Original: Original
Dialogue: Dialogue
trans: 对话

Original: Materia:With this power and you, Mog, we can...we should be able to save this world.
Dialogue: With this power and you, Mog, we can...we should be able to save this world.
trans: 有了这种力量和你，Mog，我们可以……我们应该可以拯救这个世界。

Original: Mog:I shall lead our heroes to the Torsions' epicenter!
Dialogue: I shall lead our heroes to the Torsions' epicenter!
trans: 我将带领我们的英雄前往 Torsions 的震中！

Original: Mog:Together we will eradicate the threat and bring whoever is responsible for this madness to justice!
Dialogue: Together we will eradicate the threat and bring whoever is responsible for this madness to justice!
trans: 我们将共同消除威胁，并将对这种疯狂行为负责的人绳之以法！

Original: Materia:It will not be nearly so easy as you think.
Dialogue: It will not be nearly so easy as you think.
trans: 它不会像你想象的那么容易。

Original: Materia:The heroes you speak of are scattered across realms, each looking to fulfill their own destinies.
Dialogue: The heroes you speak of are scattered across realms, each looking to fulfill their own destinies.
trans: 你所说的英雄分散在各个领域，每个人都希望实现自己的命运。

Original: Mog:Don't you worry, kupo! I've got it covered!
Dialogue: Don't you worry, kupo! I've got it covered!
trans: 别担心，库波！

Original: Mog:I've already found four warriors willing to fight for our cause.
Dialogue: I've already found four warriors willing to fight for our cause.
trans: 我已经找到了四个愿意为我们的事业而战的战士。

Original: Materia:I see them now. The mighty Warrior of Light...
Dialogue: I see them now. The mighty Warrior of Light...
trans: 我现在看到他们了。

Original: Materia:A young boy who harbors tremendous magical powers...
Dialogue: A young boy who harbors tremendous magical powers...
trans: 一个拥有巨大魔力的少年……

Original: Materia:A man whose love for his family surpasses all...
Dialogue: A man whose love for his family surpasses all...
trans: 一个对家人的爱胜过一切的男人……

Original: Materia:And a young girl who has grown into herself during a time of war...
Dialogue: And a young girl who has grown into herself during a time of war...
trans: 还有一个在战争时期成长为自己的年轻女孩......

Original: Mog:And that makes four, kupo!
Dialogue: And that makes four, kupo!
trans: 这就是四个，kupo！

Original: Materia:Indeed. It seems you are more than equal to the task.
Dialogue: Indeed. It seems you are more than equal to the task.
trans: 的确。

Original: Materia:Time, however, is not on your side.
Dialogue: Time, however, is not on your side.
trans: 然而，时间并不站在你这边。

Original: Materia:Even as we speak, the Torsions continue to spread and evolve at an unprecedented rate.
Dialogue: Even as we speak, the Torsions continue to spread and evolve at an unprecedented rate.
trans: 就在我们说话的时候，扭曲继续以前所未有的速度传播和发展。

Original: Mog:Which is precisely why I must leave soon, kupo! Before I go, though, I have one question. What of Master Spiritus?
Dialogue: Which is precisely why I must leave soon, kupo! Before I go, though, I have one question. What of Master Spiritus?
trans: 这正是我必须尽快离开的原因，库波！

Original: Materia:What of him?
Dialogue: What of him?
trans: 他呢？

Original: Mog:You know he is plotting something, kupo! Should we not move to stop him?
Dialogue: You know he is plotting something, kupo! Should we not move to stop him?
trans: 你知道他在密谋什么，库波！

Original: Mog:Or do you not trust me enough to tell me, kupo...?
Dialogue: Or do you not trust me enough to tell me, kupo...?
trans: 还是你不够信任我，不敢告诉我，库波……？

Original: Materia:He and I... We are as day and nighteternally divorced.
Dialogue: He and I... We are as day and night—eternally divorced.
trans: 他和我……我们就像白天和黑夜一样——永远离婚。

Original: Materia:But he is none of your concern.
Dialogue: But he is none of your concern.
trans: 但他与你无关。

Original: Mog:What if our methods of dealing with this issue were to collide with his plans?
Dialogue: What if our methods of dealing with this issue were to collide with his plans?
trans: 如果我们处理这个问题的方法与他的计划发生冲突怎么办？

Original: Materia:I trust that your warriors will find a way to overcome any problems that may arise.
Dialogue: I trust that your warriors will find a way to overcome any problems that may arise.
trans: 我相信你们的战士们会找到解决可能出现的任何问题的方法。

Original: Materia:They will be guided by the light after all.
Dialogue: They will be guided by the light after all.
trans: 他们终究会被光所指引。

Original: Mog:...Very well, kupo.
Dialogue: ...Very well, kupo.
trans: ……很好，大衣。

Original: Mog:Now I really must get going. Already another Torsion has opened!
Dialogue: Now I really must get going. Already another Torsion has opened!
trans: 现在我真的必须走了。

Original: Materia:Go forth, and see that the world is not met with destruction.
Dialogue: Go forth, and see that the world is not met with destruction.
trans: 出去吧，看看这个世界不会遭到毁灭。

Original: Mog:Leave it to me, kupo!
Dialogue: Leave it to me, kupo!
trans: 交给我吧，库波！

Original: Materia:These Torsions destroy even the cycle of battle.
Dialogue: These Torsions destroy even the cycle of battle.
trans: 这些扭曲甚至会破坏战斗循环。

Original: Materia:I only hope that it is not too late.
Dialogue: I only hope that it is not too late.
trans: 我只希望现在还不算太晚。

Original: Materia:If the world were to fall to ruin, it would mean I have failed as protector and god...
Dialogue: If the world were to fall to ruin, it would mean I have failed as protector and god...
trans: 如果世界毁灭了，那就意味着我作为保护者和神的失败......

Original: Garland:With you out of the way, the light shall soon succumb to darkness! Then there will be no stopping me!
Dialogue: With you out of the way, the light shall soon succumb to darkness! Then there will be no stopping me!
trans: 有了你，光明很快就会屈服于黑暗！

Original: Garland:Now begone from this world!
Dialogue: Now begone from this world!
trans: 现在离开这个世界！

Original: Warrior of Light:Where...am I?
Dialogue: Where...am I?
trans: 我在哪里？

Original: Warrior of Light:A Goblin? Allow me to handle this.
Dialogue: A Goblin? Allow me to handle this.
trans: 哥布林？

Original: Mog:Kupo! Then allow me to teach you how to fight!
Dialogue: Kupo! Then allow me to teach you how to fight!
trans: 库波！

Original: Mog:Kupo!? More enemies!?
Dialogue: Kupo!? More enemies!?
trans: 外套！？

Original: Vivi:L-let us help!
Dialogue: L-let us help!
trans: L-让我们帮忙！

Original: Warrior of Light:Thank you.
Dialogue: Thank you.
trans: 谢谢。

Original: Mog:That Goblin doesn't have much bravery. You might be able to inflict a BRV Break, kupo!
Dialogue: That Goblin doesn't have much bravery. You might be able to inflict a BRV Break, kupo!
trans: 那个哥布林没有多大的勇气。

Original: Mog:To think that you were able to take on such fearsome beasts and live to tell the tale... You're incredible, kupo!
Dialogue: To think that you were able to take on such fearsome beasts and live to tell the tale... You're incredible, kupo!
trans: 想不到你能够对付如此可怕的野兽并活着讲述这个故事……你太不可思议了，kupo！

Original: Rem:Sir, are you all right? Earlier you seemed
Dialogue: Sir, are you all right? Earlier you seemed—
trans: 先生，你还好吗？

Original: Warrior of Light:I'm fine. Thank you... Rem, was it?
Dialogue: I'm fine. Thank you... Rem, was it?
trans: 我很好。

Original: Rem:Yes. And this is
Dialogue: Yes. And this is—
trans: 是的。

Original: Vivi:Vivi. I am Vivi.
Dialogue: Vivi. I am Vivi.
trans: 你住在。

Original: Vivi:Mog found and rescued me when I was first transported to this world.
Dialogue: Mog found and rescued me when I was first transported to this world.
trans: 当我第一次被传送到这个世界时，Mog 发现并救了我。

Original: Warrior of Light:So you, too, are warriors possessed of the light, brought here for some explicit purpose?
Dialogue: So you, too, are warriors possessed of the light, brought here for some explicit purpose?
trans: 所以你也是拥有光的战士，为了某些明确的目的被带到这里吗？

Original: Mog:That's correct, kupo!
Dialogue: That's correct, kupo!
trans: 没错，库波！

Original: Mog:Lately, Torsions have been threatening the safety of our world. You're our last hope of finding and closing them, kupo!
Dialogue: Lately, Torsions have been threatening the safety of our world. You're our last hope of finding and closing them, kupo!
trans: 最近，扭转一直在威胁着我们世界的安全。

Original: Vivi:The monsters appeared from one of these Torsions, didn't they?
Dialogue: The monsters appeared from one of these Torsions, didn't they?
trans: 怪物是从其中一个 Torsion 出现的，不是吗？

Original: Rem:And we're the only ones who can seal them?
Dialogue: And we're the only ones who can seal them?
trans: 而我们是唯一可以封印它们的人？

Original: Rem:I feel that's far beyond our capabilities.
Dialogue: I feel that's far beyond our capabilities.
trans: 我觉得这远远超出了我们的能力范围。

Original: Mog:You can do it, kupo! Have a little faith.
Dialogue: You can do it, kupo! Have a little faith.
trans: 你可以的，库波！

Original: Mog:There's a small Torsion nearby. Let's make our way there and seal it off, kupo.
Dialogue: There's a small Torsion nearby. Let's make our way there and seal it off, kupo.
trans: 附近有一个小 Torsion。

Original: Mog:I'll assist you in any way I can, kupo.
Dialogue: I'll assist you in any way I can, kupo.
trans: 我会尽我所能帮助你，kupo。

Original: Warrior of Light:Very good. We shall be counting on your support, then.
Dialogue: Very good. We shall be counting on your support, then.
trans: 非常好。

Original: Mog:The knock back icon is your chance to perform a chain attack, kupo!
Dialogue: The knock back icon is your chance to perform a chain attack, kupo!
trans: 击退图标是你进行连锁攻击的机会，库波！

Original: Mog:Oh no! A Flan, kupo! Good thing it's weak to Vivi's Fire spell!
Dialogue: Oh no! A Flan, kupo! Good thing it's weak to Vivi's Fire spell!
trans: 不好了！

Original: Vivi:F-Fire? Okay, I'll give it a try!
Dialogue: F-Fire? Okay, I'll give it a try!
trans: F-火？

Original: Mog:Good job! Keep it up, kupo!
Dialogue: Good job! Keep it up, kupo!
trans: 好工作！

Original: Mog:It's an Iron Giant, kupo! One strike from that thing can be trouble!
Dialogue: It's an Iron Giant, kupo! One strike from that thing can be trouble!
trans: 是钢铁巨人库波！

Original: Mog:Use Shining Shield to protect Vivi, kupo!
Dialogue: Use Shining Shield to protect Vivi, kupo!
trans: 使用闪耀之盾保护薇薇，库珀！

Original: Mog:Look! We closed it, kupo!
Dialogue: Look! We closed it, kupo!
trans: 看！

Original: Vivi:Now we don't need to worry about those monsters anymore.
Dialogue: Now we don't need to worry about those monsters anymore.
trans: 现在我们再也不用担心那些怪物了。

Original: Rem:No, Vivi. You forget that there's more than one Torsion.
Dialogue: No, Vivi. You forget that there's more than one Torsion.
trans: 不，薇薇。

Original: Mog:Indeed, kupo! They've been cropping up all across the land.
Dialogue: Indeed, kupo! They've been cropping up all across the land.
trans: 确实，库波！

Original: Warrior of Light:And it is our duty to ensure that each and every one of them is closed.
Dialogue: And it is our duty to ensure that each and every one of them is closed.
trans: 我们有责任确保每一个都关闭。

Original: Mog:You won't be alone! We'll find more people along the way who can help us, kupo!
Dialogue: You won't be alone! We'll find more people along the way who can help us, kupo!
trans: 你不会孤单！

Original: Warrior of Light:Is that man a friend of yours?
Dialogue: Is that man a friend of yours?
trans: 那个男人是你的朋友吗？

Original: Vivi:Mister! We're over here!
Dialogue: Mister! We're over here!
trans: 先生！

Original: ???:Sorry 'bout that! Was busy inspecting the area.
Dialogue: Sorry 'bout that! Was busy inspecting the area.
trans: 对不起！

Original: Mog:Did you find anything, kupo?
Dialogue: Did you find anything, kupo?
trans: 你找到什么了吗，库波？

Original: Sazh:Yeah. There's a big Torsion up ahead. Bet that's where all the monsters are coming from.
Dialogue: Yeah. There's a big Torsion up ahead. Bet that's where all the monsters are coming from.
trans: 是的。

Original: Mog:Kupopo! We only just closed one and you're telling me there's another, bigger one nearby!?
Dialogue: Kupopo! We only just closed one and you're telling me there's another, bigger one nearby!?
trans: 库波波！

Original: Mog:Good grief, kupo... Well, I suppose it's nothing we can't handle together!
Dialogue: Good grief, kupo... Well, I suppose it's nothing we can't handle together!
trans: 天啊，库波……好吧，我想我们没有什么不能一起解决的！

Original: Rem:Once we eradicate all the Torsions, will we be able to return to our respective worlds?
Dialogue: Once we eradicate all the Torsions, will we be able to return to our respective worlds?
trans: 消灭所有扭曲后，我们就能回到各自的世界吗？

Original: Vivi:Yes, I'm certain of it! That's why we have to do our best to help them!
Dialogue: Yes, I'm certain of it! That's why we have to do our best to help them!
trans: 是的，我确定！

Original: Mog:That's the spirit, kupo! Now that Sazh is back, we can go and close the next Torsion!
Dialogue: That's the spirit, kupo! Now that Sazh is back, we can go and close the next Torsion!
trans: 这就是精神，库波！

Original: Warrior of Light:When this is all over...
Dialogue: When this is all over...
trans: 当这一切结束...

Original: Warrior of Light:I wonder if there will even be a world left for me to return to...
Dialogue: I wonder if there will even be a world left for me to return to...
trans: 我不知道是否还有一个世界让我回到……

Original: ???:Little do they know, should all go according to plan, soon they'll be dancing to the beat of my drum.
Dialogue: Little do they know, should all go according to plan, soon they'll be dancing to the beat of my drum.
trans: 他们不知道，一切都应该按计划进行，很快他们就会随着我的鼓点跳舞。

Original: ???:Oh, what a spectacular show it will be!
Dialogue: Oh, what a spectacular show it will be!
trans: 哦，这将是一场多么壮观的表演！

Original: Mog:Red Bats are pesky creatures that use Flap to dodge your attacks!
Dialogue: Red Bats are pesky creatures that use Flap to dodge your attacks!
trans: 红蝙蝠是讨厌的生物，它们会使用拍打来躲避您的攻击！

Original: Mog:But Sazh's ability Aim will hit the enemy every time, kupo!
Dialogue: But Sazh's ability Aim will hit the enemy every time, kupo!
trans: 但是Sazh的技能Aim每次都会命中敌人，kupo！

Original: Mog:Kupo... Skeletons unleash a frightening attack after using Brace.
Dialogue: Kupo... Skeletons unleash a frightening attack after using Brace.
trans: Kupo... 骷髅在使用 Brace 后发动可怕的攻击。

Original: Mog:But inflicting a BRV Break will smash it into pieces, leaving it vulnerable for a few turns!
Dialogue: But inflicting a BRV Break will smash it into pieces, leaving it vulnerable for a few turns!
trans: 但是造成 BRV Break 会将它粉碎成碎片，让它在几个回合内变得脆弱！

Original: Sazh:Nasty bats nearly had us back there. Dodge every attack you throw at 'em.
Dialogue: Nasty bats nearly had us back there. Dodge every attack you throw at 'em.
trans: 讨厌的蝙蝠差点让我们回到那里。

Original: Mog:That's why we need as many allies as possible, kupo!
Dialogue: That's why we need as many allies as possible, kupo!
trans: 这就是为什么我们需要尽可能多的盟友，kupo！

Original: Vivi:Lookthere's someone over there!
Dialogue: Look—there's someone over there!
trans: 看——那边有人！

Original: Mog:P-please, kupo! Lower your fists! We mean you no harm!
Dialogue: P-please, kupo! Lower your fists! We mean you no harm!
trans: P-拜托，kupo！

Original: ???:...You don't appear to be dangerous.
Dialogue: ...You don't appear to be dangerous.
trans: ……你看起来并不危险。

Original: Sazh:We're not, but I wouldn't blame you if you turned and ran the other way. Just look at usa talking moogle, a knight...
Dialogue: We're not, but I wouldn't blame you if you turned and ran the other way. Just look at us—a talking moogle, a knight...
trans: 我们不是，但如果你转身跑向另一条路，我不会责怪你。

Original: ???:You, on the other hand, seem fairly...normal. What is this place?
Dialogue: You, on the other hand, seem fairly...normal. What is this place?
trans: 另一方面，你看起来相当……正常。

Original: Warrior of Light:While I cannot answer that with any certainty, what I can tell you is that none of us are natives of this land.
Dialogue: While I cannot answer that with any certainty, what I can tell you is that none of us are natives of this land.
trans: 虽然我不能肯定地回答这个问题，但我可以告诉你的是，我们都不是这片土地上的本地人。

Original: ???:You mean...this isn't my world?
Dialogue: You mean...this isn't my world?
trans: 你是说……这不是我的世界？

Original: Sazh:No, it isn't. It's dangerous for a little lady like you to be wandering this place alone.
Dialogue: No, it isn't. It's dangerous for a little lady like you to be wandering this place alone.
trans: 不，不是。

Original: ???:I'm not alone. My friends are here, too. We got separated earlier.
Dialogue: I'm not alone. My friends are here, too. We got separated earlier.
trans: 我不孤独。

Original: ???:I've been searching for them, but I keep running into monsters.
Dialogue: I've been searching for them, but I keep running into monsters.
trans: 我一直在寻找它们，但我一直遇到怪物。

Original: Mog:Kupo... Up until recently, our land was a peaceful one.
Dialogue: Kupo... Up until recently, our land was a peaceful one.
trans: Kupo... 直到最近，我们的土地还是和平的。

Original: Mog:It was only after the Torsions started to appear that the beasts began terrorizing us.
Dialogue: It was only after the Torsions started to appear that the beasts began terrorizing us.
trans: 直到扭曲开始出现后，野兽才开始恐吓我们。

Original: Mog:But I have hope that tranquility will soon be restored by the light, kupo!
Dialogue: But I have hope that tranquility will soon be restored by the light, kupo!
trans: 但我希望光明能很快恢复平静，库波！

Original: Warrior of Light:Perhaps she too possesses the light.
Dialogue: Perhaps she too possesses the light.
trans: 也许她也拥有光。

Dialogue: ...I do?
trans: ...我愿意？

Original: Mog:Yes! Yes, indeed, kupo!
Dialogue: Yes! Yes, indeed, kupo!
trans: 是的！

Original: Vivi:Maybe you can join us, miss?
Dialogue: Maybe you can join us, miss?
trans: 也许你可以加入我们，小姐？

Original: ???:Hm... Yes, maybe I should.
Dialogue: Hm... Yes, maybe I should.
trans: 嗯……是的，也许我应该。

Original: ???:Perhaps then I'll finally be able to find my friends.
Dialogue: Perhaps then I'll finally be able to find my friends.
trans: 也许到那时我终于可以找到我的朋友了。

Original: Tifa:I'm Tifa. I look forward to working with you.
Dialogue: I'm Tifa. I look forward to working with you.
trans: 我是蒂法

Original: Mog:Welcome aboard, kupo! You look like you can take out more than a few skeletons with those fists!
Dialogue: Welcome aboard, kupo! You look like you can take out more than a few skeletons with those fists!
trans: 欢迎加入，kupo！

Original: Mog:This is fantastic, kupo! Once again our numbers have grown and soon we'll be closing Torsions faster than ever before!
Dialogue: This is fantastic, kupo! Once again our numbers have grown and soon we'll be closing Torsions faster than ever before!
trans: 这太棒了，kupo！

Original: Warrior of Light:Caution, friends. Someone is nearby.
Dialogue: Caution, friends. Someone is nearby.
trans: 小心，朋友们。

Original: Tifa:Wait! That's...
Dialogue: Wait! That's...
trans: 等待！

Original: Tifa:Thank goodness it's you! I've been looking all over for you!
Dialogue: Thank goodness it's you! I've been looking all over for you!
trans: 谢天谢地是你！

Original: Mog:You know him, kupo?
Dialogue: You know him, kupo?
trans: 你认识他吗，库波？

Original: Mog:Well, that makes my job easier! Hello, Mr. Spiky-Head!
Dialogue: Well, that makes my job easier! Hello, Mr. Spiky-Head!
trans: 好吧，这让我的工作更轻松了！

Original: Cloud:A moogle that can talk?
Dialogue: A moogle that can talk?
trans: 会说话的莫古力？

Original: Tifa:Well, the world we're in right now is
Dialogue: Well, the world we're in right now is—
trans: 好吧，我们现在所处的世界是——

Original: Warrior of Light:Now is not the time. It seems we have company.
Dialogue: Now is not the time. It seems we have company.
trans: 现在不是时候。

Original: Cloud:Stand back. I've got this.
Dialogue: Stand back. I've got this.
trans: 退后。

Original: Tifa:Cloud! You're not alone anymore! Let us help you.
Dialogue: Cloud! You're not alone anymore! Let us help you.
trans: 云！

Original: Mog:Why won't anyone listen to me, kupo?
Dialogue: Why won't anyone listen to me, kupo?
trans: 为什么没人听我的，库波？

Original: Warrior of Light:You were quick to defeat those enemies. I'm impressed.
Dialogue: You were quick to defeat those enemies. I'm impressed.
trans: 你很快就打败了那些敌人。

Original: Tifa:Cloud, what you're doing is reckless!
Dialogue: Cloud, what you're doing is reckless!
trans: 云，你这样做太鲁莽了！

Original: Tifa:You don't know anything about this world...so let's stick together, okay?
Dialogue: You don't know anything about this world...so let's stick together, okay?
trans: 你对这个世界一无所知……所以让我们一起坚持，好吗？

Original: Mog:She's right, kupo! Besides, you possess the will of the light. We can save this world together.
Dialogue: She's right, kupo! Besides, you possess the will of the light. We can save this world together.
trans: 她是对的，库波！

Original: Cloud:Not interested.
Dialogue: Not interested.
trans: 没兴趣。

Original: Sazh:Looks like other worlds also have their fair share of strongheaded soldiers who take on way too much alone.
Dialogue: Looks like other worlds also have their fair share of strongheaded soldiers who take on way too much alone.
trans: 看起来其他世界也有相当一部分坚强的士兵，他们独自承担了太多的责任。

Original: Sazh:Cloud, was it? What's your game plan?
Dialogue: Cloud, was it? What's your game plan?
trans: 云，是吗？

Original: Cloud:There's someone I need to settle things with.
Dialogue: There's someone I need to settle things with.
trans: 我需要找个人来解决问题。

Original: Sazh:And do you have any idea where this someone is? Sure you don't need any help?
Dialogue: And do you have any idea where this someone is? Sure you don't need any help?
trans: 你知道这个人在哪里吗？

Original: Sazh:This moogle's the only one who knows anything about this world. Besides, what've you gotta lose?
Dialogue: This moogle's the only one who knows anything about this world. Besides, what've you gotta lose?
trans: 这个莫古利是唯一对这个世界一无所知的人。

Original: Cloud:Maybe you're right.
Dialogue: Maybe you're right.
trans: 也许你是对的。

Original: Cloud:All right, I'll go with you. Just don't get in my way.
Dialogue: All right, I'll go with you. Just don't get in my way.
trans: 好吧，我跟你一起去。

Original: Sazh:We won't. We're on your side.
Dialogue: We won't. We're on your side.
trans: 我们不会。

Original: Mog:Then it's settled! Great having you aboard, kupo!
Dialogue: Then it's settled! Great having you aboard, kupo!
trans: 然后就解决了！

Original: Tifa:Looks like it's you and me again!
Dialogue: Looks like it's you and me again!
trans: 看来又是你我了！

Original: Mog:The more the merrier! You can never have too many friends, kupo!
Dialogue: The more the merrier! You can never have too many friends, kupo!
trans: 多多益善！

Original: ???:Why me? Why do bad things always happen to me?
Dialogue: Why me? Why do bad things always happen to me?
trans: 为什么是我？

Original: Sazh:Huh? Is that...!?
Dialogue: Huh? Is that...!?
trans: 嗯？

Original: ???:Wait. Is that an exit over there?
Dialogue: Wait. Is that an exit over there?
trans: 等待。

Original: Mog:Do you know him, kupo?
Dialogue: Do you know him, kupo?
trans: 你认识他吗，库波？

Original: Sazh:Do I know him? He's one of my buddies from my world!
Dialogue: Do I know him? He's one of my buddies from my world!
trans: 我认识他吗？

Original: Mog:Kupopo! I sensed a strong will of the light from him!
Dialogue: Kupopo! I sensed a strong will of the light from him!
trans: 库波波！

Original: Sazh:But he's still just a kid, you know? I mean, he's older than Vivi...
Dialogue: But he's still just a kid, you know? I mean, he's older than Vivi...
trans: 但他还是个孩子，你知道吗？

Original: Vivi:You're really worried about him, aren't you?
Dialogue: You're really worried about him, aren't you?
trans: 你真的很担心他，不是吗？

Original: Sazh:Yeah, I have a son of my own, so I can't just... Sorry, this isn't the time to be getting sentimental.
Dialogue: Yeah, I have a son of my own, so I can't just... Sorry, this isn't the time to be getting sentimental.
trans: 是的，我有自己的儿子，所以我不能只是... 抱歉，现在不是多愁善感的时候。

Original: Warrior of Light:Getting out of here alone is not a simple task. We must find him quickly.
Dialogue: Getting out of here alone is not a simple task. We must find him quickly.
trans: 一个人离开这里可不是一件简单的事情。

Original: Mog:Let's help him and get him to join us, kupo!
Dialogue: Let's help him and get him to join us, kupo!
trans: 让我们帮助他，让他加入我们，kupo！

Original: Sazh:Hope!
Dialogue: Hope!
trans: 希望！

Original: Hope:Where are we? And who are they? And why are they
Dialogue: Where are we? And who are they? And why are they—
trans: 我们在哪里？

Original: Sazh:Relax, relax. They may look a little different, but they're on our side.
Dialogue: Relax, relax. They may look a little different, but they're on our side.
trans: 放松，放松。

Original: Mog:Your name's Hope, kupo?
Dialogue: Your name's Hope, kupo?
trans: 你叫霍普，库波？

Original: Hope:Did that moogle just talk? This is some kind of ultra-realistic toy...right?
Dialogue: Did that moogle just talk? This is some kind of ultra-realistic toy...right?
trans: 那个莫古利刚刚说话了吗？

Original: Mog:I'm not a toy, kupo! More importantly, I have something I need to tell you!
Dialogue: I'm not a toy, kupo! More importantly, I have something I need to tell you!
trans: 我不是玩具，库波！

Original: Mog:...And that's the situation we're in right now, kupo.
Dialogue: ...And that's the situation we're in right now, kupo.
trans: ......这就是我们现在所处的情况，kupo。

Original: Warrior of Light:And you, Hope, also possess the will of the light. You are one of us.
Dialogue: And you, Hope, also possess the will of the light. You are one of us.
trans: 而你，霍普，也拥有光之意志。

Original: Hope:The will of the light? M-me? Are you sure?
Dialogue: The will of the light? M-me? Are you sure?
trans: 光之意志？

Original: Mog:I'm positive, kupo! Trust me.
Dialogue: I'm positive, kupo! Trust me.
trans: 我很肯定，库波！

Original: Sazh:At any rate, we gotta do something about this world if we ever plan on going back to our own.
Dialogue: At any rate, we gotta do something about this world if we ever plan on going back to our own.
trans: 无论如何，如果我们打算回到我们自己的世界，我们就必须为这个世界做点什么。

Original: Sazh:So come with us. It's safer that way, you know?
Dialogue: So come with us. It's safer that way, you know?
trans: 所以和我们一起来吧。

Original: Sazh:Besides, you'd be doing us a favor! We could use your skills.
Dialogue: Besides, you'd be doing us a favor! We could use your skills.
trans: 此外，你会帮我们一个忙！

Original: Hope:All right, I'm in.
Dialogue: All right, I'm in.
trans: 好吧，我进去了。

Original: Hope:I'll do what I can to help.
Dialogue: I'll do what I can to help.
trans: 我会尽我所能提供帮助。

Original: Mog:Hello, kupo! What are you doing?
Dialogue: Hello, kupo! What are you doing?
trans: 你好，库波！

Original: Mog:No. Why, kupo?
Dialogue: No. Why, kupo?
trans: 不。

Original: ???:This forest's aether is corrupted. I can only hope that the taint has not spread much further beyond this area.
Dialogue: This forest's aether is corrupted. I can only hope that the taint has not spread much further beyond this area.
trans: 这片森林的以太被腐蚀了。

Original: Mog:Corrupted aether...? Oh, because of the Torsions! That's where the dark energy is spilling from. We're here to close them!
Dialogue: Corrupted aether...? Oh, because of the Torsions! That's where the dark energy is spilling from. We're here to close them!
trans: 腐化的以太……？

Original: Mog:Yes, they serve as an interdimensional portal to our world. That's where the dark energy and scary monsters are coming from, kupo.
Dialogue: Yes, they serve as an interdimensional portal to our world. That's where the dark energy and scary monsters are coming from, kupo.
trans: 是的，它们是通往我们世界的多维门户。

Original: ???:That would explain the sinister presence I felt earlier.
Dialogue: That would explain the sinister presence I felt earlier.
trans: 这可以解释我之前感受到的险恶存在。

Original: Mog:The will of the light radiates strongly from you. Will you help us, kupo?
Dialogue: The will of the light radiates strongly from you. Will you help us, kupo?
trans: 光的意志从你身上散发出强烈的光芒。

Original: ???:Hm... Working with a group would certainly facilitate my investigation.
Dialogue: Hm... Working with a group would certainly facilitate my investigation.
trans: 嗯……和一群人一起工作肯定会有助于我的调查。

Original: Mog:Hooray, ku!
Dialogue: Hooray, ku—!
trans: 万岁，到——！

Original: ???:I am afraid, however, that I must decline. There is another matter I must attend to first.
Dialogue: I am afraid, however, that I must decline. There is another matter I must attend to first.
trans: 然而，恐怕我必须拒绝。

Original: Mog:What if we can help you? Would you join us then?
Dialogue: What if we can help you? Would you join us then?
trans: 如果我们可以帮助您呢？

Original: ???:Perhaps. But before we discuss this any further, I ask that you draw your swords.
Dialogue: Perhaps. But before we discuss this any further, I ask that you draw your swords.
trans: 也许。

Original: ???:It seems we've been joined by a few uninvited guests.
Dialogue: It seems we've been joined by a few uninvited guests.
trans: 似乎有一些不速之客加入了我们。

Original: Mog:A-are they gone, kupo?
Dialogue: A-are they gone, kupo?
trans: 他们走了吗，kupo？

Original: ???:I believe so. I can no longer feel their presence.
Dialogue: I believe so. I can no longer feel their presence.
trans: 我相信是这样。

Original: Mog:Good! So what do you say? Will you join us, kupo?
Dialogue: Good! So what do you say? Will you join us, kupo?
trans: 好的！

Original: ???:Having witnessed your incredible strength first-hand, I would be honored to call you allies.
Dialogue: Having witnessed your incredible strength first-hand, I would be honored to call you allies.
trans: 亲眼目睹了你们不可思议的力量，我很荣幸称你们为盟友。

Original: ???:Please allow me to properly introduce myself. I am Y'shtola.
Dialogue: Please allow me to properly introduce myself. I am Y'shtola.
trans: 请允许我适当地介绍一下自己。

Original: Y'shtola:I am well versed in the art of Conjury, and believe my talents will serve you well.
Dialogue: I am well versed in the art of Conjury, and believe my talents will serve you well.
trans: 我精通魔术艺术，相信我的才能对你有用。

Original: Mog:How exciting, kupo! Another friend possessed of the light has agreed to lend a hand to our cause!
Dialogue: How exciting, kupo! Another friend possessed of the light has agreed to lend a hand to our cause!
trans: 多么令人兴奋，库波！

Original: Y'shtola:I take it that having this light is essential to one's ability to close Torsions?
Dialogue: I take it that having this light is essential to one's ability to close Torsions?
trans: 我认为拥有这种光对于一个人关闭扭转的能力至关重要吗？

Original: Mog:That's right, kupo! ...But I don't know how it works...
Dialogue: That's right, kupo! ...But I don't know how it works...
trans: 没错，库波！

Original: Y'shtola:Fascinating... Perhaps there is more to this world than meets the eye.
Dialogue: Fascinating... Perhaps there is more to this world than meets the eye.
trans: 令人着迷……也许这个世界远不止眼前所见。

Original: Rem:I have a bad feeling about this. The monsters in this area are acting very strangely.
Dialogue: I have a bad feeling about this. The monsters in this area are acting very strangely.
trans: 我对此有一种不好的预感。

Original: Mog:That means there's a Torsion nearby, kupo!
Dialogue: That means there's a Torsion nearby, kupo!
trans: 这意味着附近有扭力，kupo！

Original: Warrior of Light:Yes. I can feel it...and something else.
Dialogue: Yes. I can feel it...and something else.
trans: 是的。

Original: Warrior of Light:Everyone, be on your guard. There is something far more malevolent than mere monsters lurking about.
Dialogue: Everyone, be on your guard. There is something far more malevolent than mere monsters lurking about.
trans: 大家注意安全。

Original: Vivi:M-more malevolent than monsters!? I don't like the sound of that...
Dialogue: M-more malevolent than monsters!? I don't like the sound of that...
trans: 比怪物还恶毒！？

Original: Vivi:Wait! Please don't leave me behind!
Dialogue: Wait! Please don't leave me behind!
trans: 等待！

Original: ???:Ah... There you are.
Dialogue: Ah... There you are.
trans: 啊……你来了。

Original: ???:Why must you insist on always ruining my fun?
Dialogue: Why must you insist on always ruining my fun?
trans: 为什么你一定要老是破坏我的乐趣？

Original: Mog:That was a close one, kupo! Counter with a summon!
Dialogue: That was a close one, kupo! Counter with a summon!
trans: 那是一个接近的，kupo！

Original: Cloud:Is that it?
Dialogue: Is that it?
trans: 是吗？

Original: Sazh:And more importantly did getting rid of it solve our monster problem?
Dialogue: And more importantly did getting rid of it solve our monster problem?
trans: 更重要的是，摆脱它是否解决了我们的怪物问题？

Original: Tifa:I think so. Their numbers seem to have diminished at the very least.
Dialogue: I think so. Their numbers seem to have diminished at the very least.
trans: 我想是这样。

Original: Y'shtola:You must remember, however, that this is not the only Torsion that plagues this world.
Dialogue: You must remember, however, that this is not the only Torsion that plagues this world.
trans: 但是，您必须记住，这并不是困扰这个世界的唯一扭曲。

Original: Mog:Indeed, kupo! Our job is far from over.
Dialogue: Indeed, kupo! Our job is far from over.
trans: 确实，库波！

Original: Mog:But if we continue working together I'm sure we'll accomplish our goal in no time!
Dialogue: But if we continue working together I'm sure we'll accomplish our goal in no time!
trans: 但如果我们继续合作，我相信我们会很快实现我们的目标！

Original: Tifa:Then let's keep going.
Dialogue: Then let's keep going.
trans: 那我们继续吧。

Original: Mog:Yes, kupo! Our next destination: the lands beyond the northern sea!
Dialogue: Yes, kupo! Our next destination the lands beyond the northern sea!
trans: 是的，库波！

Original: Mog:And before you ask how we're going to get there, we'll be going by airship, kupo!
Dialogue: And before you ask how we're going to get there, we'll be going by airship, kupo!
trans: 在你问我们如何到达那里之前，我们将乘飞艇去，库波！

Original: Sazh:Airship? Excellent. That's just my style.
Dialogue: Airship? Excellent. That's just my style.
trans: 飞艇？

Original: Cloud:Are you a pilot or something?
Dialogue: Are you a pilot or something?
trans: 你是飞行员还是什么？

Original: Hope:Only the best! How could you tell?
Dialogue: Only the best! How could you tell?
trans: 只有最好！

Original: Cloud:I have a friend a lot like him.
Dialogue: I have a friend a lot like him.
trans: 我有一个朋友很像他。

Original: Sazh:Let's go! I can't wait to see how this baby flies!
Dialogue: Let's go! I can't wait to see how this baby flies!
trans: 我们走吧！

Original: Materia:I see you were successful in closing the Torsion and averting disaster. Thank you.
Dialogue: I see you were successful in closing the Torsion and averting disaster. Thank you.
trans: 我看到你成功地关闭了 Torsion 并避免了灾难。

Original: Mog:Of course, kupo! It's my duty after all!
Dialogue: Of course, kupo! It's my duty after all!
trans: 当然，库波！

Original: Mog:And not to toot my own horn, but I've also managed to find four new warriors!
Dialogue: And not to toot my own horn, but I've also managed to find four new warriors!
trans: 不是自吹自擂，我还设法找到了四个新战士！

Original: Materia:Indeed. And each and every one of them has demonstrated enormous promise.
Dialogue: Indeed. And each and every one of them has demonstrated enormous promise.
trans: 的确。

Original: Materia:I fear, however, that the darkness continues to grow stronger.
Dialogue: I fear, however, that the darkness continues to grow stronger.
trans: 然而，我担心黑暗会继续变强。

Original: Mog:Wh-what do you mean, kupo?
Dialogue: Wh-what do you mean, kupo?
trans: 什-什么意思，库波？

Original: Materia:Whoever is responsible has been attempting to bend the Torsions to their own will.
Dialogue: Whoever is responsible has been attempting to bend the Torsions to their own will.
trans: 负责的人一直在试图使扭力屈服于他们自己的意志。

Original: Mog:That sounds very dangerous, kupo! We must proceed with the utmost caution then!
Dialogue: That sounds very dangerous, kupo! We must proceed with the utmost caution then!
trans: 听起来很危险，库波！

Original: Materia:Yes. And remember, Mog, among the warriors you will encounter is one who knows the darkness.
Dialogue: Yes. And remember, Mog, among the warriors you will encounter is one who knows the darkness.
trans: 是的。

Original: Materia:When all is lost, you best turn to him for guidance.
Dialogue: When all is lost, you best turn to him for guidance.
trans: 当一切都失去了，你最好向他寻求指导。

Original: Mog:Yes, kupo!
Dialogue: Yes, kupo!
trans: 对，外套！

Original: Sazh:We're here!
Dialogue: We're here!
trans: 我们到了！

Original: Vivi:That was amazing! You really are a great pilot, Mister!
Dialogue: That was amazing! You really are a great pilot, Mister!
trans: 那太精彩了！

Original: Sazh:It's easy once you know the basics. Shame we couldn't fly in any closer, though.
Dialogue: It's easy once you know the basics. Shame we couldn't fly in any closer, though.
trans: 一旦你了解了基础知识就很容易了。

Original: Mog:Sadly, there aren't any areas we can safely land the airship beyond this point, kupo.
Dialogue: Sadly, there aren't any areas we can safely land the airship beyond this point, kupo.
trans: 可悲的是，除了这个点之外，我们没有任何地方可以让飞艇安全着陆，kupo。

Original: Cloud:Whatever. We can walk from here. If anything gets in our way, I'll put it down.
Dialogue: Whatever. We can walk from here. If anything gets in our way, I'll put it down.
trans: 任何。

Original: Tifa:And who knows? Maybe we'll make some new friends along the way.
Dialogue: And who knows? Maybe we'll make some new friends along the way.
trans: 谁知道呢？

Original: Warrior of Light:Where exactly do we need to go?
Dialogue: Where exactly do we need to go?
trans: 我们到底需要去哪里？

Original: Mog:North, kupo! To where the ancient ruins are.
Dialogue: North, kupo! To where the ancient ruins are.
trans: 北方，库波！

Original: Mog:The time-space continuum has been heavily distorted in that region, which means a Torsion is close by!
Dialogue: The time-space continuum has been heavily distorted in that region, which means a Torsion is close by!
trans: 该区域的时空连续体已经严重扭曲，这意味着扭曲就在附近！

Original: Tifa:Ruins? I guess your world isn't that much different from ours.
Dialogue: Ruins? I guess your world isn't that much different from ours.
trans: 废墟？

Original: Zidane:You've been gathering an army of beasts. What do you intend to do with them, Kuja!?
Dialogue: You've been gathering an army of beasts. What do you intend to do with them, Kuja!?
trans: 你一直在聚集野兽大军。

Original: Kuja:You of all people should understand! If you've come all this way to mock me
Dialogue: You of all people should understand! If you've come all this way to mock me—
trans: 你们所有人都应该明白！

Original: Zidane:Mock you? I'm here to
Dialogue: Mock you? I'm here to—
trans: 嘲笑你？

Original: Vivi:Oh! That's him, everyonethe friend I was telling you about! And he's with that man...
Dialogue: Oh! That's him, everyone—the friend I was telling you about! And he's with that man...
trans: 哦！

Original: Kuja:Bearers of light... How inconvenient.
Dialogue: Bearers of light... How inconvenient.
trans: 光的承载者……多么不方便。

Original: Warrior of Light:That manhe just opened a Torsion!
Dialogue: That man—he just opened a Torsion!
trans: 那个男人——他刚刚开启了扭力！

Original: Zidane:No! I can't believe he got away!
Dialogue: No! I can't believe he got away!
trans: 不！

Original: Vivi:I-I'm sorry... It's all my fault.
Dialogue: I-I'm sorry... It's all my fault.
trans: 我、对不起……都是我的错。

Original: Zidane:Don't worry about it, Vivi. I"m just glad you're safe. ...That said, who are these pretty ladies?
Dialogue: Don't worry about it, Vivi. I"m just glad you're safe. ...That said, who are these pretty ladies?
trans: 别担心，薇薇。

Original: Tifa:I'm Tifa. I take it you're Vivi's friend?
Dialogue: I'm Tifa. I take it you're Vivi's friend?
trans: 我是蒂法

Original: Vivi:Yes! His name is Zidane. He's really, really strong and reliable!
Dialogue: Yes! His name is Zidane. He's really, really strong and reliable!
trans: 是的！

Original: Zidane:Aw, Vivistop it! You're making me blush. And you might be...?
Dialogue: Aw, Vivi—stop it! You're making me blush. And you might be...?
trans: 噢，薇薇——停下！

Original: Rem:I'm Rem. It seems we come from very different places.
Dialogue: I'm Rem. It seems we come from very different places.
trans: 我是蕾姆

Original: Mog:Everyone here is blessed with the lightthe power to close Torsions, kupo!
Dialogue: Everyone here is blessed with the light—the power to close Torsions, kupo!
trans: 这里的每个人都被光所祝福——关闭扭转的力量，库波！

Original: Zidane:Torsions...? Is that what you call the portals Kuja uses to let monsters in and out?
Dialogue: Torsions...? Is that what you call the portals Kuja uses to let monsters in and out?

Original: Vivi:Yes, and that's why this world is in big trouble.
Dialogue: Yes, and that's why this world is in big trouble.
trans: 是的，这就是这个世界陷入大麻烦的原因。

Original: Mog:Not just this world, kupo! If the Torsions continue to spread, they'll eventually reach your home, too!
Dialogue: Not just this world, kupo! If the Torsions continue to spread, they'll eventually reach your home, too!
trans: 不只是这个世界，库波！

Original: Zidane:So that's what he's been up to!
Dialogue: So that's what he's been up to!
trans: 原来他是这么想的！

Original: Mog:Zidane, you also have the gift of light! Will you help us, kupo?
Dialogue: Zidane, you also have the gift of light! Will you help us, kupo?
trans: 齐达内，你也有光明的天赋！

Original: Zidane:I don't see why not.
Dialogue: I don't see why not.
trans: 我不明白为什么不。

Original: Mog:Hooray, kupo! Once again, our number's grown!
Dialogue: Hooray, kupo! Once again, our number's grown!
trans: 万岁，库波！

Original: Zidane:That's right. If you need someone agile, I'm your guy!
Dialogue: That's right. If you need someone agile, I'm your guy!
trans: 这是正确的。

Original: Warrior of Light:You would be the first among us capable of such feats. We would be glad to have you in our ranks.
Dialogue: You would be the first among us capable of such feats. We would be glad to have you in our ranks.
trans: 你将是我们当中第一个有这种壮举的人。

Original: Y'shtola:A man has stepped through the Torsion!
Dialogue: A man has stepped through the Torsion!
trans: 一个人已经跨过了扭转！

Original: Sazh:Sweet mercy! I hope he's friendly.
Dialogue: Sweet mercy! I hope he's friendly.
trans: 甜蜜的怜悯！

Original: Sazh:All these armored-up soldiers look the same to me.
Dialogue: All these armored-up soldiers look the same to me.
trans: 所有这些全副武装的士兵在我看来都一样。

Original: ???:Identify yourselves!
Dialogue: Identify yourselves!
trans: 认清自己！

Original: Sazh:Your mother not teach you any manners? You first.
Dialogue: Your mother not teach you any manners? You first.
trans: 你妈妈没教你什么礼仪？

Original: Sazh:Guess you really shouldn't judge a book by its cover.
Dialogue: Guess you really shouldn't judge a book by its cover.
trans: 我猜你真的不应该凭封面来判断一本书。

Original: Mog:I can sense the will of the light, kupo!
Dialogue: I can sense the will of the light, kupo!
trans: 我能感觉到光的意志，库波！

Original: Warrior of Light:It appears that fate has guided him to us.
Dialogue: It appears that fate has guided him to us.
trans: 看来是命运指引他来到了我们身边。

Original: Cecil:The will of the light? Fate? What does any of that mean?
Dialogue: The will of the light? Fate? What does any of that mean?
trans: 光之意志？

Original: Mog:The portal you just came through is a dimensional Torsion. They're what's destroying our world.
Dialogue: The portal you just came through is a dimensional Torsion. They're what's destroying our world.
trans: 你刚刚通过的门户是一个次元扭曲。

Original: Mog:We're on a journey to seal them, kupo.
Dialogue: We're on a journey to seal them, kupo.
trans: 我们正在封印它们，kupo。

Original: Mog:You share that destiny with usthe will of the light, kupo!
Dialogue: You share that destiny with us—the will of the light, kupo!
trans: 你与我们分享那个命运——光的意志，kupo！

Original: Mog:You should join us, kupo!
Dialogue: You should join us, kupo!
trans: 你应该加入我们，kupo！

Original: Cecil:You would be better off without me.
Dialogue: You would be better off without me.
trans: 没有我，你会过得更好。

Original: Y'shtola:I don't blame you for having doubt, but we need your help.
Dialogue: I don't blame you for having doubt, but we need your help.
trans: 我不怪你有疑问，但我们需要你的帮助。

Original: Warrior of Light:You possess cosmic potential as a warriora gift which must be used for good.
Dialogue: You possess cosmic potential as a warrior—a gift which must be used for good.
trans: 你拥有作为战士的宇宙潜力——一份必须善用的礼物。

Original: Cecil:I've walked the path of darkness for too long.
Dialogue: I've walked the path of darkness for too long.
trans: 我在黑暗的道路上走了太久。

Original: Cecil:The light you speak of has faded to but a mere shadow of the past.
Dialogue: The light you speak of has faded to but a mere shadow of the past.
trans: 你所说的光已经褪色，只是过去的影子。

Original: Mog:You just need to believe in yourself, kupo!
Dialogue: You just need to believe in yourself, kupo!
trans: 你只需要相信你自己，kupo！

Original: Cecil:Forgive me...
Dialogue: Forgive me...
trans: 对不起...

Original: Cecil:Is everyone all right!?
Dialogue: Is everyone all right!?
trans: 大家还好吗！？

Original: Warrior of Light:It seems we owe you a debt of gratitude.
Dialogue: It seems we owe you a debt of gratitude.
trans: 看来我们欠你一份情债。

Original: Cecil:I could scarce stand by and simply watch as the monsters attacked you.
Dialogue: I could scarce stand by and simply watch as the monsters attacked you.
trans: 我几乎不能袖手旁观，只能看着怪物攻击你。

Original: Mog:Thanks for watching out for us, kupo!
Dialogue: Thanks for watching out for us, kupo!
trans: 谢谢你照顾我们，kupo！

Original: Y'shtola:Indeed. I fear to think what would have happened had you not been here.
Dialogue: Indeed. I fear to think what would have happened had you not been here.
trans: 的确。

Original: Sazh:You made it all this way alone!? Where'd that self-doubt from earlier go?
Dialogue: You made it all this way alone!? Where'd that self-doubt from earlier go?
trans: 你一个人走到这一步！？

Original: Cecil:I'm glad I could be of some help. Well, I wish you all the best on your journey.
Dialogue: I'm glad I could be of some help. Well, I wish you all the best on your journey.
trans: 很高兴能帮上忙。

Original: Mog:Wait, kupo!
Dialogue: Wait, kupo!
trans: 等等，大衣！

Original: Mog:Your power is an important piece to our puzzle. Our journey wouldn't be complete without you, kupo.
Dialogue: Your power is an important piece to our puzzle. Our journey wouldn't be complete without you, kupo.
trans: 您的力量是我们拼图的重要组成部分。

Original: Cecil:I appreciate the offer, but I've walked the path of darkness for too long.
Dialogue: I appreciate the offer, but I've walked the path of darkness for too long.
trans: 我很感激这个提议，但我已经在黑暗的道路上走了太久。

Original: Warrior of Light:Darkness is nothing to fear. For there is no darkness without light.
Dialogue: Darkness is nothing to fear. For there is no darkness without light.
trans: 黑暗没什么可怕的。

Original: Cecil:Nothing to fear?
Dialogue: Nothing to fear?
trans: 没什么可怕的？

Original: Sazh:Don't know anything about all this darkness mumbo jumbo, but you helped us out of a jam. That makes you a good guy in my book.
Dialogue: Don't know anything about all this darkness mumbo jumbo, but you helped us out of a jam. That makes you a good guy in my book.
trans: 对所有这些黑暗的胡言乱语一无所知，但你帮助我们摆脱了困境。

Original: Warrior of Light:It is as Sazh says. Your sword may be forged of darkness, but the light resides in your heart.
Dialogue: It is as Sazh says. Your sword may be forged of darkness, but the light resides in your heart.
trans: 正如 Sazh 所说。

Original: Cecil:Do you truly believe I can fight alongside you?
Dialogue: Do you truly believe I can fight alongside you?
trans: 你真的相信我能和你并肩作战吗？

Original: Cloud:That's up to you. What do you want to do?
Dialogue: That's up to you. What do you want to do?
trans: 这取决于你。

Original: Cecil:You are right. If this Dark Sword can be used for good...
Dialogue: You are right. If this Dark Sword can be used for good...
trans: 你是对的。

Original: Cecil:Then I shall accompany you on your journey to save the world!
Dialogue: Then I shall accompany you on your journey to save the world!
trans: 那我就陪你踏上拯救世界的征程！

Original: Mog:Hooray, kupo!
Dialogue: Hooray, kupo!
trans: 万岁，天才！

Original: Cecil:There is no darkness without light...
Dialogue: There is no darkness without light...
trans: 没有光就没有黑暗...

Original: Cecil:Maybe my sword will bear the light one day as well.
Dialogue: Maybe my sword will bear the light one day as well.
trans: 说不定有一天我的剑也会发光。

Original: Sazh:The Torsion's on the other side of these ruins right?
Dialogue: The Torsion's on the other side of these ruins right?
trans: Torsion 在这些废墟的另一边，对吧？

Original: Mog:Yes. We need to stay vigilant, kupo! The closer we are, the stronger the monsters!
Dialogue: Yes. We need to stay vigilant, kupo! The closer we are, the stronger the monsters!
trans: 是的。

Original: Rem:Be careful, everyone. There's no telling what's out there.
Dialogue: Be careful, everyone. There's no telling what's out there.
trans: 大家小心点。

Original: Zidane:Aw, Remyou're so sweet. Just my kind of girl.
Dialogue: Aw, Rem—you're so sweet. Just my kind of girl.
trans: 噢，雷姆——你真可爱。

Original: Rem:Please, Zidane. Now's not the time for jokes.
Dialogue: Please, Zidane. Now's not the time for jokes.
trans: 拜托，齐达内。

Original: Zidane:Who's joking?
Dialogue: Who's joking?
trans: 谁在开玩笑？

Original: Sazh:Quit while you're ahead, kid.
Dialogue: Quit while you're ahead, kid.
trans: 在你领先的时候退出，孩子。

Original: Y'shtola:That man you were with earlierwhat is your relationship with him?
Dialogue: That man you were with earlier—what is your relationship with him?
trans: 刚才和你在一起的那个男人，你和他是什么关系？

Original: Sazh:And I guess laying waste to his own planet wasn't enough?
Dialogue: And I guess laying waste to his own planet wasn't enough?
trans: 而且我想浪费他自己的星球还不够吗？

Original: Zidane:I have no idea what his motives for coming here are, but I intend to find out.
Dialogue: I have no idea what his motives for coming here are, but I intend to find out.
trans: 我不知道他来这里的动机是什么，但我打算弄清楚。

Original: Zidane:This may sound weird but...
Dialogue: This may sound weird but...
trans: 这听起来可能很奇怪，但是……

Original: Zidane:I feel like I know these ruins.
Dialogue: I feel like I know these ruins.
trans: 我觉得我知道这些废墟。

Original: Hope:Yeah... They're familiar somehow.
Dialogue: Yeah... They're familiar somehow.
trans: 是的......他们不知何故很熟悉。

Original: Cloud:Aren't the two of you from different planets?
Dialogue: Aren't the two of you from different planets?
trans: 你们两个不是不同星球的吗？

Original: Sazh:That said, these ruins don't look like any we've been to, but they do feel familiar.
Dialogue: That said, these ruins don't look like any we've been to, but they do feel familiar.
trans: 也就是说，这些废墟看起来不像我们去过的任何地方，但它们确实让人感觉很熟悉。

Original: Zidane:Maybe Mog knows something.
Dialogue: Maybe Mog knows something.
trans: 也许莫格知道些什么。

Original: Zidane:Mog, you told us these were ancient ruins.
Dialogue: Mog, you told us these were ancient ruins.
trans: Mog，你告诉我们这些是古代遗迹。

Original: Zidane:That means this world must have had a civilization that once lived here.
Dialogue: That means this world must have had a civilization that once lived here.
trans: 也就是说，这个世界一定有过曾经存在过的文明。

Original: Mog:Actually, no, kupo!
Dialogue: Actually, no, kupo!
trans: 实际上，不，库波！

Original: Cloud:What do you mean?
Dialogue: What do you mean?
trans: 你是什​​么意思？

Original: Mog:You see, our world was created by the gods in the image of other planets.
Dialogue: You see, our world was created by the gods in the image of other planets.
trans: 你看，我们的世界是众神按照其他行星的形象创造的。

Original: Mog:Each aspect of this place was inspired by your homes, kupo.
Dialogue: Each aspect of this place was inspired by your homes, kupo.
trans: 这个地方的每个方面都受到你家的启发，kupo。

Original: Mog:That's probably why you recognize certain areas.
Dialogue: That's probably why you recognize certain areas.
trans: 这可能就是您识别某些区域的原因。

Original: Sazh:So the reason why we haven't met any natives of this planet...
Dialogue: So the reason why we haven't met any natives of this planet...
trans: 所以我们没有遇到这个星球上的任何本地人的原因...

Original: Sazh:Is because this place is something of an artificial creation?
Dialogue: Is because this place is something of an artificial creation?
trans: 是因为这个地方是人造的东西吗？

Original: Mog:Yes, kupo! And that's why it's important for us to stop this world from becoming corrupted.
Dialogue: Yes, kupo! And that's why it's important for us to stop this world from becoming corrupted.
trans: 是的，库波！

Original: Mog:Otherwise, it'll spread to all the other worlds, kupo!
Dialogue: Otherwise, it'll spread to all the other worlds, kupo!
trans: 否则，它会传播到所有其他世界，库珀！

Original: Zidane:We have to do what we can.
Dialogue: We have to do what we can.
trans: 我们必须尽我们所能。

Original: ???:Who goes there!?
Dialogue: Who goes there!?
trans: 谁去那里！？

Original: Warrior of Light:Please lower your weapons. We have no intention to fight you.
Dialogue: Please lower your weapons. We have no intention to fight you.
trans: 请放下你的武器。

Original: ???:Very well. Although...
Dialogue: Very well. Although...
trans: 很好。

Original: ???:I would have loved to test my own skill at combat against yours. Perhaps another time.
Dialogue: I would have loved to test my own skill at combat against yours. Perhaps another time.
trans: 我很想测试我自己的技能与你的战斗。

Original: Mog:What brings you here, kupo?
Dialogue: What brings you here, kupo?
trans: 库波，你怎么来了？

Original: ???:A moogle!? If you must know, I was searching the area for living creatures...and it looks like I found some.
Dialogue: A moogle!? If you must know, I was searching the area for living creatures...and it looks like I found some.
trans: 莫古力！？

Original: Sazh:He doesn't live here, if that's what you're thinking. We've only come to close the Torsions.
Dialogue: He doesn't live here, if that's what you're thinking. We've only come to close the Torsions.
trans: 他不住在这里，如果那是你的想法。

Original: ???:So this land is completely devoid of life? How odd...
Dialogue: So this land is completely devoid of life? How odd...
trans: 所以这片土地完全没有生命？

Original: ???:You see, I've been attempting to learn more about what has caused the sudden influx of beasts in this region.
Dialogue: You see, I've been attempting to learn more about what has caused the sudden influx of beasts in this region.
trans: 你看，我一直在尝试更多地了解是什么原因导致野兽突然涌入该地区。

Original: ???:The only real clue I've stumbled across in my investigations was a mysterious coil of energy.
Dialogue: The only real clue I've stumbled across in my investigations was a mysterious coil of energy.
trans: 我在调查中偶然发现的唯一真正线索是一个神秘的能量线圈。

Original: ???:...Is this perhaps the Torsion to which you refer?
Dialogue: ...Is this perhaps the Torsion to which you refer?
trans: ...这可能是您所指的扭力吗？

Original: Sazh:That'd be it. Our goal is the same, then.
Dialogue: That'd be it. Our goal is the same, then.
trans: 就是这样。

Original: ???:Our goals are the same? So these Torsions must be connected to the monsters!
Dialogue: Our goals are the same? So these Torsions must be connected to the monsters!
trans: 我们的目标一样吗？

Original: ???:Interesting. Thank you for your help!
Dialogue: Interesting. Thank you for your help!
trans: 有趣的。

Original: Mog:W-wait! ...She's gone. What a shame, kupo. She had the light, too.
Dialogue: W-wait! ...She's gone. What a shame, kupo. She had the light, too.
trans: 等等！

Original: Y'shtola:You appear perplexed. What's wrong?
Dialogue: You appear perplexed. What's wrong?
trans: 你看起来很困惑。

Original: Sazh:We met a girl who came as quickly as she left. Didn't even have time to recruit her.
Dialogue: We met a girl who came as quickly as she left. Didn't even have time to recruit her.
trans: 我们遇到了一个来得快去得也快的女孩。

Original: Y'shtola:If, as you say, our goals are the same, you'll get your chancewhen the crystal's light shines brightest.
Dialogue: If, as you say, our goals are the same, you'll get your chance—when the crystal's light shines brightest.
trans: 如果，如你所说，我们的目标相同，你就会有机会——当水晶的光芒最亮时。

Original: ???:Hyah! Never fear! I've come to save
Dialogue: Hyah! Never fear! I've come to save—
trans: 嘿！

Original: ???:Aw, don't tell me the fun is already over.
Dialogue: Aw, don't tell me the fun is already over.
trans: 噢，别告诉我乐趣已经结束了。

Original: Warrior of Light:We only just finished.
Dialogue: We only just finished.
trans: 我们才刚刚完成。

Original: Yda:Y'shtola!? What are you doing here!?
Dialogue: Y'shtola!? What are you doing here!?
trans: Y'shtola！？

Original: Y'shtola:I could ask you the same. So you're the girl everyone was talking about earlier... Speaking of which, where are the others?
Dialogue: I could ask you the same. So you're the girl everyone was talking about earlier... Speaking of which, where are the others?
trans: 我也可以问你同样的问题。

Original: Yda:I couldn't tell you.
Dialogue: I couldn't tell you.
trans: 我不能告诉你。

Original: Y'shtola:Gods... Well, at least you're here.
Dialogue: Gods... Well, at least you're here.
trans: 诸神……好吧，至少你在这里。

Original: Sazh:You guys know each other?
Dialogue: You guys know each other?
trans: 你们认识吗？

Original: Yda:Of course! In fact, she's one of the very people I've been searching for!
Dialogue: Of course! In fact, she's one of the very people I've been searching for!
trans: 当然！

Original: Yda:I was following the Torsions when I spotted you. I never expected Y'shtola to be here.
Dialogue: I was following the Torsions when I spotted you. I never expected Y'shtola to be here.
trans: 当我发现你时，我正在跟踪 Torsions。

Original: Sazh:You've been following the Torsions?
Dialogue: You've been following the Torsions?
trans: 你一直在关注扭转？

Original: Yda:That's right. I noticed the monsters coming from them and figured by pursuing them, I'd find my friends sooner or later.
Dialogue: That's right. I noticed the monsters coming from them and figured by pursuing them, I'd find my friends sooner or later.
trans: 这是正确的。

Original: Sazh:A woman of action. I like it!
Dialogue: A woman of action. I like it!
trans: 行动的女人。

Original: Mog:How goes the search, kupo?
Dialogue: How goes the search, kupo?
trans: 搜索进展如何，kupo？

Original: Yda:Good, thanks largely to you.
Dialogue: Good, thanks largely to you.
trans: 很好，多亏了你。

Original: Yda:I'm also thinking to investigate another area. What would you say to accompanying me?
Dialogue: I'm also thinking to investigate another area. What would you say to accompanying me?
trans: 我也在考虑调查另一个领域。

Original: Y'shtola:Chance has brought us together. It would be unwise to defy it, would it not?
Dialogue: Chance has brought us together. It would be unwise to defy it, would it not?
trans: 机遇让我们走到了一起。

Original: Mog:I agree, kupo! Let's go!
Dialogue: I agree, kupo! Let's go!
trans: 我同意，库波！

Original: Yda:Excellent! I'll meet you guys there!
Dialogue: Excellent! I'll meet you guys there!
trans: 出色的！

Original: Sazh:Make that "non-stop action." Well, I guess we better get going before we lose sight of her.
Dialogue: Make that "non-stop action." Well, I guess we better get going before we lose sight of her.
trans: 做出那个“不间断的动作”。

Original: Yda:I think that about takes care of this area.
Dialogue: I think that about takes care of this area.
trans: 我认为 about 会处理这方面的问题。

Original: Yda:Thank you. I couldn't have done it without your help!
Dialogue: Thank you. I couldn't have done it without your help!
trans: 谢谢。

Original: Y'shtola:What do you propose we do next, Yda?
Dialogue: What do you propose we do next, Yda?
trans: Yda，你建议我们接下来做什么？

Original: Yda:I must go and find the others. I'll leave things here to you.
Dialogue: I must go and find the others. I'll leave things here to you.
trans: 我必须去找其他人。

Original: Y'shtola:Wait! It's better if we all go together.
Dialogue: Wait! It's better if we all go together.
trans: 等待！

Original: Y'shtola:I understand your concern for the others, but we mustn't let hate cloud our judgement.
Dialogue: I understand your concern for the others, but we mustn't let hate cloud our judgement.
trans: 我理解你对其他人的关心，但我们不能让仇恨影响我们的判断。

Original: Yda:You're right.
Dialogue: You're right.
trans: 你说得对。

Original: Yda:Besides, the Scions are a tough bunch! I'm sure they're fine.
Dialogue: Besides, the Scions are a tough bunch! I'm sure they're fine.
trans: 何况，子孙们是一群强悍的家伙！

Original: Yda:Well, then! What are you guys waiting for? Let's go!
Dialogue: Well, then! What are you guys waiting for? Let's go!
trans: 好吧！

Original: Y'shtola:While a little reckless at times, Yda is an old friend and a good ally.
Dialogue: While a little reckless at times, Yda is an old friend and a good ally.
trans: 虽然有时有点鲁莽，但 Yda 是一位老朋友和好盟友。

Original: Y'shtola:I'm certain she will prove to be a source of great strength in the journey ahead.
Dialogue: I'm certain she will prove to be a source of great strength in the journey ahead.
trans: 我相信她会在未来的旅程中成为强大力量的源泉。

Original: Yda:Reckless? You almost make it sound like I'm a liability!
Dialogue: Reckless? You almost make it sound like I'm a liability!
trans: 鲁莽？

Original: Mog:We're very happy to have you, kupo! We need all the help we can get!
Dialogue: We're very happy to have you, kupo! We need all the help we can get!
trans: 我们很高兴有你，kupo！

Original: Yda:I'm glad to hear it! You won't regret it!
Dialogue: I'm glad to hear it! You won't regret it!
trans: 我很高兴听到它！

Original: Zidane:So this is a Torsion...
Dialogue: So this is a Torsion...
trans: 所以这是一个扭转...

Original: Warrior of Light:You seem troubled.
Dialogue: You seem troubled.
trans: 你好像很烦恼

Original: Zidane:Kuja... He warped into the space right in front of me with one of these.
Dialogue: Kuja... He warped into the space right in front of me with one of these.
trans: Kuja……他用其中一个飞跃进了我面前的空间。

Original: Cloud:He did? But he's not a monster, is he?
Dialogue: He did? But he's not a monster, is he?
trans: 他做到了吗？

Original: Mog:It's scary to think he can create them so easily, kupo! Torsions rip apart the planes of time and space and randomly put them back together.
Dialogue: It's scary to think he can create them so easily, kupo! Torsions rip apart the planes of time and space and randomly put them back together.
trans: 库珀，他能如此轻松地创造出它们真是太可怕了！

Original: Zidane:...Shortly after, he opened another one and disappeared into it...
Dialogue: ...Shortly after, he opened another one and disappeared into it...
trans: ……没过多久，他又打开了一个，消失在里面……

Original: Sazh:You've gotta be kidding. Don't tell me you're actually considering
Dialogue: You've gotta be kidding. Don't tell me you're actually considering—
trans: 你一定是在开玩笑。

Original: Zidane:We know next to nothing about these Torsions. Maybe the only way to find out more is to enter one.
Dialogue: We know next to nothing about these Torsions. Maybe the only way to find out more is to enter one.
trans: 我们对这些扭转几乎一无所知。

Original: Warrior of Light:The idea has merit.
Dialogue: The idea has merit.
trans: 这个想法是有道理的。

Original: Sazh:And what if we're walking into a trap?
Dialogue: And what if we're walking into a trap?
trans: 如果我们走进陷阱怎么办？

Original: Y'shtola:The chance to gain some answers outweighs that potential risk.
Dialogue: The chance to gain some answers outweighs that potential risk.
trans: 获得一些答案的机会超过了潜在的风险。

Original: Zidane:I don't know about you guys, but I'm going in there.
Dialogue: I don't know about you guys, but I'm going in there.
trans: 我不了解你们，但我要去那里。

Original: Mog:I don't think you should, kupo, but I won't stop you...
Dialogue: I don't think you should, kupo, but I won't stop you...
trans: 我认为你不应该，kupo，但我不会阻止你......

Original: Zidane:I've made up my mind. Coming?
Dialogue: I've made up my mind. Coming?
trans: 我决定了。

Original: Sazh:*Sigh* Kids these days...
Dialogue: *Sigh* Kids these days...
trans: *叹息*现在的孩子们......

Original: Y'shtola:I take it you're planning on staying behind?
Dialogue: I take it you're planning on staying behind?
trans: 我猜你打算留下来？

Original: Sazh:Do I even have a choice?
Dialogue: Do I even have a choice?
trans: 我还有选择吗？

Original: Warrior of Light:So this is how the Torsion looks from the inside...
Dialogue: So this is how the Torsion looks from the inside...
trans: 这就是 Torsion 从内部看起来的样子……

Original: Vivi:The atmosphere is so much heavier in here... I don't like it.
Dialogue: The atmosphere is so much heavier in here... I don't like it.
trans: 这里的气氛太沉重了……我不喜欢它。

Original: Rem:Yes... It almost feels like we're on a battlefield.
Dialogue: Yes... It almost feels like we're on a battlefield.
trans: 是的……感觉就像我们在战场上一样。

Original: Mog:What you're feeling is darkness, kupo. We're surrounded by it in here.
Dialogue: What you're feeling is darkness, kupo. We're surrounded by it in here.
trans: 你感觉到的是黑暗，库珀。

Original: Zidane:Kuja's gotta be around here somewhere!
Dialogue: Kuja's gotta be around here somewhere!
trans: Kuja 一定在这附近的某个地方！

Original: Vivi:Look! Over there!
Dialogue: Look! Over there!
trans: 看！

Original: Kuja:It's not enough...not nearly enough.
Dialogue: It's not enough...not nearly enough.
trans: 这还不够……还远远不够。

Original: Kuja:To change the course of fate, one must first reshape the cogs on which the world is run.
Dialogue: To change the course of fate, one must first reshape the cogs on which the world is run.
trans: 要改变命运的进程，首先要重塑世界运转的齿轮。

Original: Zidane:Kuja! What are you doing!?
Dialogue: Kuja! What are you doing!?
trans: 九爷！

Original: Kuja:I knew you would come, Zidane.
Dialogue: I knew you would come, Zidane.
trans: 我知道你会来，齐达内。

Original: Kuja:After all, you are but puppets to those foolish beings you call godsyour lives but scripts written by their hand...
Dialogue: After all, you are but puppets to those foolish beings you call gods—your lives but scripts written by their hand...
trans: 毕竟，对于那些你称之为神的愚蠢生物来说，你只是木偶——你的生活不过是他们亲手写下的剧本……

Original: Warrior of Light:Gods? Foolish!? How dare you!
Dialogue: Gods? Foolish!? How dare you!
trans: 神？

Original: Kuja:Ah, the Warrior of Lightthe man from which this narrative unfolds...
Dialogue: Ah, the Warrior of Light—the man from which this narrative unfolds...
trans: 啊，光之战士——故事展开的那个人……

Original: Kuja:Even you, in all your might, shall fail to stand against me.
Dialogue: Even you, in all your might, shall fail to stand against me.
trans: 即使是你，用你的全部力量，也无法与我对抗。

Original: Kuja:Get them, my darlings!
Dialogue: Get them, my darlings!
trans: 得到他们，我亲爱的！

Original: Vivi:Something's coming!
Dialogue: Something's coming!
trans: 有什么东西来了！

Original: Warrior of Light:Those thingsthey appear to have assumed our forms.
Dialogue: Those things—they appear to have assumed our forms.
trans: 那些东西——它们似乎已经采用了我们的形式。

Original: Sazh:Or were created by Kuja to look like us.
Dialogue: Or were created by Kuja to look like us.
trans: 或者是由 Kuja 创造的，看起来像我们。

Original: Vivi:Back on our world, he often created soldiers to do his bidding.
Dialogue: Back on our world, he often created soldiers to do his bidding.
trans: 回到我们的世界，他经常创造士兵来执行他的命令。

Original: Zidane:The thing is, even if he did make them, how did he know what all of us looked like?
Dialogue: The thing is, even if he did make them, how did he know what all of us looked like?
trans: 问题是，即使他真的创造了它们，他怎么知道我们所有人的样子？

Original: Cloud:And also why go through all that trouble?
Dialogue: And also why go through all that trouble?
trans: 还有为什么要经历所有这些麻烦？

Original: Warrior of Light:...There is always the possibility that the specters were in no way related to Kuja.
Dialogue: ...There is always the possibility that the specters were in no way related to Kuja.
trans: ……总有一种可能，幽灵与九蛇没有任何关系。

Original: Mog:Whatever the case, we must be very careful, kupo! Whoever is behind this is extremely dangerous!
Dialogue: Whatever the case, we must be very careful, kupo! Whoever is behind this is extremely dangerous!
trans: 无论如何，我们必须非常小心，库珀！

Original: Mog:We also need to find the rest of these monsters and destroy them before they cause any problems!
Dialogue: We also need to find the rest of these monsters and destroy them before they cause any problems!
trans: 我们还需要找到其余的这些怪物并在它们造成任何问题之前将它们消灭！

Original: Zidane:Don't worry. We'll get rid of them.
Dialogue: Don't worry. We'll get rid of them.
trans: 不用担心。

Original: Cloud:Yeah. We need to stop them before they reach our home.
Dialogue: Yeah. We need to stop them before they reach our home.
trans: 是的。

Original: Mog:Yes, kupo! I'm counting on you!
Dialogue: Yes, kupo! I'm counting on you!
trans: 是的，库波！

Original: Manikin:G...od...
trans: ……的……先生

Original: Mog:They look like us, but I don't sense the will of the light.
Dialogue: They look like us, but I don't sense the will of the light.
trans: 他们看起来像我们，但我感觉不到光的意志。

Original: Mog:Everyone, get ready!
Dialogue: Everyone, get ready!
trans: 大家准备好！

Original: Hope:Look! I bet this will take us back!
Dialogue: Look! I bet this will take us back!
trans: 看！

Original: Zidane:If there's a way in, there's gotta be a way out, huh?
Dialogue: If there's a way in, there's gotta be a way out, huh?
trans: 既然有进门，就一定有出路，对吧？

Original: Y'shtola:But it might not lead back to the same world we came from.
Dialogue: But it might not lead back to the same world we came from.
trans: 但它可能不会回到我们来自的同一个世界。

Original: Vivi:At least Kuja seems to be gone.
Dialogue: At least Kuja seems to be gone.
trans: 至少Kuja似乎已经消失了。

Original: Warrior of Light:Shall we continue forward?
Dialogue: Shall we continue forward?
trans: 我们继续前进吗？

Original: Hope:But wait. Kuja knows how to manipulate Torsions and move between them.
Dialogue: But wait. Kuja knows how to manipulate Torsions and move between them.
trans: 可是等等。

Original: Hope:How do we know he didn't create this one?
Dialogue: How do we know he didn't create this one?
trans: 我们怎么知道他没有创造这个？

Original: Zidane:There's only one way to find out.
Dialogue: There's only one way to find out.
trans: 只有一种方法可以找出答案。

Original: Vivi:Kuja, what are you planning?
Dialogue: Kuja, what are you planning?
trans: 库贾，你有什么打算？

Original: Hope:Are you okay?
Dialogue: Are you okay?
trans: 你还好吗？

Original: Vivi:Yes. I'm just worried. He hurt a lot of my friends back home.
Dialogue: Yes. I'm just worried. He hurt a lot of my friends back home.
trans: 是的。

Original: Hope:Don't worry, Vivi. It's not going to happen againbecause you won't let it.
Dialogue: Don't worry, Vivi. It's not going to happen again—because you won't let it.
trans: 别担心，薇薇。

Original: Hope:Just remember to stand strong and keep going no matter what happens.
Dialogue: Just remember to stand strong and keep going no matter what happens.
trans: 只要记住无论发生什么事情都要坚强并继续前进。

Original: Vivi:I will. Thank you, Mister!
Dialogue: I will. Thank you, Mister!
trans: 我会。

Original: Y'shtola:Are the two of you coming?
Dialogue: Are the two of you coming?
trans: 你们两个要来吗？

Original: Hope:We'll be right there! Come on, Vivi!
Dialogue: We'll be right there! Come on, Vivi!
trans: 我们马上到！

Original: Vivi:Right behind you!
Dialogue: Right behind you!
trans: 就在你后面！

Original: Zidane:It looks like we're back at the ruins. May the hunt for Kuja begin!
Dialogue: It looks like we're back at the ruins. May the hunt for Kuja begin!
trans: 看来我们又回到了废墟。

Original: Zidane:Everything okay? You seemed lost in thought back there.
Dialogue: Everything okay? You seemed lost in thought back there.
trans: 一切都好？

Original: Vivi:I'm fine. Let's just keep going.
Dialogue: I'm fine. Let's just keep going.
trans: 我很好。

Original: Zidane:...If you say so. You've done great so far, you know.
Dialogue: ...If you say so. You've done great so far, you know.
trans: ……如果你这么说。

Original: Vivi:For that I have you and everyone else to thank. I never could have done anything on my own.
Dialogue: For that I have you and everyone else to thank. I never could have done anything on my own.
trans: 为此，我要感谢你和其他所有人。

Original: Vivi:Even with the light, I don't think I can save the world...
Dialogue: Even with the light, I don't think I can save the world...
trans: 就算有光，我也不认为我能拯救世界……

Original: Vivi:I'm not strong like any of you.
Dialogue: I'm not strong like any of you.
trans: 我不像你们中的任何一个人那么坚强。

Original: Zidane:Trust me, you're just as strong as any of us.
Dialogue: Trust me, you're just as strong as any of us.
trans: 相信我，你和我们任何人一样坚强。

Original: Zidane:You have a reason to fight and so long as you keep reminding yourself of it, you'll find you have the power to save any world.
Dialogue: You have a reason to fight and so long as you keep reminding yourself of it, you'll find you have the power to save any world.
trans: 你有战斗的理由，只要你不断提醒自己，你就会发现自己有能力拯救任何世界。

Original: Vivi:Thanks, Zidane. You always know what to say.
Dialogue: Thanks, Zidane. You always know what to say.
trans: 谢谢，齐达内。

Original: Zidane:I've been thinking, if the reason we can close Torsions is because of the light...
Dialogue: I've been thinking, if the reason we can close Torsions is because of the light...
trans: 我一直在想，如果我们可以关闭 Torsions 的原因是因为光线......

Original: Zidane:How does Kuja do it?
Dialogue: How does Kuja do it?
trans: Kuja是怎么做到的？

Original: Vivi:I don't know. He shouldn't have the light. He's done a lot of bad things.
Dialogue: I don't know. He shouldn't have the light. He's done a lot of bad things.
trans: 我不知道。

Original: Zidane:But it's no use talking about it. For now, we just need to focus on finding him.
Dialogue: But it's no use talking about it. For now, we just need to focus on finding him.
trans: 但是谈论它是没有用的。

Original: Rem:There, when you die, you also cease to exist in people's memories.
Dialogue: There, when you die, you also cease to exist in people's memories.
trans: 在那里，当你死去的时候，你也不再存在于人们的记忆中。

Original: Vivi:And there's no way you can transfer your life's memories to others?
Dialogue: And there's no way you can transfer your life's memories to others?
trans: 而且你就不能把你一生的记忆转移给别人吗？

Original: Vivi:That's terrible. What's the point of even living if you're going to be forgotten?
Dialogue: That's terrible. What's the point of even living if you're going to be forgotten?
trans: 这太可怕了。

Original: Rem:It was done so that those left behind wouldn't have to suffer. It's the crystal's will.
Dialogue: It was done so that those left behind wouldn't have to suffer. It's the crystal's will.
trans: 这样做是为了让那些留下来的人不必受苦。

Original: Rem:That said, we fear death just the same as any of you.
Dialogue: That said, we fear death just the same as any of you.
trans: 也就是说，我们和你们一样害怕死亡。

Original: Hope:And so Kuja attempts to defy fate.
Dialogue: And so Kuja attempts to defy fate.
trans: 因此，Kuja 试图反抗命运。

Original: Hope:In our world, each of us is given alife's purposea destiny, if you willbycosmic beingssimilar to those you call gods.
Dialogue: In our world, each of us is given a life's purpose—a destiny, if you will—by cosmic beings similar to those you call gods.
trans: 在我们的世界中，我们每个人都被赋予了生命的目的——命运，如果你愿意的话——来自类似于你们称为神的宇宙存在。

Original: Vivi:Me and Zidane and Kuja are just like you...
Dialogue: Me and Zidane and Kuja are just like you...
trans: 我、齐达内和库贾就像你一样……

Original: Hope:Have you ever attempted to defy your fate?
Dialogue: Have you ever attempted to defy your fate?
trans: 你有没有试图反抗你的命运？

Original: Vivi:Have you, Mister?
Dialogue: Have you, Mister?
trans: 有吗，先生？

Original: Hope:My friends and I...we fought it once.
Dialogue: My friends and I...we fought it once.
trans: 我和我的朋友们……我们打过一次。

Original: Rem:...Defying fate, huh?
Dialogue: ...Defying fate, huh?
trans: ……违抗命运吧？

Original: Vivi:Just like Kuja. Only he's done a lot of wrong in his life.
Dialogue: Just like Kuja. Only he's done a lot of wrong in his life.
trans: 就像库贾一样。

Original: Rem:If Torsions distort reality, that means there's a chance we can use them to change the fate of our worlds.
Dialogue: If Torsions distort reality, that means there's a chance we can use them to change the fate of our worlds.
trans: 如果扭转扭曲了现实，那就意味着我们有机会利用它们来改变我们世界的命运。

Original: Vivi:B-but what about all the monsters that come out of them?
Dialogue: B-but what about all the monsters that come out of them?
trans: B-但是从他们身上出来的所有怪物呢？

Original: Hope:We also still don't know the true nature of these Torsions. I think we should forget about this and put our trust in Mog for now.
Dialogue: We also still don't know the true nature of these Torsions. I think we should forget about this and put our trust in Mog for now.
trans: 我们也仍然不知道这些扭转的真实性质。

Original: Rem:Vivi, Zidanethat man, Kuja, he's from your world right?
Dialogue: Vivi, Zidane—that man, Kuja, he's from your world right?
trans: Vivi、Zidane——那个男人，Kuja，他来自你们的世界，对吧？

Original: Zidane:Gaia, yeah. That's where we're from, though I can't necessarily say the same for him...
Dialogue: Gaia, yeah. That's where we're from, though I can't necessarily say the same for him...
trans: 盖亚，是的。

Original: Hope:And you have absolutely no idea what he could be after?
Dialogue: And you have absolutely no idea what he could be after?
trans: 你完全不知道他想要什么？

Original: Vivi:I think he's...afraid of dying...
Dialogue: I think he's...afraid of dying...
trans: 我觉得他……怕死……

Original: Vivi:Kuja likely thinks that by creating Torsions and warping reality, he can defy fate.
Dialogue: Kuja likely thinks that by creating Torsions and warping reality, he can defy fate.
trans: Kuja 可能认为通过创造扭曲和扭曲现实，他可以对抗命运。

Original: Rem:So he's motivated by a fear of death?
Dialogue: So he's motivated by a fear of death?
trans: 所以他是出于对死亡的恐惧？

Original: Hope:And he fights to change his destiny...
Dialogue: And he fights to change his destiny...
trans: 他为改变自己的命运而奋斗……

Original: Zidane:It doesn't matter what his reasons are. The fact remains that he hurts people to get what he wants. He must be stopped.
Dialogue: It doesn't matter what his reasons are. The fact remains that he hurts people to get what he wants. He must be stopped.
trans: 他的理由是什么并不重要。

Original: Zidane:What he's doing, if left unchecked, will affect all our worlds.
Dialogue: What he's doing, if left unchecked, will affect all our worlds.
trans: 他的所作所为，如果任其发展，将影响我们所有的世界。

Original: Zidane:Besides, it's not our sympathy he's after.
Dialogue: Besides, it's not our sympathy he's after.
trans: 此外，他追求的不是我们的同情。

Original: Zidane:Tifa, you like plays, don't you? You ought to come watch me perform sometime.
Dialogue: Tifa, you like plays, don't you? You ought to come watch me perform sometime.
trans: 蒂法，你喜欢戏剧，不是吗？

Original: Zidane:I'm pretty talented. I even got the princess to cry once, and trust me, she's practically made of ice.
Dialogue: I'm pretty talented. I even got the princess to cry once, and trust me, she's practically made of ice.
trans: 我很有才华。

Original: Tifa:Zidane, do you even understand the gravity of our situation? Now's really not the time.
Dialogue: Zidane, do you even understand the gravity of our situation? Now's really not the time.
trans: 齐达内，你了解我们处境的严重性吗？

Original: Zidane:Aw, come onlighten up. We've still got a long trip ahead of us.
Dialogue: Aw, come on—lighten up. We've still got a long trip ahead of us.
trans: 噢，来吧——放松点。

Original: Zidane:So, Rem, I hear we're the same age. Do you have anyone youyou knowlike?
Dialogue: So, Rem, I hear we're the same age. Do you have anyone you—you know—like?
trans: 所以，雷姆，我听说我们同龄。

Original: Zidane:Ah... Guess I don't stand a chance here.
Dialogue: Ah... Guess I don't stand a chance here.
trans: 啊...我想我在这里没有机会。

Original: Zidane:...Nothing.
Dialogue: ...Nothing.
trans: ...没有什么。

Original: Tifa:Zidane, you're a lot funnier than I ever gave you credit for.
Dialogue: Zidane, you're a lot funnier than I ever gave you credit for.
trans: 齐达内，你比我想象的要有趣得多。

Original: Zidane:Of course I'm funny. What use would I be if I couldn't keep beautiful ladies like you entertain
Dialogue: Of course I'm funny. What use would I be if I couldn't keep beautiful ladies like you entertain—
trans: 我当然很有趣。

Original: Sazh:Who's asking?
Dialogue: Who's asking?
trans: 谁在问？

Original: Vaan:Oh, me? I'm Vaan. And that's a really cool airship!
Dialogue: Oh, me? I'm Vaan. And that's a really cool airship!
trans: 哦，我？

Original: Sazh:Finally, someone who understands! And it's not just for show. It's fast, safe, and comes with the best pilot you've ever met.
Dialogue: Finally, someone who understands! And it's not just for show. It's fast, safe, and comes with the best pilot you've ever met.
trans: 终于有人懂了！

Original: Vaan:Heh-heh, I know a good airship when I see one. So it's yours, huh?
Dialogue: Heh-heh, I know a good airship when I see one. So it's yours, huh?
trans: 嘿嘿，一看就知道是好飞艇。

Original: Mog:Since when did you become the owner!? I got us that ship, kupo!
Dialogue: Since when did you become the owner!? I got us that ship, kupo!
trans: 你什么时候当主人了！？

Original: Vaan:Oh yeah! I almost forgot to ask.
Dialogue: Oh yeah! I almost forgot to ask.
trans: 哦耶！

Original: Vaan:Where am I?
Dialogue: Where am I?
trans: 我在哪里？

Original: Mog:You're just now wondering that, kupo?
Dialogue: You're just now wondering that, kupo?
trans: 你现在才想知道，库波？

Original: Vaan:What's the big deal? People get lost all the time when they're hunting.
Dialogue: What's the big deal? People get lost all the time when they're hunting.
trans: 有什么大不了的？

Original: Vaan:I can't be the first. So, can you take me home in that airship of yours?
Dialogue: I can't be the first. So, can you take me home in that airship of yours?
trans: 我不能成为第一个。

Original: Mog:I'm afraid it can't take you back to your world, kupo.
Dialogue: I'm afraid it can't take you back to your world, kupo.
trans: 恐怕它不能带你回到你的世界，库波。

Original: Vaan:My...world? What are you talking about?
Dialogue: My...world? What are you talking about?
trans: 我的世界？

Original: Mog:Dimensional Torsions have been appearing, connecting this world to others, kupo.
