Dialogue: Dimensional Torsions have been appearing, connecting this world to others, kupo.
trans: Dimensional Torsions 一直在出现，将这个世界与其他世界连接起来，kupo。

Original: Sazh:We all came from another world. Including you, apparently.
Dialogue: We all came from another world. Including you, apparently.
trans: 我们都来自另一个世界。

Original: Sazh:Hoo-boy! Looks like we've got company.
Dialogue: Hoo-boy! Looks like we've got company.
trans: 好家伙！

Original: Sazh:Be right back with you in a second, kid.
Dialogue: Be right back with you in a second, kid.
trans: 孩子，马上回来找你。

Original: Vaan:What was that all about? That monster looked just like me.
Dialogue: What was that all about? That monster looked just like me.
trans: 刚才那是干什么啊？

Original: Tifa:We call them Manikins. We've already run into others that look like our friends as well.
Dialogue: We call them Manikins. We've already run into others that look like our friends as well.
trans: 我们称它们为人体模型。

Original: Mog:It's true, kupo. The world's being invaded by monsters.
Dialogue: It's true, kupo. The world's being invaded by monsters.
trans: 这是真的，库波。

Original: Mog:So we're on a journey to find new friends with the will of the light to stop them.
Dialogue: So we're on a journey to find new friends with the will of the light to stop them.
trans: 所以我们踏上了寻找新朋友的旅程，带着光的意志来阻止他们。

Original: Mog:And I can sense the light in you, kupo!
Dialogue: And I can sense the light in you, kupo!
trans: 我能感觉到你身上的光，库波！

Original: Vaan:I get it. You're on a mission.
Dialogue: I get it. You're on a mission.
trans: 我得到它。

Original: Vaan:But wouldn't it be easier to find and stop whoever's making these, uh, Torsions?
Dialogue: But wouldn't it be easier to find and stop whoever's making these, uh, Torsions?
trans: 但是找到并阻止制造这些，呃，Torsions 的人不是更容易吗？

Original: Mog:We still don't really know who or what that is, kupo.
Dialogue: We still don't really know who or what that is, kupo.
trans: 我们仍然不知道那是谁或什么，kupo。

Original: Tifa:But we do know that monsters are using the Torsions to spread destruction throughout this world.
Dialogue: But we do know that monsters are using the Torsions to spread destruction throughout this world.
trans: 但我们确实知道怪物正在使用 Torsions 在这个世界上散布破坏。

Original: Mog:Which is why we've been defeating the monsters to seal the Torsions, kupo.
Dialogue: Which is why we've been defeating the monsters to seal the Torsions, kupo.
trans: 这就是为什么我们一直在击败怪物来封印扭曲，库波。

Original: Vaan:Then let me come with you. I can't just look the other way when someone's in need of help.
Dialogue: Then let me come with you. I can't just look the other way when someone's in need of help.
trans: 那就让我跟你一起去吧。

Original: Tifa:Wonderful! We can use all the help we can get.
Dialogue: Wonderful! We can use all the help we can get.
trans: 精彩的！

Original: Sazh:All right, all right, enough chitchat. Hey kid, wanna peek at the engine?
Dialogue: All right, all right, enough chitchat. Hey kid, wanna peek at the engine?
trans: 好吧，好吧，闲聊够了。

Original: Mog:I hope he knows how important our mission is, kupo.
Dialogue: I hope he knows how important our mission is, kupo.
trans: 我希望他知道我们的使命有多么重要，库波。

Original: Tifa:I'm sure he'll learn. Besides, a little optimism is a good thing.
Dialogue: I'm sure he'll learn. Besides, a little optimism is a good thing.
trans: 我相信他会学会的。

Original: Zidane:Huh? Did you hear that?
Dialogue: Huh? Did you hear that?
trans: 嗯？

Original: Warrior of Light:We must be close.
Dialogue: We must be close.
trans: 我们必须接近。

Original: Kuja:More! ...More!!! Rip it apart, dismantle itdisfigure this world beyond recognition!
Dialogue: More! ...More!!! Rip it apart, dismantle it—disfigure this world beyond recognition!
trans: 更多的！

Original: Zidane:What do you think you're doing!?
Dialogue: What do you think you're doing!?
trans: 你以为你在做什么！？

Original: Warrior of Light:He appears to be giving power to the Torsions.
Dialogue: He appears to be giving power to the Torsions.
trans: 他似乎正在为扭曲提供力量。

Original: Mog:He can't get away with it, kupo!
Dialogue: He can't get away with it, kupo!
trans: 他逃不掉的，库波！

Original: Kuja:Fools! Spare me the sermon! You know nothing!
Dialogue: Fools! Spare me the sermon! You know nothing!
trans: 傻瓜！

Original: Kuja:You, especially, tiny rat! You blindly worship these so-called gods
Dialogue: You, especially, tiny rat! You blindly worship these so-called gods—
trans: 尤其是你，小耗子！

Original: Mog:I won't let you speak of them that way! This is where it ends, kupo!
Dialogue: I won't let you speak of them that way! This is where it ends, kupo!
trans: 我不会让你那样说他们的！

Original: Kuja:Threaten me all you want, but it will not change what's to come.
Dialogue: Threaten me all you want, but it will not change what's to come.
trans: 随心所欲地威胁我，但这不会改变即将发生的事情。

Original: Zidane:What are you talking about!?
Dialogue: What are you talking about!?
trans: 你在说什么！？

Original: Kuja:My role here is finished. I am bowing out. Come, my dragons! It is your time to take center stage!
Dialogue: My role here is finished. I am bowing out. Come, my dragons! It is your time to take center stage!
trans: 我在这里的角色结束了。

Original: Mog:D-d-dragon! Kupooo!
Dialogue: D-d-dragon! Kupooo!
trans: D-d-龙！

Original: Mog:Watch out for the Red Dragon's ability Megaflash! If it uses Charge, do whatever it takes to stop him!
Dialogue: Watch out for the Red Dragon's ability Megaflash! If it uses Charge, do whatever it takes to stop him!
trans: 当心红龙的能力 Megaflash！

Original: Mog:I don't wanna be barbeque, kupo!
Dialogue: I don't wanna be barbeque, kupo!
trans: 我不想做烧烤，库波！

Original: Zidane:Kuja! I've got you now!
Dialogue: Kuja! I've got you now!
trans: 九爷！

Original: Kuja:This light... It's riveting.
Dialogue: This light... It's riveting.
trans: 这光……很吸引人。

Original: Zidane:Stop with this nonsense! Tell us what you know!
Dialogue: Stop with this nonsense! Tell us what you know!
trans: 停止这种废话！

Original: Kuja:To divulge such knowledge to someone as worthless as you is but a waste of my breath.
Dialogue: To divulge such knowledge to someone as worthless as you is but a waste of my breath.
trans: 把这些知识泄露给像你这样一文不值的人，简直是在浪费我的呼吸。

Original: Kuja:Farewell, Zidane.
Dialogue: Farewell, Zidane.
trans: 再见了，齐达内。

Original: Mog:He escaped again, and we still don't have answers, but our mission remains the same, kupo!
Dialogue: He escaped again, and we still don't have answers, but our mission remains the same, kupo!
trans: 他又逃了，我们仍然没有答案，但我们的任务还是一样的，kupo！

Original: Mog:Hooray! One more Torsion gone, kupo!
Dialogue: Hooray! One more Torsion gone, kupo!
trans: 万岁！

Original: Yda:So this is yourrather ourmission.
Dialogue: So this is your—rather our—mission.
trans: 所以这是你的——而不是我们的——使命。

Original: Vaan:So this area is now safe from monsters, right?
Dialogue: So this area is now safe from monsters, right?
trans: 所以这个区域现在对怪物来说是安全的，对吧？

Original: Warrior of Light:Aye. But that is not to say we can let our guard down. The threat we face might be far greater than we anticipated.
Dialogue: Aye. But that is not to say we can let our guard down. The threat we face might be far greater than we anticipated.
trans: 是的。

Original: Zidane:It's like he's trying to use the Torsions to do something else...something more.
Dialogue: It's like he's trying to use the Torsions to do something else...something more.
trans: 就好像他在尝试使用 Torsions 来做其他事情……更多事情。

Original: Hope:So the Torsions are what is corrupting this world...
Dialogue: So the Torsions are what is corrupting this world...
trans: 所以扭曲是腐蚀这个世界的东西......

Original: Mog:And that's why we need to close them, kupo!
Dialogue: And that's why we need to close them, kupo!
trans: 这就是为什么我们需要关闭它们，kupo！

Original: Mog:If we don't, it'll begin spreading to your worlds!
Dialogue: If we don't, it'll begin spreading to your worlds!
trans: 如果我们不这样做，它将开始传播到你们的世界！

Original: Warrior of Light:What can you tell us of the Torsions' origins?
Dialogue: What can you tell us of the Torsions' origins?
trans: 关于扭转的起源，您能告诉我们什么？

Original: Mog:I'm not sure... Much of this world still remains a mystery to me, kupo!
Dialogue: I'm not sure... Much of this world still remains a mystery to me, kupo!
trans: 我不确定……这个世界的大部分对我来说仍然是个谜，kupo！

Original: Mog:I was hoping we'd find the answer to that as we went along...
Dialogue: I was hoping we'd find the answer to that as we went along...
trans: 我希望我们在前进的过程中能找到答案……

Original: Zidane:Well, standing around interrogating Mog isn't going to get us anywhere. We need to continue our search.
Dialogue: Well, standing around interrogating Mog isn't going to get us anywhere. We need to continue our search.
trans: 好吧，站在那里审问 Mog 对我们没有任何帮助。

Original: Sazh:Let's head on back to the airship!
Dialogue: Let's head on back to the airship!
trans: 让我们回到飞艇吧！

Original: Materia:Kuja, what so spurs you to change the tides of destiny?
Dialogue: Kuja, what so spurs you to change the tides of destiny?
trans: Kuja，是什么促使你改变命运的潮流？

Original: Materia:Have you been swayed by the darkness or is there something more to this that I fail to understand...?
Dialogue: Have you been swayed by the darkness or is there something more to this that I fail to understand...?
trans: 您是否被黑暗所左右，或者还有其他我无法理解的东西……？

Original: Mog:Our allies continue to grow, kupo!
Dialogue: Our allies continue to grow, kupo!
trans: 我们的盟友继续壮大，库波！

Original: Materia:I have noticed.
Dialogue: I have noticed.
trans: 我注意到了。

Original: Materia:You have done well, Mog. The greater our numbers the sooner this war will end.
Dialogue: You have done well, Mog. The greater our numbers the sooner this war will end.
trans: 你做得很好，莫格。

Original: Mog:Yes, kupo!
Dialogue: Yes, kupo!
trans: 对，外套！

Original: Materia:I only hope you will continue to be so forthright in your efforts.
Dialogue: I only hope you will continue to be so forthright in your efforts.
trans: 我只希望你在努力中继续如此直率。

Original: Mog:Is something on your mind? You seem worried, kupo.
Dialogue: Is something on your mind? You seem worried, kupo.
trans: 你有什么想法吗？

Original: Materia:...Kuja has been manipulating the Torsions.
Dialogue: ...Kuja has been manipulating the Torsions.
trans: ...Kuja 一直在操纵 Torsions。

Original: Materia:I have yet to determine if his handiwork will be the very thing to damn us or save us.
Dialogue: I have yet to determine if his handiwork will be the very thing to damn us or save us.
trans: 我还没有确定他的杰作是否会成为诅咒我们或拯救我们的东西。

Original: Mog:Kupopo! It doesn't matter who he is. If he's creating Torsions, then he's the enemy, kupo!
Dialogue: Kupopo! It doesn't matter who he is. If he's creating Torsions, then he's the enemy, kupo!
trans: 库波波！

Original: Mog:He must be struck down at all costs, kupo!
Dialogue: He must be struck down at all costs, kupo!
trans: 必须不惜一切代价将他击倒，库珀！

Original: Materia:Indeed. And I shall rely on you to do just that, my friend.
Dialogue: Indeed. And I shall rely on you to do just that, my friend.
trans: 的确。

Original: Sazh:We made it!
Dialogue: We made it!
trans: 我们做到了！

Original: Mog:Just up ahead is the ancient Kingdom of Thronus, kupo!
Dialogue: Just up ahead is the ancient Kingdom of Thronus, kupo!
trans: 就在前面是古老的 Thronus 王国，kupo！

Original: Cecil:That is where the next Torsion is located, correct?
Dialogue: That is where the next Torsion is located, correct?
trans: 那就是下一个 Torsion 所在的位置，对吗？

Original: Mog:Yes, kupo! *Shiver* I can feel the darkness from here.
Dialogue: Yes, kupo! *Shiver* I can feel the darkness from here.
trans: 是的，库波！

Original: Sazh:Sorry, wish we could've flown in a bit closer.
Dialogue: Sorry, wish we could've flown in a bit closer.
trans: 抱歉，希望我们能飞近一点。

Original: Cecil:There is no need for apologies. We understand that it is near impossible to land the airship on certain terrain.
Dialogue: There is no need for apologies. We understand that it is near impossible to land the airship on certain terrain.
trans: 没有必要道歉。

Original: Zidane:I'm not complaining! This gives me a chance to go on romantic strolls along the beach with some beautiful ladies!
Dialogue: I'm not complaining! This gives me a chance to go on romantic strolls along the beach with some beautiful ladies!
trans: 我没有抱怨！

Original: Tifa:You really think a lot of yourself, don't you?
Dialogue: You really think a lot of yourself, don't you?
trans: 你真的很看重自己，不是吗？

Original: ???:Yoink!
Dialogue: Yoink!
trans: 哟！

Original: Tifa:Wait... Yuffie!?
Dialogue: Wait... Yuffie!?
trans: 等等……尤菲！？

Original: Zidane:Hey, what happened to the jewel on your glove?
Dialogue: Hey, what happened to the jewel on your glove?
trans: 嘿，你手套上的宝石怎么了？

Original: Yuffie:Wow, I've never seen a device like this before. And what's this, an ancient dagger? Not bad. Not bad at all.
Dialogue: Wow, I've never seen a device like this before. And what's this, an ancient dagger? Not bad. Not bad at all.
trans: 哇，我以前从未见过这样的设备。

Original: Tifa:What do you think you're doing!? Give that back!
Dialogue: What do you think you're doing!? Give that back!
trans: 你以为你在做什么！？

Original: Yuffie:Oh, hey, Tifa! Long time no see.
Dialogue: Oh, hey, Tifa! Long time no see.
trans: 哦，嘿，蒂法！

Original: Tifa:"Long time no see"? Do you even understand the situation you're in right now!?
Dialogue: "Long time no see"? Do you even understand the situation you're in right now!?
trans: “好久不见”？

Original: Yuffie:Don't know, don't care. Want your stuff back? Then ya gotta catch me!
Dialogue: Don't know, don't care. Want your stuff back? Then ya gotta catch me!
trans: 不知道，不在乎。

Original: Tifa:All right, you asked for it.
Dialogue: All right, you asked for it.
trans: 好吧，你自找的。

Original: Yuffie:Uh-oh... Tifa's serious.
Dialogue: Uh-oh... Tifa's serious.
trans: 呃……蒂法是认真的。

Original: Yuffie:There's only one thing to do at a time like this... Run away!
Dialogue: There's only one thing to do at a time like this... Run away!
trans: 这种时候只能做一件事……逃！

Original: Zidane:Don't tell me that thief's a friend of yours?
Dialogue: Don't tell me that thief's a friend of yours?
trans: 别告诉我那个小偷是你的朋友？

Original: Tifa:I'm afraid so. I had no idea she was here though.
Dialogue: I'm afraid so. I had no idea she was here though.
trans: 恐怕是这样。

Original: Zidane:The nerve of that girl! She took my favorite dagger.
Dialogue: The nerve of that girl! She took my favorite dagger.
trans: 那个女孩的神经！

Original: Hope:She, uh...stole my device, too. It's not something I can use in this world, but...
Dialogue: She, uh...stole my device, too. It's not something I can use in this world, but...
trans: 她，呃……也偷了我的设备。

Original: Tifa:Ugh, she's always like this! Come on, we're going after her!
Dialogue: Ugh, she's always like this! Come on, we're going after her!
trans: 唉，她总是这样！

Original: Zidane:Gotcha!
Dialogue: Gotcha!
trans: 明白了！

Original: Cloud:It's over.
Dialogue: It's over.
trans: 结束了。

Original: Yuffie:Cloud! You're here too!?
Dialogue: Cloud! You're here too!?
trans: 云！

Original: Cloud:Just give back what you stole.
Dialogue: Just give back what you stole.
trans: 把你偷的东西还给我。

Original: Yuffie:Not in a million years! Let me go!
Dialogue: Not in a million years! Let me go!
trans: 一百万年都不会！

Original: Y'shtola:You best surrender now.
Dialogue: You best surrender now.
trans: 你最好现在投降。

Original: Yuffie:Hmph. I wouldn't be so sure about that. Never underestimate a ninja.
Dialogue: Hmph. I wouldn't be so sure about that. Never underestimate a ninja.
trans: 哼。

Original: Cloud:Guess I should've seen that coming.
Dialogue: Guess I should've seen that coming.
trans: 我想我早该预见到这一点。

Original: Yuffie:Nyuk, nyuk, nyuk! You can never let your guard down around me!
Dialogue: Nyuk, nyuk, nyuk! You can never let your guard down around me!
trans: 纽克，纽克，纽克！

Original: Yuffie:Oh, and check out what the cat-girl gave me.
Dialogue: Oh, and check out what the cat-girl gave me.
trans: 哦，看看猫女给了我什么。

Original: Y'shtola:My staff!?
Dialogue: My staff!?
trans: 我的员工！？

Original: Yuffie:Look at all these goodies! I've never seen anythin' like 'em.
Dialogue: Look at all these goodies! I've never seen anythin' like 'em.
trans: 看看所有这些好东西！

Original: Yuffie:I bet I can sell this one for a hefty price!
Dialogue: I bet I can sell this one for a hefty price!
trans: 我敢打赌我能卖个好价钱！

Original: Sazh:Yeah, you'd make a small fortune selling items from other worlds.
Dialogue: Yeah, you'd make a small fortune selling items from other worlds.
trans: 是的，你会通过出售来自其他世界的物品赚到一笔不小的财富。

Original: Zidane:But you're much too cut efor petty thievery. If you want something to steal, you can have my heart any day.
Dialogue: But you're much too cut efor petty thievery. If you want something to steal, you can have my heart any day.
trans: 但是你对小偷小摸太过分了。

Original: Sazh:This ain't the time for that!
Dialogue: This ain't the time for that!
trans: 现在不是说那个的时候！

Original: Yuffie:Heh, now's my chance! Later!
Dialogue: Heh, now's my chance! Later!
trans: 呵呵，机会来了！

Original: Sazh:See what you did? Now she's gone!
Dialogue: See what you did? Now she's gone!
trans: 看看你做了什么？

Original: Tifa:Give it up, Yuffie. We've got you now.
Dialogue: Give it up, Yuffie. We've got you now.
trans: 放弃吧，尤菲。

Original: Sazh:You've taken this prank too far.
Dialogue: You've taken this prank too far.
trans: 你把这个恶作剧搞得太过分了。

Original: Vivi:Excuse me... Could I please have my stuff back?
Dialogue: Excuse me... Could I please have my stuff back?
trans: 打扰一下……我可以拿回我的东西吗？

Original: Yuffie:*Sigh* All right, all right. You win.
Dialogue: *Sigh* All right, all right. You win.
trans: *叹气*好吧，好吧。

Original: Yuffie:My beautiful treasures...
Dialogue: My beautiful treasures...
trans: 我美丽的宝物...

Original: Tifa:They're not yours!
Dialogue: They're not yours!
trans: 他们不是你的！

Original: Mog:Kupo! I've never seen anyone run so fast! We sure could use someone like you, kupo!
Dialogue: Kupo! I've never seen anyone run so fast! We sure could use someone like you, kupo!
trans: 库波！

Original: Sazh:This little thief? You gotta be kidding.
Dialogue: This little thief? You gotta be kidding.
trans: 这个小贼？

Original: Tifa:Yuffie's actually a close friend of mine back in our world. She...just has some sticky fingers.
Dialogue: Yuffie's actually a close friend of mine back in our world. She...just has some sticky fingers.
trans: Yuffie 实际上是我在我们世界里的好朋友。

Original: Sazh:If you say so.
Dialogue: If you say so.
trans: 如果你这么说。

Original: Yuffie:Hm, so they really need me.
Dialogue: Hm, so they really need me.
trans: 嗯，所以他们真的需要我。

Original: Tifa:All right, then. Shall we get going?
Dialogue: All right, then. Shall we get going?
trans: 那好吧。

Original: Mog:Hooray for new friends, kupo!
Dialogue: Hooray for new friends, kupo!
trans: 新朋友万岁，kupo！

Original: Yuffie:I mean, they're practically begging me to join them...
Dialogue: I mean, they're practically begging me to join them...
trans: 我的意思是，他们实际上是在求我加入他们……

Original: Yuffie:All right, you've got it! I'll go with you!
Dialogue: All right, you've got it! I'll go with you!
trans: 好吧，你明白了！

Original: Yuffie:Hey! Didn't you hear me!? The conqueror of evil, Yuffie Kisaragi, just said she'll join you!
Dialogue: Hey! Didn't you hear me!? The conqueror of evil, Yuffie Kisaragi, just said she'll join you!
trans: 嘿！

Original: Yuffie:Oh, well. Who cares? This is gonna be great!
Dialogue: Oh, well. Who cares? This is gonna be great!
trans: 那好吧。

Original: Yuffie:Now I'll be just seconds away from those otherworldy treasures.
Dialogue: Now I'll be just seconds away from those otherworldy treasures.
trans: 现在我离那些超凡脱俗的宝藏只有几秒钟的路程。

Original: Yuffie:And soon they'll be all mine for the taking!
Dialogue: And soon they'll be all mine for the taking!
trans: 很快它们就会全部归我所有！

Original: ???:Who do you think you are, taking that lofty tone with me!?
Dialogue: Who do you think you are, taking that lofty tone with me!?
trans: 你以为你是谁，用那种高高在上的语气跟我说话！？

Original: Seifer:As if they have anything worthwhile to say.
Dialogue: As if they have anything worthwhile to say.
trans: 好像他们有什么值得说的一样。

Original: Seifer:If there's anything I despise, it's mindless sheep!
Dialogue: If there's anything I despise, it's mindless sheep!
trans: 如果有什么我鄙视的，那就是没脑子的羊！

Original: Warrior of Light:Mindless sheep!?
Dialogue: Mindless sheep!?
trans: 无脑羊！？

Original: Mog:How rude, kupo!
Dialogue: How rude, kupo!
trans: 多么粗鲁，库波！

Original: Cloud:Stop with whatever it is you're trying to do.
Dialogue: Stop with whatever it is you're trying to do.
trans: 停下任何你想做的事。

Original: Seifer:I don't like the look of you.
Dialogue: I don't like the look of you.
trans: 我不喜欢你的样子

Original: Cloud:Are we going to stand here and take this?
Dialogue: Are we going to stand here and take this?
trans: 我们要站在这里接受这个吗？

Original: Mog:Please be on your way, kupo! If you continue to harass us, I'll have no choice but to report you to Mistress Materia!
Dialogue: Please be on your way, kupo! If you continue to harass us, I'll have no choice but to report you to Mistress Materia!
trans: 库波，请上路！

Original: Mog:Well, kupo?
Dialogue: Well, kupo?
trans: 嗯，聪明吗？

Original: Raijin:What? I wasn't listening, ya know?
Dialogue: What? I wasn't listening, ya know?
trans: 什么？

Original: Seifer:Quiet, Raijin. Can't you see they're trying to pick a fight with us?
Dialogue: Quiet, Raijin. Can't you see they're trying to pick a fight with us?
trans: 安静，雷神。

Original: Y'shtola:Far from it. You are the one intent on starting a fight with us.
Dialogue: Far from it. You are the one intent on starting a fight with us.
trans: 离得很远。

Original: Seifer:I can't stand people like you. Talking down to others as if you know better!
Dialogue: I can't stand people like you. Talking down to others as if you know better!
trans: 我不能忍受像你这样的人。

Original: Warrior of Light:Nothing we say will get through to him.
Dialogue: Nothing we say will get through to him.
trans: 我们说的话他都听不懂。

Original: Mog:Kupopo! Then we have no choice but to open his ears to reason!
Dialogue: Kupopo! Then we have no choice but to open his ears to reason!
trans: 库波波！

Original: Seifer:Heh. These weaklings aren't even worth my time. Raijin, Fujin, take care of them.
Dialogue: Heh. These weaklings aren't even worth my time. Raijin, Fujin, take care of them.
trans: 呵呵。

Original: Raijin:You better be ready, ya know!
Dialogue: You better be ready, ya know!
trans: 你最好做好准备，你知道的！

Original: Seifer:What's the matter with you guys?
Dialogue: What's the matter with you guys?
trans: 你们怎么了？

Original: Seifer:Whatever. I don't need help taking out the trash.
Dialogue: Whatever. I don't need help taking out the trash.
trans: 任何。

Original: Cecil:Are you finally ready to talk? If so, let us begin with basic introductions.
Dialogue: Are you finally ready to talk? If so, let us begin with basic introductions.
trans: 你终于准备好说话了吗？

Original: Raijin:There's a lot we wanna say, ya know?
Dialogue: There's a lot we wanna say, ya know?
trans: 我们有很多话想说，你知道吗？

Original: Seifer:Stop it! Stop engaging them! They're
Dialogue: Stop it! Stop engaging them! They're—
trans: 停下来！

Original: Raijin:SorrytheDisciplinary Committeehas spoken. My hands are tied now, ya know?
Dialogue: Sorry—the Disciplinary Committee has spoken. My hands are tied now, ya know?
trans: 抱歉——纪律委员会已经发话了。

Original: Raijin:We'll be back!
Dialogue: We'll be back!
trans: 我们会回来的！

Original: Vivi:Why did that man want to fight us? He didn't seem to be a bad person...
Dialogue: Why did that man want to fight us? He didn't seem to be a bad person...
trans: 为什么那个男人要和我们打架？

Original: Cecil:Perhaps he was feeling overwhelmed and turned to anger.
Dialogue: Perhaps he was feeling overwhelmed and turned to anger.
trans: 也许他感到不知所措，转而愤怒。

Original: Mog:I understand, kupo. But it doesn't excuse his actions!
Dialogue: I understand, kupo. But it doesn't excuse his actions!
trans: 我明白了，库波。

Original: Mog:That said, we can't get distracted. We have a Torsion to close, kupo!
Dialogue: That said, we can't get distracted. We have a Torsion to close, kupo!
trans: 也就是说，我们不能分心。

Original: Cecil:We are well aware of the fact.
Dialogue: We are well aware of the fact.
trans: 我们很清楚这个事实。

Original: Vivi:Um, Mr. Cecildo you think there's a chance they'll become our allies, just like you did?
Dialogue: Um, Mr. Cecil—do you think there's a chance they'll become our allies, just like you did?
trans: 嗯，塞西尔先生——您认为他们有可能像您一样成为我们的盟友吗？

Original: Cecil:It is not out of the question. They appeared to be new to this world.
Dialogue: It is not out of the question. They appeared to be new to this world.
trans: 这不是不可能的。

Original: Cecil:If we run into them again, perhaps we can attempt to recruit them.
Dialogue: If we run into them again, perhaps we can attempt to recruit them.
trans: 如果我们再次遇到他们，也许我们可以尝试招募他们。

Original: Yda:Seifer, was it? He seemed to have quite a temper.
Dialogue: Seifer, was it? He seemed to have quite a temper.
trans: 塞弗，是吗？

Original: Vaan:Talk about the pot calling the kettle black.
Dialogue: Talk about the pot calling the kettle black.
trans: 谈壶称壶黑。

Original: Tifa:Vaan! No need to be rude!
Dialogue: Vaan! No need to be rude!
trans: 梵！

Original: Hope:He didn't seem like a bad person...just liable to cause trouble, probably without even meaning to.
Dialogue: He didn't seem like a bad person...just liable to cause trouble, probably without even meaning to.
trans: 他看起来不像是个坏人……只是容易惹麻烦，甚至可能根本不想惹麻烦。

Original: Tifa:There's no denying he was a pain, but it felt like he was putting on an act.
Dialogue: There's no denying he was a pain, but it felt like he was putting on an act.
trans: 不可否认他很痛苦，但感觉就像他在演戏。

Original: Yda:Well, I suppose there's no harm in trying to recruit him and his friends.
Dialogue: Well, I suppose there's no harm in trying to recruit him and his friends.
trans: 好吧，我想尝试招募他和他的朋友并没有什么坏处。

Original: Cloud:It's not their skill that's the problem. It's their personalities.
Dialogue: It's not their skill that's the problem. It's their personalities.
trans: 问题不在于他们的技能。

Original: Vaan:Yeah, just because they aren't the enemy, doesn't mean they're on our side.
Dialogue: Yeah, just because they aren't the enemy, doesn't mean they're on our side.
trans: 是的，仅仅因为他们不是敌人，并不意味着他们站在我们这边。

Original: Vaan:I don't want him coming with us. He's too arrogant and grumpy.
Dialogue: I don't want him coming with us. He's too arrogant and grumpy.
trans: 我不想让他和我们一起去。

Original: Hope:Agreed... Even if we did form an alliance, I do't know if that would mean anything to him.
Dialogue: Agreed... Even if we did form an alliance, I do't know if that would mean anything to him.
trans: 同意……就算真的结盟，也不知道对他来说有没有意义。

Original: Mog:No matter who they are or what they're like, we just need to focus on our task at hand, kupo.
Dialogue: No matter who they are or what they're like, we just need to focus on our task at hand, kupo.
trans: 不管他们是谁，长什么样，我们只需要专注于手头的工作，库波。

Original: Mog:But if they get in our way, we will have to fight them, kupo...
Dialogue: But if they get in our way, we will have to fight them, kupo...
trans: 但如果他们妨碍我们，我们将不得不与他们战斗，库波……

Original: Mog:M-more of what, kupo!?
Dialogue: M-more of what, kupo!?
trans: M-更多什么，kupo！？

Original: ???:Don't think I'm so easily fooled! I shall trounce you as thoroughly as I did the first time!
Dialogue: Don't think I'm so easily fooled! I shall trounce you as thoroughly as I did the first time!
trans: 别以为我这么容易上当！

Original: Warrior of Light:It appears he is under the impression that we are Manikins.
Dialogue: It appears he is under the impression that we are Manikins.
trans: 看来他的印象是我们是人体模型。

Original: Sazh:Kid, listen. I know you think you saw us, but
Dialogue: Kid, listen. I know you think you saw us, but—
trans: 孩子，听着。

Original: ???:Enough! I'll show you what Eblan ninjas are made of!
Dialogue: Enough! I'll show you what Eblan ninjas are made of!
trans: 足够的！

Original: ???:*Pant* Not bad! Nothing like those monsters from earlier!
Dialogue: *Pant* Not bad! Nothing like those monsters from earlier!
trans: *裤子*不错！

Original: Zidane:I'd hope so. We are the real thing after all.
Dialogue: I'd hope so. We are the real thing after all.
trans: 我希望如此。

Original: Warrior of Light:I gather you were attacked by foes who resemble us.
Dialogue: I gather you were attacked by foes who resemble us.
trans: 我猜你是被和我们很像的敌人袭击了。

Original: ???:...You can speak? Properly? I guess you really aren't them.
Dialogue: ...You can speak? Properly? I guess you really aren't them.
trans: ...你可以说？

Original: Rem:We're human just like you. We're not going to hurt you, I promise.
Dialogue: We're human just like you. We're not going to hurt you, I promise.
trans: 我们和你一样是人。

Original: ???:What choice do I have than to trust the words of a pretty lady such as yourself?
Dialogue: What choice do I have than to trust the words of a pretty lady such as yourself?
trans: 除了相信像你这样的漂亮女士的话，我还有什么选择呢？

Original: Cecil:Did you say Eblan!?
Dialogue: Did you say Eblan!?
trans: 你是说埃布兰！？

Original: Edge:Wait. That armor...
Dialogue: Wait. That armor...
trans: 等待。

Original: Cecil:Indeed. My name is Cecil.
Dialogue: Indeed. My name is Cecil.
trans: 的确。

Original: Edge:What's a Baron knight doing here? Shouldn't you be exploring the world for the crystals?
Dialogue: What's a Baron knight doing here? Shouldn't you be exploring the world for the crystals?
trans: 男爵骑士来这里做什么？

Original: Rem:This isn't the world you call home anymore.
Dialogue: This isn't the world you call home anymore.
trans: 这不再是你称之为家的世界。

Original: Mog:Let me take over from here, kupo!
Dialogue: Let me take over from here, kupo!
trans: 让我接管这里，kupo！

Original: Mog:...And that's what happened, kupo.
Dialogue: ...And that's what happened, kupo.
trans: ......事情就是这样，库波。

Original: Edge:So the world's in danger and you're on a journey to save it?
Dialogue: So the world's in danger and you're on a journey to save it?
trans: 所以世界处于危险之中，而你正在拯救它？

Original: Edge:All right, then! Count me in!
Dialogue: All right, then! Count me in!
trans: 那好吧！

Original: Seifer:Just shut up and follow us. I'm going to
Dialogue: Just shut up and follow us. I'm going to—
trans: 闭嘴跟着我们。

Original: Zidane:Picking up girls now? Not too good at it, are ya?
Dialogue: Picking up girls now? Not too good at it, are ya?
trans: 现在还泡妞？

Original: Zidane:Lesson one: Tenderness and affection go a long way. The very opposite of what you're
Dialogue: Lesson one Tenderness and affection go a long way. The very opposite of what you're—
trans: 第一课 温柔和感情大有帮助。

Original: Seifer:I let you off the hook last time but you won't be so lucky this time!
Dialogue: I let you off the hook last time but you won't be so lucky this time!
trans: 上次放过你，这次就没你这么幸运了！

Original: Zidane:You let us off the hook!? That's not how I remember it!
Dialogue: You let us off the hook!? That's not how I remember it!
trans: 你放过我们！？

Original: Seifer:Shut up!
Dialogue: Shut up!
trans: 住口！

Original: Raijin:Not again...
Dialogue: Not again...
trans: 不会再...

Original: Seifer:Whose side are the two of you on!?
Dialogue: Whose side are the two of you on!?
trans: 你们两个站在哪一边！？

Original: Mog:...He really does have a temper, kupo.
Dialogue: ...He really does have a temper, kupo.
trans: ……他还真是有脾气啊库珀。

Original: Seifer:This time, I'll make it as a knight... I have to...
Dialogue: This time, I'll make it as a knight... I have to...
trans: 这一次，我要成为骑士……我必须……

Original: Seifer:And I'm not going to let you stand in my way!
Dialogue: And I'm not going to let you stand in my way!
trans: 而且我不会让你挡我的路！

Original: Mog:Then you give us no choice, kupo!
Dialogue: Then you give us no choice, kupo!
trans: 那你就别无选择了，kupo！

Original: Raijin:Time to get serious, ya know!
Dialogue: Time to get serious, ya know!
trans: 是时候认真起来了，你知道的！

Original: Seifer:Let's see what you wusses can do!
Dialogue: Let's see what you wusses can do!
trans: 让我们看看你们这些胆小鬼能做什么！

Original: Raijin:Seifer, you should've listened to us, ya know. Let's get outta here.
Dialogue: Seifer, you should've listened to us, ya know. Let's get outta here.
trans: Seifer，你应该听听我们的，你知道的。

Original: Warrior of Light:...And they are gonebefore we could even speak a word.
Dialogue: ...And they are gone—before we could even speak a word.
trans: ......然后他们就走了——我们还没来得及说一句话。

Original: Zidane:Are you all right? Did they hurt you?
Dialogue: Are you all right? Did they hurt you?
trans: 你没事儿吧？

Original: ???:No, I'm fine. I met them right before you came. As soon as I told them who I was...
Dialogue: No, I'm fine. I met them right before you came. As soon as I told them who I was...
trans: 不我没事。

Original: ???:They insisted I join them. I, of course, had no choice but to refuse.
Dialogue: They insisted I join them. I, of course, had no choice but to refuse.
trans: 他们坚持要我加入他们。

Original: Mog:The light radiates strongly from you, kupo! What's your name?
Dialogue: The light radiates strongly from you, kupo! What's your name?
trans: 从你身上散发出强烈的光芒，库波！

Original: Yuna:Ah, sorry. I'm Yuna.
Dialogue: Ah, sorry. I'm Yuna.
trans: 啊，对不起。

Original: Rem:I don't know what that is. I assume you're also a warrior of some kind from a different world?
Dialogue: I don't know what that is. I assume you're also a warrior of some kind from a different world?
trans: 我不知道那是什么。

Original: Zidane:What exactly do summoners do where you're from?
Dialogue: What exactly do summoners do where you're from?
trans: 你来自哪里，召唤师具体做什么？

Original: Yuna:We are trained to kill monsters and protect the people.
Dialogue: We are trained to kill monsters and protect the people.
trans: 我们受过训练来杀死怪物和保护人民。

Original: Yuna:It's a skill I'm glad to have. I was separated from my friends, and while searching for a way home, I was attacked by monsters.
Dialogue: It's a skill I'm glad to have. I was separated from my friends, and while searching for a way home, I was attacked by monsters.
trans: 这是我很高兴拥有的一项技能。

Original: Rem:And that's how you met Seifer?
Dialogue: And that's how you met Seifer?
trans: 你就是这样认识Seifer的？

Original: Yuna:Yes. He wouldn't let me out of his sight, telling me he couldn't leave a girl with such an unfortunate destiny on her own.
Dialogue: Yes. He wouldn't let me out of his sight, telling me he couldn't leave a girl with such an unfortunate destiny on her own.
trans: 是的。

Original: Warrior of Light:He also proclaimed he wanted to become a knight.
Dialogue: He also proclaimed he wanted to become a knight.
trans: 他还宣布他想成为一名骑士。

Original: Zidane:Seems to me, he needs to learn the meaning of "no." What an oaf.
Dialogue: Seems to me, he needs to learn the meaning of "no." What an oaf.
trans: 在我看来，他需要学习“不”的含义。

Original: Mog:Well, if you're alone, why don't you come with us?
Dialogue: Well, if you're alone, why don't you come with us?
trans: 好吧，如果你一个人，为什么不和我们一起去呢？

Original: Mog:We know more about this place than Seifer and his friends. We can tell you all about it, kupo!
Dialogue: We know more about this place than Seifer and his friends. We can tell you all about it, kupo!
trans: 我们比 Seifer 和他的朋友们更了解这个地方。

Original: Yuna:Are you sure it's okay for me to come with you?
Dialogue: Are you sure it's okay for me to come with you?
trans: 你确定我可以和你一起去吗？

Original: Zidane:Of course! We can't leave a beautiful young lady out here to fend for herself!
Dialogue: Of course! We can't leave a beautiful young lady out here to fend for herself!
trans: 当然！

Original: Yuna:Thank you. In that case, I look forward to learning more about this place from you.
Dialogue: Thank you. In that case, I look forward to learning more about this place from you.
trans: 谢谢。

Original: Raijin:I think we should've listened to what they had to say. They might've been able to help, ya know?
Dialogue: I think we should've listened to what they had to say. They might've been able to help, ya know?
trans: 我认为我们应该听听他们的意见。

Original: Seifer:Stop talking about them! Can't you see I'm in a bad mood already!?
Dialogue: Stop talking about them! Can't you see I'm in a bad mood already!?
trans: 别说他们了！

Original: Seifer:That girlshe said her name was Yuna...
Dialogue: That girl—she said her name was Yuna...
trans: 那个女孩——她说她叫尤娜……

Original: Seifer:Fate, you cruel mistressto think that you'd thrust such a great burden upon such a frail creature...
Dialogue: Fate, you cruel mistress—to think that you'd thrust such a great burden upon such a frail creature...
trans: 命运，你这个残忍的女主人——想不到你会把这么大的负担强加在这样一个脆弱的生物身上……

Original: Seifer:Wait. I remember nowthose imbeciles that showed up mentioned they were going to the Lost Kingdom.
Dialogue: Wait. I remember now—those imbeciles that showed up mentioned they were going to the Lost Kingdom.
trans: 等待。

Original: Seifer:No. We're gonna beat them there.
Dialogue: No. We're gonna beat them there.
trans: 不，我们要在那里打败他们。

Original: Seifer:We'll protect her by exterminating all the monsters in the area before they arrive.
Dialogue: We'll protect her by exterminating all the monsters in the area before they arrive.
trans: 我们会在他们到达之前消灭该地区的所有怪物来保护她。

Original: Raijin:Got it, Seifer! We'll follow your lead, ya know!
Dialogue: Got it, Seifer! We'll follow your lead, ya know!
trans: 知道了，塞弗！

Original: Vaan:Not again.
Dialogue: Not again.
trans: 不会再来了。

Original: Seifer:You're late. We've already taken care of this area.
Dialogue: You're late. We've already taken care of this area.
trans: 你迟到了。

Original: Warrior of Light:You mean to say you have defeated all of the monsters here?
Dialogue: You mean to say you have defeated all of the monsters here?
trans: 你的意思是说你已经打败了这里所有的怪物？

Original: Cecil:You have our thanks. You have saved us a great deal of trouble.
Dialogue: You have our thanks. You have saved us a great deal of trouble.
trans: 我们感谢你。

Original: Raijin:Thanks? From you? I must be hearing things, ya know?
Dialogue: Thanks? From you? I must be hearing things, ya know?
trans: 谢谢？

Original: Vaan:These two are actual knights, after all.
Dialogue: These two are actual knights, after all.
trans: 毕竟，这两个是真正的骑士。

Original: Seifer:What are you trying to imply, kid!?
Dialogue: What are you trying to imply, kid!?
trans: 你想暗示什么，孩子！？

Original: Vaan:Well, you're not exactly the knightly typeat least not by my world's standards.
Dialogue: Well, you're not exactly the knightly type—at least not by my world's standards.
trans: 好吧，你不完全是骑士类型——至少按照我的世界标准不是。

Original: Vaan:Don't tell me you're upset?
Dialogue: Don't tell me you're upset?
trans: 别告诉我你不高兴？

Original: Raijin:He's upset, ya know.
Dialogue: He's upset, ya know.
trans: 他很沮丧，你知道的。

Original: Warrior of Light:There is a Torsion beyond this point that we must close. There are many more like it that must also be sealed.
Dialogue: There is a Torsion beyond this point that we must close. There are many more like it that must also be sealed.
trans: 在这一点之外还有一个我们必须关闭的扭转。

Original: Warrior of Light:If left unattended, the corruption will continue to spread and monsters will run rampant.
Dialogue: If left unattended, the corruption will continue to spread and monsters will run rampant.
trans: 如果放任不管，腐败将继续蔓延，怪物将猖獗。

Original: Seifer:All right.
Dialogue: All right.
trans: 好的。

Original: Seifer:We'll take care of this Torsioneven if it means I have to pry the privilege from you.
Dialogue: We'll take care of this Torsion—even if it means I have to pry the privilege from you.
trans: 我们会处理这个 Torsion——即使这意味着我必须从你那里抢走特权。

Original: Cecil:Please. For once, I ask that you lower your sword and listen to what we have to say.
Dialogue: Please. For once, I ask that you lower your sword and listen to what we have to say.
trans: 请。

Original: Seifer:I don't have the time to listen to a clown like you.
Dialogue: I don't have the time to listen to a clown like you.
trans: 我没有时间听你这样的小丑说话。

Original: Seifer:Fujin! Raijin!
Dialogue: Fujin! Raijin!
trans: 风神！雷神！

Original: Vaan:You're his friends, aren't you? Why aren't you stopping him!?
Dialogue: You're his friends, aren't you? Why aren't you stopping him!?
trans: 你是他的朋友，不是吗？

Original: Raijin:Like you said, we're his friendswe can't let him fight you alone, ya know?
Dialogue: Like you said, we're his friends—we can't let him fight you alone, ya know?
trans: 就像你说的，我们是他的朋友——我们不能让他一个人和你打架，你知道吗？

Original: Warrior of Light:If you continue to raise your weapons against us, we will be forced to take action against you.
Dialogue: If you continue to raise your weapons against us, we will be forced to take action against you.
trans: 如果你们继续对我们举起武器，我们将被迫对你们采取行动。

Original: Seifer:Why is everyone trying to make a fool out of me!?
Dialogue: Why is everyone trying to make a fool out of me!?
trans: 为什么每个人都想愚弄我！？

Original: Yuna:We're doing no such thing!
Dialogue: We're doing no such thing!
trans: 我们不做这样的事！

Original: Yuna:We just want you to listen to what we have to say. We know deep down you're a good man...
Dialogue: We just want you to listen to what we have to say. We know deep down you're a good man...
trans: 我们只是想让你听听我们要说的话。

Original: Yuna:Which is why we want you to join us.
Dialogue: Which is why we want you to join us.
trans: 这就是我们希望您加入我们的原因。

Original: Seifer:What? You've got to be kidding me.
Dialogue: What? You've got to be kidding me.
trans: 什么？

Original: Seifer:Just stay out of our way. That's the only kind of alliance we need.
Dialogue: Just stay out of our way. That's the only kind of alliance we need.
trans: 别挡路。

Original: Sazh:You really don't know anything about how these things work, do you?
Dialogue: You really don't know anything about how these things work, do you?
trans: 你真的不知道这些东西是如何工作的，是吗？

Original: Seifer:I'll give you this Torsion, but it's going to be me that saves the worldgot it?
Dialogue: I'll give you this Torsion, but it's going to be me that saves the world—got it?
trans: 我会给你这个 Torsion，但拯救世界的将是我——明白吗？

Original: Seifer:So long.
Dialogue: So long.
trans: 这么久。

Original: Raijin:We'll see ya around, ya know!
Dialogue: We'll see ya around, ya know!
trans: 我们会再见的，你知道的！

Original: Yuffie:Hey Vaan, that's some awful nice jewelry you got there.
Dialogue: Hey Vaan, that's some awful nice jewelry you got there.
trans: 嘿 Vaan，你拿到的珠宝真是太棒了。

Original: Yuffie:Where'd you steal it from?
Dialogue: Where'd you steal it from?
trans: 你从哪里偷来的？

Original: Yuffie:My countrywasn't weak by any means, but they destroyed us in thewar.
Dialogue: My country wasn't weak by any means, but they destroyed us in the war.
trans: 我的国家无论如何都不弱，但他们在战争中摧毁了我们。

Original: Zidane:And that's how you became a thief.
Dialogue: And that's how you became a thief.
trans: 这就是你成为小偷的原因。

Original: Yuffie:What!? I'm not a thief! I'm a ninja.
Dialogue: What!? I'm not a thief! I'm a ninja.
trans: 什么！？

Original: Yuffie:A ninja looking to take back all that Shinra stole from my homeland.
Dialogue: A ninja looking to take back all that Shinra stole from my homeland.
trans: 一个忍者想要夺回神罗从我的祖国偷走的一切。

Original: Vaan:I like your ambition.
Dialogue: I like your ambition.
trans: 我喜欢你的野心。

Original: Vaan:Unlike you, I was whittling away my life on the streets. I wouldn't have imagined I'd end up in another world on some grand adventure.
Dialogue: Unlike you, I was whittling away my life on the streets. I wouldn't have imagined I'd end up in another world on some grand adventure.
trans: 不像你，我是在街头消磨我的生命。

Original: Yuffie:Well, I'm glad someone finally understands the noble cause I fight for!
Dialogue: Well, I'm glad someone finally understands the noble cause I fight for!
trans: 好吧，我很高兴终于有人了解我为之奋斗的崇高事业！

Original: Zidane:...She's really something, isn't she?
Dialogue: ...She's really something, isn't she?
trans: ......她真的很了不起，不是吗？

Original: Zidane:Must've been hard to work with someone as flighty and brash as her.
Dialogue: Must've been hard to work with someone as flighty and brash as her.
trans: 和她这样轻浮、鲁莽的人共事一定很辛苦。

Original: Cloud:She's just like you.
Dialogue: She's just like you.
trans: 她和你一样。

Original: Cloud:Nothing. Let's go.
Dialogue: Nothing. Let's go.
trans: 没有什么。

Original: Mog:Kupopo! We're here, everyone!
Dialogue: Kupopo! We're here, everyone!
trans: 哎呀！

Original: Sazh:How does Seifer plan on closing the Torsion when he knows next to nothing about how it works?
Dialogue: How does Seifer plan on closing the Torsion when he knows next to nothing about how it works?
trans: 当 Seifer 对 Torsion 的工作原理几乎一无所知时，他打算如何关闭 Torsion？

Original: Yda:Good question. I guess we just have to hope he doesn't do anything foolish.
Dialogue: Good question. I guess we just have to hope he doesn't do anything foolish.
trans: 好问题。

Original: Warrior of Light:They do not appear to be in the near vicinity. Perhaps they went elsewhere?
Dialogue: They do not appear to be in the near vicinity. Perhaps they went elsewhere?
trans: 他们似乎不在附近。

Original: Hope:Either way, I'm sure they're fine. They have each other. That should be enough.
Dialogue: Either way, I'm sure they're fine. They have each other. That should be enough.
trans: 不管怎样，我相信他们都很好。

Original: Sazh:Well, there's no use in us worrying about it.
Dialogue: Well, there's no use in us worrying about it.
trans: 好吧，我们担心它是没有用的。

Original: Mog:Agreed. Let's focus on our task for now, kupo!
Dialogue: Agreed. Let's focus on our task for now, kupo!
trans: 同意。

Original: Warrior of Light:Yes. We must keep an eye out. We are close to a Torsion. No doubt there are monsters lurking nearby.
Dialogue: Yes. We must keep an eye out. We are close to a Torsion. No doubt there are monsters lurking nearby.
trans: 是的。

Original: Hope:We should be extra careful, then.
Dialogue: We should be extra careful, then.
trans: 那么我们应该格外小心。

Original: ???:You there, in theAkademeiauniform!
Dialogue: You there, in the Akademeia uniform!
trans: 你在那里，穿着 Akademeia 制服！

Original: King:Where're the others? I haven't been able to get in contact with anyone since I wandered into this place.
Dialogue: Where're the others? I haven't been able to get in contact with anyone since I wandered into this place.
trans: 其他人在哪里？

Original: Mog:Do you know him, kupo?
Dialogue: Do you know him, kupo?
trans: 你认识他吗，库波？

Original: Rem:He's not from Akademeia, but he is our friend.
Dialogue: He's not from Akademeia, but he is our friend.
trans: 他不是来自 Akademeia，但他是我们的朋友。

Original: Warrior of Light:It appears you were also summoned to this world to act as its savior.
Dialogue: It appears you were also summoned to this world to act as its savior.
trans: 看来你也被召唤到这个世界来充当它的救世主。

Original: Rem:Y-yeah, I can't believe someone as inexperienced as me was chosen either.
Dialogue: Y-yeah, I can't believe someone as inexperienced as me was chosen either.
trans: 是-是的，我不敢相信像我这样没有经验的人也被选中了。

Original: King:That's not what I meant. You're ill, you know?
Dialogue: That's not what I meant. You're ill, you know?
trans: 我不是这个意思。

Original: Rem:I-it's nothing. I just get a little cough sometimes, so you don't need to worry about me, okay?
Dialogue: I-it's nothing. I just get a little cough sometimes, so you don't need to worry about me, okay?
trans: 我——没什么。

Original: Warrior of Light:It seems we have visitors.
Dialogue: It seems we have visitors.
trans: 看来我们有客人。

Original: Rem:Um, King? Could you do me a favor?
Dialogue: Um, King? Could you do me a favor?
trans: 嗯，国王？

Original: Rem:Could you keep my illness a secret from everyone else?
Dialogue: Could you keep my illness a secret from everyone else?
trans: 你能不能对其他人隐瞒我的病？

Original: King:Sounds like it really is serious then.
Dialogue: Sounds like it really is serious then.
trans: 听起来好像真的很严重。

Original: King:That's more the reason why you shouldn't be fighting.
Dialogue: That's more the reason why you shouldn't be fighting.
trans: 这就是你不应该战斗的更多原因。

Original: Rem:No, I'm fine! Really. Everyone's just so nice that I don't want to worry them.
Dialogue: No, I'm fine! Really. Everyone's just so nice that I don't want to worry them.
trans: 不我没事！

Original: King:What a terrible liar.
Dialogue: What a terrible liar.
trans: 多么可怕的骗子。

Original: Rem:King, I was wondering... Why don't you come with us?
Dialogue: King, I was wondering... Why don't you come with us?
trans: 国王，我在想……你为什么不和我们一起去？

Original: Sazh:Yeah, come on! We could use another gunslingerand a talented one at that.
Dialogue: Yeah, come on! We could use another gunslinger—and a talented one at that.
trans: 是啊来吧！

Original: King:I was trained to use these handguns for war, not for protection.
Dialogue: I was trained to use these handguns for war, not for protection.
trans: 我受过训练，将这些手枪用于战争，而不是用于保护。

Original: King:A guy like me isn't fit to fight for a noble cause like saving the world.
Dialogue: A guy like me isn't fit to fight for a noble cause like saving the world.
trans: 像我这样的人不适合为拯救世界这样崇高的事业而战。

Original: Sazh:That ain't a reason. Weapons are just tools that level the playing field.
Dialogue: That ain't a reason. Weapons are just tools that level the playing field.
trans: 那不是理由。

Original: Sazh:What matters is why you pull that trigger. What're your intentions? What's your purpose?
Dialogue: What matters is why you pull that trigger. What're your intentions? What's your purpose?
trans: 重要的是你为什么扣动扳机。

Original: King:My purpose...
Dialogue: My purpose...
trans: 我的目的...

Original: Vivi:...I was supposed to be a puppet for war back in my world.
Dialogue: ...I was supposed to be a puppet for war back in my world.
trans: ……在我的世界里，我本该成为战争的傀儡。

Original: Vivi:But my family and friends gave me purpose.
Dialogue: But my family and friends gave me purpose.
trans: 但是我的家人和朋友给了我目标。

Original: Vivi:Instead of hurting others, I decided to protect them with my magic.
Dialogue: Instead of hurting others, I decided to protect them with my magic.
trans: 我决定用我的魔法保护他们，而不是伤害他人。

Original: Mog:They're right, kupo!
Dialogue: They're right, kupo!
trans: 他们是对的，库波！

Original: Warrior of Light:Your noble intentions shall illuminate the path to righteousness.
Dialogue: Your noble intentions shall illuminate the path to righteousness.
trans: 您高尚的意图将照亮通往正义的道路。

Original: King:So these are the values of other worlds, huh?
Dialogue: So these are the values of other worlds, huh?
trans: 所以这些是其他世界的价值观，是吧？

Original: King:I can feel there's something here that wasn't in the shelter I grew up in or Akademeia. Or even in Orience.
Dialogue: I can feel there's something here that wasn't in the shelter I grew up in or Akademeia. Or even in Orience.
trans: 我能感觉到这里有一些东西是我长大的避难所或 Akademeia 所没有的。

Original: King:I don't know if I believe everything the moogle said just yet, but...
Dialogue: I don't know if I believe everything the moogle said just yet, but...
trans: 我不知道我是否相信莫古利刚才所说的一切，但是……

Original: King:I'm in. I'll fight for this world...and for myself.
Dialogue: I'm in. I'll fight for this world...and for myself.
trans: 我加入了。我将为这个世界而战……也为我自己。

Original: King:We're saving the world by wielding our guns and magic against monsters. A far cry from home, huh?
Dialogue: We're saving the world by wielding our guns and magic against monsters. A far cry from home, huh?
trans: 我们正在通过挥舞我们的枪支和魔法来对抗怪物来拯救世界。

Original: Rem:Yeah, while monsters exist in Orience, it wasn't them we had to fight most of the time.
Dialogue: Yeah, while monsters exist in Orience, it wasn't them we had to fight most of the time.
trans: 是的，虽然 Orience 存在怪物，但大多数时候我们不得不与它们战斗。

Original: Rem:...King, there's something that's been weighing on my mind lately.
Dialogue: ...King, there's something that's been weighing on my mind lately.
trans: ……King，最近有件事一直困扰着我。

Original: King:Let me guess. Death?
Dialogue: Let me guess. Death?
trans: 让我猜猜。

Original: Rem:Yeah. While no one we know has died yet...
Dialogue: Yeah. While no one we know has died yet...
trans: 是的。

Original: Rem:If something were to happen to them, they wouldn't be erased from my memories, right?
Dialogue: If something were to happen to them, they wouldn't be erased from my memories, right?
trans: 万一他们出了什么事，也不会从我的记忆中抹去吧？

Original: King:Probably not. I don't imagine the crystal's influence extends this far.
Dialogue: Probably not. I don't imagine the crystal's influence extends this far.
trans: 可能不会。

Original: Rem:...I'm just scared that should anyone die, we'll remember them.
Dialogue: ...I'm just scared that should anyone die, we'll remember them.
trans: ......我只是害怕如果有人死了，我们会记住他们。

Original: King:I agree.
Dialogue: I agree.
trans: 我同意。

Original: King:But that's why I strongly believe that we need to protect those important to us.
Dialogue: But that's why I strongly believe that we need to protect those important to us.
trans: 但这就是为什么我坚信我们需要保护对我们重要的人。

Original: Rem:That's what we can and should do.
Dialogue: That's what we can and should do.
trans: 这是我们能做的，也是应该做的。

Original: Rem:Sorry for bringing it up. Let's go back to the others.
Dialogue: Sorry for bringing it up. Let's go back to the others.
trans: 抱歉提出来。

Original: King:It's nothing. We're from the same world. No one else would understand.
Dialogue: It's nothing. We're from the same world. No one else would understand.
trans: 没什么。

Original: Rem:But... Yeah, I guess you're right. If I fight and die here...
Dialogue: But... Yeah, I guess you're right. If I fight and die here...
trans: 但是……是的，我想你是对的。

Original: Rem:At least I won't be forgotten.
Dialogue: At least I won't be forgotten.
trans: 至少我不会被遗忘。

Original: Zidane:*Sniff* *Sniff* You smell that?
Dialogue: *Sniff* *Sniff* You smell that?
trans: *闻* *闻* 你闻到了吗？

Original: Vaan:Is it the sweet smell of treasure?
Dialogue: Is it the sweet smell of treasure?
trans: 是宝物的香气？

Original: Zidane:No, not that. It stinks. Doesn't anyone else smell that?
Dialogue: No, not that. It stinks. Doesn't anyone else smell that?
trans: 不，不是那样。

Original: Sazh:Smell what?
Dialogue: Smell what?
trans: 闻什么？

Original: Sazh:Whoa! What is that!?
Dialogue: Whoa! What is that!?
trans: 哇！

Original: Mog:It's coming from up ahead, kupo!
Dialogue: It's coming from up ahead, kupo!
trans: 它从前面来了，库波！

Original: Zidane:I hope it's not what I think it is...
Dialogue: I hope it's not what I think it is...
trans: 我希望这不是我想的那样......

Original: Mog:We have to keep going, no matter how smelly, kupo!
Dialogue: We have to keep going, no matter how smelly, kupo!
trans: 我们必须继续前进，不管有多臭，kupo！

Original: King:I think I know which monster you're talking about, Zidane. If it's what I think it is...
Dialogue: I think I know which monster you're talking about, Zidane. If it's what I think it is...
trans: 我想我知道你在说哪个怪物，齐达内。

Original: Y'shtola:Then we must proceed with caution, else risk being rendered defenseless.
Dialogue: Then we must proceed with caution, else risk being rendered defenseless.
trans: 那么我们必须谨慎行事，否则就有可能变得毫无防备。

Original: Zidane:Phew. Let's get outta hereI need a breath of fresh air.
Dialogue: Phew. Let's get outta here—I need a breath of fresh air.
trans: 呸。

Original: Yuna:The Torsion should disappear any second now, right?
Dialogue: The Torsion should disappear any second now, right?
trans: 扭力现在应该随时消失，对吧？

Original: Mog:Yes, ku Wait, do you hear that?
Dialogue: Yes, ku— Wait, do you hear that?
trans: 是的，ku——等等，你听到了吗？

Original: ???:Where...am I?
Dialogue: Where...am I?
trans: 我在哪里？

Original: Mog:You nearly gave me a heart attack, kupo!
Dialogue: You nearly gave me a heart attack, kupo!
trans: 你差点让我心脏病发作，kupo！

Original: Zidane:...Who are you?
Dialogue: ...Who are you?
trans: ...你是谁？

Original: Bartz:I'm Bartz.
Dialogue: I'm Bartz.
trans: 我是巴茨。

Original: Bartz:A wandering adventurer of sorts.
Dialogue: A wandering adventurer of sorts.
trans: 一个流浪的冒险家。

Original: Bartz:I got separated from my friends, and while I was searching for them, I was pulled into a limbo-like space. Now I'm here.
Dialogue: I got separated from my friends, and while I was searching for them, I was pulled into a limbo-like space. Now I'm here.
trans: 我和我的朋友走散了，在我寻找他们的时候，我被拉进了一个像地狱一样的空间。

Original: Bartz:So who are you guys? You look to be a knight of some kind...and you, a summoner. Fellow adventurers, I take it?
Dialogue: So who are you guys? You look to be a knight of some kind...and you, a summoner. Fellow adventurers, I take it?
trans: 那么你们是谁？

Original: Zidane:I guess you could say that.
Dialogue: I guess you could say that.
trans: 我想你可以这么说。

Original: Zidane:Lemme explain everything from the beginning...
Dialogue: Lemme explain everything from the beginning...
trans: 让我从头解释一切......

Original: Bartz:Now it all makes sense!
Dialogue: Now it all makes sense!
trans: 现在一切都说得通了！

Original: Bartz:I think I'll join you! Fate brought us togetherthat must mean something. Besides, I don't have anywhere else to be.
Dialogue: I think I'll join you! Fate brought us together—that must mean something. Besides, I don't have anywhere else to be.
trans: 我想我会加入你！

Original: Warrior of Light:The monsters in this area are quite powerful. The greater our numbers, the better.
Dialogue: The monsters in this area are quite powerful. The greater our numbers, the better.
trans: 这片区域的怪物，相当的强大。

Original: Yuna:I, um, I'm glad to have you with us.
Dialogue: I, um, I'm glad to have you with us.
trans: 我，嗯，很高兴你能和我们在一起。

Original: Mog:Now that we have a new friend to help us, let's make for the next Torsion, kupo!
Dialogue: Now that we have a new friend to help us, let's make for the next Torsion, kupo!
trans: 现在我们有一位新朋友来帮助我们，让我们为下一个 Torsion 做准备吧，kupo！

Original: Mog:Talk about progress! The light shines brighter than ever, and we just closed our biggest Torsion to date, kupo!
Dialogue: Talk about progress! The light shines brighter than ever, and we just closed our biggest Torsion to date, kupo!
trans: 谈进步！

Original: Materia:Mog, tell me...
Dialogue: Mog, tell me...
trans: 莫格，告诉我...

Original: Materia:Why did you refuse Seifer's help? He is possessed of the lightjust as any of your other warriors.
Dialogue: Why did you refuse Seifer's help? He is possessed of the light—just as any of your other warriors.
trans: 你为什么拒绝Seifer的帮助？

Original: Mog:Even if I explained my reasoning, I don't think you'd understand, kupo. You are a goddess, after all. And they are humans.
Dialogue: Even if I explained my reasoning, I don't think you'd understand, kupo. You are a goddess, after all. And they are humans.
trans: 即使我解释了我的推理，我想你也不会理解，kupo。

Original: Materia:I will do my very best.
Dialogue: I will do my very best.
trans: 我会尽我所能。

Original: Mog:You see, humans are ruled by emotion. Even if their goal is the same, should their beliefs conflict, the result will be disastrous, kupo!
Dialogue: You see, humans are ruled by emotion. Even if their goal is the same, should their beliefs conflict, the result will be disastrous, kupo!
trans: 你看，人类受情感支配。

Original: Materia:Seifer and your warriors, though they share the same goal, are simply too different...
Dialogue: Seifer and your warriors, though they share the same goal, are simply too different...
trans: Seifer 和你的勇士们，尽管他们有着相同的目标，但他们的差别实在是太大了……

Original: Materia:I think I grasp what you are saying.
Dialogue: I think I grasp what you are saying.
trans: 我想我明白你在说什么。

Original: Mog:Yes, their intentions are good and their hearts are in the right place, kupo!
Dialogue: Yes, their intentions are good and their hearts are in the right place, kupo!
trans: 是的，他们的用意是好的，他们的心是对的，kupo！

Original: Mog:They just have different methods, kupo!
Dialogue: They just have different methods, kupo!
trans: 他们只是有不同的方法，kupo！

Original: Materia:Very well. I will not claim to understand it, but will trust in your judgement.
Dialogue: Very well. I will not claim to understand it, but will trust in your judgement.
trans: 很好。

Original: Materia:Now returning to the matter at handI sense a great danger from the lands you are to travel to next.
Dialogue: Now returning to the matter at hand—I sense a great danger from the lands you are to travel to next.
trans: 现在回到手头的事情——我从你接下来要去的地方感觉到了巨大的危险。

Original: Mog:Great danger, kupo!? L-like a super strong monster?
Dialogue: Great danger, kupo!? L-like a super strong monster?
trans: 大危险，库波！？

Original: Materia:Yes... One that is taken by madness and more powerful than you can even imagine.
Dialogue: Yes... One that is taken by madness and more powerful than you can even imagine.
trans: 是的……一个被疯狂所占据并且比你想象的更强大的人。

Original: Mog:Regardless of its strength, we will return victorious, kupo! We have the light on our side after all!
Dialogue: Regardless of its strength, we will return victorious, kupo! We have the light on our side after all!
trans: 不管它的实力如何，我们都会凯旋归来，库波！

Original: Zidane:Brrr! It's so cold out here! I can barely feel my nose!
Dialogue: Brrr! It's so cold out here! I can barely feel my nose!
trans: 呸！

Original: Bartz:Too bad we couldn't take the airship over those peaks.
Dialogue: Too bad we couldn't take the airship over those peaks.
trans: 可惜我们不能乘坐飞艇飞越那些山峰。

Original: Mog:Kupo! Unfortunately, the next Torsion is located beyond the Crudelis Mountains.
Dialogue: Kupo! Unfortunately, the next Torsion is located beyond the Crudelis Mountains.
trans: 库波！

Original: Yuna:And we will have to scale it to get there.
Dialogue: And we will have to scale it to get there.
trans: 我们将不得不扩大规模才能到达那里。

Original: Yuffie:You're lucky, Mog. You've got a thick layer of fur to protect you from the elements.
Dialogue: You're lucky, Mog. You've got a thick layer of fur to protect you from the elements.
trans: 你很幸运，莫格。

Original: Mog:The heat, the coldit's all the same to me, kupo! What's important is that I do a good job as your guide!
Dialogue: The heat, the cold—it's all the same to me, kupo! What's important is that I do a good job as your guide!
trans: 热，冷——对我来说都一样，库波！

Original: Zidane:Come on, guys! If this little guy can do it without complaining, so can we!
Dialogue: Come on, guys! If this little guy can do it without complaining, so can we!
trans: 拜托了伙计们！

Original: Yuna:Stay on your toes, everyone. Remember, monsters could appear at any time.
Dialogue: Stay on your toes, everyone. Remember, monsters could appear at any time.
trans: 大家保持警惕。

Original: King:That Magitek Armor... It's different from the rest.
Dialogue: That Magitek Armor... It's different from the rest.
trans: 那个魔导装甲……和其他的不一样。

Original: Cloud:We'll worry about the details later.
Dialogue: We'll worry about the details later.
trans: 我们稍后会担心细节。

Original: Edge:Did she just fall out of that machine!?
Dialogue: Did she just fall out of that machine!?
trans: 她是从那台机器上掉下来的吗！？

Original: Zidane:Hey! Are you okay!? Wake up!
Dialogue: Hey! Are you okay!? Wake up!
trans: 嘿！

Original: Warrior of Light:Wait! She attacked us. I think it unwise to approach her.
Dialogue: Wait! She attacked us. I think it unwise to approach her.
trans: 等待！

Original: Zidane:She's practically unconscious. She couldn't hurt us even if she tried.
Dialogue: She's practically unconscious. She couldn't hurt us even if she tried.
trans: 她几乎失去知觉。

Original: Edge:Why was she in that machine?
Dialogue: Why was she in that machine?
trans: 她为什么在那台机器里？

Original: Rem:Magitek armor requires someone to operate it.
Dialogue: Magitek armor requires someone to operate it.
trans: Magitek 盔甲需要有人来操作它。

Original: Rem:The model she was in, though, looked a bit different from those in my world.
Dialogue: The model she was in, though, looked a bit different from those in my world.
trans: 不过，她所处的模型看起来与我的世界中的模型有点不同。

Original: Zidane:Looksomething just came off her head.
Dialogue: Look—something just came off her head.
trans: 看——有什么东西从她的头上掉下来了。

Original: Rem:I sense something. Could it be magic? Magic used to addle the mind?
Dialogue: I sense something. Could it be magic? Magic used to addle the mind?
trans: 我感觉到了什么。

Original: Mog:Kupo! So maybe she was being controlled by this band of metal?
Dialogue: Kupo! So maybe she was being controlled by this band of metal?
trans: 库波！

Original: Zidane:...Then she's not the enemy.
Dialogue: ...Then she's not the enemy.
trans: ……那她就不是敌人了。

Original: Edge:We should wait for her to wake up so she can tell us what happened.
Dialogue: We should wait for her to wake up so she can tell us what happened.
trans: 我们应该等她醒来，这样她才能告诉我们发生了什么事。

Original: Warrior of Light:Let's take her to a safe place and treat her wounds, then.
Dialogue: Let's take her to a safe place and treat her wounds, then.
trans: 那我们先带她去安全的地方，处理一下她的伤吧。

Original: Mog:Good idea, kupo! There's a cave just over there!
Dialogue: Good idea, kupo! There's a cave just over there!
trans: 好主意，库波！

Original: Mog:Kupo! I sense the light coming from someone in that direction.
Dialogue: Kupo! I sense the light coming from someone in that direction.
trans: 库波！

Original: Bartz:Are they one of us?
Dialogue: Are they one of us?
trans: 他们是我们中的一员吗？

Original: Yuna:If they are, I hope they're okay. This area is crawling with monsters.
Dialogue: If they are, I hope they're okay. This area is crawling with monsters.
trans: 如果是，我希望他们没事。

Original: Zidane:Are they alone?
Dialogue: Are they alone?
trans: 他们一个人吗？

Original: Mog:Most likely, kupo. They might be lost.
Dialogue: Most likely, kupo. They might be lost.
trans: 最有可能的是，库波。

Original: Bartz:Then let's get a move on.
Dialogue: Then let's get a move on.
trans: 那么让我们继续吧。

Original: Zidane:Right behind ya.
Dialogue: Right behind ya.
trans: 就在你身后。

Original: Mog:*Sigh* We should follow them before they get into trouble, kupo...
Dialogue: *Sigh* We should follow them before they get into trouble, kupo...
trans: *叹气*我们应该在他们惹上麻烦之前跟上他们，库波...

Original: Vaan:So, you have any idea what this person looks like?
Dialogue: So, you have any idea what this person looks like?
trans: 那么，你知道这个人长什么样吗？

Original: Mog:No, but I can try to conjure up an image, kupo!
Dialogue: No, but I can try to conjure up an image, kupo!
trans: 不，但我可以试着想象一个形象，库波！

Original: Tifa:What is it, Vaan? Something on your mind?
Dialogue: What is it, Vaan? Something on your mind?
trans: 什么事，梵？

Original: Vaan:Yeah, I'm wondering if Nah, couldn't be.
Dialogue: Yeah, I'm wondering if— Nah, couldn't be.
trans: 是的，我想知道是否——不，不可能。

Original: Mog:Kupo, kupo...
Dialogue: Kupo, kupo...
trans: 笨蛋，笨蛋……

Original: Mog:It's a girl! She has blonde hair...and braids. That's all I could get, kupo.
Dialogue: It's a girl! She has blonde hair...and braids. That's all I could get, kupo.
trans: 这是一个女孩！

Original: Vaan:Or could it!? I've gotta make sure she's okay.
Dialogue: Or could it!? I've gotta make sure she's okay.
trans: 还是可以！？

Original: Zidane:Is she your girlfriend? Come on, tell us about her!
Dialogue: Is she your girlfriend? Come on, tell us about her!
trans: 她是你的女朋友吗？

Original: Vaan:We grew up together. Sorry, guys, but I can't leave her out there all by herself.
Dialogue: We grew up together. Sorry, guys, but I can't leave her out there all by herself.
trans: 我们一起长大。

Original: Yuna:She must really mean a lot to him.
Dialogue: She must really mean a lot to him.
trans: 她对他来说一定很重要。

Original: Tifa:Yeah, which is why we should hurry.
Dialogue: Yeah, which is why we should hurry.
trans: 是的，这就是为什么我们应该快点。

Original: Vaan:I knew it was you, Penelo! What are you doing here?
Dialogue: I knew it was you, Penelo! What are you doing here?
trans: 我就知道是你，佩内洛！

Original: Penelo:How can you be so calm!? I was worried sick about you!
Dialogue: How can you be so calm!? I was worried sick about you!
trans: 你怎么可以这么淡定！？

Original: Zidane:Vaan was really worried about you too, you know?
Dialogue: Vaan was really worried about you too, you know?
trans: 梵也很担心你，你知道吗？

Original: Penelo:Huh? Oh, I... Right.
Dialogue: Huh? Oh, I... Right.
trans: 嗯？

Original: Penelo:I'm Penelo. Thanks for saving me. May I ask what you're all doing here?
Dialogue: I'm Penelo. Thanks for saving me. May I ask what you're all doing here?
trans: 我是佩内洛

Original: Mog:We're on a journey to seal the Torsions, kupo.
Dialogue: We're on a journey to seal the Torsions, kupo.
trans: 我们正在踏上封印扭曲的旅程，库波。

Original: Penelo:Torsions? You mean those portals the monsters have been coming out of?
Dialogue: Torsions? You mean those portals the monsters have been coming out of?
trans: 扭转？

Original: Vaan:You're coming with us, right? Not like you can go home, anyway.
Dialogue: You're coming with us, right? Not like you can go home, anyway.
trans: 你要和我们一起去，对吧？

Original: Penelo:Wait... We can't return to our world?
Dialogue: Wait... We can't return to our world?
trans: 等等……我们不能回到我们的世界？

Original: Zidane:For the time being, none of us can.
Dialogue: For the time being, none of us can.
trans: 目前，我们谁都做不到。

Original: Yuna:Even if we could, those Torsions are spreading destruction to our worlds as well. We have to do something.
Dialogue: Even if we could, those Torsions are spreading destruction to our worlds as well. We have to do something.
trans: 即使我们可以，这些扭曲也会对我们的世界造成破坏。

Original: Penelo:But I... I don't know what to do.
Dialogue: But I... I don't know what to do.
trans: 但是我……我不知道该怎么办。

Original: Vaan:That's why you should come with us. We can worry about getting home after we take care of things here.
Dialogue: That's why you should come with us. We can worry about getting home after we take care of things here.
trans: 这就是为什么你应该和我们一起去。

Original: Penelo:Are you sure? I don't want to get in the way.
Dialogue: Are you sure? I don't want to get in the way.
trans: 你确定吗？

Original: Zidane:We'd love to have you. Right, guys?
Dialogue: We'd love to have you. Right, guys?
trans: 我们很想拥有你。

Original: Zidane:All right, let's do this! Unlike some bozo I know, I can actually protect you.
Dialogue: All right, let's do this! Unlike some bozo I know, I can actually protect you.
trans: 好吧，让我们开始吧！

Original: Vaan:Huh? Are you talking about me?
Dialogue: Huh? Are you talking about me?
trans: 嗯？

Original: Zidane:*Sigh* It's just no fun when they're this dense.
Dialogue: *Sigh* It's just no fun when they're this dense.
trans: *叹气*当它们如此密集时，它就没有乐趣了。

Original: Penelo:All right, I've made up my mind. I'm coming with you!
Dialogue: All right, I've made up my mind. I'm coming with you!
trans: 好吧，我决定了。

Original: Vivi:That machinethe Magitek armor...
Dialogue: That machine—the Magitek armor...
trans: 那台机器——魔导装甲……

Original: Vivi:I noticed the way it was moving was strange.
Dialogue: I noticed the way it was moving was strange.
trans: 我注意到它移动的方式很奇怪。

Original: Tifa:What do you mean?
Dialogue: What do you mean?
trans: 你是什​​么意思？

Original: Vivi:It was almost as if it was being forced to attack against its own will.
Dialogue: It was almost as if it was being forced to attack against its own will.
trans: 就好像它是被迫违背自己的意愿进行攻击一样。

Original: Hope:So the girl controlling the armor was being controlled by the band.
Dialogue: So the girl controlling the armor was being controlled by the band.
trans: 所以控制铠甲的少女是被乐队控制着的。

Original: Hope:That means she was manipulated into attacking us, right?
Dialogue: That means she was manipulated into attacking us, right?
trans: 这意味着她被操纵来攻击我们，对吧？

Original: King:It's definitely possible. While I can't speak for what kind of otherworldly enchantment was put on this thing...
Dialogue: It's definitely possible. While I can't speak for what kind of otherworldly enchantment was put on this thing...
trans: 这绝对有可能。

Original: King:I can say it looks like it was forged by someone who possesses incredible magic.
Dialogue: I can say it looks like it was forged by someone who possesses incredible magic.
trans: 可以说是拥有不可思议的魔力的人打造出来的样子。

Original: Tifa:Who would do such a thing? And why?
Dialogue: Who would do such a thing? And why?
trans: 谁会做这样的事？

Original: Cecil:Let's try asking the girl when she comes around.
Dialogue: Let's try asking the girl when she comes around.
trans: 让我们试着问问那个女孩什么时候回来。

Original: Cecil:Until then, we wait.
Dialogue: Until then, we wait.
trans: 在那之前，我们等待。

Original: Warrior of Light:How is she doing?
Dialogue: How is she doing?
trans: 她过的好吗？

Original: Yuna:Her wounds are nearly healed. She should be awake any moment now.
Dialogue: Her wounds are nearly healed. She should be awake any moment now.
trans: 她的伤快好了。

Original: Rem:Should I try using my magic?
Dialogue: Should I try using my magic?
trans: 我应该尝试使用我的魔法吗？

Original: Warrior of Light:Nay. Let her rest. She has endured enough already.
Dialogue: Nay. Let her rest. She has endured enough already.
trans: 不。

Original: Yuffie:You're being awfully kind. What's with the sudden change of heart?
Dialogue: You're being awfully kind. What's with the sudden change of heart?
trans: 你太善良了

Original: Warrior of Light:What do you mean?
Dialogue: What do you mean?
trans: 你是什​​么意思？

Original: Yuffie:From the way you were talking earlier, I assumed you had a personality to match those horns on your helmet.
Dialogue: From the way you were talking earlier, I assumed you had a personality to match those horns on your helmet.
trans: 从你刚才说话的方式来看，我认为你的性格与你头盔上的喇叭相匹配。

Original: Yuffie:You were ready to leave her for dead, remember?
Dialogue: You were ready to leave her for dead, remember?
trans: 你准备好让她等死，记得吗？

Original: Bartz:Before we didn't know she was acting under the influence of another.
Dialogue: Before we didn't know she was acting under the influence of another.
trans: 在我们不知道她是在另一个人的影响下行事之前。

Original: Edge:Hah! As if a girl this cute would wish anyone harm!
Dialogue: Hah! As if a girl this cute would wish anyone harm!
trans: 哈！

Original: Edge:And even if she did, I would find a way to steer her off such a path!
Dialogue: And even if she did, I would find a way to steer her off such a path!
trans: 即使她这样做了，我也会想办法让她离开这样的道路！

Original: Warrior of Light:Whatever happened, there is no need for us to force her awake.
Dialogue: Whatever happened, there is no need for us to force her awake.
trans: 不管发生了什么，我们都没有必要强迫她醒来。

Original: Yuna:Yes. Let's just watch over her until she wakes up.
Dialogue: Yes. Let's just watch over her until she wakes up.
trans: 是的。

Original: ???:Wh-where am I!?
Dialogue: Wh-where am I!?
trans: 我、我在哪！？

Original: Zidane:She's up!
Dialogue: She's up!
trans: 她起来了！

Original: ???:You...you saved me. But why? I attacked you.
Dialogue: You...you saved me. But why? I attacked you.
trans: 你……你救了我。

Original: Tifa:We could tell you weren't in your right mind. We wanted to hear what you had to say.
Dialogue: We could tell you weren't in your right mind. We wanted to hear what you had to say.
trans: 我们可以看出你的想法不对。

Original: Sazh:You remember us? Do you remember who you are?
Dialogue: You remember us? Do you remember who you are?
trans: 你还记得我们吗？

Original: Terra:I'm Terra. This is not my world...is it?
Dialogue: I'm Terra. This is not my world...is it?
trans: 我是泰拉

Original: Mog:What do you remember? Please, tell us everything, kupo!
Dialogue: What do you remember? Please, tell us everything, kupo!
trans: 你记得什么？

Original: Terra:Soon after I was brought to this place...
Dialogue: Soon after I was brought to this place...
trans: 在我被带到这个地方后不久...

Original: Terra:I was unlucky enough to cross paths with a mage named Kefka. We fought, and
Dialogue: I was unlucky enough to cross paths with a mage named Kefka. We fought, and—
trans: 我很不幸遇到了一个名叫凯夫卡的法师。

Original: Vaan:Why? Did the two of you know each other from before?
Dialogue: Why? Did the two of you know each other from before?
trans: 为什么？

Original: Terra:Yes. He and I hail from the same worlda world he seeks to destroy.
Dialogue: Yes. He and I hail from the same world—a world he seeks to destroy.
trans: 是的。

Original: Terra:No doubt he intends to do the same here.
Dialogue: No doubt he intends to do the same here.
trans: 毫无疑问，他打算在这里做同样的事情。

Original: Tifa:And you were trying to stop him?
Dialogue: And you were trying to stop him?
trans: 而你试图阻止他？

Original: Terra:But I failed. Alone, I wasn't strong enough to defeat him.
Dialogue: But I failed. Alone, I wasn't strong enough to defeat him.
trans: 但是我失败了。

Original: Sazh:Was it Kefka who took control of your mind?
Dialogue: Was it Kefka who took control of your mind?
trans: 是凯夫卡控制了你的思想吗？

Original: Terra:Yes, though my memories are a little fuzzy. I just remember fighting him with all I had...
Dialogue: Yes, though my memories are a little fuzzy. I just remember fighting him with all I had...
trans: 是的，虽然我的记忆有点模糊。

Original: Terra:If you hadn't removed this band from me, I might still be on a rampage.
Dialogue: If you hadn't removed this band from me, I might still be on a rampage.
trans: 如果你没有把这支乐队从我身上拿走，我可能还在暴走。

Original: Vaan:Don't worry. You're not under his control any more.
Dialogue: Don't worry. You're not under his control any more.
trans: 不用担心。

Original: Vaan:Besides, you did nothing wrong. It's all Kefka's fault.
Dialogue: Besides, you did nothing wrong. It's all Kefka's fault.
trans: 此外，你没有做错任何事。

Original: Sazh:I don't know how all this works, but does Kefka know you're free?
Dialogue: I don't know how all this works, but does Kefka know you're free?
trans: 我不知道这一切是如何运作的，但 Kefka 知道你有空吗？

Original: Terra:Yes. He knows.
Dialogue: Yes. He knows.
trans: 是的。

Original: Zidane:Do you think he could take over your mind again?
Dialogue: Do you think he could take over your mind again?
trans: 你认为他能再次控制你的思想吗？

Original: Terra:Even if he couldn't, he cannot be allowed to roam freely. There's no telling what he could do...
Dialogue: Even if he couldn't, he cannot be allowed to roam freely. There's no telling what he could do...
trans: 就算不能，也不能让他随意流浪。

Original: Zidane:Don't worry, Terra. You no longer have to fight alone. Right, Mog?
Dialogue: Don't worry, Terra. You no longer have to fight alone. Right, Mog?
trans: 别担心，泰拉。

Original: Mog:That's right, kupo! You are a warrior with the light. You have us now!
Dialogue: That's right, kupo! You are a warrior with the light. You have us now!
trans: 没错，库波！

Original: Mog:So what do you say? Will you come with us, kupo?
Dialogue: So what do you say? Will you come with us, kupo?
trans: 你认为呢？

Original: Terra:I would love that. Thank you.
Dialogue: I would love that. Thank you.
trans: 我会很高兴。

Original: Warrior of Light:Our mission is to close all the Torsions that have appeared in this world.
Dialogue: Our mission is to close all the Torsions that have appeared in this world.
trans: 我们的任务是关闭这个世界上出现的所有扭曲。

Original: Terra:...Torsions? Are those the distorted spaces that monsters appear from?
Dialogue: ...Torsions? Are those the distorted spaces that monsters appear from?

Original: Cloud:Not only that, they also spread corruption by warping space and time.
Dialogue: Not only that, they also spread corruption by warping space and time.
trans: 不仅如此，他们还通过扭曲空间和时间来传播腐败。

Original: Y'shtola:We have yet to learn what is causing them to manifest. Until then, all we can do is continue searching for and closing them.
Dialogue: We have yet to learn what is causing them to manifest. Until then, all we can do is continue searching for and closing them.
trans: 我们还没有了解是什么导致它们显现。

Original: Terra:I see...
Dialogue: I see...
trans: 我懂了...

Original: Bartz:You mentioned Kefka wants to destroy the world.
Dialogue: You mentioned Kefka wants to destroy the world.
trans: 你提到凯夫卡想要毁灭世界。

Original: Bartz:He's not somehow responsible for the Torsions, is he?
Dialogue: He's not somehow responsible for the Torsions, is he?
trans: 他不会以某种方式对扭曲负责，是吗？

Original: Terra:I couldn't tell you... All my memories since coming here are far too hazy...
Dialogue: I couldn't tell you... All my memories since coming here are far too hazy...
trans: 我不能告诉你……来到这里后我所有的记忆都太模糊了……

Original: Terra:I only vaguely recall battling another group of people similar to you.
Dialogue: I only vaguely recall battling another group of people similar to you.
trans: 我只是依稀记得与另一群与你相似的人作战。

Original: Y'shtola:Everyone here is like you, warriors brought here from another realm.
Dialogue: Everyone here is like you, warriors brought here from another realm.
trans: 这里的每个人都像你一样，是从另一个领域来到这里的战士。

Original: Terra:And to think I tried to hurt youthe very people looking to close Torsions and save this world.
Dialogue: And to think I tried to hurt you—the very people looking to close Torsions and save this world.
trans: 想想我曾试图伤害你——正是那些想要关闭 Torsions 并拯救这个世界的人。

Original: Cloud:Well, not everyone. Some here have also been using the Torsions to fulfill their own selfish desires.
Dialogue: Well, not everyone. Some here have also been using the Torsions to fulfill their own selfish desires.
trans: 好吧，不是每个人。

Original: Cloud:You couldn't have known. Don't blame yourself.
Dialogue: You couldn't have known. Don't blame yourself.
trans: 你不可能知道。

Original: Bartz:Cloud's right. Chin up, Terra!
Dialogue: Cloud's right. Chin up, Terra!
trans: 云说的对

Original: Bartz:Come on, you guys. Help me cheer her up.
Dialogue: Come on, you guys. Help me cheer her up.
trans: 来吧，你们。

Original: Mog:Kupo! Terra, the past is in the past! You're our friend now and that's all that matters!
Dialogue: Kupo! Terra, the past is in the past! You're our friend now and that's all that matters!
trans: 库波！

Original: Terra:Thank you... I promise... I...
