Dialogue: Thank you... I promise... I...
trans: 谢谢……我保证……我……

Original: Terra:...You're so soft.
Dialogue: ...You're so soft.
trans: ……你好软。

Original: Bartz:Haha. Mog, you ball of fur, you!
Dialogue: Haha. Mog, you ball of fur, you!
trans: 哈哈。

Original: Warrior of Light:Good. I am glad to see you are starting to feel better.
Dialogue: Good. I am glad to see you are starting to feel better.
trans: 好的。

Original: Mog:We're nearly to the next Torsion, kupo!
Dialogue: We're nearly to the next Torsion, kupo!
trans: 我们离下一个 Torsion 很近了，kupo！

Original: Zidane:Who's there!?
Dialogue: Who's there!?
trans: 谁在那儿！？

Original: Terra:That voice... It's him! Everyone, on your guard!
Dialogue: That voice... It's him! Everyone, on your guard!
trans: 那个声音……是他！

Original: ???:Ah, it wore off. I thought that might be the case and came to investigate...
Dialogue: Ah, it wore off. I thought that might be the case and came to investigate...
trans: 啊，它消失了。

Original: ???:A good thing I did, too! You've brought me some big fishbig fish to fry!
Dialogue: A good thing I did, too! You've brought me some big fish—big fish to fry!
trans: 我也做了一件好事！

Original: Cecil:So this is himthe man that took over your mind?
Dialogue: So this is him—the man that took over your mind?
trans: 所以这就是他——控制你思想的那个人？

Original: Kefka:Ah, yes, that would be me! And I've come to reclaim my toy. Now if you would be so kind
Dialogue: Ah, yes, that would be me! And I've come to reclaim my toy. Now if you would be so kind—
trans: 啊，是的，那就是我！

Original: Zidane:Toy!? How dare you!
Dialogue: Toy!? How dare you!
trans: 玩具！？

Original: Kefka:You're more than welcome to keep her, if you like.
Dialogue: You're more than welcome to keep her, if you like.
trans: 如果你愿意，我们非常欢迎你留下她。

Original: Kefka:Well, if I deem you strong enough, that is.
Dialogue: Well, if I deem you strong enough, that is.
trans: 好吧，如果我认为你足够强大，那就是。

Original: Cecil:You are a depraved man, using people as though they are naught but disposable tools!
Dialogue: You are a depraved man, using people as though they are naught but disposable tools!
trans: 你是个堕落的人，把人当成一次性工具一样利用！

Original: Kefka:Well, goody two-shoes, you can criticize me all you want after you've defeated me! Hehehe!
Dialogue: Well, goody two-shoes, you can criticize me all you want after you've defeated me! Hehehe!
trans: 好吧，二鞋大人，打败我之后可以随便骂我！

Original: Kefka:It's showtime!
Dialogue: It's showtime!
trans: 好戏开场了！

Original: Kefka:Bravo! And to think I thought you were just a bunch of losers...
Dialogue: Bravo! And to think I thought you were just a bunch of losers...
trans: 太棒了！

Original: Terra:Kefka! Stop this! Stop this right now!
Dialogue: Kefka! Stop this! Stop this right now!
trans: 凯夫卡！

Original: Terra:I am so sorry for involving all of you...
Dialogue: I am so sorry for involving all of you...
trans: 我很抱歉牵扯到你们所有人...

Original: Kefka:What's this? You're making friends now?
Dialogue: What's this? You're making friends now?
trans: 这是什么？

Original: Kefka:Such a waste. When you were under my control, you were an unstoppable machinetoppling bodies left and right.
Dialogue: Such a waste. When you were under my control, you were an unstoppable machine—toppling bodies left and right.
trans: 太浪费了。

Original: Mog:Toppling bodies? Don't tell me you mean warriors with the light, kupo!?
Dialogue: Toppling bodies? Don't tell me you mean warriors with the light, kupo!?
trans: 倾倒的身体？

Original: Kefka:Warriors with the light? Is that what you call them? What an utterly ridiculous name!
Dialogue: Warriors with the light? Is that what you call them? What an utterly ridiculous name!
trans: 有光的战士？

Original: King:Tell us what you know.
Dialogue: Tell us what you know.
trans: 告诉我们你所知道的。

Original: Kefka:There's nothing you need to know...
Dialogue: There's nothing you need to know...
trans: 没有什么你需要知道的...

Original: Kefka:...For now, that is. Maybe I'll tell you later!
Dialogue: ...For now, that is. Maybe I'll tell you later!
trans: ......现在，就是这样。

Original: Mog:I don't think he's gone far, kupo. Let's take a moment to recover, then follow him!
Dialogue: I don't think he's gone far, kupo. Let's take a moment to recover, then follow him!
trans: 我不认为他走得太远了，kupo。

Original: Terra:So maybe I've done even worse things than I thought...
Dialogue: So maybe I've done even worse things than I thought...
trans: 所以也许我做了比我想象的更糟糕的事情......

Original: Yuna:No. You've done nothing wrong.
Dialogue: No. You've done nothing wrong.
trans: 不，你没有做错任何事。

Original: King:He said you "toppled" them. There's a good chance you haven't killed anyone.
Dialogue: He said you "toppled" them. There's a good chance you haven't killed anyone.
trans: 他说你“推翻”了他们。

Original: King:We have to press forward. That's the only way we'll learn the whole truth.
Dialogue: We have to press forward. That's the only way we'll learn the whole truth.
trans: 我们必须向前推进。

Original: Terra:You're right. Thank you, everyone.
Dialogue: You're right. Thank you, everyone.
trans: 你说得对。

Original: Tifa:Who are you?
Dialogue: Who are you?
trans: 你是谁？

Original: Yang:I am Yang, monk of Fabul!
Dialogue: I am Yang, monk of Fabul!
trans: 我是杨，法布和尚！

Original: Cecil:Yang!? What are you doing here?
Dialogue: Yang!? What are you doing here?

Original: Mog:You know each other? Why isn't he letting us pass, kupo?
Dialogue: You know each other? Why isn't he letting us pass, kupo?
trans: 你们认识吗？

Original: Yang:Silence, intruders! Nobody gets past me alive!
Dialogue: Silence, intruders! Nobody gets past me alive!
trans: 安静，入侵者！

Original: Warrior of Light:Something is wrong.
Dialogue: Something is wrong.
trans: 出了点问题。

Original: Tifa:Yeah, it's almost like he's being possessed by something.
Dialogue: Yeah, it's almost like he's being possessed by something.
trans: 是的，就好像他被什么东西附身了一样。

Original: Yang:Urgh... Where am I?
Dialogue: Urgh... Where am I?
trans: 呃...我在哪里？

Original: Cecil:Yang, do you recognize me?
Dialogue: Yang, do you recognize me?
trans: 杨，你认得我吗？

Original: Yang:Cecil!? Did I attack you?
Dialogue: Cecil!? Did I attack you?
trans: 塞西尔！？

Original: Yda:You throw quite a punch.
Dialogue: You throw quite a punch.
trans: 你打得很厉害。

Original: Yang:I know not what came over me. Please forgive my actions.
Dialogue: I know not what came over me. Please forgive my actions.
trans: 我不知道我怎么了。

Original: Terra:It looked like someone had taken control of you.
Dialogue: It looked like someone had taken control of you.
trans: 看起来有人控制了你。

Original: Yang:All I remember was that I was in a haze...
Dialogue: All I remember was that I was in a haze...
trans: 我只记得我在阴霾中......

Original: Yang:There was a voice telling me to fighttelling me to bring chaos to the world.
Dialogue: There was a voice telling me to fight—telling me to bring chaos to the world.
trans: 有一个声音告诉我去战斗——告诉我要给世界带来混乱。

Original: Yda:Can this man be trusted?
Dialogue: Can this man be trusted?
trans: 这个人可以信任吗？

Original: Cecil:He is a friend of mine. We have fought countless battles together back home.
Dialogue: He is a friend of mine. We have fought countless battles together back home.
trans: 他是我的朋友。

Original: Cecil:He can be trustedof that you have my word. Yang is a proud monk and a man of character.
Dialogue: He can be trusted—of that you have my word. Yang is a proud monk and a man of character.
trans: 他是值得信赖的——我向你保证。

Original: Yang:Yet I gave in to the whispers of evil. I am ashamed of myself.
Dialogue: Yet I gave in to the whispers of evil. I am ashamed of myself.
trans: 然而我屈服于邪恶的低语。

Original: Terra:Do you have any idea who could've done such a thing?
Dialogue: Do you have any idea who could've done such a thing?
trans: 你知道谁能做出这样的事吗？

Original: Yang:That I do not. I hardly remember anything.
Dialogue: That I do not. I hardly remember anything.
trans: 我没有。

Original: Terra:Could it have been the same person who was controlling me?
Dialogue: Could it have been the same person who was controlling me?
trans: 会不会是控制我的同一个人？

Original: Cecil:Perhaps it is best not to speculate the unknown for now. More importantly, what do you plan to do?
Dialogue: Perhaps it is best not to speculate the unknown for now. More importantly, what do you plan to do?
trans: 也许现在最好不要推测未知的事物。

Original: Yang:I have nowhere to go in this foreign world.
Dialogue: I have nowhere to go in this foreign world.
trans: 在这个陌生的世界，我无处可去。

Original: Yang:And I do feel I must atone for my crimes against you all.
Dialogue: And I do feel I must atone for my crimes against you all.
trans: 我确实觉得我必须为我对你们所有人犯下的罪行赎罪。

Original: Mog:Then come with us, kupo! We're on a journey to save the world.
Dialogue: Then come with us, kupo! We're on a journey to save the world.
trans: 那就跟我们走吧，库波！

Original: Yang:Thank you. I would be honored to accept your invitation.
Dialogue: Thank you. I would be honored to accept your invitation.
trans: 谢谢。

Original: Cecil:Thank you, Yang. Your assistance is always appreciated.
Dialogue: Thank you, Yang. Your assistance is always appreciated.
trans: 谢谢你，杨。

Original: Yuffie:There you are! You're not getting away this time!
Dialogue: There you are! You're not getting away this time!
trans: 你在这！

Original: Kefka:Hehehe! Back for some more fun, I take it!
Dialogue: Hehehe! Back for some more fun, I take it!
trans: 嘿嘿嘿！

Original: Terra:What are you planning, Kefka!?
Dialogue: What are you planning, Kefka!?
trans: 凯夫卡，你有什么打算！？

Original: Kefka:I haven't decided yet.
Dialogue: I haven't decided yet.
trans: 我还没有决定。

Original: Hope:He's not taking us seriously...
Dialogue: He's not taking us seriously...
trans: 他没有认真对待我们...

Original: Warrior of Light:He has made it clear he intends to do anything but the right thing. Regardless of what he plans, he is our enemy.
Dialogue: He has made it clear he intends to do anything but the right thing. Regardless of what he plans, he is our enemy.
trans: 他已经明确表示他打算做任何正确的事情。

Original: Kefka:Sounds to me like you're raring for a fight. Well, you're in luck. I've prepared one of your favorite things!
Dialogue: Sounds to me like you're raring for a fight. Well, you're in luck. I've prepared one of your favorite things!
trans: 在我看来你很想打架。

Original: Kefka:Ta-da! Have at it, my friends!
Dialogue: Ta-da! Have at it, my friends!
trans: 哒哒！

Original: Yuffie:Wh-what's happening!?
Dialogue: Wh-what's happening!?
trans: 什、什么事！？

Original: Hope:Some people here have the ability to make Torsions.
Dialogue: Some people here have the ability to make Torsions.
trans: 这里的一些人有能力制造扭转。

Original: Kefka:See you on the other side!
Dialogue: See you on the other side!
trans: 在另一边见！

Original: Terra:We need to follow him!
Dialogue: We need to follow him!
trans: 我们需要跟着他！

Original: Warrior of Light:Let us make haste!
Dialogue: Let us make haste!
trans: 让我们抓紧时间！

Original: Yuffie:Just looking at it is making me dizzy...
Dialogue: Just looking at it is making me dizzy...
trans: 光是看着就让人头晕目眩……

Original: Mog:Come on, Yuffie! We have to hurry, kupo!
Dialogue: Come on, Yuffie! We have to hurry, kupo!
trans: 加油，尤菲！

Original: Yuffie:I know! I'm going, I'm going!
Dialogue: I know! I'm going, I'm going!
trans: 我知道！

Original: Mog:Kupo... Kefka, just how much do you know?
Dialogue: Kupo... Kefka, just how much do you know?
trans: 库波……凯夫卡，你到底知道多少？

Original: Edge:I now see why monks are held in such high regard. Word of your strength has spread far and wide, even reaching my homeland.
Dialogue: I now see why monks are held in such high regard. Word of your strength has spread far and wide, even reaching my homeland.
trans: 我现在明白为什么僧侣受到如此高的尊重。

Original: Edge:To think that the only weapons you need are your fistsI must admit I'm slightly jealous.
Dialogue: To think that the only weapons you need are your fists—I must admit I'm slightly jealous.
trans: 想到你唯一需要的武器就是你的拳头——我必须承认我有点嫉妒。

Original: Yang:I am the one that should be jealous. You are a ninja of great skillflawlessly adapting your technique to any given situation.
Dialogue: I am the one that should be jealous. You are a ninja of great skill—flawlessly adapting your technique to any given situation.
trans: 我才是该吃醋的人。

Original: Edge:Truth be told, I owe most of my talent to the secret ninjutsu passed down through the noble Geraldine line.
Dialogue: Truth be told, I owe most of my talent to the secret ninjutsu passed down through the noble Geraldine line.
trans: 说实话，我的大部分才能都归功于通过高贵的杰拉尔丁家族传承的秘密忍术。

Original: Yang:Noble line? So you are royalty!? And yet you would willingly risk your life on the battlefield!?
Dialogue: Noble line? So you are royalty!? And yet you would willingly risk your life on the battlefield!?
trans: 贵族线？

Original: Terra:I know a king who fights as well. In fact, his younger brother uses his fists, just like you Yang.
Dialogue: I know a king who fights as well. In fact, his younger brother uses his fists, just like you Yang.
trans: 我认识一个国王，他也很会打架。

Original: Vivi:One of my friends from back home who fought alongside us was a princess.
Dialogue: One of my friends from back home who fought alongside us was a princess.
trans: 我的一位与我们并肩作战的故乡朋友是一位公主。

Original: Edge:A princess that can fight? Now, that is a lady I'd be interested in meeting.
Dialogue: A princess that can fight? Now, that is a lady I'd be interested in meeting.
trans: 会战斗的公主？

Original: Bartz:Some of my friends that fought with us were also nobilitya princess and a king, to be precise.
Dialogue: Some of my friends that fought with us were also nobility—a princess and a king, to be precise.
trans: 和我们并肩作战的朋友中有几个也是贵族——准确地说是公主和国王。

Original: Terra:If this world falls to ruin, our worlds will too...
Dialogue: If this world falls to ruin, our worlds will too...
trans: 如果这个世界毁灭，我们的世界也会……

Original: Terra:And our friends will be in trouble.
Dialogue: And our friends will be in trouble.
trans: 我们的朋友会有麻烦。

Original: Edge:I'm sure your friends will be fine. They are far stronger than you think.
Dialogue: I'm sure your friends will be fine. They are far stronger than you think.
trans: 我相信你的朋友会没事的。

Original: Edge:And don't forgetthere's a chance they might be here, too.
Dialogue: And don't forget—there's a chance they might be here, too.
trans: 别忘了——他们也有可能在这里。

Original: Yang:Indeed. Stranger things have happened.
Dialogue: Indeed. Stranger things have happened.
trans: 的确。

Original: Terra:You're right. I'll trust that they'll be all right and that I'll be able to see them again soon.
Dialogue: You're right. I'll trust that they'll be all right and that I'll be able to see them again soon.
trans: 你说得对。

Original: Bartz:Well, my friends can handle anything that comes their way. There's nothing for me to worry about.
Dialogue: Well, my friends can handle anything that comes their way. There's nothing for me to worry about.
trans: 好吧，我的朋友们可以处理他们遇到的任何事情。

Original: Terra:Earlier you mentioned there are others besides Kefka capable of creating Torsions.
Dialogue: Earlier you mentioned there are others besides Kefka capable of creating Torsions.
trans: 早些时候你提到除了 Kefka 之外还有其他人能够产生扭转。

Original: Zidane:Yeah. Though, we only know one other guy who can do it.
Dialogue: Yeah. Though, we only know one other guy who can do it.
trans: 是的。

Original: Vaan:Like us, he comes from a different world. How is it that they can control them and we can't?
Dialogue: Like us, he comes from a different world. How is it that they can control them and we can't?
trans: 和我们一样，他来自不同的世界。

Original: Mog:I'm not sure, kupo...
Dialogue: I'm not sure, kupo...
trans: 我不确定，库波...

Original: Bartz:If we defeat all those who can create them, will the Torsions disappear?
Dialogue: If we defeat all those who can create them, will the Torsions disappear?
trans: 如果我们打败所有可以创造它们的人，扭曲会消失吗？

Original: Y'shtola:I doubt it will be so easy.
Dialogue: I doubt it will be so easy.
trans: 我怀疑这会这么容易。

Original: Y'shtola:According to Mog, our numbers are limited. Only those with the light are capable of sealing Torsions.
Dialogue: According to Mog, our numbers are limited. Only those with the light are capable of sealing Torsions.
trans: 根据 Mog 的说法，我们的人数有限。

Original: Mog:It's true! It's true, kupo!
Dialogue: It's true! It's true, kupo!
trans: 这是真的！

Original: Vaan:Yeah, but...
Dialogue: Yeah, but...
trans: 好但是...

Original: Zidane:If only they can open Torsions and only we can close them, that must mean their powers are somehow related to ours.
Dialogue: If only they can open Torsions and only we can close them, that must mean their powers are somehow related to ours.
trans: 如果只有他们可以打开 Torsions 而只有我们可以关闭它们，那一定意味着他们的力量与我们的力量有某种关联。

Original: Mog:Though your powers are the same, the way it reveals itself strongly depends on the wielder, kupo!
Dialogue: Though your powers are the same, the way it reveals itself strongly depends on the wielder, kupo!
trans: 虽然你的力量是一样的，但它展现自己的方式在很大程度上取决于持有者，kupo！

Original: Mog:We need to gather more friends like you, capable of closing Torsions, kupo!
Dialogue: We need to gather more friends like you, capable of closing Torsions, kupo!
trans: 我们需要聚集更多像你这样的朋友，能够关闭 Torsions，kupo！

Original: Bartz:If we don't, those exploiting Torsions to fulfill their own selfish desires will destroy the world.
Dialogue: If we don't, those exploiting Torsions to fulfill their own selfish desires will destroy the world.
trans: 如果我们不这样做，那些利用扭曲来满足自己私欲的人将会毁灭世界。

Original: Mog:That's right, kupo! And their actions will not only endanger this world, but yours as well!
Dialogue: That's right, kupo! And their actions will not only endanger this world, but yours as well!
trans: 没错，库波！

Original: Terra:And that is why we must fight to stop them.
Dialogue: And that is why we must fight to stop them.
trans: 这就是为什么我们必须努力阻止他们。

Original: Zidane:This may sound crazy but...do you think we could coax them to our side?
Dialogue: This may sound crazy but...do you think we could coax them to our side?
trans: 这听起来很疯狂，但是……你觉得我们能把他们哄到我们这边吗？

Original: Mog:It's not totally impossible, kupo! It's up to you to convince them!
Dialogue: It's not totally impossible, kupo! It's up to you to convince them!
trans: 也不是完全不可能，库波！

Original: Y'shtola:Sounds like a challenge to me.
Dialogue: Sounds like a challenge to me.
trans: 听起来像是对我的挑战。

Original: Terra:It's definitely not going to be easy...
Dialogue: It's definitely not going to be easy...
trans: 这绝对不容易...

Original: Vivi:This place is really scary.
Dialogue: This place is really scary.
trans: 这个地方真的很可怕。

Original: Rem:You mean inside the Torsion?
Dialogue: You mean inside the Torsion?
trans: 你是说在 Torsion 里面？

Original: Vivi:Yeah... Just walking is making me really tired.
Dialogue: Yeah... Just walking is making me really tired.
trans: 是啊……光是走路就很累了。

Original: Y'shtola:I agree. It is draining our aether more quickly than any battles we have been in thus far.
Dialogue: I agree. It is draining our aether more quickly than any battles we have been in thus far.
trans: 我同意。

Original: Vivi:You feel it too?
Dialogue: You feel it too?
trans: 你也感觉到了吗？

Original: Yuna:Yes, a little.
Dialogue: Yes, a little.
trans: 对，一点。

Original: Y'shtola:Torsions are planes between worlds. Or so that is what we were told.
Dialogue: Torsions are planes between worlds. Or so that is what we were told.
trans: 扭转是世界之间的平面。

Original: Y'shtola:It seems to me, however, there is much more to this place.
Dialogue: It seems to me, however, there is much more to this place.
trans: 然而，在我看来，这个地方还有更多。

Original: Rem:Even if that's the case, it doesn't change our objective. We need to keep fighting the monsters that appear.
Dialogue: Even if that's the case, it doesn't change our objective. We need to keep fighting the monsters that appear.
trans: 即使是这样，也不会改变我们的目标。

Original: Vivi:Even though it's scary, we need to defeat as many of them as we can!
Dialogue: Even though it's scary, we need to defeat as many of them as we can!
trans: 尽管这很可怕，但我们需要尽可能多地打败他们！

Original: Mog:Is everyone okay, kupo?
Dialogue: Is everyone okay, kupo?
trans: 大家还好吗，伙计？

Original: Mog:I found an exit over there. Let's get out of here and go find Kefka, kupo!
Dialogue: I found an exit over there. Let's get out of here and go find Kefka, kupo!
trans: 我在那边找到了一个出口。

Original: Yuna:Good idea. Come on, everyone.
Dialogue: Good idea. Come on, everyone.
trans: 好主意。

Original: Mog:I sense a strong light from that boy, kupo!
Dialogue: I sense a strong light from that boy, kupo!
trans: 我感觉到那个男孩身上散发出强烈的光芒，库波！

Original: Cloud:Relax. We're not the enemy.
Dialogue: Relax. We're not the enemy.
trans: 放松。

Original: ???:Humans...and a moogle?
Dialogue: Humans...and a moogle?
trans: 人类……还有莫古力？

Original: ???:Doesn't look like you're friends of those monsters at the very least.
Dialogue: Doesn't look like you're friends of those monsters at the very least.
trans: 至少看起来不像是那些怪物的朋友。

Original: Mog:Those clothesyou must bear the title of Onion Knight, kupo!
Dialogue: Those clothes—you must bear the title of Onion Knight, kupo!
trans: 那些衣服——你必须拥有洋葱骑士的称号，库珀！

Original: Onion Knight:How do you know?
Dialogue: How do you know?
trans: 你怎么知道？

Original: Mog:I'm a messenger for the goddess Materia, so I know a few things about other worlds too, kupo.
Dialogue: I'm a messenger for the goddess Materia, so I know a few things about other worlds too, kupo.
trans: 我是玛泰利亚女神的使者，所以我也知道一些其他世界的事情，库波。

Original: Mog:Have you come across any Torsions, kupo?
Dialogue: Have you come across any Torsions, kupo?
trans: kupo，你遇到过扭转吗？

Original: Onion Knight:You mean those distortions of space and time? Then yes, I guess I have.
Dialogue: You mean those distortions of space and time? Then yes, I guess I have.
trans: 你是说那些扭曲的时空？

Original: Onion Knight:I've witnessed them close after defeating certain monsters. By the way, what are you all doing here?
Dialogue: I've witnessed them close after defeating certain monsters. By the way, what are you all doing here?
trans: 在击败某些怪物后，我亲眼目睹了他们。

Original: Warrior of Light:We are on a journey to vanquish the monsters and seal the Torsions.
Dialogue: We are on a journey to vanquish the monsters and seal the Torsions.
trans: 我们正在踏上征服怪物和封印扭曲的旅程。

Original: Onion Knight:What about that moogle? Doesn't look like he can fight to me.
Dialogue: What about that moogle? Doesn't look like he can fight to me.
trans: 那个莫古力呢？

Original: Cloud:Guess you can say he's our guide.
Dialogue: Guess you can say he's our guide.
trans: 我想你可以说他是我们的向导。

Original: Terra:We wouldn't be able to get around this world without him. He's even letting us use his ship.
Dialogue: We wouldn't be able to get around this world without him. He's even letting us use his ship.
trans: 没有他，我们将无法环游这个世界。

Original: Warrior of Light:If you do not possess a map or means of transport, then let us travel together.
Dialogue: If you do not possess a map or means of transport, then let us travel together.
trans: 如果你没有地图或交通工具，那就让我们一起旅行吧。

Original: Onion Knight:A logical proposal, but I still have some things to take care of.
Dialogue: A logical proposal, but I still have some things to take care of.
trans: 一个合乎逻辑的提议，但我还有一些事情要处理。

Original: Onion Knight:Let me get back to you on that offer.
Dialogue: Let me get back to you on that offer.
trans: 让我就那个提议回复你。

Original: Mog:*Sigh* He left, kupo.
Dialogue: *Sigh* He left, kupo.
trans: *叹息*他离开了，kupo。

Original: Onion Knight:What happened to the monsters that were here?
Dialogue: What happened to the monsters that were here?
trans: 这里的怪物怎么了？

Original: Bartz:Just took care of the last of them. What? Were you worried about us?
Dialogue: Just took care of the last of them. What? Were you worried about us?
trans: 只是照顾他们中的最后一个。

Original: Onion Knight:You could say that. I wouldn't be able to forgive myself if I failed to protect someone in need.
Dialogue: You could say that. I wouldn't be able to forgive myself if I failed to protect someone in need.
trans: 你可以那样说。

Original: Sazh:You're not a bad guy after all, little man.
Dialogue: You're not a bad guy after all, little man.
trans: 毕竟你不是坏人，小家伙。

Original: Onion Knight:Are you making fun of me?
Dialogue: Are you making fun of me?
trans: 你在逗我吗？

Original: Sazh:Let's just say the kids from my world don't know the meaning of "cautious."
Dialogue: Let's just say the kids from my world don't know the meaning of "cautious."
trans: 假设我的世界里的孩子不知道“谨慎”的意思。

Original: Hope:Yeah, most people your age don't have a care in the world. Their lives are peaceful.
Dialogue: Yeah, most people your age don't have a care in the world. Their lives are peaceful.
trans: 是的，世界上大多数你这个年龄的人都没有得到照顾。

Original: Onion Knight:A peaceful world, huh?
Dialogue: A peaceful world, huh?
trans: 一个和平的世界，嗯？

Original: Hope:On the surface at least.
Dialogue: On the surface at least.
trans: 至少在表面上。

Original: Onion Knight:But what are you doing here fighting monsters if you came from a world like that?
Dialogue: But what are you doing here fighting monsters if you came from a world like that?
trans: 但是，如果你来自那样的世界，你来这里与怪物战斗做什么？

Original: Hope:The Torsions will eventually spread destruction to our world as well. That's why we fight.
Dialogue: The Torsions will eventually spread destruction to our world as well. That's why we fight.
trans: 扭曲最终也会将破坏传播到我们的世界。

Original: Bartz:What about you? You don't even know what's going on, so why are you fighting?
Dialogue: What about you? You don't even know what's going on, so why are you fighting?
trans: 你呢？

Original: Onion Knight:Because I want to know.
Dialogue: Because I want to know.
trans: 因为我想知道。

Original: Onion Knight:I want to know my purpose here and the truth behind what's happening in this world.
Dialogue: I want to know my purpose here and the truth behind what's happening in this world.
trans: 我想知道我来这里的目的以及这个世界上正在发生的事情背后的真相。

Original: Mog:We can teach you a thing or two about that, kupo!
Dialogue: We can teach you a thing or two about that, kupo!
trans: 我们可以教你一两件事，kupo！

Original: Onion Knight:Looks that way.
Dialogue: Looks that way.
trans: 看起来是这样的。

Original: Onion Knight:But first, we need to take care of these guests.
Dialogue: But first, we need to take care of these guests.
trans: 但首先，我们需要照顾好这些客人。

Original: Yuffie:See? We wiped the floor with those monsters, so clearly we're not one of them.
Dialogue: See? We wiped the floor with those monsters, so clearly we're not one of them.
trans: 看？

Original: Yuffie:C'mon, come with us.
Dialogue: C'mon, come with us.
trans: 来吧，跟我们一起来。

Original: Onion Knight:Yeah, I probably wouldn't be able to handle this all on my own...
Dialogue: Yeah, I probably wouldn't be able to handle this all on my own...
trans: 是的，我一个人可能无法处理这一切......

Original: Vivi:If we work together, I'm sure you'll be able to find what you're looking for.
Dialogue: If we work together, I'm sure you'll be able to find what you're looking for.
trans: 如果我们一起工作，我相信您一定能够找到您要找的东西。

Original: Mog:Exactly! Besides, we really need someone with a strong will of the light like you, kupo.
Dialogue: Exactly! Besides, we really need someone with a strong will of the light like you, kupo.
trans: 确切地！

Original: Onion Knight:The light's needed to close the Torsions, is it?
Dialogue: The light's needed to close the Torsions, is it?
trans: 关闭扭转需要光，是吗？

Original: Onion Knight:Let's say I don't completely believe you yet. Can I still tag along?
Dialogue: Let's say I don't completely believe you yet. Can I still tag along?
trans: 假设我还不完全相信你。

Original: Zidane:It's not like we're all fighting for justice.
Dialogue: It's not like we're all fighting for justice.
trans: 并不是说我们都在为正义而战。

Original: Zidane:Each of us has someone we want to protect or something we want to do. We're doing this for ourselves.
Dialogue: Each of us has someone we want to protect or something we want to do. We're doing this for ourselves.
trans: 我们每个人都有想要保护的人或想要做的事情。

Original: Onion Knight:A journey motivated by self-interest...
Dialogue: A journey motivated by self-interest...
trans: 一场出于私利的旅行……

Original: Yuffie:Yep! So just don't think about it and follow your instincts!
Dialogue: Yep! So just don't think about it and follow your instincts!
trans: 是的！

Original: Onion Knight:All right, I'll go with you.
Dialogue: All right, I'll go with you.
trans: 好吧，我跟你一起去。

Original: Onion Knight:I feel like there's so much I can learn from being with you all.
Dialogue: I feel like there's so much I can learn from being with you all.
trans: 我觉得和你们在一起我可以学到很多东西。

Original: Bartz:You know, you really overthink things for a kid.
Dialogue: You know, you really overthink things for a kid.
trans: 你知道，你真的为孩子想太多了。

Original: Onion Knight:And you really don't think things through enough for an adult.
Dialogue: And you really don't think things through enough for an adult.
trans: 对于一个成年人来说，你真的没有把事情想清楚。

Original: Bartz:You arrogant little
Dialogue: You arrogant little—
trans: 你这个傲慢的小——

Original: Mog:Hooray! Let's make this journey a fun one, kupo!
Dialogue: Hooray! Let's make this journey a fun one, kupo!
trans: 万岁！

Original: Onion Knight:Terra, how did you become friends with everyone here?
Dialogue: Terra, how did you become friends with everyone here?
trans: Terra，你是怎么和这里的所有人成为朋友的？

Original: Terra:My mind was taken over by Kefka...and I attacked them...
Dialogue: My mind was taken over by Kefka...and I attacked them...
trans: 我的思想被凯夫卡接管了……我攻击了他们……

Original: Onion Knight:So you decided to make it up to them by joining them?
Dialogue: So you decided to make it up to them by joining them?
trans: 所以你决定加入他们来补偿他们？

Original: Terra:Why are you asking me this?
Dialogue: Why are you asking me this?
trans: 你为什么问我这个？

Original: Onion Knight:Because I'm not so sure I completely trust Mog yet...
Dialogue: Because I'm not so sure I completely trust Mog yet...
trans: 因为我不太确定我是否完全信任 Mog...

Original: Onion Knight:I'd like to observe things for just a bit longer and draw my own conclusions as to what's worth fighting for.
Dialogue: I'd like to observe things for just a bit longer and draw my own conclusions as to what's worth fighting for.
trans: 我想多观察一段时间，然后就什么值得为之奋斗得出自己的结论。

Original: Onion Knight:I was just wondering where you stood.
Dialogue: I was just wondering where you stood.
trans: 我只是想知道你站在哪里。

Original: Terra:While I will admit there is a lot we have yet to understand, there is one thing I do know.
Dialogue: While I will admit there is a lot we have yet to understand, there is one thing I do know.
trans: 虽然我承认还有很多我们尚未了解，但我确实知道一件事。

Original: Terra:Kefka hurt a lot of people back home. He is demented and cannot be left to his own devices.
Dialogue: Kefka hurt a lot of people back home. He is demented and cannot be left to his own devices.
trans: 凯夫卡在家乡伤害了很多人。

Original: Terra:I'm going to do everything within my power to stop him.
Dialogue: I'm going to do everything within my power to stop him.
trans: 我会尽我所能阻止他。

Original: Onion Knight:Good. I'm just glad to hear it's a decision you made for yourself.
Dialogue: Good. I'm just glad to hear it's a decision you made for yourself.
trans: 好的。

Original: Onion Knight:I was worried you simply took Mog's word at face value and were following him blindly.
Dialogue: I was worried you simply took Mog's word at face value and were following him blindly.
trans: 我担心你只是把莫格的话当真，然后盲目跟从他。

Original: Onion Knight:I apologize.
Dialogue: I apologize.
trans: 我道歉。

Original: Terra:It's fine. Let's do what we can to protect what's important to us.
Dialogue: It's fine. Let's do what we can to protect what's important to us.
trans: 没关系。

Original: Kefka:Ah, so the warriors with the light have returned...
Dialogue: Ah, so the warriors with the light have returned...
trans: 啊，原来带着光的战士们回来了……

Original: Kefka:Oh, what carnage there will be!
Dialogue: Oh, what carnage there will be!
trans: 哦，会有怎样的大屠杀！

Original: Terra:You're not getting away this time, Kefka!
Dialogue: You're not getting away this time, Kefka!
trans: 这次你跑不掉了，凯夫卡！

Original: Warrior of Light:You'll tell us all you know, even if we have to force it out of you!
Dialogue: You'll tell us all you know, even if we have to force it out of you!
trans: 你会告诉我们你知道的一切，即使我们不得不强迫你说出来！

Original: Kefka:No need to be so serious.
Dialogue: No need to be so serious.
trans: 没必要这么认真。

Original: Mog:Kupopo! Th-that big shiny thing...!
Dialogue: Kupopo! Th-that big shiny thing...!
trans: 库波波！

Original: Yda:What? Do you know what it is?
Dialogue: What? Do you know what it is?
trans: 什么？

Original: Mog:Yes, kupo! Be careful, everyone! When it becomes fully charged, it'll unleash an incredibly powerful attack!
Dialogue: Yes, kupo! Be careful, everyone! When it becomes fully charged, it'll unleash an incredibly powerful attack!
trans: 是的，库波！

Original: Kefka:Hehehe! As your friend said, you best give this fight your all...
Dialogue: Hehehe! As your friend said, you best give this fight your all...
trans: 嘿嘿嘿！

Original: Kefka:Else you'll be toastquite literally!
Dialogue: Else you'll be toast—quite literally!
trans: 否则你会完蛋——毫不夸张地说！

Original: Kefka:Uwee-hee-hee! What a delightful little toy!
Dialogue: Uwee-hee-hee! What a delightful little toy!
trans: 呜呜呜！

Original: Kefka:Now let me hear those utterly delicious screams of yours.
Dialogue: Now let me hear those utterly delicious screams of yours.
trans: 现在让我听听你那美妙绝伦的尖叫声。

Original: Mog:Brace yourselves, kupo! He's no ordinary foe!
Dialogue: Brace yourselves, kupo! He's no ordinary foe!
trans: 振作起来，库波！

Original: Kefka:What a pesky moogle, you are. You'll just have to perish with the rest of them!
Dialogue: What a pesky moogle, you are. You'll just have to perish with the rest of them!
trans: 你真是个讨厌的莫古力。

Original: Onion Knight:The Torsion... It's gone...
Dialogue: The Torsion... It's gone...
trans: 扭力……没了……

Original: Kefka:Well done! You are all very capable fighters!
Dialogue: Well done! You are all very capable fighters!
trans: 做得好！

Original: Terra:Why are you so happy? I thought you wanted to use the Torsions to spread destruction.
Dialogue: Why are you so happy? I thought you wanted to use the Torsions to spread destruction.
trans: 为什么你这么开心？

Original: Kefka:I do! And I want you to fight them with the last of your strength!
Dialogue: I do! And I want you to fight them with the last of your strength!
trans: 我愿意！

Original: Mog:I don't understand, kupo! What exactly is your goal!?
Dialogue: I don't understand, kupo! What exactly is your goal!?
trans: 我不明白，库波！

Original: Kefka:Hehehe. Isn't that obvious? I just want to have a little fun!
Dialogue: Hehehe. Isn't that obvious? I just want to have a little fun!
trans: 呵呵。

Original: Kefka:I'll see you around!
Dialogue: I'll see you around!
trans: 我们回头见！

Original: Onion Knight:Hold on! Recklessly chasing him is only going to get us into more trouble!
Dialogue: Hold on! Recklessly chasing him is only going to get us into more trouble!
trans: 坚持，稍等！

Original: Onion Knight:Besides, we'd never catch him! He can control Torsions at will!
Dialogue: Besides, we'd never catch him! He can control Torsions at will!
trans: 此外，我们永远也抓不到他！

Original: Terra:But we can't just stand here! He'll do to others what he did to metake over their minds and use them to sow destruction!
Dialogue: But we can't just stand here! He'll do to others what he did to me—take over their minds and use them to sow destruction!
trans: 但我们不能就这样站着！

Original: Yang:We must prevent that from ever coming to pass.
Dialogue: We must prevent that from ever coming to pass.
trans: 我们必须防止这种情况发生。

Original: Yang:We have the power to do that much, do we not?
Dialogue: We have the power to do that much, do we not?
trans: 我们有能力做那么多，不是吗？

Original: Warrior of Light:The enemy has a far greater understanding of what is happening than we do.
Dialogue: The enemy has a far greater understanding of what is happening than we do.
trans: 敌人比我们更了解正在发生的事情。

Original: Onion Knight:Which is precisely why we shouldn't be blindly chasing them.
Dialogue: Which is precisely why we shouldn't be blindly chasing them.
trans: 这正是我们不应该盲目追逐它们的原因。

Original: Onion Knight:So where should we go next?
Dialogue: So where should we go next?
trans: 那么接下来我们应该去哪里呢？

Original: Mog:Let's make our way to the Palace of Malitia! There is a large Torsion there, kupo!
Dialogue: Let's make our way to the Palace of Malitia! There is a large Torsion there, kupo!
trans: 让我们前往马里蒂亚宫！

Original: Onion Knight:If that's the case, we're likely to meet enemies similar to Kefka there.
Dialogue: If that's the case, we're likely to meet enemies similar to Kefka there.
trans: 那样的话，我们很可能会在那里遇到类似凯夫卡的敌人。

Original: Terra:Yeah, and we might finally get some answers.
Dialogue: Yeah, and we might finally get some answers.
trans: 是的，我们可能最终会得到一些答案。

Original: Onion Knight:...And the pieces of this puzzle will fall into place soon enough.
Dialogue: ...And the pieces of this puzzle will fall into place soon enough.
trans: ......这个拼图的碎片很快就会落到位。

Original: Materia:Kefka... What exactly are your intentions?
Dialogue: Kefka... What exactly are your intentions?
trans: 凯夫卡……你到底有什么意图？

Original: Mog:Apologies for my tardiness, kupo!
Dialogue: Apologies for my tardiness, kupo!
trans: 为我的迟到道歉，kupo！

Original: Materia:Tell me, Mog, do you not find Kefka's actions puzzling?
Dialogue: Tell me, Mog, do you not find Kefka's actions puzzling?
trans: 告诉我，莫格，你不觉得凯夫卡的行为令人费解吗？

Original: Materia:He attempts to fan the flames of war by provoking your warriors, yet never does he unleash the full extent of his powers upon them.
Dialogue: He attempts to fan the flames of war by provoking your warriors, yet never does he unleash the full extent of his powers upon them.
trans: 他试图通过激怒你的战士来煽动战火，但他从未对他们释放他的全部力量。

Original: Materia:Whatever could he be up to?
Dialogue: Whatever could he be up to?
trans: 他能做什么？

Original: Mog:Truth be told, I know little more of his plans than you, kupo!
Dialogue: Truth be told, I know little more of his plans than you, kupo!
trans: 老实说，我比你更了解他的计划，库波！

Original: Materia:More troubling still is he seems to know who or what is behind these Torsions...
Dialogue: More troubling still is he seems to know who or what is behind these Torsions...
trans: 更麻烦的是他似乎知道这些扭曲背后的人或物……

Original: Mog:Yes, but we have no means of questioning him. We don't even know where he is, kupo!
Dialogue: Yes, but we have no means of questioning him. We don't even know where he is, kupo!
trans: 是的，但我们没有办法审问他。

Original: Mog:...Maybe if you were to use your powers...
Dialogue: ...Maybe if you were to use your powers...
trans: ...也许如果你要使用你的力量...

Original: Materia:I will see what I can do.
Dialogue: I will see what I can do.
trans: 我会看看我能做什么。

Original: Mog:Once you know where he is, we will go and subdue him, kupo!
Dialogue: Once you know where he is, we will go and subdue him, kupo!
trans: 一旦你知道他在哪里，我们就去制服他，库波！

Original: Materia:I only ask that you be careful.
Dialogue: I only ask that you be careful.
trans: 我只要求你小心。

Original: Mog:We always are, kupo!
Dialogue: We always are, kupo!
trans: 我们一直都是，库波！

Original: Materia:Spiritus, you fool...
Dialogue: Spiritus, you fool...
trans: Spiritus，你这个傻瓜……

Original: Materia:Do not tell me this is your doing.
Dialogue: Do not tell me this is your doing.
trans: 不要告诉我这是你做的。

Original: Materia:Should you have crossed the line between mortal and god, you know very well I will be forced to take action against you.
Dialogue: Should you have crossed the line between mortal and god, you know very well I will be forced to take action against you.
trans: 如果你跨越了凡人与神之间的界限，你很清楚我将被迫对你采取行动。

Original: Zidane:Hm? Why are we here? I don't see any palace.
Dialogue: Hm? Why are we here? I don't see any palace.
trans: 嗯？

Original: Mog:We had to stop because the Torsions in this area prevent the airship's engine from running properly, kupo!
Dialogue: We had to stop because the Torsions in this area prevent the airship's engine from running properly, kupo!
trans: 我们不得不停下来，因为这个区域的扭力阻止了飞艇的引擎正常运转，库珀！

Original: Mog:The number of places we can fly through safely are slowly dwindling, kupo!
Dialogue: The number of places we can fly through safely are slowly dwindling, kupo!
trans: 能安全飞过的地方越来越少了，库珀！

Original: Penelo:I had no idea...
Dialogue: I had no idea...
trans: 我不知道...

Original: Terra:It's crazy to think just how deeply the Torsions affect everything around us.
Dialogue: It's crazy to think just how deeply the Torsions affect everything around us.
trans: 想想扭转对我们周围一切的影响有多深，真是太疯狂了。

Original: Bartz:Look on the bright side, guys! We can walk around and enjoy the scenic route for once!
Dialogue: Look on the bright side, guys! We can walk around and enjoy the scenic route for once!
trans: 看看光明的一面，伙计们！

Original: Bartz:After all, flying gets old pretty quickly...
Dialogue: After all, flying gets old pretty quickly...
trans: 毕竟，飞行很快就变老了……

Original: Zidane:Bahaha! Bartz, don't tell me you don't like flying because you're afraid of heights!
Dialogue: Bahaha! Bartz, don't tell me you don't like flying because you're afraid of heights!
trans: 哈哈哈！

Original: Yuffie:I, for one, wouldn't mind the walk! Me and vehicles... Well, we don't really agree.
Dialogue: I, for one, wouldn't mind the walk! Me and vehicles... Well, we don't really agree.
trans: 我，一方面，不介意走路！

Original: Zidane:You should've said so earlier, Yuffie! Come on everyone, let's start walking!
Dialogue: You should've said so earlier, Yuffie! Come on everyone, let's start walking!
trans: 尤菲，你早该说的！

Original: Bartz:Hey! Why do you listen to her and not me?
Dialogue: Hey! Why do you listen to her and not me?
trans: 嘿！

Original: Sazh:The monsters just keep gettin' stronger, don't they?
Dialogue: The monsters just keep gettin' stronger, don't they?
trans: 怪物只会越来越强，不是吗？

Original: Vivi:Uh-huh. I don't think I would have been able to make it this far alone.
Dialogue: Uh-huh. I don't think I would have been able to make it this far alone.
trans: 嗯。

Original: Onion Knight:When you started out, it was just the four of you?
Dialogue: When you started out, it was just the four of you?
trans: 刚开始的时候只有你们四个人？

Original: Mog:Yes, kupo! I'm so happy our numbers have grown this much!
Dialogue: Yes, kupo! I'm so happy our numbers have grown this much!
trans: 是的，库波！

Original: Onion Knight:Mog, you're their guide, right? Have you been targeting Torsions based on the group's strength?
Dialogue: Mog, you're their guide, right? Have you been targeting Torsions based on the group's strength?
trans: 莫格，你是他们的向导，对吧？

Original: Mog:That's right, kupo!
Dialogue: That's right, kupo!
trans: 没错，库波！

Original: Mog:I can sense both the strength and size of a Torsion and the locations of warriors with the light, kupo!
Dialogue: I can sense both the strength and size of a Torsion and the locations of warriors with the light, kupo!
trans: 我可以用光感应扭曲的强度和大小以及战士的位置，库波！

Original: Cloud:So you've been choosing where we go based on how many we are and how strong the enemy is?
Dialogue: So you've been choosing where we go based on how many we are and how strong the enemy is?
trans: 所以你一直在根据我们的人数和敌人的实力来选择我们去哪里？

Original: Vivi:If that's true, Mog, we owe all of our success to you!
Dialogue: If that's true, Mog, we owe all of our success to you!
trans: 如果这是真的，莫格，我们所有的成功都归功于你！

Original: Mog:Kupopo! It's my duty to make sure this mission is a success, after all!
Dialogue: Kupopo! It's my duty to make sure this mission is a success, after all!
trans: 库波波！

Original: Onion Knight:Everything your moogle says sounds rehearsed, doesn't it?
Dialogue: Everything your moogle says sounds rehearsed, doesn't it?
trans: 你的 moogle 说的一切听起来都是排练过的，不是吗？

Original: Cloud:Yeah, so? I couldn't care less about any of that.
Dialogue: Yeah, so? I couldn't care less about any of that.
trans: 所以啊？

Original: Cloud:I'm here for my own reasons.
Dialogue: I'm here for my own reasons.
trans: 我来这里是为了我自己的原因。

Original: Onion Knight:You're rightI should do the same. I need to focus on my own objectives. Not Mog's.
Dialogue: You're right—I should do the same. I need to focus on my own objectives. Not Mog's.
trans: 你是对的——我也应该这样做。

Original: Tifa:Look!
Dialogue: Look!
trans: 看！

Original: Mog:Excuse me, mister? Did you just seal that Torsion, kupo?
Dialogue: Excuse me, mister? Did you just seal that Torsion, kupo?
trans: 对不起，先生？

Original: Firion:Call me Firion. And you are?
Dialogue: Call me Firion. And you are?
trans: 叫我菲里奥。

Original: Mog:I'm Mog. We're on a mission to return peace to the world, kupo!
Dialogue: I'm Mog. We're on a mission to return peace to the world, kupo!
trans: 我是莫哥

Original: Yda:That is to say, we share the same goal as you.
Dialogue: That is to say, we share the same goal as you.
trans: 也就是说，我们与您有着相同的目标。

Original: Firion:Oh, so you're the ones I keep hearing about.
Dialogue: Oh, so you're the ones I keep hearing about.
trans: 哦，所以你就是我一直听说的人。

Original: Bartz:You've heard about us?
Dialogue: You've heard about us?
trans: 你听说过我们吗？

Original: Firion:Only that there were others that share my mission.
Dialogue: Only that there were others that share my mission.
trans: 只是还有其他人分享我的使命。

Original: Tifa:So, why did you put a flower where the Torsion was?
Dialogue: So, why did you put a flower where the Torsion was?
trans: 那么，为什么要在 Torsion 所在的位置放一朵花呢？

Original: Firion:It serves as a message for my comrades.
Dialogue: It serves as a message for my comrades.
trans: 它作为我的同志们的信息。

Original: Bartz:So there are others doing the same?
Dialogue: So there are others doing the same?
trans: 那么还有其他人在做同样的事情吗？

Original: Firion:Something like that. Well, I must be going.
Dialogue: Something like that. Well, I must be going.
trans: 像那样的东西。

Original: Mog:Wait, kupo! Let's
Dialogue: Wait, kupo! Let's—
trans: 等等，大衣！

Original: Yda:It sounded like he already has others he's working with. Let's leave him be for now.
Dialogue: It sounded like he already has others he's working with. Let's leave him be for now.
trans: 听起来他已经和其他人一起工作了。

Original: Mog:We could've really used him on our side, kupo.
Dialogue: We could've really used him on our side, kupo.
trans: 我们真的可以利用他在我们这边，kupo。

Original: Firion:We meet again. Were you the ones who defeated the monsters around here?
Dialogue: We meet again. Were you the ones who defeated the monsters around here?
trans: 我们再见面。

Original: Terra:Yes, the planet will die if we don't get rid of them.
Dialogue: Yes, the planet will die if we don't get rid of them.
trans: 是的，如果我们不消灭它们，地球就会灭亡。

Original: Firion:I see. Well, I wish you the best.
Dialogue: I see. Well, I wish you the best.
trans: 我懂了。

Original: Cecil:Wait. Could you tell us about your allies?
Dialogue: Wait. Could you tell us about your allies?
trans: 等待。

Original: Cecil:If they're just like youa group looking to save this worldperhaps we could help each other.
Dialogue: If they're just like you—a group looking to save this world—perhaps we could help each other.
trans: 如果他们和你一样——一群想要拯救这个世界的人——也许我们可以互相帮助。

Original: Firion:My allies? How should I put it?
Dialogue: My allies? How should I put it?
trans: 我的盟友？

Original: Firion:I've been calling them the rebel forces, since they remind me of a resistance organization back home.
Dialogue: I've been calling them the rebel forces, since they remind me of a resistance organization back home.
trans: 我一直称他们为叛军，因为他们让我想起了家乡的抵抗组织。

Original: Terra:A resistance organization? Like to fight an empire? But there aren't any in this world.
Dialogue: A resistance organization? Like to fight an empire? But there aren't any in this world.
trans: 抵抗组织？

Original: Firion:Their enemy isn't the empire. It's just what I call them out of convenience. I believe some call them...the Returners.
Dialogue: Their enemy isn't the empire. It's just what I call them out of convenience. I believe some call them...the Returners.
trans: 他们的敌人不是帝国。

Original: Terra:The Returners!?
Dialogue: The Returners!?
trans: 回归者！？

Original: Cecil:Do you recognize the name?
Dialogue: Do you recognize the name?
trans: 你认识这个名字吗？

Original: Terra:My friends back home went by that name.
Dialogue: My friends back home went by that name.
trans: 我回家的朋友都叫这个名字。

Original: Firion:Then perhaps you're all from the same world. Are you alone?
Dialogue: Then perhaps you're all from the same world. Are you alone?
trans: 那么也许你们都来自同一个世界。

Original: Terra:All I have now are my friends here from other worlds.
Dialogue: All I have now are my friends here from other worlds.
trans: 我现在只有来自其他世界的朋友。

Original: Firion:As much as I want to help, I must see to my duty by sealing the Torsion around here.
Dialogue: As much as I want to help, I must see to my duty by sealing the Torsion around here.
trans: 尽管我很想提供帮助，但我必须通过密封这里周围的扭曲来履行我的职责。

Original: Mog:Okay! We can think about what to do after that, kupo.
Dialogue: Okay! We can think about what to do after that, kupo.
trans: 好的！

Original: Firion:Very well. Let's continue this later.
Dialogue: Very well. Let's continue this later.
trans: 很好。

Original: Firion:That should do it. Now where should I begin? Though I should warn you, I really don't know much about them.
Dialogue: That should do it. Now where should I begin? Though I should warn you, I really don't know much about them.
trans: 应该这样做。

Original: Terra:Anything will do. Just please tell me whatever you know about the Returners and the rebel forces.
Dialogue: Anything will do. Just please tell me whatever you know about the Returners and the rebel forces.
trans: 什么都会做。

Original: Firion:The rebel forces are an organization traveling the lands to close the Torsions.
Dialogue: The rebel forces are an organization traveling the lands to close the Torsions.
trans: 反抗军是一个组织，他们游历各地以关闭 Torsions。

Original: Firion:From what I hear, the leader used to be a king or queen or something back in their world.
Dialogue: From what I hear, the leader used to be a king or queen or something back in their world.
trans: 据我所知，领导者曾经是他们世界中的国王或王后之类的人。

Original: Onion Knight:Wait... You've never met them before?
Dialogue: Wait... You've never met them before?
trans: 等等……你以前从没见过他们？

Original: Firion:I heard they don't like drawing attention to themselves. It's too dangerous.
Dialogue: I heard they don't like drawing attention to themselves. It's too dangerous.
trans: 我听说他们不喜欢引起人们对自己的注意。

Original: Firion:So they send messengers from other worlds to contact me. I call them my "allies," but there's no sense of camaraderie.
Dialogue: So they send messengers from other worlds to contact me. I call them my "allies," but there's no sense of camaraderie.
trans: 所以他们派其他世界的使者来联系我。

Original: Firion:Some are volunteer soldiers like me while others are mercenaries.
Dialogue: Some are volunteer soldiers like me while others are mercenaries.
trans: 有些是像我这样的志愿军，有些则是雇佣兵。

Original: Onion Knight:So they're able to keep things secret by having strangers relay information for them, huh?
Dialogue: So they're able to keep things secret by having strangers relay information for them, huh?
trans: 所以他们可以通过让陌生人为他们传递信息来保密，对吧？

Original: Mog:Can we meet them, kupo?
Dialogue: Can we meet them, kupo?
trans: 我们能见见他们吗，库波？

Original: Mog:The only ones who can seal the Torsions are those with the will of the light like you.
Dialogue: The only ones who can seal the Torsions are those with the will of the light like you.
trans: 唯一能封印扭曲的人是那些像你一样拥有光之意志的人。

Original: Mog:So I'd love for them to become our friends, kupo!
Dialogue: So I'd love for them to become our friends, kupo!
trans: 所以我希望他们成为我们的朋友，kupo！

Original: Onion Knight:You mentioned that your objective was to clear out the monsters in the area, right?
Dialogue: You mentioned that your objective was to clear out the monsters in the area, right?
trans: 你说过你的目标是清除该地区的怪物，对吧？

Original: Onion Knight:What's next?
Dialogue: What's next?
trans: 下一步是什么？

Original: Firion:That depends. Do you know where the Torsions are located?
Dialogue: That depends. Do you know where the Torsions are located?
trans: 那要看。

Original: Mog:Of course, kupo! We even have an airship.
Dialogue: Of course, kupo! We even have an airship.
trans: 当然，库波！

Original: Firion:I see. Then would you mind if I come along?
Dialogue: I see. Then would you mind if I come along?
trans: 我懂了。

Original: Firion:I would like to reunite the lady with her friends from back home as well.
Dialogue: I would like to reunite the lady with her friends from back home as well.
trans: 我也想让这位女士与她在家乡的朋友团聚。

Original: Terra:Call me Terra. And thank you.
Dialogue: Call me Terra. And thank you.
trans: 叫我泰拉。

Original: Firion:No, I apologize I couldn't be of much help to you.
Dialogue: No, I apologize I couldn't be of much help to you.
trans: 不，很抱歉我帮不了你太多。

Original: Firion:Let us be off now.
Dialogue: Let us be off now.
trans: 我们现在就出发吧。

Original: Mog:Watch your step, kupo! We'll soon be entering a very mountainous area!
Dialogue: Watch your step, kupo! We'll soon be entering a very mountainous area!
trans: 小心你的脚步，库波！

Original: Yang:It was in a place very similar to this that we first met, was it not, Cecil?
Dialogue: It was in a place very similar to this that we first met, was it not, Cecil?
trans: 我们第一次见面的地方和这里非常相似，不是吗，塞西尔？

Original: Cecil:Indeed. It brings back many memories.
Dialogue: Indeed. It brings back many memories.
trans: 的确。

Original: Warrior of Light:This world was created in the image of our own worlds. Perhaps that is why it feels so familiar to you.
Dialogue: This world was created in the image of our own worlds. Perhaps that is why it feels so familiar to you.
trans: 这个世界是按照我们自己世界的形象创造的。

Original: Mog:Yes, kupo! Maybe this region was even molded after that place the two of you met!
Dialogue: Yes, kupo! Maybe this region was even molded after that place the two of you met!
trans: 是的，库波！

Original: Yuna:Where I'm from, summoners are required to go on a pilgrimage to the given lands. To get there, we must ascend a large mountain.
Dialogue: Where I'm from, summoners are required to go on a pilgrimage to the given lands. To get there, we must ascend a large mountain.
trans: 我来自哪里，召唤师必须前往指定的土地朝圣。

Original: Yuna:And, just like in my world, maybe the lands beyond these peaks will hold the key to this world's salvation.
Dialogue: And, just like in my world, maybe the lands beyond these peaks will hold the key to this world's salvation.
trans: 而且，就像在我的世界中一样，也许这些山峰之外的土地将掌握拯救这个世界的关键。

Original: Yang:You are an incredibly earnest young lady. You must be a very well-respected individual in your homeland.
Dialogue: You are an incredibly earnest young lady. You must be a very well-respected individual in your homeland.
trans: 你是一位非常认真的年轻女士。

Original: Yuna:There is still much I have to learn.
Dialogue: There is still much I have to learn.
trans: 我还有很多东西要学。

Original: Yuna:My father, however, was an incredible man, and it is to carry on his legacy that I persevere.
Dialogue: My father, however, was an incredible man, and it is to carry on his legacy that I persevere.
trans: 然而，我的父亲是一个了不起的人，我坚持要继承他的遗产。

Original: Yuna:But saving this world comes first.
Dialogue: But saving this world comes first.
trans: 但拯救这个世界是第一位的。

Original: Mog:I'm glad to hear it, kupo!
Dialogue: I'm glad to hear it, kupo!
trans: 我很高兴听到这个消息，库波！

Original: Penelo:We've come a long way, haven't we?
Dialogue: We've come a long way, haven't we?
trans: 我们已经走了很长一段路，不是吗？

Original: Vaan:Yeah. Back in Ivalice, I couldn't have imagined any of this, even if I tried.
Dialogue: Yeah. Back in Ivalice, I couldn't have imagined any of this, even if I tried.
trans: 是的。

Original: Penelo:Vaan, do you ever get worried? We've been roped into doing things we don't understand in a world we know nothing about.
Dialogue: Vaan, do you ever get worried? We've been roped into doing things we don't understand in a world we know nothing about.
trans: 梵，你有没有担心过？

Original: Vaan:What? Are you worried?
Dialogue: What? Are you worried?
trans: 什么？

Original: Penelo:A little. I mean, a lot has happened...
Dialogue: A little. I mean, a lot has happened...
trans: 一点。

Original: Vaan:You've always been a bit of a worrywart.
Dialogue: You've always been a bit of a worrywart.
trans: 你总是有点忧心忡忡。

Original: Vaan:Honestly speaking, I'm a little nervous, but I think I'm more excited than anything!
Dialogue: Honestly speaking, I'm a little nervous, but I think I'm more excited than anything!
trans: 老实说，我有点紧张，但我觉得我比什么都兴奋！

Original: Penelo:Ugh! You've always been far too brazen!
Dialogue: Ugh! You've always been far too brazen!
trans: 啊!

Original: Rem:Come on, you two! We're leaving so
Dialogue: Come on, you two! We're leaving so—
trans: 来吧，你们两个！

Original: Rem:Oh, sorry! I didn't mean to interrupt...
Dialogue: Oh, sorry! I didn't mean to interrupt...
trans: 哦对不起！

Original: Vaan:Hm? Interrupt what?
Dialogue: Hm? Interrupt what?
trans: 嗯？

Original: Penelo:It's fine, Rem! Thanks for letting us know.
Dialogue: It's fine, Rem! Thanks for letting us know.
trans: 没关系的，雷姆！

Original: Rem:If you don't mind my asking, have you two known each other for long?
Dialogue: If you don't mind my asking, have you two known each other for long?
trans: 如果你不介意我问，你们两个认识很久了吗？

Original: Penelo:Yeah, we've been friends since childhood.
Dialogue: Yeah, we've been friends since childhood.
trans: 是的，我们从小就是朋友。

Original: Penelo:He's always had a reckless streak, so I constantly worry about him.
Dialogue: He's always had a reckless streak, so I constantly worry about him.
trans: 他总是有鲁莽的倾向，所以我经常担心他。

Original: Vaan:Why do you make it sound like I'm some daredevil kid!?
Dialogue: Why do you make it sound like I'm some daredevil kid!?
trans: 为什么你说得好像我是个胆大包天的孩子！？

Original: Penelo:I'm simply stating the truth! Besides, you and I are kids, which is why...
Dialogue: I'm simply stating the truth! Besides, you and I are kids, which is why...
trans: 我只是在陈述事实！

Original: Penelo:We need to be careful. I don't want to see you get hurt.
Dialogue: We need to be careful. I don't want to see you get hurt.
trans: 我们需要小心。

Original: Rem:I can tell you care a lot about each other.
Dialogue: I can tell you care a lot about each other.
trans: 我可以告诉你们，你们非常关心彼此。

Original: Rem:It's nice to have someone close by who worries about you, isn't it?
Dialogue: It's nice to have someone close by who worries about you, isn't it?
trans: 有一个关心你的人在身边真好，不是吗？

Original: Penelo:Do you have anyone like that, Rem?
Dialogue: Do you have anyone like that, Rem?
trans: 你有这样的人吗，雷姆？

Original: Penelo:I see... I hope he's okay.
Dialogue: I see... I hope he's okay.
trans: 我明白了……我希望他没事。

Original: Rem:Me too. Now let's get back to the others.
Dialogue: Me too. Now let's get back to the others.
trans: 我也是。

Original: ???:Ah, if it isn't Lady Yuna.
Dialogue: Ah, if it isn't Lady Yuna.
trans: 啊，要不是尤娜大人就好了。

Original: Yuna:Maester Seymour!
Dialogue: Maester Seymour!
trans: 西摩学士！

Original: Yuna:I admit I am equally surprised to see you here.
Dialogue: I admit I am equally surprised to see you here.
trans: 我承认在这里见到你我同样感到惊讶。

Original: Seymour:That we should be reunited in this mannerit is no doubt Yevon's will.
Dialogue: That we should be reunited in this manner—it is no doubt Yevon's will.
trans: 我们应该以这种方式重聚——这无疑是叶冯的意愿。

Original: Zidane:Yuna, who's this guy? He your friend?
Dialogue: Yuna, who's this guy? He your friend?
trans: 尤娜，这个人是谁？

Original: Yuna:This is Maester Seymour Guado.
Dialogue: This is Maester Seymour Guado.
trans: 这是西摩·瓜多学士。

Original: Seymour:Might I inquire as to who you all are? You also hail from other worlds?
Dialogue: Might I inquire as to who you all are? You also hail from other worlds?
trans: 请问你们都是什么人？

Original: Yuna:Y-yes, that's right...
Dialogue: Y-yes, that's right...
trans: 对、对，没错……

Original: Yuna:We have been working together to rid this world of the Torsions from which the monsters are appearing.
Dialogue: We have been working together to rid this world of the Torsions from which the monsters are appearing.
trans: 我们一直在共同努力，以消除这个世界上出现怪物的扭曲。

Original: Seymour:Ridding this world of Torsions... I see...
Dialogue: Ridding this world of Torsions... I see...
trans: 摆脱这个扭曲的世界……我明白了……

Original: Zidane:If you're Yuna's friend, you're more than welcome to join us. You look pretty strong.
Dialogue: If you're Yuna's friend, you're more than welcome to join us. You look pretty strong.
trans: 如果您是 Yuna 的朋友，我们非常欢迎您加入我们。

Original: Seymour:While I thank you for the offer, I'm afraid I must decline.
Dialogue: While I thank you for the offer, I'm afraid I must decline.
trans: 虽然我感谢你的提议，但恐怕我必须拒绝。

Original: Seymour:I have an investigation I need to conduct here.
Dialogue: I have an investigation I need to conduct here.
trans: 我有一项调查需要在这里进行。

Original: Seymour:I must be going now. Godspeed, my friends.
Dialogue: I must be going now. Godspeed, my friends.
trans: 我现在必须走了。

Original: Zidane:Don't take it too hard. I'm sure you'll see each other again soon.
Dialogue: Don't take it too hard. I'm sure you'll see each other again soon.
trans: 不要太难了。

Original: Warrior of Light:That man... He was very difficult to read. I could not tell if he is with the light or the darkness.
Dialogue: That man... He was very difficult to read. I could not tell if he is with the light or the darkness.
trans: 那个男人……很难读懂。

Original: Y'shtola:While he is possessed of incredible magic, it appears to be tinged with a certain malevolence.
Dialogue: While he is possessed of incredible magic, it appears to be tinged with a certain malevolence.
trans: 虽然他拥有不可思议的魔法，但似乎带有某种恶意。

Original: Onion Knight:We need to keep this from Yuna.
Dialogue: We need to keep this from Yuna.
trans: 我们需要对 Yuna 保密。

Original: Onion Knight:Worrying her won't help anyone.
Dialogue: Worrying her won't help anyone.
trans: 担心她对任何人都没有帮助。

Original: Warrior of Light:Indeed. Let us put this in the back of our minds for now and simply continue toward our ultimate goal.
Dialogue: Indeed. Let us put this in the back of our minds for now and simply continue toward our ultimate goal.
trans: 的确。

Original: Yuna:Look! There's someone there.
Dialogue: Look! There's someone there.
trans: 看！

Original: ???:A knight, a guy with an afro, a moogle... You guys having a costume party?
Dialogue: A knight, a guy with an afro, a moogle... You guys having a costume party?
trans: 一个骑士，一个有爆炸头的家伙，一个莫古力……你们在搞化装舞会吗？

Original: Mog:This isn't a costume! I'm a real moogle, kupo!
Dialogue: This isn't a costume! I'm a real moogle, kupo!
trans: 这不是戏服！

Original: ???:Whoa! You can talk!?
Dialogue: Whoa! You can talk!?
trans: 哇！

Original: Yuna:Excuse me, but may I ask what you're doing here?
Dialogue: Excuse me, but may I ask what you're doing here?
trans: 打扰一下，但我可以问一下你在这里做什么吗？

Original: Laguna:So, like, I'm trekking, y'know? And Oh yeah, my name's Laguna. Anyway, I'm traveling the world like usual...
Dialogue: So, like, I'm trekking, y'know? And— Oh yeah, my name's Laguna. Anyway, I'm traveling the world like usual...
trans: 所以，就像，我在徒步旅行，你知道吗？

Original: Laguna:And the next thing you know, I find myself here, completely lost, getting attacked by monsters. Can you believe my luck?
Dialogue: And the next thing you know, I find myself here, completely lost, getting attacked by monsters. Can you believe my luck?
trans: 接下来你知道，我发现自己在这里，完全迷路了，被怪物袭击了。

Original: Sazh:Uh, you seem pretty cheerful for a guy down on his luck.
Dialogue: Uh, you seem pretty cheerful for a guy down on his luck.
trans: 呃，对于一个倒霉的人来说，你似乎很开朗。

Original: Mog:No matter how unlucky he may be, I sense a strong will of the light coming from him, kupo!
Dialogue: No matter how unlucky he may be, I sense a strong will of the light coming from him, kupo!
trans: 不管他有多么倒霉，我都感觉到了一股强烈的光明意志从他身上传来，库珀！

Original: Laguna:A strong what?
Dialogue: A strong what?
trans: 强什么？

Original: Warrior of Light:Only those who bear the light possess the power to seal the Torsions.
Dialogue: Only those who bear the light possess the power to seal the Torsions.
trans: 只有那些承载着光芒的人才拥有封印扭曲的力量。

Original: Yuna:We're on a journey to close them to save our worlds. Will you come with us?
Dialogue: We're on a journey to close them to save our worlds. Will you come with us?
trans: 我们正在努力关闭它们以拯救我们的世界。

Original: Laguna:I'll tell ya what...
Dialogue: I'll tell ya what...
trans: 我会告诉你什么...

Original: Laguna:I didn't understand a word of that!
Dialogue: I didn't understand a word of that!
trans: 我一个字都没听懂！

Original: Laguna:But hey, I appreciate the offer. I'll give it some thought.
Dialogue: But hey, I appreciate the offer. I'll give it some thought.
trans: 但是，嘿，我很感激这个提议。

Original: Laguna:Well, see you guys around. Oh, and watch out for the monsters, okay?
Dialogue: Well, see you guys around. Oh, and watch out for the monsters, okay?
trans: 好吧，回头见。

Original: Sazh:He's gotta be messin' with us.
Dialogue: He's gotta be messin' with us.
trans: 他一定是在逗我们。

Original: Laguna:Hey, looks like I'm still in time for the costume party!
Dialogue: Hey, looks like I'm still in time for the costume party!
trans: 嘿，看来我还没来得及参加化装舞会！

Original: Mog:Kupo! I'm glad you're still here!
Dialogue: Kupo! I'm glad you're still here!
trans: 库波！

Original: Cecil:Have you considered our proposal?
Dialogue: Have you considered our proposal?
trans: 你考虑过我们的建议了吗？

Original: Laguna:Yeah, about that... I'm still a little iffy on the details.
Dialogue: Yeah, about that... I'm still a little iffy on the details.
trans: 是的，关于那个……我对细节还是有点不确定。

Original: Laguna:What exactly are these "Torsions"? And why are you going around closing them?
Dialogue: What exactly are these "Torsions"? And why are you going around closing them?
trans: 这些“扭转”到底是什么？

Original: Cloud:They're being used as gateways for monsters to invade this world.
Dialogue: They're being used as gateways for monsters to invade this world.
trans: 它们被用作怪物入侵这个世界的门户。

Original: Cloud:The Torsions are even transforming the world itself. That's why.
Dialogue: The Torsions are even transforming the world itself. That's why.
trans: 扭转甚至正在改变世界本身。

Original: Laguna:So basically, you're all heroes trying to save the world?
Dialogue: So basically, you're all heroes trying to save the world?
trans: 所以基本上，你们都是试图拯救世界的英雄？

Original: Laguna:And you want my help, eh?
Dialogue: And you want my help, eh?
trans: 你需要我的帮助，嗯？

Original: Laguna:All right! Now we're talkin'!
Dialogue: All right! Now we're talkin'!
trans: 好的！

Original: Mog:So you'll come with us, kupo?
Dialogue: So you'll come with us, kupo?
trans: 所以你会和我们一起去吗，库波？

Original: Laguna:I was worried you guys were picking fights with monsters for fun, but it looks like you actually have a legitimate reason. I'm in!
Dialogue: I was worried you guys were picking fights with monsters for fun, but it looks like you actually have a legitimate reason. I'm in!
trans: 我担心你们是为了好玩而挑起与怪物打架，但看起来你们确实有正当理由。

Original: Cloud:Didn't expect you to be this much of a thinker.
Dialogue: Didn't expect you to be this much of a thinker.
trans: 没想到你这么有思想。

Original: Penelo:Everyone, look! Monsters are coming this way!
Dialogue: Everyone, look! Monsters are coming this way!
trans: 大家快看！

Original: Cecil:Might we request your assistance?
Dialogue: Might we request your assistance?
trans: 我们需要你的帮助吗？

Original: Laguna:Yeah, no problem. Looks like this is my hero debut, eh?
Dialogue: Yeah, no problem. Looks like this is my hero debut, eh?
trans: 是的，没问题。

Original: Laguna:I'll take care of these guys so you don't get flanked!
Dialogue: I'll take care of these guys so you don't get flanked!
trans: 我会照顾这些家伙，这样你就不会被夹击！

Original: Cloud:You sure you've got this?
Dialogue: You sure you've got this?
trans: 你确定你有这个？

Original: Laguna:Trust me. I've been on the battlefield more times than I'd like to remember!
Dialogue: Trust me. I've been on the battlefield more times than I'd like to remember!
trans: 相信我。

Original: Laguna:We'll regroup after battle!
Dialogue: We'll regroup after battle!
trans: 战后重整旗鼓！

Original: Mog:Kupo! We did it!
Dialogue: Kupo! We did it!
trans: 库波！

Original: Laguna:Hey, glad you guys are okay. Looks like you didn't have too much trouble either.
Dialogue: Hey, glad you guys are okay. Looks like you didn't have too much trouble either.
trans: 嘿，很高兴你们没事。

Original: Y'shtola:You seem to be a man of remarkable skill.
Dialogue: You seem to be a man of remarkable skill.
trans: 看来你是个身手不凡的人。

Original: Hope:You mentioned earlier you've fought on the battlefield before. Does that mean you're a soldier?
Dialogue: You mentioned earlier you've fought on the battlefield before. Does that mean you're a soldier?
trans: 你刚才提到你曾经在战场上战斗过。

Original: Laguna:Former soldier. Some stuff went down, and now I just travel from place to place.
Dialogue: Former soldier. Some stuff went down, and now I just travel from place to place.
trans: 前军人。

Original: Laguna:By the way, I've been wondering. I feel like somebody's controlling the monsters from behind the scenes. You guys know anything?
Dialogue: By the way, I've been wondering. I feel like somebody's controlling the monsters from behind the scenes. You guys know anything?
trans: 顺便说一句，我一直在想。

Original: Y'shtola:Nay. We know naught more than you. Else, we would not be here.
Dialogue: Nay. We know naught more than you. Else, we would not be here.
trans: 不。

Original: Laguna:Yep, should've seen that coming. You got me there. Looks like this is gonna be tougher than I thought.
Dialogue: Yep, should've seen that coming. You got me there. Looks like this is gonna be tougher than I thought.
trans: 是的，应该已经看到了。

Original: Laguna:At any rate, let's just focus on putting an end to the extortion!
Dialogue: At any rate, let's just focus on putting an end to the extortion!
trans: 无论如何，让我们专注于结束勒索！

Original: Mog:You mean "Torsion"... That wasn't even close, kupo...
Dialogue: You mean "Torsion"... That wasn't even close, kupo...
trans: 你的意思是“扭转”......那还差得远，库波......

Original: Laguna:Huh? Whatever. Extortions, Torsions, same thing!
Dialogue: Huh? Whatever. Extortions, Torsions, same thing!
trans: 嗯？

Original: Laguna:Anyway, it's great to be part of the team! If you ever need me, I'll be here.
Dialogue: Anyway, it's great to be part of the team! If you ever need me, I'll be here.
trans: 不管怎样，能成为团队的一员真是太好了！

Original: Manikin:U... Urgh...
Dialogue: U... Urgh...
trans: 那个……呃……

Original: Rem:I don't think I'll ever get used to those things...
Dialogue: I don't think I'll ever get used to those things...
trans: 我不认为我会习惯那些东西...

Original: Vivi:I wonder if they're living beings, like all the other monsters we've defeated.
Dialogue: I wonder if they're living beings, like all the other monsters we've defeated.
trans: 我想知道他们是不是活人，就像我们打败的所有其他怪物一样。

Original: Edge:I doubt it. They're lifeless puppetsI'm sure of it. That's why they're so creepy.
Dialogue: I doubt it. They're lifeless puppets—I'm sure of it. That's why they're so creepy.
trans: 我对此表示怀疑。

Original: Vivi:S-some puppets have souls... I'm one of them. At least I was in my world.
Dialogue: S-some puppets have souls... I'm one of them. At least I was in my world.
trans: 这、有些傀儡是有灵魂的……我就是其中之一。

Original: Yuna:Puppets with souls... That reminds me...
Dialogue: Puppets with souls... That reminds me...
trans: 有灵魂的人偶……这让我想起了……

Original: Yuna:Where I'm from, it is possible to be temporarily reunited with those who have passed on.
Dialogue: Where I'm from, it is possible to be temporarily reunited with those who have passed on.
trans: 我所在的地方，有可能与逝去的人暂时团聚。

Original: Edge:You can speak with the dead!?
Dialogue: You can speak with the dead!?
trans: 你可以和死人说话！？

Original: Tifa:How does it work? Do you have to call upon their spirit or something?
Dialogue: How does it work? Do you have to call upon their spirit or something?
trans: 它是如何工作的？

Original: Yuna:Upon death, they are sent to the Farplanea place the living can also visit.
Dialogue: Upon death, they are sent to the Farplane—a place the living can also visit.
trans: 死后，他们会被送到 Farplane——生者也可以造访的地方。

Original: Yuna:Some claim it is simply an illusion, but there, you can speak with the spirits of the dead.
Dialogue: Some claim it is simply an illusion, but there, you can speak with the spirits of the dead.
trans: 有人声称这只是一种幻觉，但在那里，你可以与死者的灵魂交谈。

Original: Tifa:This place sounds both sad and amazing at the same time.
Dialogue: This place sounds both sad and amazing at the same time.
trans: 这个地方听起来既悲伤又令人惊奇。

Original: Yuna:Maester Seymour...
Dialogue: Maester Seymour...
trans: 西摩学士...

Original: Seymour:The dimensions between worlds were distorted, and I was brought here.
Dialogue: The dimensions between worlds were distorted, and I was brought here.
trans: 世界之间的次元被扭曲，我被带到了这里。

Original: Seymour:But why? Why am Ia man bereft of lifehere?
Dialogue: But why? Why am I—a man bereft of life—here?
trans: 但为什么？

Original: Seymour:Who goes there!?
Dialogue: Who goes there!?
trans: 谁去那里！？

Original: Seymour:What are you doing here!? What is it you seek?
Dialogue: What are you doing here!? What is it you seek?
trans: 你在这里做什么！？

Original: Shadow:Who knows? It all depends on the client.
Dialogue: Who knows? It all depends on the client.
trans: 谁知道？

Original: Seymour:You are possessed by the reaper... Your voice is so cold it could be made of ice.
Dialogue: You are possessed by the reaper... Your voice is so cold it could be made of ice.
trans: 你被死神附体了……你的声音冷得仿佛冰块。

Original: Shadow:Who are you to judge me? You don't appear dead at first glance, yet you can't exist in the same way that I do.
Dialogue: Who are you to judge me? You don't appear dead at first glance, yet you can't exist in the same way that I do.
trans: 你凭什么评判我？

Original: Seymour:You're wrong. The only difference between you and I is the fundamental principles our respective worlds operate on.
Dialogue: You're wrong. The only difference between you and I is the fundamental principles our respective worlds operate on.
trans: 你错了。

Original: Seymour:You mentioned you take clients. How about you tell me what you know in exchange for some coin?
Dialogue: You mentioned you take clients. How about you tell me what you know in exchange for some coin?
trans: 你提到你接受客户。

Original: Shadow:What I know for a bit of pocket money? Very well.
Dialogue: What I know for a bit of pocket money? Very well.
trans: 我知道一点点零花钱？

Original: Shadow:For this amount, I can tell you this...
Dialogue: For this amount, I can tell you this...
trans: 对于这个数额，我可以告诉你这个......

Original: Seymour:No! I need details!
Dialogue: No! I need details!
trans: 不！

Original: Seymour:Argh! He's gone...
Dialogue: Argh! He's gone...
trans: 啊！

Original: ???:Graaagh! Where in the world am I!?
Dialogue: Graaagh! Where in the world am I!?
trans: Graaagh！

Original: Vivi:Zidane, that voice. Is that?
Dialogue: Zidane, that voice. Is that—?
trans: 齐达内，那个声音。

Original: Zidane:Yeah, no doubt about it.
Dialogue: Yeah, no doubt about it.
trans: 是的，毫无疑问。

Original: Vivi:We were right! Steiner, I'm so happy to see you again!
Dialogue: We were right! Steiner, I'm so happy to see you again!
trans: 我们是对的！

Original: Steiner:M-Master Vivi!? And if it isn't the monkey Zidane as well!
Dialogue: M-Master Vivi!? And if it isn't the monkey Zidane as well!
trans: M、薇薇少爷！？

Original: Steiner:I am very fortunate to have run into you here! I somehow got lost in this forest, and I cannot find my way out!
Dialogue: I am very fortunate to have run into you here! I somehow got lost in this forest, and I cannot find my way out!
trans: 很幸运能在这里遇到你！

Original: Steiner:...Forgive me for asking, but who might this be?
Dialogue: ...Forgive me for asking, but who might this be?
trans: ......请原谅我问，但这可能是谁？

Original: Zidane:You mean Mog? We ran into a little trouble, and well, long story short, we're traveling together now.
Dialogue: You mean Mog? We ran into a little trouble, and well, long story short, we're traveling together now.
trans: 你是说莫哥？

Original: Mog:Nice to meet you, kupo.
Dialogue: Nice to meet you, kupo.
trans: 很高兴认识你，库波。

Original: Steiner:What do you mean "ran into a little trouble"? Don't tell me you're up to no good again, you scoundrel!
Dialogue: What do you mean "ran into a little trouble"? Don't tell me you're up to no good again, you scoundrel!
trans: “遇到一点麻烦”是什么意思？

Original: Zidane:You never change, do you, Rusty?
Dialogue: You never change, do you, Rusty?
trans: 你永远不会改变，是吗，Rusty？

Original: Steiner:Enough of your nonsense. We have more important things to discuss right now!
Dialogue: Enough of your nonsense. We have more important things to discuss right now!
trans: 你的废话够多了。

Original: Steiner:Kind traveler, could you by any chance enlighten me on how to get out of this forest?
Dialogue: Kind traveler, could you by any chance enlighten me on how to get out of this forest?
trans: 好心的旅行者，你能不能告诉我如何离开这片森林？

Original: Mog:Of course, kupo! First, go straight down this path until
Dialogue: Of course, kupo! First, go straight down this path until—
trans: 当然，库波！

Original: Steiner:Straight, you say? Thank you, kind stranger!
Dialogue: Straight, you say? Thank you, kind stranger!
trans: 你说直？

Original: Mog:I wasn't even halfway done explaining, kupo...
Dialogue: I wasn't even halfway done explaining, kupo...
trans: 我什至没有解释一半，kupo ...

Original: Vivi:Steiner's not here either. Where could he have gone?
Dialogue: Steiner's not here either. Where could he have gone?
trans: 斯坦纳也不在这里。

Original: Zidane:Ugh, that rusty hunk of metal sure nows how to be a pain. Going off on his own like that.
Dialogue: Ugh, that rusty hunk of metal sure nows how to be a pain. Going off on his own like that.
trans: 呃，那块生锈的金属现在肯定很痛苦。

Original: Warrior of Light:Ventured alone, these woods may prove to be dangerous even for a knight of his caliber.
Dialogue: Ventured alone, these woods may prove to be dangerous even for a knight of his caliber.
trans: 独自冒险，这些树林即使对他这样的骑士来说也可能是危险的。

Original: Mog:I really hope he's okay, kupo.
Dialogue: I really hope he's okay, kupo.
trans: 我真的希望他没事，库波。

Original: Steiner:Aaargh! How dare you! Have you no manners!?
Dialogue: Aaargh! How dare you! Have you no manners!?
trans: 啊！

Original: Vivi:Did you hear that!?
Dialogue: Did you hear that!?
trans: 你听到了吗！？

Original: Zidane:Yeah, that's him all right! Let's do this!
Dialogue: Yeah, that's him all right! Let's do this!
trans: 没错，就是他！

Original: Mog:Move out, kupo!
Dialogue: Move out, kupo!
trans: 滚出去，库波！

Original: Steiner:Th-thank you. You have my gratitude.
Dialogue: Th-thank you. You have my gratitude.
trans: 谢谢你。

Original: Zidane:You're lucky we found you in time.
Dialogue: You're lucky we found you in time.
trans: 你很幸运我们及时找到了你。

Original: Vivi:I'm so glad you're all right!
Dialogue: I'm so glad you're all right!
trans: 我很高兴你没事！

Original: Steiner:It seems you are rather used to fighting powerful monsters such as those. But why?
Dialogue: It seems you are rather used to fighting powerful monsters such as those. But why?
trans: 看来你已经习惯了和那些强大的魔物战斗了。

Original: Cecil:Our mission is to seal the dimensional Torsions which serve as their gateway to this world.
Dialogue: Our mission is to seal the dimensional Torsions which serve as their gateway to this world.
trans: 我们的任务是封印作为他们通往这个世界的门户的次元扭曲。

Original: Mog:And we can't afford to mess this up, so we've gotta get even stronger, kupo!
Dialogue: And we can't afford to mess this up, so we've gotta get even stronger, kupo!
trans: 我们不能把这件事搞砸，所以我们必须变得更强大，kupo！

Original: Cecil:It is a battle to protect not only this world, but those we care about as well.
Dialogue: It is a battle to protect not only this world, but those we care about as well.
trans: 这是一场不仅要保护这个世界，还要保护我们所关心的人的战斗。

Original: Steiner:To use your sword to protect those close to you...
Dialogue: To use your sword to protect those close to you...
trans: 用你的剑来保护你身边的人......

Original: Steiner:That is the spirit of chivalry itself! Your words have brought a tear to my eye.
Dialogue: That is the spirit of chivalry itself! Your words have brought a tear to my eye.
trans: 那就是骑士精神本身！

Original: Steiner:Although I am but a humble knight, I wish to fight by your side to return peace to the land!
Dialogue: Although I am but a humble knight, I wish to fight by your side to return peace to the land!
trans: 虽然我只是一个卑微的骑士，但我愿与你并肩作战，还天下太平！

Original: Vivi:Is it okay if he comes with us?
Dialogue: Is it okay if he comes with us?
trans: 他和我们一起去可以吗？

Original: Mog:Of course! The light in his heart is almost blinding. He's just the kind of friend we need, kupo!
Dialogue: Of course! The light in his heart is almost blinding. He's just the kind of friend we need, kupo!
trans: 当然！

Original: Steiner:You have my sword.
Dialogue: You have my sword.
trans: 你有我的剑。

Original: Steiner:As a knight of Alexandria, I vow to protect this world!
Dialogue: As a knight of Alexandria, I vow to protect this world!
trans: 作为亚历山大的骑士，我发誓要保护这个世界！
