Original: Mog:Yay! Welcome aboard, kupo!
Dialogue: Yay! Welcome aboard, kupo!
trans: 耶！

Original: Hope:We've been having to battle more and more manikins lately.
Dialogue: We've been having to battle more and more manikins lately.
trans: 我们最近不得不与越来越多的人体模型作斗争。

Original: King:While the influx of monsters can be explained by the Torsions pulling more beasts from different worlds...
Dialogue: While the influx of monsters can be explained by the Torsions pulling more beasts from different worlds...
trans: 虽然怪物的涌入可以用扭曲从不同的世界拉出更多的野兽来解释......

Original: King:That doesn't explain where all these manikins are coming from or why they look like us.
Dialogue: That doesn't explain where all these manikins are coming from or why they look like us.
trans: 这并不能解释所有这些人体模型是从哪里来的，也不能解释为什么它们看起来像我们。

Original: Onion Knight:According to Mog, this world is the gods' creation.
Dialogue: According to Mog, this world is the gods' creation.
trans: 按照莫格的说法，这个世界是众神的创造。

Original: Mog:That's right, kupo! And it is the gods that asked me to gather you guys to combat the threat we currently face!
Dialogue: That's right, kupo! And it is the gods that asked me to gather you guys to combat the threat we currently face!
trans: 没错，库波！

Original: Vaan:You said that they built this place using our own worlds as reference, right?
Dialogue: You said that they built this place using our own worlds as reference, right?
trans: 你说他们建造这个地方是参照我们自己的世界对吧？

Original: Onion Knight:If this place was inspired by where we're from...
Dialogue: If this place was inspired by where we're from...
trans: 如果这个地方的灵感来自于我们来自哪里……

Original: Onion Knight:Then maybe these manikins were inspired by us.
Dialogue: Then maybe these manikins were inspired by us.
trans: 那么也许这些人体模型是受到了我们的启发。

Original: Vaan:You're implying they've been made by the gods!?
Dialogue: You're implying they've been made by the gods!?
trans: 你是在暗示它们是神造的！？

Original: Mog:You're not exactly wrong, kupo...
Dialogue: You're not exactly wrong, kupo...
trans: 你并没有完全错，库波...

Original: King:What do you mean!?
Dialogue: What do you mean!?
trans: 你是什​​么意思！？

Original: Mog:This world was created by more than one god, kupo.
Dialogue: This world was created by more than one god, kupo.
trans: 这个世界是由不止一位神，库波创造的。

Original: Mog:Mistress Materiathe god I serveis doing her very best to close the Torsions and keep this world safe.
Dialogue: Mistress Materia—the god I serve—is doing her very best to close the Torsions and keep this world safe.
trans: Materia 女主人——我所侍奉的神——正在竭尽全力关闭 Torsions 并保护这个世界的安全。

Original: Onion Knight:And this other god is not?
Dialogue: And this other god is not?
trans: 而这个其他的神不是吗？

Original: Mog:I don't know the details, but even if I did, it's not a subject I can discuss lightly, kupo!
Dialogue: I don't know the details, but even if I did, it's not a subject I can discuss lightly, kupo!
trans: 细节我不知道，但就算知道了，也不是我可以随便讨论的话题，库珀！

Original: Mog:That said, I will tell you what little I do know, kupo.
Dialogue: That said, I will tell you what little I do know, kupo.
trans: 也就是说，我会告诉你我所知道的一点点，kupo。

Original: Vaan:Hey, Mog, can we talk about this god you mentionedthe one you aren't helping?
Dialogue: Hey, Mog, can we talk about this god you mentioned—the one you aren't helping?
trans: 嘿，莫格，我们能谈谈你提到的这位神——你没有帮助的那个吗？

Original: Hope:The god who uses people as puppets... Just the thought gives me shivers.
Dialogue: The god who uses people as puppets... Just the thought gives me shivers.
trans: 以人为傀儡的神……光是想想就让人不寒而栗。

Original: Mog:While Mistress Materia values free will greatly, kupo...
Dialogue: While Mistress Materia values free will greatly, kupo...
trans: 虽然 Mistress Materia 非常重视自由意志，但 kupo...

Original: Mog:There are other gods who aren't nearly as nice.
Dialogue: There are other gods who aren't nearly as nice.
trans: 还有其他的神没有那么好。

Original: Y'shtola:Tell us more.
Dialogue: Tell us more.
trans: 请告诉我们更多。

Original: Terra:I want to know why we were brought here to fight.
Dialogue: I want to know why we were brought here to fight.
trans: 我想知道为什么我们被带到这里来战斗。

Original: Mog:As you already know, Mistress Materia has gathered youwarriors with the lightto help close the Torsions, kupo.
Dialogue: As you already know, Mistress Materia has gathered you—warriors with the light—to help close the Torsions, kupo.
trans: 正如你已经知道的，Materia 女士召集了你们——光之战士——来帮助关闭 Torsions，kupo。

Original: Mog:She needs the swords of the righteous to protect this world, kupo.
Dialogue: She needs the swords of the righteous to protect this world, kupo.
trans: 她需要正义之剑来保护这个世界，库波。

Original: Vaan:And this other god doesn't feel the same way?
Dialogue: And this other god doesn't feel the same way?
trans: 而这位别神可不这么觉得？

Original: Mog:His name is Master Spiritus, kupo.
Dialogue: His name is Master Spiritus, kupo.
trans: 他的名字是元神，库波。

Original: Mog:He doesn't care who or what he uses, so long as he gets his way.
Dialogue: He doesn't care who or what he uses, so long as he gets his way.
trans: 他不在乎他使用谁或什么，只要他能如愿以偿。

Original: Y'shtola:Not unlike Kuja or Kefka.
Dialogue: Not unlike Kuja or Kefka.
trans: 与 Kuja 或 Kefka 不同。

Original: Mog:If he wanted to, he could even bend the two of them to his own will, kupo!
Dialogue: If he wanted to, he could even bend the two of them to his own will, kupo!
trans: 如果他愿意，他甚至可以将他们两个屈服于他的意志，库珀！

Original: Terra:That's horrible! If he takes control of Kefka, this place will end up like my world...
Dialogue: That's horrible! If he takes control of Kefka, this place will end up like my world...
trans: 那太糟了！

Original: Mog:I don't want any of you to become pawns to Master Spiritus.
Dialogue: I don't want any of you to become pawns to Master Spiritus.
trans: 我不想让你们中的任何人成为 Spiritus 大师的棋子。

Original: Hope:Neither do I... I've had enough of that.
Dialogue: Neither do I... I've had enough of that.
trans: 我也不……我受够了。

Original: Vaan:Yeah! I don't need some external force deciding my fate for me!
Dialogue: Yeah! I don't need some external force deciding my fate for me!
trans: 是的！

Original: Mog:We're not going to let it happen, kupo!
Dialogue: We're not going to let it happen, kupo!
trans: 我们不会让它发生的，库波！

Original: ???:Terra. There you are.
Dialogue: Terra. There you are.
trans: 泰拉。

Original: Sazh:You know him? Are the two of you from the same world or something?
Dialogue: You know him? Are the two of you from the same world or something?
trans: 你认识他吗？

Original: Terra:Yeah. We're friends. In fact, we used to fight together.
Dialogue: Yeah. We're friends. In fact, we used to fight together.
trans: 是的。

Original: Shadow:Friends? My allegiance belongs only to those willing to match my price.
Dialogue: Friends? My allegiance belongs only to those willing to match my price.
trans: 朋友们？

Original: Yuffie:Willing to match your price? I like the sound of that! Haha! This guy's just like me!
Dialogue: Willing to match your price? I like the sound of that! Haha! This guy's just like me!
trans: 愿意配合你的价格吗？

Original: Edge:Good lord, Yuffiedon't insult him.
Dialogue: Good lord, Yuffie—don't insult him.
trans: 天啊，尤菲——别侮辱他。

Original: Yuffie:What's that supposed to mean!? I'm a ninja, too, you know!
Dialogue: What's that supposed to mean!? I'm a ninja, too, you know!
trans: 那是什么意思！？

Original: Terra:So Shadow, what brings you here?
Dialogue: So Shadow, what brings you here?
trans: 影子，是什么把你带到这里来的？

Original: Shadow:I have been contracted by someone who bore witness to you attacking people under Kefka's influence.
Dialogue: I have been contracted by someone who bore witness to you attacking people under Kefka's influence.
trans: 我被一个见证了你攻击受凯夫卡影响的人的人所契约。

Original: Shadow:I was sent to remove the spell put on you and make sure that you were unharmed...
Dialogue: I was sent to remove the spell put on you and make sure that you were unharmed...
trans: 我被派去解除加在你身上的咒语，确保你安然无恙……

Original: Sazh:Only your job's already done, thanks to us.
Dialogue: Only your job's already done, thanks to us.
trans: 多亏了我们，您的工作才算完成。

Original: Shadow:Exactly. Now I must report back to my client. I shall take my leave here.
Dialogue: Exactly. Now I must report back to my client. I shall take my leave here.
trans: 确切地。

Original: Terra:Wait! Why don't you join us?
Dialogue: Wait! Why don't you join us?
trans: 等待！

Original: Shadow:Only if it is my client's wish that I do.
Dialogue: Only if it is my client's wish that I do.
trans: 只有当我的客户希望我这样做时。

Original: Yuffie:Man, this guy's sooo cool! One day I'm going to be as cool as him!
Dialogue: Man, this guy's sooo cool! One day I'm going to be as cool as him!
trans: 伙计，这家伙太酷了！

Original: Shadow:...For the sake of the alliance we once shared, before I go I'll tell you this.
Dialogue: ...For the sake of the alliance we once shared, before I go I'll tell you this.
trans: ……为了我们曾经的同盟，在我走之前我会告诉你这个。

Original: Shadow:Just beyond here, I ran into a man with blue hair and long robes...
Dialogue: Just beyond here, I ran into a man with blue hair and long robes...
trans: 就在这边，我遇到了一个蓝色头发和长袍的男人……

Original: Shadow:Robes similar to what that girl there is wearing.
Dialogue: Robes similar to what that girl there is wearing.
trans: 长袍和那个女孩穿的很相似。

Original: Yuna:Maester Seymour...
Dialogue: Maester Seymour...
trans: 西摩学士...

Original: Shadow:He was also possessed by the reaper.
Dialogue: He was also possessed by the reaper.
trans: 他也被收割者附身了。

Original: Edge:What does that mean!?
Dialogue: What does that mean!?
trans: 这意味着什么！？

Original: Shadow:I wouldn't know how. It's just a hunch. Nothing more.
Dialogue: I wouldn't know how. It's just a hunch. Nothing more.
trans: 我不知道怎么办。

Original: Shadow:To obey the gods or to defy them... Which is the road to happiness?
Dialogue: To obey the gods or to defy them... Which is the road to happiness?
trans: 服从神灵还是反抗神灵……哪条是通往幸福的道路？

Original: Seymour:Lady Yuna, we meet again.
Dialogue: Lady Yuna, we meet again.
trans: 尤娜大人，我们又见面了。

Original: Yuna:Maester Seymour!
Dialogue: Maester Seymour!
trans: 西摩学士！

Original: Seymour:Ah... So he sought you out, did he?
Dialogue: Ah... So he sought you out, did he?
trans: 啊……所以他找到你了，是吗？

Original: Seymour:Then you are now aware of the true reason why we are here.
Dialogue: Then you are now aware of the true reason why we are here.
trans: 那么你现在知道我们在这里的真正原因了。

Original: Zidane:No. He barely told us anything.
Dialogue: No. He barely told us anything.
trans: 不，他几乎没有告诉我们任何事情。

Original: Zidane:Do you know something we don't!?
Dialogue: Do you know something we don't!?
trans: 你知道我们不知道的事情吗！？

Original: Seymour:You follow this moogle, risking your lives for a god you know nothing about and don't give a second thought as to why you do it.
Dialogue: You follow this moogle, risking your lives for a god you know nothing about and don't give a second thought as to why you do it.
trans: 你跟随这个 moogle，为一个你一无所知的神冒着生命危险，并且不会再考虑你为什么这样做。

Original: Seymour:What a pathetic bunch you are.
Dialogue: What a pathetic bunch you are.
trans: 你们真是一群可悲的人。

Original: Warrior of Light:What are you talking about?
Dialogue: What are you talking about?
trans: 你在说什么？

Original: Seymour:Have a look for yourselvesmaybe then you will finally understand the truth.
Dialogue: Have a look for yourselves—maybe then you will finally understand the truth.
trans: 你们自己看看吧，也许到时候你们就会明白真相了。

Original: Yuna:So it's true!?
Dialogue: So it's true!?
trans: 所以这是真的！？

Original: Onion Knight:Yuna, is this man somehow connected to you being able to meet the dead?
Dialogue: Yuna, is this man somehow connected to you being able to meet the dead?
trans: 尤娜，这个男人和你能见到死人有什么联系吗？

Original: Yuna:Yes, but...
Dialogue: Yes, but...
trans: 对，但是...

Original: Seymour:That I, a dead man, should be brought to this world against my will and used as a pawn in their schemes...
Dialogue: That I, a dead man, should be brought to this world against my will and used as a pawn in their schemes...
trans: 我，一个死人，违背我的意愿被带到这个世界上，并被用作他们计划中的棋子......

Original: Seymour:I resent them. I resent these selfish beings you call gods.
Dialogue: I resent them. I resent these selfish beings you call gods.
trans: 我讨厌他们。

Original: Seymour:To think that you would fight for themyou're all fools!
Dialogue: To think that you would fight for them—you're all fools!
trans: 以为你们会为他们而战——你们都是傻子！

Original: Zidane:You're assuming a lot there, buddy! We're not just fighting for the gods!
Dialogue: You're assuming a lot there, buddy! We're not just fighting for the gods!
trans: 你在那里假设了很多，伙计！

Original: Warrior of Light:We fight because that is what we wish to do. We are pawns to no one.
Dialogue: We fight because that is what we wish to do. We are pawns to no one.
trans: 我们战斗，因为那是我们想要做的。

Original: Seymour:Does your foolishness have no end, you pitiful creatures? It seems I have no choiceit falls to me to save you.
Dialogue: Does your foolishness have no end, you pitiful creatures? It seems I have no choice—it falls to me to save you.
trans: 难道你们的愚蠢没有尽头吗，你们这些可怜的生物？

Original: Seymour:Don't you worrydeath should be enough to liberate you!
Dialogue: Don't you worry—death should be enough to liberate you!
trans: 别担心——死亡应该足以让你解脱！

Original: Mog:Watch out, kupo!
Dialogue: Watch out, kupo!
trans: 小心，大衣！

Original: Yuna:Maester Seymour, please stop this!
Dialogue: Maester Seymour, please stop this!
trans: 西摩学士，请停止！

Original: Seymour:You are a tough lottenaciously clinging to this meaningless existence you call life.
Dialogue: You are a tough lot—tenaciously clinging to this meaningless existence you call life.
trans: 你是一个坚强的人——顽固地执着于你称之为生活的这种毫无意义的存在。

Original: Vivi:Our lives have so much more meaning than you will ever know!
Dialogue: Our lives have so much more meaning than you will ever know!
trans: 我们的生活比您所知道的要有意义得多！

Original: Seymour:You give me no choice but to use this. Welcome it, my friends, and die without regret!
Dialogue: You give me no choice but to use this. Welcome it, my friends, and die without regret!
trans: 你让我别无选择，只能使用它。

Original: Cecil:Manikins! We cannot allow them to flank us!
Dialogue: Manikins! We cannot allow them to flank us!
trans: 人体模型！

Original: Shadow:Don't worry. I've got your back.
Dialogue: Don't worry. I've got your back.
trans: 不用担心。

Original: Yuna:Shadow, is what you told Maester Seymour true?
Dialogue: Shadow, is what you told Maester Seymour true?
trans: 影子，你对西摩学士说的话是真的吗？

Original: Shadow:Think about it. All of us were transported here by the gods' willnot of our own volition.
Dialogue: Think about it. All of us were transported here by the gods' will—not of our own volition.
trans: 想想看。

Original: Shadow:Though, whether or not you view that as a bad thing depends on who you are.
Dialogue: Though, whether or not you view that as a bad thing depends on who you are.
trans: 不过，你是否认为这是一件坏事取决于你是谁。

Original: Cecil:What about you? The individual you're contracted toare they somehow in contact with the gods?
Dialogue: What about you? The individual you're contracted to—are they somehow in contact with the gods?
trans: 你呢？

Original: Shadow:I cannot tell you that. I will say, however, that they have nothing to do with your moogle friend there.
Dialogue: I cannot tell you that. I will say, however, that they have nothing to do with your moogle friend there.
trans: 我不能告诉你。

Original: Mog:Kupo! So there's another group of warriors out there banding together?
Dialogue: Kupo! So there's another group of warriors out there banding together?
trans: 库波！

Original: Seymour:Now do you finally see? The only way for you to be saved is to accept the salvation I extend to you.
Dialogue: Now do you finally see? The only way for you to be saved is to accept the salvation I extend to you.
trans: 现在你终于明白了吗？

Original: Shadow:To defeat him and persevere or give up and die here... Which will it be?
Dialogue: To defeat him and persevere or give up and die here... Which will it be?
trans: 是打败他坚持下去，还是放弃死在这里…… 会是哪个？

Original: Vivi:I will never give up! I will never ever give up on something as precious as life!
Dialogue: I will never give up! I will never ever give up on something as precious as life!
trans: 我绝不会放弃！

Original: Yuna:It is as Vivi says. We will not give up. We must do whatever it takes to save this world.
Dialogue: It is as Vivi says. We will not give up. We must do whatever it takes to save this world.
trans: 正如薇薇所说。

Original: Yuna:And even though you are very dear to me, if you try and stand in our way, I will be forced to put you down!
Dialogue: And even though you are very dear to me, if you try and stand in our way, I will be forced to put you down!
trans: 即使你对我很重要，但如果你试图阻止我们，我将不得不让你失望！

Original: Seymour:Very well. Give it your best shot!
Dialogue: Very well. Give it your best shot!
trans: 很好。

Original: Terra:We've managed to weaken him, but I don't know how we're supposed to kill the dead...
Dialogue: We've managed to weaken him, but I don't know how we're supposed to kill the dead...
trans: 我们设法削弱了他，但我不知道我们应该如何杀死死者......

Original: Yuna:In our world, we have a ritual known as "the sending." We use it to send the dead to the Farplane. I shall perform it right now.
Dialogue: In our world, we have a ritual known as "the sending." We use it to send the dead to the Farplane. I shall perform it right now.
trans: 在我们的世界中，我们有一种称为“发送”的仪式。

Original: Seymour:You...will be sending me...?
Dialogue: You...will be sending me...?
trans: 你……要派我……？

Original: Firion:He escaped!
Dialogue: He escaped!
trans: 他逃走了！

Original: Shadow:If I had to guess, I'd say he was saved. Seems the gods still have use for him.
Dialogue: If I had to guess, I'd say he was saved. Seems the gods still have use for him.
trans: 如果非要我猜的话，我会说他得救了。

Original: Shadow:How ironic.
Dialogue: How ironic.
trans: 多么讽刺。

Original: Terra:Shadow, why did you help us?
Dialogue: Shadow, why did you help us?
trans: 影子，你为什么要帮我们？

Original: Terra:You said yourself your contractor's not in any way affiliated with Mog.
Dialogue: You said yourself your contractor's not in any way affiliated with Mog.
trans: 你自己说你的承包商与 Mog 没有任何关系。

Original: Shadow:But I also never said my client was unsympathetic to your moogle's cause.
Dialogue: But I also never said my client was unsympathetic to your moogle's cause.
trans: 但我也从没说过我的委托人对你的莫古利事业没有同情心。

Original: Yuna:Then, will you agree to come with us and tell us what you know?
Dialogue: Then, will you agree to come with us and tell us what you know?
trans: 那么，你愿意和我们一起来，告诉我们你所知道的吗？

Original: Yuna:We need to learn as much as we can about this world and what it is we must do here...
Dialogue: We need to learn as much as we can about this world and what it is we must do here...
trans: 我们需要尽可能多地了解这个世界以及我们必须在这里做什么......

Original: Firion:I would also ask that you come with us. I'm afraid it is very difficult for me to explain things alone.
Dialogue: I would also ask that you come with us. I'm afraid it is very difficult for me to explain things alone.
trans: 我也想请你和我们一起去。

Original: Mog:Kupo?
Dialogue: Kupo?
trans: 外套？

Original: Shadow:Very well, but first I must report back to my client.
Dialogue: Very well, but first I must report back to my client.
trans: 很好，但首先我必须向我的客户汇报。

Original: Firion:Excellent! Now that that's settled, Mog, why don't you lead us to where we need to go next?
Dialogue: Excellent! Now that that's settled, Mog, why don't you lead us to where we need to go next?
trans: 出色的！

Original: Mog:Okay, kupo!
Dialogue: Okay, kupo!
trans: 好的，外套！

Original: Shadow:You're our guide, huh? Where will you be taking us?
Dialogue: You're our guide, huh? Where will you be taking us?
trans: 你是我们的向导，对吧？

Original: Mog:To peace, kupo!
Dialogue: To peace, kupo!
trans: 为了和平，库波！

Original: Mog:Sorry to keep you waiting, kupo!
Dialogue: Sorry to keep you waiting, kupo!
trans: 对不起，让你久等了，库波！

Original: Spiritus:About time.
Dialogue: About time.
trans: 关于时间。

Original: Mog:Were you the one who saved Seymour back there, kupo?
Dialogue: Were you the one who saved Seymour back there, kupo?
trans: 库珀，是你救了西摩吗？

Original: Spiritus:He still has some use.
Dialogue: He still has some use.
trans: 他还有点用。

Original: Spiritus:Besides, I couldn't let him fall into the hands of Materia's warriors.
Dialogue: Besides, I couldn't let him fall into the hands of Materia's warriors.
trans: 再说了，也不能让他落入魔石武士的手中。

Original: Mog:Wise decision, my lord!
Dialogue: Wise decision, my lord!
trans: 明智的决定，我的主！

Original: Mog:Pretty words aren't going to save the world from destruction, kupo.
Dialogue: Pretty words aren't going to save the world from destruction, kupo.
trans: 花言巧语无法拯救世界免于毁灭，库波。

Original: Mog:You should do whatever you can to succeed!
Dialogue: You should do whatever you can to succeed!
trans: 你应该尽你所能去成功！

Original: Spiritus:Don't think you're fooling me, moogle. I still don't trust you.
Dialogue: Don't think you're fooling me, moogle. I still don't trust you.
trans: 莫古利，别以为你在愚弄我。

Original: Spiritus:You may not agree with my methods but know that I'm only doing what's necessary to fulfill my duty as a god.
Dialogue: You may not agree with my methods but know that I'm only doing what's necessary to fulfill my duty as a god.
trans: 你可能不认同我的做法，但你知道我只是在尽我作为神的职责所必需的。

Original: Mog:I know, kupo.
Dialogue: I know, kupo.
trans: 我知道，库波。

Original: Spiritus:You will encounter many others as you continue your journey.
Dialogue: You will encounter many others as you continue your journey.
trans: 当您继续您的旅程时，您会遇到许多其他人。

Original: Spiritus:Use these opportunities to your advantage.
Dialogue: Use these opportunities to your advantage.
trans: 利用这些机会为您带来优势。

Original: Mog:I will, kupo!
Dialogue: I will, kupo!
trans: 我会的，笨蛋！

Original: Spiritus:Materia, you fool.
Dialogue: Materia, you fool.
trans: 魔石，你这个傻瓜。

Original: Spiritus:This world belongs to me now.
Dialogue: This world belongs to me now.
trans: 这个世界现在属于我了。

Original: Mog:I'm sorry for taking so long, kupo!
Dialogue: I'm sorry for taking so long, kupo!
trans: 抱歉拖了这么久，库波！

Original: Materia:I was waiting for you. What have you learned?
Dialogue: I was waiting for you. What have you learned?
trans: 我在等你。

Original: Mog:There are still many warriors somewhere out there fighting! We also made some new friends, kupo.
Dialogue: There are still many warriors somewhere out there fighting! We also made some new friends, kupo.
trans: 那里还有很多战士在战斗！

Original: Materia:And they, too, bear the light.
Dialogue: And they, too, bear the light.
trans: 他们也承受着光明。

Original: Mog:Yes, Shadow and Firion are really strong, kupo.
Dialogue: Yes, Shadow and Firion are really strong, kupo.
trans: 是的，Shadow 和 Firion 真的很强，kupo。

Original: Mog:But right when we had Seymour cornered...
Dialogue: But right when we had Seymour cornered...
trans: 但就在我们让西摩走投无路的时候...

Original: Materia:Spiritus saved him. So he intends to continue gathering wicked men to use for his own ends?
Dialogue: Spiritus saved him. So he intends to continue gathering wicked men to use for his own ends?
trans: 斯皮里图斯救了他。

Original: Mog:There's no denying that Seymour and Kefka are powerful, kupo.
Dialogue: There's no denying that Seymour and Kefka are powerful, kupo.
trans: 不可否认，Seymour 和 Kefka 很强大，kupo。

Original: Materia:However, when you think about what they did back in their own world...
Dialogue: However, when you think about what they did back in their own world...
trans: 然而，当你想到他们在自己的世界里所做的事情时......

Original: Materia:The situation is dire.
Dialogue: The situation is dire.
trans: 形势严峻。

Original: Materia:If only we could somehow seal their sinister desires and have them join our forces.
Dialogue: If only we could somehow seal their sinister desires and have them join our forces.
trans: 如果我们能以某种方式封印他们险恶的欲望并让他们加入我们的部队就好了。

Original: Mog:Then you should use my powers, kupo!
Dialogue: Then you should use my powers, kupo!
trans: 那么你应该使用我的力量，kupo！

Original: Mog:With your divine assistance, I can summon any willing warrior from their world.
Dialogue: With your divine assistance, I can summon any willing warrior from their world.
trans: 在你神圣的帮助下，我可以从他们的世界召唤任何愿意的战士。

Original: Materia:Are you saying you can persuade them to join us?
Dialogue: Are you saying you can persuade them to join us?
trans: 你是说你能说服他们加入我们吗？

Original: Mog:Yes! Just leave it to me, kupo!
Dialogue: Yes! Just leave it to me, kupo!
trans: 是的！

Original: Materia:Very well. I shall grant you the power you seek.
Dialogue: Very well. I shall grant you the power you seek.
trans: 很好。

Original: Materia:I will trust you to guide my warriors to the right path.
Dialogue: I will trust you to guide my warriors to the right path.
trans: 我相信你会指引我的战士们走上正确的道路。

Original: Mog:You can count on me, kupo!
Dialogue: You can count on me, kupo!
trans: 你可以指望我，库波！

Original: Mog:The next Torsion is here in the Domina Wastelands, kupo!
Dialogue: The next Torsion is here in the Domina Wastelands, kupo!
trans: 下一个 Torsion 就在 Domina Wastelands，kupo！

Original: Laguna:Can it get any hotter? I'm soaked.
Dialogue: Can it get any hotter? I'm soaked.
trans: 它能再热一点吗？

Original: Laguna:You must be boiling in that armor.
Dialogue: You must be boiling in that armor.
trans: 你一定穿着那件盔甲沸腾了。

Original: Warrior of Light:I'm fine.
Dialogue: I'm fine.
trans: 我很好。

Original: Bartz:Yeah, I feel like I've been here before, too.
Dialogue: Yeah, I feel like I've been here before, too.
trans: 是的，我觉得我以前也来过这里。

Original: Mog:That's because the goddess Materia created this world based on all of yours.
Dialogue: That's because the goddess Materia created this world based on all of yours.
trans: 那是因为女神Materia根据你的一切创造了这个世界。

Original: Mog:So it's no wonder it feels familiar, kupo!
Dialogue: So it's no wonder it feels familiar, kupo!
trans: 所以难怪有种熟悉的感觉，kupo！

Original: Vaan:Anyway, we can't use the airship because of the Torsion, right? Wonderful.
Dialogue: Anyway, we can't use the airship because of the Torsion, right? Wonderful.
trans: 无论如何，因为扭力我们不能使用飞艇，对吧？

Original: Warrior of Light:Darkness is devouring this world.
Dialogue: Darkness is devouring this world.
trans: 黑暗正在吞噬这个世界。

Original: Warrior of Light:We must hurry and seal the Torsions before it is too late.
Dialogue: We must hurry and seal the Torsions before it is too late.
trans: 我们必须抓紧时间，在为时已晚之前封印扭曲。

Original: Bartz:How do you suggest we do that? Remember, we can only close one at a time...
Dialogue: How do you suggest we do that? Remember, we can only close one at a time...
trans: 你建议我们怎么做？

Original: Mog:Slow and steady, kupo. We have to be careful.
Dialogue: Slow and steady, kupo. We have to be careful.
trans: 缓慢而稳定，kupo。

Original: Laguna:Hey, I just wanted to say I'm really glad you're here.
Dialogue: Hey, I just wanted to say I'm really glad you're here.
trans: 嘿，我只是想说我真的很高兴你在这里。

Original: Laguna:Wouldn't know what to do if I took a wrong turn and ran into one of the bad guys.
Dialogue: Wouldn't know what to do if I took a wrong turn and ran into one of the bad guys.
trans: 如果我转错了弯撞上其中一个坏人，我不知道该怎么办。

Original: Warrior of Light:Indeed. Now come, we must seal the Torsion.
Dialogue: Indeed. Now come, we must seal the Torsion.
trans: 的确。

Original: Yuna:That was Wakka's manikin. He was myguardianback inSpiraour world.
Dialogue: That was Wakka's manikin. He was my guardian back in Spira—our world.
trans: 那是瓦卡的人体模型。

Original: Yuffie:What's a guardian?
Dialogue: What's a guardian?
trans: 什么是监护人？

Original: Yuna:As you know, I'm asummoneron apilgrimageto afabled landto save my planet.
Dialogue: As you know, I'm a summoner on a pilgrimage to a fabled land to save my planet.
trans: 如你所知，我是一名召唤师，正前往传说中的土地朝圣，以拯救我的星球。

Original: Yuna:We summoners must overcome many trials during our journey, so we travel with guardians to protect us.
Dialogue: We summoners must overcome many trials during our journey, so we travel with guardians to protect us.
trans: 我们召唤师在旅途中要克服许多考验，所以我们带着守护者一起旅行以保护我们。

Original: Cloud:Bodyguards, huh? I've had some experience in the field, but it's probably nothing compared to this Wakka guy.
Dialogue: Bodyguards, huh? I've had some experience in the field, but it's probably nothing compared to this Wakka guy.
trans: 保镖是吧？

Original: Steiner:Sworn to serve and protect Miss Yunahe is a knight in all but name!
Dialogue: Sworn to serve and protect Miss Yuna—he is a knight in all but name!
trans: 发誓要侍奉和保护尤娜小姐——他是名副其实的骑士！

Original: Yuna:I wouldn't go that far.
Dialogue: I wouldn't go that far.
trans: 我不会走那么远。

Original: Sazh:Just can't imagine what you're going through. When I was your age, stuff like that was the last thing on my mind.
Dialogue: Just can't imagine what you're going through. When I was your age, stuff like that was the last thing on my mind.
trans: 只是无法想象你正在经历什么。

Original: Yuffie:Yeah, seriously. If someone asked me to save the world, I'd tell them to shove it.
Dialogue: Yeah, seriously. If someone asked me to save the world, I'd tell them to shove it.
trans: 是的，认真的。

Original: Sazh:I'm sure you don't need to worry about anyone ever asking you for help.
Dialogue: I'm sure you don't need to worry about anyone ever asking you for help.
trans: 我相信您不必担心有人会向您求助。

Original: Mog:This Wakka person has the light, kupo! Come on, let's go look for him!
Dialogue: This Wakka person has the light, kupo! Come on, let's go look for him!
trans: 这个Wakka人有光，kupo！

Original: ???:Ugh... Just my luck.
Dialogue: Ugh... Just my luck.
trans: 呃...只是我的运气。

Original: ???:Never thought I'd die in the middle of the desert like this.
Dialogue: Never thought I'd die in the middle of the desert like this.
trans: 从来没有想过我会像这样死在沙漠中。

Original: Wakka:Ow...
Dialogue: Ow...
trans: 哎哟...

Original: Yuna:Are you okay!? Hold on, I'll heal you.
Dialogue: Are you okay!? Hold on, I'll heal you.
trans: 你还好吗！？

Original: Wakka:Whew, thanks! Glad I ran into ya!
Dialogue: Whew, thanks! Glad I ran into ya!
trans: 哇，谢谢！

Original: Mog:So you're Wakka? Nice to meet you, kupo!
Dialogue: So you're Wakka? Nice to meet you, kupo!
trans: 所以你是瓦卡？

Original: Wakka:Whoa! D-did that toy just talk!?
Dialogue: Whoa! D-did that toy just talk!?
trans: 哇！

Original: Mog:How rude, kupo! I'm quite real, I assure you!
Dialogue: How rude, kupo! I'm quite real, I assure you!
trans: 多么粗鲁，库波！

Original: Wakka:S-seriously? Guess I'm just not used to seeing real moogles.
Dialogue: S-seriously? Guess I'm just not used to seeing real moogles.
trans: 认真地？

Original: Warrior of Light:So this is the guardian you spoke of?
Dialogue: So this is the guardian you spoke of?
trans: 所以这就是你说的守护者？

Original: Cecil:I'm glad you're okay.
Dialogue: I'm glad you're okay.
trans: 你没事我就可以放心。

Original: Steiner:Master Wakka! I, too, am a knight. Please let me shake your hand!
Dialogue: Master Wakka! I, too, am a knight. Please let me shake your hand!
trans: 瓦卡老师！

Original: Wakka:Okay, I'm lost. Who are all these strangely-dressed people?
Dialogue: Okay, I'm lost. Who are all these strangely-dressed people?
trans: 好吧，我迷路了。

Original: Yuna:Wakka, there's something you need to know...
Dialogue: Wakka, there's something you need to know...
trans: Wakka，有些事情你需要知道...

Original: Wakka:So I was sucked into another dimension, ya?
Dialogue: So I was sucked into another dimension, ya?
trans: 所以我被吸进了另一个维度，是吗？

Original: Warrior of Light:I know it may be difficult to understand, but this is the reality of our situation.
Dialogue: I know it may be difficult to understand, but this is the reality of our situation.
trans: 我知道这可能很难理解，但这就是我们的现实情况。

Original: Wakka:All right, I've made up my mind. I'm comin' with you guys!
Dialogue: All right, I've made up my mind. I'm comin' with you guys!
trans: 好吧，我决定了。

Original: Mog:Kupo! I'm so glad you'll be joining us!
Dialogue: Kupo! I'm so glad you'll be joining us!
trans: 库波！

Original: Wakka:Hey, what would a summoner be without her guardian, ya?
Dialogue: Hey, what would a summoner be without her guardian, ya?
trans: 嘿，没有她的监护人，召唤师会怎样，是吗？

Original: Wakka:Yuna, you've got nothing to worry about now that I'm here.
Dialogue: Yuna, you've got nothing to worry about now that I'm here.
trans: 尤娜，有我在，你就不用担心了。

Original: Yuna:I'm here for you too, Wakka.
Dialogue: I'm here for you too, Wakka.
trans: 我也为你而来，Wakka。

Original: Zidane:Huh?
Dialogue: Huh?
trans: 嗯？

Original: Firion:What is it? Did you find shade!?
Dialogue: What is it? Did you find shade!?
trans: 它是什么？

Original: Zidane:Yeah, and that's not all. I think I just saw Aaand they're gone.
Dialogue: Yeah, and that's not all. I think I just saw— Aaand they're gone.
trans: 是的，这还不是全部。

Original: Tifa:Was someone there?
Dialogue: Was someone there?
trans: 那里有人吗？

Original: King:Whoever it was, they disappeared.
Dialogue: Whoever it was, they disappeared.
trans: 不管是谁，他们都消失了。

Original: Tifa:You think someone was spying on us?
Dialogue: You think someone was spying on us?
trans: 你认为有人在监视我们？

Original: Zidane:Nah, I got the sense that it was a cutie checkin' me out.
Dialogue: Nah, I got the sense that it was a cutie checkin' me out.
trans: 不，我觉得这是一个可爱的人来检查我。

Original: Zidane:I hope she's single.
Dialogue: I hope she's single.
trans: 我希望她是单身。

Original: Mog:A-anyway, let's move into the shade.
Dialogue: A-anyway, let's move into the shade.
trans: 总、总之，我们搬到阴凉处去吧。

Original: Mog:I need to cool off, kupo.
Dialogue: I need to cool off, kupo.
trans: 我需要冷静下来，库波。

Original: King:Good idea. We should rest while we have the chance.
Dialogue: Good idea. We should rest while we have the chance.
trans: 好主意。

Original: Firion:We can try to figure out who was watching us, too.
Dialogue: We can try to figure out who was watching us, too.
trans: 我们也可以试着弄清楚谁在监视我们。

Original: Tifa:Maybe we could even get them to join us if they're still around.
Dialogue: Maybe we could even get them to join us if they're still around.
trans: 如果他们还在，我们甚至可以让他们加入我们。

Original: Mog:Yeah! After all, we always have room for new friends.
Dialogue: Yeah! After all, we always have room for new friends.
trans: 是的！

Original: Mog:Into the forest we go, kupo!
Dialogue: Into the forest we go, kupo!
trans: 进入森林，库波！

Original: ???:Welcome and greetings to you alleven to you, flying furball.
Dialogue: Welcome and greetings to you all—even to you, flying furball.
trans: 欢迎和问候你们所有人——甚至是你们，会飞的毛球。

Original: Cecil:Who's there?
Dialogue: Who's there?
trans: 谁在那儿？

Original: Mog:I-I can't believe it, kupo!
Dialogue: I-I can't believe it, kupo!
trans: 我-我简直不敢相信，库波！

Original: Mog:Her light is so powerful! I-it's almost menacing, kupo!
Dialogue: Her light is so powerful! I-it's almost menacing, kupo!
trans: 她的光芒好强大！

Original: Shantotto:Let's hope that's a compliment, lest you come to woefor you stand before the elite, the black mage Shantotto.
Dialogue: Let's hope that's a compliment, lest you come to woe—for you stand before the elite, the black mage Shantotto.
trans: 让我们希望这是一种恭维，以免您遭遇不幸——因为您站在精英黑魔法师 Shantotto 面前。

Original: Terra:Is she really one of us?
Dialogue: Is she really one of us?
trans: 她真的是我们中的一员吗？

Original: Shadow:Yeah, a menacing light, you say? Sounds contradictory.
Dialogue: Yeah, a menacing light, you say? Sounds contradictory.
trans: 是的，你说是威胁性的光？

Original: Shantotto:I am but a humble professor of the magical arts. Soon, my utterly good nature shall dwell in your hearts.
Dialogue: I am but a humble professor of the magical arts. Soon, my utterly good nature shall dwell in your hearts.
trans: 我只是一个卑微的魔法教授。

Original: Mog:Would you be willing to use that magic to save the world, kupo?
Dialogue: Would you be willing to use that magic to save the world, kupo?
trans: 库波，你愿意用那个魔法来拯救世界吗？

Original: Mog:We're trying to
Dialogue: We're trying to—
trans: 我们正在努力——

Original: Shantotto:To eliminate the distortions. That is your quest.
Dialogue: To eliminate the distortions. That is your quest.
trans: 消除扭曲。

Original: Shantotto:And you want my help to search for the rest?
Dialogue: And you want my help to search for the rest?
trans: 你想要我帮忙寻找其余的吗？

Original: Terra:We can't force you to come with us, but we could really use your assistance.
Dialogue: We can't force you to come with us, but we could really use your assistance.
trans: 我们不能强迫你和我们一起去，但我们真的需要你的帮助。

Original: Shantotto:Oh, and I am sorry, but I follow a strict set of rules.
Dialogue: Oh, and I am sorry, but I follow a strict set of rules.
trans: 哦，对不起，但我遵守一套严格的规则。

Original: Shantotto:One of which is to never associate with blundering fools.
Dialogue: One of which is to never associate with blundering fools.
trans: 其中之一就是永远不要与浮躁的傻瓜交往。

Original: Cecil:Well, let us know if you ever change your mind.
Dialogue: Well, let us know if you ever change your mind.
trans: 好吧，如果您改变主意，请告诉我们。

Original: Shadow:Come find us if you ever wish to learn the truth of this world. You won't regret it.
Dialogue: Come find us if you ever wish to learn the truth of this world. You won't regret it.
trans: 如果您想了解这个世界的真相，请来找我们。

Original: Shantotto:I thank you for the guarantee.
Dialogue: I thank you for the guarantee.
trans: 我感谢你的保证。

Original: Shantotto:But I fear there is more to that moogle than the eye can see.
Dialogue: But I fear there is more to that moogle than the eye can see.
trans: 但我担心那只 moogle 的东西比眼睛能看到的更多。

Original: Hope:Um... Is she following us?
Dialogue: Um... Is she following us?
trans: 嗯……她在跟踪我们吗？

Original: Edge:Looks like it.
Dialogue: Looks like it.
trans: 看起来像。

Original: Y'shtola:Or perhaps she is attempting to learn more about us?
Dialogue: Or perhaps she is attempting to learn more about us?
trans: 或者她可能想更多地了解我们？

Original: Shantotto:Ohohoho! I had a hunch that you were a fascinating bunch.
Dialogue: Ohohoho! I had a hunch that you were a fascinating bunch.
trans: 呵呵呵！

Original: Edge:Join us and then you can watch us to your heart's content.
Dialogue: Join us and then you can watch us to your heart's content.
trans: 加入我们，然后您就可以随心所欲地观看我们了。

Original: Shantotto:How humorousyour advice.
Dialogue: How humorous—your advice.
trans: 多么幽默——你的建议。

Original: Shantotto:But my magicit comes with a price.
Dialogue: But my magic—it comes with a price.
trans: 但我的魔力——它是有代价的。

Original: Shantotto:What I do cannot be bought with flattery or applause, but must stem from a noble cause.
Dialogue: What I do cannot be bought with flattery or applause, but must stem from a noble cause.
trans: 我所做的事不能用奉承或掌声来换取，而必须源于崇高的事业。

Original: Hope:A noble cause?
Dialogue: A noble cause?
trans: 一个崇高的事业？

Original: Mog:Then look no further, kupo!
Dialogue: Then look no further, kupo!
trans: 那就别再看了，库波！

Original: Mog:The Torsions are unraveling the fabric of space-time as we know it. We have to do something before it destroys their worlds.
Dialogue: The Torsions are unraveling the fabric of space-time as we know it. We have to do something before it destroys their worlds.
trans: 扭转正在解开我们所知的时空结构。

Original: Shantotto:I want to believe you. That's very virtuous and nice.
Dialogue: I want to believe you. That's very virtuous and nice.
trans: 我想相信你。

Original: Shantotto:But do the words of one moogle truly suffice?
Dialogue: But do the words of one moogle truly suffice?
trans: 但是一只莫古利的话真的就足够了吗？

Original: Y'shtola:It is not because we believe his word that we fight. We fight to defend that which we believe in.
Dialogue: It is not because we believe his word that we fight. We fight to defend that which we believe in.
trans: 我们战斗并不是因为我们相信他的话。

Original: Edge:Besides, we can't just let the monsters run rampant.
Dialogue: Besides, we can't just let the monsters run rampant.
trans: 再说了，也不能让魔物横行。

Original: Shantotto:It seems you aren't the moogle's puppetsyour apprehension is wise. It may even save you from an early demise.
Dialogue: It seems you aren't the moogle's puppets—your apprehension is wise. It may even save you from an early demise.
trans: 看来你不是莫古利的傀儡——你的担心是明智的。

Original: Hope:So would you be willing to come with us?
Dialogue: So would you be willing to come with us?
trans: 那你愿意和我们一起去吗？

Original: Shantotto:Allow me to speak with clarity so that those with meager minds may understand.
Dialogue: Allow me to speak with clarity so that those with meager minds may understand.
trans: 容我讲清楚，让脑袋浅的人明白。

Original: Shantotto:Before I make a decision, I must further study you and the laws of this world firsthand.
Dialogue: Before I make a decision, I must further study you and the laws of this world firsthand.
trans: 在我做出决定之前，我必须进一步深入研究你和这个世界的第一手法律。

Original: Shantotto:It is always a pleasure watching you fight. You show great courage in what seems a helpless plight.
Dialogue: It is always a pleasure watching you fight. You show great courage in what seems a helpless plight.
trans: 看你打架总是一种乐趣。

Original: Cloud:Make up your mind already.
Dialogue: Make up your mind already.
trans: 已经下定决心了。

Original: Rem:We'd love to have you come with us, but understand if your goals differ from ours.
Dialogue: We'd love to have you come with us, but understand if your goals differ from ours.
trans: 我们很乐意邀请​​您加入我们，但如果您的目标与我们的不同，请理解。

Original: Yuna:Yes, you're more than welcome to join us.
Dialogue: Yes, you're more than welcome to join us.
trans: 是的，非常欢迎您加入我们。

Original: Shantotto:At the very least, my boredom will be ceased.
Dialogue: At the very least, my boredom will be ceased.
trans: 至少，我的无聊会停止。

Original: Mog:Does that mean you'll be our friend, kupo?
Dialogue: Does that mean you'll be our friend, kupo?
trans: 这是否意味着你会成为我们的朋友，库波？

Original: Shantotto:There is no need to guessfor my answer is yes.
Dialogue: There is no need to guess—for my answer is yes.
trans: 无需猜测——因为我的回答是肯定的。

Original: Shantotto:You're the perfect specimens for
Dialogue: You're the perfect specimens for—
trans: 你是完美的标本——

Original: Mog:Kupo?
Dialogue: Kupo?
trans: 外套？

Original: Mog:The Torsion's not that way, kupo.
Dialogue: The Torsion's not that way, kupo.
trans: 扭力不是那样的，kupo。

Original: Shantotto:The call of chaos.
Dialogue: The call of chaos.
trans: 混沌的呼唤。

Original: Shantotto:Do not take this the wrong way. You are not being critiqued. However, I must be offmy interest is piqued.
Dialogue: Do not take this the wrong way. You are not being critiqued. However, I must be off—my interest is piqued.
trans: 不要误会。

Original: Cloud:You'd think we'd learn by now.
Dialogue: You'd think we'd learn by now.
trans: 你会认为我们现在已经学会了。

Original: Mog:Well...it looks like we'll just have to move on without her, kupo.
Dialogue: Well...it looks like we'll just have to move on without her, kupo.
trans: 好吧……看起来我们只能在没有她的情况下继续前进，库波。

Original: ???:Kweh! Kweh!
Dialogue: Kweh! Kweh!
trans: 哇！

Original: Yang:Hm? Is that what I think it is?
Dialogue: Hm? Is that what I think it is?
trans: 嗯？

Original: Yuffie:Whoa, it's a chocobo. Is he yours, Bartz?
Dialogue: Whoa, it's a chocobo. Is he yours, Bartz?
trans: 哇，这是一只陆行鸟。

Original: Bartz:I was kind of hoping he was, but unfortunately not.
Dialogue: I was kind of hoping he was, but unfortunately not.
trans: 我有点希望他是，但不幸的是不是。

Original: Chocobo:Kweh kweh.
Dialogue: Kweh kweh.
trans: 两个都。

Original: Bartz:Hm? What's that, boy?
Dialogue: Hm? What's that, boy?
trans: 嗯？

Original: Bartz:Really? That's wonderful!
Dialogue: Really? That's wonderful!
trans: 真的吗？

Original: Terra:You can talk to chocobos?
Dialogue: You can talk to chocobos?
trans: 你能和陆行鸟说话吗？

Original: Bartz:I like to think so.
Dialogue: I like to think so.
trans: 我喜欢这样想。

Original: Yuffie:So you can't...
Dialogue: So you can't...
trans: 所以你不能...

Original: Mog:Don't worry, kupo! I can speak fluent chocobo!
Dialogue: Don't worry, kupo! I can speak fluent chocobo!
trans: 别担心，库波！

Original: Chocobo:Kweh kweh.
Dialogue: Kweh kweh.
trans: 两个都。

Original: Mog:Kupo, kupo... I see.
Dialogue: Kupo, kupo... I see.
trans: 愚蠢，愚蠢……我明白了。

Original: Mog:He's saying he saw an old man in the area. It could be one of your friends, kupo!
Dialogue: He's saying he saw an old man in the area. It could be one of your friends, kupo!
trans: 他说他在附近看到了一个老人。

Original: Yang:An elderly gentleman, you say?
Dialogue: An elderly gentleman, you say?
trans: 你是说一位老先生？

Original: Bartz:Galuf's an old man. Maybe it's him!
Dialogue: Galuf's an old man. Maybe it's him!
trans: Galuf是个老人。

Original: Yuffie:What's with everyone dragging old people with them on their journey? They need their rest!
Dialogue: What's with everyone dragging old people with them on their journey? They need their rest!
trans: 每个人都拖着老人去旅行是怎么回事？

Original: Mog:Thanks for the information, kupo! Watch out for monsters, okay?
Dialogue: Thanks for the information, kupo! Watch out for monsters, okay?
trans: 谢谢你的信息，kupo！

Original: Bartz:Yeah, and if you ever run into a chocobo called Boko, you let me know!
Dialogue: Yeah, and if you ever run into a chocobo called Boko, you let me know!
trans: 是的，如果你遇到一只叫 Boko 的陆行鸟，请告诉我！

Original: Chocobo:Kweh! Kweh!
Dialogue: Kweh! Kweh!
trans: 哇！

Original: Bartz:An old man, huh? I wonder who he could be?
Dialogue: An old man, huh? I wonder who he could be?
trans: 一个老人，是吗？

Original: Bartz:That was a manikin of Galuf! I'm sure of it!
Dialogue: That was a manikin of Galuf! I'm sure of it!
trans: 那是伽鲁夫的人体模型！

Original: Yuffie:Looks like the old man that chocobo saw is your friend then.
Dialogue: Looks like the old man that chocobo saw is your friend then.
trans: 看来陆行鸟看到的那个老人是你的朋友呢。

Original: Bartz:Yeah, I hope so. He's a great guy. You can really count on him.
Dialogue: Yeah, I hope so. He's a great guy. You can really count on him.
trans: 是的，我希望如此。

Original: Bartz:His memory's not the sharpest sometimes, though.
Dialogue: His memory's not the sharpest sometimes, though.
trans: 不过，他的记忆力有时并不是最敏锐的。

Original: Mog:I bet he also bears the light, kupo! We should go look for him!
Dialogue: I bet he also bears the light, kupo! We should go look for him!
trans: 我敢打赌他也有光，库波！

Original: Edge:He may be strong, but I don't feel comfortable leaving a senile old man alone out here.
Dialogue: He may be strong, but I don't feel comfortable leaving a senile old man alone out here.
trans: 他可能很强壮，但我觉得把一个年迈的老人单独留在这里感觉不舒服。

Original: Bartz:Then it's settled! Just you wait, Galuf. We're coming to get you!
Dialogue: Then it's settled! Just you wait, Galuf. We're coming to get you!
trans: 然后就解决了！

Original: Rem:Look! Someone's there!
Dialogue: Look! Someone's there!
trans: 看！

Original: Bartz:That's himGaluf!
Dialogue: That's him—Galuf!
trans: 就是他——嘎鲁夫！

Original: Shadow:It appears we are too late.
Dialogue: It appears we are too late.
trans: 看来我们来不及了。

Original: Sazh:What!? He's just sleepin' in the middle of the path!
Dialogue: What!? He's just sleepin' in the middle of the path!
trans: 什么！？

Original: Galuf:*Yawn* What a pleasant dream.
Dialogue: *Yawn* What a pleasant dream.
trans: *哈欠*多么愉快的梦。

Original: Galuf:Hm? Do you need something?
Dialogue: Hm? Do you need something?
trans: 嗯？

Original: Galuf:Huh? Who are you?
Dialogue: Huh? Who are you?
trans: 嗯？

Original: Galuf:And...who am I?
Dialogue: And...who am I?
trans: 还有……我是谁？

Original: Bartz:Galuf, don't tell me you've got amnesia.
Dialogue: Galuf, don't tell me you've got amnesia.
trans: Galuf，别告诉我你失忆了。

Original: Galuf:How have you been, Bartz? It's been a while!
Dialogue: How have you been, Bartz? It's been a while!
trans: 你最近怎么样，巴茨？

Original: Bartz:That's not funny! You had me seriously worried!
Dialogue: That's not funny! You had me seriously worried!
trans: 这不好笑！

Original: Galuf:SorryI just couldn't help myself.
Dialogue: Sorry—I just couldn't help myself.
trans: 抱歉——我就是情不自禁。

Original: Sazh:Is he really okay?
Dialogue: Is he really okay?
trans: 他真的没事吗？

Original: Rem:I doubt it.
Dialogue: I doubt it.
trans: 我对此表示怀疑。

Original: Galuf:By the way, where are we?
Dialogue: By the way, where are we?
trans: 顺便问一下，我们在哪里？

Original: Bartz:Let me start from the beginning...
Dialogue: Let me start from the beginning...
trans: 让我从头开始...

Original: Galuf:I see... So we're not in our world any longer. That explains a lot.
Dialogue: I see... So we're not in our world any longer. That explains a lot.
trans: 我明白了……所以我们已经不在我们的世界了。

Original: Shadow:You don't seem surprised.
Dialogue: You don't seem surprised.
trans: 你似乎并不感到惊讶。

Original: Galuf:Let's just say I'm used to traveling to different worlds!
Dialogue: Let's just say I'm used to traveling to different worlds!
trans: 这么说吧，我已经习惯了去不同的世界旅行！

Original: Galuf:So, where is everyone?
Dialogue: So, where is everyone?
trans: 那么，每个人都在哪里？

Original: Bartz:I'm still looking for them. I'm sure they're somewhere out there though.
Dialogue: I'm still looking for them. I'm sure they're somewhere out there though.
trans: 我还在找他们。

Original: Mog:You have more friends, kupo? Then let's go look for them!
Dialogue: You have more friends, kupo? Then let's go look for them!
trans: 你有更多的朋友吗，kupo？

Original: Galuf:Sounds good to me!
Dialogue: Sounds good to me!
trans: 听起来不错！

Original: Shantotto:Ohohoho!
Dialogue: Ohohoho!
trans: 哇！

Original: Shantotto:For a moment, I almost felt dense, but now it all makes sense!
Dialogue: For a moment, I almost felt dense, but now it all makes sense!
trans: 一瞬间，我几乎感觉脑子发麻，但现在一切都说得通了！

Original: Kuja:All those who have been summoned possess this power.
Dialogue: All those who have been summoned possess this power.
trans: 所有被召唤的人都拥有这种力量。

Original: Kuja:And yet there are fools who still have not realized this.
Dialogue: And yet there are fools who still have not realized this.
trans: 然而，有些傻瓜还没有意识到这一点。

Original: Shantotto:Those who can close the portals can open them as well.
Dialogue: Those who can close the portals can open them as well.
trans: 那些可以关闭门户的人也可以打开它们。

Original: Shantotto:What a fascinating world for me to dwell!
Dialogue: What a fascinating world for me to dwell!
trans: 多么迷人的世界让我居住！

Original: Kuja:What will you do?
Dialogue: What will you do?
trans: 你会怎么做？

Original: Kuja:They're nearly here.
Dialogue: They're nearly here.
trans: 他们快到了。

Original: Kuja:Did you find the answers you were searching for?
Dialogue: Did you find the answers you were searching for?
trans: 你找到你正在寻找的答案了吗？

Original: Shantotto:There are still a few theories that must be applied, but I cannot do so unless I go inside.
Dialogue: There are still a few theories that must be applied, but I cannot do so unless I go inside.
trans: 还有一些必须应用的理论，但我不能这样做，除非我进去。

Original: Kuja:Do you truly believe you'll be able to make it back?
Dialogue: Do you truly believe you'll be able to make it back?
trans: 你真的相信你能挽回吗？

Original: Shantotto:Stand back and behold. The mind of a genius cannot be controlled.
Dialogue: Stand back and behold. The mind of a genius cannot be controlled.
trans: 退后一步看。

Original: Kuja:A brave soul.
Dialogue: A brave soul.
trans: 一个勇敢的灵魂。

Original: Zidane:Kuja! What did you do to her!?
Dialogue: Kuja! What did you do to her!?
trans: 九爷！

Original: Mog:Did you trap her in the Torsion, kupo!?
Dialogue: Did you trap her in the Torsion, kupo!?
trans: 库珀，你把她困在了扭曲中了吗！？

Original: Kuja:She went inside of her own accord. All I did was lend a hand.
Dialogue: She went inside of her own accord. All I did was lend a hand.
trans: 她自愿进去了。

Original: Zidane:You really think I'm going to fall for that!?
Dialogue: You really think I'm going to fall for that!?
trans: 你真以为我会上当！？

Original: Kuja:Spare me the theatrics.
Dialogue: Spare me the theatrics.
trans: 饶了我吧。

Original: Kuja:You always knew it would come to this.
Dialogue: You always knew it would come to this.
trans: 你一直都知道事情会变成这样。

Original: Zidane:Answer me, Kuja!
Dialogue: Answer me, Kuja!
trans: 回答我，Kuja！

Original: Kuja:There's no reason to get upset. Why don't you just ask her for yourself?
Dialogue: There's no reason to get upset. Why don't you just ask her for yourself?
trans: 没有理由不高兴。

Original: Mog:We can worry about Shantotto after defeating him, kupo!
Dialogue: We can worry about Shantotto after defeating him, kupo!
trans: 打败Shantotto我们就可以放心了，kupo！

Original: Kuja:You foolthat you should risk your life for someone you just met...
Dialogue: You fool—that you should risk your life for someone you just met...
trans: 你这个笨蛋——竟然为了刚认识的人冒着生命危险……

Original: Kuja:You are far too trusting, Zidane.
Dialogue: You are far too trusting, Zidane.
trans: 你太轻信了，齐达内。

Original: Zidane:Not gonna run? I thought you could open Torsions.
Dialogue: Not gonna run? I thought you could open Torsions.
trans: 不会跑？

Original: Mog:Kuja's too weak right now, kupo!
Dialogue: Kuja's too weak right now, kupo!
trans: Kuja现在太虚弱了，kupo！

Original: Mog:This is our chance to
Dialogue: This is our chance to—
trans: 这是我们的机会——

Original: Zidane:Kuja, why are you messin' with the Torsions?
Dialogue: Kuja, why are you messin' with the Torsions?
trans: Kuja，你为什么要搞乱 Torsions？

Original: Zidane:Do you know something we don't?
Dialogue: Do you know something we don't?
trans: 你知道我们不知道的事情吗？

Original: Kuja:I'm not telling you a thing.
Dialogue: I'm not telling you a thing.
trans: 我什么都没告诉你。

Original: Shantotto:It seems I'm late.
Dialogue: It seems I'm late.
trans: 看来我迟到了。

Original: Shantotto:But as an apology, I have obtained a lot of data on the gate.
Dialogue: But as an apology, I have obtained a lot of data on the gate.
trans: 但作为一个道歉，我已经获得了很多关于大门的数据。

Original: Cloud:She was able to open the Torsion on her own. Is she not possessed of the light?
Dialogue: She was able to open the Torsion on her own. Is she not possessed of the light?
trans: 她能够自己打开 Torsion。

Original: Mog:J-just who is she, kupo?
Dialogue: J-just who is she, kupo?
trans: J-她到底是谁，kupo？

Original: Shantotto:Kuja, was it? Are you giving up already, you bum?
Dialogue: Kuja, was it? Are you giving up already, you bum?
trans: Kuja，是吗？

Original: Shantotto:The best part is yet to come.
Dialogue: The best part is yet to come.
trans: 最好的部分还在后面。

Original: Kuja:I know.
Dialogue: I know.
trans: 我知道。

Original: Kuja:I'd rather not be indebted to you, so I shall tell you this before I go.
Dialogue: I'd rather not be indebted to you, so I shall tell you this before I go.
trans: 我不想亏欠你，所以我会在走之前告诉你这件事。

Original: Kuja:The one who possesses the call of chaos is nearby.
Dialogue: The one who possesses the call of chaos is nearby.
trans: 拥有混沌召唤的就在附近。

Original: Kuja:He's quite the spectaclea man with long silver hair, wielding a long, curved blade.
Dialogue: He's quite the spectacle—a man with long silver hair, wielding a long, curved blade.
trans: 他非常引人注目——一个留着长长的银发的男人，挥舞着一把长而弯曲的刀片。

Original: Cloud:What did you just say!?
Dialogue: What did you just say!?
trans: 你刚刚说什么！？

Original: Zidane:Hey, get back here!
Dialogue: Hey, get back here!
trans: 嘿，回到这里！

Original: Mog:He got away, kupo.
Dialogue: He got away, kupo.
trans: 他跑了，库波。

Original: Zidane:Whose side are you on?
Dialogue: Whose side are you on?
trans: 你支持哪一方呢？

Original: Shantotto:We shared a mutual interest in the past.
Dialogue: We shared a mutual interest in the past.
trans: 我们过去有共同的兴趣。

Original: Shantotto:But I think I have found a group much more fascinating at last.
Dialogue: But I think I have found a group much more fascinating at last.
trans: 但我想我终于找到了一个更迷人的团体。

Original: Zidane:What do you think? Should we let her come with us?
Dialogue: What do you think? Should we let her come with us?
trans: 你怎么认为？

Original: Mog:She does bear the light, kupo. Besides, there isn't much we can do if she decides to follow us.
Dialogue: She does bear the light, kupo. Besides, there isn't much we can do if she decides to follow us.
trans: 她确实承受着光，kupo。

Original: Shantotto:Ohohoho! Never fear, the illustrious Shantotto is here!
Dialogue: Ohohoho! Never fear, the illustrious Shantotto is here!
trans: 呵呵呵！

Original: Zidane:I already know we're gonna regret this.
Dialogue: I already know we're gonna regret this.
trans: 我已经知道我们会后悔的。

Original: Cloud:He's here... I have to find him.
Dialogue: He's here... I have to find him.
trans: 他在这里……我必须找到他。

Original: Firion:What's that?
Dialogue: What's that?
trans: 那是什么？

Original: Cloud:There's only one person who could have done this.
Dialogue: There's only one person who could have done this.
trans: 只有一个人可以做到这一点。

Original: Cloud:He's close.
Dialogue: He's close.
trans: 他很接近。

Original: Mog:Wait! It's too dangerous to go alone, kupo!
Dialogue: Wait! It's too dangerous to go alone, kupo!
trans: 等待！

Original: Sazh:Why don't they ever listen?
Dialogue: Why don't they ever listen?
trans: 为什么他们从来不听？

Original: Shantotto:The way this monster was killed makes it very clear.
Dialogue: The way this monster was killed makes it very clear.
trans: 这只怪物被杀的方式已经很清楚了。

Original: Shantotto:The one who bears the call of chaos was just here.
Dialogue: The one who bears the call of chaos was just here.
trans: 那个承受混沌召唤的人，就在这里。

Original: Firion:This is bad. He must be strong if Kuja has his eye on him.
Dialogue: This is bad. He must be strong if Kuja has his eye on him.
trans: 这不好。

Original: Sazh:Yeah, it sounds like this is the guy Cloud's been lookin' for.
Dialogue: Yeah, it sounds like this is the guy Cloud's been lookin' for.
trans: 是的，听起来这就是克劳德一直在寻找的人。

Original: Shantotto:The only thing on his mind is a confrontation with his rival, but what he should be worried about is his own survival.
Dialogue: The only thing on his mind is a confrontation with his rival, but what he should be worried about is his own survival.
trans: 他脑子里只想着和自己的对手正面交锋，更该担心的是自己的生死存亡。

Original: Wakka:Hey, was there somethin' you wanted to talk about?
Dialogue: Hey, was there somethin' you wanted to talk about?
trans: 嘿，你有什么想谈的吗？

Original: Yuna:I just wanted to tell you that Maester Seymour is here.
Dialogue: I just wanted to tell you that Maester Seymour is here.
trans: 我只是想告诉你西摩学士来了。

Original: Wakka:B-but why!? How!?
Dialogue: B-but why!? How!?
trans: B-但是为什么！？

Original: Warrior of Light:He claims he is already dead.
Dialogue: He claims he is already dead.
trans: 他声称他已经死了。

Original: Sazh:You know that we've been summoned here by the gods, right?
Dialogue: You know that we've been summoned here by the gods, right?
trans: 你知道我们是被神灵召唤到这里来的吧？

Original: Yuna:Well, Maester Seymour says they're using us as their pawns. Even he, in death, cannot escape their machinations.
Dialogue: Well, Maester Seymour says they're using us as their pawns. Even he, in death, cannot escape their machinations.
trans: 好吧，西摩学士说他们要把我们当作他们的棋子。

Original: Yuna:He pities us and wants to release us from our shacklesby taking our lives.
Dialogue: He pities us and wants to release us from our shackles—by taking our lives.
trans: 他怜悯我们，想把我们从枷锁中释放出来——夺走我们的生命。

Original: Wakka:Sounds pretty ridiculous. Honestly, I'm kinda relieved that's all it is.
Dialogue: Sounds pretty ridiculous. Honestly, I'm kinda relieved that's all it is.
trans: 听起来很荒谬。

Original: Wakka:WithoutSin, you won't have to perform theFinal Summoning, right? That means you won't have to!
Dialogue: Without Sin, you won't have to perform the Final Summoning, right? That means you won't have to—!
trans: 没有罪，你就不必执行最终召唤，对吧？

Original: Wakka:Sorry, I got a little carried away there. I guess moaning about it isn't going to solve anything.
Dialogue: Sorry, I got a little carried away there. I guess moaning about it isn't going to solve anything.
trans: 对不起，我有点忘乎所以了。

Original: Wakka:Anyway, it doesn't matter where we are or who we're fighting.
Dialogue: Anyway, it doesn't matter where we are or who we're fighting.
trans: 无论如何，我们身在何处或与谁作战并不重要。

Original: Wakka:I'm your guardian, and I'm here to protect you. That'll never change.
Dialogue: I'm your guardian, and I'm here to protect you. That'll never change.
trans: 我是你的监护人，我是来保护你的。

Original: Warrior of Light:You are a man of honor. I admire that.
Dialogue: You are a man of honor. I admire that.
trans: 你是一个有尊严的人。

Original: Sazh:Yeah, you're my kind of guy!
Dialogue: Yeah, you're my kind of guy!
trans: 是的，你是我喜欢的人！

Original: Yuna:Thank you, Wakka.
Dialogue: Thank you, Wakka.
trans: 谢谢你，瓦卡。

Original: Wakka:Cut it out, guys! You're embarrassing me.
Dialogue: Cut it out, guys! You're embarrassing me.
trans: 别闹了，伙计们！

Original: Cloud:It ends here, Sephiroth.
Dialogue: It ends here, Sephiroth.
trans: 它到此结束，Sephiroth。

Original: Sephiroth:A puppet in this world as well, I see.
Dialogue: A puppet in this world as well, I see.
trans: 原来也是这个世界的傀儡啊。

Original: Cloud:Shut up!
Dialogue: Shut up!
trans: 住口！

Original: Cloud:I came here by my own free willto end this.
Dialogue: I came here by my own free will—to end this.
trans: 我自愿来到这里——为了结束这一切。

Original: Sephiroth:If it's despair you want, it's despair you'll get.
Dialogue: If it's despair you want, it's despair you'll get.
trans: 如果你想要绝望，你就会得到绝望。

Original: Mog:This is bad, kupo!
Dialogue: This is bad, kupo!
trans: 这很糟糕，库波！

Original: Warrior of Light:He cannot win this alone. We must help him. Everyone, to arms.
Dialogue: He cannot win this alone. We must help him. Everyone, to arms.
trans: 他一个人赢不了。

Original: Vivi:All right!
Dialogue: All right!
trans: 好的！

Original: Warrior of Light:Calm yourself. This is not a battle that can be fought alone.
Dialogue: Calm yourself. This is not a battle that can be fought alone.
trans: 你冷静一下。

Original: Cloud:You're wrong!
Dialogue: You're wrong!
trans: 你错了！

Original: Sephiroth:Come, I will lead you to despair.
Dialogue: Come, I will lead you to despair.
trans: 来吧，我会带你走向绝望。

Original: Mog:Here it comes, kupo! Get ready!
Dialogue: Here it comes, kupo! Get ready!
trans: 来了，库波！

Original: Sephiroth:Pathetic.
Dialogue: Pathetic.
trans: 可怜的。

Original: Sephiroth:You're weakfar too weak to alter the course of fate.
Dialogue: You're weak—far too weak to alter the course of fate.
trans: 你很虚弱——太虚弱了，无法改变命运的进程。

Original: Mog:How did he get so powerful, kupo?
Dialogue: How did he get so powerful, kupo?
trans: 他怎么变得这么厉害了，库波？

Original: Cloud:We have to stop him!
Dialogue: We have to stop him!
trans: 我们必须阻止他！

Original: Shantotto:How exciting! I would love to join in on all this fighting!
Dialogue: How exciting! I would love to join in on all this fighting!
trans: 多么激动人心！

Original: Yuffie:Great, just when you thought things couldn't get any worse!
Dialogue: Great, just when you thought things couldn't get any worse!
trans: 太棒了，就在你认为事情不会变得更糟的时候！

Original: Sephiroth:My power only continues to grow.
Dialogue: My power only continues to grow.
trans: 我的力量只会继续增长。

Original: Sephiroth:But it's still not enough.
Dialogue: But it's still not enough.
trans: 但这还不够。

Original: Shantotto:I must analyze that power, so stop right there, or I'll be forced to pull out all that beautiful hair!
Dialogue: I must analyze that power, so stop right there, or I'll be forced to pull out all that beautiful hair!
trans: 我必须要分析那股力量，所以停下来，否则我会被强制拔掉所有美丽的头发！

Original: Warrior of Light:Is she friend or foe?
Dialogue: Is she friend or foe?
trans: 她是敌是友？

Original: Warrior of Light:What is her aim?
Dialogue: What is her aim?
trans: 她的目的是什么？

Original: Yuffie:Who cares? Just ignore her.
Dialogue: Who cares? Just ignore her.
trans: 谁在乎？

Original: Cloud:Because we want the same thing. Come on, we're going after her.
Dialogue: Because we want the same thing. Come on, we're going after her.
trans: 因为我们想要同样的东西。

Original: Yuffie:*Sigh* Fine.
Dialogue: *Sigh* Fine.
trans: *叹息*很好。

Original: Yang:Is there a meeting I missed?
Dialogue: Is there a meeting I missed?
trans: 有我错过的会议吗？

Original: Galuf:Just a few old men having a discussion.
Dialogue: Just a few old men having a discussion.
trans: 几个老头在议论。

Original: Laguna:Adult stuff!
Dialogue: Adult stuff!
trans: 成人的东西！

Original: Sazh:Pretty sure a real adult wouldn't say that.
Dialogue: Pretty sure a real adult wouldn't say that.
trans: 一个真正的成年人肯定不会这么说。

Original: Steiner:From time to time, we just need to talk alone, so we gathered here for a heart-to-heart.
Dialogue: From time to time, we just need to talk alone, so we gathered here for a heart-to-heart.
trans: 时不时的，我们只是需要一个人倾诉，于是我们相聚于此，倾诉心声。

Original: Galuf:Yang, was it? What's weighing on your mind?
Dialogue: Yang, was it? What's weighing on your mind?
trans: 杨，是吗？

Original: Laguna:Nice stealth brag. Can't say I'm not jealous though!
Dialogue: Nice stealth brag. Can't say I'm not jealous though!
trans: 漂亮的隐形吹嘘。

Original: Sazh:You really seem like you're in love. Man, I'd kill to be in your shoes.
Dialogue: You really seem like you're in love. Man, I'd kill to be in your shoes.
trans: 你看起来真的像是恋爱了。

Original: Yang:She is kind, brave, a wonderful cookshe even hits me with the frying pan when I need the motivation.
Dialogue: She is kind, brave, a wonderful cook—she even hits me with the frying pan when I need the motivation.
trans: 她善良、勇敢，是一位出色的厨师——当我需要动力时，她甚至用煎锅打我。

Original: Steiner:She sounds quite pleasant.
Dialogue: She sounds quite pleasant.
trans: 她听起来很愉快。

Original: Shadow:Did I say anything?
Dialogue: Did I say anything?
trans: 我有说什么吗？

Original: Galuf:You were mumbling something about yourpartnerand somedaughterof yours.
Dialogue: You were mumbling something about your partner and some daughter of yours.
trans: 你在咕哝着关于你的伴侣和你的某个女儿的事情。

Original: Shadow:I've been tired lately. That's all.
Dialogue: I've been tired lately. That's all.
trans: 我最近很累。

Original: Laguna:Yeah, I know what you mean. Faeries have been visiting me lately. I think they're in my head.
Dialogue: Yeah, I know what you mean. Faeries have been visiting me lately. I think they're in my head.
trans: 是的，我知道你的意思。

Original: Galuf:Just listening to you talking about it makes me feel drained.
Dialogue: Just listening to you talking about it makes me feel drained.
trans: 只是听你谈论它让我感到筋疲力尽。

Original: Sazh:What about you, Steiner? Anything on your mind?
Dialogue: What about you, Steiner? Anything on your mind?
trans: 你呢，斯坦纳？

Original: Steiner:Me? Hm...
Dialogue: Me? Hm...
trans: 我？

Original: Steiner:I have been thinking a lot lately.
Dialogue: I have been thinking a lot lately.
trans: 最近想了很多。

Original: Steiner:Is living for others a selfish act?
Dialogue: Is living for others a selfish act?
trans: 为别人而活是自私的行为吗？

Original: Galuf:Ah, the joys of being young.
Dialogue: Ah, the joys of being young.
trans: 啊，年轻的快乐。

Original: Sazh:What about you, old man?
Dialogue: What about you, old man?
trans: 你呢，老铁？

Original: Galuf:That's funny. I can't remember. Wait, where am I?
Dialogue: That's funny. I can't remember. Wait, where am I?
trans: 那很好笑。

Original: Shantotto:How could I lose sight of such a tall, strange-looking man?
Dialogue: How could I lose sight of such a tall, strange-looking man?
trans: 这么高大，长相奇特的男人，我怎么可能看不到呢？

Original: Shantotto:He must have caught sight of me, crossed dimensions, and ran.
Dialogue: He must have caught sight of me, crossed dimensions, and ran.
trans: 他一定是看到了我，穿越了次元，然后跑了。

Original: Penelo:There you are! Thank goodness you're all right.
Dialogue: There you are! Thank goodness you're all right.
trans: 你在这！

Original: Onion Knight:I'm pretty sure she can take care of herself.
Dialogue: I'm pretty sure she can take care of herself.
trans: 我很确定她能照顾好自己。

Original: Onion Knight:Anyway, Doctor Shantotto, did you find what you were looking for?
Dialogue: Anyway, Doctor Shantotto, did you find what you were looking for?
trans: 不管怎样，Shantotto 医生，你找到你要找的东西了吗？

Original: Shantotto:Not yet, but I won't fret.
Dialogue: Not yet, but I won't fret.
trans: 还没有，但我不会担心。

Original: Onion Knight:Well, will you at least tell us now how you opened that Torsion?
Dialogue: Well, will you at least tell us now how you opened that Torsion?
trans: 好吧，你至少现在能告诉我们你是如何打开 Torsion 的吗？

Original: Shantotto:It is a simple theory.
Dialogue: It is a simple theory.
trans: 这是一个简单的理论。

Original: Shantotto:That which Mog calls the light is
Dialogue: That which Mog calls the light is—
trans: 莫格称之为光的是——

Original: Mog:Hold that thought, kupo!
Dialogue: Hold that thought, kupo!
trans: 保持这个想法，库波！

Original: Penelo:What is that!?
Dialogue: What is that!?
trans: 那是什么！？

Original: Mog:It's guarding the Torsion! We have to defeat it, kupo!
Dialogue: It's guarding the Torsion! We have to defeat it, kupo!
trans: 它在守护扭力！

Original: Shantotto:Sure, let us save the discussion for laterfor the problem standing before us is greater.
Dialogue: Sure, let us save the discussion for later—for the problem standing before us is greater.
trans: 当然，让我们留到以后再讨论——因为摆在我们面前的问题更大。

Original: Mog:I-it's huge!
Dialogue: I-it's huge!
trans: 我-它很大！

Original: Mog:That giant worm must be guarding the Torsion! We have to defeat it, kupo!
Dialogue: That giant worm must be guarding the Torsion! We have to defeat it, kupo!
trans: 那条巨大的蠕虫一定是在守卫扭曲！

Original: Shantotto:Fascinating. Around a large gate always lies a monster in wait.
Dialogue: Fascinating. Around a large gate always lies a monster in wait.
trans: 迷人。

Original: Mog:And it is by defeating them that we can close the Torsions, kupo!
Dialogue: And it is by defeating them that we can close the Torsions, kupo!
trans: 只有打败他们，我们才能关闭扭曲，库波！

Original: Shantotto:Understood. However, there is still one thing I must investigate. Moments ago, it was as if my powers began to dissipate.
Dialogue: Understood. However, there is still one thing I must investigate. Moments ago, it was as if my powers began to dissipate.
trans: 明白了。

Original: Y'shtola:That is a common occurrence during battles within the Torsions.
Dialogue: That is a common occurrence during battles within the Torsions.
trans: 这在 Torsions 内部的战斗中很常见。

Original: Onion Knight:Any ideas why this happens?
Dialogue: Any ideas why this happens?
trans: 为什么会发生这种情况的任何想法？

Original: Shantotto:I wish I could say, but a valid theory requires evidence, okay?
Dialogue: I wish I could say, but a valid theory requires evidence, okay?
trans: 我希望我能说，但是一个有效的理论需要证据，好吗？

Original: Mog:Kupo?
Dialogue: Kupo?
trans: 外套？

Original: Shantotto:I must continue to observe those who can detect the distortionfor they will lead me to intellectual prosperity and good fortune.
Dialogue: I must continue to observe those who can detect the distortion—for they will lead me to intellectual prosperity and good fortune.
trans: 我必须继续观察那些能发现扭曲的人——因为他们会引导我走向智力繁荣和好运。

Original: Onion Knight:What about your hypothesis about the light?
Dialogue: What about your hypothesis about the light?
trans: 你关于光的假设怎么样？

Original: Shantotto:Those who can close the gates can also open them with force.
Dialogue: Those who can close the gates can also open them with force.
trans: 能关闸者，亦能强开。

Original: Shantotto:Theoretically speaking, of course.
Dialogue: Theoretically speaking, of course.
trans: 当然，从理论上讲。

Original: Warrior of Light:Do you mean the light we bear is a threat to the world?
Dialogue: Do you mean the light we bear is a threat to the world?
trans: 你是说我们携带的光是对世界的威胁？

Original: Shantotto:If your intentions are pure, then the world's well-being is secure.
Dialogue: If your intentions are pure, then the world's well-being is secure.
trans: 如果你的意图是纯净的，那么世界的幸福就是安全的。

Original: Y'shtola:I see.
Dialogue: I see.
trans: 我懂了。

Original: Y'shtola:Then that would mean that our foes were using the light for their own self-interests.
Dialogue: Then that would mean that our foes were using the light for their own self-interests.
trans: 那么这就意味着我们的敌人正在利用光来谋取私利。

Original: Onion Knight:Did you know about this?
Dialogue: Did you know about this?
trans: 你知道吗？

Original: Mog:I didn't want to say anything until I was completely sure, kupo.
Dialogue: I didn't want to say anything until I was completely sure, kupo.
trans: 在完全确定之前我不想说什么，库波。

Original: Mog:Plus, I wanted to first make sure everybody's intentions were good.
Dialogue: Plus, I wanted to first make sure everybody's intentions were good.
trans: 另外，我想首先确保每个人的意图都是好的。

Original: Onion Knight:Make sure our intentions were good, huh?
Dialogue: Make sure our intentions were good, huh?
trans: 确保我们的意图是好的，是吗？

Original: Warrior of Light:Shantotto, come with us. Your knowledge is vital to our successand to me as well.
Dialogue: Shantotto, come with us. Your knowledge is vital to our success—and to me as well.
trans: Shantotto，跟我们一起来。

Original: Warrior of Light:I would like to discover who I really ammy purpose.
Dialogue: I would like to discover who I really am—my purpose.
trans: 我想发现我到底是谁——我的目的。

Original: Shantotto:Consider yourselves luckyfor if that is what you desire, then sure, just this once I am for hire.
Dialogue: Consider yourselves lucky—for if that is what you desire, then sure, just this once I am for hire.
trans: 认为自己很幸运——因为如果那是你想要的，那么当然，只有这一次我被雇用了。

Original: Mog:Then we'd love to recruit you, kupo! Light comes in all colors, after all!
Dialogue: Then we'd love to recruit you, kupo! Light comes in all colors, after all!
trans: 那么我们很乐意招募你，kupo！

Original: Materia:It seems you have made a new friend.
Dialogue: It seems you have made a new friend.
trans: 看来你交了一个新朋友。

Original: Mog:It wasn't easy, kupo! I'm just glad we could work things out.
Dialogue: It wasn't easy, kupo! I'm just glad we could work things out.
trans: 这并不容易，库波！

Original: Mog:Did you summon her?
Dialogue: Did you summon her?
trans: 你召唤她了吗？

Original: Materia:That is correct.
Dialogue: That is correct.
trans: 那是对的。

Original: Materia:While she may find pleasure in destruction, she displays remarkable sangfroid and intellect.
Dialogue: While she may find pleasure in destruction, she displays remarkable sangfroid and intellect.
trans: 虽然她可能会以破坏为乐，但她表现出非凡的冷静和智慧。

Original: Mog:Professor Shantotto is researching the will of the light, kupo.
Dialogue: Professor Shantotto is researching the will of the light, kupo.
trans: Shantotto教授正在研究光之意志，kupo。

Original: Materia:The force we call the light is a part of the natural law in this world.
Dialogue: The force we call the light is a part of the natural law in this world.
trans: 我们称之为光的力量是这个世界自然法则的一部分。

Original: Materia:It dictates the planet's fate, regardless of the bearer's temperament or morality behind their past actions.
Dialogue: It dictates the planet's fate, regardless of the bearer's temperament or morality behind their past actions.
trans: 它决定了星球的命运，无论持有者的气质或过去行为背后的道德如何。

Original: Materia:That is why I ask that you lead them onto the path of the righteous. Can you do that?
Dialogue: That is why I ask that you lead them onto the path of the righteous. Can you do that?
trans: 这就是为什么我请求你带领他们走上正义的道路。

Original: Mog:Of course, kupo!
Dialogue: Of course, kupo!
trans: 当然，库波！

Original: Materia:We cannot allow those who desire chaos such as Kefka and Sephiroth to have their way.
Dialogue: We cannot allow those who desire chaos such as Kefka and Sephiroth to have their way.
trans: 我们不能允许像 Kefka 和 Sephiroth 这样渴望混乱的人为所欲为。

Original: Mog:But the Torsions are getting even bigger, kupo. Maybe persuading them to join us wouldn't be such a bad idea?
Dialogue: But the Torsions are getting even bigger, kupo. Maybe persuading them to join us wouldn't be such a bad idea?
trans: 但是 Torsions 变得更大了，kupo。

Original: Materia:Persuade them to join us?
Dialogue: Persuade them to join us?
trans: 说服他们加入我们？

Original: Mog:Of course, I don't expect for everyone to get along at first. After all, we've had our share of differences, kupo.
Dialogue: Of course, I don't expect for everyone to get along at first. After all, we've had our share of differences, kupo.
trans: 当然，我不指望每个人一开始都能相处融洽。

Original: Mog:But if I have your blessing, I'll see what I can do, kupo!
Dialogue: But if I have your blessing, I'll see what I can do, kupo!
trans: 但如果我有你的祝福，我会看看我能做些什么，kupo！

Original: Materia:If we could unite the warriors of this world before Spiritus...
Dialogue: If we could unite the warriors of this world before Spiritus...
trans: 如果我们能在 Spiritus 之前团结这个世界的战士……

Original: Mog:Then we could prevent him from taking control of this world, kupo!
Dialogue: Then we could prevent him from taking control of this world, kupo!
trans: 那么我们就可以阻止他控制这个世界，库波！

Original: Materia:It is my duty as a goddess to restore stability to the planet.
Dialogue: It is my duty as a goddess to restore stability to the planet.
trans: 恢复地球的稳定是我身为女神的职责。

Original: Materia:Mog, will you be able to persuade them to change their ways?
Dialogue: Mog, will you be able to persuade them to change their ways?
trans: 莫格，你能说服他们改弦更张吗？

Original: Mog:I'll start with the easy ones, kupo.
Dialogue: I'll start with the easy ones, kupo.
trans: 我将从简单的开始，kupo。

Original: Mog:I actually sense the presence of an individual you summoned.
Dialogue: I actually sense the presence of an individual you summoned.
trans: 我实际上感觉到了你召唤的一个人的存在。

Original: Mog:But he seems to have teamed up with one of Spiritus's warriors, kupo.
Dialogue: But he seems to have teamed up with one of Spiritus's warriors, kupo.
trans: 但他似乎与 Spiritus 的一名战士 kupo 联手。

Original: Materia:So he used to be an ally of one of my warriors?
Dialogue: So he used to be an ally of one of my warriors?
trans: 所以他曾经是我的一个战士的盟友？

Original: Mog:Exactly! That means he'll be a lot easier to convince than someone Spiritus summoned, kupo!
Dialogue: Exactly! That means he'll be a lot easier to convince than someone Spiritus summoned, kupo!
trans: 确切地！

Original: Materia:Having him join us would provide valuable information on persuading those on the other side as well.
Dialogue: Having him join us would provide valuable information on persuading those on the other side as well.
trans: 让他加入我们也将为说服对方提供有价值的信息。

Original: Materia:Very well. I am counting on you, Mog.
Dialogue: Very well. I am counting on you, Mog.
trans: 很好。

Original: Materia:Now go, usher those who bear the light onto the rightful path.
Dialogue: Now go, usher those who bear the light onto the rightful path.
trans: 现在去吧，把那些承载着光明的人带上正道。

Original: Mog:My pleasure, kupo!
Dialogue: My pleasure, kupo!
trans: 我的荣幸，库波！

Original: Warrior of Light:So ill will might also be considered "light" in this world...
Dialogue: So ill will might also be considered "light" in this world...
trans: 所以恶意在这个世界上也算得上是“轻”了吧……

Original: Terra:Have we really been doing the right thing?
Dialogue: Have we really been doing the right thing?
trans: 我们真的一直在做正确的事吗？

Original: Shantotto:Before you begin your ruing, how about you tell me just what you've been doing?
Dialogue: Before you begin your ruing, how about you tell me just what you've been doing?
trans: 在你开始你的毁灭之前，你能告诉我你一直在做什么吗？

Original: Warrior of Light:Closing Torsions and defeating the beasts that guard them.
Dialogue: Closing Torsions and defeating the beasts that guard them.
trans: 关闭 Torsions 并击败守卫它们的野兽。

Original: Warrior of Light:At times, the likes of Kuja as well...
Dialogue: At times, the likes of Kuja as well...
trans: 有时，Kuja 之类的人也...

Original: Terra:Any confrontation would end in battle. We thought them a threat...
Dialogue: Any confrontation would end in battle. We thought them a threat...
trans: 任何对抗都将以战斗告终。

Original: Shantotto:And all on Mog's word your mind was set?
Dialogue: And all on Mog's word your mind was set?
trans: 莫格的话让你下定了决心？

Original: Terra:No! We've made our decisions ourselves.
Dialogue: No! We've made our decisions ourselves.
trans: 不！

Original: Terra:We're doing what we can to protect the things that are important to us...
Dialogue: We're doing what we can to protect the things that are important to us...
trans: 我们正在尽我们所能来保护对我们来说很重要的东西......

Original: Shantotto:If that's the case, then what's amiss? Operate according to your own sense of justice.
Dialogue: If that's the case, then what's amiss? Operate according to your own sense of justice.
trans: 如果是这样的话，那有什么不对？

Original: Shantotto:I fight for mine and it suits me just fine.
Dialogue: I fight for mine and it suits me just fine.
trans: 我为我的而战，它很适合我。

Original: Shadow:...We're not alone.
Dialogue: ...We're not alone.
trans: ...我们并不孤单。

Original: Kefka:My, oh, my! Aren't we all so big and strong now? I've been waiting for this day.
Dialogue: My, oh, my! Aren't we all so big and strong now? I've been waiting for this day.
trans: 我的，哦，我的！

Original: Shantotto:...Such vulgar sorcery.
Dialogue: ...Such vulgar sorcery.
trans: ……这种下流的魔法。

Original: Kefka:Whaaat? And here I thought you were on our team.
Dialogue: Whaaat? And here I thought you were on our team.
trans: 什么？

Original: Shantotto:Really? Thanks, but that's news to me.
Dialogue: Really? Thanks, but that's news to me.
trans: 真的吗？

Original: Shantotto:I'm just happy we're clear someone of my position cannot consort with a circus magician.
Dialogue: I'm just happy we're clear someone of my position cannot consort with a circus magician.
trans: 我很高兴我们很清楚像我这样的人不能和马戏团魔术师交往。

Original: Kefka:Fine. Whatev. But since we're all here, how about a little show of force?
Dialogue: Fine. Whatev. But since we're all here, how about a little show of force?
trans: 美好的。

Original: Mog:You again!? Leave us alone, kupo!
Dialogue: You again!? Leave us alone, kupo!
trans: 又是你！？
