Original: Kefka:Uwee, hee, hee! What a wonderful surprise. Come on, let's have a little fun.
Dialogue: Uwee, hee, hee! What a wonderful surprise. Come on, let's have a little fun.
trans: 呜呜呜嘻嘻！

Original: Kefka:Not bad, not bad... Leveling up nicely, I see...
Dialogue: Not bad, not bad... Leveling up nicely, I see...
trans: 不错，不错... 升级不错，我明白了...

Original: Kefka:For power-hungry munchkins such as youse, I have a very special sur...!
Dialogue: For power-hungry munchkins such as youse, I have a very special sur...!
trans: 对于像你这样渴望权力的笨蛋，我有一个非常特别的 sur...！

Original: Kefka:Interested parties are asked to gird their loins and proceed to the manor up ahead.
Dialogue: Interested parties are asked to gird their loins and proceed to the manor up ahead.
trans: 有意者请系好腰带，前往前方庄园。

Original: Mog:Imber Manor just so happens to house a pretty big Torsion, too, kupo.
Dialogue: Imber Manor just so happens to house a pretty big Torsion, too, kupo.
trans: Imber Manor 恰好也有一个相当大的 Torsion，kupo。

Original: Mog:The going might be tough, but... shall we get going, kupo?
Dialogue: The going might be tough, but... shall we get going, kupo?
trans: 前进可能会很艰难，但是……我们要开始了吗，kupo？

Original: Terra:We can't leave Kefka to his own devices. That man...is carnage itself.
Dialogue: We can't leave Kefka to his own devices. That man...is carnage itself.
trans: 我们不能让凯夫卡任其自生自灭。

Original: Shantotto:I'm curious to see what this surprise might be.
Dialogue: I'm curious to see what this surprise might be.
trans: 我很好奇这个惊喜可能是什么。

Original: Mog:Then it's settled. Onward, kupo!
Dialogue: Then it's settled. Onward, kupo!
trans: 然后就解决了。

Original: ???:Back for more, you monsters!? Hope you're ready for a beatdown!
Dialogue: Back for more, you monsters!? Hope you're ready for a beatdown!
trans: 回来要更多，你们这些怪物！？

Original: Sazh:You know this kid?
Dialogue: You know this kid?
trans: 你认识这个孩子吗？

Original: ???:...They can talk? They ain't as glassy as the others either.
Dialogue: ...They can talk? They ain't as glassy as the others either.
trans: ……他们会说话？

Original: Tifa:I think he thinks we're manikins.
Dialogue: I think he thinks we're manikins.
trans: 我想他认为我们是人体模型。

Original: Laguna:Ahh, so that's what this is all about.
Dialogue: Ahh, so that's what this is all about.
trans: 啊，这就是全部。

Original: Laguna:Hey, kid, take it easy. We're the good guys!
Dialogue: Hey, kid, take it easy. We're the good guys!
trans: 嘿，孩子，放轻松。

Original: ???:L-Laguna!? Is that really you!?
Dialogue: L-Laguna!? Is that really you!?
trans: L、拉古纳！？

Original: Laguna:Huh? Have we met somewhere?
Dialogue: Huh? Have we met somewhere?
trans: 嗯？

Original: ???:You bet we have! Tons of times! When I'm dreaming!
Dialogue: You bet we have! Tons of times! When I'm dreaming!
trans: 你打赌我们有！

Original: ???:Wait... Does that mean this is a dream, too?
Dialogue: Wait... Does that mean this is a dream, too?
trans: 等等……这是否意味着这也是一个梦？

Original: Laguna:What are you babbling on about? You've lost me, and when I'm lost, I am lost.
Dialogue: What are you babbling on about? You've lost me, and when I'm lost, I am lost.
trans: 你在唠叨什么？

Original: Tifa:I've never seen Laguna this flustered before.
Dialogue: I've never seen Laguna this flustered before.
trans: 我以前从未见过拉古纳如此慌张。

Original: Cloud:Looks like he's finally met his match.
Dialogue: Looks like he's finally met his match.
trans: 看来他终于遇到对手了。

Original: Sazh:So, kid, you gonna tell us who you are?
Dialogue: So, kid, you gonna tell us who you are?
trans: 那么，孩子，你会告诉我们你是谁吗？

Original: Zell:Zell's the name. I'm aSeeDstationed atBalamb Garden.
Dialogue: Zell's the name. I'm a SeeD stationed at Balamb Garden.
trans: 泽尔的名字。

Original: Laguna:Balamb? So does that mean you came from the same world as me?
Dialogue: Balamb? So does that mean you came from the same world as me?
trans: 巴拉姆？

Original: Zell:Huh? Same world? Are you talking about the real world or the dream world?
Dialogue: Huh? Same world? Are you talking about the real world or the dream world?
trans: 嗯？

Original: Mog:Calm down, kupo! I'll explain everything, so listen up.
Dialogue: Calm down, kupo! I'll explain everything, so listen up.
trans: 冷静点，库波！

Original: Mog:...And that's how you got here, kupo!
Dialogue: ...And that's how you got here, kupo!
trans: ......你就是这样来到这里的，kupo！

Original: Zell:A different world? Dimensional distortion? I mean, I'm pretty well informed about things, but I've never heard anything like this before.
Dialogue: A different world? Dimensional distortion? I mean, I'm pretty well informed about things, but I've never heard anything like this before.
trans: 一个不同的世界？

Original: Tifa:That's the story. So, will you come with us?
Dialogue: That's the story. So, will you come with us?
trans: 故事就是这样。

Original: Zell:Heh, I'm flattered, but I'll pass. I can make it home on my own with one hand tied behind my back.
Dialogue: Heh, I'm flattered, but I'll pass. I can make it home on my own with one hand tied behind my back.
trans: 嘿，我受宠若惊，但我会通过。

Original: Tifa:Don't be too modest, now...
Dialogue: Don't be too modest, now...
trans: 别太谦虚了，现在...

Original: Zell:I'm not being modest! How can I call myself SeeD if I can't take care of myself!
Dialogue: I'm not being modest! How can I call myself SeeD if I can't take care of myself!
trans: 我不是谦虚！

Original: Cloud:Knock yourself out.
Dialogue: Knock yourself out.
trans: 把自己打昏。

Original: Zell:Well, you guys take care. Maybe we'll meet again someday. Later!
Dialogue: Well, you guys take care. Maybe we'll meet again someday. Later!
trans: 好吧，你们保重。

Original: Laguna:So, uh... How'd he know me?
Dialogue: So, uh... How'd he know me?
trans: 那么，呃...他怎么认识我的？

Original: Cloud:Don't ask me. I'm sure you'll figure it out.
Dialogue: Don't ask me. I'm sure you'll figure it out.
trans: 不要问我。

Original: Kefka:Hale losers, well schlepped. Waltz in like you own the place, why don't ya?
Dialogue: Hale losers, well schlepped. Waltz in like you own the place, why don't ya?
trans: 硬朗的失败者，很好 schlepped。

Original: ???:...If it isn't Cloud.
Dialogue: ...If it isn't Cloud.
trans: ...如果不是Cloud。

Original: Cloud:Vincent!? What are you doing here?
Dialogue: Vincent!? What are you doing here?
trans: 文森特！？

Original: Terra:A friend?
Dialogue: A friend?
trans: 一个朋友？

Original: Vincent:I've chosen a different path in this world.
Dialogue: I've chosen a different path in this world.
trans: 我在这个世界上选择了一条不同的道路。

Original: Mog:Could he also be under Kefka's control, kupo?
Dialogue: Could he also be under Kefka's control, kupo?
trans: 难不成他也​​在凯夫卡的控制之下，库波？

Original: Vincent:I act of my own accord.
Dialogue: I act of my own accord.
trans: 我是自愿的。

Original: Vincent:I have sins to atone for...
Dialogue: I have sins to atone for...
trans: 我有罪要赎...

Original: Kefka:Hee hee hee. Ain't it the truth.
Dialogue: Hee hee hee. Ain't it the truth.
trans: 嘻嘻嘻。

Original: Cloud:What sins?
Dialogue: What sins?
trans: 什么罪？

Original: Cloud:You think he can help atone for anything? All he'll do is pile one sin on top of another.
Dialogue: You think he can help atone for anything? All he'll do is pile one sin on top of another.
trans: 你认为他可以帮助赎罪吗？

Original: Vincent:There's more here than meets the eye.
Dialogue: There's more here than meets the eye.
trans: 这里有比眼睛更多的东西。

Original: Kefka:Moving on, there's a big, fat Torsion hiding somewhere in here.
Dialogue: Moving on, there's a big, fat Torsion hiding somewhere in here.
trans: 继续前进，这里某处藏着一个又大又胖的 Torsion。

Original: Kefka:Clean it up and you'll be in for a fabulous reward from yours truly.
Dialogue: Clean it up and you'll be in for a fabulous reward from yours truly.
trans: 把它清理干净，你就会真正从你那里得到一份极好的奖励。

Original: Cloud:Argh... What's going on?
Dialogue: Argh... What's going on?
trans: 啊……这是怎么回事？

Original: Mog:A-at any rate, there's no mistaking that there's a Torsion here, kupo.
Dialogue: A-at any rate, there's no mistaking that there's a Torsion here, kupo.
trans: 总、总之，这里肯定存在扭力，kupo。

Original: Mog:If we keep moving, maybe we'll see your friend again, too, kupo!
Dialogue: If we keep moving, maybe we'll see your friend again, too, kupo!
trans: 如果我们继续前进，也许我们还能再见到你的朋友，kupo！

Original: Cloud:...I suppose that's our only option.
Dialogue: ...I suppose that's our only option.
trans: ...我想这是我们唯一的选择。

Original: ???:Light... Darkness...
Dialogue: Light... Darkness...
trans: 光明……黑暗……

Original: ???:The balance of all has foundered... So...we have come to return all to the Void, have we?
Dialogue: The balance of all has foundered... So...we have come to return all to the Void, have we?
trans: 一切的平衡都已经崩溃了……所以……我们是来把一切都归还虚空的，是吗？

Original: Terra:And you are?
Dialogue: And you are?
trans: 你是？

Original: Terra:Did you say Edgar!? He's the resistance leader!?
Dialogue: Did you say Edgar!? He's the resistance leader!?
trans: 你说埃德加！？

Original: ???:You didn't tell her?
Dialogue: You didn't tell her?
trans: 你没告诉她？

Original: Shadow:I only told her what she needed to know.
Dialogue: I only told her what she needed to know.
trans: 我只告诉了她她需要知道的。

Original: Terra:Wow, thanks...
Dialogue: Wow, thanks...
trans: 哇谢谢...

Original: Warrior of Light:Who is this Edgar you speak of?
Dialogue: Who is this Edgar you speak of?
trans: 你说的埃德加是谁？

Original: Mog:Anyway, I'm guessing you're also looking for the Torsions, kupo?
Dialogue: Anyway, I'm guessing you're also looking for the Torsions, kupo?
trans: 无论如何，我猜你也在寻找 Torsions，kupo？

Original: ???:So you're the moogle I keep hearing about.
Dialogue: So you're the moogle I keep hearing about.
trans: 所以你就是我一直听说的莫古力。

Original: ???:Let me get a better look at ya.
Dialogue: Let me get a better look at ya.
trans: 让我好好看看你。

Original: Mog:Wh-what's going on, kupooo!?
Dialogue: Wh-what's going on, kupooo!?
trans: 什、怎么回事，咕咕咕！？

Original: Bartz:Whoa! Mog, you can fly backwards? I'm impressed!
Dialogue: Whoa! Mog, you can fly backwards? I'm impressed!
trans: 哇！

Original: Mog:I-it's not me! Something's pulling me back, kupo!
Dialogue: I-it's not me! Something's pulling me back, kupo!
trans: 我、不是我！

Original: ???:Hmmm. Looks like any ordinary moogle to mea bit shifty, maybe.
Dialogue: Hmmm. Looks like any ordinary moogle to me—a bit shifty, maybe.
trans: 嗯。

Original: Mog:H-how rude! I'm not shifty, kupo!
Dialogue: H-how rude! I'm not shifty, kupo!
trans: 多么粗鲁！

Original: ???:...Ah well.
Dialogue: ...Ah well.

Original: ???:Anyway, Edgar asked me to help you guys out.
Dialogue: Anyway, Edgar asked me to help you guys out.
trans: 不管怎样，埃德加要我帮助你们。

Original: ???:There's still some stuff I need to look into, so I'll catch up with you all when I'm done.
Dialogue: There's still some stuff I need to look into, so I'll catch up with you all when I'm done.
trans: 我还有一些事情需要调查，所以我会在完成后与大家联系。

Original: Mog:Just when you think you've seen it all. I thought I was a goner, kupo.
Dialogue: Just when you think you've seen it all. I thought I was a goner, kupo.
trans: 就在你认为你已经看到这一切的时候。

Original: Cloud:Mansions and Vincent... Go figure.
Dialogue: Mansions and Vincent... Go figure.
trans: 豪宅和文森特......去图。

Original: Vaan:Home sweet home?
Dialogue: Home sweet home?
trans: 家，甜蜜的家？

Original: Cloud:As if. The place was packed with monsters. I'd have a hard time calling it "sweet" anything.
Dialogue: As if. The place was packed with monsters. I'd have a hard time calling it "sweet" anything.
trans: 仿佛。

Original: Steiner:A most unpleasant abode, in truth...
Dialogue: A most unpleasant abode, in truth...
trans: 一个最不愉快的住所，事实上...

Original: Terra:The gods fashioned this world after all of ours, right?
Dialogue: The gods fashioned this world after all of ours, right?
trans: 众神在我们所有人之后塑造了这个世界，对吧？

Original: Steiner:That would explain any uncanny similarities.
Dialogue: That would explain any uncanny similarities.
trans: 这可以解释任何不可思议的相似之处。

Original: Vaan:In that case, the gods have awfully bad taste.
Dialogue: In that case, the gods have awfully bad taste.
trans: 在那种情况下，众神的品味非常糟糕。

Original: Vaan:They shoulda copied someplace a little nicer.
Dialogue: They shoulda copied someplace a little nicer.
trans: 他们应该在某个地方复制得更好一点。

Original: Cloud:...No argument from me.
Dialogue: ...No argument from me.
trans: ......我没有争论。

Original: Vaan:I bet your pal acts that way 'cause he hangs out in such depressing places.
Dialogue: I bet your pal acts that way 'cause he hangs out in such depressing places.
trans: 我敢打赌你的朋友会那样做，因为他常去那些令人沮丧的地方。

Original: Cloud:If I had to guess, likely he's got a reason for being here...
Dialogue: If I had to guess, likely he's got a reason for being here...
trans: 如果非要我猜的话，他可能有来这里的理由……

Original: Cloud:...But standing around won't tell us anything. Let's go.
Dialogue: ...But standing around won't tell us anything. Let's go.
trans: ......但站在那里不会告诉我们任何事情。

Original: Vivi:Tifa, that Vincent guy is one of your friends, right?
Dialogue: Tifa, that Vincent guy is one of your friends, right?
trans: 蒂法，那个文森特是你的朋友之一，对吧？

Original: Tifa:He is, but...
Dialogue: He is, but...
trans: 他是，但是...

Original: Tifa:He's got a tendency to clam up and brood over things on his own...
Dialogue: He's got a tendency to clam up and brood over things on his own...
trans: 他有闭口不谈和独自思考事情的倾向……

Original: Hope:We should help him.
Dialogue: We should help him.
trans: 我们应该帮助他。

Original: Galuf:He spoke of sins. Have you any idea about what he meant?
Dialogue: He spoke of sins. Have you any idea about what he meant?
trans: 他谈到罪恶。

Original: Tifa:...I don't know for sure. But...
Dialogue: ...I don't know for sure. But...

Original: Tifa:If what happens in this world has some effect on what's happened in ours...
Dialogue: If what happens in this world has some effect on what's happened in ours...
trans: 如果这个世界上发生的事情对我们这个世界上发生的事情有一些影响......

Original: Vivi:He might try to use the Torsions to change fate...like Kuja.
Dialogue: He might try to use the Torsions to change fate...like Kuja.
trans: 他可能会尝试使用 Torsions 来改变命运……就像 Kuja。

Original: Galuf:Power is to be used for the greater good.
Dialogue: Power is to be used for the greater good.
trans: 权力是为了更大的利益而使用的。

Original: Hope:The same goes for our light. Misusing it could destroy the world.
Dialogue: The same goes for our light. Misusing it could destroy the world.
trans: 我们的光也是如此。

Original: Hope:So... If we let him continue on this path...
Dialogue: So... If we let him continue on this path...
trans: 所以……如果我们让他继续这条路……

Original: Mog:Right, kupo.
Dialogue: Right, kupo.
trans: 对了，大衣。

Original: Mog:Vincent's light is strong, but it's veered off course, kupo.
Dialogue: Vincent's light is strong, but it's veered off course, kupo.
trans: 文森特的光芒很强，但它偏离了轨道，库珀。

Original: Mog:It's like it's wavering between light and dark... A real precarious position, kupo.
Dialogue: It's like it's wavering between light and dark... A real precarious position, kupo.
trans: 就好像它在光明和黑暗之间摇摆不定……一个真正不稳定的位置，kupo。

Original: Tifa:We need more information. If we keep moving, we'll find him...I hope.
Dialogue: We need more information. If we keep moving, we'll find him...I hope.
trans: 我们需要更多信息。

Original: ???:Hey, party people. Getting along well?
Dialogue: Hey, party people. Getting along well?
trans: 嘿，党员们。

Original: Mog:Kupo!? Oh no...
Dialogue: Kupo!? Oh no...
trans: 愚蠢的！？

Original: ???:I've wrapped up my business. Far be it from me to cast aspersions, but what a cruddy mansion.
Dialogue: I've wrapped up my business. Far be it from me to cast aspersions, but what a cruddy mansion.
trans: 我已经结束了我的生意。

Original: ???:Anyway, count me in your party, too. Nothing beats good company, right?
Dialogue: Anyway, count me in your party, too. Nothing beats good company, right?
trans: 不管怎样，把我也算在你的队伍里。

Original: Terra:Mog's terrified of you, you know?
Dialogue: Mog's terrified of you, you know?
trans: 莫格害怕你，你知道吗？

Original: ???:Whoops, sorry about earlier. Promise it won't happen again.
Dialogue: Whoops, sorry about earlier. Promise it won't happen again.
trans: 哎呀，对不起之前。

Original: Terra:How did you even do that? It looked like you were pulling Mog with some sort of invisible hand.
Dialogue: How did you even do that? It looked like you were pulling Mog with some sort of invisible hand.
trans: 你是怎么做到的？

Original: Bartz:...What's that? How do you bear crystals?
Dialogue: ...What's that? How do you bear crystals?
trans: ...那是什么？

Original: ???:Take a look here. On my face.
Dialogue: Take a look here. On my face.
trans: 看看这里。

Original: Bartz:Whoa! You've got a crystal stuck in your cheek!
Dialogue: Whoa! You've got a crystal stuck in your cheek!
trans: 哇！

Original: ???:A bearer gets to use the powers of the crystal he's stuck withergo, crystal bearer.
Dialogue: A bearer gets to use the powers of the crystal he's stuck with—ergo, crystal bearer.
trans: 持有者可以使用他所坚持的水晶的力量——因此，水晶持有者。

Original: ???:I can manipulate gravity to move anything I want. Juggling moogles is a piece of cake.
Dialogue: I can manipulate gravity to move anything I want. Juggling moogles is a piece of cake.
trans: 我可以操纵重力来移动我想要的任何东西。

Original: Bartz:That's amazing. I can't believe the crystals in your world have that kind of power.
Dialogue: That's amazing. I can't believe the crystals in your world have that kind of power.
trans: 太棒了。

Original: ???:Oh yeah. Forgot to introduce myself.
Dialogue: Oh yeah. Forgot to introduce myself.
trans: 哦耶。

Original: Layle:Layle. Nice to meet you.
Dialogue: Layle. Nice to meet you.
trans: 莱尔。

Original: Mog:You really promise you won't pick on me anymore, kupo?
Dialogue: You really promise you won't pick on me anymore, kupo?
trans: 你真的保证不再找我麻烦了吗，库波？

Original: Layle:Relax. I've got better things to do.
Dialogue: Relax. I've got better things to do.
trans: 放松。

Original: Layle:Anyway, let's go and get this crap over with.
Dialogue: Anyway, let's go and get this crap over with.
trans: 无论如何，让我们去结束这个废话。

Original: Zidane:Look, this way leads underground!
Dialogue: Look, this way leads underground!
trans: 看，这条路通往地下！

Original: Bartz:Where there's a hidden passage, there's treasure, huh?
Dialogue: Where there's a hidden passage, there's treasure, huh?
trans: 哪里有暗道，哪里就有宝物吧？

Original: Mog:I'm sensing tremendous power from down there, kupo!
Dialogue: I'm sensing tremendous power from down there, kupo!
trans: 我从下面感觉到巨大的力量，kupo！

Original: Yuffie:The mansion basement... Man, talk about creepy!
Dialogue: The mansion basement... Man, talk about creepy!
trans: 豪宅地下室……伙计，说说毛骨悚然吧！

Original: Yuffie:Damp, dark...and definitely haunted...
Dialogue: Damp, dark...and definitely haunted...
trans: 潮湿、黑暗……绝对是闹鬼的……

Original: Zidane:Scared? We can hold hands if you
Dialogue: Scared? We can hold hands if you—
trans: 害怕的？

Original: Yuffie:Hate to break it to ya, but where there's treasure, there's Yuffie!
Dialogue: Hate to break it to ya, but where there's treasure, there's Yuffie!
trans: 不想告诉你，但哪里有宝藏，哪里就有 Yuffie！

Original: Yuffie:Ladies first!
Dialogue: Ladies first!
trans: 女士优先！

Original: Zidane:Good grief... What a ball of energy. Wish I could be that carefree.
Dialogue: Good grief... What a ball of energy. Wish I could be that carefree.
trans: 天哪……真是个能量球。

Original: Bartz:...Can't say I can tell the difference.
Dialogue: ...Can't say I can tell the difference.
trans: ...不能说我能分辨出区别。

Original: Mog:...Best to keep it simple, kupo.
Dialogue: ...Best to keep it simple, kupo.
trans: ...最好保持简单，kupo。

Original: Mog:Kupo! Don't leave me here!
Dialogue: Kupo! Don't leave me here!
trans: 库波！

Original: Vincent:You gathered I'd be here and came after me.
Dialogue: You gathered I'd be here and came after me.
trans: 你猜到我会在这里，然后跟着我。

Original: Cloud:We aren't looking for a fight. Why are you with Kefka?
Dialogue: We aren't looking for a fight. Why are you with Kefka?
trans: 我们不是要打架。

Original: Cloud:He's thrown away his humanity and become a slave to chaos. I wouldn't expect you to partner with scum like that.
Dialogue: He's thrown away his humanity and become a slave to chaos. I wouldn't expect you to partner with scum like that.
trans: 他抛弃了人性，成为混乱的奴隶。

Original: Vincent:Heh... Thrown away his humanity, has he?
Dialogue: Heh... Thrown away his humanity, has he?
trans: 呵……丢掉人性了吧？

Original: Vincent:I guess this body of mine makes us one and the same then.
Dialogue: I guess this body of mine makes us one and the same then.
trans: 我想我的这个身体使我们成为一体。

Original: Cloud:You know that's not what I meant!
Dialogue: You know that's not what I meant!
trans: 你知道我不是那个意思！

Original: Cloud:What's going on? You're usually more level-headed than this...
Dialogue: What's going on? You're usually more level-headed than this...
trans: 这是怎么回事？

Original: Vincent:...You met Sphiroth.
Dialogue: ...You met Sphiroth.
trans: ...你遇到了斯菲罗斯。

Original: Warrior of Light:Why would you know that? I don't recall you being there.
Dialogue: Why would you know that? I don't recall you being there.
trans: 为什么你会知道？

Original: Vincent:I've chosen my associates... based on the knowledge you seem to lack.
Dialogue: I've chosen my associates... based on the knowledge you seem to lack.
trans: 我已经选择了我的同事……基于你似乎缺乏的知识。

Original: Vincent:Depending on how it's used, the same power could change the fate of the planet...
Dialogue: Depending on how it's used, the same power could change the fate of the planet...
trans: 取决于它的使用方式，同样的力量可能会改变地球的命运......

Original: Cloud:You seriously believe that?
Dialogue: You seriously believe that?
trans: 你真的相信吗？

Original: Firion:You can't! The light isn't as simple as that.
Dialogue: You can't! The light isn't as simple as that.
trans: 你不能！

Original: Y'shtola:...Indeed, we may be lacking in knowledge.
Dialogue: ...Indeed, we may be lacking in knowledge.
trans: ...确实，我们可能缺乏知识。

Original: Y'shtola:Yet somehow I have little interest in aiding a man hellbent on destruction.
Dialogue: Yet somehow I have little interest in aiding a man hellbent on destruction.
trans: 然而不知何故，我对帮助一个执意要毁灭的人毫无兴趣。

Original: Vincent:...I'm not looking for anyone's understanding.
Dialogue: ...I'm not looking for anyone's understanding.
trans: ...我不是在寻求任何人的理解。

Original: Cloud:Hold on!
Dialogue: Hold on!
trans: 坚持，稍等！

Original: Warrior of Light:If we mean to learn the truth, perhaps we can extract it from him.
Dialogue: If we mean to learn the truth, perhaps we can extract it from him.
trans: 如果我们想知道真相，也许我们可以从他那里提取出来。

Original: Firion:First let's help him get in the mood to talk!
Dialogue: First let's help him get in the mood to talk!
trans: 首先让我们帮他找心情说话！

Original: Vincent:I must atone for my sins. Let me be.
Dialogue: I must atone for my sins. Let me be.
trans: 我必须为我的罪孽赎罪。

Original: Yuffie:You can be a real pain, you know that? Are you sure you didn't imagine all these sins?
Dialogue: You can be a real pain, you know that? Are you sure you didn't imagine all these sins?
trans: 你可以是一个真正的痛苦，你知道吗？

Original: Yuffie:Listen, we're bringing you back to our side! Everyone, gimme a hand with him!
Dialogue: Listen, we're bringing you back to our side! Everyone, gimme a hand with him!
trans: 听着，我们要把你带回我们身边！

Original: Vincent:Ngh... Even here I'm useless...?
Dialogue: Ngh... Even here I'm useless...?
trans: 唔……即使在这里我也是无用的……？

Original: Cloud:Vincent, get a grip! We can still
Dialogue: Vincent, get a grip! We can still—
trans: 文森特，抓紧！

Original: Kefka:Zip! A widdle warp for my starry-eyed sock puppet. Ain't I swell?
Dialogue: Zip! A widdle warp for my starry-eyed sock puppet. Ain't I swell?
trans: 压缩！

Original: Rem:Translocation magic... He's back in the manor!
Dialogue: Translocation magic... He's back in the manor!
trans: 易位魔法……他回庄园了！

Original: Mog:Let's go after him and finish talking, kupo!
Dialogue: Let's go after him and finish talking, kupo!
trans: 我们去追他，把话说完，库波！

Original: Cloud:(There's no way Vincent hasn't got that snake's number...)
Dialogue: (There's no way Vincent hasn't got that snake's number...)
trans: （文森特不可能不知道那条蛇的号码……）

Original: Cloud:(He must be letting Kefka think he's pulling the strings in order to use him...)
Dialogue: (He must be letting Kefka think he's pulling the strings in order to use him...)
trans: （他一定是让 ​​Kefka 认为他在暗中操纵以便利用他……）

Original: Cloud:If we hear him out, maybe we can figure out what's really going on here...
Dialogue: If we hear him out, maybe we can figure out what's really going on here...
trans: 如果我们听他说完，也许我们就能弄清楚这里到底发生了什么……

Original: Zell:Argh...
Dialogue: Argh...

Original: Seifer:That all you got? Once a chicken-wuss, always a chicken-wuss, I guess.
Dialogue: That all you got? Once a chicken-wuss, always a chicken-wuss, I guess.
trans: 这就是你的全部？

Original: Zell:Shut up! I ain't no chicken-wuss, you
Dialogue: Shut up! I ain't no chicken-wuss, you—
trans: 住口！

Original: Mog:Seifer! Stop, kupo!
Dialogue: Seifer! Stop, kupo!
trans: 塞弗！

Original: Seifer:Hmph. You again, moogle? I told you to stay out of my way.
Dialogue: Hmph. You again, moogle? I told you to stay out of my way.
trans: 哼。

Original: Laguna:Whoa! Nice gunblade!
Dialogue: Whoa! Nice gunblade!
trans: 哇！

Original: Seifer:Who do you think you are, talking to me like that?
Dialogue: Who do you think you are, talking to me like that?
trans: 你以为你是谁，这样跟我说话？

Original: Seifer:Wait. I've seen him from somewhere before.
Dialogue: Wait. I've seen him from somewhere before.
trans: 等待。

Original: Laguna:Ack! Don't tell me you also met me in your dreams.
Dialogue: Ack! Don't tell me you also met me in your dreams.
trans: 阿克！

Original: Raijin:Oh yeah! That's the guy who played the gunblade knight in that old movie, ya know?
Dialogue: Oh yeah! That's the guy who played the gunblade knight in that old movie, ya know?
trans: 哦耶！

Original: Laguna:Old? That movie just came out.
Dialogue: Old? That movie just came out.
trans: 老的？

Original: Seifer:You...you're my hero! I started using a gunblade because of you! I can't believe I ran into you here!
Dialogue: You...you're my hero! I started using a gunblade because of you! I can't believe I ran into you here!
trans: 你……你是我的英雄！

Original: Raijin:Yeah, he looks the same as he did back then, ya know? Gotta hand it to movie stars, ya know?
Dialogue: Yeah, he looks the same as he did back then, ya know? Gotta hand it to movie stars, ya know?
trans: 是的，他看起来和当年一样，你知道吗？

Original: Laguna:Back then? Unaged? Uh-oh, I'm gettin' lost again...
Dialogue: Back then? Unaged? Uh-oh, I'm gettin' lost again...
trans: 那时候？

Original: Mog:Dimensional distortion transcends time and space, kupo.
Dialogue: Dimensional distortion transcends time and space, kupo.
trans: 维度扭曲超越时空，kupo。

Original: Seifer:You made me the man I am today! Who better to test my strength against than my childhood hero!
Dialogue: You made me the man I am today! Who better to test my strength against than my childhood hero!
trans: 你让我成为今天的我！

Original: Zell:Seifer, d-don't...
Dialogue: Seifer, d-don't...
trans: Seifer，别-别...

Original: Seifer:Take a nap, chicken-wuss.
Dialogue: Take a nap, chicken-wuss.
trans: 小睡一下，胆小鬼。

Original: Seifer:Let's do this. Fujin! Raijin!
Dialogue: Let's do this. Fujin! Raijin!
trans: 让我们这样做。风神！雷神！

Original: Mog:W-watch out, kupo!
Dialogue: W-watch out, kupo!
trans: 小心，库波！

Original: Warrior of Light:Are you hurt?
Dialogue: Are you hurt?
trans: 你受伤了吗？

Original: Zell:Ugh! That punk made a fool of me!
Dialogue: Ugh! That punk made a fool of me!
trans: 啊!

Original: Laguna:Eh, what are ya gonna do? He's a tough guy.
Dialogue: Eh, what are ya gonna do? He's a tough guy.
trans: 呃，你要做什么？

Original: Zell:What, so you're saying I should just give up and admit defeat!?
Dialogue: What, so you're saying I should just give up and admit defeat!?
trans: 什么，你说我就认输认输吧！？

Original: Warrior of Light:Coming to terms with defeat grants an opportunity to reflect upon and improve oneself. Consider this a lesson.
Dialogue: Coming to terms with defeat grants an opportunity to reflect upon and improve oneself. Consider this a lesson.
trans: 坦然接受失败，让我们有机会反省和提升自己。

Original: Laguna:Yeah, shed the ego and put on your training gloves. Gotta prepare for the rematch!
Dialogue: Yeah, shed the ego and put on your training gloves. Gotta prepare for the rematch!
trans: 是的，摆脱自我，戴上训练手套。

Original: Zell:Shed my ego, huh? You're right. Thanks, Laguna.
Dialogue: Shed my ego, huh? You're right. Thanks, Laguna.
trans: 摆脱我的自我，是吧？

Original: Laguna:Heh-heh! I do what I can.
Dialogue: Heh-heh! I do what I can.
trans: 呵呵！

Original: Zell:All right, I've made up my mind. I'm comin' with you guys.
Dialogue: All right, I've made up my mind. I'm comin' with you guys.
trans: 好吧，我决定了。

Original: Mog:Really, kupo!?
Dialogue: Really, kupo!?
trans: 真的吗，大衣！？

Original: Zell:Yeah, man! Training is back in session! And who better to train with than you all?
Dialogue: Yeah, man! Training is back in session! And who better to train with than you all?
trans: 是的，伙计！

Original: Zell:Next time I see Seifer, he's gonna wish he never messed with me.
Dialogue: Next time I see Seifer, he's gonna wish he never messed with me.
trans: 下次我见到 Seifer，他会希望他永远不要惹我。

Original: Warrior of Light:We're glad to have you.
Dialogue: We're glad to have you.
trans: 我们很高兴有你。

Original: Mog:I can feel your light getting even brighter, kupo!
Dialogue: I can feel your light getting even brighter, kupo!
trans: 我能感觉到你的光越来越亮了，kupo！

Original: Zell:Left! Right! Hah!
Dialogue: Left! Right! Hah!
trans: 左边！

Original: Zell:Whew...! Alright, only eight more sets!
Dialogue: Whew...! Alright, only eight more sets!

Original: Zidane:Look at that Zell go. Gotta admire his pep.
Dialogue: Look at that Zell go. Gotta admire his pep.
trans: 看看那个 Zell 去。

Original: Vaan:Hey, Zell! Why don't you take a break already?
Dialogue: Hey, Zell! Why don't you take a break already?
trans: 嘿，泽尔！

Original: Zell:Not yet! How am I gonna kick Seifer's butt if I skimp on my workout!?
Dialogue: Not yet! How am I gonna kick Seifer's butt if I skimp on my workout!?
trans: 还没有！

Original: Zell:I'm SeeD! That bum can't diss me and get away with it!
Dialogue: I'm SeeD! That bum can't diss me and get away with it!
trans: 我是西德！

Original: Vaan:Speaking of, I've been wondering... What's "seed"?
Dialogue: Speaking of, I've been wondering... What's "seed"?
trans: 说到，我一直在想……什么是“种子”？

Original: Zell:Military cadets who train at the Garden and pass a really tough exam get to become members of an elite unit: SeeD.
Dialogue: Military cadets who train at the Garden and pass a really tough exam get to become members of an elite unit SeeD.
trans: 在花园接受训练并通过严格考试的军校学员将成为精英部队 SeeD 的成员。

Original: Vaan:No kidding. You must be more impressive than you look, huh?
Dialogue: No kidding. You must be more impressive than you look, huh?
trans: 别开玩笑了。

Original: Zell:What's that supposed to mean!?
Dialogue: What's that supposed to mean!?
trans: 那是什么意思！？

Original: Zidane:Is Seifer SeeD, too?
Dialogue: Is Seifer SeeD, too?
trans: Seifer SeeD 也是吗？

Original: Zell:Naw, he's forever a cadet. He's got the ability, sure, but you saw his attitude.
Dialogue: Naw, he's forever a cadet. He's got the ability, sure, but you saw his attitude.
trans: 不，他永远是一名学员。

Original: Vaan:He does seem to have a bit of a self-centered, stubborn streak...
Dialogue: He does seem to have a bit of a self-centered, stubborn streak...
trans: 他似乎确实有点以自我为中心，固执己见……

Original: Zell:And that's why I can't let him kick me around!
Dialogue: And that's why I can't let him kick me around!
trans: 这就是为什么我不能让他踢我！

Original: Zell:I'm gonna get stronger, pound some sense into that stupid head of his, and put him on the straight and narrow!
Dialogue: I'm gonna get stronger, pound some sense into that stupid head of his, and put him on the straight and narrow!
trans: 我要变得更强壮，给他那愚蠢的脑袋灌输一些理智，让他走正路！

Original: Zidane:Ah, the passion of youth. Must be fun.
Dialogue: Ah, the passion of youth. Must be fun.
trans: 啊，青春的激情。

Original: Vaan:Zell! Let's train together! I know exactly how you feel!
Dialogue: Zell! Let's train together! I know exactly how you feel!
trans: 泽尔！

Original: Zell:Deal! We'll race to the sunset!
Dialogue: Deal! We'll race to the sunset!
trans: 交易！

Original: Zidane:What sun? It's pouring.
Dialogue: What sun? It's pouring.
trans: 什么太阳？

Original: Zell:Let's go! Raaargh! I'll show you, Seifer!
Dialogue: Let's go! Raaargh! I'll show you, Seifer!
trans: 我们走吧！

Original: Vaan:Raaargh! First-rate sky pirate, here I come!
Dialogue: Raaargh! First-rate sky pirate, here I come!
trans: 哇！

Original: Zidane:Ah well. No point in raining on their parade...
Dialogue: Ah well. No point in raining on their parade...
trans: 呃，好吧。

Original: Zidane:Hold up! I'm coming, too!
Dialogue: Hold up! I'm coming, too!
trans: 耽误！

Original: Layle:This place gets spookier the more you look at it. Let's finish up and get out of here.
Dialogue: This place gets spookier the more you look at it. Let's finish up and get out of here.
trans: 这个地方越看越诡异。

Original: Shadow:The monsters are getting stronger, too. We shouldn't stay any longer than we need to.
Dialogue: The monsters are getting stronger, too. We shouldn't stay any longer than we need to.
trans: 怪物也越来越强了。

Original: Terra:Mog said he's choosing our destinations based on our strength.
Dialogue: Mog said he's choosing our destinations based on our strength.
trans: 莫格说他是根据我们的实力来选择我们的目的地。

Original: Layle:You don't say. In other words, then, everything we face should be an even match.
Dialogue: You don't say. In other words, then, everything we face should be an even match.
trans: 你不说。

Original: Shadow:I doubt it's as convenient as that.
Dialogue: I doubt it's as convenient as that.
trans: 我怀疑它是否那么方便。

Original: Layle:Monsters obviously have the upper hand in this world. Things are gonna get harder before they get easier.
Dialogue: Monsters obviously have the upper hand in this world. Things are gonna get harder before they get easier.
trans: 怪物显然在这个世界上占据了上风。

Original: Layle:...A note from Edgar. Taking that moogle at its every word'll come back to bite you.
Dialogue: ...A note from Edgar. Taking that moogle at its every word'll come back to bite you.
trans: ……埃德加的字条。

Original: Shadow:There's another deity beside the "goddess" who called us here... Do I have that right?
Dialogue: There's another deity beside the "goddess" who called us here... Do I have that right?
trans: 把我们叫到这里来的，除了“女神”之外，还有一位神……我说的对吗？

Original: Terra:The god who aims to protect the world he created by any means necessary...Spiritus.
Dialogue: The god who aims to protect the world he created by any means necessary...Spiritus.
trans: 以不惜一切手段保护自己创造的世界为目标的神……精灵。

Original: Terra:Undoubtedly, he's the one commanding Kefka and Kuja...
Dialogue: Undoubtedly, he's the one commanding Kefka and Kuja...
trans: 毫无疑问，他就是指挥凯夫卡和库亚的人……

Original: Layle:Also according to your moogle?
Dialogue: Also according to your moogle?
trans: 还根据你的moogle？

Original: Layle:If that were the case, you'd think trouncing that god'd be the first order of business.
Dialogue: If that were the case, you'd think trouncing that god'd be the first order of business.
trans: 如果是这样的话，你会认为击败上帝是首要任务。

Original: Shadow:A battle against divinity, eh?
Dialogue: A battle against divinity, eh?
trans: 与神的战斗，嗯？

Original: Mog:What are you three up to over here, kupo?
Dialogue: What are you three up to over here, kupo?
trans: 你们三个在这里干什么，kupo？

Original: Layle:Just shooting the breeze.
Dialogue: Just shooting the breeze.
trans: 只是拍微风。

Original: Mog:We should get moving soon. If you don't pick it up, you'll get left behind, kupo.
Dialogue: We should get moving soon. If you don't pick it up, you'll get left behind, kupo.
trans: 我们应该尽快搬家。

Original: Terra:...It's true we don't know how much we can believe of what Mog tells us...
Dialogue: ...It's true we don't know how much we can believe of what Mog tells us...
trans: ...的确，我们不知道我们能相信莫格告诉我们的事情有多少...

Original: Terra:But I trust him.
Dialogue: But I trust him.
trans: 但我信任他。

Original: Layle:Shadow? What about you?
Dialogue: Shadow? What about you?
trans: 阴影？

Original: Shadow:I do what I'm paid for, and nothing more.
Dialogue: I do what I'm paid for, and nothing more.
trans: 我做我得到的报酬，仅此而已。

Original: Layle:...Sure you do.
Dialogue: ...Sure you do.
trans: ...当然可以。

Original: Kefka:Ruh-roh! The big, bad good guys have come to stop your diabolical schemes. I trust...you know what must be done.
Dialogue: Ruh-roh! The big, bad good guys have come to stop your diabolical schemes. I trust...you know what must be done.
trans: 鲁鲁！

Original: Vincent:Hmph. Save your half-witted jesting for someone who cares. I only fight for myself.
Dialogue: Hmph. Save your half-witted jesting for someone who cares. I only fight for myself.
trans: 哼。

Original: Kefka:Oh, what arrogance! I love it. Now, show them that monstrous power of yours!
Dialogue: Oh, what arrogance! I love it. Now, show them that monstrous power of yours!
trans: 哦，多么傲慢！

Original: Kefka:Hee hee hee! Slick moves you had there.
Dialogue: Hee hee hee! Slick moves you had there.
trans: 嘻嘻嘻！

Original: Vincent:I wasn't fighting for your sake... I just...want...
Dialogue: I wasn't fighting for your sake... I just...want...
trans: 我不是为了你而战……我只是……想要……

Original: Vincent:...wanted to light some spark of hope... in this contorted world...
Dialogue: ...wanted to light some spark of hope... in this contorted world...
trans: ...想点燃希望的火花...在这个扭曲的世界...

Original: Kefka:Like I give two licks!
Dialogue: Like I give two licks!
trans: 就像我舔两下一样！

Original: Kefka:Struggle and strife... The rising urge to break stuff with each and every fight...
Dialogue: Struggle and strife... The rising urge to break stuff with each and every fight...
trans: 斗争和纷争……每一次战斗都在不断上升的破坏事物的冲动……

Original: Kefka:Can't you just feel it?
Dialogue: Can't you just feel it?
trans: 你就不能感受一下吗？

Original: Shantotto:Push around lackeys to sate urges by proxy? Never have I heard a thing so unappealing.
Dialogue: Push around lackeys to sate urges by proxy? Never have I heard a thing so unappealing.
trans: 通过代理人推动走狗满足冲动？

Original: Shantotto:Better to take what you want by your own sheer moxie! Do it yourself for that full-bellied feeling.
Dialogue: Better to take what you want by your own sheer moxie! Do it yourself for that full-bellied feeling.
trans: 最好用你自己纯粹的勇气去拿你想要的东西！

Original: Cloud:...Vincent, stop taking this all on by yourself.
Dialogue: ...Vincent, stop taking this all on by yourself.
trans: ......文森特，别再一个人承担这一切了。

Original: Kefka:What's this what's this? You knock him about, then want to kiss and make up?
Dialogue: What's this what's this? You knock him about, then want to kiss and make up?
trans: 这是什么 这是什么

Original: Kefka:If you accuse li'l ol' me of being self-serving, isn't he juuust as guilty?
Dialogue: If you accuse li'l ol' me of being self-serving, isn't he juuust as guilty?
trans: 如果你指责 li'l ol' 我是自私自利的，他不是也一样有罪吗？

Original: Cloud:...He hasn't slaughtered countless innocents, to say the least.
Dialogue: ...He hasn't slaughtered countless innocents, to say the least.
trans: ......至少可以说，他没有屠杀过无数无辜者。

Original: Terra:He's nothing like you... Stop tormenting him!
Dialogue: He's nothing like you... Stop tormenting him!
trans: 他跟你不一样……别再折磨他了！

Original: Kefka:Hmph. Cheeky know-nothings.
Dialogue: Hmph. Cheeky know-nothings.
trans: 哼。

Original: Kefka:Fine, then. Make me!
Dialogue: Fine, then. Make me!
trans: 那好吧。

Original: Kefka:Aww, what a lousy monster. You're worthless. Worthlesser than worthless.
Dialogue: Aww, what a lousy monster. You're worthless. Worthlesser than worthless.
trans: 哇，多么糟糕的怪物。

Original: Kefka:You're garbageall of you! So now I'm going to have to Punish you! With a capital P.
Dialogue: You're garbage—all of you! So now I'm going to have to Punish you! With a capital P.
trans: 你们都是垃圾——你们所有人！

Original: Kefka:Ulp, that's enough for now...
Dialogue: Ulp, that's enough for now...
trans: 乌尔普，现在就够了……

Original: Kefka:...Oh-ho? Here's another rude guest...
Dialogue: ...Oh-ho? Here's another rude guest...
trans: ……喔喔？

Original: ???:Hahaha... That's what you call destruction?
Dialogue: Hahaha... That's what you call destruction?
trans: 哈哈哈……这就是所谓的毁灭？

Original: Onion Knight:That's...! Kefka's in league with that, too!?
Dialogue: That's...! Kefka's in league with that, too!?

Original: Kefka:I do not recollect making palsy-walsy with Ms. Cloud of That's-What-You-Call Darkness.
Dialogue: I do not recollect making palsy-walsy with Ms. Cloud of That's-What-You-Call Darkness.
trans: 我不记得曾与“那是你所谓的黑暗”的 Cloud 女士一起麻痹麻痹。

Original: Kefka:...The world is mine for the breaking.
Dialogue: ...The world is mine for the breaking.
trans: ...世界是我的破碎。

Original: Mog:Kupo! We don't stand a chance if they team up against us, kupo!
Dialogue: Kupo! We don't stand a chance if they team up against us, kupo!
trans: 库波！

Original: Mog:Let's beat a hasty retreat, kupo!
Dialogue: Let's beat a hasty retreat, kupo!
trans: 快撤退吧，库波！

Original: Cecil:There's no way in which to flee!
Dialogue: There's no way in which to flee!
trans: 无路可逃！

Original: Onion Knight:What's your game?
Dialogue: What's your game?
trans: 你的游戏是什么？

Original: Vincent:That's your only option for escape. ...I know you can find your way out of there.
Dialogue: That's your only option for escape. ...I know you can find your way out of there.
trans: 那是你逃脱的唯一选择。

Original: Cecil:Come with us; I'm sure we can come to an understanding!
Dialogue: Come with us; I'm sure we can come to an understanding!
trans: 跟我们来;

Original: Vincent:...I've yet to atone from my sins.
Dialogue: ...I've yet to atone from my sins.
trans: ……我的罪还没赎呢。

Original: Cecil:Wait! It's too dangerous...!
Dialogue: Wait! It's too dangerous...!
trans: 等待！

Original: Cloud of Darkness:Run where you may, resistance is futile...
Dialogue: Run where you may, resistance is futile...
trans: 想跑就跑，抵抗是徒劳的……

Original: Vincent:I've...made my choice...
Dialogue: I've...made my choice...
trans: 我……做出了我的选择……

Original: Warrior of Light:Cloud of...Darkness was it? What can you tell us about that entity?
Dialogue: Cloud of...Darkness was it? What can you tell us about that entity?
trans: 是……黑暗之云吗？

Original: Onion Knight:It's from my world. ...I can't believe it's here.
Dialogue: It's from my world. ...I can't believe it's here.
trans: 它来自我的世界。

Original: Yuna:It was impossible to tell if it was friend or foe.
Dialogue: It was impossible to tell if it was friend or foe.
trans: 分不清是敌是友。

Original: Onion Knight:The Cloud of Darkness is...neither human nor monster.
Dialogue: The Cloud of Darkness is...neither human nor monster.
trans: 黑暗之云……既不是人类也不是怪物。

Original: Onion Knight:It appears when the balance between light and dark is out of whack.
Dialogue: It appears when the balance between light and dark is out of whack.
trans: 当光明与黑暗之间的平衡失调时，它就会出现。

Original: King:Appears and then what? It was going on about destruction or something or other.
Dialogue: Appears and then what? It was going on about destruction or something or other.
trans: 出现然后呢？

Original: Onion Knight:When light and darkness are no longer in balance, the Cloud of Darkness will destroy the world... But we're not talking about any old destruction.
Dialogue: When light and darkness are no longer in balance, the Cloud of Darkness will destroy the world... But we're not talking about any old destruction.
trans: 当光明与黑暗不再平衡时，黑暗之云将毁灭世界……但我们不是在谈论任何古老的毁灭。

Original: Onion Knight:It's like a force of nature that comes to reset the world...so it can be reborn from nothingness.
Dialogue: It's like a force of nature that comes to reset the world...so it can be reborn from nothingness.
trans: 就像是一股自然之力降临，重塑了世界……所以才可以从虚无中重生。

Original: Yuna:If such a thing has appeared here, does that mean this world is in such peril?
Dialogue: If such a thing has appeared here, does that mean this world is in such peril?
trans: 如果这里出现了这样的东西，那岂不是这个世界就这么危险了？

Original: Warrior of Light:The balance between light and darkness... Assuming we're the light...
Dialogue: The balance between light and darkness... Assuming we're the light...
trans: 光明与黑暗的平衡……假设我们是光明……

Original: Warrior of Light:Even should we flood the world with light, is it still destined for ruin...?
Dialogue: Even should we flood the world with light, is it still destined for ruin...?
trans: 即使我们应该用光淹没世界，它仍然注定要毁灭......？

Original: Onion Knight:...I don't know. All I know is that we're clueless.
Dialogue: ...I don't know. All I know is that we're clueless.
trans: ...我不知道。

Original: Onion Knight:...It's safe to say this world is anything but balanced.
Dialogue: ...It's safe to say this world is anything but balanced.
trans: ...可以肯定地说，这个世界一点也不平衡。

Original: Onion Knight:But...we don't even know what a balanced world is supposed to look like.
Dialogue: But...we don't even know what a balanced world is supposed to look like.
trans: 但是……我们甚至不知道一个平衡的世界应该是什么样子。

Original: Mog:That's why you should just trust me...
Dialogue: That's why you should just trust me...
trans: 这就是为什么你应该相信我...

Original: ???:I am Ultima... Forged in antiquity, all powerful...
Dialogue: I am Ultima... Forged in antiquity, all powerful...
trans: 我是 Ultima...锻造于远古，无所不能...

Original: Terra:Who said that!?
Dialogue: Who said that!?
trans: 谁说的！？

Original: ???:I am power, unliving... Feeble mortals, begone!!
Dialogue: I am power, unliving... Feeble mortals, begone!!
trans: 我是力量，没有生命……弱小的凡人，开始吧！！

Original: Terra:Look out!
Dialogue: Look out!
trans: 小心！

Original: Mog:I can't believe my eyes, kupo. Here too? But why? Could it be...?
Dialogue: I can't believe my eyes, kupo. Here too? But why? Could it be...?
trans: 我简直不敢相信自己的眼睛，库波。

Original: Mog:Or maybe the destruction is spreading even faster than I imagined...
Dialogue: Or maybe the destruction is spreading even faster than I imagined...
trans: 或许破坏的蔓延速度比我想象的还要快……

Original: Layle:Whoa, now for something completely different... We can't let that thing out of the Torsion!
Dialogue: Whoa, now for something completely different... We can't let that thing out of the Torsion!
trans: 哇哦，现在来点完全不同的东西……我们不能让那东西脱离扭转！

Original: Zell:You can say that again! Come on, let's do this!
Dialogue: You can say that again! Come on, let's do this!
trans: 你可以再说一遍！

Original: Terra:Ultima Weapon... Did it also appear because of the Torsions?
Dialogue: Ultima Weapon... Did it also appear because of the Torsions?
trans: Ultima Weapon……难道也是因为扭曲而出现的？

Original: Cloud:Think there's some rule to how the Torsions pick their muscle?
Dialogue: Think there's some rule to how the Torsions pick their muscle?
trans: 认为扭转如何选择肌肉有一些规则吗？

Original: Onion Knight:One after another, they've all had some connection to us...
Dialogue: One after another, they've all had some connection to us...
trans: 一个接一个，他们都和我们有某种联系……

Original: Onion Knight:...Can't be a coincidence.
Dialogue: ...Can't be a coincidence.
trans: ……不可能是巧合。

Original: Mog:Kupo! More importantly, an exit, kupo!
Dialogue: Kupo! More importantly, an exit, kupo!
trans: 库波！

Original: Kefka:Seee? I told you we'd get here. My magic's nothing to sniff at.
Dialogue: Seee? I told you we'd get here. My magic's nothing to sniff at.
trans: 看到了吗？

Original: Cloud of Darkness:...Insolent man.
Dialogue: ...Insolent man.
trans: ……无礼的人。

Original: Cloud:They followed us... What happened to Vincent!
Dialogue: They followed us... What happened to Vincent!
trans: 他们跟着我们……文森特怎么了！

Original: Kefka:That puppet outlived his usefulness.
Dialogue: That puppet outlived his usefulness.
trans: 那个傀儡活过了他的用处。

Original: Cloud:A puppet...? Why you!
Dialogue: A puppet...? Why you—!
trans: 人偶……？

Original: Cloud of Darkness:We will fight here... That will lead to the Void...
Dialogue: We will fight here... That will lead to the Void...
trans: 我们将在这里战斗……那将通向虚空……

Original: Cloud of Darkness:Let us bring about the cycle of ruin and rebirth...
Dialogue: Let us bring about the cycle of ruin and rebirth...
trans: 让我们带来毁灭和重生的循环……

Original: Onion Knight:Doesn't look like we can avoid this fight.
Dialogue: Doesn't look like we can avoid this fight.
trans: 看来我们无法避免这场战斗。

Original: Cloud of Darkness:Warriors of light? Hmph.
Dialogue: Warriors of light? Hmph.
trans: 光之战士？

Original: Cloud of Darkness:It will take more than light to defeat us.
Dialogue: It will take more than light to defeat us.
trans: 打败我们需要的不仅仅是光。

Original: Terra:We won't know until we try!
Dialogue: We won't know until we try!
trans: 在我们尝试之前我们不会知道！

Original: Cloud of Darkness:Yes... Try to defy reason!
Dialogue: Yes... Try to defy reason!
trans: 是的... 试图违抗理性！

Original: Kefka:And don't forget about yours truly.
Dialogue: And don't forget about yours truly.
trans: 并且不要真正忘记你的。

Original: Cloud:Don't think for a minute we did!
Dialogue: Don't think for a minute we did!
trans: 想一想我们做到了！

Original: Cloud of Darkness:What a powerless, dim light... Allow us to inter you in darkness.
Dialogue: What a powerless, dim light... Allow us to inter you in darkness.
trans: 多么无力、昏暗的光……让我们把你埋葬在黑暗中。

Original: Kefka:Where do all these yahoos get off doing as they please? They're just gonna die. At least I get to do the killing!
Dialogue: Where do all these yahoos get off doing as they please? They're just gonna die. At least I get to do the killing!
trans: 所有这些雅虎都从哪里下车为所欲为？

Original: Zell:Looks like every world has its share of freaks!
Dialogue: Looks like every world has its share of freaks!
trans: 看起来每个世界都有它的怪胎！

Original: Layle:Took the words right out of my mouth. It ends here! Get ready to fight, no holds barred!
Dialogue: Took the words right out of my mouth. It ends here! Get ready to fight, no holds barred!
trans: 直接从我嘴里说出来。

Original: Yuffie:Ahhh! It's Vincent!
Dialogue: Ahhh! It's Vincent!
trans: 啊！

Original: Zell:Oh man, is he alright?
Dialogue: Oh man, is he alright?
trans: 哦，伙计，他还好吗？

Original: Bartz:He's still breathing!
Dialogue: He's still breathing!
trans: 他还在呼吸！

Original: Vincent:Where...? You...you're all safe!
Dialogue: Where...? You...you're all safe!
trans: 在哪里...？

Original: Yuffie:"You're all safe" my foot!
Dialogue: "You're all safe" my foot!
trans: “你们都安全”我的脚！

Original: Yuffie:You're not allowed to act all cool after you get the snot kicked outta you!
Dialogue: You're not allowed to act all cool after you get the snot kicked outta you!
trans: 被踢出你的鼻涕后，你不能表现得很酷！

Original: Layle:Harsh friend. She always like this?
Dialogue: Harsh friend. She always like this?
trans: 苛刻的朋友。

Original: Cloud:Yuffie's concern for others can get a bit dramatic.
Dialogue: Yuffie's concern for others can get a bit dramatic.
trans: Yuffie 对他人的关心可能会变得有点戏剧化。

Original: Yuffie:Gimme a break! You were worried the whole time, too!
Dialogue: Gimme a break! You were worried the whole time, too!
trans: 给我休息一下！

Original: Mog:Neither the Cloud of Darkness nor Kefka are down for the count, kupo.
Dialogue: Neither the Cloud of Darkness nor Kefka are down for the count, kupo.
trans: 黑暗之云和凯夫卡都算不上，库波。

Original: Mog:There're only more and more difficult battles waiting for us from here on out, kupo...
Dialogue: There're only more and more difficult battles waiting for us from here on out, kupo...
trans: 今后只有越来越艰苦的战斗在等着我们，库波……

Original: Zell:We'll knock 'em down as many times as they get back up!
Dialogue: We'll knock 'em down as many times as they get back up!
trans: 只要他们重新站起来，我们就会将他们打倒！

Original: Zell:...Though it'd be nice to at least get one clean victory 'fore I start running my mouth...
Dialogue: ...Though it'd be nice to at least get one clean victory 'fore I start running my mouth...
trans: ......虽然在我开始流口水之前至少获得一场干净的胜利会很好......

Original: Vincent:So my rescue attempt sent you from bad to worse...
Dialogue: So my rescue attempt sent you from bad to worse...
trans: 所以我的营救尝试让你每况愈下...

Original: Bartz:Nobody's blaming you.
Dialogue: Nobody's blaming you.
trans: 没人怪你

Original: Layle:But you still want to make it up to us.
Dialogue: But you still want to make it up to us.
trans: 但你还是想补偿我们。

Original: Vincent:...I need to redeem myself.
Dialogue: ...I need to redeem myself.
trans: ……我需要自我救赎。

Original: Cloud:Then come with us and tell us what you know.
Dialogue: Then come with us and tell us what you know.
trans: 然后和我们一起来，告诉我们你所知道的。

Original: Cloud:(...Including whatever it is that moogle is up to.)
Dialogue: (...Including whatever it is that moogle is up to.)
trans: （……包括莫古利的所作所为。）

Original: Vincent:...Understood. I'll take responsibility for everything.
Dialogue: ...Understood. I'll take responsibility for everything.
trans: ……明白了。

Original: Mog:We've got another warrior with the light, kupo!
Dialogue: We've got another warrior with the light, kupo!
trans: 我们又来了一个带光的战士，kupo！

Original: Vincent:Heh... We'll see soon enough what you mean by that...
Dialogue: Heh... We'll see soon enough what you mean by that...
trans: 嘿......我们很快就会明白你的意思......

Original: Vincent:If that light truly is for helping others or not...
Dialogue: If that light truly is for helping others or not...
trans: 如果那光真的是为了帮助别人……

Original: Mog:Come on! Let's take the airship to the next Torsion, kupo!
Dialogue: Come on! Let's take the airship to the next Torsion, kupo!
trans: 快点！

Original: Yuffie:Ughhh... Not the airship again...
Dialogue: Ughhh... Not the airship again...
trans: 呃……又不是飞艇……

Original: Layle:Not a fan of airships? I can give you a lift with my powers.
Dialogue: Not a fan of airships? I can give you a lift with my powers.
trans: 不喜欢飞艇？

Original: Yuffie:Heck no! You wanna see me extra sick!?
Dialogue: Heck no! You wanna see me extra sick!?
trans: 哎呀不！

Original: Bartz:I finally figured out how to cope! If you don't look outside, you can't tell how high you're up!
Dialogue: I finally figured out how to cope! If you don't look outside, you can't tell how high you're up!
trans: 我终于想出了如何应对！

Original: Vincent:...Blessed with a colorful bunch as usual, eh?
Dialogue: ...Blessed with a colorful bunch as usual, eh?
trans: ...像往常一样幸运地拥有五颜六色的一束，嗯？

Original: Cloud:...You're one to talk.
Dialogue: ...You're one to talk.
trans: ......你是一个说话的人。

Original: Mog:I'm back, kupo.
Dialogue: I'm back, kupo.
trans: 我回来了，笨蛋。

Original: Spiritus:You have quite the band of warriors now.
Dialogue: You have quite the band of warriors now.
trans: 你现在拥有相当多的战士。

Original: Spiritus:Or should I call them pawns?
Dialogue: Or should I call them pawns?
trans: 或者我应该称他们为典当？

Original: Mog:They are no such thing, kupo!
Dialogue: They are no such thing, kupo!
trans: 他们不是这样的东西，kupo！

Original: Mog:Vincent was one of Cloud's allies back in their world, so it's only natural he allied with the goddess Materia.
Dialogue: Vincent was one of Cloud's allies back in their world, so it's only natural he allied with the goddess Materia.
trans: 文森特是克劳德在他们世界中的盟友之一，所以他与女神马特里亚结盟是很自然的。

Original: Spiritus:Hmph. Then I will just send in another pawn to take care of things.
Dialogue: Hmph. Then I will just send in another pawn to take care of things.
trans: 哼。

Original: Spiritus:That's exactly why I sent the Cloud of Darkness.
Dialogue: That's exactly why I sent the Cloud of Darkness.
trans: 这正是我发送黑暗之云的原因。

Original: Mog:That was your doing?
Dialogue: That was your doing?
trans: 那是你干的？

Original: Mog:She was really powerful, kupo.
Dialogue: She was really powerful, kupo.
trans: 她真的很强大，kupo。

Original: Spiritus:Stability in this world cannot exist without a balance between light and darkness.
Dialogue: Stability in this world cannot exist without a balance between light and darkness.
trans: 没有光明与黑暗之间的平衡，这个世界就不可能存在稳定。

Original: Spiritus:Materia's nave puppets will not be able to save the planet.
Dialogue: Materia's naïve puppets will not be able to save the planet.
trans: Materia 天真的傀儡将无法拯救地球。

Original: Mog:So they're not bothering you, kupo?
Dialogue: So they're not bothering you, kupo?
trans: 所以他们没有打扰你，kupo？

Original: Spiritus:To the contrarythey are doing exactly what I want them to.
Dialogue: To the contrary—they are doing exactly what I want them to.
trans: 相反——他们正在做我想让他们做的事情。

Original: Spiritus:Besides, closing the Torsions is merely a temporary solution.
Dialogue: Besides, closing the Torsions is merely a temporary solution.
trans: 此外，关闭 Torsions 只是一个临时解决方案。

Original: Spiritus:Nothing will change if they do not find out what is causing them.
Dialogue: Nothing will change if they do not find out what is causing them.
trans: 如果他们不找出导致他们的原因，什么都不会改变。

Original: Mog:What if the cause of their existence could be found inside of the warriors themselves, kupo?
Dialogue: What if the cause of their existence could be found inside of the warriors themselves, kupo?
trans: 如果他们存在的原因可以在战士本身的内部找到怎么办，kupo？

Original: Spiritus:Ridiculous. Although, that would be rather ironic, wouldn't it?
Dialogue: Ridiculous. Although, that would be rather ironic, wouldn't it?
trans: 荒谬的。

Original: Spiritus:The crystal created this place that the warriors might find respite from battle.
Dialogue: The crystal created this place that the warriors might find respite from battle.
trans: 水晶创造了这个地方，战士们可以从战斗中找到喘息的机会。

Original: Spiritus:Yet even now they continue to fight. Pathetic.
Dialogue: Yet even now they continue to fight. Pathetic.
trans: 然而，即使是现在，他们仍在继续战斗。

Original: Spiritus:But never mind that for now. In the near future, you will encounter someone who despises the gods...
Dialogue: But never mind that for now. In the near future, you will encounter someone who despises the gods...
trans: 但暂时不要介意。

Original: Spiritus:An antagonistic warrior summoned by Materia who chooses no side.
Dialogue: An antagonistic warrior summoned by Materia who chooses no side.
trans: 不选择任何一方的由魔石召唤的敌对战士。

Original: Spiritus:She may even prove to be hostile toward a moogle like you.
Dialogue: She may even prove to be hostile toward a moogle like you.
trans: 她甚至可能对像你这样的 moogle 怀有敌意。

Original: Spiritus:In fact, she's fighting with one of my own as we speak.
Dialogue: In fact, she's fighting with one of my own as we speak.
trans: 事实上，就在我们说话的时候，她正在和我自己的一个人打架。

Original: Spiritus:Will she be a threat to this world? Or the key to uncovering its truths?
Dialogue: Will she be a threat to this world? Or the key to uncovering its truths?
trans: 她会成为这个世界的威胁吗？

Original: Mog:You can count on me to lead her in the right direction, kupo!
Dialogue: You can count on me to lead her in the right direction, kupo!
trans: 你可以指望我带领她朝着正确的方向前进，kupo！

Original: Spiritus:Then prove it.
Dialogue: Then prove it.
trans: 然后证明它。

Original: Mog:K-kupo! Yes, sir!
Dialogue: K-kupo! Yes, sir!
trans: K-kupo！

Original: Garland:You defy me, despite knowing you are nothing more than a tool of the goddess?
Dialogue: You defy me, despite knowing you are nothing more than a tool of the goddess?
trans: 明知自己不过是女神的工具，还违抗我？

Original: Garland:It doesn't matter whose side we're on. There is no future for warriors like us here.
Dialogue: It doesn't matter whose side we're on. There is no future for warriors like us here.
trans: 我们站在哪一边并不重要。

Original: Garland:Or are you merely enjoying the carnage of this world? Perhaps you and I are not so different.
Dialogue: Or are you merely enjoying the carnage of this world? Perhaps you and I are not so different.
trans: 或者你只是在享受这个世界的屠杀？

Original: ???:I didn't ask what you thought.
Dialogue: I didn't ask what you thought.
trans: 我没问你怎么想的。

Original: Garland:It seems there is only one way to settle this.
Dialogue: It seems there is only one way to settle this.
trans: 似乎只有一种方法可以解决这个问题。

Original: ???:Hmph. Was that supposed to hit me?
Dialogue: Hmph. Was that supposed to hit me?
trans: 哼。

Original: Garland:You dare to oppose your fate?
Dialogue: You dare to oppose your fate?
trans: 你敢反抗命运吗？

Original: ???:Fighting for no reason's just slow suicide.
Dialogue: Fighting for no reason's just slow suicide.
trans: 无缘无故的战斗只是缓慢的自杀。

Original: Mog:There's a Torsion here too, kupo!
Dialogue: There's a Torsion here too, kupo!
trans: 这里也有扭转，kupo！

Original: Warrior of Light:Even the scorching lava feels familiar to me. Are these memories of my past?
Dialogue: Even the scorching lava feels familiar to me. Are these memories of my past?
trans: 即使是灼热的熔岩，我也觉得很熟悉。

Original: Bartz:There are places like this where you're from, too?
Dialogue: There are places like this where you're from, too?
trans: 你也有这样的地方吗？

Original: Warrior of Light:...I don't know.
Dialogue: ...I don't know.
trans: ...我不知道。

Original: Warrior of Light:I remember little of my past ever since I arrived in these lands.
Dialogue: I remember little of my past ever since I arrived in these lands.
trans: 自从我来到这片土地后，我几乎不记得我的过去了。

Original: Bartz:Now that you mention it, my head did feel kinda funny while I was going through the Torsion.
Dialogue: Now that you mention it, my head did feel kinda funny while I was going through the Torsion.
trans: 既然你提到了，我在经历 Torsion 时确实觉得脑袋有点滑稽。

Original: Mog:The distortion affects everyone differently, kupo. For some people it's their memories, and for others it's their abilities.
Dialogue: The distortion affects everyone differently, kupo. For some people it's their memories, and for others it's their abilities.
trans: 扭曲对每个人的影响不同，kupo。

Original: Warrior of Light:Regardless, lingering on the past serves us no purpose here. Come, we have no time to waste.
Dialogue: Regardless, lingering on the past serves us no purpose here. Come, we have no time to waste.
trans: 无论如何，留恋过去对我们没有任何意义。

Original: Onion Knight:Vincent, you mentioned you were working with Kefka because there was something you wanted to know, right?
Dialogue: Vincent, you mentioned you were working with Kefka because there was something you wanted to know, right?
trans: 文森特，你提到你和凯夫卡一起工作是因为你想知道一些事情，对吧？

Original: Shantotto:Would that certain something happen to be learning how to create a Torsion to flee?
Dialogue: Would that certain something happen to be learning how to create a Torsion to flee?
trans: 某些事情会不会碰巧正在学习如何创建一个 Torsion 来逃跑？

Original: Vincent:I was unsuccessful. I won't be able to provide you with any valuable information.
Dialogue: I was unsuccessful. I won't be able to provide you with any valuable information.
trans: 我没有成功。

Original: Squall:(That's for us to decide.)
Dialogue: (That's for us to decide.)
trans: （这由我们决定。）

Original: Terra:We wouldn't have been able to escape if it weren't for you.
Dialogue: We wouldn't have been able to escape if it weren't for you.
trans: 如果不是你，我们就逃不掉了。

Original: Shantotto:Listen to the girl; this is no time to brood. Now tell us what you know while I'm still in a good mood.
Dialogue: Listen to the girl; this is no time to brood. Now tell us what you know while I'm still in a good mood.
trans: 听女孩说；

Original: Squall:What is this, an inquisition?
Dialogue: What is this, an inquisition?
trans: 这是什么，审讯？

Original: Shantotto:I suppose you'd prefer to be in his position?
Dialogue: I suppose you'd prefer to be in his position?
trans: 我想你更愿意站在他的立场上？

Original: Layle:He was just talking to himself like always.
Dialogue: He was just talking to himself like always.
trans: 他只是像往常一样自言自语。

Original: Squall:...You were saying.
Dialogue: ...You were saying.
trans: ……你是说。

Original: Vincent:The moogle said we need to save this world.
Dialogue: The moogle said we need to save this world.
trans: 莫古利说我们需要拯救这个世界。

Original: Vincent:But...for who?
Dialogue: But...for who?
trans: 但是……为了谁？

Original: Onion Knight:The only people we've met here are warriors from other worlds.
Dialogue: The only people we've met here are warriors from other worlds.
trans: 我们在这里遇到的唯一的人是来自其他世界的战士。

Original: Shantotto:And forget not in the least the manikins and beasts.
Dialogue: And forget not in the least the manikins and beasts.
trans: 并且至少不要忘记人体模型和野兽。

Original: Vincent:Exactly. I've seen nothing worth fighting for in this inane world.
Dialogue: Exactly. I've seen nothing worth fighting for in this inane world.
trans: 确切地。

Original: Terra:But according to Mog, the destruction will eventually spread to our worlds.
Dialogue: But according to Mog, the destruction will eventually spread to our worlds.
trans: 但根据 Mog 的说法，破坏最终会蔓延到我们的世界。

Original: Squall:There's no way for us to confirm that.
Dialogue: There's no way for us to confirm that.
trans: 我们无法确认这一点。

Original: Layle:Which is why our client has a hard time trusting Mog.
Dialogue: Which is why our client has a hard time trusting Mog.
trans: 这就是为什么我们的客户很难信任 Mog。

Original: Onion Knight:Client, huh? ...Mog claimed he's a messenger of some goddess, didn't he?
Dialogue: Client, huh? ...Mog claimed he's a messenger of some goddess, didn't he?
trans: 客户，嗯？

Original: Shantotto:A goddess, is it? Then let's pay her a visit.
Dialogue: A goddess, is it? Then let's pay her a visit.
trans: 是女神吧？

Original: Layle:You think we can meet her that easy?
Dialogue: You think we can meet her that easy?
trans: 你以为我们这么容易就能见到她？

Original: Shantotto:That moogle on occasion sneaks off someplace. We should follow him, of course.
Dialogue: That moogle on occasion sneaks off someplace. We should follow him, of course.
trans: 那只莫古利有时会偷偷溜到某个地方。

Original: Shantotto:And if that doesn't work, then there's always force...
Dialogue: And if that doesn't work, then there's always force...
trans: 如果这不起作用，那么总会有力量......

Original: Layle:I can get on board with that. The more we know, the better.
Dialogue: I can get on board with that. The more we know, the better.
trans: 我可以同意这一点。

Original: Squall:(You sure take your work seriously.)
Dialogue: (You sure take your work seriously.)
trans: （你一定认真对待你的工作。）

Original: Layle:Flattery will get you nowhere. Anyway, you're cool with that, right Squall?
Dialogue: Flattery will get you nowhere. Anyway, you're cool with that, right Squall?
trans: 奉承会让你无处可去。

Original: Squall:Guess talking to this so-called "goddess" would be our best bet.
Dialogue: Guess talking to this so-called "goddess" would be our best bet.
trans: 猜猜与这个所谓的“女神”交谈将是我们最好的选择。

Original: Terra:But would we even be able to comprehend the divine plan of a god?
Dialogue: But would we even be able to comprehend the divine plan of a god?
trans: 但是，我们甚至能够理解神的神圣计划吗？

Original: Onion Knight:There's no harm in asking. Let's finish up sealing the Torsion here first, though.
Dialogue: There's no harm in asking. Let's finish up sealing the Torsion here first, though.
trans: 多问也无妨。

Original: Bartz:Man, how much longer is this gonna take?
Dialogue: Man, how much longer is this gonna take?
trans: 伙计，这需要多长时间？

Original: Mog:Don't be a quitter, kupo! Come on, we're almost there!
Dialogue: Don't be a quitter, kupo! Come on, we're almost there!
trans: 不要放弃，库波！

Original: Bartz:Yeah, easy for a flying moogle to say.
Dialogue: Yeah, easy for a flying moogle to say.
trans: 是的，对于会飞的莫古利来说很容易说。

Original: Bartz:Let's go, Shadow. No time for breaks.
Dialogue: Let's go, Shadow. No time for breaks.
trans: 走吧，影子。

Original: Shadow:Is this what I think it is?
Dialogue: Is this what I think it is?
trans: 这是我想的吗？

Original: Vivi:Find something?
Dialogue: Find something?
trans: 找东西？

Original: Bartz:Something's been engraved here. ...Perhaps with a katana.
Dialogue: Something's been engraved here. ...Perhaps with a katana.
trans: 这里刻有什么东西。

Original: Cloud:A katana... Sephiroth?
Dialogue: A katana... Sephiroth?
trans: 武士刀……萨菲罗斯？

Original: Terra:A katana? Doma...?
Dialogue: A katana? Doma...?
trans: 武士刀？

Original: Terra:Wait! Do you think it's him!?
Dialogue: Wait! Do you think it's him!?
trans: 等待！

Original: Cloud:You know who did this?
Dialogue: You know who did this?
trans: 你知道这是谁干的吗？

Original: Terra:It must have been our friend Cyan. He's a samurai from the Kingdom of Doma.
Dialogue: It must have been our friend Cyan. He's a samurai from the Kingdom of Doma.
trans: 一定是我们的朋友青色。

Original: Vivi:A samur-what?
Dialogue: A samur-what?
trans: 一只武士——什么？

Original: Shadow:Samurai. Noble warriors and faithful retainers to their master. Think of it as a sort of knight.
Dialogue: Samurai. Noble warriors and faithful retainers to their master. Think of it as a sort of knight.
trans: 武士。

Original: Vivi:Oh, like Mr. Steiner!
Dialogue: Oh, like Mr. Steiner!
trans: 哦，就像施泰纳先生一样！

Original: Terra:Look... There's an arrow etched into the ground next to the emblem.
Dialogue: Look... There's an arrow etched into the ground next to the emblem.
trans: 看... 徽章旁边的地面上蚀刻着一个箭头。

Original: Shadow:It seems to be pointing that way.
Dialogue: It seems to be pointing that way.
trans: 它似乎指向那个方向。

Original: Mog:A clue, kupo! Looks like that settles it. New friend, here we come!
Dialogue: A clue, kupo! Looks like that settles it. New friend, here we come!
trans: 一个线索，库波！

Original: Terra:Cyan, are you all right!?
Dialogue: Cyan, are you all right!?
trans: 青色，你没事吧！？

Original: Cyan:Worry not about me. Art thou hurt?
Dialogue: Worry not about me. Art thou hurt?
trans: 别担心我。

Original: Zidane:We're fine.
Dialogue: We're fine.
trans: 我们很好。

Original: Yuffie:We were doing great until you attacked us though! What's your problem!
Dialogue: We were doing great until you attacked us though! What's your problem!
trans: 在你攻击我们之前我们做得很好！

Original: Shadow:Let me guess: you attempted to use the Magitek Armor to fight the monsters here, but lost control of it.
Dialogue: Let me guess you attempted to use the Magitek Armor to fight the monsters here, but lost control of it.
trans: 让我猜想你试图使用 Magitek Armor 来对抗这里的怪物，但失去了对它的控制。

Original: Terra:You know how bad you are with machines, Cyan. You need to be more careful, okay?
Dialogue: You know how bad you are with machines, Cyan. You need to be more careful, okay?
trans: 你知道你对机器有多糟糕，Cyan。

Original: Cyan:I am ashamed of my behavior. I beg thee for forgiveness.
Dialogue: I am ashamed of my behavior. I beg thee for forgiveness.
trans: 我为我的行为感到羞耻。

Original: Mog:No sweat! It's all in the past, kupo!
Dialogue: No sweat! It's all in the past, kupo!
trans: 没有汗水！

Original: Cyan:Incidentally, Terra, what is thy relationship with these warriors?
Dialogue: Incidentally, Terra, what is thy relationship with these warriors?
trans: 顺便说一句，泰拉，你和这些战士是什么关系？

Original: Terra:They're our new friends we met in this world. Shadow and I are on a journey with them to seal the Torsions.
Dialogue: They're our new friends we met in this world. Shadow and I are on a journey with them to seal the Torsions.
trans: 他们是我们在这个世界上认识的新朋友。

Original: Cyan:This world? Torsions...?
Dialogue: This world? Torsions...?
trans: 这个世界？

Original: Cyan:Hm? Hmmm?
Dialogue: Hm? Hmmm?
trans: 嗯？

Original: Zidane:Looks like the old man needs someone to fill him in.
Dialogue: Looks like the old man needs someone to fill him in.
trans: 看来老头子需要找人来填补空缺。

Original: Cyan:I was summoned to another world? And that detestable Kefka is here as well?
Dialogue: I was summoned to another world? And that detestable Kefka is here as well?
trans: 我被召唤到异世界了？

Original: Cyan:It seems I shall have my revenge sooner than I thought thanks to this curious twist of fate.
Dialogue: It seems I shall have my revenge sooner than I thought thanks to this curious twist of fate.
trans: 由于命运的这种奇怪的转折，我似乎比我想象的要早报仇。

Original: Yuffie:Revenge? What'd he do to you?
Dialogue: Revenge? What'd he do to you?
trans: 复仇？

Original: Zidane:He's even sicker than I thought.
Dialogue: He's even sicker than I thought.
trans: 他比我想象的还要病。

Original: Cyan:Yet I shall not turn mine eyes away from the truth. I shall live on, following my path until the bitter end.
Dialogue: Yet I shall not turn mine eyes away from the truth. I shall live on, following my path until the bitter end.
trans: 然而，我不会将目光从真相上移开。

Original: Cyan:For that is the way of the samurai.
Dialogue: For that is the way of the samurai.
trans: 因为那是武士之道。

Original: Wakka:Gotta stick to your beliefs no matter what happens, eh? Now there's a man I can respect!
Dialogue: Gotta stick to your beliefs no matter what happens, eh? Now there's a man I can respect!
trans: 不管发生什么事都要坚持你的信念，嗯？

Original: Zidane:I feel like we just recruited another Steiner...
Dialogue: I feel like we just recruited another Steiner...
trans: 我觉得我们刚刚招募了另一个 Steiner...

Original: Cyan:I cannot allow Kefka's acts of savagery to go on any longer! I shall accompany ye on thy quest.
Dialogue: I cannot allow Kefka's acts of savagery to go on any longer! I shall accompany ye on thy quest.
trans: 我不能再让凯夫卡的野蛮行径继续下去了！

Original: Mog:Sounds good to me, kupo! We really appreciate you helping us out.
Dialogue: Sounds good to me, kupo! We really appreciate you helping us out.
trans: 听起来不错，kupo！

Original: Cyan:Thou art like family to me. I shall protect ye with my life.
Dialogue: Thou art like family to me. I shall protect ye with my life.
trans: 你对我来说就像家人一样。

Original: Garland:Bwahaha! Yes, how exhilarating!
Dialogue: Bwahaha! Yes, how exhilarating!
trans: 哇！

Original: Warrior of Light:I have to stop him!
Dialogue: I have to stop him!
trans: 我必须阻止他！

Original: ???:You won't be laughing for long.
Dialogue: You won't be laughing for long.
trans: 你不会笑很久的。

Original: Hope:Is that Light!?
Dialogue: Is that Light!?
trans: 那是光！？

Original: Vanille:You're right! And it looks like she's in trouble!
Dialogue: You're right! And it looks like she's in trouble!
trans: 你说得对！

Original: Warrior of Light:Allow me to raise my sword to assist.
Dialogue: Allow me to raise my sword to assist.
trans: 容我举剑相助。

Original: Lightning:Huh... So that's the moogle.
Dialogue: Huh... So that's the moogle.
trans: 嗯……原来是莫古利。

Original: Lightning:Go, the Torsion is just up ahead.
Dialogue: Go, the Torsion is just up ahead.
trans: 去吧，Torsion 就在前面。

Original: Vanille:We're not going without you!
Dialogue: We're not going without you!
trans: 我们不会没有你！

Original: Lightning:The mission comes first! Now, go! I'll create a path for you and hold him off!
Dialogue: The mission comes first! Now, go! I'll create a path for you and hold him off!
trans: 使命至上！

Original: Mog:M-more monsters are going to come crawling out of the Torsion if we don't hurry, kupo!
Dialogue: M-more monsters are going to come crawling out of the Torsion if we don't hurry, kupo!
trans: 如果我们再不快点，就会有更多的怪物从扭曲中爬出来，库波！

Original: Warrior of Light:But Garland is too dangerous for one to handle alone!
Dialogue: But Garland is too dangerous for one to handle alone!
trans: 但是加兰太危险了，一个人无法应付！

Original: Hope:...!
Vanille:We just have to trust her.
Dialogue: We just have to trust her.
trans: 我们只需要相信她。

Original: Vanille:I don't know what happened between you and Garland, but you don't need to worry about Lightning.
Dialogue: I don't know what happened between you and Garland, but you don't need to worry about Lightning.
trans: 我不知道你和加兰之间发生了什么，但闪电的事情你不用担心。

Original: Warrior of Light:...Very well. I cannot doubt the words of my allies.
Dialogue: ...Very well. I cannot doubt the words of my allies.

Original: Vanille:It'll all work out. I promise.
Dialogue: It'll all work out. I promise.
trans: 一切都会好起来的。

Original: Hope:Let's go. We're the only ones who can do this.
Dialogue: Let's go. We're the only ones who can do this.
trans: 我们走吧。

Original: Lightning:What?
Dialogue: What?
trans: 什么？

Original: Hope:I trust you. So, please...
Dialogue: I trust you. So, please...
trans: 我相信你。

Original: Lightning:I know. Now, keep your eyes front and go!
Dialogue: I know. Now, keep your eyes front and go!
trans: 我知道。

Original: Mog:We've gotta defeat that monster to close the Torsion, kupo!
Dialogue: We've gotta defeat that monster to close the Torsion, kupo!
trans: 我们必须打败那个怪物才能关闭 Torsion，kupo！

Original: Hope:Where's Light!?
Dialogue: Where's Light!?
trans: 光在哪里！？

Original: Zidane:They're both gone.
Dialogue: They're both gone.
trans: 他们都走了。

Original: Hope:This can't be...
Dialogue: This can't be...
trans: 这不可能...

Original: King:Let's not jump to conclusions. She might still be around here somewhere.
Dialogue: Let's not jump to conclusions. She might still be around here somewhere.
trans: 我们不要仓促下结论。

Original: King:Besides, I thought you trusted her.
Dialogue: Besides, I thought you trusted her.
trans: 此外，我以为你信任她。

Original: Hope:You're right. I don't know what got into me.
Dialogue: You're right. I don't know what got into me.
trans: 你说得对。

Original: Zidane:So who's this Garland guy, anyway?
Dialogue: So who's this Garland guy, anyway?
trans: 那么这个 Garland 人到底是谁？

Original: Zidane:I mean, he's obviously bad news, but do you know him or something?
Dialogue: I mean, he's obviously bad news, but do you know him or something?
trans: 我的意思是，他显然是个坏消息，但你认识他吗？

Original: Warrior of Light:I suppose you could say he is an old enemy of mine.
Dialogue: I suppose you could say he is an old enemy of mine.
trans: 我想你可以说他是我的宿敌。

Original: Zell:Then do you know why he's here?
Dialogue: Then do you know why he's here?
trans: 那你知道他为什么来这里吗？

Original: Warrior of Light:That...I cannot remember.
Dialogue: That...I cannot remember.
trans: 那个……我不记得了。

Original: Zell:Aw, c'mon!
Dialogue: Aw, c'mon!
trans: 噢，来吧！

Original: Zidane:Oh yeah, you said you lost your memory, right?
Dialogue: Oh yeah, you said you lost your memory, right?
trans: 哦对了，你不是说你失忆了吗？

Original: Warrior of Light:There is one thing I can recall.
Dialogue: There is one thing I can recall.
trans: 我记得一件事。

Original: Warrior of Light:Garland said he would live on forever here, and then...he cut me down.
Dialogue: Garland said he would live on forever here, and then...he cut me down.
trans: 加兰说他会永远活在这里，然后……他砍了我。

Original: King:I'm no doctor, but...I'm pretty sure you're alive.
Dialogue: I'm no doctor, but...I'm pretty sure you're alive.
trans: 我不是医生，但是……我很确定你还活着。

Original: Zell:Aaah! All this thinking is making my head hurt!
Dialogue: Aaah! All this thinking is making my head hurt!
trans: 啊！

Original: Zell:I've gotta do something! The stress is gonna kill me. Yo, Mog! Where's the next Torsion?
Dialogue: I've gotta do something! The stress is gonna kill me. Yo, Mog! Where's the next Torsion?
trans: 我得做点什么！

Original: Mog:It's right over there, kupo! Follow me!
Dialogue: It's right over there, kupo! Follow me!
trans: 就在那边，库波！

Original: Terra:So, how are you feeling? Used to this world yet?
Dialogue: So, how are you feeling? Used to this world yet?
trans: 那么，你感觉如何？

Original: Cyan:Yes, and I owe it all to my new allies.
Dialogue: Yes, and I owe it all to my new allies.
trans: 是的，这一切都归功于我的新盟友。

Original: Cyan:While our fields of battle may differ, we share an unfaltering bond. Allow me to express my gratitude.
Dialogue: While our fields of battle may differ, we share an unfaltering bond. Allow me to express my gratitude.
trans: 尽管我们的战场可能不同，但我们有着坚定不移的联系。

Original: Layle:Ahh, right, you guys came from the same world.
Dialogue: Ahh, right, you guys came from the same world.
trans: 啊，对了，你们来自同一个世界。

Original: Layle:So does that mean you know our client, too?
Dialogue: So does that mean you know our client, too?
trans: 那么这是否意味着您也了解我们的客户？

Original: Cyan:Client? I am afraid I do not know what you mean.
Dialogue: Client? I am afraid I do not know what you mean.
trans: 客户？

Original: Terra:Layle and Shadow are members of an insurgent group that was formed in this world.
Dialogue: Layle and Shadow are members of an insurgent group that was formed in this world.
trans: Layle 和 Shadow 是在这个世界上成立的叛乱组织的成员。

Original: Shadow:I like to call us the Returners.
Dialogue: I like to call us the Returners.
trans: 我喜欢称我们为回归者。

Original: Cyan:The Returners!?
Dialogue: The Returners!?
trans: 回归者！？

Original: Layle:Our client's a royal flirt who likes tinkering with machines.
Dialogue: Our client's a royal flirt who likes tinkering with machines.
trans: 我们的客户是一位喜欢摆弄机器的皇家调情师。

Original: Cyan:A royal flirt...who tinkers with machines...
Dialogue: A royal flirt...who tinkers with machines...
trans: 一个皇家调情......谁修补机器......

Original: Layle:Bingo. Good guess.
Dialogue: Bingo. Good guess.
trans: 答对了。

Original: Terra:They are close friends, after all.
Dialogue: They are close friends, after all.
trans: 毕竟，他们是亲密的朋友。

Original: Shadow:The Returners act under Edgar's orders here as well.
Dialogue: The Returners act under Edgar's orders here as well.
trans: 回归者在这里也听从埃德加的命令。

Original: Cyan:Then what are we waiting for? Let us recruit him and the Returners to our cause.
Dialogue: Then what are we waiting for? Let us recruit him and the Returners to our cause.
trans: 那我们还等什么呢？

Original: Layle:Easier said than done.
Dialogue: Easier said than done.
trans: 说起来容易做起来难。

Original: Cyan:Wh-wherefore would that be?
Dialogue: Wh-wherefore would that be?
trans: 为什么会这样？

Original: Shadow:The Returners aren't Mog's allies.
Dialogue: The Returners aren't Mog's allies.
trans: 回归者不是莫格的盟友。

Original: Layle:We're not enemies, though. This world is shrouded in mystery, you know?
Dialogue: We're not enemies, though. This world is shrouded in mystery, you know?
trans: 不过我们不是敌人。
