Original: Layle:The Returners want to learn more about it before making a move. Edgar's a lot more careful than he looks.
Dialogue: The Returners want to learn more about it before making a move. Edgar's a lot more careful than he looks.
trans: 返回者希望在采取行动之前了解更多信息。

Original: Cyan:I see... If there were only some way we could join forces...
Dialogue: I see... If there were only some way we could join forces...
trans: 我明白了……要是有什么办法我们可以联手就好了……

Original: Layle:It all depends on that moogle.
Dialogue: It all depends on that moogle.
trans: 这一切都取决于那个莫古利。

Original: Mog:The next Torsion's at the top of Capta Est Tower, kupo.
Dialogue: The next Torsion's at the top of Capta Est Tower, kupo.
trans: 下一个 Torsion 在 Capta Est Tower 的顶部，kupo。

Original: Yuna:It looks like we have a lot of walking to do.
Dialogue: It looks like we have a lot of walking to do.
trans: 看来我们还有很多路要走。

Original: Setzer:So we can't use the airship, huh?
Dialogue: So we can't use the airship, huh?
trans: 所以我们不能使用飞艇，是吧？

Original: Vaan:Is that because of the Torsion?
Dialogue: Is that because of the Torsion?
trans: 那是因为扭转吗？

Original: Galuf:I don't know about that... I've got a bad feeling about this.
Dialogue: I don't know about that... I've got a bad feeling about this.
trans: 我不知道……我对此有种不好的预感。

Original: Setzer:Come on, don't say stuff like that, old man. What do I have to look forward to now?
Dialogue: Come on, don't say stuff like that, old man. What do I have to look forward to now?
trans: 拜托，别说那样的话，老头子。

Original: Galuf:What do you ever look forward to other than flying?
Dialogue: What do you ever look forward to other than flying?
trans: 除了飞行，你还期待什么？

Original: Onion Knight:If it's not flying, it's always gambling with you, isn't it?
Dialogue: If it's not flying, it's always gambling with you, isn't it?
trans: 如果它不飞，它就一直在跟你赌，不是吗？

Original: Onion Knight:Anyway, I can feel the Torsion from here...and it's powerful.
Dialogue: Anyway, I can feel the Torsion from here...and it's powerful.
trans: 不管怎样，我能从这里感受到扭力……而且很强大。

Original: Onion Knight:Are you sure we're ready?
Dialogue: Are you sure we're ready?
trans: 你确定我们准备好了吗？

Original: Mog:I...hope so, kupo.
Dialogue: I...hope so, kupo.
trans: 我……终于傻了。

Original: Vaan:What do you mean "you hope so"? Are we ready or not?
Dialogue: What do you mean "you hope so"? Are we ready or not?
trans: “你希望如此”是什么意思？

Original: Galuf:It means that not even Mog can fathom the power of what we are about to face.
Dialogue: It means that not even Mog can fathom the power of what we are about to face.
trans: 这意味着即使是 Mog 也无法理解我们将要面对的力量。

Original: Setzer:I usually like to be a little more prepared when I'm gambling with my life.
Dialogue: I usually like to be a little more prepared when I'm gambling with my life.
trans: 当我拿自己的生命做赌注时，我通常喜欢多做一些准备。

Original: Yuna:It's going to be a difficult journey, but I know we can do it if we stick together.
Dialogue: It's going to be a difficult journey, but I know we can do it if we stick together.
trans: 这将是一段艰难的旅程，但我知道如果我们团结一致，我们就能做到。

Original: Warrior of Light:Garland, why did you spare me?
Dialogue: Garland, why did you spare me?
trans: 加兰，你为什么要放过我？

Original: Onion Knight:Listen, there's no use mulling over something you can't remember.
Dialogue: Listen, there's no use mulling over something you can't remember.
trans: 听着，考虑你不记得的事情是没有用的。

Original: Setzer:He's right. Don't obsess over past matches. It'll only hold you back.
Dialogue: He's right. Don't obsess over past matches. It'll only hold you back.
trans: 他是对的。

Original: Warrior of Light:What if I end up holding you back though?
Dialogue: What if I end up holding you back though?
trans: 如果我最终阻止了你怎么办？

Original: Setzer:Nonsense. Don't think like that.
Dialogue: Nonsense. Don't think like that.
trans: 废话。

Original: Vaan:Besides, this isn't your battle alone. We're in this together, you know?
Dialogue: Besides, this isn't your battle alone. We're in this together, you know?
trans: 此外，这不是你一个人的战斗。

Original: Galuf:Exactly. You're not alone. You need to rely on us more.
Dialogue: Exactly. You're not alone. You need to rely on us more.
trans: 确切地。

Original: Warrior of Light:Thank you. You're right. I must focus on the present, not the past.
Dialogue: Thank you. You're right. I must focus on the present, not the past.
trans: 谢谢。

Original: Squall:(I was able to meet up with Zell and Laguna, so I'm sure the others are here, too. I have to find them.)
Dialogue: (I was able to meet up with Zell and Laguna, so I'm sure the others are here, too. I have to find them.)
trans: （我能够见到 Zell 和 Laguna，所以我确定其他人也在这里。我必须找到他们。）

Original: Squall:(Seifer and his gang are here as well. Can't say I'm thrilled about that.)
Dialogue: (Seifer and his gang are here as well. Can't say I'm thrilled about that.)
trans: （Seifer 和他的帮派也在这里。不能说我对此很兴奋。）

Original: Raijin:Whoa! Seifer, look!
Dialogue: Whoa! Seifer, look!
trans: 哇！

Original: Raijin:It's Squall! It's really him, ya know!?
Dialogue: It's Squall! It's really him, ya know!?
trans: 斯考尔！

Original: Seifer:...You were here and you couldn't even take the time to say hello?
Dialogue: ...You were here and you couldn't even take the time to say hello?
trans: ......你在这里，你甚至没有时间打个招呼？

Original: Seifer:Just what I needed. Another chicken-wuss without any manners.
Dialogue: Just what I needed. Another chicken-wuss without any manners.
trans: 正是我需要的。

Original: Squall:(Maybe people would like you more if you pulled that stick out of your rear.)
Dialogue: (Maybe people would like you more if you pulled that stick out of your rear.)
trans: （如果你把那根棍子从你的屁股上拔下来，也许人们会更喜欢你。）

Original: Squall:(Why do you always have to be like this? Even now...)
Dialogue: (Why do you always have to be like this? Even now...)
trans: （为什么你总是要这样？现在也...）

Original: Squall:I don't have time for this.
Dialogue: I don't have time for this.
trans: 我没有时间做这个。

Original: Seifer:Wait! I'm not done talking to Argh!
Dialogue: Wait! I'm not done talking to— Argh!
trans: 等待！

Original: Fujin:INJURED! REST.
Dialogue: INJURED! REST.
trans: 受伤了！

Original: Seifer:Hmph. Bet you're all laughing at me now.
Dialogue: Hmph. Bet you're all laughing at me now.
trans: 哼。

Original: Yuna:Nobody's laughing at you...
Dialogue: Nobody's laughing at you...
trans: 没有人笑话你...

Original: Rem:Got something on your mind?
Dialogue: Got something on your mind?
trans: 你有什么想法吗？

Original: Squall:I was just thinking about when we ran into Seifer and his lackeys.
Dialogue: I was just thinking about when we ran into Seifer and his lackeys.
trans: 我只是在想我们什么时候遇到 Seifer 和他的走狗。

Original: Rem:Actually, I've been meaning to ask you about that, but I couldn't find the right moment.
Dialogue: Actually, I've been meaning to ask you about that, but I couldn't find the right moment.
trans: 其实，我一直想问你这件事，但我找不到合适的时机。

Original: Rem:You all...know each other, don't you?
Dialogue: You all...know each other, don't you?
trans: 你们都……认识，不是吗？

Original: Vaan:Seifer almost made it sound like you were friends.
Dialogue: Seifer almost made it sound like you were friends.
trans: Seifer 几乎让人觉得你们是朋友。

Original: Squall:(Blank stares, huh? Should have seen that coming. Let me rephrase that.)
Dialogue: (Blank stares, huh? Should have seen that coming. Let me rephrase that.)
trans: （茫然的目光，是吧？应该预见到这一点。让我换个说法。）

Original: Squall:We're from the same facility.
Dialogue: We're from the same facility.
trans: 我们来自同一个设施。

Original: Rem:You and Seifer use the same weapon, too.
Dialogue: You and Seifer use the same weapon, too.
trans: 你和 Seifer 也使用相同的武器。

Original: Vaan:The scar on his face is similar to yours as well.
Dialogue: The scar on his face is similar to yours as well.
trans: 他脸上的伤疤也和你的很像。

Original: Squall:It's...a long story.
Dialogue: It's...a long story.
trans: 说来话长。

Original: Hope:Well, we have time if you don't mind telling us.
Dialogue: Well, we have time if you don't mind telling us.
trans: 好吧，如果你不介意告诉我们的话，我们有时间。

Original: Squall:(Are they genuinely curious about me? No, they're probably nervous because they don't know what's going on.)
Dialogue: (Are they genuinely curious about me? No, they're probably nervous because they don't know what's going on.)
trans: （他们真的对我很好奇吗？不，他们可能很紧张，因为他们不知道发生了什么。）

Original: Vaan:You on bad terms?
Dialogue: You on bad terms?
trans: 你们关系不好？

Original: Squall:Well, I wouldn't say we were friends. I got this scar fighting him.
Dialogue: Well, I wouldn't say we were friends. I got this scar fighting him.
trans: 好吧，我不会说我们是朋友。

Original: Squall:Us using the same weapon is pure coincidence though. Gunblades are pretty rare where I come from.
Dialogue: Us using the same weapon is pure coincidence though. Gunblades are pretty rare where I come from.
trans: 不过，我们使用相同的武器纯属巧合。

Original: Squall:Basically, we're from the same place, but we don't get along. There, happy now?
Dialogue: Basically, we're from the same place, but we don't get along. There, happy now?
trans: 基本上，我们来自同一个地方，但我们相处不来。

Original: Rem:If you're from the same facility, then I wonder if you could get them to join us?
Dialogue: If you're from the same facility, then I wonder if you could get them to join us?
trans: 如果您来自同一设施，那么我想知道您是否可以让他们加入我们？

Original: Squall:You saw him. You really think he'd help us?
Dialogue: You saw him. You really think he'd help us?
trans: 你看见他了。

Original: Hope:Yeah... You're right.
Dialogue: Yeah... You're right.
trans: 是啊，你说得对。

Original: Rem:He didn't seem like a bad person though. He just seemed a little stubborn.
Dialogue: He didn't seem like a bad person though. He just seemed a little stubborn.
trans: 不过他看起来不像是个坏人。

Original: Squall:He wasn't always like this, and deep down he's not a bad person, but we don't really need them.
Dialogue: He wasn't always like this, and deep down he's not a bad person, but we don't really need them.
trans: 他并不总是这样，内心深处他也不是坏人，但我们真的不需要他们。

Original: Vaan:Well, after seeing what he did to your face, I say we just forget about him.
Dialogue: Well, after seeing what he did to your face, I say we just forget about him.
trans: 好吧，在看到他对你的脸做了什么之后，我说我们就忘了他吧。

Original: Squall:(But I was the one that left that scar on Seifer's face. I'm no better than he is.)
Dialogue: (But I was the one that left that scar on Seifer's face. I'm no better than he is.)
trans: （但我是在 Seifer 脸上留下疤痕的人。我并不比他好。）

Original: Squall:(Nothing really has changed, has it? Even people from other worlds don't know how to deal with you, Seifer.)
Dialogue: (Nothing really has changed, has it? Even people from other worlds don't know how to deal with you, Seifer.)
trans: （真的什么都没有变，对吧？连异世界的人都不知道怎么对付你，赛菲尔。）

Original: Zell:Man, do we really gotta go all the way up there to get to the Torsion? I'm exhausted just thinkin' about it.
Dialogue: Man, do we really gotta go all the way up there to get to the Torsion? I'm exhausted just thinkin' about it.
trans: 伙计，我们真的要一直走到那里才能到达扭转吗？

Original: Zell:But in a way, it's kind of exciting, isn't it?
Dialogue: But in a way, it's kind of exciting, isn't it?
trans: 但在某种程度上，这有点令人兴奋，不是吗？

Original: Squall:(How can Zell be enjoying himself at a time like this? Does he not realize what's happening to this world?)
Dialogue: (How can Zell be enjoying himself at a time like this? Does he not realize what's happening to this world?)
trans: （这种时候泽尔怎么可能乐在其中？难道他不知道这个世界正在发生什么吗？）

Original: Squall:(Well, he did look pretty clueless when we were reunited.)
Dialogue: (Well, he did look pretty clueless when we were reunited.)
trans: （好吧，当我们重聚时，他看起来确实很无能。）

Original: Zell:So you were with Mog too, huh? Thank goodness you're here.
Dialogue: So you were with Mog too, huh? Thank goodness you're here.
trans: 所以你也和 Mog 在一起，是吗？

Original: Zell:Oh, and I don't mean that as a diss to any of you guys!
Dialogue: Oh, and I don't mean that as a diss to any of you guys!
trans: 哦，我并不是说要贬低你们中的任何一个人！

Original: Zidane:Don't worry about it. We all know how comforting it is to see someone from back home.
Dialogue: Don't worry about it. We all know how comforting it is to see someone from back home.
trans: 别担心。

Original: Squall:I'm glad you're okay.
Dialogue: I'm glad you're okay.
trans: 你没事我就可以放心。

Original: Squall:(Zell, Seifer, and even Laguna are here. What does this so-called goddess want with us?)
Dialogue: (Zell, Seifer, and even Laguna are here. What does this so-called goddess want with us?)
trans: （泽尔，塞弗，连拉古娜都来了，这个所谓的女神找我们有什么事？）

Original: Laguna:Hold up. If you two are friends, does that mean you're from the same world as me?
Dialogue: Hold up. If you two are friends, does that mean you're from the same world as me?
trans: 耽误。

Original: Laguna:I don't remember Balamb ever having a school in it...
Dialogue: I don't remember Balamb ever having a school in it...
trans: 我不记得 Balamb 曾经有过一所学校......

Original: Squall:(The Laguna here is a little different from the one I know though. Maybe it's because of the Torsions?)
Dialogue: (The Laguna here is a little different from the one I know though. Maybe it's because of the Torsions?)
trans: （虽然这里的 Laguna 与我所知道的有点不同。也许是因为 Torsions？）

Original: Squall:(I probably shouldn't say anything until I have a better idea of what's going on.)
Dialogue: (I probably shouldn't say anything until I have a better idea of what's going on.)
trans: （在我更好地了解正在发生的事情之前，我可能不应该说什么。）

Original: Zell:Not only are you two from the same world, but you've met before, too! I mean, it was in a dream, but yeah.
Dialogue: Not only are you two from the same world, but you've met before, too! I mean, it was in a dream, but yeah.
trans: 你们两个不仅来自同一个世界，而且你们以前也见过面！

Original: Laguna:Not this again. Am I really that famous?
Dialogue: Not this again. Am I really that famous?
trans: 又不是这个。

Original: Squall:It was only a dream. Forget he mentioned it.
Dialogue: It was only a dream. Forget he mentioned it.
trans: 那只是一个梦。

Original: Zell:Squall, that's cold! You two used to be so...
Dialogue: Squall, that's cold! You two used to be so...
trans: 斯考尔，好冷！

Original: Squall:(Zell, could you shut up and think before you talk for once?)
Dialogue: (Zell, could you shut up and think before you talk for once?)
trans: （泽尔，你能不能先闭嘴想想再说一次？）

Original: Laguna:Wait, wait, wait! Do you guys know me from that movie!? Is that what this is all about!? When did it become such a big hit!?
Dialogue: Wait, wait, wait! Do you guys know me from that movie!? Is that what this is all about!? When did it become such a big hit!?
trans: 等等，等等，等等！

Original: Bartz:Wow, look at you, Mr. Popular.
Dialogue: Wow, look at you, Mr. Popular.
trans: 哇，看看你，流行先生。

Original: Squall:Can you give it a rest?
Dialogue: Can you give it a rest?
trans: 你能让它休息一下吗？

Original: Squall:(Great. Now they're all looking at me.)
Dialogue: (Great. Now they're all looking at me.)
trans: （太好了。现在他们都在看着我。）

Original: Squall:Sorry. I was just thinking to myself.
Dialogue: Sorry. I was just thinking to myself.
trans: 对不起。

Original: Laguna:No, I get it. You're young! You're at a very impressionable time in your life.
Dialogue: No, I get it. You're young! You're at a very impressionable time in your life.
trans: 不，我明白了。

Original: Squall:(I've never met someone so clueless.)
Dialogue: (I've never met someone so clueless.)
trans: （我从来没有遇到过这么笨的人。）

Original: Laguna:Can't blame you for being nervous around your hero, but you can be yourself around me.
Dialogue: Can't blame you for being nervous around your hero, but you can be yourself around me.
trans: 不能怪你对你的英雄感到紧张，但你可以在我身边做你自己。

Original: Zell:Yeah, I guess we shouldn't be putting so much thought into those dreams, anyway.
Dialogue: Yeah, I guess we shouldn't be putting so much thought into those dreams, anyway.
trans: 是的，我想无论如何我们都不应该对那些梦想投入太多的心思。

Original: Squall:Please, just let me focus on figuring out what's going on here.
Dialogue: Please, just let me focus on figuring out what's going on here.
trans: 拜托，让我专注于弄清楚这里发生了什么。

Original: Zidane:Hey, you okay?
Dialogue: Hey, you okay?
trans: 嘿，你还好吗？

Original: Squall:It's nothing any of you need to worry about. I was just thinking about this world.
Dialogue: It's nothing any of you need to worry about. I was just thinking about this world.
trans: 你们不需要担心。

Original: Bartz:If that's the case, then why don't you tell us what's on your mind? Two heads are better than one, right?
Dialogue: If that's the case, then why don't you tell us what's on your mind? Two heads are better than one, right?
trans: 如果是这样，那你为什么不告诉我们你的想法呢？

Original: Zidane:Exactly. Sometimes talking about it can make you feel better.
Dialogue: Exactly. Sometimes talking about it can make you feel better.
trans: 确切地。

Original: Zidane:We're your friends. You can come to us, okay?
Dialogue: We're your friends. You can come to us, okay?
trans: 我们是你的朋友。

Original: Squall:(Friends, huh? I guess we are.)
Dialogue: (Friends, huh? I guess we are.)
trans: （朋友，嗯？我想我们是。）

Original: Squall:I'll consider it.
Dialogue: I'll consider it.
trans: 我会考虑的。

Original: Warrior of Light:(I am certain I was defeated by Garland then.)
Dialogue: (I am certain I was defeated by Garland then.)
trans: （我确定我当时被加兰打败了。）

Original: Warrior of Light:(And unlike my allies, I have almost no recollection of ever meeting Mog.)
Dialogue: (And unlike my allies, I have almost no recollection of ever meeting Mog.)
trans: （而且与我的盟友不同，我几乎不记得曾经见过 Mog。）

Original: Warrior of Light:(However, telling them this would only engender apprehension.)
Dialogue: (However, telling them this would only engender apprehension.)
trans: （但是，告诉他们这只会引起担忧。）

Original: Mog:He doesn't look so good, kupo. Could you guys go check on him?
Dialogue: He doesn't look so good, kupo. Could you guys go check on him?
trans: 他看起来不太好，库波。

Original: Vivi:Are you okay? Does your stomach hurt?
Dialogue: Are you okay? Does your stomach hurt?
trans: 你还好吗？

Original: Warrior of Light:Ah, do not be alarmed. I will return shortly.
Dialogue: Ah, do not be alarmed. I will return shortly.
trans: 啊，不要惊慌。

Original: Firion:If something is troubling you, then so be it. However, you don't have to face these tribulations alone.
Dialogue: If something is troubling you, then so be it. However, you don't have to face these tribulations alone.
trans: 如果有什么事情困扰着你，那就这样吧。

Original: Firion:I understand that you feel you have a responsibility to stand strongto lead and protect us.
Dialogue: I understand that you feel you have a responsibility to stand strong—to lead and protect us.
trans: 我知道你觉得你有责任坚强地领导和保护我们。

Original: Firion:But we are more than a team. We're friends.
Dialogue: But we are more than a team. We're friends.
trans: 但我们不仅仅是一个团队。

Original: Squall:(Friends? I guess you could call us that.)
Dialogue: (Friends? I guess you could call us that.)
trans: （朋友？我想你可以这样称呼我们。）

Original: Zell:Hm? Yo, Squall. What's up?
Dialogue: Hm? Yo, Squall. What's up?
trans: 嗯？

Original: Warrior of Light:It is because we are allies that I do not wish to lose your trust.
Dialogue: It is because we are allies that I do not wish to lose your trust.
trans: 因为我们是盟友，所以我不想失去你们的信任。

Original: Vivi:Are you afraid you'll make us worry?
Dialogue: Are you afraid you'll make us worry?
trans: 你怕你让我们担心吗？

Original: Vivi:Because you shouldn't. Having people worry about you just means they care.
Dialogue: Because you shouldn't. Having people worry about you just means they care.
trans: 因为你不应该。

Original: Firion:While we may have met by chance, everything else was of our own free will. Am I wrong?
Dialogue: While we may have met by chance, everything else was of our own free will. Am I wrong?
trans: 虽然我们可能是偶然相遇，但其他一切都是我们自愿的。

Original: Firion:We need you to believe in us just like we believe in you.
Dialogue: We need you to believe in us just like we believe in you.
trans: 我们需要您像我们相信您一样相信我们。

Original: Warrior of Light:The next time I confront Garland, I intend on uncovering the truth about my lost memories.
Dialogue: The next time I confront Garland, I intend on uncovering the truth about my lost memories.
trans: 下次我面对加兰时，我打算揭开我失去的记忆的真相。

Original: Warrior of Light:But I will need your assistance for when that time comes.
Dialogue: But I will need your assistance for when that time comes.
trans: 但到时候我需要你的帮助。

Original: Firion:That's what friends are for.
Dialogue: That's what friends are for.
trans: 这就是朋友的作用。

Original: Mog:Kupo? Who are you? I sense the light within you...
Dialogue: Kupo? Who are you? I sense the light within you...
trans: 库波？

Original: ???:The light? What an odd thing to say. But, yes, I do consider myself one of the good guys.
Dialogue: The light? What an odd thing to say. But, yes, I do consider myself one of the good guys.
trans: 光？

Original: Yda:That voiceis that you, Papalymo!?
Dialogue: That voice—is that you, Papalymo!?
trans: 那个声音——是你吗，Papalymo！？

Original: Papalymo:Yda! Oh, and Y'shtola is with you as well! I wondered where you went.
Dialogue: Yda! Oh, and Y'shtola is with you as well! I wondered where you went.
trans: 尤达！

Original: Shantotto:Dare I assume you know this monocled gent?
Dialogue: Dare I assume you know this monocled gent?
trans: 我敢假设你认识这个戴单片眼镜的绅士吗？

Original: Yda:Yes, he's my friend.
Dialogue: Yes, he's my friend.
trans: 是的，他是我的朋友。

Original: Papalymo:When did I ever say I was your friend!?
Dialogue: When did I ever say I was your friend!?
trans: 我什么时候说我是你朋友了！？

Original: Shantotto:Ohoho. Another guinea pig? How swell! ...I mean, am I correct to assume you have a knack for black magic as well?
Dialogue: Ohoho. Another guinea pig? How swell! ...I mean, am I correct to assume you have a knack for black magic as well?
trans: 呵呵。

Original: Papalymo:Aye, I suppose you could say that. Perhaps not quite the aptitude that you have, though.
Dialogue: Aye, I suppose you could say that. Perhaps not quite the aptitude that you have, though.
trans: 是的，我想你可以这么说。

Original: Yda:Papalymo's a true master of thaumaturgy! If only he weren't so serious all the time... So, were you surveying the area of simply lost?
Dialogue: Papalymo's a true master of thaumaturgy! If only he weren't so serious all the time... So, were you surveying the area of simply lost?
trans: Papalymo 是真正的魔术大师！

Original: Papalymo:Me? Lost? Is that a jibe, my dear Yda? I was merely searching for you all.
Dialogue: Me? Lost? Is that a jibe, my dear Yda? I was merely searching for you all.
trans: 我？

Original: Yda:Come now, there's no shame in getting lost.
Dialogue: Come now, there's no shame in getting lost.
trans: 来吧，迷路并不丢人。

Original: Papalymo:What are you insinuating!
Dialogue: What are you insinuating!
trans: 你在暗示什么！

Original: Mog:Please, stop fighting, kupo! We need to get along if we're going to be working together.
Dialogue: Please, stop fighting, kupo! We need to get along if we're going to be working together.
trans: 求求你，停止战斗，库波！

Original: Papalymo:"We," you say? I am truly sorry, but I'm afraid I have no intention of going with you.
Dialogue: "We," you say? I am truly sorry, but I'm afraid I have no intention of going with you.
trans: “我们，”你说？

Original: Papalymo:All I wished to do was verify that Yda and Y'shtola were safe. Now if you would excuse me.
Dialogue: All I wished to do was verify that Yda and Y'shtola were safe. Now if you would excuse me.
trans: 我只想确认 Yda 和 Y'shtola 是否安全。

Original: Yda:This again? I don't see why he couldn't just admit he was lost.
Dialogue: This again? I don't see why he couldn't just admit he was lost.
trans: 又是这个？

Original: Sazh:Just gonna let him go like that?
Dialogue: Just gonna let him go like that?
trans: 就这么放过他吗？

Original: Y'shtola:You needn't worry. This always happens.
Dialogue: You needn't worry. This always happens.
trans: 你不用担心。

Original: Sazh:I don't think we can afford to bicker right now...
Dialogue: I don't think we can afford to bicker right now...
trans: 我认为我们现在不能争吵...

Original: Yda:Wait, is that the exit?
Dialogue: Wait, is that the exit?
trans: 等等，那是出口吗？

Original: Mog:Looking at the map, we just need to take this passage outside. Then, we loop back inside the tower once more after that, kupo.
Dialogue: Looking at the map, we just need to take this passage outside. Then, we loop back inside the tower once more after that, kupo.
trans: 看地图，我们只要把这条通道往外走就可以了。

Original: Rem:Just when I thought we were almost there...
Dialogue: Just when I thought we were almost there...
trans: 就在我以为我们快到了的时候......

Original: Onion Knight:Don't you love it when you get your hopes up only for them to be crushed moments later?
Dialogue: Don't you love it when you get your hopes up only for them to be crushed moments later?
trans: 难道你不喜欢当你的希望只是为了他们在片刻之后被粉碎时吗？

Original: Bartz:Hang on. We've been climbing this tower for a while now.
Dialogue: Hang on. We've been climbing this tower for a while now.
trans: 不挂断。

Original: Bartz:Which means if we go outside...and look down...
Dialogue: Which means if we go outside...and look down...
trans: 这意味着如果我们走到外面……往下看……

Original: Yang:Ah, afraid of heights, are we?
Dialogue: Ah, afraid of heights, are we?
trans: 啊，恐高，是吗？

Original: Yang:We monks often meditate before training on high mountains.
Dialogue: We monks often meditate before training on high mountains.
trans: 我们和尚经常在高山修行前打坐。

Original: Bartz:Does that actually help!?
Dialogue: Does that actually help!?
trans: 这真的有用吗！？

Original: Yang:It gives us the fear we need to survive. For when you fall off a cliff, it won't matter how much you've trained your body.
Dialogue: It gives us the fear we need to survive. For when you fall off a cliff, it won't matter how much you've trained your body.
trans: 它给了我们生存所需的恐惧。

Original: Yda:I'm afraid that won't be of any use to you, then.
Dialogue: I'm afraid that won't be of any use to you, then.
trans: 恐怕那对你没有任何用处了。

Original: Rem:We'll be fine as long as we're careful...right, everyone?
Dialogue: We'll be fine as long as we're careful...right, everyone?
trans: 只要我们小心一点就没事……对吧，大家？

Original: Onion Knight:Look how much room we have to walk. As long as nothing catastrophic happens, we should be fine.
Dialogue: Look how much room we have to walk. As long as nothing catastrophic happens, we should be fine.
trans: 看看我们有多少空间要走。

Original: Mog:We're almost back inside the tower, kupo!
Dialogue: We're almost back inside the tower, kupo!
trans: 我们快回到塔内了，kupo！

Original: Warrior of Light:I can feel it... He's here.
Dialogue: I can feel it... He's here.
trans: 我能感觉到……他在这里。

Original: Garland:With each battle fought, the chaos continues to grow.
Dialogue: With each battle fought, the chaos continues to grow.
trans: 随着每场战斗的进行，混乱继续增长。

Original: Lightning:I've got you now.
Dialogue: I've got you now.
trans: 我现在得到你了。

Original: Garland:Bwahaha! Back for more? I see you have the same love for combat as I.
Dialogue: Bwahaha! Back for more? I see you have the same love for combat as I.
trans: 哇哈哈！

Original: Lightning:Enough with the games. You were using me back there, weren't you?
Dialogue: Enough with the games. You were using me back there, weren't you?
trans: 玩够了。

Original: Lightning:The distortion at the volcanoit got bigger the more we fought.
Dialogue: The distortion at the volcano—it got bigger the more we fought.
trans: 火山的扭曲——我们越打越厉害。

Original: Garland:I'm impressed. But if you figured out that much, why did you come after me?
Dialogue: I'm impressed. But if you figured out that much, why did you come after me?
trans: 我印象深刻。

Original: Lightning:To defeat you and cleave a path for the others.
Dialogue: To defeat you and cleave a path for the others.
trans: 打败你，为其他人开辟一条道路。

Original: Garland:A futile gesture.
Dialogue: A futile gesture.
trans: 一个徒劳的手势。

Original: Garland:But I admire your eagerness to die.
Dialogue: But I admire your eagerness to die.
trans: 但我很佩服你求死的心。

Original: Papalymo:Ugh. Yda knows physical labor isn't my forte.
Dialogue: Ugh. Yda knows physical labor isn't my forte.
trans: 啊。

Original: Yda:Papalymo, are you okay!?
Dialogue: Papalymo, are you okay!?
trans: papalymo，你还好吗！？

Original: Papalymo:What took you so long!
Dialogue: What took you so long!
trans: 你怎么这么久！

Original: Yda:I know. I'm sorry. I'm really glad you're all right, though.
Dialogue: I know. I'm sorry. I'm really glad you're all right, though.
trans: 我知道。

Original: Papalymo:Of course I'm all right. Now, don't just stand there. We have business to take care of.
Dialogue: Of course I'm all right. Now, don't just stand there. We have business to take care of.
trans: 我当然没事。

Original: Yda:Right behind you!
Dialogue: Right behind you!
trans: 就在你后面！

Original: Rem:Wow, they make a really good team.
Dialogue: Wow, they make a really good team.
trans: 哇，他们组成了一个非常好的团队。

Original: Y'shtola:They do, don't they?
Dialogue: They do, don't they?
trans: 他们这样做，不是吗？

Original: Penelo:But how did you know they would make up so quickly?
Dialogue: But how did you know they would make up so quickly?
trans: 但你怎么知道他们会这么快和好？

Original: Y'shtola:I was not exaggerating when I said this always happens.
Dialogue: I was not exaggerating when I said this always happens.
trans: 当我说这总是会发生时，我并没有夸大其词。

Original: Papalymo:So, could I ask you all to lend us a hand as well? It seems we've been surrounded by monsters.
Dialogue: So, could I ask you all to lend us a hand as well? It seems we've been surrounded by monsters.
trans: 那么，请问大家也能帮帮我们吗？

Original: Vaan:Don't think you could've said that a little sooner?
Dialogue: Don't think you could've said that a little sooner?
trans: 你觉得你不能早点说吗？

Original: Papalymo:There's no rush. They shan't strike just yet.
Dialogue: There's no rush. They shan't strike just yet.
trans: 不用着急。

Original: Rem:How can you be so sure?
Dialogue: How can you be so sure?
trans: 你怎么能这么肯定？

Original: Papalymo:Because I used my magicks to detain them. ...Regrettably soon to wear off, however.
Dialogue: Because I used my magicks to detain them. ...Regrettably soon to wear off, however.
trans: 因为我用我的魔法来拘留他们。

Original: Vaan:So we still have some time, huh?
Dialogue: So we still have some time, huh?
trans: 所以我们还有一些时间，是吗？

Original: Papalymo:Precisely. Now, take the lead. I'll cover you.
Dialogue: Precisely. Now, take the lead. I'll cover you.
trans: 恰恰。

Original: Penelo:I wasn't expecting you to be this fired up for battle.
Dialogue: I wasn't expecting you to be this fired up for battle.
trans: 我没想到你会如此热衷于战斗。

Original: Papalymo:I take no pleasure in combat, but I also do not take threats lightly. Now, come.
Dialogue: I take no pleasure in combat, but I also do not take threats lightly. Now, come.
trans: 我不喜欢战斗，但我也不会轻视威胁。

Original: Yda:Let's do this!
Dialogue: Let's do this!
trans: 我们开工吧！

Original: Y'shtola:It appears fighting is inevitable.
Dialogue: It appears fighting is inevitable.
trans: 看来战斗是不可避免的。

Original: Vaan:Heh, I'm sure glad the Scions of the Seventh Dawn are on our side.
Dialogue: Heh, I'm sure glad the Scions of the Seventh Dawn are on our side.
trans: 嘿，我很高兴第七黎明的后裔站在我们这边。

Original: Yda:I'm sorry for teasing you earlier, Papalymo.
Dialogue: I'm sorry for teasing you earlier, Papalymo.
trans: 很抱歉之前取笑了你，Papalymo。

Original: Papalymo:Never mind it. Hardly the first time this has happened.
Dialogue: Never mind it. Hardly the first time this has happened.
trans: 没关系。

Original: Yda:But this is your fault too, you know? You should have just
Dialogue: But this is your fault too, you know? You should have just—
trans: 但这也是你的错，你知道吗？

Original: Papalymo:Yes, yes, Yda. I know.
Dialogue: Yes, yes, Yda. I know.
trans: 是的，是的，尤达。

Original: Papalymo:Regardless, I should be thanking you for coming to my rescue.
Dialogue: Regardless, I should be thanking you for coming to my rescue.
trans: 不管怎样，我应该感谢你来救我。

Original: Rem:Wow, one minute they're fighting and now they're best friends again?
Dialogue: Wow, one minute they're fighting and now they're best friends again?
trans: 哇，上一分钟他们还在吵架，现在他们又成了最好的朋友？

Original: Papalymo:Do not be ridiculous. We weren't fighting. Fighting is something you can only do with your equals.
Dialogue: Do not be ridiculous. We weren't fighting. Fighting is something you can only do with your equals.
trans: 不能太荒唐。

Original: Yda:What are you trying to say!? Just because I'm younger than you, you think
Dialogue: What are you trying to say!? Just because I'm younger than you, you think—
trans: 你想说什么！？

Original: Rem:You two really get along, don't you?
Dialogue: You two really get along, don't you?
trans: 你们两个真的很合得来，不是吗？

Original: Papalymo:I wouldn't necessarily say that.
Dialogue: I wouldn't necessarily say that.
trans: 我不一定会这么说。

Original: Papalymo:Rather, we trust each other. Yda is a dear partner to me.
Dialogue: Rather, we trust each other. Yda is a dear partner to me.
trans: 相反，我们彼此信任。

Original: Rem:I can see that.
Dialogue: I can see that.
trans: 我理解了。

Original: Y'shtola:Papalymo, I daresay this tower would be arduous to investigate alone.
Dialogue: Papalymo, I daresay this tower would be arduous to investigate alone.
trans: Papalymo，我敢说这座塔很难单独调查。

Original: Sazh:She's right. I mean, I admit things aren't easy for us, but I think we could really help each other out.
Dialogue: She's right. I mean, I admit things aren't easy for us, but I think we could really help each other out.
trans: 她是对的。

Original: Papalymo:Very well. After all, we share a common goal. I confess the persistent monsters concern me as well.
Dialogue: Very well. After all, we share a common goal. I confess the persistent monsters concern me as well.
trans: 很好。

Original: Papalymo:Besides, who would keep Yda in line if not me?
Dialogue: Besides, who would keep Yda in line if not me?
trans: 此外，如果不是我，谁会让 Yda 保持一致？

Original: Papalymo:I shall just have to join you.
Dialogue: I shall just have to join you.
trans: 我只需要加入你。

Original: Yda:Oh, if you think I'm bad, wait until you meet the others!
Dialogue: Oh, if you think I'm bad, wait until you meet the others!
trans: 哦，如果你觉得我不好，等你遇到其他人！

Original: Papalymo:So you admit you're the problem!
Dialogue: So you admit you're the problem!
trans: 所以你承认你是问题所在！

Original: Rem:I feel like I can watch them all day and never stop smiling.
Dialogue: I feel like I can watch them all day and never stop smiling.
trans: 我觉得我可以整天看着他们，永远不会停止微笑。

Original: Mog:A new friend always makes me smile, too! Soon enough, we're going to be unstoppable, kupo!
Dialogue: A new friend always makes me smile, too! Soon enough, we're going to be unstoppable, kupo!
trans: 一个新朋友也总是让我微笑！

Original: Papalymo:Agreed. But it is not solely unique to this area. The world is filled with aether like this.
Dialogue: Agreed. But it is not solely unique to this area. The world is filled with aether like this.
trans: 同意。

Original: Papalymo:Do you think it could have something to do with the Torsions?
Dialogue: Do you think it could have something to do with the Torsions?
trans: 你认为它可能与扭转有关吗？

Original: Yda:Come to think of it, don't the Torsions connect this world with our own?
Dialogue: Come to think of it, don't the Torsions connect this world with our own?
trans: 想想看，扭曲不是把这个世界和我们自己的世界联系起来了吗？

Original: Y'shtola:I suspect the aether from the outside worlds flows continuously into this one.
Dialogue: I suspect the aether from the outside worlds flows continuously into this one.
trans: 我怀疑来自外部世界的以太源源不断地流入这个世界。

Original: Y'shtola:With no outlet, however, the aether dispersed accumulates here.
Dialogue: With no outlet, however, the aether dispersed accumulates here.
trans: 然而，由于没有出口，分散的以太会聚集在这里。

Original: Papalymo:...Thus preventing new life from being created on our planets.
Dialogue: ...Thus preventing new life from being created on our planets.
trans: ......从而阻止在我们的星球上创造新的生命。

Original: Yda:Ahhh, no wonder it's so unpleasant here.
Dialogue: Ahhh, no wonder it's so unpleasant here.
trans: 啊啊啊，怪不得这里这么不愉快呢。

Original: Y'shtola:Aether is the lifeblood of the planetthe source of all living things.
Dialogue: Aether is the lifeblood of the planet—the source of all living things.
trans: 以太是地球的命脉——所有生物的源泉。

Original: Y'shtola:If it continues to accumulate, then before long this world shall cease to exist.
Dialogue: If it continues to accumulate, then before long this world shall cease to exist.
trans: 如果继续累积，那么不久这个世界就会不复存在。

Original: Papalymo:And it gets worse, I'm afraid. What happens once the aether on our planet ends up depleted?
Dialogue: And it gets worse, I'm afraid. What happens once the aether on our planet ends up depleted?
trans: 恐怕情况会变得更糟。

Original: Y'shtola:Our home will no longer be able to produce life, reducing it to a desolate wasteland...
Dialogue: Our home will no longer be able to produce life, reducing it to a desolate wasteland...
trans: 我们的家园将无法再孕育生命，沦为一片荒凉的荒地……

Original: Yda:We have to do something!
Dialogue: We have to do something!
trans: 我们必须做点什么！

Original: Papalymo:The only thing we can do right now is shut the Torsions.
Dialogue: The only thing we can do right now is shut the Torsions.
trans: 我们现在唯一能做的就是关闭扭转。

Original: Y'shtola:It appears so. Come, we must hurry.
Dialogue: It appears so. Come, we must hurry.
trans: 看起来是这样。

Original: Hope:Light!
Dialogue: Light!
trans: 光！

Original: Lightning:Hope? I'm sorry... I couldn't defeat him.
Dialogue: Hope? I'm sorry... I couldn't defeat him.
trans: 希望？

Original: Garland:You were foolish to ever believe you could.
Dialogue: You were foolish to ever believe you could.
trans: 你太愚蠢了，竟然相信你可以。

Original: Garland:...For I cannot die. I shall live on in this world for an eternity.
Dialogue: ...For I cannot die. I shall live on in this world for an eternity.
trans: ……因为我不能死。

Original: Warrior of Light:I remember those words.
Dialogue: I remember those words.
trans: 我记得那些话。

Original: Cloud:Do you seriously believe him?
Dialogue: Do you seriously believe him?
trans: 你真的相信他吗？

Original: Cloud:He's claiming he's immortal, you know?
Dialogue: He's claiming he's immortal, you know?
trans: 他声称自己是不朽的，你知道吗？

Original: Garland:Draw your sword and find out for yourself if you don't believe me.
Dialogue: Draw your sword and find out for yourself if you don't believe me.
trans: 如果你不相信我的话，拔出你的剑，自己去看看。

Original: Garland:However, know you shall die and forever become one with the chaos!
Dialogue: However, know you shall die and forever become one with the chaos!
trans: 然而，要知道你终将死去并永远与混沌合而为一！

Original: Garland:Hmph... Bearers of the feeble light, you cannot stop the carnage from spreading.
Dialogue: Hmph... Bearers of the feeble light, you cannot stop the carnage from spreading.
trans: 哼…… 微光的承载者，你们无法阻止屠杀的蔓延。

Original: Garland:You fared better than I thought you would, but you are no match for me.
Dialogue: You fared better than I thought you would, but you are no match for me.
trans: 你的表现比我想象的要好，但你不是我的对手。

Original: Cecil:It's not over yet!
Dialogue: It's not over yet!
trans: 还没结束！

Original: Mog:K-kupo! The Torsion's going critical!
Dialogue: K-kupo! The Torsion's going critical!
trans: K-kupo！

Original: Shantotto:The Torsion has reached a critical state, you say? Fascinating! This must be my lucky day.
Dialogue: The Torsion has reached a critical state, you say? Fascinating! This must be my lucky day.
trans: 你说扭转已经到了临界状态？

Original: Warrior of Light:Garland, what have you done!?
Dialogue: Garland, what have you done!?
trans: 嘉兰，你做了什么！？

Original: Garland:Nothing. This is how this world operates.
Dialogue: Nothing. This is how this world operates.
trans: 没有什么。

Original: Cecil:Get ready!
Dialogue: Get ready!
trans: 做好准备！

Original: Mog:Th-this is gonna be a tough one, kupo! But it's now or never!
Dialogue: Th-this is gonna be a tough one, kupo! But it's now or never!
trans: 这-这将是一场艰难的比赛，kupo！

Original: Cecil:We did it...
Dialogue: We did it...
trans: 我们做到了...

Original: Cyan:L-look up! A fleet of airships is heading this way!
Dialogue: L-look up! A fleet of airships is heading this way!
trans: L-抬头看！

Original: Cecil:They're firing on us! This tower could collapse at any moment!
Dialogue: They're firing on us! This tower could collapse at any moment!
trans: 他们向我们开火！

Original: Lightning:...! Was it all for nothing?
Dialogue: ...! Was it all for nothing?

Original: Sazh:I wouldn't lose hope just yet, Lightning!
Dialogue: I wouldn't lose hope just yet, Lightning!
trans: 我不会失去希望，Lightning！

Original: Mog:Hurray! It's our ship, kupo!
Dialogue: Hurray! It's our ship, kupo!
trans: 欢呼！

Original: Papalymo:Let us bid this tower farewell, shall we?
Dialogue: Let us bid this tower farewell, shall we?
trans: 让我们告别这座塔，好吗？

Original: Onion Knight:Lightning, was it? Hope's friend?
Dialogue: Lightning, was it? Hope's friend?
trans: 闪电，是吗？

Original: Onion Knight:You're coming with us. Not like the others in the ship would have it any other way.
Dialogue: You're coming with us. Not like the others in the ship would have it any other way.
trans: 你要和我们一起去

Original: Onion Knight:That's okay with you, right?
Dialogue: That's okay with you, right?
trans: 你没问题，对吧？

Original: Mog:You know it! Lightning also possesses the
Dialogue: You know it! Lightning also possesses the—
trans: 你知道的！

Original: Cecil:We must hurry to our ship! That's our only chance to escape!
Dialogue: We must hurry to our ship! That's our only chance to escape!
trans: 我们必须赶快回到我们的船上！

Original: Mog:You don't have to tell me twice! Kupooo!
Dialogue: You don't have to tell me twice! Kupooo!
trans: 你不必告诉我两次！

Original: Onion Knight:Lightning, you seem to know a lot more about this world than we do.
Dialogue: Lightning, you seem to know a lot more about this world than we do.
trans: 闪电，你似乎比我们更了解这个世界。

Original: Lightning:Not as much as your moogle.
Dialogue: Not as much as your moogle.
trans: 不如你的moogle。

Original: Onion Knight:That's fine. We could still really use your help.
Dialogue: That's fine. We could still really use your help.
trans: 没关系。

Original: Onion Knight:We're planning on meeting the "goddess" he serves.
Dialogue: We're planning on meeting the "goddess" he serves.
trans: 我们计划去见见他侍奉的“女神”。

Original: Lightning:All right...I'm in.
Dialogue: All right...I'm in.
trans: 好吧……我进去了。

Original: Materia:The squadron that attacked them must have been sent by Spiritus.
Dialogue: The squadron that attacked them must have been sent by Spiritus.
trans: 袭击他们的中队肯定是斯皮里图斯派来的。

Original: Materia:But why would Spiritus, a god himself, try to spread chaos throughout this world?
Dialogue: But why would Spiritus, a god himself, try to spread chaos throughout this world?
trans: 但是，为什么 Spiritus 本身就是一个神，会试图在这个世界上散播混乱呢？

Original: Materia:That is not what bothers me most though.
Dialogue: That is not what bothers me most though.
trans: 不过，这并不是最让我困扰的。

Original: Materia:Some of my warriors are growing suspicious of Mog.
Dialogue: Some of my warriors are growing suspicious of Mog.
trans: 我的一些战士开始怀疑莫格了。

Original: Materia:But as a goddess, I cannot strip them of their spirit of inquiryfor that is what makes them human.
Dialogue: But as a goddess, I cannot strip them of their spirit of inquiry—for that is what makes them human.
trans: 但作为女神，我无法剥夺她们的探究精神——因为那是她们之所以为人的原因。

Original: Materia:The warrior in charge of Spiritus's squadron seems to have a good heart.
Dialogue: The warrior in charge of Spiritus's squadron seems to have a good heart.
trans: 负责 Spiritus 中队的战士似乎心地善良。

Original: Materia:Perhaps their encounter can lead this world to salvation.
Dialogue: Perhaps their encounter can lead this world to salvation.
trans: 或许他们的相遇可以引领这个世界走向救赎。

Original: Spiritus:The time is near.
Dialogue: The time is near.
trans: 时间快到了。

Original: Spiritus:The rebel army has started to take action as well.
Dialogue: The rebel army has started to take action as well.
trans: 叛军也开始行动了。

Original: Spiritus:Come forth, those who are not bound by the trivial laws held by Materia or that moogle.
Dialogue: Come forth, those who are not bound by the trivial laws held by Materia or that moogle.
trans: 出来吧，那些不受 Materia 或那个 moogle 所持有的琐碎法则约束的人。

Original: Spiritus:Bring to this world the chaos you so desire.
Dialogue: Bring to this world the chaos you so desire.
trans: 给这个世界带来你渴望的混乱。

Original: Spiritus:All that is left is to wait for it to be freed from its shackles.
Dialogue: All that is left is to wait for it to be freed from its shackles.
trans: 剩下的就是等待它摆脱束缚。

Original: Spiritus:Then, I shall rebuild this shattered world and establish equilibrium.
Dialogue: Then, I shall rebuild this shattered world and establish equilibrium.
trans: 然后，我将重建这个破碎的世界，建立平衡。

Original: Lightning:...! Was it all for nothing?
Dialogue: ...! Was it all for nothing?

Original: Sazh:I wouldn't lose hope just yet, Lightning!
Dialogue: I wouldn't lose hope just yet, Lightning!
trans: 我不会失去希望，Lightning！

Original: Mog:Hurray! It's our ship, kupo!
Dialogue: Hurray! It's our ship, kupo!
trans: 欢呼！

Original: Papalymo:Let us bid this tower farewell, shall we?
Dialogue: Let us bid this tower farewell, shall we?
trans: 让我们告别这座塔，好吗？

Original: Onion Knight:Lightning, was it? Hope's friend?
Dialogue: Lightning, was it? Hope's friend?
trans: 闪电，是吗？

Original: Onion Knight:You're coming with us. Not like the others in the ship would have it any other way.
Dialogue: You're coming with us. Not like the others in the ship would have it any other way.
trans: 你要和我们一起去

Original: Onion Knight:That's okay with you, right?
Dialogue: That's okay with you, right?
trans: 你没问题，对吧？

Original: Mog:You know it! Lightning also possesses the
Dialogue: You know it! Lightning also possesses the—
trans: 你知道的！

Original: Cecil:We must hurry to our ship! That's our only chance to escape!
Dialogue: We must hurry to our ship! That's our only chance to escape!
trans: 我们必须赶快回到我们的船上！

Original: Mog:You don't have to tell me twice! Kupooo!
Dialogue: You don't have to tell me twice! Kupooo!
trans: 你不必告诉我两次！

Original: Warrior of Light:Is everyone safely aboard?
Dialogue: Is everyone safely aboard?
trans: 船上的人都安全吗？

Original: Mog:We're all here, kupo! Our new friends, too!
Dialogue: We're all here, kupo! Our new friends, too!
trans: 我们都在这里，库波！

Original: Lightning:So you're the moogle the Returners spoke of, going around closing Torsions.
Dialogue: So you're the moogle the Returners spoke of, going around closing Torsions.
trans: 所以你就是 Returners 所说的 moogle，绕着关闭 Torsions 转。

Original: Firion:Returners...? You know of the resistance?
Dialogue: Returners...? You know of the resistance?
trans: 回归者……？

Original: Lightning:I met their leader soon after arriving in this world. He gave me the gist of what's going on...
Dialogue: I met their leader soon after arriving in this world. He gave me the gist of what's going on...
trans: 来到这个世界不久，我就遇到了他们的首领。

Original: Lightning:But the folks I know are with you. I'm not part of any resistance.
Dialogue: But the folks I know are with you. I'm not part of any resistance.
trans: 但我认识的人都和你在一起。

Original: Mog:You're one of us now, kupo!
Dialogue: You're one of us now, kupo!
trans: 你现在是我们中的一员了，kupo！

Original: Lightning:I'm not one of yours either. I fight on my own terms.
Dialogue: I'm not one of yours either. I fight on my own terms.
trans: 我也不是你们的一员。

Original: Sazh:Hey, guys? I got some bad news! We're stuck...
Dialogue: Hey, guys? I got some bad news! We're stuck...
trans: 大家好？

Original: Sazh:These airships've got us surrounded!
Dialogue: These airships've got us surrounded!
trans: 这些飞艇已经把我们包围了！

Original: Cecil:That fleet is from my world... TheRed WingsofBaron...
Dialogue: That fleet is from my world... The Red Wings of Baron...
trans: 那支舰队来自我的世界……男爵的红翼……

Original: Edge:Whoa, whoa, whoa! I thought you're in charge of the Red Wings!
Dialogue: Whoa, whoa, whoa! I thought you're in charge of the Red Wings!
trans: 哇，哇，哇！

Original: Cecil:I was...driven out from my country.
Dialogue: I was...driven out from my country.
trans: 我被……赶出了我的国家。

Original: Cecil:The Red Wings current commander is Golbez...a ruthless scoundrel.
Dialogue: The Red Wings current commander is Golbez...a ruthless scoundrel.
trans: Red Wings 的现任指挥官是 Golbez……一个无情的恶棍。

Original: Firion:Airborne fiends coming at us!
Dialogue: Airborne fiends coming at us!
trans: 空中恶魔向我们袭来！

Original: Warrior of Light:We will be going down ship and all if we do not break through the enemy formation...!
Dialogue: We will be going down ship and all if we do not break through the enemy formation...!
trans: 如果我们不突破敌人的阵型，我们就要下船了……！

Original: Lightning:You... Cecil, was it? You were their former commander? Can you point out the flagship?
Dialogue: You... Cecil, was it? You were their former commander? Can you point out the flagship?
trans: 你……塞西尔，是吗？

Original: Cecil:Naturally. Of course... We need only take out the command ship!
Dialogue: Naturally. Of course... We need only take out the command ship!
trans: 自然。

Original: Firion:Alright, we know what we need to do. Cecil, give Sazh our course!
Dialogue: Alright, we know what we need to do. Cecil, give Sazh our course!
trans: 好吧，我们知道我们需要做什么。

Original: Cecil:Roger. We'll head for the center of the fleet as we deal with these monsters!
Dialogue: Roger. We'll head for the center of the fleet as we deal with these monsters!
trans: 罗杰。

Original: Kuja:I hope you realize knocking them out of the sky won't be the end of that lot.
Dialogue: I hope you realize knocking them out of the sky won't be the end of that lot.
trans: 我希望你意识到，将它们从天上击落并不是一切的终结。

Original: Kuja:Have a look, Golbez. They're headed straight for this airship.
Dialogue: Have a look, Golbez. They're headed straight for this airship.
trans: 看看，戈尔贝兹。

Original: Golbez:...Kuja. Met you a knight called Cecil traveling with the moogle and his band?
Dialogue: ...Kuja. Met you a knight called Cecil traveling with the moogle and his band?

Original: Kuja:Ah, yes, the fellow employing the powers of darkness. An acquaintance of yours?
Dialogue: Ah, yes, the fellow employing the powers of darkness. An acquaintance of yours?
trans: 啊，对了，那个使用黑暗力量的家伙。

Original: Golbez:Darkness...? I see... So the Torsions do bend time as they call us here.
Dialogue: Darkness...? I see... So the Torsions do bend time as they call us here.

Original: Kuja:More than an acquaintance, hm?
Dialogue: More than an acquaintance, hm?
trans: 不只是熟人，嗯？

Original: Kuja:...I've left one of my toys in their way. It should buy you some time.
Dialogue: ...I've left one of my toys in their way. It should buy you some time.
trans: ......我把我的一个玩具落在了他们的路上。

Original: Kuja:If you need to put your feelings in order, I suggest you do it sooner than later.
Dialogue: If you need to put your feelings in order, I suggest you do it sooner than later.
trans: 如果你需要整理你的感情，我建议你早点做。

Original: Cecil:I've given Sazh our course. Let us prepare for aerial combat.
Dialogue: I've given Sazh our course. Let us prepare for aerial combat.
trans: 我已经给 Sazh 上课了。

Original: Lightning:You sound none too happy. I guess those were your ships, after all.
Dialogue: You sound none too happy. I guess those were your ships, after all.
trans: 你听起来不太高兴。

Original: Cecil:No... I'd rather them scuttled than in the clutches of evil.
Dialogue: No... I'd rather them scuttled than in the clutches of evil.
trans: 不...我宁愿他们沉没也不愿落入邪恶的魔爪。

Original: Steiner:It is not only exile that drives your unrelenting sense of guilt...
Dialogue: It is not only exile that drives your unrelenting sense of guilt...
trans: 驱使你持续不断的内疚感的不仅是流放......

Original: Steiner:...To have to bear witness to your former honor used for villainy...
Dialogue: ...To have to bear witness to your former honor used for villainy...
trans: ......不得不见证你曾经的荣誉被用来作恶......

Original: Warrior of Light:Might not someone from a world other than your own be in control of those airships?
Dialogue: Might not someone from a world other than your own be in control of those airships?
trans: 那些飞艇应该不是来自其他世界的人控制的吧？

Original: Cecil:There are only so many capable of commanding them. Others may be with him, but...
Dialogue: There are only so many capable of commanding them. Others may be with him, but...
trans: 只有这么多人能够指挥他们。

Original: Cecil:I'm certain Golbez is aboard the flagship.
Dialogue: I'm certain Golbez is aboard the flagship.
trans: 我确定 Golbez 在旗舰上。

Original: Warrior of Light:Have you any insight as to his motives in this world?
Dialogue: Have you any insight as to his motives in this world?
trans: 你对他在这个世界上的动机有什么了解吗？

Original: Cecil:I...do not. All I know is that he...sows chaos merely in pursuit of power.
Dialogue: I...do not. All I know is that he...sows chaos merely in pursuit of power.
trans: 我不。

Original: Lightning:At the very least, it doesn't seem he wants to be our friend.
Dialogue: At the very least, it doesn't seem he wants to be our friend.
trans: 至少，他似乎并不想成为我们的朋友。

Original: Steiner:While it must be hard for you, let us together see that justice is served!
Dialogue: While it must be hard for you, let us together see that justice is served!
trans: 虽然这对您来说一定很难，但让我们一起见证正义得到伸张！

Original: Cecil:Thank you. I know I can fight with you at my side.
Dialogue: Thank you. I know I can fight with you at my side.
trans: 谢谢。

Original: Zidane:A Black Waltz!? That's one of Kuja's goons!
Dialogue: A Black Waltz!? That's one of Kuja's goons!
trans: 黑色华尔兹！？

Original: Vivi:He can use magic like me...! Be careful, everyone!
Dialogue: He can use magic like me...! Be careful, everyone!
trans: 他能像我一样使用魔法……！

Original: Vivi:That was one of the Black Waltzes... They work for Kuja back home...
Dialogue: That was one of the Black Waltzes... They work for Kuja back home...
trans: 那是一首黑色华尔兹……他们在家乡为 Kuja 工作……

Original: Eiko:I thought the airships' boss was Cecil's baddie! What's Kuja doing here!?
Dialogue: I thought the airships' boss was Cecil's baddie! What's Kuja doing here!?
trans: 我还以为飞艇老大是塞西尔的坏蛋呢！

Original: Mog:The enemy must be working together, too, kupo...
Dialogue: The enemy must be working together, too, kupo...
trans: 敌人一定也在合作，库波……

Original: Cecil:Golbez...working with Kuja?
Dialogue: Golbez...working with Kuja?
trans: Golbez……和Kuja一起工作？

Original: Vincent:He's using the Torsions to try and alter his destiny...
Dialogue: He's using the Torsions to try and alter his destiny...
trans: 他正在使用 Torsions 来尝试改变他的命运......

Original: Vivi:That's right. ...Do you know him?
Dialogue: That's right. ...Do you know him?
trans: 这是正确的。

Original: Vincent:...I have met him. When I was with Kefka...
Dialogue: ...I have met him. When I was with Kefka...
trans: ……我见过他。

Original: Cecil:If they are working together, what could they possibly be after...?
Dialogue: If they are working together, what could they possibly be after...?
trans: 如果他们一起工作，他们可能会追求什么......？

Original: Cecil:Kuja wants to twist fate, and Kefka wants to destroy the world... But what about Golbez?
Dialogue: Kuja wants to twist fate, and Kefka wants to destroy the world... But what about Golbez?
trans: 库亚想要扭转命运，杰夫卡想要毁灭世界……而戈尔贝兹呢？

Original: Vincent:...Go find out for yourself.
Dialogue: ...Go find out for yourself.
trans: ……自己去找吧。

Original: Eiko:Ouch! If you don't know, say so! You're just...making me worried, too...
Dialogue: Ouch! If you don't know, say so! You're just...making me worried, too...
trans: 哎哟!

Original: Yuffie:Would you guys listen to this!? Bartz is being a total jerk!
Dialogue: Would you guys listen to this!? Bartz is being a total jerk!
trans: 你们会听这个吗！？

Original: Yuffie:He's making fun of me for getting airsick!
Dialogue: He's making fun of me for getting airsick!
trans: 他取笑我晕机！

Original: Yuffie:Even though that wuss can't fight in high places without wetting himself! ...Urp.
Dialogue: Even though that wuss can't fight in high places without wetting himself! ...Urp.
trans: 纵然那窝囊废不能上高处打不湿身！

Original: Bartz:I just don't like heights! Don't put me in the same group as you! Cecil, help me out here!
Dialogue: I just don't like heights! Don't put me in the same group as you! Cecil, help me out here!
trans: 我就是不喜欢高！

Original: Cecil:Eh? I thought you've both fought admirab
Dialogue: Eh? I thought you've both fought admirab—
trans: 嗯？

Original: Bartz:Ack! Don't make me look up!
Dialogue: Ack! Don't make me look up!
trans: 阿克！

Original: Vivi:Umm... I guess we can leave them be.
Dialogue: Umm... I guess we can leave them be.
trans: 嗯……我想我们可以不管他们了。

Original: Vincent:...They're fine.
Dialogue: ...They're fine.
trans: ...他们很好。

Original: Cecil:I have friends now who are cheerful no matter the situation.
Dialogue: I have friends now who are cheerful no matter the situation.
trans: 我现在有朋友，无论情况如何，他们都很开朗。

Original: Cecil:Perhaps I will be rid of this uncertainty once I confront Golbez...!
Dialogue: Perhaps I will be rid of this uncertainty once I confront Golbez...!
trans: 或许与古尔贝兹对峙后，我就能摆脱这种不确定性……！

Original: Kuja:The enemy is boarding. How do you plan to engage them, Commander?
Dialogue: The enemy is boarding. How do you plan to engage them, Commander?
trans: 敌人登机了。

Original: Kefka:Heh heh heh. The only way is the personal way, of course.
Dialogue: Heh heh heh. The only way is the personal way, of course.
trans: 呵呵呵呵。

Original: Kuja:I wouldn't expect the commander to lend an ear to your buffoonery.
Dialogue: I wouldn't expect the commander to lend an ear to your buffoonery.
trans: 我没想到指挥官会听你的滑稽表演。

Original: Kefka:That dark knight has nooo idea who you are or what he's walking into.
Dialogue: That dark knight has nooo idea who you are or what he's walking into.
trans: 那个黑暗骑士不知道你是谁，也不知道他要走进什么地方。

Original: Kefka:Clueless...like, totally unaware about that blood you share!
Dialogue: Clueless...like, totally unaware about that blood you share!
trans: 无知......就像，完全不知道你分享的血！

Original: Kuja:...Don't tell me that's why you're so interested in Cecil.
Dialogue: ...Don't tell me that's why you're so interested in Cecil.
trans: ……别告诉我这就是你对塞西尔如此感兴趣的原因。

Original: Kefka:It is! Today's main dish is a battle between brothers! Just how much does the younger hate the elder?
Dialogue: It is! Today's main dish is a battle between brothers! Just how much does the younger hate the elder?
trans: 这是！

Original: Kuja:So that's the sort of plot you enjoy? You truly are tasteless.
Dialogue: So that's the sort of plot you enjoy? You truly are tasteless.
trans: 这就是你喜欢的情节吗？

Original: Kuja:You needn't listen to this clown. You have your own plan, I trust.
Dialogue: You needn't listen to this clown. You have your own plan, I trust.
trans: 你不必听这个小丑的话。

Original: Golbez:I do... And I will carry it out even if the light illuminating my brother's path is dimmer than moonlight.
Dialogue: I do... And I will carry it out even if the light illuminating my brother's path is dimmer than moonlight.
trans: 我愿意……即使照亮我兄弟道路的光线比月光还暗，我也会执行它。

Original: Kefka:Hee hee hee... How touching. I think I might cry.
Dialogue: Hee hee hee... How touching. I think I might cry.
trans: 嘻嘻嘻……好感人。

Original: Kefka:Two lights coming together, and the world crumbles beneath them!
Dialogue: Two lights coming together, and the world crumbles beneath them!
trans: 两道光汇聚在一起，世界在他们脚下崩塌！

Original: Kuja:...Are you going to play his game? Golbez... You can yet...
Dialogue: ...Are you going to play his game? Golbez... You can yet...
trans: ……你要玩他的游戏吗？

Original: Golbez:What is necessary now is battle. Of that I am sure.
Dialogue: What is necessary now is battle. Of that I am sure.
trans: 现在需要的是战斗。

Original: Kuja:Very well. I can respect that.
Dialogue: Very well. I can respect that.
trans: 很好。

Original: Kuja:...But in that case, why don't you leave it to me?
Dialogue: ...But in that case, why don't you leave it to me?
trans: ……不过，既然如此，就交给我吧？

Original: Kuja:You've yet to meet in this world. All the more reason to not take part in the clown's trashy melodrama.
Dialogue: You've yet to meet in this world. All the more reason to not take part in the clown's trashy melodrama.
trans: 你们还没有在这个世界上相遇。

Original: Golbez:Kuja, you...
Dialogue: Kuja, you...
trans: 婊子，你...

Original: Kuja:Please, allow me to let you watch the knight's reaction from the mezzanine.
Dialogue: Please, allow me to let you watch the knight's reaction from the mezzanine.
trans: 拜托，让我让你在夹层看骑士的反应。

Original: Kuja:At last the dark knight enters the stage.
Dialogue: At last the dark knight enters the stage.
trans: 黑暗骑士终于登场了。

Original: Kuja:Heh. Past me awaits your dear Golbez.
Dialogue: Heh. Past me awaits your dear Golbez.
trans: 呵呵。

Original: Kuja:Just how will the curtain fall on you two, I wonder.
Dialogue: Just how will the curtain fall on you two, I wonder.
trans: 我想知道你们两个将如何落幕。

Original: Cecil:Golbez!
Dialogue: Golbez!
trans: 戈贝兹！

Original: Golbez:...Even as a dark knight, the light is with you in this world...
Dialogue: ...Even as a dark knight, the light is with you in this world...
trans: ……即使身为暗黑骑士，这个世界也有光与你同在……

Original: Kuja:Heh... The light within the dark... Perhaps you have the same potential as me.
Dialogue: Heh... The light within the dark... Perhaps you have the same potential as me.
trans: 呵……黑暗中的光明……或许你也有和我一样的潜力。

Original: Cecil:What are you talking about!? What is it you're after...?
Dialogue: What are you talking about!? What is it you're after...?
trans: 你在说什么！？

Original: Mog:Kupo! Uh-oh!
Dialogue: Kupo! Uh-oh!
trans: 库帕！

Original: Kuja:And now the clown's melodrama is no more. Your fraternal problems...will be resolved.
Dialogue: And now the clown's melodrama is no more. Your fraternal problems...will be resolved.
trans: 现在小丑的情节剧已经不复存在了。

Original: Sazh:Hey, you guys better get in here! Our engine's shot!
Dialogue: Hey, you guys better get in here! Our engine's shot!
trans: 嘿，你们最好进来！

Original: Golbez:Cecil! I expect light the next time we meet... Until then, your will is your own!
Dialogue: Cecil! I expect light the next time we meet... Until then, your will is your own!
trans: 塞西尔！

Original: Cecil:What's this all of a sudden? Why would I listen to your
Dialogue: What's this all of a sudden? Why would I listen to your—
trans: 这是什么突然？

Original: Lightning:Cecil! Forget about it!
Dialogue: Cecil! Forget about it!
trans: 塞西尔！

Original: Layle:Let me handle this! Come on now!
Dialogue: Let me handle this! Come on now!
trans: 让我来处理这件事！

Original: Mog:Hurry to safety, kupo!
Dialogue: Hurry to safety, kupo!
trans: 快点到安全​​的地方，kupo！

Original: Sazh:Mog! I'm putting us down on that floating continent!
Dialogue: Mog! I'm putting us down on that floating continent!
trans: 猫！

Original: Mog:Roger, kupo! Everyone get ready for a rough landing, kupo!
Dialogue: Roger, kupo! Everyone get ready for a rough landing, kupo!
trans: 罗杰，库波！

Original: ???:Now then... Might the sleeping beauty be awake already?
Dialogue: Now then... Might the sleeping beauty be awake already?
trans: 那么……睡美人该不会已经醒了吧？

Original: Cecil:Unh... Who're you...?
Dialogue: Unh... Who're you...?

Original: Lightning:A line like that...has to be Edgar.
Dialogue: A line like that...has to be Edgar.
trans: 这样的台词……一定是埃德加。

Original: Edgar:The moogle and his merry band. At last we meet.
Dialogue: The moogle and his merry band. At last we meet.
trans: moogle 和他快乐的乐队。

Original: Warrior of Light:Then you are the leader of Layle and Firion's Returners...
Dialogue: Then you are the leader of Layle and Firion's Returners...
trans: 那么你就是 Layle 和 Firion 的 Returners 的领导者......

Original: Layle:Were you tending to us? Nice way to steal the show.
Dialogue: Were you tending to us? Nice way to steal the show.
trans: 你照顾我们吗？

Original: Edgar:It's all of your information that brought me here. Thanks for your hard work.
Dialogue: It's all of your information that brought me here. Thanks for your hard work.
trans: 是你的所有信息把我带到了这里。

Original: Cecil:What about the airship? Is it a wreck?
Dialogue: What about the airship? Is it a wreck?
trans: 飞艇呢？

Original: Edgar:Not to worry. Despite appearances, I have a knack for the mechanical.
Dialogue: Not to worry. Despite appearances, I have a knack for the mechanical.
trans: 不用担心。

Original: Mog:You were fixing the goddess's airship, kupo?
Dialogue: You were fixing the goddess's airship, kupo?
trans: 你在修理女神的飞艇，库波？

Original: Edgar:The Goddess Materia, eh? So I have her imagination to thank for that being a serviceable product.
Dialogue: The Goddess Materia, eh? So I have her imagination to thank for that being a serviceable product.
trans: 女神魔石，嗯？

Original: Edgar:At any rate, it'll be a bit longer until it's up and running.
Dialogue: At any rate, it'll be a bit longer until it's up and running.
trans: 无论如何，在启动和运行之前它会更长一些。

Original: Edgar:How about closing up the local Torsion in the meantime?
Dialogue: How about closing up the local Torsion in the meantime?
trans: 同时关闭本地 Torsion 怎么样？

Original: Lightning:While I don't like being told what to do, I don't have a reason to decline.
Dialogue: While I don't like being told what to do, I don't have a reason to decline.
trans: 虽然我不喜欢被告知该做什么，但我没有理由拒绝。

Original: Cecil:Indeed... It seems there are monsters around.
Dialogue: Indeed... It seems there are monsters around.
trans: 果然……周围好像有怪物。

Original: Warrior of Light:Edgar, once we have secured the area, I'd like to hear what you have to say.
Dialogue: Edgar, once we have secured the area, I'd like to hear what you have to say.
trans: 埃德加，一旦我们占领了该地区，我想听听你有什么要说的。

Original: Edgar:Naturally. Warriors of and with the light, I trust you will return safely.
Dialogue: Naturally. Warriors of and with the light, I trust you will return safely.
trans: 自然。

Original: Terra:Say, Shadow and you guys have been fighting at Edgar's direction, right?
Dialogue: Say, Shadow and you guys have been fighting at Edgar's direction, right?
trans: 话说，影子他们一直在艾德加的指使下战斗吧？

Original: Shadow:The world matters not. I go where I'm paid to.
Dialogue: The world matters not. I go where I'm paid to.
trans: 世界无关紧要。

Original: Firion:I don't know about "direction." I was told to protect what needed protecting how I saw fit.
Dialogue: I don't know about "direction." I was told to protect what needed protecting how I saw fit.
trans: 我不知道“方向”。

Original: Squall:...More or less the same here. I'd receive a commission, but the particulars were left up to me.
Dialogue: ...More or less the same here. I'd receive a commission, but the particulars were left up to me.
trans: ……这里差不多。

Original: Mog:How many are in the organization, kupo?
Dialogue: How many are in the organization, kupo?
trans: 组织里有多少人，kupo？

Original: Firion:No idea. Edgar never spoke of it.
Dialogue: No idea. Edgar never spoke of it.
trans: 不知道。

Original: Firion:But he seems to have been in contact with others beside us.
Dialogue: But he seems to have been in contact with others beside us.
trans: 不过他好像和我们身边的其他人有过接触。

Original: Balthier:A cautious fellow. Must be a thing among royalty.
Dialogue: A cautious fellow. Must be a thing among royalty.
trans: 一个谨慎的家伙。

Original: Balthier:Gods and moogles, otherworldly villains, and a maverick king... Who's up to the most no good?
Dialogue: Gods and moogles, otherworldly villains, and a maverick king... Who's up to the most no good?
trans: 众神与莫古利、异界恶人、特立独行的国王……谁最不怀好意？

Original: Terra:Edgar...is a friend.
Dialogue: Edgar...is a friend.
trans: 埃德加……是朋友。

Original: Terra:He's following the will of the light... Isn't that right, Mog?
Dialogue: He's following the will of the light... Isn't that right, Mog?
trans: 他在追随圣光的意志……对不对，莫格？

Original: Mog:You bet it is, kupo! If he's a friend of yours, he's a friend of ours, kupo!
Dialogue: You bet it is, kupo! If he's a friend of yours, he's a friend of ours, kupo!
trans: 你敢打赌，库波！

Original: Balthier:A convenient way to wrap up the conversation if I've ever heard one.
Dialogue: A convenient way to wrap up the conversation if I've ever heard one.
trans: 如果我曾经听过的话，这是一种结束对话的便捷方式。

Original: Mog:I wish you'd trust me a little more, kupo...
Dialogue: I wish you'd trust me a little more, kupo...
trans: 我希望你能多相信我一点，kupo...

Original: Onion Knight:...They looked creepy, but they weren't regular monsters, huh?
Dialogue: ...They looked creepy, but they weren't regular monsters, huh?
trans: ……虽然看起来很恐怖，但也不是普通的怪物吧？

Original: Lightning:..."Creepy" as they are, they were once human.
Dialogue: ..."Creepy" as they are, they were once human.
trans: ......尽管他们“令人毛骨悚然”，但他们曾经是人类。

Original: Shantotto:Oh? You don't say. Was it by their own misdeeds they ended up that way?
Dialogue: Oh? You don't say. Was it by their own misdeeds they ended up that way?
trans: 哦？

Original: Lightning:The opposite.
Dialogue: The opposite.
trans: 相反。

Original: Hope:In our world, there are...godlike beingsthat arbitrarily assign humans aFocus.
Dialogue: In our world, there are...godlike beings that arbitrarily assign humans a Focus.
trans: 在我们的世界中，有...神一样的存在任意分配给人类一个焦点。

Original: Hope:If you can't complete your Focus...even through no fault of your own...you become a Cie'th...
Dialogue: If you can't complete your Focus...even through no fault of your own...you become a Cie'th...
trans: 如果你不能完成你的焦点……即使不是你自己的错……你也会成为 Cie'th……

Original: Onion Knight:Those gods sound awfully self-serving...not that our position is all that different right now.
Dialogue: Those gods sound awfully self-serving...not that our position is all that different right now.
trans: 那些神明听起来非常自私……并不是说我们现在的立场完全不同。

Original: Lightning:Yeah. And because of that airship scuffle, my confrontation with this latest goddess has to wait.
Dialogue: Yeah. And because of that airship scuffle, my confrontation with this latest goddess has to wait.
trans: 是的。

Original: Shantotto:Since we've encountered that know-it-all king, you may get your wish sooner than later.
Dialogue: Since we've encountered that know-it-all king, you may get your wish sooner than later.
trans: 既然遇到了那个万事通王，说不定早日如愿。

Original: Shantotto:With the added pawnser, knowledge at our disposal, I simply can't think of anything greater.
Dialogue: With the added pawns—er, knowledge at our disposal, I simply can't think of anything greater.
trans: 有了更多的棋子——呃，我们可以支配的知识，我简直想不出还有什么比这更好的了。

Original: Zell:Here you guys are! We're moving out!
Dialogue: Here you guys are! We're moving out!
trans: 给你们！

Original: Papalymo:May I inquire as to your topic of discussion?
Dialogue: May I inquire as to your topic of discussion?
trans: 请问你们讨论的话题是什么？

Original: Onion Knight:We were talking about monsters. Just idle chatter.
Dialogue: We were talking about monsters. Just idle chatter.
trans: 我们在谈论怪物。

Original: Shantotto:Yes, the creatures of far-flung realms was our subject matter.
Dialogue: Yes, the creatures of far-flung realms was our subject matter.
trans: 是的，遥远领域的生物是我们的主题。

Original: Zell:Huh, that sounds pretty fun! The two of you sure've got a lot of smarts packed into those tiny bodies.
Dialogue: Huh, that sounds pretty fun! The two of you sure've got a lot of smarts packed into those tiny bodies.
trans: 呵呵，听起来很有趣！

Original: Shantotto:A smart aleck, eh? That's quite enough. Unless for some reason you want to play rough.
Dialogue: A smart aleck, eh? That's quite enough. Unless for some reason you want to play rough.
trans: 一个聪明的aleck，嗯？

Original: Zell:N-no smart alecks here! J-just a happy, peaceful party ready to shake a leg!
Dialogue: N-no smart alecks here! J-just a happy, peaceful party ready to shake a leg!
trans: N-这里没有聪明的alecks！

Original: Penelo:Was that...gunfire just now?
Dialogue: Was that...gunfire just now?
trans: 刚刚那是……枪声？

Original: Zidane:I wouldn't sweat it. Probably just Laguna goofing off.
Dialogue: I wouldn't sweat it. Probably just Laguna goofing off.
trans: 我不会出汗。

Original: Laguna:Now hold on a minute there! Even I know better than to do something dangerous like that!
Dialogue: Now hold on a minute there! Even I know better than to do something dangerous like that!
trans: 现在等一下！

Original: Cyan:Wast it thou, Sir Vincent?
Dialogue: Wast it thou, Sir Vincent?
trans: 是你吗，文森特爵士？

Original: Vincent:...I'm not in the habit of drawing my weapon without an enemy around.
Dialogue: ...I'm not in the habit of drawing my weapon without an enemy around.
trans: ......我没有在没有敌人的情况下拔出武器的习惯。

Original: Zidane:Hey, you think someone...might be shooting at us?
Dialogue: Hey, you think someone...might be shooting at us?
trans: 嘿，你觉得有人……可能在朝我们开枪？

Original: Penelo:H-how are you so calm about it? Let's get out of here!
Dialogue: H-how are you so calm about it? Let's get out of here!
trans: 你、你怎么这么淡定？

Original: Mog:But to where, kupo? We're in the middle of a field!
Dialogue: But to where, kupo? We're in the middle of a field!
trans: 但是去哪里，kupo？

Original: Laguna:Rule fifty-five! Every soldier knows, if you're targeted out in the open, face the enemy and charge!
Dialogue: Rule fifty-five! Every soldier knows, if you're targeted out in the open, face the enemy and charge!
trans: 规则五十五！

Original: Penelo:What!? You're joking, right!?
Dialogue: What!? You're joking, right!?
trans: 什么！？

Original: Cyan:Nay, with no place to flee, it is a plan befitting our situation.
Dialogue: Nay, with no place to flee, it is a plan befitting our situation.
trans: 不，无处可逃，这是适合我们情况的计划。

Original: Vincent:Face the enemy, eh?
Dialogue: Face the enemy, eh?
trans: 面对敌人，嗯？

Original: Laguna:Somebody's gonna regret pointing a gun at yours truly!
Dialogue: Somebody's gonna regret pointing a gun at yours truly!
trans: 有人真的会后悔拿枪指着你的！

Original: Penelo:Ah! Guys!
Dialogue: Ah! Guys!
trans: 啊!

Original: Mog:Wait for us, kupo!
Dialogue: Wait for us, kupo!
trans: 等着我们，库波！

Original: ???:...Hold on, now. Where have I seen that one before...?
Dialogue: ...Hold on, now. Where have I seen that one before...?

Original: Zell:Stop! Cease! Hold your fire!
Dialogue: Stop! Cease! Hold your fire!
trans: 停止！

Original: ???:If it ain't Zell. What a surprise. I thought you looked familiar.
Dialogue: If it ain't Zell. What a surprise. I thought you looked familiar.
trans: 如果不是泽尔。

Original: Zell:We should be the surprised ones...
Dialogue: We should be the surprised ones...
trans: 吃惊的应该是我们吧……

Original: Squall:Couldn't you tell it was us?
Dialogue: Couldn't you tell it was us?
trans: 你看不出来是我们吗？

Original: Irvine:Ahh, sorry about that. I thought you were more of those rowdy, shiny fellas.
Dialogue: Ahh, sorry about that. I thought you were more of those rowdy, shiny fellas.
trans: 啊，对不起。

Original: Zell:Hah? You aren't calling me rowdy, are you?
Dialogue: Hah? You aren't calling me rowdy, are you?
trans: 哈？

Original: Irvine:Not you. These shiny, kinda rocky guys were attacking me, so I got a little anxious is all.
Dialogue: Not you. These shiny, kinda rocky guys were attacking me, so I got a little anxious is all.
trans: 不是你。

Original: Steiner:Shiny, you say? Manikins, I wonder.
Dialogue: Shiny, you say? Manikins, I wonder.
trans: 你说闪亮？

Original: Squall:(He can't distinguish between his allies and a bunch of fakes...? Ugh.)
Dialogue: (He can't distinguish between his allies and a bunch of fakes...? Ugh.)
trans: （他分不清自己的盟友和一群冒牌货……？呃。）

Original: Irvine:So, who's your company? 'Preciate if you could fill me in on the lay of the land, too.
Dialogue: So, who's your company? 'Preciate if you could fill me in on the lay of the land, too.
trans: 那么，你的公司是谁？

Original: Zell:Sounds like a job for Know-It-All-Zell. Alright, Irvine, listen good...
Dialogue: Sounds like a job for Know-It-All-Zell. Alright, Irvine, listen good...
trans: 听起来像是 Know-It-All-Zell 的工作。

Original: Irvine:Huh, you don't say. Stumbling into a different world sure is something.
Dialogue: Huh, you don't say. Stumbling into a different world sure is something.
trans: 呵呵，你不说。

Original: Firion:He's awfully cavalier about all this. I hope he doesn't slow us down...
Dialogue: He's awfully cavalier about all this. I hope he doesn't slow us down...
trans: 他对这一切非常傲慢。

Original: Mog:But he's full of the light, kupo! You'll come with us, won't you, kupo?
Dialogue: But he's full of the light, kupo! You'll come with us, won't you, kupo?
trans: 但他充满了光芒，库波！

Original: Irvine:Sure. These Torsions sound like a walk in the park.
Dialogue: Sure. These Torsions sound like a walk in the park.
trans: 当然。

Original: Irvine:Leave the sharpshooting to me. I'm counting on you for backup.
Dialogue: Leave the sharpshooting to me. I'm counting on you for backup.
trans: 把锐击留给我。

Original: Squall:(...Same as ever.)
Dialogue: (...Same as ever.)
trans: （……一如既往。）

Original: Zell:You're the same as ever!
Dialogue: You're the same as ever!
trans: 你和以前一样！

Original: Firion:If you're Squall and Zell's comrade, you're welcome just the same, but...backup?
Dialogue: If you're Squall and Zell's comrade, you're welcome just the same, but...backup?
trans: 如果你是 Squall 和 Zell 的战友，同样欢迎你，但是……替补？

Original: Zell:Try to overlook his arrogance. That's just the way he is.
Dialogue: Try to overlook his arrogance. That's just the way he is.
trans: 试着忽略他的傲慢。

Original: Irvine:Don't let it bother you and we'll get along just fine.
Dialogue: Don't let it bother you and we'll get along just fine.
trans: 不要让它打扰你，我们会相处得很好。

Original: Irvine:Now, if your fancy pantses'll excuse me.
Dialogue: Now, if your fancy pantses'll excuse me.
trans: 现在，如果你喜欢的裤子会原谅我。

Original: Zell:Irvine! I'm begging ya! Try to catch a drift!
Dialogue: Irvine! I'm begging ya! Try to catch a drift!
trans: 尔湾！

Original: Steiner:...Hrm. It would seem the light chooses all kinds...
Dialogue: ...Hrm. It would seem the light chooses all kinds...

Original: Irvine:That's an older model of a Galbadian military-issue machine gun, isn't it? Slick.
Dialogue: That's an older model of a Galbadian military-issue machine gun, isn't it? Slick.
trans: 那是 Galbadian 军用机枪的旧型号，不是吗？

Original: Laguna:Heh, don't you know it? I ain't sharing, though!
Dialogue: Heh, don't you know it? I ain't sharing, though!
trans: 呵呵，你不知道吗？

Original: Irvine:And you pack duel pistols? That takes skill.
Dialogue: And you pack duel pistols? That takes skill.
trans: 你还带了决斗手枪？

Original: King:...Two guns let me fire twice as many rounds. Simple math.
Dialogue: ...Two guns let me fire twice as many rounds. Simple math.
trans: ......两把枪让我可以发射两倍的子弹。

Original: Irvine:No kidding. Can't argue with you there.
Dialogue: No kidding. Can't argue with you there.
trans: 别开玩笑了。

Original: Irvine:Your firearm is mighty cool, too. Let me give it a try sometime, won't you?
Dialogue: Your firearm is mighty cool, too. Let me give it a try sometime, won't you?
trans: 你的枪支也很酷。

Original: Vincent:...A nave aspiration... ...as you run from isolation, is it?
Dialogue: ...A naïve aspiration... ...as you run from isolation, is it?
trans: ...一个天真的愿望... ...当你从孤立中逃跑时，是吗？

Original: Yang:Oh? What sort of gathering have we here?
Dialogue: Oh? What sort of gathering have we here?
trans: 哦？

Original: Irvine:Just a little get together for gun nuts.
Dialogue: Just a little get together for gun nuts.
trans: 只是为了枪坚果聚在一起。

Original: Zell:Happy as a lark... You sure now's the time for that?
Dialogue: Happy as a lark... You sure now's the time for that?
trans: 高兴得像云雀......你确定现在是时候了吗？

Original: Irvine:We've got some big battles coming up, don't we? What's the harm in letting our hair down for a bit?
Dialogue: We've got some big battles coming up, don't we? What's the harm in letting our hair down for a bit?
trans: 我们即将进行一些大战，不是吗？

Original: Irvine:Relax, I'll be ready when the time comes. You know what I can do.
Dialogue: Relax, I'll be ready when the time comes. You know what I can do.
trans: 放心，到时候我会准备好的。

Original: Zell:Yeah, I know exactly. You choke under pressure.
Dialogue: Yeah, I know exactly. You choke under pressure.
trans: 是的，我很清楚。

Original: Irvine:Aw, you don't have to bring that up.
Dialogue: Aw, you don't have to bring that up.
trans: 哦，你不必提出来。

Original: Yang:Choke under pressure?
Dialogue: Choke under pressure?
trans: 在压力下窒息？

Original: Zell:He's got the chops, but when it's go time, he gets the jitters.
Dialogue: He's got the chops, but when it's go time, he gets the jitters.
trans: 他有勇气，但到了该走的时候，他就会紧张不安。

Original: Laguna:I know how you feel, man! I've got stage fright like you wouldn't believe!
Dialogue: I know how you feel, man! I've got stage fright like you wouldn't believe!
trans: 我知道你的感受，伙计！

Original: Zell:Why do you sound proud of it...?
Dialogue: Why do you sound proud of it...?
trans: 为什么你听起来很自豪......？

Original: Yang:That is a problem. All the moreso for a true warrior with the actual ability...
Dialogue: That is a problem. All the moreso for a true warrior with the actual ability...
trans: 那是个问题。

Original: Yang:Steel nerves require a steel body in which to rest! Come, we start our training immediately!
Dialogue: Steel nerves require a steel body in which to rest! Come, we start our training immediately!
trans: 钢铁般的神经需要钢铁般的身体来安息！

Original: Zell:Oh, sweet! Count me in!
Dialogue: Oh, sweet! Count me in!
trans: 哦太好了！
