Original: Vivi:There are lots of different kinds of worlds, huh?
Dialogue: There are lots of different kinds of worlds, huh?
trans: 世界有很多种，对吧？

Original: Yuffie:I have a hunch your world is probably a lot like mine.
Dialogue: I have a hunch your world is probably a lot like mine.
trans: 我有一种预感，你的世界可能很像我的。

Original: Yuffie:I'm a ninja, too, but I've only seen ones in a ridiculous getup like Edge's in picture books.
Dialogue: I'm a ninja, too, but I've only seen ones in a ridiculous getup like Edge's in picture books.
trans: 我也是忍者，但我只在图画书中看到过像 Edge 那样装束可笑的忍者。

Original: Edge:Hey! You got some nerve saying that in front of a manly specimen of a prince like me!
Dialogue: Hey! You got some nerve saying that in front of a manly specimen of a prince like me!
trans: 嘿！

Original: Yuffie:Ha ha! You're as square as they come! You wanna see a stylish ninja, you're lookin' at her!
Dialogue: Ha ha! You're as square as they come! You wanna see a stylish ninja, you're lookin' at her!
trans: 哈哈！

Original: Raijin:I've only ever read about ninja in books, ya know? I'm so lucky to meet you guys, ya know?
Dialogue: I've only ever read about ninja in books, ya know? I'm so lucky to meet you guys, ya know?
trans: 我只在书上读过忍者，你知道吗？

Original: Yuffie:What about your partner? Doesn't she use shuriken?
Dialogue: What about your partner? Doesn't she use shuriken?
trans: 你的伴侣呢？

Original: Raijin:She can't "ninja-vanish!" or anything like Edge does, ya know? I thought that only happened in fairy tales, ya know?
Dialogue: She can't "ninja-vanish!" or anything like Edge does, ya know? I thought that only happened in fairy tales, ya know?
trans: 她不能“忍者消失！”

Original: Bartz:You really like books, huh?
Dialogue: You really like books, huh?
trans: 你真的很喜欢书，是吧？

Original: Raijin:I borrow 'em from the library, ya know! Except I forget to return them while I'm hanging out with Seifer, ya know?
Dialogue: I borrow 'em from the library, ya know! Except I forget to return them while I'm hanging out with Seifer, ya know?
trans: 我从图书馆借的，你知道的！

Original: Yuffie:Hey, I don't suppose you picked up that way you talk from books, too, huh?
Dialogue: Hey, I don't suppose you picked up that way you talk from books, too, huh?
trans: 嘿，我不认为你也是从书本上学到的，是吧？

Original: Raijin:I was already talking like this by the time I noticed it, ya know?
Dialogue: I was already talking like this by the time I noticed it, ya know?
trans: 当我注意到它时，我已经在这样说话了，你知道吗？

Original: Edge:Fujin's got a funny way of expressing herself, too... A looker like her, it's a shame she doesn't talk more.
Dialogue: Fujin's got a funny way of expressing herself, too... A looker like her, it's a shame she doesn't talk more.
trans: 福晋表达自己的方式也很有趣……像她这样的长相，不多说话真是可惜。

Original: Raijin:She can't stand chatter, ya know? Plus, you try anything she doesn't like, she'll give you a good boot, ya know?
Dialogue: She can't stand chatter, ya know? Plus, you try anything she doesn't like, she'll give you a good boot, ya know?
trans: 她受不了喋喋不休，你知道吗？

Original: Bartz:She'll kick you? I thought she uses ranged attacks!
Dialogue: She'll kick you? I thought she uses ranged attacks!
trans: 她会踢你吗？

Original: Raijin:It friggin' hurts, too, so you better watch yourself, ya know!
Dialogue: It friggin' hurts, too, so you better watch yourself, ya know!
trans: 这该死的也很痛，所以你最好小心点，你知道的！

Original: Steiner:Now I understand. The disciplinary committee is responsible for upholding youthful morals...
Dialogue: Now I understand. The disciplinary committee is responsible for upholding youthful morals...
trans: 现在我明白了。

Original: Steiner:Truly commendable!
Dialogue: Truly commendable!
trans: 实在是太赞了！

Original: Raijin:It's hard work, ya know? We have to crack down on little kids like Vivi even, ya know?
Dialogue: It's hard work, ya know? We have to crack down on little kids like Vivi even, ya know?
trans: 这很辛苦，你知道吗？

Original: Yuffie:I think it suits you. Though you come after me, I'd just run away.
Dialogue: I think it suits you. Though you come after me, I'd just run away.
trans: 我觉得很适合你。

Original: Steiner:Indeed! From your dress to your speech, your very character says you'd let no injustice escape your grasp!
Dialogue: Indeed! From your dress to your speech, your very character says you'd let no injustice escape your grasp!
trans: 的确！

Original: Raijin:Talking about it makes me miss the good ol' days, ya know?
Dialogue: Talking about it makes me miss the good ol' days, ya know?
trans: 谈论它让我怀念过去的美好时光，你知道吗？

Original: Raijin:...I hope the three of us can go back to the way things were, ya know.
Dialogue: ...I hope the three of us can go back to the way things were, ya know.
trans: ……我希望我们三个人能回到原来的样子，你知道的。

Original: Mog:Our escape is a success, kupo!
Dialogue: Our escape is a success, kupo!
trans: 我们逃跑成功了，库波！

Original: Seifer:Don't even think of running.
Dialogue: Don't even think of running.
trans: 想都别想跑。

Original: Mog:Of course not, kupo! So, where's your sorceress?
Dialogue: Of course not, kupo! So, where's your sorceress?
trans: 当然不是，库波！

Original: Seifer:...I was only ordered to drag the info out of you.
Dialogue: ...I was only ordered to drag the info out of you.
trans: ...我只是奉命从你那里拖出信息。

Original: Seifer:You're the one who said she'd be waiting to greet me.
Dialogue: You're the one who said she'd be waiting to greet me.
trans: 你就是那个说她会等着迎接我的人。

Original: Mog:Kupo! "Undoubtedly," I said, kupo!
Dialogue: Kupo! "Undoubtedly," I said, kupo!
trans: 外套！

Original: Mog:I thought if you're really a knight par excellence, she'll heap praise on you for catching me, kupo!
Dialogue: I thought if you're really a knight par excellence, she'll heap praise on you for catching me, kupo!
trans: 我想如果你真的是一位卓越的骑士，她会夸奖你抓住了我，库珀！

Original: Seifer:You trying to start something?
Dialogue: You trying to start something?
trans: 你想开始什么？

Original: Mog:Kupo kupo! Not at all, kupo!
Dialogue: Kupo kupo! Not at all, kupo!
trans: 外套外套！

Original: Mog:What if she's fighting with my warriors, kupo?
Dialogue: What if she's fighting with my warriors, kupo?
trans: 如果她在和我的战士打架怎么办，库波？

Original: Seifer:If she's tied up with Squall...
Dialogue: If she's tied up with Squall...
trans: 如果她和斯考尔有联系……

Original: Seifer:I have to go protect her!
Dialogue: I have to go protect her!
trans: 我得去保护她！

Original: Mog:If it's warriors you want, I can lead you to them, kupo! Come on!
Dialogue: If it's warriors you want, I can lead you to them, kupo! Come on!
trans: 如果你想要战士，我可以带你去找他们，kupo！

Original: Irvine:Hey, now. Isn't that...?
Dialogue: Hey, now. Isn't that...?
trans: 嘿，现在。

Original: Zidane:It's the better third of Seifer's gang!
Dialogue: It's the better third of Seifer's gang!
trans: 这是 Seifer 帮派中最好的三分之一！

Original: Raijin:...Something about the way you say that don't sit right, ya know?
Dialogue: ...Something about the way you say that don't sit right, ya know?
trans: ...关于你说坐姿不对的方式，你知道吗？

Original: Squall:Looks like you got separated.
Dialogue: Looks like you got separated.
trans: 看来你们分开了。

Original: Fujin:RAIJIN? WHY?
Dialogue: RAIJIN? WHY?
trans: 雷金？为什么？

Original: Raijin:It's just like you thought; Ultimecia is big trouble, ya know!
Dialogue: It's just like you thought; Ultimecia is big trouble, ya know!
trans: 就像你想的那样；

Original: Zidane:So we're all going to go convince Seifer to give it up. If you want to come, I'd be happy to escort you along the way.
Dialogue: So we're all going to go convince Seifer to give it up. If you want to come, I'd be happy to escort you along the way.
trans: 所以我们都会去说服 Seifer 放弃它。

Original: Fujin:...CONFUSED. NEED TIME.
Dialogue: ...CONFUSED. NEED TIME.
trans: ...使困惑。

Original: Cyan:Sir Zidane!
Dialogue: Sir Zidane!
trans: 齐达内爵士！

Original: Zidane:Yeah, I know. Everyone ready to protect the lady?
Dialogue: Yeah, I know. Everyone ready to protect the lady?
trans: 是的，我知道。

Original: Squall:Would you call Fujin a lady?
Dialogue: Would you call Fujin a lady?
trans: 你会称福晋为淑女吗？

Original: Irvine:Let's just worry about the monsters first, 'kay?
Dialogue: Let's just worry about the monsters first, 'kay?
trans: 让我们先担心怪物，好吗？

Original: Squall:...Fujin. We can tell you're worried about Seifer.
Dialogue: ...Fujin. We can tell you're worried about Seifer.
trans: ……福晋。

Original: Fujin:DISTRUST. BEWITCHED.
Dialogue: DISTRUST. BEWITCHED.
trans: 怀疑。

Original: Zidane:Your concerns are spot on. Seifer's gonna go on a rampage if we don't help him...
Dialogue: Your concerns are spot on. Seifer's gonna go on a rampage if we don't help him...
trans: 你的担忧是正确的。

Original: Zidane:Right, Squall?
Dialogue: Right, Squall?
trans: 对吧，斯考尔？

Original: Squall:(He never talks that nicely to guys.)
Dialogue: (He never talks that nicely to guys.)
trans: （他从不和男人说得那么好。）

Original: Raijin:You and I gotta do something, and soon, ya know? He ain't gonna listen to Squall, ya know.
Dialogue: You and I gotta do something, and soon, ya know? He ain't gonna listen to Squall, ya know.
trans: 你和我必须做点什么，很快，你知道吗？

Original: Layle:Then we're all on the same page.
Dialogue: Then we're all on the same page.
trans: 然后我们都在同一页面上。

Original: Layle:Doubtless you'd be better off traveling with us than fighting off monsters on your own, too.
Dialogue: Doubtless you'd be better off traveling with us than fighting off monsters on your own, too.
trans: 毫无疑问，与我们一起旅行比你自己与怪物战斗更好。

Original: Raijin:I'm beggin' ya, too; I can't just leave ya out here, ya know!
Dialogue: I'm beggin' ya, too; I can't just leave ya out here, ya know!
trans: 我也求你了；

Original: Raijin:He might say that, but so what, ya know! Actually, I know he'll say it, ya know!
Dialogue: He might say that, but so what, ya know! Actually, I know he'll say it, ya know!
trans: 他可能会这么说，但那又怎样，你知道的！

Original: Raijin:But... We just gotta do this, ya know?
Dialogue: But... We just gotta do this, ya know?
trans: 但是...我们只需要这样做，你知道吗？

Original: Fujin:...You're right... He's an...important part of our posse...
Dialogue: ...You're right... He's an...important part of our posse...
trans: ......你是对的......他是......我们团队的重要组成部分......

Original: Zidane:Oh? I didn't think she could talk normally...
Dialogue: Oh? I didn't think she could talk normally...
trans: 哦？

Original: Squall:...Once in a blue moon, it seems.
Dialogue: ...Once in a blue moon, it seems.
trans: ......似乎千载难逢。

Original: Layle:Perfect, so you're in? You'll provide better ammunition talking to him than any of us.
Dialogue: Perfect, so you're in? You'll provide better ammunition talking to him than any of us.
trans: 完美，所以你在？

Original: Fujin:MUTUALLY BENEFICIAL. IN.
Dialogue: MUTUALLY BENEFICIAL. IN.
trans: 互惠互利。

Original: Zidane:What the? She's back to normal.
Dialogue: What the—? She's back to normal.
trans: 什么——？

Original: Squall:That's her default setting for anyone but her friends. ...She's not a bad person deep down.
Dialogue: That's her default setting for anyone but her friends. ...She's not a bad person deep down.
trans: 除了她的朋友，这是她对任何人的默认设置。

Original: Zidane:I can tell! She's a babe, too!
Dialogue: I can tell! She's a babe, too!
trans: 我看得出来！

Original: ???:...Who have we here?
Dialogue: ...Who have we here?
trans: ...我们这里有谁？

Original: Balthier:Oh, please...you can't be serious.
Dialogue: Oh, please...you can't be serious.
trans: 哦，拜托……你不是认真的。

Original: Vaan:Vayne!? From the empire!?
Dialogue: Vayne!? From the empire!?
trans: 薇恩！？

Original: Cloud:Someone from your world?
Dialogue: Someone from your world?
trans: 来自你世界的人？

Original: Ramza:That would mean your Ivalice.
Dialogue: That would mean your Ivalice.
trans: 那将意味着你的 Ivalice。

Original: Penelo:He was...but...
Dialogue: He was...but...
trans: 他是……但是……

Original: Balthier:From the looks of it, he's lost in a strange world, and having a hard time of it to boot.
Dialogue: From the looks of it, he's lost in a strange world, and having a hard time of it to boot.
trans: 看样子，他迷失在一个陌生的世界里，难以自拔。

Original: Vayne:,,,I have been generally apprised of my circumstances. Oddly enough, from one claiming to be "emperor."
Dialogue: ,,,I have been generally apprised of my circumstances. Oddly enough, from one claiming to be "emperor."
trans: ,,,我一般都知道我的情况。

Original: Vayne:Summoned by a god...to do battle for the sake of this world.
Dialogue: Summoned by a god...to do battle for the sake of this world.
trans: 被神召唤……为了这个世界而战。

Original: Vayne:As though his outrageous tale weren't enough, he would that I submit to his authority. Naturally, I refused.
Dialogue: As though his outrageous tale weren't enough, he would that I submit to his authority. Naturally, I refused.
trans: 好像他的离谱故事还不够，他希望我服从他的权威。

Original: Cloud:What's your objective?
Dialogue: What's your objective?
trans: 你的目标是什么？

Original: Vayne:I am of House Solidor. I wish only to protect my lineage and my country.
Dialogue: I am of House Solidor. I wish only to protect my lineage and my country.
trans: 我是众议院索利多尔人。

Original: Vayne:Thrust into this unknown world, I have yet to discover even what I must do to preserve myself.
Dialogue: Thrust into this unknown world, I have yet to discover even what I must do to preserve myself.
trans: 被推入这个未知的世界，我什至还没有发现我必须做些什么来保护自己。

Original: Ramza:Vaan, would you say there's room to reason with him?
Dialogue: Vaan, would you say there's room to reason with him?
trans: 梵，你说他还有讲道理的余地吗？

Original: Vaan:Don't believe a word he says. You don't know how many people died in the wars he's started.
Dialogue: Don't believe a word he says. You don't know how many people died in the wars he's started.
trans: 不要相信他说的任何一个字。

Original: Penelo:...He's our foe, but...fighting him here won't do anything to bring back the dead...
Dialogue: ...He's our foe, but...fighting him here won't do anything to bring back the dead...
trans: ......他是我们的敌人，但是......在这里与他战斗不会起死回生......

Original: Vayne:In no way do I expect this to assuage your ill will. However...
Dialogue: In no way do I expect this to assuage your ill will. However...
trans: 我绝不会期望这会减轻您的恶意。

Original: Vayne:As I stand now, I am in need of your knowledge. The little I have heard so far was patently colored.
Dialogue: As I stand now, I am in need of your knowledge. The little I have heard so far was patently colored.
trans: 就我现在的立场而言，我需要你的知识。

Original: Ramza:...What do you think? He is turned about... Were we to share the road a bit, we could exchange information.
Dialogue: ...What do you think? He is turned about... Were we to share the road a bit, we could exchange information.
trans: ...你怎么认为？

Original: Vaan:Ramza, you don't know this guy!
Dialogue: Ramza, you don't know this guy!
trans: 拉姆萨，你不认识这个人！

Original: Balthier:Nor do you. Solve your problems in your world.
Dialogue: Nor do you. Solve your problems in your world.
trans: 你也没有。

Original: Vaan:You're fine with this!?
Dialogue: You're fine with this!?
trans: 你对这个没问题！？

Original: Balthier:That depends on his attitude. Well?
Dialogue: That depends on his attitude. Well?
trans: 这取决于他的态度。

Original: Vayne:I will bear no arms, and stay my hand in your battles. How does that suit you?
Dialogue: I will bear no arms, and stay my hand in your battles. How does that suit you?
trans: 我将不带武器，在你的战斗中留下我的手。

Original: Cloud:Fair enough.
Dialogue: Fair enough.
trans: 很公平。

Original: Balthier:Truce, then. We'll take what you can tell us, too.
Dialogue: Truce, then. We'll take what you can tell us, too.
trans: 休战，然后。

Original: Vaan:Give me a break... Is that supposed to be "acting mature"?
Dialogue: Give me a break... Is that supposed to be "acting mature"?
trans: 饶了我吧……这就是“装成熟”吗？

Original: Penelo:...I'm frightened.
Dialogue: ...I'm frightened.
trans: ……我很害怕。

Original: Firion:He used monsters to conquer neighboring lands. He's an emperor consumed with avarice.
Dialogue: He used monsters to conquer neighboring lands. He's an emperor consumed with avarice.
trans: 他利用怪物征服邻近的土地。

Original: Firion:No people should be subjugated. He built an army to obey his every whim...and used it to rule the world.
Dialogue: No people should be subjugated. He built an army to obey his every whim...and used it to rule the world.
trans: 没有人应该被征服。

Original: Edgar:Somewhat hard to forgive, wouldn't you say? You strike me as a different sort, though...
Dialogue: Somewhat hard to forgive, wouldn't you say? You strike me as a different sort, though...
trans: 有点难以原谅，你不觉得吗？

Original: Vaan:...He occupied my home. The empire makes nothing but war.
Dialogue: ...He occupied my home. The empire makes nothing but war.
trans: ……他霸占了我的家。

Original: Vayne:The censure of an opponent's citizenry leaves no room for retort.
Dialogue: The censure of an opponent's citizenry leaves no room for retort.
trans: 对对手公民的谴责没有任何反驳的余地。

Original: Vayne:But in the interest of one's homeland, there come times when conflict is inevitable. Such is the position of a sovereign.
Dialogue: But in the interest of one's homeland, there come times when conflict is inevitable. Such is the position of a sovereign.
trans: 但为了祖国的利益，有时冲突是不可避免的。

Original: Edgar:I can never lose sight of the innocents sacrificed to the ravages of war by my decision.
Dialogue: I can never lose sight of the innocents sacrificed to the ravages of war by my decision.
trans: 我永远不会忘记因我的决定而牺牲在战争蹂躏中的无辜者。

Original: Ramza:Is royal birthright all one needs to take the lives of others in one's hands...?
Dialogue: Is royal birthright all one needs to take the lives of others in one's hands...?
trans: 皇室与生俱来的权利就可以将他人的生命掌握在自己手中吗……？

Original: Vayne:The emperor of Archadia is appointed by her people.
Dialogue: The emperor of Archadia is appointed by her people.
trans: 阿卡迪亚的皇帝由她的人民任命。

Original: Vayne:Blood does not decide all.
Dialogue: Blood does not decide all.
trans: 血液并不能决定一切。

Original: Edgar:That, too, must make for a difficult right of succession. After all, you need the people's support.
Dialogue: That, too, must make for a difficult right of succession. After all, you need the people's support.
trans: 这也必然导致继承权变得困难。

Original: Vayne:What way with words I do possess is thanks to that.
Dialogue: What way with words I do possess is thanks to that.
trans: 我所拥有的语言方式是多亏了这一点。

Original: Firion:A far better system than the Emperor's brute force.
Dialogue: A far better system than the Emperor's brute force.
trans: 一个比皇帝的蛮力好得多的系统。

Original: Vaan:What gives...? How can he be so well behaved?
Dialogue: What gives...? How can he be so well behaved?
trans: 是什么赋予了...？

Original: Ramza:That is how he is able to capture public sentiment.
Dialogue: That is how he is able to capture public sentiment.
trans: 这就是他能够抓住公众情绪的方式。

Original: Vaan:Listening to him talk, it makes me sound like i'm just a wrong-headed kid. I can't tell what's what anymore.
Dialogue: Listening to him talk, it makes me sound like i'm just a wrong-headed kid. I can't tell what's what anymore.
trans: 听他说话，我听起来就像是个不合时宜的孩子。

Original: Ramza:You needn't struggle to keep up. Simply, when an unreasonable claim is made, call it out as such.
Dialogue: You needn't struggle to keep up. Simply, when an unreasonable claim is made, call it out as such.
trans: 你不需要努力跟上。

Original: Ramza:I know not what your Ivalice is like.
Dialogue: I know not what your Ivalice is like.
trans: 我不知道你的伊瓦利斯是什么样的。

Original: Ramza:But in mine, I have watched all too often those with power fomenting wars that consume the powerless.
Dialogue: But in mine, I have watched all too often those with power fomenting wars that consume the powerless.
trans: 但在我的生活中，我经常看到那些有权势的人煽动战争，吞噬弱者。

Original: Vaan:You only watched?
Dialogue: You only watched?
trans: 你只看了？

Original: Ramza:I am of fortunate birth. But I could not abide a world with such divisions in fortune. Thus...did I fight...
Dialogue: I am of fortunate birth. But I could not abide a world with such divisions in fortune. Thus...did I fight...
trans: 我是幸运的出生。

Original: Vaan:...I see.
Dialogue: ...I see.
trans: ...我懂了。

Original: Edgar:You aren't your cheerful self, Vaan.
Dialogue: You aren't your cheerful self, Vaan.
trans: 你不是你快乐的自己，Vaan。

Original: Edgar:...Don't worry. I trust that man far less than you may think.
Dialogue: ...Don't worry. I trust that man far less than you may think.
trans: ...不用担心。

Original: Vaan:You sure sounded awfully friendly.
Dialogue: You sure sounded awfully friendly.
trans: 你听起来确实非常友好。

Original: Edgar:Call it a grownup's political savvy. The other side didn't let slip his true feelings either.
Dialogue: Call it a grownup's political savvy. The other side didn't let slip his true feelings either.
trans: 称之为成年人的政治头脑。

Original: Edgar:Leave it to me to find them out, though. For now, try to bear it.
Dialogue: Leave it to me to find them out, though. For now, try to bear it.
trans: 不过，让我找出它们。

Original: Vaan:Thanks, Edgar... Alright, I'll keep my head in our battles.
Dialogue: Thanks, Edgar... Alright, I'll keep my head in our battles.
trans: 谢谢，埃德加……好吧，我会在战斗中保持冷静。

Original: Vanille:Y'know, Fujin. You don't have to keep to yourself all the time. You can talk to us about anything.
Dialogue: Y'know, Fujin. You don't have to keep to yourself all the time. You can talk to us about anything.
trans: 你知道的，福晋。

Original: Faris:Are you worried about your mates?
Dialogue: Are you worried about your mates?
trans: 你担心你的伙伴吗？

Original: Rem:Or if Seifer thinks you betrayed him?
Dialogue: Or if Seifer thinks you betrayed him?
trans: 或者如果 Seifer 认为你背叛了他？

Original: Penelo:I think you're doing the right thing. If he's being fooled, I'm sure he'll...
Dialogue: I think you're doing the right thing. If he's being fooled, I'm sure he'll...
trans: 我认为你在做正确的事。

Original: Y'shtola:Anyone would be if everyone starts talking to her all at once.
Dialogue: Anyone would be if everyone starts talking to her all at once.
trans: 如果每个人都同时开始和她说话，任何人都会是。

Original: Penelo:Ah... I'm sorry, we got carried away...
Dialogue: Ah... I'm sorry, we got carried away...
trans: 啊……对不起，我们跑题了……

Original: Fujin:NO... UNPRACTICED.
Dialogue: NO... UNPRACTICED.
trans: 不...未实践。

Original: Vanille:Don't you like talking to people?
Dialogue: Don't you like talking to people?
trans: 你不喜欢和人说话吗？

Original: Fujin:COMMITTEE. LONE GIRL.
Dialogue: COMMITTEE. LONE GIRL.
trans: 委员会。

Original: Rem:What? You mean you're always with Seifer and Raijin!?
Dialogue: What? You mean you're always with Seifer and Raijin!?
trans: 什么？

Original: Y'shtola:That requires a special patience.
Dialogue: That requires a special patience.
trans: 这需要特别的耐心。

Original: Rem:...I guess I can understand that. Sometimes it's better to be with a few friends than a big group.
Dialogue: ...I guess I can understand that. Sometimes it's better to be with a few friends than a big group.
trans: ……我想我能理解。

Original: Penelo:In that case...I hope Seifer comes to his senses soon.
Dialogue: In that case...I hope Seifer comes to his senses soon.
trans: 那样的话……我希望 Seifer 能尽快清醒过来。

Original: Faris:Until then, you have us.
Dialogue: Until then, you have us.
trans: 在那之前，你有我们。

Original: Y'shtola:It may bewilder you at first, but it would be nice if you would talk to us, even bit by bit.
Dialogue: It may bewilder you at first, but it would be nice if you would talk to us, even bit by bit.
trans: 一开始您可能会感到困惑，但如果您愿意与我们交谈，哪怕是一点一点，那就太好了。

Original: Fujin:WILL TRY.
Dialogue: WILL TRY.
trans: 会尝试。

Original: Ultimecia:You've finally arrived... To this deceitful garden...
Dialogue: You've finally arrived... To this deceitful garden...
trans: 你终于到了……来到这个充满欺骗性的花园……

Original: Squall:Who's the deceitful one here?
Dialogue: Who's the deceitful one here?
trans: 谁是这里的骗子？

Original: Fujin:SEIFER. WHERE?
Dialogue: SEIFER. WHERE?
trans: 塞弗。

Original: Ultimecia:The sorceress's knight fulfills the sorceress's wishes. He is her shield, and preserves her life.
Dialogue: The sorceress's knight fulfills the sorceress's wishes. He is her shield, and preserves her life.
trans: 女术士的骑士满足了女术士的愿望。

Original: Seifer:What the hell is this? Why is the disciplinary committee threatening the sorceress?
Dialogue: What the hell is this? Why is the disciplinary committee threatening the sorceress?
trans: 这到底是什么？

Original: Raijin:We got reasons, ya know!
Dialogue: We got reasons, ya know!
trans: 我们有理由，你知道的！

Original: Seifer:I don't want to hear excuses!
Dialogue: I don't want to hear excuses!
trans: 我不想听借口！

Original: Vaan:You're the one who asked... What a pain in the butt.
Dialogue: You're the one who asked... What a pain in the butt.
trans: 你是那个问的人... 屁股真疼。

Original: Warrior of Light:Is battle our only option? With Seifer, too, now?
Dialogue: Is battle our only option? With Seifer, too, now?
trans: 战斗是我们唯一的选择吗？

Original: Squall:We can't let Ultimecia exist here. She's no better than your Garland.
Dialogue: We can't let Ultimecia exist here. She's no better than your Garland.
trans: 我们不能让 Ultimecia 存在于此。

Original: Seifer:Cut the slander and bring it on! All of you! Traitors, too!
Dialogue: Cut the slander and bring it on! All of you! Traitors, too!
trans: 停止诽谤，把它带上！

Original: Squall:You can tell his stance on the matter.
Dialogue: You can tell his stance on the matter.
trans: 你可以说出他对此事的立场。

Original: Raijin:You're gonna get it if ya go easy on him, ya know? Get ready, ya know!
Dialogue: You're gonna get it if ya go easy on him, ya know? Get ready, ya know!
trans: 如果你对他宽容点，你会得到它的，你知道吗？

Original: Ultimecia:That sadness...anger...hatred...loneliness...
Dialogue: That sadness...anger...hatred...loneliness...
trans: 那种悲伤……愤怒……仇恨……孤独……

Original: Ultimecia:All shall be assimilated and flow into the dimensional algorithm...
Dialogue: All shall be assimilated and flow into the dimensional algorithm...
trans: 统统同化，流入次元算法……

Original: Ultimecia:Do battle, children of destiny. I, too, shall join you.
Dialogue: Do battle, children of destiny. I, too, shall join you.
trans: 战斗吧，命运之子。

Original: Raijin:Seifer! We shouldn't fight, ya know!
Dialogue: Seifer! We shouldn't fight, ya know!
trans: 塞弗！

Original: Seifer:Shut it. I... This is all I have left!
Dialogue: Shut it. I... This is all I have left!
trans: 关掉它。

Original: Ultimecia:Hm hm hm... Indulge your rage... And fight.
Dialogue: Hm hm hm... Indulge your rage... And fight.
trans: 嗯嗯嗯...放纵你的愤怒...然后战斗。

Original: Ultimecia:Is this knight...spent? Useless man.
Dialogue: Is this knight...spent? Useless man.
trans: 这个骑士……废了吗？

Original: Ultimecia:I am through with you. I will see you children again...in theDimensions' Labyrinth.
Dialogue: I am through with you. I will see you children again...in the Dimensions' Labyrinth.
trans: 我和你结束了。

Original: Seifer:Wait! Please! I...I caught the moogle like you asked!
Dialogue: Wait! Please! I...I caught the moogle like you asked!
trans: 等待！

Original: Mog:Kupo? What are you talking about, kupo?
Dialogue: Kupo? What are you talking about, kupo?
trans: 库波？

Original: Mog:I could finally meet back up with everyone, kupo! You're a life saver! Thanks for helping me out, kupo!
Dialogue: I could finally meet back up with everyone, kupo! You're a life saver! Thanks for helping me out, kupo!
trans: 终于可以和大家见面了，kupo！

Original: Seifer:What's happening...? Aren't I...the sorceress's chosen knight...?
Dialogue: What's happening...? Aren't I...the sorceress's chosen knight...?
trans: 发生了什么...？

Original: Seifer:Don't you come near me! I can't stand traitors!
Dialogue: Don't you come near me! I can't stand traitors!
trans: 你不要靠近我！

Original: Squall:...You don't even have faith in your friends?
Dialogue: ...You don't even have faith in your friends?
trans: ……连朋友都不信任？

Original: Vaan:And you don't remember what happened back in your world, right? ...This is getting kinda sad.
Dialogue: And you don't remember what happened back in your world, right? ...This is getting kinda sad.
trans: 你不记得你的世界发生了什么，对吧？

Original: Vayne:Who created these circumstances?
Dialogue: Who created these circumstances?
trans: 谁造成了这些情况？

Original: Raijin:He's got Mog hostage, ya know!
Dialogue: He's got Mog hostage, ya know!
trans: 他挟持了莫格，你知道的！

Original: Vaan:You said you'd stay your hand!
Dialogue: You said you'd stay your hand!
trans: 你说你会留下你的手！

Original: Vayne:Are you blind to your own situation? This moogle uses gods' names to manipulate men as though they were game pieces.
Dialogue: Are you blind to your own situation? This moogle uses gods' names to manipulate men as though they were game pieces.
trans: 你对自己的情况视而不见吗？

Original: Squall:Are we supposed to cut him down on your say so?
Dialogue: Are we supposed to cut him down on your say so?
trans: 如果你这么说，我们应该减少他的数量吗？

Original: Vayne:I have just found my objective. First, to break free from the fetters of these "gods."
Dialogue: I have just found my objective. First, to break free from the fetters of these "gods."
trans: 我刚刚找到了我的目标。

Original: Mog:Help me, kupo! I-I'll tell you anything you want, kupo!
Dialogue: Help me, kupo! I-I'll tell you anything you want, kupo!
trans: 帮帮我，库波！

Original: Seifer:He's hiding more than you realize...
Dialogue: He's hiding more than you realize...
trans: 他隐藏的比你意识到的要多...

Original: Seifer:Let him go... I need to pay him back, too...
Dialogue: Let him go... I need to pay him back, too...
trans: 放过他吧……我也要还他……

Original: Squall:...Hand over Mog.
Dialogue: ...Hand over Mog.
trans: ...交出莫格。

Original: Vayne:It seems we are at an impasse.
Dialogue: It seems we are at an impasse.
trans: 看来我们陷入了僵局。

Original: Vayne:So strike at me. Evince the power to claim your path!
Dialogue: So strike at me. Evince the power to claim your path!
trans: 所以打我。

Original: Vaan:You asked for it!
Dialogue: You asked for it!
trans: 你自找的！

Original: Vayne:It is the right of the powerful to hold the reins of the future!
Dialogue: It is the right of the powerful to hold the reins of the future!
trans: 掌控未来，是强者的权利！

Original: Ramza:Balderdash! That is simply a sophist's excuse for might makes right!
Dialogue: Balderdash! That is simply a sophist's excuse for might makes right!
trans: 梦呓！

Original: Vaan:Don't waste your breath on him! We're past the point of talking!
Dialogue: Don't waste your breath on him! We're past the point of talking!
trans: 别在他身上浪费口舌！

Original: Vayne:Hnh... Not yet...
Dialogue: Hnh... Not yet...
trans: 嗯……还没有……

Original: Vayne:It is not over yet!
Dialogue: It is not over yet!
trans: 这还没有结束！

Original: Warrior of Light:Mog is...driving the Torsion...out of control...!?
Dialogue: Mog is...driving the Torsion...out of control...!?
trans: Mog 正在……驾驶 Torsion……失控……！？

Original: Vayne:...I see. So that is where it all is.
Dialogue: ...I see. So that is where it all is.
trans: ...我懂了。

Original: Ramza:Something is leaving the Torsion!
Dialogue: Something is leaving the Torsion!
trans: 有什么东西正在离开扭曲！

Original: Squall:What...is that?
Dialogue: What...is that?
trans: 那是什么？

Original: Ramza:I know not. I know not, but it is coming for us!
Dialogue: I know not. I know not, but it is coming for us!
trans: 我不知道。

Original: Warrior of Light:Everyone, do not let down your guard! We must first defeat this thing before us!
Dialogue: Everyone, do not let down your guard! We must first defeat this thing before us!
trans: 大家千万不要掉以轻心！

Original: Warrior of Light:Is this the Torsion's master, or...? It matters not; we have no choice but to battle!
Dialogue: Is this the Torsion's master, or...? It matters not; we have no choice but to battle!
trans: 这是 Torsion 的主人，还是……？

Original: Warrior of Light:We defeated what would have appeared to be the master of that Torsion, yet it persists.
Dialogue: We defeated what would have appeared to be the master of that Torsion, yet it persists.
trans: 我们打败了似乎是扭曲的主人的东西，但它仍然存在。

Original: Onion Knight:It's getting bigger, Mog at its center... It's gonna swallow us up if it doesn't blow us away.
Dialogue: It's getting bigger, Mog at its center... It's gonna swallow us up if it doesn't blow us away.
trans: 它越来越大，莫格在它的中心……如果它不把我们吹走，它就会吞噬我们。

Original: Squall:...Seifer! This isn't the time for a nap!
Dialogue: ...Seifer! This isn't the time for a nap!
trans: ……赛弗！

Original: Yuna:He'll be sucked into the Torsion!
Dialogue: He'll be sucked into the Torsion!
trans: 他会被卷入扭转！

Original: Squall:Get up! Seifer!!
Dialogue: Get up! Seifer!!
trans: 起床！

Original: Seifer:...Don't tell me what to do!
Dialogue: ...Don't tell me what to do!
trans: ……别告诉我该怎么做！

Original: Warrior of Light:He has avoided being drawn in.
Dialogue: He has avoided being drawn in.
trans: 他避免被卷入其中。

Original: Seifer:Ugh... It's just you. Where's the moogle?
Dialogue: Ugh... It's just you. Where's the moogle?
trans: 呃……只有你。

Original: Onion Knight:He made that Torsion over there. A big one, too.
Dialogue: He made that Torsion over there. A big one, too.
trans: 他在那边制造了 Torsion。

Original: Onion Knight:By all appearances, we've got ourselves wrapped up in a whole new problem.
Dialogue: By all appearances, we've got ourselves wrapped up in a whole new problem.
trans: 从表面上看，我们已经陷入了一个全新的问题。

Original: Seifer:Don't you drag me into your mess. I was chosen by Spiritus as one with power.
Dialogue: Don't you drag me into your mess. I was chosen by Spiritus as one with power.
trans: 别把我拖进你的烂摊子里。

Original: Squall:That's what the moogle told you.
Dialogue: That's what the moogle told you.
trans: 那是莫古利告诉你的。

Original: Warrior of Light:What on earth... Which god does he serve?
Dialogue: What on earth... Which god does he serve?
trans: 到底……他侍奉的是哪个神明？

Original: ???:He serves neither.
Dialogue: He serves neither.
trans: 他既不服务也不服务。

Original: Materia:...The moogle straddled both of our allegiances, working in secret to gather all kinds of power...
Dialogue: ...The moogle straddled both of our allegiances, working in secret to gather all kinds of power...
trans: ...moogle 跨越我们两个效忠，秘密工作以收集各种力量...

Original: Materia:Furthermore, the moogle's physical form is no longer here.
Dialogue: Furthermore, the moogle's physical form is no longer here.
trans: 而且，莫古利的实体已经不在了。

Original: Materia:What could he have been trying to accomplish?
Dialogue: What could he have been trying to accomplish?
trans: 他可能一直在努力完成什么？

Original: ???:All answers lie beyond that Torsion... In the Dimensions' Labyrinth.
Dialogue: All answers lie beyond that Torsion... In the Dimensions' Labyrinth.
trans: 所有的答案都在扭曲之外……在次元迷宫中。

Original: Warrior of Light:Who goes there!
Dialogue: Who goes there!
trans: 谁去那里！

Original: ???:I, the god of this world.
Dialogue: I, the god of this world.
trans: 我，这个世界的神。

Original: Materia:You are wrong, Spiritus... This is not your world.
Dialogue: You are wrong, Spiritus... This is not your world.
trans: 你错了，Spiritus……这不是你的世界。

Original: Seifer:Spiritus? You're...who chose me...?
Dialogue: Spiritus? You're...who chose me...?
trans: 醑？

Original: Spiritus:...The moogle controlled Materia's combatants to wound my warriors...
Dialogue: ...The moogle controlled Materia's combatants to wound my warriors...
trans: ...moogle 控制 Materia 的战斗人员伤害我的战士...

Original: Spiritus:But was that at the moogle's discretion...or yours, Materia!
Dialogue: But was that at the moogle's discretion...or yours, Materia!
trans: 但这是由 moogle 决定的……还是你的决定，Materia！

Original: Materia:...Those who possess wills of good chose to stop those with wills of evil. It is meaningless if evil destroys the world!
Dialogue: ...Those who possess wills of good chose to stop those with wills of evil. It is meaningless if evil destroys the world!
trans: ……拥有善良意志的人，选择了阻止拥有邪恶意志的人。

Original: Spiritus:Hmph! What good or evil inherent in a will shifts with the circumstances. All that is necessary is pure power!
Dialogue: Hmph! What good or evil inherent in a will shifts with the circumstances. All that is necessary is pure power!
trans: 哼！

Original: Warrior of Light:Foolishness! You would profess that simple power can save the world?
Dialogue: Foolishness! You would profess that simple power can save the world?
trans: 愚蠢！

Original: Onion Knight:Spiritus, do you have any idea what kind of troops you've been summoning?
Dialogue: Spiritus, do you have any idea what kind of troops you've been summoning?
trans: Spiritus，你知道你召唤了什么样的部队吗？

Original: Spiritus:Rubbish... Whatever your feeble lights spout amounts to less than drivel.
Dialogue: Rubbish... Whatever your feeble lights spout amounts to less than drivel.
trans: 垃圾......无论你微弱的灯光喷出什么都比胡言乱语少。

Original: Spiritus:My warrior Seifer. You have no time to grovel in self-pity.
Dialogue: My warrior Seifer. You have no time to grovel in self-pity.
trans: 我的战士塞弗。

Original: Spiritus:Investigate the Dimensions' Labyrinth and put an end to the source of these troubles.
Dialogue: Investigate the Dimensions' Labyrinth and put an end to the source of these troubles.
trans: 调查 Dimensions' Labyrinth 并结束这些麻烦的根源。

Original: Seifer:This time I'm a god's knight, eh?
Dialogue: This time I'm a god's knight, eh?
trans: 这次我是神的骑士，嗯？

Original: Yuna:Stop! It's reckless to go alone!
Dialogue: Stop! It's reckless to go alone!
trans: 停止！

Original: Spiritus:Collaboration cannot save the world. Do not interfere with my warriors!
Dialogue: Collaboration cannot save the world. Do not interfere with my warriors!
trans: 合作无法拯救世界。

Original: Spiritus:Materia... Think not for a moment that your powers can help this world. It is my power that will change it.
Dialogue: Materia... Think not for a moment that your powers can help this world. It is my power that will change it.
trans: Materia... 暂时不要认为你的力量可以帮助这个世界。

Original: Spiritus:Seifer, that power is yours to use.
Dialogue: Seifer, that power is yours to use.
trans: Seifer，你可以使用这种力量。

Original: Squall:It's not a "collaboration"... We need each other, so we're in this together.
Dialogue: It's not a "collaboration"... We need each other, so we're in this together.
trans: 这不是“合作”……我们需要彼此，所以我们在一起。

Original: Seifer:...Ha. When did you become such a goody-goody? I don't need a god's holier-than-thou speech, nor should you.
Dialogue: ...Ha. When did you become such a goody-goody? I don't need a god's holier-than-thou speech, nor should you.

Original: Seifer:But after being led around by the nose, I won't be satisfied until I get at least one good punch in.
Dialogue: But after being led around by the nose, I won't be satisfied until I get at least one good punch in.
trans: 但在被牵着鼻子走之后，我至少要打出一记好拳，否则我不会满意。

Original: Seifer:I'm using this power for me. And I'm using you losers, too. Don't get in my way...
Dialogue: I'm using this power for me. And I'm using you losers, too. Don't get in my way...
trans: 我正在为我使用这种力量。

Original: Onion Knight:Same as ever... If we're headed the same way, you might as well just join us...
Dialogue: Same as ever... If we're headed the same way, you might as well just join us...
trans: 一如既往...如果我们朝着相同的方向前进，您不妨加入我们...

Original: Materia:Regardless of the moogle's circumstances, whom you choose to join you is up to you.
Dialogue: Regardless of the moogle's circumstances, whom you choose to join you is up to you.
trans: 无论 moogle 的情况如何，您选择加入谁都取决于您。

Original: Materia:But there is no meaning in the power of those trapped in darkness... The light will clear the darkest hearts.
Dialogue: But there is no meaning in the power of those trapped in darkness... The light will clear the darkest hearts.
trans: 但那些被困在黑暗中的人的力量毫无意义……光明会照亮最黑暗的心灵。

Original: Materia:Go, warriors. You will find all truths before you.
Dialogue: Go, warriors. You will find all truths before you.
trans: 去吧，勇士们。

Original: Warrior of Light:"All truths"... Beyond this Torsion...
Dialogue: "All truths"... Beyond this Torsion...
trans: “所有真理”......超越这个扭曲......

Original: Materia:...The warriors of light are at last to depart for the Dimensions' Labyrinth.
Dialogue: ...The warriors of light are at last to depart for the Dimensions' Labyrinth.
trans: ...光之战士们终于要启程前往次元迷宫了。

Original: Materia:What could that moogle spirit have been planning?
Dialogue: What could that moogle spirit have been planning?
trans: 那个moogle精神可能一直在计划什么？

Original: Materia:For that matter, was this the moogle's will...or perhaps...some other malevolent being...?
Dialogue: For that matter, was this the moogle's will...or perhaps...some other malevolent being...?
trans: 就此而言，这是莫古利的意志……还是……其他恶毒的存在……？

Original: Materia:...At any rate, it appears new warriors have already stumbled into the labyrinth.
Dialogue: ...At any rate, it appears new warriors have already stumbled into the labyrinth.
trans: ……总之，似乎已经有新的战士闯入迷宫了。

Original: Materia:The most I can do is trust my warriors and leave the matter in their hands.
Dialogue: The most I can do is trust my warriors and leave the matter in their hands.
trans: 我最多只能相信我的战士们，把事情交给他们处理。

Original: Materia:By all means...may the light bless every warrior...
Dialogue: By all means...may the light bless every warrior...
trans: 无论如何……愿光明保佑每一位战士……

Original: Setzer:...So this is the Dimensions' Labyrinth, the depths of space and time.
Dialogue: ...So this is the Dimensions' Labyrinth, the depths of space and time.
trans: ……这就是次元迷宫，时空的深处。

Original: Yuffie:Hrmmm... It's kinda totally different from inside the other Torsions.
Dialogue: Hrmmm... It's kinda totally different from inside the other Torsions.
trans: 嗯……这与其他 Torsions 内部有点完全不同。

Original: Yuffie:Like I feel dizzier than usual... Or sick even... Urp.
Dialogue: Like I feel dizzier than usual... Or sick even... Urp.
trans: 好像我比平时更头晕……或者甚至恶心……呜呜呜。

Original: Warrior of Light:Evidence of just how much the place will wear on us. We must keep our composure.
Dialogue: Evidence of just how much the place will wear on us. We must keep our composure.
trans: 证明这个地方会对我们造成多大影响的证据。

Original: Terra:Mog is somewhere deep inside this labyrinth...
Dialogue: Mog is somewhere deep inside this labyrinth...
trans: 莫格就在这个迷宫深处的某个地方……

Original: Terra:He's waiting for us. I can feel it...
Dialogue: He's waiting for us. I can feel it...
trans: 他在等我们。

Original: Balthier:I'll be heading his way whether he wants me to or not.
Dialogue: I'll be heading his way whether he wants me to or not.
trans: 不管他要不要我，我都会朝他的方向走。

Original: Balthier:I have more than a few questions for the chap. You might say I've had it up to here.
Dialogue: I have more than a few questions for the chap. You might say I've had it up to here.
trans: 我有很多问题要问这个小伙子。

Original: Yuffie:Ditto. Let's hurry and hook up with him so I can get rid of this stress.
Dialogue: Ditto. Let's hurry and hook up with him so I can get rid of this stress.
trans: 同上。

Original: Setzer:The nuance is somehow different when you say it...
Dialogue: The nuance is somehow different when you say it...
trans: 当您说出来时，细微差别会有所不同...

Original: Warrior of Light:At any rate, let us continue on. To Mog, and the truth.
Dialogue: At any rate, let us continue on. To Mog, and the truth.
trans: 无论如何，让我们继续。

Original: Warrior of Light:Our light shall cut a path through the darkness before us.
Dialogue: Our light shall cut a path through the darkness before us.
trans: 我们的光将在我们面前的黑暗中开辟一条道路。

Original: Raijin:Whoo-ee! Get a load of this place! It's like some fantasy land straight out of a picture book, ya know!
Dialogue: Whoo-ee! Get a load of this place! It's like some fantasy land straight out of a picture book, ya know!
trans: 哇哦！

Original: Seifer:Keep your shorts on, Raijin. This isn't a field trip.
Dialogue: Keep your shorts on, Raijin. This isn't a field trip.
trans: 穿上你的短裤，Raijin。

Original: Raijin:I-I know that. I'm just tryingt o lighten the mood, ya know?
Dialogue: I-I know that. I'm just tryingt o lighten the mood, ya know?
trans: 我-我知道。

Original: Seifer:Who do you think I am? I'm a god's knight, chosen by Spiritus himself.
Dialogue: Who do you think I am? I'm a god's knight, chosen by Spiritus himself.
trans: 你觉得我是谁？

Original: Seifer:That moogle, the root of all our problems, is squirreled away somewhere in here...
Dialogue: That moogle, the root of all our problems, is squirreled away somewhere in here...
trans: 那只 moogle，我们所有问题的根源，被藏在这里的某个地方......

Original: Seifer:Keep it together, you losers! And don't get in my way!
Dialogue: Keep it together, you losers! And don't get in my way!
trans: 保持团结，你们这些失败者！

Original: Zell:...Just like he's part of the team, eh?
Dialogue: ...Just like he's part of the team, eh?
trans: ...就像他是团队的一员一样，嗯？

Original: Onion Knight:And after all that protesting about not wanting to hang around with us.
Dialogue: And after all that protesting about not wanting to hang around with us.
trans: 毕竟抗议不想和我们在一起。

Original: Seifer:Don't get me wrong. I'm not about to cozy up with any of you.
Dialogue: Don't get me wrong. I'm not about to cozy up with any of you.
trans: 不要误会我的意思。

Original: Seifer:Did you forget? I said I'm only using you losers.
Dialogue: Did you forget? I said I'm only using you losers.
trans: 你忘了吗？

Original: Seifer:The knight's escort, so to speak. Do your job and be grateful about it.
Dialogue: The knight's escort, so to speak. Do your job and be grateful about it.
trans: 骑士的护送，可以这么说。

Original: Squall:(You're just afraid of being alone...)
Dialogue: (You're just afraid of being alone...)
trans: （你只是害怕一个人...）

Original: Zell:That's just you afraid of being alone, right?
Dialogue: That's just you afraid of being alone, right?
trans: 那只是你害怕孤独，对吧？

Original: Seifer:I think you're confusing me with yourself, chicken-wuss.
Dialogue: I think you're confusing me with yourself, chicken-wuss.
trans: 我觉得你把我和你自己搞混了，胆小鬼。

Original: Seifer:Need me to make it clear to you how easily we can get by with one escort less?
Dialogue: Need me to make it clear to you how easily we can get by with one escort less?
trans: 需要我向你解释清楚我们少一个护卫有多容易吗？

Original: Zell:Oh, ready to settle this, huh!?
Dialogue: Oh, ready to settle this, huh!?
trans: 哦，准备好解决这个问题了吗！？

Original: Onion Knight:I'd say you're more squire than knight if you need an escort, but that's just me.
Dialogue: I'd say you're more squire than knight if you need an escort, but that's just me.
trans: 如果你需要护送，我会说你更像是侍从而不是骑士，但那只是我。

Original: Raijin:Seifer, give it a rest! This ain't the time for squabbling, ya know!
Dialogue: Seifer, give it a rest! This ain't the time for squabbling, ya know!
trans: 塞弗，休息吧！

Original: Seifer:...Hmph. Let's go! Fujin, Raijin!
Dialogue: ...Hmph. Let's go! Fujin, Raijin!
trans: ...Hmph. Let's go! Fujin, Raijin!

Original: Seifer:You, too. You can at least be cannon fodder.
Dialogue: You, too. You can at least be cannon fodder.
trans: 你也是。

Original: Zell:Arrrgh! Will that punk never get off his high horse!?
Dialogue: Arrrgh! Will that punk never get off his high horse!?
trans: 啊！

Original: Onion Knight:It's better than having to keep fighting him.
Dialogue: It's better than having to keep fighting him.
trans: 总比一直和他战斗要好。

Original: Squall:Try not to provoke him so much. It just makes him difficult.
Dialogue: Try not to provoke him so much. It just makes him difficult.
trans: 尽量不要激怒他。

Original: Zell:When did I provoke him?
Dialogue: When did I provoke him?
trans: 我什么时候惹他了？

Original: Squall:(You're that oblivious?)
Dialogue: (You're that oblivious?)
trans: （你就这么健忘？）

Original: ???:Well, well, trying to follow in my footsteps, are you?
Dialogue: Well, well, trying to follow in my footsteps, are you?
trans: 好吧，好吧，想追随我的脚步，是吗？

Original: Yuna:Sir Jecht!
Dialogue: Sir Jecht!
trans: 杰特爵士！

Original: Jecht:You eating right, boy? Ain't fighting to your full potential, I'll bet.
Dialogue: You eating right, boy? Ain't fighting to your full potential, I'll bet.
trans: 你吃对了吗，孩子？

Original: Tidus:...Why're you here?
Dialogue: ...Why're you here?
trans: ……你怎么在这里？

Original: Jecht:Ain't that the million gil question.
Dialogue: Ain't that the million gil question.
trans: 这不是百万吉尔问题吗？

Original: Jecht:Seems I was summoned by some god, but I'm kinda fuzzy on the particulars.
Dialogue: Seems I was summoned by some god, but I'm kinda fuzzy on the particulars.
trans: 好像是被什么神灵召唤了，具体情况我也不太清楚。

Original: Ace:Tidus, this is your father?
Dialogue: Tidus, this is your father?
trans: Tidus，这是你父亲？

Original: Bartz:No kidding? What a lucky break.
Dialogue: No kidding? What a lucky break.
trans: 不开玩笑？

Original: Yang:Heartening indeed. Father of Lord Tidus, let us be on our way.
Dialogue: Heartening indeed. Father of Lord Tidus, let us be on our way.
trans: 确实令人振奋。

Original: Yuna:Sir Jecht... Won't you lend us your aid?
Dialogue: Sir Jecht... Won't you lend us your aid?
trans: Jecht爵士……你愿意帮助我们吗？

Original: Yuna:The world is different, but the danger
Dialogue: The world is different, but the danger—
trans: 世界不同，但危险——

Original: Jecht:Sorry, Yuna. No can do.
Dialogue: Sorry, Yuna. No can do.
trans: 对不起，尤娜。

Original: Yuna:B-but why?
Dialogue: B-but why?
trans: B-但是为什么？

Original: Jecht:I told you. I was summoned here by a god. Spiritus.
Dialogue: I told you. I was summoned here by a god. Spiritus.
trans: 我告诉你了。

Original: Ace:Our enemy then?
Dialogue: Our enemy then?
trans: 那么我们的敌人呢？

Original: Yang:Do not let affiliations stand in the way. If you have the will, then
Dialogue: Do not let affiliations stand in the way. If you have the will, then—
trans: 不要让从属关系成为障碍。

Original: Jecht:That's not the issue. It's that I can't trust a scrawny guardian to watch my back.
Dialogue: That's not the issue. It's that I can't trust a scrawny guardian to watch my back.
trans: 那不是问题。

Original: Tidus:Hey! Just what're you thinking to pull? It's dangerous here!
Dialogue: Hey! Just what're you thinking to pull? It's dangerous here!
trans: 嘿！

Original: Jecht:Exactly! And that's why you should scram!
Dialogue: Exactly! And that's why you should scram!
trans: 确切地！

Original: Jecht:Got it?
Dialogue: Got it?
trans: 知道了？

Original: Bartz:Huh? What's going on?
Dialogue: Huh? What's going on?
trans: 嗯？

Original: Yuna:He plans to do...something...
Dialogue: He plans to do...something...
trans: 他打算做……某事……

Original: Wakka:But man, I never expected Sir Jecht to pop up...
Dialogue: But man, I never expected Sir Jecht to pop up...
trans: 但是伙计，我没想到 Jecht 爵士会突然出现……

Original: Tidus:I don't know why he had to come here. It's just more problems for us.
Dialogue: I don't know why he had to come here. It's just more problems for us.
trans: 我不知道他为什么要来这里。

Original: Penelo:You aren't...happy to see your father?
Dialogue: You aren't...happy to see your father?
trans: 你不……很高兴见到你父亲吗？

Original: Tidus:Oh, sorry...
Dialogue: Oh, sorry...
trans: 哦对不起...

Original: Penelo:No, don't worry. I didn't mean it that way... But I guess you're worried about him fighting.
Dialogue: No, don't worry. I didn't mean it that way... But I guess you're worried about him fighting.
trans: 不，别担心。

Original: Tidus:Nah, not really...I guess.
Dialogue: Nah, not really...I guess.
trans: 不，不是真的......我猜。

Original: Wakka:Yeah! He's a total veteran!
Dialogue: Yeah! He's a total veteran!
trans: 是的！

Original: Cyan:Thy relationship, however, seems rather strained, Sir Tidus.
Dialogue: Thy relationship, however, seems rather strained, Sir Tidus.
trans: 然而，您的关系似乎相当紧张，提达斯爵士。

Original: Tidus:He went missing when I was a kid.
Dialogue: He went missing when I was a kid.
trans: 我小时候他失踪了。

Original: Tidus:But even back then his attitude sucked. Always looking down on people and laughing at them...
Dialogue: But even back then his attitude sucked. Always looking down on people and laughing at them...
trans: 但即使在那时，他的态度也很糟糕。

Original: Cyan:...Hmmm. I suspect thou might be mistaken.
Dialogue: ...Hmmm. I suspect thou might be mistaken.

Original: Sazh:Yeah, same here. When he was giving you a hard time back there, he was just lookin' out for his kid.
Dialogue: Yeah, same here. When he was giving you a hard time back there, he was just lookin' out for his kid.
trans: 是的，这里也一样。

Original: Cyan:I am also a parent... To think if I were to reunite with my son in a place such as this...
Dialogue: I am also a parent... To think if I were to reunite with my son in a place such as this...
trans: 我也是为人父母的……想想如果在这种地方和儿子团聚……

Original: Tidus:Even still, I can't understand what he's thinking...
Dialogue: Even still, I can't understand what he's thinking...
trans: 即便如此，我还是不明白他在想什么……

Original: Sazh:...Yeah. I guess you might not until it's your turn to be a dad.
Dialogue: ...Yeah. I guess you might not until it's your turn to be a dad.

Original: Cyan:But understand this: it is natural for a father to love his family, love his children. Looking into Sir Jecht's eyes, that is the sort of man I saw.
Dialogue: But understand this it is natural for a father to love his family, love his children. Looking into Sir Jecht's eyes, that is the sort of man I saw.
trans: 但要明白这一点，父亲爱他的家人、爱他的孩子是很自然的。

Original: Tidus:Oh, yeah...? He could try saying something like that...
Dialogue: Oh, yeah...? He could try saying something like that...

Original: Yuna:Sir Jecht is kindhearted, so I know he worries about you.
Dialogue: Sir Jecht is kindhearted, so I know he worries about you.
trans: Jecht爵士心地善良，我知道他很担心你。

Original: Wakka:He told you to beat it...but you ain't plannin' to, yeah?
Dialogue: He told you to beat it...but you ain't plannin' to, yeah?
trans: 他叫你打败它......但你不打算，是吗？

Original: Tidus:Yeah. I'm going after him.
Dialogue: Yeah. I'm going after him.
trans: 是的。

Original: Tidus:And I'm going to find out what he's thinking.
Dialogue: And I'm going to find out what he's thinking.
trans: 我要弄清楚他在想什么。

Original: ???:Aha! Found you!
Dialogue: Aha! Found you!
trans: 啊哈！

Original: ???:You're the warriors of light the goddess spoke of, if I'm not mistaken.
Dialogue: You're the warriors of light the goddess spoke of, if I'm not mistaken.
trans: 如果我没记错的话，你们就是女神所说的光之战士。

Original: Sazh:Wh-whoa there! What's this about, and who might you be, missy?
Dialogue: Wh-whoa there! What's this about, and who might you be, missy?
trans: 哇哇！

Original: ???:Whoops, I haven't introduced myself.
Dialogue: Whoops, I haven't introduced myself.
trans: 哎呀，我还没有自我介绍。

Original: Lilisette:Lilisette of the great Troupe Mayakov stands before you! It's a pleasure to make your acquaintance!
Dialogue: Lilisette of the great Troupe Mayakov stands before you! It's a pleasure to make your acquaintance!
trans: 伟大的马雅可夫剧团的莉莉赛特站在你面前！

Original: Shantotto:Of the Troupe Mayakov, you claim? Now there's a rather nostalgic name.
Dialogue: Of the Troupe Mayakov, you claim? Now there's a rather nostalgic name.
trans: 您声称是马雅可夫剧团的？

Original: Hope:You know it?
Dialogue: You know it?
trans: 你知道的？

Original: Shantotto:A troupe of dancers from some decades gone. Their popularity was second to none.
Dialogue: A troupe of dancers from some decades gone. Their popularity was second to none.
trans: 几十年来的一群舞者。

Original: Sazh:Popular decades ago? That mean you're puttin' on a revival?
Dialogue: Popular decades ago? That mean you're puttin' on a revival?
trans: 几十年前流行？

Original: Lilisette:Ahh...that's, um...b-because of the Torsion!
Dialogue: Ahh...that's, um...b-because of the Torsion!
trans: 啊……那是，嗯……因为扭力！

Original: Lilisette:Right! The goddess said they distort space and time!
Dialogue: Right! The goddess said they distort space and time!
trans: 正确的！

Original: Ramza:It would appear further explanation from us is unnecessary.
Dialogue: It would appear further explanation from us is unnecessary.
trans: 看来我们没有必要再做解释了。

Original: Lilisette:Completely. Let me fight alongside you, for the sake of the future!
Dialogue: Completely. Let me fight alongside you, for the sake of the future!
trans: 完全地。

Original: Hope:I think some monsters've sniffed us out.
Dialogue: I think some monsters've sniffed us out.
trans: 我认为一些怪物已经嗅出了我们。

Original: Sazh:Hold that thought, Lilisette! We've got more pressing fish to fry!
Dialogue: Hold that thought, Lilisette! We've got more pressing fish to fry!
trans: 保持这个想法，莉莉赛特！

Original: Lilisette:Perfect! That's what I'm here for!
Dialogue: Perfect! That's what I'm here for!
trans: 完美的！

Original: Tidus:Argh... He never changes...
Dialogue: Argh... He never changes...
trans: 啊……他从不改变……

Original: Lilisette:What's eating him?
Dialogue: What's eating him?
trans: 他在吃什么？

Original: Fujin:FAMILY REUNION.
Dialogue: FAMILY REUNION.
trans: 家庭团聚。

Original: Lilisette:Come again?
Dialogue: Come again?
trans: 再来？

Original: Raijin:We ran into Tidus's pops, ya know? We tried to get him to join us, but he turned us down.
Dialogue: We ran into Tidus's pops, ya know? We tried to get him to join us, but he turned us down.
trans: 我们遇到了 Tidus 的流行音乐，你知道吗？

Original: Fujin:INVECTIVE. QUARRELSOME.
Dialogue: INVECTIVE. QUARRELSOME.
trans: 煽动性的。

Original: Lilisette:I see. Even though they could reunite, it ended in an argument.
Dialogue: I see. Even though they could reunite, it ended in an argument.
trans: 我懂了。

Original: Lilisette:Tidus! I hear you're in the middle of a fight with your father!
Dialogue: Tidus! I hear you're in the middle of a fight with your father!
trans: 提达斯！

Original: Tidus:It's not a fight. Things are just a little tense is all.
Dialogue: It's not a fight. Things are just a little tense is all.
trans: 这不是打架。

Original: Lilisette:Boys can be that way.
Dialogue: Boys can be that way.
trans: 男孩子可以这样。

Original: Lilisette:Why not give it another shot? Things might go better the next time.
Dialogue: Why not give it another shot? Things might go better the next time.
trans: 为什么不再试一次呢？

Original: Tidus:What's the point? He's too pigheaded.
Dialogue: What's the point? He's too pigheaded.
trans: 重点是什么？

Original: Raijin:You'll never get anywhere if you just end it at pigheaded, ya know? You gotta try to understand the other side, ya know?
Dialogue: You'll never get anywhere if you just end it at pigheaded, ya know? You gotta try to understand the other side, ya know?
trans: 如果你只是顽固地结束它，你永远不会有任何进展，你知道吗？

Original: Lilisette:He must have something on his mind, too. Do you have any idea what it might be?
Dialogue: He must have something on his mind, too. Do you have any idea what it might be?
trans: 他一定也有什么心事。

Original: Tidus:Probably something no good that he thinks is a great idea.
Dialogue: Probably something no good that he thinks is a great idea.
trans: 可能是他认为是个好主意的不好的东西。

Original: Lilisette:...I guess you know your father well.
Dialogue: ...I guess you know your father well.
trans: ......我想你很了解你的父亲。

Original: Lilisette:Your future isn't set in stone yet.
Dialogue: Your future isn't set in stone yet.
trans: 你的未来还不是一成不变的。

Original: Lilisette:You look like you've got it together, so I'm sure things will turn out alright.
Dialogue: You look like you've got it together, so I'm sure things will turn out alright.
trans: 你看起来好像一切都好，所以我相信事情会好起来的。

Original: Onion Knight:...I wonder if it's something no good. I can only comment on what I've seen...
Dialogue: ...I wonder if it's something no good. I can only comment on what I've seen...
trans: ……是不是有什么不好的地方。

Original: Onion Knight:And it didn't look like they could see eye to eye, but what I saw was a parent trying to protect his child.
Dialogue: And it didn't look like they could see eye to eye, but what I saw was a parent trying to protect his child.
trans: 看起来他们的看法并不一致，但我看到的是一位父母试图保护他的孩子。

Original: Onion Knight:There probably aren't any parents out there who don't think about their children...
Dialogue: There probably aren't any parents out there who don't think about their children...
trans: 应该没有哪个父母不为自己的孩子着想吧……

Original: Tidus:Alright... Next time we'll talk, even if I have to pin him down.
Dialogue: Alright... Next time we'll talk, even if I have to pin him down.
trans: 好吧...下次我们再说，即使我必须把他钉住。

Original: Lilisette:That's the spirit!
Dialogue: That's the spirit!
trans: 就是那种精神！

Original: Galuf:...Something's not right.
Dialogue: ...Something's not right.
trans: ……不对劲。

Original: Sabin:What's wrong?
Dialogue: What's wrong?
trans: 怎么了？

Original: Galuf:There's an evil will hanging in the air. One that seeks to eliminate everything.
Dialogue: There's an evil will hanging in the air. One that seeks to eliminate everything.
trans: 空气中弥漫着邪恶的意志。

Original: Galuf:...And I have a strong feeling I know who it is.
Dialogue: ...And I have a strong feeling I know who it is.
trans: ......我有一种强烈的感觉，我知道它是谁。

Original: ???:Mwa-hahaha...! Quite perceptive of you, Galuf!
Dialogue: Mwa-hahaha...! Quite perceptive of you, Galuf!
trans: 哇哈哈哈……！

Original: Galuf:I knew it... I'd prepared myself for when you'd show up.
Dialogue: I knew it... I'd prepared myself for when you'd show up.
trans: 我就知道……我已经做好了你出现的准备。

Original: Sabin:An acquaintance?
Dialogue: An acquaintance?
trans: 熟人？

Original: Galuf:The dark warlock Exdeath. Our archenemy.
Dialogue: The dark warlock Exdeath. Our archenemy.
trans: 黑暗术士Exdeath。

Original: Sabin:Meaning he's our enemy, too.
Dialogue: Meaning he's our enemy, too.
trans: 这意味着他也是我们的敌人。

Original: Bartz:Don't tell me Spiritus sent you after Mog, too!
Dialogue: Don't tell me Spiritus sent you after Mog, too!
trans: 别告诉我 Spiritus 也派你去追 Mog！

Original: Exdeath:Mwa-hahaha... Do not worry. I will not stand in your way.
Dialogue: Mwa-hahaha... Do not worry. I will not stand in your way.
trans: Mwa-hahaha...别担心。

Original: Galuf:We won't make the same mistake again.
Dialogue: We won't make the same mistake again.
trans: 我们不会再犯同样的错误。

Original: Exdeath:...There is some time yet before the power manifests itself.
Dialogue: ...There is some time yet before the power manifests itself.
trans: ......距离力量显现还有一段时间。

Original: Exdeath:When it does, allow me to expunge every trace of you.
Dialogue: When it does, allow me to expunge every trace of you.
trans: 当它发生时，请允许我抹去你的所有痕迹。

Original: Edge:Whoa, whoa, I don't like the sound of this Void.
Dialogue: Whoa, whoa, I don't like the sound of this Void.
trans: 哇哇，我不喜欢这个 Void 的声音。

Original: Eiko:He's really ticking me off! Can I kill him?
Dialogue: He's really ticking me off! Can I kill him?
trans: 他真的是在挑剔我！

Original: Galuf:Yes. We mustn't let that power fall into his hands!
Dialogue: Yes. We mustn't let that power fall into his hands!
trans: 是的。

Original: Bartz:Yeah! Let's end this here and now!
Dialogue: Yeah! Let's end this here and now!
trans: 是的！

Original: Bartz:Argh! Where'd he go!?
Dialogue: Argh! Where'd he go!?
trans: 啊！

Original: Exdeath:Mwa-hahaha...! Mwaaa-hahahaha!
Dialogue: Mwa-hahaha...! Mwaaa-hahahaha!
trans: 哇哈哈哈……！

Original: Eiko:Oooh! What a coward! Come out and fight!
Dialogue: Oooh! What a coward! Come out and fight!
trans: 哦！

Original: Galuf:No good... What a troubling development this is...
Dialogue: No good... What a troubling development this is...
trans: 不好……这是多么令人不安的发展……

Original: Shantotto:...Hold your horses.
Dialogue: ...Hold your horses.
trans: ...稍安毋躁。

Original: Shantotto:Do you not notice these unsettling forces?
Dialogue: Do you not notice these unsettling forces?
trans: 你没有注意到这些令人不安的力量吗？

Original: Yda:...Something is a bit tingly.
Dialogue: ...Something is a bit tingly.
trans: ……有些刺痛。

Original: Vanille:Could it be a barrier...?
Dialogue: Could it be a barrier...?
trans: 会不会是障碍……？

Original: Shantotto:Right you are, my dear.
Dialogue: Right you are, my dear.
trans: 你是对的，亲爱的。

Original: Shantotto:Ahead of us barriers of power and magic lie.
Dialogue: Ahead of us barriers of power and magic lie.
trans: 摆在我们面前的是力量和魔法的障碍。

Original: Ramza:How do we make our way through them?
Dialogue: How do we make our way through them?
trans: 我们如何通过它们？

Original: Shantotto:Don't bother with magic inside a barrier of power. It's a waste to try.
Dialogue: Don't bother with magic inside a barrier of power. It's a waste to try.
trans: 不要在力量屏障内使用魔法。

Original: Vivi:Then I guess that means physical attacks won't do much in a barrier of magic, huh?
Dialogue: Then I guess that means physical attacks won't do much in a barrier of magic, huh?
trans: 那么我想这意味着物理攻击在魔法屏障中起不了多大作用，是吧？

Original: Bartz:And I'll bet they explode if we don't clear them simultaneously...
Dialogue: And I'll bet they explode if we don't clear them simultaneously...
trans: 如果我们不同时清除它们，我敢打赌它们会爆炸……

Original: Shantotto:Ooh, you know how to entertain a lady.
Dialogue: Ooh, you know how to entertain a lady.
trans: 哦，你知道如何招待女士。

Original: Ramza:You've encountered a similar gimmick.
Dialogue: You've encountered a similar gimmick.
trans: 你遇到过类似的噱头。

Original: Tifa:In that case, we'd better put our heads together to figure out who to send in to fight.
Dialogue: In that case, we'd better put our heads together to figure out who to send in to fight.
trans: 那样的话，还是大家一起商量一下，派谁去打吧。

Original: Vanille:Right! This is a chance to let everyone's specialties shine!
Dialogue: Right! This is a chance to let everyone's specialties shine!
trans: 正确的！

Original: Vanille:You can leave the barriers of magic to us!
Dialogue: You can leave the barriers of magic to us!
trans: 你可以把魔法结界交给我们！

Original: Yda:Keen! Then we'll rough up the barriers of power!
Dialogue: Keen! Then we'll rough up the barriers of power!
trans: 敏锐的！

Original: Vivi:Miss Yda, you're so cool!
Dialogue: Miss Yda, you're so cool!
trans: Yda 小姐，你太酷了！

Original: Yda:Haha! You can count on me!
Dialogue: Haha! You can count on me!
trans: 哈哈！

Original: Squall:This is a barrier of power, right? We'll handle this.
Dialogue: This is a barrier of power, right? We'll handle this.
trans: 这是力量壁垒吧？

Original: Zell:Yeah! Give me something to pound!
Dialogue: Yeah! Give me something to pound!
trans: 是的！

Original: Shantotto:Oh ho ho ho! You'd better not let us down!
Dialogue: Oh ho ho ho! You'd better not let us down!
trans: 哦呵呵呵！

Original: Sazh:We're inside a barrier of magic! Physical attacks won't cut it in here!
Dialogue: We're inside a barrier of magic! Physical attacks won't cut it in here!
trans: 我们在魔法屏障内！

Original: Eiko:Leave it to us! We'll clean up in no time!
Dialogue: Leave it to us! We'll clean up in no time!
trans: 交给我们吧！

Original: Jecht:You caught up, did ya?
Dialogue: You caught up, did ya?
trans: 你赶上了，是吗？

Original: Yuna:Sir Jecht!
Dialogue: Sir Jecht!
trans: 杰特爵士！

Original: Jecht:I'm not trying to give you a hard time. Turn around and just leave this to me.
Dialogue: I'm not trying to give you a hard time. Turn around and just leave this to me.
trans: 我不是想为难你。

Original: Wakka:Preciate your concern.
Dialogue: Preciate your concern.
trans: 感谢您的关心。

Original: Wakka:But there's no turning back for us now, yeah?
Dialogue: But there's no turning back for us now, yeah?
trans: 但是现在我们已经没有回头路了，是吗？

Original: Hope:We have things we want to know, so we keep moving forward. We won't be leaving.
Dialogue: We have things we want to know, so we keep moving forward. We won't be leaving.
trans: 我们有我们想知道的事情，所以我们继续前进。

Original: Jecht:Geez, you kids are stubborn... Birds of a feather, huh?
Dialogue: Geez, you kids are stubborn... Birds of a feather, huh?
trans: 哎呀，你们这些孩子太固执了……物是人非，是吧？

Original: Tidus:Which of us is the stubborn one?
Dialogue: Which of us is the stubborn one?
trans: 我们谁是顽固的？

Original: Tidus:What do you plan to do by yourself?
Dialogue: What do you plan to do by yourself?
trans: 你打算自己做什么？

Original: Cloud:You look like a capable warrior, but even you must be having a rough go of it by now.
Dialogue: You look like a capable warrior, but even you must be having a rough go of it by now.
trans: 你看起来像个能干的战士，但现在连你也一定过得很艰难。

Original: Hope:You're Tidus's dad. We're worried about you, too.
Dialogue: You're Tidus's dad. We're worried about you, too.
trans: 你是提达斯的爸爸。

Original: Jecht:Well how about that? You made yourself some real good friends here.
Dialogue: Well how about that? You made yourself some real good friends here.
trans: 那怎么样？

Original: Hope:Don't try to change the subject!
Dialogue: Don't try to change the subject!
trans: 不要试图改变话题！

Original: Tidus:They're more than just friends. I trust them with my life.
Dialogue: They're more than just friends. I trust them with my life.
trans: 他们不仅仅是朋友。

Original: Tidus:And they trust me, too. You don't need to worry about me.
Dialogue: And they trust me, too. You don't need to worry about me.
trans: 他们也信任我。

Original: Jecht:Heh, ain't that special. Alright, do what you want. I'll be going now.
Dialogue: Heh, ain't that special. Alright, do what you want. I'll be going now.
trans: 呵呵，是不是很特别。

Original: Yuna:Ah! W-wait!
Dialogue: Ah! W-wait!
trans: 啊!

Original: Tidus:It's fine. We'll see him again.
Dialogue: It's fine. We'll see him again.
trans: 没关系。

Original: Jecht:...Whew. Now to do things my way.
Dialogue: ...Whew. Now to do things my way.

Original: Wakka:Sir Jecht!
Dialogue: Sir Jecht!
trans: 杰特爵士！

Original: Jecht:What? Just you? Woulda preferred it was Yuna, to be honest.
Dialogue: What? Just you? Woulda preferred it was Yuna, to be honest.
trans: 什么？

Original: Wakka:Please! Come with us!
Dialogue: Please! Come with us!
trans: 请！

Original: Jecht:Sorry, kid. I can't join your party. Not with him in it.
Dialogue: Sorry, kid. I can't join your party. Not with him in it.
trans: 对不起，孩子。

Original: Wakka:F-fine... How about this then?
Dialogue: F-fine... How about this then?
trans: F-好吧……那这个怎么样？

Original: Wakka:I wanna become stronger! Please, coach me!
Dialogue: I wanna become stronger! Please, coach me!
trans: 我要变强！

Original: Jecht:You don't need my coaching. You're a perfectly respectable guardian.
Dialogue: You don't need my coaching. You're a perfectly respectable guardian.
trans: 你不需要我的指导。

Original: Wakka:...Sir. Sir Jecht, sir... Are you or are you not Tidus's dad?
Dialogue: ...Sir. Sir Jecht, sir... Are you or are you not Tidus's dad?

Original: Wakka:Mine died before I had a chance to remember him... I envy Tidus, to tell the truth.
Dialogue: Mine died before I had a chance to remember him... I envy Tidus, to tell the truth.
trans: 在我有机会记住他之前，我的就死了……说实话，我很羡慕 Tidus。

Original: Wakka:So why won't you be there for him? What's the issue for you two?
Dialogue: So why won't you be there for him? What's the issue for you two?
trans: 那你为什么不在他身边呢？

Original: Jecht:Issue, huh...? Is that it?
Dialogue: Issue, huh...? Is that it?

Original: Jecht:That I'm a selfish bastard ain't good enough for you?
Dialogue: That I'm a selfish bastard ain't good enough for you?
trans: 说我是个自私的混蛋对你来说还不够好吗？

Original: Jecht:Do me a favor. Tell him I'll see him around.
Dialogue: Do me a favor. Tell him I'll see him around.
trans: 帮我个忙。

Original: Wakka:I can believe you mean that, right!
Dialogue: I can believe you mean that, right!
trans: 我相信你是这个意思，对吧！

Original: Shantotto:Oh ho ho ho! Some barriers, no?
Dialogue: Oh ho ho ho! Some barriers, no?
trans: 哦呵呵呵！

Original: Steiner:We did it! And now we can fight as a single unit again!
Dialogue: We did it! And now we can fight as a single unit again!
trans: 我们做到了！

Original: Zidane:But... What was the point of Exdeath putting us through that?
Dialogue: But... What was the point of Exdeath putting us through that?
trans: 但是... Exdeath 让我们渡过难关的意义何在？

Original: Galuf:He wouldn't do it for no reason. I'm sure he had something in mind.
Dialogue: He wouldn't do it for no reason. I'm sure he had something in mind.
trans: 他不会无缘无故的这么做。

Original: Faris:The deep take me if we were aiding his schemes without our realizing it.
Dialogue: The deep take me if we were aiding his schemes without our realizing it.
trans: 如果我们在没有意识到的情况下帮助他的计划，那么深渊就会带走我。

Original: Steiner:Grr... How evil!
Dialogue: Grr... How evil!
trans: 呃……好邪恶！

Original: Galuf:Ho ho! Hit the nail on the head, you did.
Dialogue: Ho ho! Hit the nail on the head, you did.
trans: 呵呵！

Original: Galuf:Evil spirits concentrated in a single tree and given formthat's Exdeath.
Dialogue: Evil spirits concentrated in a single tree and given form—that's Exdeath.
trans: 恶灵集中在一棵树上并赋予其形态——这就是艾克斯迪斯。

Original: Shantotto:What a fascinating origin. It takes all kinds to make the world go round.
Dialogue: What a fascinating origin. It takes all kinds to make the world go round.
trans: 多么迷人的起源。

Original: Shantotto:I would love to hear a primary account. ...How does that sound?
Dialogue: I would love to hear a primary account. ...How does that sound?
trans: 我很想听听主要帐户。

Original: Zidane:That was a close one!
Dialogue: That was a close one!
trans: 这很接近！

Original: Shantotto:Oh ho ho ho! I hope your thanks have just begun!
Dialogue: Oh ho ho ho! I hope your thanks have just begun!
trans: 哦呵呵呵！

Original: Steiner:Humbly do I acknowledge how very much I am in your debt...!
Dialogue: Humbly do I acknowledge how very much I am in your debt...!
trans: 我谦卑地承认我欠你多少债……！

Original: Zidane:Not now, Steiner! Draw your weapon!
Dialogue: Not now, Steiner! Draw your weapon!
trans: 现在不行，施泰纳！

Original: Exdeath:Mwa-haha... I had thought crossing those barriers would have made you stronger...
Dialogue: Mwa-haha... I had thought crossing those barriers would have made you stronger...
trans: Mwa-haha...我以为跨越那些障碍会让你变得更强大...

Original: Exdeath:Pathetic vermin.
Dialogue: Pathetic vermin.
trans: 可悲的害虫。

Original: Galuf:...Think what you want.
Dialogue: ...Think what you want.
trans: ...想想你想要什么。

Original: Galuf:I don't care how much you belittle us or stand in our way.
Dialogue: I don't care how much you belittle us or stand in our way.
trans: 我不在乎你如何贬低我们或阻碍我们。

Original: Galuf:Just know that I will defeat you!
Dialogue: Just know that I will defeat you!
trans: 只知道我会打败你！

Original: Galuf:I'll preserve a future for everyone here! Even if it consumes the very last of my energies...that is my role!
Dialogue: I'll preserve a future for everyone here! Even if it consumes the very last of my energies...that is my role!
trans: 我会为这里的每个人保留一个未来！

Original: Bartz:Galuf! You got it wrong... Don't try to take it all on yourself.
Dialogue: Galuf! You got it wrong... Don't try to take it all on yourself.
trans: 嘎鲁夫！

Original: Faris:Aye... "We'll" preserve the future!
Dialogue: Aye... "We'll" preserve the future!
trans: 是的……“我们将”保护未来！

Original: Zidane:Amen. That future is yours, too, Galuf.
Dialogue: Amen. That future is yours, too, Galuf.
trans: 阿门。

Original: Shantotto:Precisely. You won't see this one leaving to younger generations all the fun.
Dialogue: Precisely. You won't see this one leaving to younger generations all the fun.
trans: 恰恰。

Original: Exdeath:Hah... Yes... Let your powers surge...
Dialogue: Hah... Yes... Let your powers surge...
trans: 哈……是的……让你的力量暴涨……

Original: Exdeath:It hastens the coming of the power of the Void...
Dialogue: It hastens the coming of the power of the Void...
trans: 它加速了虚空之力的降临……

Original: Bartz:I'm gonna protect everyone's futures, too. And I won't leave a single world out. Everyone's going home in one piece!
Dialogue: I'm gonna protect everyone's futures, too. And I won't leave a single world out. Everyone's going home in one piece!
trans: 我也要保护大家的未来。

Original: Faris:Hear, hear! Time to finish this!
Dialogue: Hear, hear! Time to finish this!
trans: 听，听！

Original: Galuf:Such comrades are my pride and joy... Ready yourself, Exdeath! Here we come!
Dialogue: Such comrades are my pride and joy... Ready yourself, Exdeath! Here we come!
trans: 这样的同志是我的骄傲和喜悦……准备好，Exdeath！

Original: Exdeath:Fools... Mwa-haha! Hell awaits you!
Dialogue: Fools... Mwa-haha! Hell awaits you!
trans: 傻瓜……哇哈哈！

Original: Y'shtola:...It would seem we have prevailed.
Dialogue: ...It would seem we have prevailed.
trans: ......看来我们已经占了上风。

Original: Y'shtola:Nevertheless, the might of this Exdeath is fearsome...
Dialogue: Nevertheless, the might of this Exdeath is fearsome...
trans: 尽管如此，这个绝杀的威力还是很可怕的……

Original: Exdeath:What navet. Is victory over a mere puppet really that sweet?
Dialogue: What naïveté. Is victory over a mere puppet really that sweet?
trans: 多么天真。

Original: Tidus:But it wasn't all shiny like the other manikins!
Dialogue: But it wasn't all shiny like the other manikins!
trans: 但它并不像其他人体模型那样闪闪发光！

Original: Exdeath:Mwa-haha! Do not mistake my works for those shoddy simulacra.
Dialogue: Mwa-haha! Do not mistake my works for those shoddy simulacra.
trans: 哇哈哈！

Original: Exdeath:There is no comparing what the Torsions can make and my superior sorcery!
Dialogue: There is no comparing what the Torsions can make and my superior sorcery!
trans: 没有什么可以比较 Torsions 可以制造的东西和我的高级魔法！

Original: Layle:This isn't looking good for us.
Dialogue: This isn't looking good for us.
trans: 这对我们来说不太好。

Original: Exdeath:Prostrate yourselves before my power and spend the rest of eternity wandering the Dimensions' Labyrinth!
Dialogue: Prostrate yourselves before my power and spend the rest of eternity wandering the Dimensions' Labyrinth!
trans: 拜倒在我的力量之前，度过永恒的余生，在次元迷宫中徘徊！

Original: Tidus:Oh yeah? Make us!
Dialogue: Oh yeah? Make us!
trans: 哦耶？

Original: Layle:I think that's his plan. What's ours?
Dialogue: I think that's his plan. What's ours?
trans: 我认为这是他的计划。

Original: Bartz:We don't need a plan... We just need to stop him! If we don't, all our worlds are
Dialogue: We don't need a plan... We just need to stop him! If we don't, all our worlds are—
trans: 我们不需要计划……我们只需要阻止他！

Original: Exdeath:What!?
Dialogue: What!?
trans: 什么！？

Original: Jecht:What're you standing around gawking for! Regroup already!
Dialogue: What're you standing around gawking for! Regroup already!
trans: 你站在那里发呆干什么！

Original: Exdeath:Fool... You mean to betray Spiritus?
Dialogue: Fool... You mean to betray Spiritus?
trans: 笨蛋……你是要背叛斯皮里图斯？

Original: Jecht:Hah! That god's business is his own, and mine is mine! I do what I want!
Dialogue: Hah! That god's business is his own, and mine is mine! I do what I want!
trans: 哈！

Original: Bartz:Nice timing! Now's our chance to beat him!
Dialogue: Nice timing! Now's our chance to beat him!
trans: 时机不错！

Original: Jecht:You kids get a move on!
Dialogue: You kids get a move on!
trans: 孩子们继续前进！

Original: Tidus:What!? You gotta be kidding me!
Dialogue: What!? You gotta be kidding me!
trans: 什么！？

Original: Bartz:Yeah! If we don't stop him now
Dialogue: Yeah! If we don't stop him now—
trans: 是的！

Original: Jecht:That's. What. I'm. Doing! Now get your rears in gear!
Dialogue: That's. What. I'm. Doing! Now get your rears in gear!
trans: 那是。

Original: Y'shtola:...Very well.
Dialogue: ...Very well.

Original: Y'shtola:The more power we let slip into Exdeath's hands, the greater danger your world is in.
Dialogue: The more power we let slip into Exdeath's hands, the greater danger your world is in.
trans: 我们让越多的力量落入 Exdeath 手中，你们的世界就越危险。

Original: Layle:You want to keep upping the ante?
Dialogue: You want to keep upping the ante?
trans: 你想继续提高赌注吗？

Original: Tidus:Stuff it! I'm staying!
Dialogue: Stuff it! I'm staying!
trans: 塞满它！

Original: Exdeath:Another fool rushes to his death!
Dialogue: Another fool rushes to his death!
trans: 又一个傻子冲上去送死！

Original: Tidus:I'm not a weak little kid anymore! Let me help!
Dialogue: I'm not a weak little kid anymore! Let me help!
trans: 我不再是弱小的孩子了！

Original: Jecht:You never listen...
Dialogue: You never listen...
trans: 你从来不听...

Original: Jecht:Hey! You back there! Can you take care of this brat for me!
Dialogue: Hey! You back there! Can you take care of this brat for me!
trans: 嘿！

Original: Layle:Talk about parenting with two left feet... Ugh, yeah, I got him!
Dialogue: Talk about parenting with two left feet... Ugh, yeah, I got him!
trans: 谈论用两只左脚为人父母......呃，是的，我明白了他！

Original: Tidus:Wh-whoa! Layle! Put me down!
Dialogue: Wh-whoa! Layle! Put me down!
trans: 哇哇！

Original: Tidus:You... You suck, Dad!
Dialogue: You... You suck, Dad!
trans: 你……你很烂，爸爸！

Original: Tidus:Why...why did he rescue us?
Dialogue: Why...why did he rescue us?
trans: 为什么……他为什么要救我们？

Original: Tidus:I could've held my own...
Dialogue: I could've held my own...
trans: 我本可以拥有自己的...

Original: Serah:Don't you think he didn't want you to have to?
Dialogue: Don't you think he didn't want you to have to?
trans: 你不认为他不想让你不得不这样做吗？

Original: Tidus:...As if now's the time for that.
Dialogue: ...As if now's the time for that.
trans: ……好像现在是时候了。

Original: Balthier:Exactly. Now's not the time. We need to keep moving so his sacrifice doesn't go to waste.
Dialogue: Exactly. Now's not the time. We need to keep moving so his sacrifice doesn't go to waste.
trans: 确切地。

Original: Shadow:Don't kill him yet.
Dialogue: Don't kill him yet.
trans: 还不杀他。

Original: Balthier:Just a figure of speech.
Dialogue: Just a figure of speech.
trans: 只是一个比喻。

Original: Irvine:This isn't the time for second thoughts, you know. We're already on this road, so let's hoof it.
Dialogue: This isn't the time for second thoughts, you know. We're already on this road, so let's hoof it.
trans: 你知道，现在不是三思而后行的时候。

Original: Vivi:Mr. Jecht is really strong, right?
Dialogue: Mr. Jecht is really strong, right?
trans: Jecht先生真的很厉害吧？

Original: Tidus:...Yeah. He can take a licking.
Dialogue: ...Yeah. He can take a licking.
