Original: Vivi:Then don't worry. He's counting on us.
Dialogue: Then don't worry. He's counting on us.
trans: 那么不用担心。

Original: Vivi:I wanna show him what we can do.
Dialogue: I wanna show him what we can do.
trans: 我想告诉他我们能做什么。

Original: Serah:There's probably a way to help him without being right there next to him, too.
Dialogue: There's probably a way to help him without being right there next to him, too.
trans: 可能有一种方法可以帮助他，而无需也在他身边。

Original: Tidus:...You think? ...I guess you're right.
Dialogue: ...You think? ...I guess you're right.
trans: ...您认为？

Original: Tidus:Yeah, let's do this. Thanks, guys.
Dialogue: Yeah, let's do this. Thanks, guys.
trans: 是的，让我们这样做。

Original: Balthier:A child never stops being a child to its parent.
Dialogue: A child never stops being a child to its parent.
trans: 孩子永远不会停止成为其父母的孩子。

Original: Chelinka:There isn't a world where you and I aren't together.
Dialogue: There isn't a world where you and I aren't together.
trans: 世界上没有你我不在一起的地方。

Original: Steiner:Oh! What's this!?
Dialogue: Oh! What's this!?
trans: 哦！

Original: Steiner:I have found two lost children! Everyone, assemble!
Dialogue: I have found two lost children! Everyone, assemble!
trans: 我找到了两个走失的孩子！

Original: Vaan:What's up? Found something interesting?
Dialogue: What's up? Found something interesting?
trans: 这是怎么回事？

Original: Sabin:Hold on, what are kids doing lost in a place like this?
Dialogue: Hold on, what are kids doing lost in a place like this?
trans: 等一下，孩子们迷路在这种地方做什么？

Original: Chelinka:Thank goodness, we aren't the only ones here.
Dialogue: Thank goodness, we aren't the only ones here.
trans: 谢天谢地，我们不是这里唯一的人。

Original: Yuri:You must be from one of the many worlds, too.
Dialogue: You must be from one of the many worlds, too.
trans: 你一定也来自众多世界之一。

Original: Penelo:Many worlds? What's that?
Dialogue: Many worlds? What's that?
trans: 许多世界？

Original: Vaan:If he means a different world, then he's not wrong.
Dialogue: If he means a different world, then he's not wrong.
trans: 如果他指的是一个不同的世界，那么他没有错。

Original: Chelinka:How do you do? I'm Chelinka, and this is my younger twin brother, Yuri.
Dialogue: How do you do? I'm Chelinka, and this is my younger twin brother, Yuri.
trans: 你好吗？

Original: Sabin:You're awful calm given the circumstances.
Dialogue: You're awful calm given the circumstances.
trans: 鉴于这种情况，你非常冷静。

Original: Penelo:Did the goddess already tell you what's going on?
Dialogue: Did the goddess already tell you what's going on?
trans: 女神已经告诉你是怎么回事了吗？

Original: Yuri:Goddess? Is there one in this world?
Dialogue: Goddess? Is there one in this world?
trans: 女神？

Original: Yuri:We haven't met anyone. We just noticed that we ended up in this world.
Dialogue: We haven't met anyone. We just noticed that we ended up in this world.
trans: 我们没有遇到任何人。

Original: Chelinka:We know this isn't the only world; that there are as many worlds as there are memories...
Dialogue: We know this isn't the only world; that there are as many worlds as there are memories...
trans: 我们知道这不是唯一的世界；

Original: Yuri:So I guess we aren't all that surprised.
Dialogue: So I guess we aren't all that surprised.
trans: 所以我想我们并不那么惊讶。

Original: Steiner:...So, what you mean to say is...?
Dialogue: ...So, what you mean to say is...?
trans: ……所以，你的意思是……？

Original: Sabin:Gah-ha-ha-ha! Beats me!
Dialogue: Gah-ha-ha-ha! Beats me!
trans: 嘎哈哈哈哈！

Original: Yuri:Well, we're gonna look for the road back home.
Dialogue: Well, we're gonna look for the road back home.
trans: 好吧，我们要寻找回家的路。

Original: Chelinka:You guys be careful. The monsters around here are tough.
Dialogue: You guys be careful. The monsters around here are tough.
trans: 你们小心点。

Original: Vaan:Huh? Wait a sec!
Dialogue: Huh? Wait a sec!
trans: 嗯？

Original: Penelo:They want us to watch out for monsters? I hope they'll be alright...
Dialogue: They want us to watch out for monsters? I hope they'll be alright...
trans: 他们要我们提防怪物？

Original: Vivi:Gosh... Do you think those twins we met earlier are okay?
Dialogue: Gosh... Do you think those twins we met earlier are okay?
trans: 天哪……你觉得我们之前遇到的那对双胞胎还好吗？

Original: Layle:They said they were looking for the "road back home."
Dialogue: They said they were looking for the "road back home."
trans: 他们说他们正在寻找“回家的路”。

Original: Layle:It'd be a lucky break for us if there is one.
Dialogue: It'd be a lucky break for us if there is one.
trans: 如果有的话，这对我们来说是一个幸运的假期。

Original: Ace:Do you want to go help them? If so, we should hurry. They couldn't have gotten far on
Dialogue: Do you want to go help them? If so, we should hurry. They couldn't have gotten far on—
trans: 你想去帮助他们吗？

Original: Vivi:Wow! That was amazing!
Dialogue: Wow! That was amazing!
trans: 哇！

Original: Yuri:Huh? Are you the group we met...?
Dialogue: Huh? Are you the group we met...?
trans: 嗯？

Original: Layle:Wait, wait, wait. That attack just now... Did you use crystal power to do that?
Dialogue: Wait, wait, wait. That attack just now... Did you use crystal power to do that?
trans: 等等，等等，等等。

Original: Vivi:You can tell, Mr. Layle?
Dialogue: You can tell, Mr. Layle?
trans: 你能看出来吗，莱尔先生？

Original: Layle:You could say I know a thing or two about crystals. And give the "mister" a rest, would ya?
Dialogue: You could say I know a thing or two about crystals. And give the "mister" a rest, would ya?
trans: 你可以说我对水晶略知一二。

Original: Yuri:Well... Chelinka draws out the power of the crystals...
Dialogue: Well... Chelinka draws out the power of the crystals...
trans: 唔……契琳卡引出水晶之力……

Original: Chelinka:And Yuri guides the flow of the power to perform his attacks.
Dialogue: And Yuri guides the flow of the power to perform his attacks.
trans: 尤里引导力量的流动来执行他的攻击。

Original: Ace:Really... So the two of you are able to act as one to fight back?
Dialogue: Really... So the two of you are able to act as one to fight back?
trans: 真的……所以你们两个可以联手反击？

Original: Yuri:That's how we've gotten by till now at least.
Dialogue: That's how we've gotten by till now at least.
trans: 至少到目前为止，我们就是这样度过的。

Original: Layle:...So how's it going? Find anything that looks like a road home?
Dialogue: ...So how's it going? Find anything that looks like a road home?
trans: ...最近怎么样？

Original: Chelinka:Not yet...
Dialogue: Not yet...
trans: 还没有...

Original: Ace:We didn't think so.
Dialogue: We didn't think so.
trans: 我们不这么认为。

Original: Layle:We've all been stuck here a while with no clue as to how to get back.
Dialogue: We've all been stuck here a while with no clue as to how to get back.
trans: 我们都被困在这里一段时间了，不知道如何回去。

Original: Ace:But there may be a clue within this labyrinth.
Dialogue: But there may be a clue within this labyrinth.
trans: 但在这个迷宫中可能有线索。

Original: Layle:C'mon, Yuri, Chelinka. Throw it in with us, hey? For some reason, it doesn't feel like we're completely strangers either.
Dialogue: C'mon, Yuri, Chelinka. Throw it in with us, hey? For some reason, it doesn't feel like we're completely strangers either.
trans: 来吧，尤里，切林卡。

Original: Yuri:...They don't seem like bad people. Why don't we?
Dialogue: ...They don't seem like bad people. Why don't we?
trans: ……他们看起来不像是坏人。

Original: Chelinka:I'm with you.
Dialogue: I'm with you.
trans: 我和你在一起。

Original: Vivi:Hooray! We made new friends!
Dialogue: Hooray! We made new friends!
trans: 万岁！

Original: Yuri:Whoa, Chelinka? Did you hear that? We're friends already!
Dialogue: Whoa, Chelinka? Did you hear that? We're friends already!
trans: 哇，切林卡？

Original: Chelinka:Haha, yup.
Dialogue: Haha, yup.
trans: 哈哈，是的。

Original: Chelinka:I can't fight in battle, but I hope you'll have me just the same. Go on, Yuri, your turn...
Dialogue: I can't fight in battle, but I hope you'll have me just the same. Go on, Yuri, your turn...
trans: 我不能在战场上战斗，但我希望你能像我一样拥有我。

Original: Vivi:There's a bunch of us over there still. C'mon!
Dialogue: There's a bunch of us over there still. C'mon!
trans: 那边还有我们一群人。

Original: Yuri:Ch-Chelinka! This is great! There's a whole bunch of them! You think they'll all be our friends?
Dialogue: Ch-Chelinka! This is great! There's a whole bunch of them! You think they'll all be our friends?
trans: Ch-Chelinka！

Original: Chelinka:Ohhh, Yuri, settle down already! You've always been like this!
Dialogue: Ohhh, Yuri, settle down already! You've always been like this!
trans: 哦，尤里，已经安定下来了！

Original: Layle:Ah, well. I thought they were oddly insightful, but kids'll be kids.
Dialogue: Ah, well. I thought they were oddly insightful, but kids'll be kids.
trans: 呃，好吧。

Original: King:Hm?
Dialogue: Hm?
trans: 嗯？

Original: Tidus:Dad!!
Dialogue: Dad!!
trans: 爸爸！！

Original: Tidus:What's wrong!? What happened to Exdeath!?
Dialogue: What's wrong!? What happened to Exdeath!?
trans: 怎么了！？

Original: Jecht:Heh, that bozo was no big deal... Except...
Dialogue: Heh, that bozo was no big deal... Except...
trans: 呵呵，那个笨蛋没什么大不了的……除了……

Original: Jecht:I ain't feelin' so good suddenly... Inside my head's...all mixed up...
Dialogue: I ain't feelin' so good suddenly... Inside my head's...all mixed up...
trans: 我突然感觉不太好……在我的脑袋里……全乱了……

Original: Ace:Could it be memory loss from being in this labyrinth?
Dialogue: Could it be memory loss from being in this labyrinth?
trans: 会不会是在迷宫里失忆了？

Original: Jecht:After battlin' Exdeath...there's somethin' inside me...that ain't me...
Dialogue: After battlin' Exdeath...there's somethin' inside me...that ain't me...
trans: 在与 Exdeath 战斗之后......我内心有一些东西......那不是我......

Original: Tidus:Not you...? You don't mean...?
Dialogue: Not you...? You don't mean...?
trans: 不是你...？

Original: King:Hey, what's going on?
Dialogue: Hey, what's going on?
trans: 嘿，怎么了？

Original: Yuna:No... I...didn't know...
Dialogue: No... I...didn't know...
trans: 不……我……不知道……

Original: King:Is he possessed or something?
Dialogue: Is he possessed or something?
trans: 他是着了魔还是怎么的？

Original: Tidus:...He must've remembered.
Dialogue: ...He must've remembered.
trans: ……他一定记得。

Original: Ace:Did the fight with Exdeath trigger it?
Dialogue: Did the fight with Exdeath trigger it?
trans: 与艾克斯迪斯的战斗触发了吗？

Original: Tidus:Probably. And now it's out of control.
Dialogue: Probably. And now it's out of control.
trans: 大概。

Original: Yuna:No... This can't be happening...
Dialogue: No... This can't be happening...
trans: 不……这不可能发生……

Original: Tidus:...Dad's in pain.
Dialogue: ...Dad's in pain.
trans: ……爸爸很痛苦。

Original: Tidus:This is what he hates the most.
Dialogue: This is what he hates the most.
trans: 这是他最痛恨的。

Original: Tidus:You won't tell me what you're thinking...
Dialogue: You won't tell me what you're thinking...
trans: 你不会告诉我你在想什么...

Original: Tidus:But I think I know.
Dialogue: But I think I know.
trans: 但我想我知道。

Original: Tidus:You came here because you don't want to cause problems for everyone else, right?
Dialogue: You came here because you don't want to cause problems for everyone else, right?
trans: 你来这里是因为你不想给其他人带来麻烦，对吧？

Original: Tidus:...You're depending on me.
Dialogue: ...You're depending on me.

Original: Tidus:Argh! You've already suffered enough...
Dialogue: Argh! You've already suffered enough...
trans: 啊！

Original: Tidus:Why do you have to suffer here, too...?
Dialogue: Why do you have to suffer here, too...?
trans: 为什么你也要在这里受苦……？

Original: Tidus:Enough with gods and saving the world! You come first!
Dialogue: Enough with gods and saving the world! You come first!
trans: 受够了神和拯救世界！

Original: Tidus:I'll stop you. Just hang on!
Dialogue: I'll stop you. Just hang on!
trans: 我会阻止你。

Original: Wakka:No, wait! We can't fight Sir Jecht!
Dialogue: No, wait! We can't fight Sir Jecht!
trans: 不，等等！

Original: Jecht:Urrrgh... Do it... I can't...hold myself back!
Dialogue: Urrrgh... Do it... I can't...hold myself back!
trans: Urrrgh...做吧...我不能...阻止自己！

Original: Tidus:Wakka! Yuna!
Dialogue: Wakka! Yuna!
trans: 瓦卡！尤娜！

Original: Tidus:Help me save my dad!
Dialogue: Help me save my dad!
trans: 帮我救爸爸！

Original: Tidus:Get ready, Dad! We're gonna hit you with all we got! We're gonna help you!
Dialogue: Get ready, Dad! We're gonna hit you with all we got! We're gonna help you!
trans: 准备好，爸爸！

Original: Jecht:Sorry... I can't control this...!
Dialogue: Sorry... I can't control this...!
trans: 对不起...我无法控制这个...！

Original: Tidus:It'll be over quick! Let's do this!
Dialogue: It'll be over quick! Let's do this!
trans: 很快就会结束的！

Original: Yuna:Sir Jecht!
Dialogue: Sir Jecht!
trans: 杰特爵士！

Original: Cecil:...Worry not. He'll be fine.
Dialogue: ...Worry not. He'll be fine.
trans: ...别担心。

Original: Laguna:Thank goodness. It was feeling touch and go there.
Dialogue: Thank goodness. It was feeling touch and go there.
trans: 谢天谢地。

Original: Tidus:Now to just wait for him to come to...
Dialogue: Now to just wait for him to come to...
trans: 现在只能等他来了……

Original: Tidus:Huh!? Yuna!?
Dialogue: Huh!? Yuna!?

Original: Tidus:Wh-wh-what's the matter!?
Dialogue: Wh-wh-what's the matter!?
trans: 呜呜呜怎么了！？

Original: Yuna:I'm so relieved... You're...still here...
Dialogue: I'm so relieved... You're...still here...
trans: 我松了口气...你...还在这里...

Original: Tidus:Ahh... You remember that.
Dialogue: Ahh... You remember that.
trans: 啊……你还记得。

Original: Tidus:Sorry to make you worry. But hey, look. I'm fine, see?
Dialogue: Sorry to make you worry. But hey, look. I'm fine, see?
trans: 对不起，让你担心了。

Original: Tidus:I'm here to guard you on this journey, so...trust me.
Dialogue: I'm here to guard you on this journey, so...trust me.
trans: 我会在这段旅程中守护你，所以……相信我。

Original: Jecht:Hey! Enough with the touchy feely!
Dialogue: Hey! Enough with the touchy feely!
trans: 嘿！

Original: Jecht:Tsk... Trying to embarrass me in front of somebody else's little girl?
Dialogue: Tsk... Trying to embarrass me in front of somebody else's little girl?
trans: 啧……想在人家小姑娘面前出丑？

Original: Tidus:You're back to yourself!
Dialogue: You're back to yourself!
trans: 你回归自我了！

Original: Jecht:Heh. No big deal.
Dialogue: Heh. No big deal.
trans: 呵呵。

Original: Squall:What was that all about?
Dialogue: What was that all about?
trans: 刚才那是干什么啊？

Original: Jecht:Sorry you had to see that. Just some bad memories poking their heads out.
Dialogue: Sorry you had to see that. Just some bad memories poking their heads out.
trans: 很抱歉你不得不看到那个。

Original: Jecht:Was trying to keep away from you all...but I got led around by the nose.
Dialogue: Was trying to keep away from you all...but I got led around by the nose.
trans: 试图远离你们所有人……但我被牵着鼻子走。

Original: Cecil:You are no longer under Exdeath's yoke.
Dialogue: You are no longer under Exdeath's yoke.
trans: 你不再受 Exdeath 的束缚。

Original: Squall:I suppose you can keep your memories under control now. Even bad ones.
Dialogue: I suppose you can keep your memories under control now. Even bad ones.
trans: 我想你现在可以控制你的记忆了。

Original: Yuna:I remembered, too...
Dialogue: I remembered, too...
trans: 我也想起来了...

Original: Jecht:That so... Sorry to put you through all that again.
Dialogue: That so... Sorry to put you through all that again.
trans: 那样...很抱歉让你再次经历这些。

Original: Cecil:That battle was fierce enough to warp the space in here... Perhaps that is why your memories returned.
Dialogue: That battle was fierce enough to warp the space in here... Perhaps that is why your memories returned.
trans: 那一场战斗，激烈到足以扭曲这里的空间……或许这就是你记忆恢复的原因。

Original: Squall:But only if your ties are close enough, it seems.
Dialogue: But only if your ties are close enough, it seems.
trans: 但似乎只有你们的关系足够密切。

Original: Cecil:Indeed. I am yet without mine...
Dialogue: Indeed. I am yet without mine...
trans: 的确。

Original: Laguna:Now, now, don't let it get you so down.
Dialogue: Now, now, don't let it get you so down.
trans: 现在，现在，不要让它让你如此沮丧。

Original: Laguna:We've found a strong clue to solving our problems! But first, let's solve the bigger problem behead of us!
Dialogue: We've found a strong clue to solving our problems! But first, let's solve the bigger problem behead of us!
trans: 我们找到了解决问题的有力线索！

Original: Squall:("Before us"? "Ahead of us"?)
Dialogue: ("Before us"? "Ahead of us"?)
trans: （“在我们之前”？“在我们之前”？）

Original: Jecht:Anyway, guess I'll take the forward position.
Dialogue: Anyway, guess I'll take the forward position.
trans: 无论如何，我猜我会占据前锋位置。

Original: Tidus:You haven't made a full recovery yet.
Dialogue: You haven't made a full recovery yet.
trans: 你还没有完全康复。

Original: Jecht:Stuff it! I've got seniority on you, so fall in line!
Dialogue: Stuff it! I've got seniority on you, so fall in line!
trans: 塞满它！

Original: Squall:(He just can't ask him to watch his back, can he?)
Dialogue: (He just can't ask him to watch his back, can he?)
trans: （他总不能让他看着他的背吧？）

Original: Laguna:Aw, Squall, that's so considerate of you to go behead of me!
Dialogue: Aw, Squall, that's so considerate of you to go behead of me!
trans: 啊，斯考尔，你真是太体贴了，竟然去砍我的头！

Original: Yuna:I'll... I'll protect you, too...
Dialogue: I'll... I'll protect you, too...
trans: 我……我也会保护你的……

Original: Yuna:So please...
Dialogue: So please...
trans: 所以，请...

Original: Cyan:How wonderful it is that Sir Jecht has joined us. I am happy for thee, Sir Tidus.
Dialogue: How wonderful it is that Sir Jecht has joined us. I am happy for thee, Sir Tidus.
trans: Jecht 爵士加入我们真是太好了。

Original: Tidus:At least one of us is.
Dialogue: At least one of us is.
trans: 至少我们中的一个是。

Original: Sazh:That look of relief on your face tells a different story, kid.
Dialogue: That look of relief on your face tells a different story, kid.
trans: 孩子，你脸上如释重负的表情说明了一个不同的故事。

Original: Lilisette:See? What did I tell you? Your father did have something in mind.
Dialogue: See? What did I tell you? Your father did have something in mind.
trans: 看？

Original: Tidus:Yeah, yeah.
Dialogue: Yeah, yeah.
trans: 是啊是啊。

Original: Cyan:For all his stern language, his desire to raise a strong child may have backfired on him...
Dialogue: For all his stern language, his desire to raise a strong child may have backfired on him...
trans: 对于他所有严厉的语言，他想要抚养一个坚强的孩子的愿望可能适得其反……

Original: Sazh:When deep down he just can't get enough of his bundle of joy.
Dialogue: When deep down he just can't get enough of his bundle of joy.
trans: 在内心深处，他只是无法获得足够的快乐。

Original: Tidus:I keep telling you, it's his attitude that sucks.
Dialogue: I keep telling you, it's his attitude that sucks.
trans: 我一直告诉你，他的态度很糟糕。

Original: Hope:I thought the same thing.
Dialogue: I thought the same thing.
trans: 我也这么想。

Original: Hope:And neither of us knew how to deal with the other. I wonder if your father doesn't have the same trouble.
Dialogue: And neither of us knew how to deal with the other. I wonder if your father doesn't have the same trouble.
trans: 我们都不知道如何与对方打交道。

Original: Sazh:You said he's a star athlete, right? That can't leave him with a lot of free time...
Dialogue: You said he's a star athlete, right? That can't leave him with a lot of free time...
trans: 你说他是明星运动员，对吧？

Original: Cyan:All the time in the world is never enough to spend with thy family...
Dialogue: All the time in the world is never enough to spend with thy family...
trans: 世界上所有的时间都不够和你的家人一起度过……

Original: Sazh:Now's your chance to make up for lost time.
Dialogue: Now's your chance to make up for lost time.
trans: 现在是您弥补失去的时间的机会了。

Original: Hope:Ah, but lately you've always got some retort to throw back at him!
Dialogue: Ah, but lately you've always got some retort to throw back at him!
trans: 啊，不过最近你总有一些反驳的话要回他！

Original: Tidus:Of course I do! We're on equal footing now! I don't have to take his crap forever!
Dialogue: Of course I do! We're on equal footing now! I don't have to take his crap forever!
trans: 我当然是了！

Original: Lilisette:Right, then! Time to bring down the house!
Dialogue: Right, then! Time to bring down the house!
trans: 对，那就！

Original: Tidus:You betcha!
Dialogue: You betcha!
trans: 完全正确！

Original: Sazh:That's a scary kind of fired up!
Dialogue: That's a scary kind of fired up!
trans: 那是一种可怕的开火！

Original: Yuri:This world is different from the others we've seen.
Dialogue: This world is different from the others we've seen.
trans: 这个世界与我们见过的其他世界不同。

Original: Yuri:Can we...really get back home?
Dialogue: Can we...really get back home?
trans: 我们……真的可以回家吗？

Original: Chelinka:"There is nothing you can't do if your will is strong enough."
Dialogue: "There is nothing you can't do if your will is strong enough."
trans: “只要意志足够坚强，没有什么做不到的。”

Original: Chelinka:If we want it, we can make it happen. So don't give up.
Dialogue: If we want it, we can make it happen. So don't give up.
trans: 如果我们想要它，我们可以实现它。

Original: Vivi:What is it?
Dialogue: What is it?
trans: 它是什么？

Original: Terra:Watching you reminds me of the children back home.
Dialogue: Watching you reminds me of the children back home.
trans: 看着你让我想起了家乡的孩子们。

Original: Vivi:Your children?
Dialogue: Your children?
trans: 你的孩子？

Original: Terra:No, orphaned children.
Dialogue: No, orphaned children.
trans: 不，孤儿。

Original: Yuri:With no parents... The same as us back then...
Dialogue: With no parents... The same as us back then...
trans: 没有父母……和当年的我们一样……

Original: Terra:In the midst of their sorrow, all I could do was be by their side.
Dialogue: In the midst of their sorrow, all I could do was be by their side.
trans: 在他们悲伤的时候，我能做的就是陪在他们身边。

Original: Terra:But I could keep going thanks to them.
Dialogue: But I could keep going thanks to them.
trans: 但多亏了他们，我才能继续前进。

Original: Terra:And the same goes for you.
Dialogue: And the same goes for you.
trans: 你也一样。

Original: Eiko:Aaack! Don't come near me!
Dialogue: Aaack! Don't come near me!
trans: 啊！

Original: Laguna:Mwe-hehe! There's no escape, Eiko! It's the Cuchi-cuchi treatment for you!
Dialogue: Mwe-hehe! There's no escape, Eiko! It's the Cuchi-cuchi treatment for you!
trans: 嗯哼！

Original: Chelinka:...What are you doing?
Dialogue: ...What are you doing?
trans: ...你在干什么？

Original: Laguna:Uh? Terror! It's Cuchi-cuchi tag!
Dialogue: Uh? Terror! It's Cuchi-cuchi tag!
trans: 呃？

Original: Eiko:It's sooo scary! Why don't you join?
Dialogue: It's sooo scary! Why don't you join?
trans: 太可怕了！

Original: Yuri:U-um... What do you think, Chelinka?
Dialogue: U-um... What do you think, Chelinka?
trans: 嗯……你怎么看，Chelinka？

Original: Laguna:What, you're not gonna play with me?
Dialogue: What, you're not gonna play with me?
trans: 什么，你不想和我玩？

Original: Laguna:Okay! The next target is Yuri! Charge, full speed ahead!
Dialogue: Okay! The next target is Yuri! Charge, full speed ahead!
trans: 好的！

Original: Yuri:Waugh! W-wait! Stooop!
Dialogue: Waugh! W-wait! Stooop!
trans: 哇！

Original: Chelinka:Yuri looks like he's having fun.
Dialogue: Yuri looks like he's having fun.
trans: 尤里看起来很开心。

Original: Terra:Hehe, everyone is so full of energy.
Dialogue: Hehe, everyone is so full of energy.
trans: 呵呵，大家精神抖擞。

Original: Vivi:I wonder if she thinks Mr. Laguna is one of us kids...
Dialogue: I wonder if she thinks Mr. Laguna is one of us kids...
trans: 我想知道她是否认为拉古纳先生是我们中的一员...

Original: Sazh:Whoever named this the Dimensions' Labyrinth knew what they were talking about. There's no end to this place.
Dialogue: Whoever named this the Dimensions' Labyrinth knew what they were talking about. There's no end to this place.
trans: 将此命名为次元迷宫的人都知道他们在说什么。

Original: Vivi:We've come a long ways.
Dialogue: We've come a long ways.
trans: 我们已经走了很长一段路。

Original: Rem:We have... But I feel Mog is nearby. Only a little more to go.
Dialogue: We have... But I feel Mog is nearby. Only a little more to go.
trans: 我们有……但我觉得莫格就在附近。

Original: Vivi:You know...I was thinking.
Dialogue: You know...I was thinking.
trans: 你知道……我在想。

Original: Vivi:I'd never be able to get this far without everyone's help.
Dialogue: I'd never be able to get this far without everyone's help.
trans: 没有大家的帮助，我永远无法走到这一步。

Original: Warrior of Light:I feel the same, Vivi.
Dialogue: I feel the same, Vivi.
trans: 我也有同感，薇薇。

Original: Warrior of Light:I am grateful to have met each of you.
Dialogue: I am grateful to have met each of you.
trans: 我很高兴认识你们每一个人。

Original: Rem:...It was just the four of us at the beginning.
Dialogue: ...It was just the four of us at the beginning.
trans: ……一开始只有我们四个人。

Original: Sazh:Haha, now that you mention it, it was, huh.
Dialogue: Haha, now that you mention it, it was, huh.
trans: 哈哈，既然说起来了，呵呵。

Original: Sazh:Who'da thunk our party'd grow this big?
Dialogue: Who'da thunk our party'd grow this big?
trans: 谁会想到我们的党会发展这么大？

Original: Mog:Kupo! We need to work together to find others to help us, kupo!
Dialogue: Kupo! We need to work together to find others to help us, kupo!
trans: 库波！

Original: Mog:Heroes with wills of light! Where are you, kupo? Come out, come out wherever you are!
Dialogue: Heroes with wills of light! Where are you, kupo? Come out, come out wherever you are!
trans: 拥有光之意志的英雄！

Original: Mog:I can sense a will of light at the other end of this coast, kupo!
Dialogue: I can sense a will of light at the other end of this coast, kupo!
trans: 我能感觉到海岸另一端的光之意志，库波！

Original: Mog:Kupo? Is that a new friend over there, kupo?
Dialogue: Kupo? Is that a new friend over there, kupo?
trans: 库波？

Original: Mog:Kupo! You're not who I was looking for, kupooo!
Dialogue: Kupo! You're not who I was looking for, kupooo!
trans: 库波！

Original: Mog:Kupo... It's not easy being a messenger of the goddess, kupo...
Dialogue: Kupo... It's not easy being a messenger of the goddess, kupo...
trans: 库波……作为女神库波的使者，可不容易啊……

Original: Mog:But I'm not about to give up either, kupo! We've got worlds to save, kupo!
Dialogue: But I'm not about to give up either, kupo! We've got worlds to save, kupo!
trans: 但我也不打算放弃，库波！

Original: Sazh:...Brings back memories.
Dialogue: ...Brings back memories.
trans: ...带回回忆。

Original: Sazh:He was an uncomplicated fella, that one.
Dialogue: He was an uncomplicated fella, that one.
trans: 他是一个简单的家伙，那个。

Original: Vivi:Yeah. He would always cheer us up when the going got tough.
Dialogue: Yeah. He would always cheer us up when the going got tough.
trans: 是的。

Original: Rem:And he was always so earnest about his mission.
Dialogue: And he was always so earnest about his mission.
trans: 他对自己的使命总是那么认真。

Original: Rem:No one was happier than him to find someone new to join us.
Dialogue: No one was happier than him to find someone new to join us.
trans: 没有人比他更高兴找到新人加入我们。

Original: Sazh:Probably nothing to gain by saying it at this point, but...
Dialogue: Probably nothing to gain by saying it at this point, but...
trans: 在这一点上说出来可能没有任何好处，但是......

Original: Sazh:Is Mog...really a bad guy?
Dialogue: Is Mog...really a bad guy?
trans: 莫格……真的是坏人吗？

Original: Vivi:...I want to see him one more time.
Dialogue: ...I want to see him one more time.
trans: ……我想再见他一面。

Original: Vivi:I can't tell if he's a good moogle or a bad moogle...
Dialogue: I can't tell if he's a good moogle or a bad moogle...
trans: 我分不清他是好莫古利还是坏莫古利...

Original: Vivi:But...I still want to see him. Do you think that's weird?
Dialogue: But...I still want to see him. Do you think that's weird?
trans: 但是……我还是想见他。

Original: Rem:Not at all, Vivi. I feel the same way.
Dialogue: Not at all, Vivi. I feel the same way.
trans: 一点也不，薇薇。

Original: Warrior of Light:Mog is one of us.
Dialogue: Mog is one of us.
trans: 莫格是我们中的一员。

Original: Sazh:...Shady or not, there's no denying that.
Dialogue: ...Shady or not, there's no denying that.
trans: ......阴暗与否，不可否认。

Original: Warrior of Light:Let us be on our way.
Dialogue: Let us be on our way.
trans: 让我们继续前进吧。

Original: Warrior of Light:I want to believe in the light of his will.
Dialogue: I want to believe in the light of his will.
trans: 我愿意相信他的意志之光。

Original: Jecht:Sure taken a turn for the horrific here... Givin' me chills.
Dialogue: Sure taken a turn for the horrific here... Givin' me chills.
trans: 肯定因为这里的恐怖而转过身来……让我不寒而栗。

Original: Galuf:Although...I wouldn't have expected it to open up like this the deeper we go.
Dialogue: Although...I wouldn't have expected it to open up like this the deeper we go.
trans: 虽然......我没想到我们越深入它就会像这样打开。

Original: Cloud:Better than getting lost.
Dialogue: Better than getting lost.
trans: 总比迷路好。

Original: Galuf:Exdeath! Shouldn't you know better than to show your face again!
Dialogue: Exdeath! Shouldn't you know better than to show your face again!
trans: 死亡！

Original: Exdeath:Mwa-haha! Wherever you go, there I'll be!
Dialogue: Mwa-haha! Wherever you go, there I'll be!
trans: 哇哈哈！

Original: Jecht:Hah! Didn't take you for the lonely type!
Dialogue: Hah! Didn't take you for the lonely type!
trans: 哈！

Original: Exdeath:Hmph. I assumed you would have destroyed yourself after recovering your memories.
Dialogue: Hmph. I assumed you would have destroyed yourself after recovering your memories.
trans: 哼。

Original: Jecht:Why you...!
Dialogue: Why you...!
trans: 为什么你...！

Original: Galuf:The way you'd dare to take advantage of a man's soul... You can't be allowed to roam free!
Dialogue: The way you'd dare to take advantage of a man's soul... You can't be allowed to roam free!
trans: 居然敢占男人的魂……不能放过！

Original: Cloud:Agreed. Memories...aren't for someone else to mess with.
Dialogue: Agreed. Memories...aren't for someone else to mess with.
trans: 同意。

Original: Exdeath:Mwa-hahaha! Yes, that's the spirit!
Dialogue: Mwa-hahaha! Yes, that's the spirit!
trans: 哇哈哈哈！

Original: Exdeath:But let us see if you can keep your composure when confronted with this...
Dialogue: But let us see if you can keep your composure when confronted with this...
trans: 但是让我们看看你在面对这个时是否能保持冷静......

Original: Exdeath:Come! Warriors possessed of darkness!
Dialogue: Come! Warriors possessed of darkness!
trans: 来！

Original: Jecht:What the!? Well, ain't this a crowd!
Dialogue: What the—!? Well, ain't this a crowd!

Original: Galuf:It's come to this...
Dialogue: It's come to this...
trans: 事情到了这...

Original: Cloud:Not a surprising lineup, though.
Dialogue: Not a surprising lineup, though.
trans: 不过，这并不令人惊讶。

Original: Exdeath:...You will find them in no way inferior to the real thing.
Dialogue: ...You will find them in no way inferior to the real thing.
trans: ...您会发现它们丝毫不逊色于真品。

Original: Exdeath:May the warriors of darkness escort you to hell!
Dialogue: May the warriors of darkness escort you to hell!
trans: 愿黑暗的战士护送你下地狱！

Original: Jecht:Things're gettin' interesting! Let's do this!
Dialogue: Things're gettin' interesting! Let's do this!
trans: 事情变得有趣了！

Original: Galuf:We'll mop them up before we realize they're in the way.
Dialogue: We'll mop them up before we realize they're in the way.
trans: 我们会在意识到它们挡路之前将它们清理干净。

Original: Cloud:Let's break through in one go. My money's on Mog being just ahead!
Dialogue: Let's break through in one go. My money's on Mog being just ahead!
trans: 一口气突破吧。

Original: Firion:That's all of them...
Dialogue: That's all of them...
trans: 这就是他们所有人...

Original: Yuffie:I'm sooo pooped. Don't make me take another step.
Dialogue: I'm sooo pooped. Don't make me take another step.
trans: 我太拉屎了

Original: Lilisette:Come on now! There's no time to dillydally! Can you just sit there while your world's in peril, Yuffie!?
Dialogue: Come on now! There's no time to dillydally! Can you just sit there while your world's in peril, Yuffie!?
trans: 快来吧！

Original: Yuffie:Ugh... Yeah, yeah, I know...
Dialogue: Ugh... Yeah, yeah, I know...
trans: 呃...是的，是的，我知道...

Original: Firion:Mog!?
Dialogue: Mog!?
trans: 我可以！？

Original: Yuffie:Whaaa?! This is sudden!
Dialogue: Whaaa?! This is sudden!

Original: Serah:Wait! ...Something's not right.
Dialogue: Wait! ...Something's not right.
trans: 等待！

Original: Vincent:...An illusion?
Dialogue: ...An illusion?
trans: ……错觉？

Original: Mog:Kupokupo! I really owe it to you all! Thanks so much, kupo!
Dialogue: Kupokupo! I really owe it to you all! Thanks so much, kupo!
trans: 咕咕咕！

Original: Lilisette:Thanks? For what?
Dialogue: Thanks? For what?
trans: 谢谢？

Original: Mog:Thanks for all the spectacular battles you've fought here and there!
Dialogue: Thanks for all the spectacular battles you've fought here and there!
trans: 感谢您在这里和那里进行的所有壮观的战斗！

Original: Mog:I've been able to gather lots and lots of energy, kupo!
Dialogue: I've been able to gather lots and lots of energy, kupo!
trans: 我已经能够聚集很多很多的能量，kupo！

Original: Mog:But but but! I need more energy, kupo! This isn't enough!
Dialogue: But but but! I need more energy, kupo! This isn't enough!
trans: 但是但是但是！

Original: Yuffie:Hold on one stinking minute there! What the heck are you gonna do with all this energy, huh!?
Dialogue: Hold on one stinking minute there! What the heck are you gonna do with all this energy, huh!?
trans: 在那儿等一分钟！

Original: Mog:Kupopo? If you want to know, you'll have to come inside, kupo!
Dialogue: Kupopo? If you want to know, you'll have to come inside, kupo!
trans: 库波波？

Original: Mog:In here is the ultimate tier of the Dimensions' Labyrinth, kupo! It's your right to set foot inside, kupo!
Dialogue: In here is the ultimate tier of the Dimensions' Labyrinth, kupo! It's your right to set foot inside, kupo!
trans: 这里是次元迷宫的最后一层，kupo！

Original: Mog:Don't keep my pom-pom waiting, kupo!
Dialogue: Don't keep my pom-pom waiting, kupo!
trans: 不要让我的 pom-pom 等待，kupo！

Original: Serah:Mog, wait!
Dialogue: Mog, wait!
trans: 莫哥，等等！

Original: Yuffie:A Torsion leading to the ultimate tier... Um, "It's a trap"?
Dialogue: A Torsion leading to the ultimate tier... Um, "It's a trap"?
trans: 通往最终层的扭曲……嗯，“这是一个陷阱”？

Original: Lilisette:But there's no other way before us.
Dialogue: But there's no other way before us.
trans: 但我们没有别的路可走。

Original: Firion:...We were prepared for this from the beginning.
Dialogue: ...We were prepared for this from the beginning.
trans: ...我们从一开始就为此做好了准备。

Original: Firion:Let's go, everyone!
Dialogue: Let's go, everyone!
trans: 走吧，大家！

Original: Yuffie:Wowzers, not even a moment's hesitation! Everybody's sure got guts...
Dialogue: Wowzers, not even a moment's hesitation! Everybody's sure got guts...
trans: Wowzers，不要犹豫！

Original: Serah:To tell the truth, I'm a little nervous.
Dialogue: To tell the truth, I'm a little nervous.
trans: 说实话，我有点紧张。

Original: Serah:But my faith in everyone else is bigger than my nerves.
Dialogue: But my faith in everyone else is bigger than my nerves.
trans: 但我对其他人的信心胜过我的紧张。

Original: Yuffie:...Yeah. I get the feeling that with everyone here, things'll turn out alright.
Dialogue: ...Yeah. I get the feeling that with everyone here, things'll turn out alright.

Original: Yuffie:Plus I don't wanna hang around here by myself.
Dialogue: Plus I don't wanna hang around here by myself.
trans: 另外，我不想一个人呆在这里。

Original: Seifer:This "ultimate tier" is pretty repulsive looking if you ask me.
Dialogue: This "ultimate tier" is pretty repulsive looking if you ask me.
trans: 如果你问我，这个“终极层”看起来非常令人厌恶。

Original: Yuri:Are all those squirming things tentacles?
Dialogue: Are all those squirming things tentacles?
trans: 那些蠕动的东西都是触手吗？

Original: Y'shtola:...It would appear that way, as though we are inside some giant creature.
Dialogue: ...It would appear that way, as though we are inside some giant creature.
trans: ......它会以这种方式出现，就好像我们在某个巨大的生物体内一样。

Original: Zidane:Hey! Mog! Where are ya!?
Dialogue: Hey! Mog! Where are ya!?
trans: 嘿！

Original: Zell:Aw, c'mon, man. What if all that shouting attracts a bunch of monsters?
Dialogue: Aw, c'mon, man. What if all that shouting attracts a bunch of monsters?
trans: 噢，来吧，伙计。

Original: Yuri:W-waugh! Is this the goddess? Gosh...
Dialogue: W-waugh! Is this the goddess? Gosh...
trans: 哇哇！

Original: Zell:Hm? I don't think it's the real her. A hologram?
Dialogue: Hm? I don't think it's the real her. A hologram?
trans: 嗯？

Original: Y'shtola:I believe she has a message for us.
Dialogue: I believe she has a message for us.
trans: 我相信她有话要告诉我们。

Original: Materia:That spirit, the moogle, is in here.
Dialogue: That spirit, the moogle, is in here.
trans: 那个精灵，moogle，就在这里。

Original: Materia:You must address the situation in all haste. If you do not...
Dialogue: You must address the situation in all haste. If you do not...
trans: 你必须迅速解决这个问题。

Original: Materia:The moogle's form may become the vessel for a sinister presence.
Dialogue: The moogle's form may become the vessel for a sinister presence.
trans: moogle 的形式可能成为邪恶存在的容器。

Original: Zidane:A sinister presence? Is that what's been behind Mog?
Dialogue: A sinister presence? Is that what's been behind Mog?
trans: 险恶的存在？

Original: Materia:Yes. I sense an omen of calamity.
Dialogue: Yes. I sense an omen of calamity.
trans: 是的。

Original: Zell:Calamity...? Is something coming?
Dialogue: Calamity...? Is something coming?

Original: Materia:You must stop it before it does.
Dialogue: You must stop it before it does.
trans: 你必须在它发生之前阻止它。

Original: Materia:Not just for this world. For every world.
Dialogue: Not just for this world. For every world.
trans: 不只是为了这个世界。

Original: Materia:You are all my light. Please, by all means, defend every world.
Dialogue: You are all my light. Please, by all means, defend every world.
trans: 你都是我的光。

Original: Yuri:Every world...? I guess that's right, huh. They are all connected.
Dialogue: Every world...? I guess that's right, huh. They are all connected.
trans: 每个世界……？

Original: Seifer:I'm gonna pop that moogle a good one.
Dialogue: I'm gonna pop that moogle a good one.
trans: 我要把那个 moogle 打爆。

Original: Y'shtola:Surely our opponent is connected to these tentacles.
Dialogue: Surely our opponent is connected to these tentacles.
trans: 我们的对手肯定与这些触手相连。

Original: Zidane:Once we find Mog, we'll get the full story.
Dialogue: Once we find Mog, we'll get the full story.
trans: 一旦我们找到 Mog，我们就会得到完整的故事。

Original: Layle:So. A sinister presence that'll bring calamity to every world.
Dialogue: So. A sinister presence that'll bring calamity to every world.
trans: 所以。

Original: Balthier:I always thought that moogle was up to no good.
Dialogue: I always thought that moogle was up to no good.
trans: 我一直认为moogle没有好事。

Original: Edgar:All these battles we've been put through to close the Torsions, too...
Dialogue: All these battles we've been put through to close the Torsions, too...
trans: 我们也经历了所有这些战斗，以结束 Torsions……

Original: Edgar:Gathering energy to present to this calamity... Assuming Mog isn't the calamity himself, that is.
Dialogue: Gathering energy to present to this calamity... Assuming Mog isn't the calamity himself, that is.
trans: 聚集能量来应对这场灾难……假设莫格本人不是这场灾难，那就是。

Original: Onion Knight:Just as we suspected, we were being used all along.
Dialogue: Just as we suspected, we were being used all along.
trans: 正如我们所怀疑的那样，我们一直都在被利用。

Original: Sabin:No use crying over spilled milk. Though I would like to ask Mog a few questions myself...
Dialogue: No use crying over spilled milk. Though I would like to ask Mog a few questions myself...
trans: 为打翻的牛奶哭泣是没有用的。

Original: Lightning:But what we need to do now is clear. Defeat Mog...no ifs, ands, or buts.
Dialogue: But what we need to do now is clear. Defeat Mog...no ifs, ands, or buts.
trans: 但我们现在需要做的很清楚。

Original: Balthier:"Defeat" is easier said than done.
Dialogue: "Defeat" is easier said than done.
trans: “打败”说起来容易做起来难。

Original: Balthier:Unless it really is just a moogle we're fighting...
Dialogue: Unless it really is just a moogle we're fighting...
trans: 除非我们打的真的只是一只莫古利……

Original: Layle:He's been a slippery one so far. He probably has more than a few more tricks up his sleeve.
Dialogue: He's been a slippery one so far. He probably has more than a few more tricks up his sleeve.
trans: 到目前为止，他一直很狡猾。

Original: Onion Knight:Come to think of it, remember what Y'shtola said?
Dialogue: Come to think of it, remember what Y'shtola said?
trans: 想一想，还记得 Y'shtola 说的话吗？

Original: Onion Knight:That the labyrinth's ultimate tier is like the inside of some creature?
Dialogue: That the labyrinth's ultimate tier is like the inside of some creature?
trans: 迷宫的最高层就像某种生物的内部？

Original: Edgar:Hmm? And not unlike a moving fortress, eh? This is something I think I'd like to figure out how to pilot.
Dialogue: Hmm? And not unlike a moving fortress, eh? This is something I think I'd like to figure out how to pilot.
trans: 唔？

Original: Sabin:Nice thinking! I call shotgun!
Dialogue: Nice thinking! I call shotgun!
trans: 不错的想法！

Original: Edgar:Settle down, Sabin. Once again, easier said than done. I can't imagine a giant creature is eager to let us manipulate it.
Dialogue: Settle down, Sabin. Once again, easier said than done. I can't imagine a giant creature is eager to let us manipulate it.
trans: 冷静下来，萨宾。

Original: Balthier:While I hate to interrupt your fun, might we focus on this calamity first?
Dialogue: While I hate to interrupt your fun, might we focus on this calamity first?
trans: 虽然我不想打扰你的乐趣，但我们可以先关注这场灾难吗？

Original: Edgar:Aha, my apologies.
Dialogue: Aha, my apologies.
trans: 啊哈，我很抱歉。

Original: Edgar:I hadn't intended to give myself over to frivolity. Only, I wonder if everyone isn't a bit too caught up by the word "calamity"...
Dialogue: I hadn't intended to give myself over to frivolity. Only, I wonder if everyone isn't a bit too caught up by the word "calamity"...
trans: 我并没有打算让自己陷入轻浮。

Original: Lightning:He's right. We shouldn't let the word tie us down. We just need to beat whatever enemy appears before us.
Dialogue: He's right. We shouldn't let the word tie us down. We just need to beat whatever enemy appears before us.
trans: 他是对的。

Original: Layle:No ifs, ands, or buts, right? Let's get this over with.
Dialogue: No ifs, ands, or buts, right? Let's get this over with.
trans: 没有如果、和或但是，对吧？

Original: Balthier:Time to save the world... Just the right burden for the leading man.
Dialogue: Time to save the world... Just the right burden for the leading man.
trans: 是时候拯救世界了……对男主角来说恰到好处。

Original: Terra:This is...Mog's presence...
Dialogue: This is...Mog's presence...
trans: 这是……莫格的存在……

Original: Eiko:I feel it, too! We're close!
Dialogue: I feel it, too! We're close!
trans: 我也觉得！

Original: Vivi:I bet he's waiting for us!
Dialogue: I bet he's waiting for us!
trans: 我打赌他在等我们！

Original: Edge:Wh-whoa, whoa, slow down. Why does everyone sound so happy about it!?
Dialogue: Wh-whoa, whoa, slow down. Why does everyone sound so happy about it!?
trans: 哇哇哇，慢点。

Original: Edge:Mog's our enemy now... He might kill us, you know.
Dialogue: Mog's our enemy now... He might kill us, you know.
trans: 莫格现在是我们的敌人了……他可能会杀了我们，你知道的。

Original: Eiko:Oh? But it's not for sure, right?
Dialogue: Oh? But it's not for sure, right?
trans: 哦？

Original: Eiko:Maybe he's just been tricked by some nasty big baddie!
Dialogue: Maybe he's just been tricked by some nasty big baddie!
trans: 也许他只是被一些讨厌的大坏蛋欺骗了！

Original: Ace:It is a possibility...
Dialogue: It is a possibility...
trans: 这是一个可能...

Original: Terra:Mog is in danger right now.
Dialogue: Mog is in danger right now.
trans: 莫格现在处于危险之中。

Original: Terra:And if so, I want to save him.
Dialogue: And if so, I want to save him.
trans: 如果是这样，我想救他。

Original: Irvine:You really like Mog, don't you?
Dialogue: You really like Mog, don't you?
trans: 你真的很喜欢 Mog，不是吗？

Original: Terra:Like... It's not just that.
Dialogue: Like... It's not just that.
trans: 好像……不只是这样。

Original: Terra:I want to repay him.
Dialogue: I want to repay him.
trans: 我要回报他。

Original: Terra:For giving me the chance to meet so many people from different worlds...
Dialogue: For giving me the chance to meet so many people from different worlds...
trans: 让我有机会认识这么多来自不同世界的人...

Original: Terra:For the bonds we built while closing the Torsions...
Dialogue: For the bonds we built while closing the Torsions...
trans: 对于我们在关闭 Torsions 时建立的债券......

Original: Terra:All of it is thanks to Mog guiding us...
Dialogue: All of it is thanks to Mog guiding us...
trans: 这一切都归功于Mog对我们的指导......

Original: Eiko:Terra's right.
Dialogue: Terra's right.
trans: 泰拉是对的。

Original: Eiko:Without Mog...we might've never met... And being alone...is so lonely...
Dialogue: Without Mog...we might've never met... And being alone...is so lonely...
trans: 没有莫格……我们可能从未见过面……一个人……太孤独了……

Original: Edge:Yeah, you got me there.
Dialogue: Yeah, you got me there.
trans: 是的，你让我在那里。

Original: Irvine:Yeah. I'm glad I got to meet all these cute girls, too.
Dialogue: Yeah. I'm glad I got to meet all these cute girls, too.
trans: 是的。

Original: Irvine:And if anyone was being used, maybe it just happened to be Mog, you know?
Dialogue: And if anyone was being used, maybe it just happened to be Mog, you know?
trans: 如果有人被利用，也许恰好是莫格，你知道吗？

Original: Ace:It might have very well been any one of us summoned here who ended up that way.
Dialogue: It might have very well been any one of us summoned here who ended up that way.
trans: 很可能我们中的任何一个被召唤到这里的人都以这种方式结束了。

Original: Terra:Mog is as special to me as all of you.
Dialogue: Mog is as special to me as all of you.
trans: Mog 对我和你们所有人一样特别。

Original: Edge:Alrighty, then let's go save him.
Dialogue: Alrighty, then let's go save him.
trans: 好吧，那我们去救他吧。

Original: Edge:Could be he hasn't attacked us yet 'cause he is just waiting for our help.
Dialogue: Could be he hasn't attacked us yet 'cause he is just waiting for our help.
trans: 可能他还没有攻击我们，因为他只是在等待我们的帮助。

Original: Eiko:Then let's hurry it up! To Mog's rescue!
Dialogue: Then let's hurry it up! To Mog's rescue!
trans: 那我们就抓紧时间吧！

Original: Warrior of Light:Mog!
Dialogue: Mog!
trans: 我可以！

Original: Lightning:We came, like you wanted.
Dialogue: We came, like you wanted.
trans: 我们来了，如你所愿。

Original: Laguna:Hold it... Is he out cold?
Dialogue: Hold it... Is he out cold?
trans: 等等……他感冒了吗？

Original: Eiko:Mog! We'll save you!
Dialogue: Mog! We'll save you!
trans: 猫！

Original: Warrior of Light:Are you alright!?
Dialogue: Are you alright!?
trans: 你还好吗！？

Original: Laguna:I didn't think they'd rush in like that...
Dialogue: I didn't think they'd rush in like that...
trans: 没想到他们会这么冲进来……

Original: Lightning:Look! Mog is!
Dialogue: Look! Mog is—!
trans: 看！

Original: Mog:You have...done well to come this far... I...commend you...
Dialogue: You have...done well to come this far... I...commend you...
trans: 你……做得很好，走到这一步……我……赞扬你……

Original: Eiko:That's not the usual Mog...
Dialogue: That's not the usual Mog...
trans: 这不是通常的莫格...

Original: Laguna:Oh, man... Something funny is going on...
Dialogue: Oh, man... Something funny is going on...
trans: 哦，伙计……发生了一些有趣的事情……

Original: Warrior of Light:Mog, what is it you are after? What do you mean to do with this world!?
Dialogue: Mog, what is it you are after? What do you mean to do with this world!?
trans: 莫格，你到底在找什么？

Original: Mog:It is... It is not enough...
Dialogue: It is... It is not enough...
trans: 这是……这还不够……

Original: Terra:What's not enough...?
Dialogue: What's not enough...?
trans: 什么还不够……？

Original: Mog:Offer more... More conflict... More power...
Dialogue: Offer more... More conflict... More power...
trans: 提供更多……更多冲突……更多力量……

Original: Lightning:You want to take more of our strength till the very end is it?
Dialogue: You want to take more of our strength till the very end is it?
trans: 你想把我们更多的力量用到最后吗？

Original: Mog:Power... Manifest...all you can...
Dialogue: Power... Manifest...all you can...
trans: 力量……体现……尽你所能……

Original: Eiko:Mog!!
Dialogue: Mog!!
trans: 我可以！！

Original: Laguna:Yikes! What the heck is that!?
Dialogue: Yikes! What the heck is that!?
trans: 哎呀！

Original: Terra:...It's not Mog. This blackened feeling isn't Mog's will!
Dialogue: ...It's not Mog. This blackened feeling isn't Mog's will!
trans: ……不是莫格。

Original: Lightning:So the real mastermind finally makes its appearance...!
Dialogue: So the real mastermind finally makes its appearance...!
trans: 所以真正的幕后黑手终于现身了……！

Original: Warrior of Light:...Can you see us, Mog? The warriors you have guided are all gathered here.
Dialogue: ...Can you see us, Mog? The warriors you have guided are all gathered here.
trans: ...你能看到我们吗，莫格？

Original: Warrior of Light:We fight with the wills of light you discovered. Now your light must prevail.
Dialogue: We fight with the wills of light you discovered. Now your light must prevail.
trans: 我们用你发现的光之意志战斗。

Original: Warrior of Light:To arms! The light is with us!
Dialogue: To arms! The light is with us!
trans: 去武装！

Original: Y'shtola:Could it be Mog was parasitized by this...this fiend...!?
Dialogue: Could it be Mog was parasitized by this...this fiend...!?
trans: 难不成莫格被这个……这个恶魔……寄生了！？

Original: Warrior of Light:We shall lay low the instigator of our ills and rescue Mog!
Dialogue: We shall lay low the instigator of our ills and rescue Mog!
trans: 我们要放下祸害的始作俑者，救出莫格！

Original: Sazh:Sonuva! So that's the real you!
Dialogue: Sonuva—! So that's the real you!
trans: 苏努瓦——！

Original: Vivi:Give us back Mog! Give us back our friend!
Dialogue: Give us back Mog! Give us back our friend!
trans: 把莫格还给我们！

Original: Mog:I'm sorry you all had to go through this, kupo.
Dialogue: I'm sorry you all had to go through this, kupo.
trans: 对不起，你们都必须经历这一切，kupo。

Original: Warrior of Light:You are still with us...! Persevere! We shall extricate you!
Dialogue: You are still with us...! Persevere! We shall extricate you!
trans: 你还和我们在一起……！

Original: Mog:Thanks...kupo... But I think...this is the end...kupo...
Dialogue: Thanks...kupo... But I think...this is the end...kupo...
trans: 谢谢...kupo...但我认为...这就是结束...kupo...

Original: Mog:The...last...of...my...strength...kupo... Take...it...and...defeat...this...evil...kupo...
Dialogue: The...last...of...my...strength...kupo... Take...it...and...defeat...this...evil...kupo...
trans: 我的……力量……库波……的……最后……接受……它……然后……打败……这个……邪恶的……库波。

Original: Rem:We won't let it end like this! We will get you back!
Dialogue: We won't let it end like this! We will get you back!
trans: 我们不会让它就这样结束的！

Original: Warrior of Light:Our will is the light! Now is the time to shine!
Dialogue: Our will is the light! Now is the time to shine!
trans: 我们的意志就是光！

Original: Warrior of Light:It is finished...
Dialogue: It is finished...
trans: 它完成了...

Original: Materia:...Go, Mog. Awaken the warriors.
Dialogue: ...Go, Mog. Awaken the warriors.
trans: ……去吧，莫格。

Original: Mog:Kupo! Leave it to me, kupo!
Dialogue: Kupo! Leave it to me, kupo!
trans: 库波！

Original: Mog:Kuuupopo! Everyone, open your eyes, kupo!
Dialogue: Kuuupopo! Everyone, open your eyes, kupo!
trans: 呜呜呜！

Original: Vivi:Thank goodness you're safe!
Dialogue: Thank goodness you're safe!
trans: 谢天谢地，你安全了！

Original: Sazh:Looks like you shook that bug you had.
Dialogue: Looks like you shook that bug you had.
trans: 看起来你摆脱了你的那个错误。

Original: Materia:Yes, there is nothing more to fear.
Dialogue: Yes, there is nothing more to fear.
trans: 是的，没有什么比这更可怕的了。

Original: Materia:The blackened will that fed on the spirit moogle has been eliminated entirely.
Dialogue: The blackened will that fed on the spirit moogle has been eliminated entirely.
trans: 以灵莫古利为食的黑化意志被彻底消灭。

Original: Mog:Everyone, I'm really sorry, kupo!
Dialogue: Everyone, I'm really sorry, kupo!
trans: 各位，真的很抱歉，kupo！

Original: Mog:It's all my fault that the world was in danger, kupo...
Dialogue: It's all my fault that the world was in danger, kupo...
trans: 世界陷入危险全是我的错，库波……

Original: Warrior of Light:And yet we prevailed.
Dialogue: And yet we prevailed.
trans: 然而我们还是赢了。

Original: Rem:If it's really you, then you're one of us.
Dialogue: If it's really you, then you're one of us.
trans: 如果真的是你，那么你就是我们中的一员。

Original: Mog:Ku...kupooo! I owe you for saving me! I'll never forget this as long as I live, kupo!
Dialogue: Ku...kupooo! I owe you for saving me! I'll never forget this as long as I live, kupo!
trans: 咳……咳咳！

Original: Rem:No, Mog. We owed you.
Dialogue: No, Mog. We owed you.
trans: 不，莫格。

Original: Rem:It was the light you gathered that defeated the blackened will.
Dialogue: It was the light you gathered that defeated the blackened will.
trans: 是你聚集的光打败了黑暗的意志。

Original: Vivi:You're back to yourself because you brought us all together!
Dialogue: You're back to yourself because you brought us all together!
trans: 你回到了你自己，因为你把我们大家聚在一起了！

Original: Warrior of Light:We felt your will resisting the blackened will in that battle. You fought alongside us.
Dialogue: We felt your will resisting the blackened will in that battle. You fought alongside us.
trans: 在那场战斗中，我们感受到了你的意志抵抗着黑暗的意志。

Original: Sazh:By the way, Materia.
Dialogue: By the way, Materia.
trans: 顺便说一下，材料。

Original: Sazh:Are we able to go home?
Dialogue: Are we able to go home?
trans: 我们可以回家吗？

Original: Materia:...Since you defeated the blackened will, the threat infesting this world is no longer.
Dialogue: ...Since you defeated the blackened will, the threat infesting this world is no longer.
trans: ……自从你打倒了黑化的意志，这个世界的威胁就不再存在了。

Original: Mog:Wait, kupo...
Dialogue: Wait, kupo...
trans: 等等，大衣……

Original: Materia:What is it?
Dialogue: What is it?
trans: 它是什么？

Original: Mog:While I was possessed by the blackened will, all kinds of unpleasant consciouses were flowing into me, kupo...
Dialogue: While I was possessed by the blackened will, all kinds of unpleasant consciouses were flowing into me, kupo...
trans: 就在我被黑化的意志附身的同时，各种不愉快的意识涌入我的体内，库波……

Original: Rem:What do you mean...?
Dialogue: What do you mean...?
trans: 你是什​​么意思...？

Original: Mog:I really don't know precisely, but these consciouses came through the blackened will and into me...kupo...
Dialogue: I really don't know precisely, but these consciouses came through the blackened will and into me...kupo...
trans: 我真的不知道具体情况，但这些意识是通过黑化的意志进入我的……库波……

Original: Materia:I believe it means the blackened will was not the only sinister presence.
Dialogue: I believe it means the blackened will was not the only sinister presence.
trans: 我相信这意味着变黑的意志并不是唯一邪恶的存在。

Original: Sazh:Aww, c'mon. So what's gonna happen with multiple sinister presences?
Dialogue: Aww, c'mon. So what's gonna happen with multiple sinister presences?
trans: 哇，来吧。

Original: Warrior of Light:Needless to say, a new danger threatens not only this world, but all of ours.
Dialogue: Needless to say, a new danger threatens not only this world, but all of ours.
trans: 不用说，一种新的危险不仅威胁着这个世界，而且威胁着我们所有人。

Original: Mog:Kupo... I want to pay you back for all the trouble I caused, kupo.
Dialogue: Kupo... I want to pay you back for all the trouble I caused, kupo.
trans: Kupo……我要报答我给你带来的所有麻烦，kupo。

Original: Mog:I want to protect all your worlds, kupo. I won't be a problem this time. I mean it, kupo!
Dialogue: I want to protect all your worlds, kupo. I won't be a problem this time. I mean it, kupo!
trans: 我想保护你所有的世界，库波。

Original: Mog:So pleasejust a little bit is fineplease stay and continue the journey with me, kupo!!
Dialogue: So please—just a little bit is fine—please stay and continue the journey with me, kupo!!
trans: 所以拜托——一点点就好了——库珀，请留下来和我一起继续旅程！！

Original: Warrior of Light:...So begins a new journey.
Dialogue: ...So begins a new journey.
trans: ……于是开始了新的旅程。

Original: Vivi:I thought I wanted to hurry back home...
Dialogue: I thought I wanted to hurry back home...
trans: 我以为我想快点回家...

Original: Vivi:But I think I want to keep adventuring with everyone and see new things and stay together longer.
Dialogue: But I think I want to keep adventuring with everyone and see new things and stay together longer.
trans: 但我想我想继续和大家一起冒险，看到新事物，一起呆得更久。

Original: Vivi:Am I being selfish...?
Dialogue: Am I being selfish...?
trans: 我是不是很自私……？

Original: Rem:Everyone might have their own goals and missions to fulfill in the homeworlds...
Dialogue: Everyone might have their own goals and missions to fulfill in the homeworlds...
trans: 每个人在家乡世界可能都有自己的目标和使命要完成……

Original: Rem:But I feel the same way as you... I've realized so many things after meeting everyone in this world.
Dialogue: But I feel the same way as you... I've realized so many things after meeting everyone in this world.
trans: 但我和你有同样的感觉……在遇到这个世界上的每一个人之后，我明白了很多事情。

Original: Cloud:We've come this far. Let's see it to the end.
Dialogue: We've come this far. Let's see it to the end.
trans: 我们已经走到这一步了。

Original: Mog:Is something bothering you, kupo?
Dialogue: Is something bothering you, kupo?
trans: 库波，有什么事困扰着你吗？

Original: Warrior of Light:Even after eliminating the blackened will and saving the world, my memories have not returned.
Dialogue: Even after eliminating the blackened will and saving the world, my memories have not returned.
trans: 即使消除了黑化的意志，拯救了世界，我的记忆也没有恢复。

Original: Warrior of Light:I wonder if I can keep up the fight when I still do not even know what was important to me.
Dialogue: I wonder if I can keep up the fight when I still do not even know what was important to me.
trans: 我什至不知道什么对我来说很重要，我想知道我是否还能继续战斗。

Original: Cloud:...Keep up the journey.
Dialogue: ...Keep up the journey.
trans: ...继续旅程。

Original: Rem:You might find something on the way!
Dialogue: You might find something on the way!
trans: 你可能会在路上找到一些东西！

Original: Mog:Trust in me, O savior of me, kupo! Together we'll help you find your memories, kupo!
Dialogue: Trust in me, O savior of me, kupo! Together we'll help you find your memories, kupo!
trans: 相信我，我的救世主啊，库波！

Original: Mog:This time...I'll protect you to the very end, kupo!
Dialogue: This time...I'll protect you to the very end, kupo!
trans: 这次……我会保护你到最后的，库波！

Original: Mog:And don't forget, you saved this world, kupo! There's nothing you can't do, kupo!
Dialogue: And don't forget, you saved this world, kupo! There's nothing you can't do, kupo!
trans: 别忘了，你拯救了这个世界，库波！

Original: Rem:But we haven't saved it completely yet... About that...
Dialogue: But we haven't saved it completely yet... About that...
trans: 但是我们还没有完全保存它......关于那个......

Original: Sazh:Yeah... And not just our worlds, but everyone's are in trouble.
Dialogue: Yeah... And not just our worlds, but everyone's are in trouble.
trans: 是的……不仅是我们的世界，每个人都有麻烦。

Original: Warrior of Light:...I hope you all will continue to fight by my side.
Dialogue: ...I hope you all will continue to fight by my side.
trans: ……希望大家继续与我并肩作战。

Original: Warrior of Light:Whatever difficulties may await, with you, I can face anything. That is what I believe.
Dialogue: Whatever difficulties may await, with you, I can face anything. That is what I believe.
trans: 不管有什么困难等待着我，有你在，我什么都可以面对。

Original: Warrior of Light:Let us carry on. To a new world. To where that light reaches.
Dialogue: Let us carry on. To a new world. To where that light reaches.
trans: 让我们继续。

Original: Onion Knight:Well...Mog is back to himself and we beat the blackened will. Are we not done here?
Dialogue: Well...Mog is back to himself and we beat the blackened will. Are we not done here?
trans: 好吧……Mog 恢复了原状，我们打败了黑化的意志。

Original: Y'shtola:Save for that, this was supposed to be a place of respite or us.
Dialogue: Save for that, this was supposed to be a place of respite or us.
trans: 除此之外，这应该是我们或我们的喘息之地。

Original: Warrior of Light:...My memories have not returned. I believe the effects of the Torsions have yet to be resolved.
Dialogue: ...My memories have not returned. I believe the effects of the Torsions have yet to be resolved.
trans: ……我的记忆还没有恢复。

Original: Materia:...You are correct.
Dialogue: ...You are correct.
trans: ...你是对的。

Original: Materia:Though you beat the will feeding on the moogle, the distorsions in this world remain.
Dialogue: Though you beat the will feeding on the moogle, the distorsions in this world remain.
trans: 尽管你打败了以莫古力为食的意志，但这个世界的扭曲依然存在。

Original: Vaan:Didn't you make this world? Can't you fix it?
Dialogue: Didn't you make this world? Can't you fix it?
trans: 这个世界不是你创造的吗？

Original: Materia:I am trying. However...something is amiss.
Dialogue: I am trying. However...something is amiss.
trans: 我在尝试。

Original: Materia:Something may have happened to the foundation of this world, the crystal core.
Dialogue: Something may have happened to the foundation of this world, the crystal core.
trans: 这个世界的根基，晶核，可能发生了什么事。

Original: Mog:Someone still has it out for this world, kupo.
Dialogue: Someone still has it out for this world, kupo.
trans: 库波，这个世界上仍然有人想要它。

Original: Onion Knight:Can I believe that?
Dialogue: Can I believe that?
trans: 我能相信吗？

Original: Mog:My spirit powers still let me sense wills and summon friends, kupo.
Dialogue: My spirit powers still let me sense wills and summon friends, kupo.
trans: 我的精神力量仍然让我感知意志和召唤朋友，库珀。

Original: Mog:...Whether you believe me or not is up to you and the gods, kupo.
Dialogue: ...Whether you believe me or not is up to you and the gods, kupo.
trans: ……信不信由你和众神决定，库波。

Original: Materia:Warriors... To repair this world, won't you lend me your strength?
Dialogue: Warriors... To repair this world, won't you lend me your strength?
trans: 勇士们……为了修复这个世界，可以借给我力量吗？

Original: Materia:I would have you make for the crystal core and ascertain if anything is there.
Dialogue: I would have you make for the crystal core and ascertain if anything is there.
trans: 我要你制造水晶核心并确定那里是否有任何东西。

Original: Y'shtola:Why us?
Dialogue: Why us?
trans: 为什么是我们？

Original: Materia:...I cannot leave my position for long. It is difficult to maintain this world.
Dialogue: ...I cannot leave my position for long. It is difficult to maintain this world.
trans: ......我不能离开我的位置太久。

Original: Vaan:So to make an airship analogy...if this is the bridge we're in, then the crystal core is the engine?
Dialogue: So to make an airship analogy...if this is the bridge we're in, then the crystal core is the engine?
trans: 所以打个飞艇比喻……如果这是我们所在的舰桥，那么水晶核就是引擎？

Original: Onion Knight:So it seems. Shall we give it a look?
Dialogue: So it seems. Shall we give it a look?
trans: 所以它看起来。

Original: Y'shtola:At any rate, we are yet unable to return home as things stand.
Dialogue: At any rate, we are yet unable to return home as things stand.
trans: 无论如何，按目前的情况，我们还不能回家。

Original: Warrior of Light:Yes... I cannot remember my home, and I do not think I am alone in this predicament.
Dialogue: Yes... I cannot remember my home, and I do not think I am alone in this predicament.
trans: 是的……我不记得我的家，而且我不认为我是一个人处于这种困境中。

Original: Vaan:Alright then, to the airship! Mog, can you get it ready for us?
Dialogue: Alright then, to the airship! Mog, can you get it ready for us?
trans: 好吧，去飞艇！

Original: Mog:Does that mean you believe me, kupo!?
Dialogue: Does that mean you believe me, kupo!?
trans: 那就是说你相信我吗，库波！？

Original: Vaan:What choice do we have? We came here with you, and we're leaving with you.
Dialogue: What choice do we have? We came here with you, and we're leaving with you.
trans: 我们有什么选择？

Original: Y'shtola:No hard feelings in that corner.
Dialogue: No hard feelings in that corner.
trans: 在那个角落没有难过的感觉。

Original: Onion Knight:...I don't think he ever gave it much thought to begin with.
Dialogue: ...I don't think he ever gave it much thought to begin with.
trans: ......我认为他一开始就没有考虑太多。

Original: Warrior of Light:It is better than worrying here about it. We still know nothing about what we face.
Dialogue: It is better than worrying here about it. We still know nothing about what we face.
trans: 这比在这里担心要好。

Original: Onion Knight:If that's what our leader says, I'm not about to argue.
Dialogue: If that's what our leader says, I'm not about to argue.
trans: 如果那是我们的领导所说的，我不想争论。

Original: Y'shtola:Memories or no, everyone relies on you.
Dialogue: Memories or no, everyone relies on you.
trans: 回忆与否，每个人都依赖你。

Original: Y'shtola:No matter the circumstances, you are always the first to fly our banner of light.
Dialogue: No matter the circumstances, you are always the first to fly our banner of light.
trans: 不管在什么情况下，你永远是第一个飘扬我们光之旗帜的人。

Original: Warrior of Light:Without a past...can I be a shining light for anyone?
Dialogue: Without a past...can I be a shining light for anyone?
trans: 没有过去……我能成为任何人的明灯吗？

Original: Materia:Go, warrior. The crystal awaits you.
Dialogue: Go, warrior. The crystal awaits you.
trans: 去吧，战士。

Original: Spiritus:The moogle is no longer necessary. Forge your own paths.
Dialogue: The moogle is no longer necessary. Forge your own paths.
trans: 不再需要 moogle。

Original: The Emperor:Hmph. As though I need you to tell me that.
Dialogue: Hmph. As though I need you to tell me that.
trans: 哼。

Original: Sephiroth:...The center of everything. If I am there...
Dialogue: ...The center of everything. If I am there...
trans: ……一切的中心。

Original: Golbez:Spiritus. I cannot guarantee I will act as you expect me to...
Dialogue: Spiritus. I cannot guarantee I will act as you expect me to...
trans: 醑。

Original: Golbez:...There is something important to me. Does this present a problem for you?
Dialogue: ...There is something important to me. Does this present a problem for you?
trans: ......对我来说有重要的事情。

Original: Spiritus:None. My warriors are those who can achieve what they will.
Dialogue: None. My warriors are those who can achieve what they will.
trans: 没有任何。

Original: Vayne:...I will not be a puppet of the gods. Yet...I lack knowledge.
Dialogue: ...I will not be a puppet of the gods. Yet...I lack knowledge.
trans: ……我不会成为众神的傀儡。

Original: Spiritus:What Materia's warriors released is in the vicinity of the crystal core.
Dialogue: What Materia's warriors released is in the vicinity of the crystal core.
trans: 魔晶石的武者释放的，就在晶核附近。

Original: Spiritus:If you wish to see it with your own eyes, that is where you shall go.
Dialogue: If you wish to see it with your own eyes, that is where you shall go.
trans: 如果你想亲眼看到它，那就是你应该去的地方。

Original: Balthier:Well...we blew the engine again.
Dialogue: Well...we blew the engine again.
trans: 好吧……我们又把引擎烧坏了。

Original: Mog:This should be where to find the crystal core, kupo.
Dialogue: This should be where to find the crystal core, kupo.
trans: 这里应该就是寻找晶核的地方，库波。

Original: Mog:But it's surrounded by buildings from another world, kupo!
Dialogue: But it's surrounded by buildings from another world, kupo!
trans: 但是它被来自另一个世界的建筑包围着，库珀！

Original: Firion:This place reminds me of the distorted realms we've traveled to get here.
Dialogue: This place reminds me of the distorted realms we've traveled to get here.
trans: 这个地方让我想起了我们穿越到这里的扭曲领域。

Original: Mog:Oh, no! If that's true, we're in danger, kupo!
Dialogue: Oh, no! If that's true, we're in danger, kupo!
trans: 不好了！

Original: Mog:Someone else must be after the crystal core and making these paths...these distortions, kupo!
Dialogue: Someone else must be after the crystal core and making these paths...these distortions, kupo!
trans: 一定是其他人在追逐水晶核心并制造这些路径……这些扭曲，库珀！

Original: Cloud:You mean Torsions, huh? The rifts we can also make by our own willpower.
Dialogue: You mean Torsions, huh? The rifts we can also make by our own willpower.
trans: 你是说扭转，对吧？

Original: Firion:Could it be one of Spiritus's lackeys?
Dialogue: Could it be one of Spiritus's lackeys?
trans: 会不会是 Spiritus 的走狗之一？

Original: Mog:It might even be worse! In any case, we need to head to the crystal, kupo!
Dialogue: It might even be worse! In any case, we need to head to the crystal, kupo!
trans: 甚至可能更糟！

Original: Balthier:If it's not one problem in this world, it's another...
Dialogue: If it's not one problem in this world, it's another...
trans: 如果这不是这个世界上的一个问题，那就是另一个...

Original: Firion:Wait, over there!
Dialogue: Wait, over there!
trans: 等等，那边！

Original: Vayne:You do not take the gods' words for truth, do you?
Dialogue: You do not take the gods' words for truth, do you?
trans: 你不会把神的话当作真理吧？

Original: ???:I'm just a fortune-telling machine. That's a mite harder question than I can answer.
Dialogue: I'm just a fortune-telling machine. That's a mite harder question than I can answer.
trans: 我只是一个算命机器。

Original: Vayne:So you say. However...
Dialogue: So you say. However...
trans: 所以你说。

Original: Cloud:It's Cait Sith! He's here, too!
Dialogue: It's Cait Sith! He's here, too!
trans: 是凯特西斯！

Original: Balthier:Don't tell me you count stuffed animals among your associates.
Dialogue: Don't tell me you count stuffed animals among your associates.
trans: 别告诉我你把毛绒动物算作你的同事。

Original: Cloud:...He's one of us.
Dialogue: ...He's one of us.
trans: ...他是我们中的一员。

Original: Balthier:Really? Looks awfully chummy with Vayne there.
Dialogue: Really? Looks awfully chummy with Vayne there.
trans: 真的吗？

Original: Firion:Maybe he's another ally sent to us by Materia.
Dialogue: Maybe he's another ally sent to us by Materia.
trans: 也许他是 Materia 派给我们的另一个盟友。

Original: Balthier:Well, "guide," what's the verdict?
Dialogue: Well, "guide," what's the verdict?
trans: 好吧，“指导”，判决是什么？

Original: Mog:I can only tell if someone has the will, kupo...
Dialogue: I can only tell if someone has the will, kupo...
trans: 我只能判断是否有人有意愿，kupo ...

Original: Cloud:So you don't know either.
Dialogue: So you don't know either.
trans: 所以你也不知道。

Original: Mog:It was my job before to find warriors with wills of light, kupo.
Dialogue: It was my job before to find warriors with wills of light, kupo.
trans: 寻找拥有光之意志的战士是我之前的工作，库波。

Original: Mog:But as you know by now, the line between good and evil or light and darkness is a moving target, kupo.
Dialogue: But as you know by now, the line between good and evil or light and darkness is a moving target, kupo.
trans: 但正如你现在所知，善与恶或光明与黑暗之间的界限是一个移动的目标，kupo。

Original: Vayne:...Then we are in agreement.
Dialogue: ...Then we are in agreement.
trans: ……那我们就同意了。

Original: Cait Sith:Alrighty. I'll hold up things on my end.
Dialogue: Alrighty. I'll hold up things on my end.
trans: 好吧。

Original: Firion:Let's follow them.
Dialogue: Let's follow them.
trans: 让我们跟随他们。

Original: Mog:But which one, kupo?
Dialogue: But which one, kupo?
trans: 但是哪一个，kupo？

Original: Cloud:Cait Sith.
Dialogue: Cait Sith.
trans: 凯特·西斯。

Original: Balthier:Wise choice. The other doesn't seem very open to persuasion.
Dialogue: Wise choice. The other doesn't seem very open to persuasion.
trans: 明智的选择。

Original: Cait Sith:Not this. Nor that.
Dialogue: Not this. Nor that.
trans: 不是这个。

Original: Cait Sith:Vayne said I'd find it around here.
Dialogue: Vayne said I'd find it around here.
trans: 薇恩说我会在这附近找到它。

Original: Cait Sith:He didn't seem like the kind of person who'd lie about something like this.
Dialogue: He didn't seem like the kind of person who'd lie about something like this.
trans: 他看起来不像是那种会在这种事情上撒谎的人。

Original: Cait Sith:Oh? This might be the ticket.
Dialogue: Oh? This might be the ticket.
trans: 哦？

Original: Cait Sith:Wh-wh-what IS that!?
Dialogue: Wh-wh-what IS that!?
trans: 什-什-那是什么！？

Original: Cait Sith:Oops! Might've bit off a wee more'n I can chew!
Dialogue: Oops! Might've bit off a wee more'n I can chew!
trans: 哎呀！

Original: Snow:Hey, did you guys hear that?
Dialogue: Hey, did you guys hear that?
trans: 嘿，你们听到了吗？

Original: Tifa:It sounded like Cait Sith! Up ahead!
Dialogue: It sounded like Cait Sith! Up ahead!
trans: 听起来像凯特西斯！

Original: Steiner:There was some mechanical noise as well! Your friend may be in danger!
Dialogue: There was some mechanical noise as well! Your friend may be in danger!
trans: 还有一些机械噪音！

Original: Mog:Kupokupo! I think they're already fighting!
Dialogue: Kupokupo! I think they're already fighting!
trans: 咕咕咕！

Original: Snow:A friend of yours and Cloud's is a friend of mine. Let's go!
Dialogue: A friend of yours and Cloud's is a friend of mine. Let's go!
trans: 你和克劳德的一个朋友是我的朋友。

Original: Layle:Time for the heroes to do our thing!
Dialogue: Time for the heroes to do our thing!
trans: 是时候让英雄们做我们的事了！

Original: Cait Sith:Cloud! It's been ages!
Dialogue: Cloud! It's been ages!
trans: 云！

Original: Cait Sith:And you got here just in time. I thought it was the rubbish heap for me this time.
Dialogue: And you got here just in time. I thought it was the rubbish heap for me this time.
trans: 而你来的正是时候。

Original: Cloud:...You okay?
Dialogue: ...You okay?
trans: ……你还好吗？

Original: Cait Sith:Fit as a fiddle thanks to you! Been a wee lost in this here factory, though.
Dialogue: Fit as a fiddle thanks to you! Been a wee lost in this here factory, though.
trans: 多亏了你！

Original: Lilisette:Cait Sith...huh. And you're the one on top? Not the big doll?
Dialogue: Cait Sith...huh. And you're the one on top? Not the big doll?
trans: 凯特·西斯……嗯。

Original: Cait Sith:You've got the right of it, lassie! It's a pleasure to meet you!
Dialogue: You've got the right of it, lassie! It's a pleasure to meet you!
trans: 你说得对，小姑娘！

Original: Cait Sith:The name's Cait Sith. I'm a fortune-telling machine.
Dialogue: The name's Cait Sith. I'm a fortune-telling machine.
trans: 名字叫凯特·西斯。

Original: Edgar:You're an entertainment apparatus? Fascinating. I'd like to see how you tick.
Dialogue: You're an entertainment apparatus? Fascinating. I'd like to see how you tick.
trans: 你是娱乐设备？

Original: Cloud:Cait Sith's not...a typical machine.
Dialogue: Cait Sith's not...a typical machine.
trans: Cait Sith 不是……一台典型的机器。

Original: Galuf:I've never seenor heardanyone quite like you before. There must be many, many worlds out there.
Dialogue: I've never seen—or heard—anyone quite like you before. There must be many, many worlds out there.
trans: 我以前从未见过或听说过像你这样的人。

Original: Warrior of Light:So it seems.
Dialogue: So it seems.
trans: 所以它看起来。

Original: Cait Sith:Hey, you!! What're you lookin' so down for!?
Dialogue: Hey, you!! What're you lookin' so down for!?
trans: 嘿，你！！

Original: Warrior of Light:Who, me?
Dialogue: Who, me?
trans: 谁，我？

Original: Cait Sith:How about it? If you have something on your mind, I can clear it up for ya!
Dialogue: How about it? If you have something on your mind, I can clear it up for ya!
trans: 这个怎么样？

Original: Cait Sith:A bright future? A happy future? I can predict anything!
Dialogue: A bright future? A happy future? I can predict anything!
trans: 光明的未来？

Original: Lilisette:The future, huh? I wonder if that's a Cait Sith's business in every world.
Dialogue: The future, huh? I wonder if that's a Cait Sith's business in every world.
trans: 未来，嗯？

Original: Galuf:Predictions don't always come true anyway. Why don't you go ahead and ask something?
Dialogue: Predictions don't always come true anyway. Why don't you go ahead and ask something?
trans: 无论如何，预测并不总是成真。

Original: Edgar:True or not, I just want to see how this works.
Dialogue: True or not, I just want to see how this works.
trans: 不管是真是假，我只是想看看它是如何工作的。

Original: Warrior of Light:Something I'd like to know...
Dialogue: Something I'd like to know...
trans: 我想知道的事情...

Original: Warrior of Light:Will there ever come a time when this world and our friends are truly at peace?
Dialogue: Will there ever come a time when this world and our friends are truly at peace?
trans: 这个世界和我们的朋友真正和平相处的时刻会到来吗？

Original: Galuf:You're asking for us? I thought you were concerned about the memories you've lost.
Dialogue: You're asking for us? I thought you were concerned about the memories you've lost.
trans: 你问我们？

Original: Warrior of Light:Yes, but I know that the person I was before I lost my memories would have asked the same question.
Dialogue: Yes, but I know that the person I was before I lost my memories would have asked the same question.
trans: 是的，但我知道失去记忆之前的我也会问同样的问题。

Original: Cloud:Well, there you have it.
Dialogue: Well, there you have it.
trans: 那么，你有它。

Original: Cait Sith:Okay, here goes!
Dialogue: Okay, here goes!
trans: 好的，开始了！

Original: Warrior of Light:..."Ordinary luck. It will be an active fortune. Give into the goodwill of others for a surprising spring"?
Dialogue: ..."Ordinary luck. It will be an active fortune. Give into the goodwill of others for a surprising spring"?
trans: ……“平凡的运气，会是主动的运气，付出别人的好意，换来一个惊喜的春天”？

Original: Edgar:...That's not an answer.
Dialogue: ...That's not an answer.
trans: ……这不是答案。

Original: Cait Sith:That's strange. I'll try again!
Dialogue: That's strange. I'll try again!
trans: 真奇怪。

Original: Warrior of Light:"Be careful of forgetfulness. Your lucky item is something shiny"?
Dialogue: "Be careful of forgetfulness. Your lucky item is something shiny"?
trans: “小心健忘。你的幸运物是闪闪发光的东西”？

Original: Lilisette:Huh. So you really are just a fortune-telling machine.
Dialogue: Huh. So you really are just a fortune-telling machine.
trans: 嗯。

Original: Cait Sith:Wait, one more! Just one more!
Dialogue: Wait, one more! Just one more!
trans: 等等，再来一个！

Original: Cait Sith:...What you pursue will come true. But you will lose something dear.
Dialogue: ...What you pursue will come true. But you will lose something dear.
trans: ......你所追求的都会实现。

Original: Warrior of Light:What do you mean by "something dear"?
Dialogue: What do you mean by "something dear"?
trans: “亲爱的”是什么意思？

Original: Edgar:I wouldn't worry yourself. This is hardly scientific.
Dialogue: I wouldn't worry yourself. This is hardly scientific.
trans: 我不会担心你自己。

Original: Cloud:...Well? I suppose you aren't satisfied with those fortunes.
Dialogue: ...Well? I suppose you aren't satisfied with those fortunes.
trans: ...出色地？

Original: Cait Sith:Of course not! I have to prove I'm no fraud! I'm coming with you.
Dialogue: Of course not! I have to prove I'm no fraud! I'm coming with you.
trans: 当然不是！

Original: Cloud:You don't mind, do you?
Dialogue: You don't mind, do you?
trans: 你不介意，是吗？

Original: Galuf:Not at all. I think Krile will be overjoyed!
Dialogue: Not at all. I think Krile will be overjoyed!
trans: 一点也不。

Original: Cait Sith:The pleasure's mine!
Dialogue: The pleasure's mine!
trans: 乐趣属于我！

Original: Edge:Hey, I hear you're a fortune-teller. What's my fortune got in store?
Dialogue: Hey, I hear you're a fortune-teller. What's my fortune got in store?
trans: 嘿，我听说你是个算命先生。

Original: Cait Sith:Leave it to Cait Sith! Right or wrong, I'm still the same ol' me!
Dialogue: Leave it to Cait Sith! Right or wrong, I'm still the same ol' me!
trans: 交给凯特西斯吧！

Original: Cait Sith:Love has not been kind...until now. Your soulmate is right around the corner.
Dialogue: Love has not been kind...until now. Your soulmate is right around the corner.
trans: 爱一直都不是仁慈的……直到现在。

Original: Edge:R-really!? My soulmate!? This is awesome!
Dialogue: R-really!? My soulmate!? This is awesome!
trans: R-真的！？

Original: Rem:Hehe, part of the gang already.
Dialogue: Hehe, part of the gang already.
trans: 呵呵，已经是帮派的一员了。

Original: Zidane:There was anactressin mytroupewho spoke a lot like him.
Dialogue: There was an actress in my troupe who spoke a lot like him.
trans: 我的剧团里有一个女演员，说话很像他。

Original: Zidane:She was fun and cheerful, and she also made everyone laugh.
Dialogue: She was fun and cheerful, and she also made everyone laugh.
trans: 她风趣开朗，也逗得大家哈哈大笑。

Original: Rem:But Mog and Cait Sith are so happy and friendly and human. It's nice.
Dialogue: But Mog and Cait Sith are so happy and friendly and human. It's nice.
trans: 但 Mog 和 Cait Sith 是如此快乐、友好和人性化。

Original: Hope:You journeyed together, right?
Dialogue: You journeyed together, right?
trans: 你们一起旅行，对吧？

Original: Hope:Cloud says Cait Sith isn't just any old machine.
Dialogue: Cloud says Cait Sith isn't just any old machine.
trans: Cloud 说 Cait Sith 不仅仅是一台旧机器。

Original: Hope:What does that mean? He looks like a toy, but is he...alive?
Dialogue: What does that mean? He looks like a toy, but is he...alive?
trans: 这意味着什么？

Original: Vincent:Not exactly. But you're not wrong either.
Dialogue: Not exactly. But you're not wrong either.
trans: 不完全是。

Original: Vincent:His workings are a lot more intricate than it may appear. ...As is his situation.
Dialogue: His workings are a lot more intricate than it may appear. ...As is his situation.
trans: 他的工作比看起来要复杂得多。

Original: Hope:But we can trust him...right?
Dialogue: But we can trust him...right?
trans: 但我们可以相信他……对吧？

Original: Vincent:Are you worried he was talking to an enemy?
Dialogue: Are you worried he was talking to an enemy?
trans: 你担心他在和敌人说话吗？

Original: Hope:I thought Vaan and the others might be concerned.
Dialogue: I thought Vaan and the others might be concerned.
trans: 我想 Vaan 和其他人可能会担心。

Original: Zidane:It's not easy to forget what happened back in our worlds, you know.
Dialogue: It's not easy to forget what happened back in our worlds, you know.
trans: 要忘记在我们的世界发生的事情并不容易，你知道的。

Original: Hope:I don't want us to be suspicious of any of our own...
Dialogue: I don't want us to be suspicious of any of our own...
trans: 我不想让我们怀疑我们自己的任何人...

Original: Vincent:Cait Sith...has a keen eye.
Dialogue: Cait Sith...has a keen eye.
trans: 凯特·西斯……有一双敏锐的眼睛。
