Original: Zidane:Vayne's an enemy, but he spotted right away that Mog was possessed.
Dialogue: Vayne's an enemy, but he spotted right away that Mog was possessed.
trans: 薇恩是敌人，但他立刻发现莫格被附身了。

Original: Vincent:Cait Sith's skilled at sneaking into enemy territory and finding out information.
Dialogue: Cait Sith's skilled at sneaking into enemy territory and finding out information.
trans: 凯特西斯擅长潜入敌方领土并获取信息。

Original: Hope:Is that why he was talking to Vayne?
Dialogue: Is that why he was talking to Vayne?
trans: 这就是他和薇恩说话的原因吗？

Original: Vincent:I can't answer that. Just trust him.
Dialogue: I can't answer that. Just trust him.
trans: 我无法回答。

Original: Vincent:The man knows the difference between right and wrong.
Dialogue: The man knows the difference between right and wrong.
trans: 男人知道对与错的区别。

Original: Hope:Don't you mean...cat?
Dialogue: Don't you mean...cat?
trans: 你不是说……猫吗？

Original: Yuffie:I thought this was supposed to be a world where we could rest!
Dialogue: I thought this was supposed to be a world where we could rest!
trans: 我以为这应该是一个可以让我们休息的世界！

Original: Yuffie:I'm exhausted! We're fighting monsters all the time!
Dialogue: I'm exhausted! We're fighting monsters all the time!
trans: 我累极了！

Original: Mog:There the warriors fight endlessly, kupo.
Dialogue: There the warriors fight endlessly, kupo.
trans: 那里的勇士们战斗不休，库波。

Original: Faris:Us, too? I don't remember any such thing.
Dialogue: Us, too? I don't remember any such thing.
trans: 我们也是？

Original: Mog:...Anyway, because that world exists, this world is a place where they can rest, kupo.
Dialogue: ...Anyway, because that world exists, this world is a place where they can rest, kupo.
trans: ……总之，因为那个世界的存在，这个世界才是他们可以安息的地方，库波。

Original: Balthier:And now their world of respite is being overrun by strife. ...The gods sure are lucky to have us.
Dialogue: And now their world of respite is being overrun by strife. ...The gods sure are lucky to have us.
trans: 而现在他们的喘息世界正被冲突所淹没。

Original: Vivi:If we protect this world, do you think we'll get a chance to rest?
Dialogue: If we protect this world, do you think we'll get a chance to rest?
trans: 如果我们保护这个世界，你认为我们会有机会休息吗？

Original: Faris:I don't have time to rest. There's so much I need to do back home.
Dialogue: I don't have time to rest. There's so much I need to do back home.
trans: 我没有时间休息。

Original: Balthier:You and me both.
Dialogue: You and me both.
trans: 你和我都。

Original: Yuffie:Yeah! Me, too!
Dialogue: Yeah! Me, too!
trans: 是的！

Original: Vivi:However busy you get in your own world, you won't forget about us, right?
Dialogue: However busy you get in your own world, you won't forget about us, right?
trans: 无论你在自己的世界里有多忙，你都不会忘记我们，对吧？

Original: Faris:Hm? Of course. I'd hate to forget you.
Dialogue: Hm? Of course. I'd hate to forget you.
trans: 嗯？

Original: Lightning:As long as our memories are still unstable, I can't make any promises.
Dialogue: As long as our memories are still unstable, I can't make any promises.
trans: 只要我们的记忆还不稳定，我就不能做出任何承诺。

Original: Balthier:...Be nice to the child.
Dialogue: ...Be nice to the child.
trans: ……对孩子好一点。

Original: Balthier:Until we do manage to find our way home, I promise I won't forget you.
Dialogue: Until we do manage to find our way home, I promise I won't forget you.
trans: 在我们设法找到回家的路之前，我保证我不会忘记你。

Original: Vivi:Thank you...
Dialogue: Thank you...
trans: 谢谢...

Original: Vivi:I don't remember much...but I do remember wanting to go on more adventures...
Dialogue: I don't remember much...but I do remember wanting to go on more adventures...
trans: 我记不太清了……但我确实记得我想继续更多的冒险……

Original: Vivi:So I'm happy I'm getting to do that right now with all of you.
Dialogue: So I'm happy I'm getting to do that right now with all of you.
trans: 所以我很高兴我现在能和大家一起做这件事。

Original: Faris:My friends here are as important to me as the ones back home.
Dialogue: My friends here are as important to me as the ones back home.
trans: 我在这里的朋友对我来说和家乡的朋友一样重要。

Original: Lightning:It doesn't matter what the gods' plans are. I'll fight to protect the people I care about right here.
Dialogue: It doesn't matter what the gods' plans are. I'll fight to protect the people I care about right here.
trans: 诸神的计划是什么并不重要。

Original: Yuffie:Me too! Me too! I want to find more trea I mean, I want to fight to save the world, too!
Dialogue: Me too! Me too! I want to find more trea— I mean, I want to fight to save the world, too!
trans: 我也是！

Original: Balthier:We all have our reasons, whatever they may be.
Dialogue: We all have our reasons, whatever they may be.
trans: 我们都有自己的理由，无论它们是什么。

Original: Penelo:I don't want to be rude, but we know you've been talking to Vayne. We saw you.
Dialogue: I don't want to be rude, but we know you've been talking to Vayne. We saw you.
trans: 我不想无礼，但我们知道你一直在和薇恩谈过。

Original: Cait Sith:Oh, why dinnae you say hello? I dinnae know you were friends of his.
Dialogue: Oh, why dinnae you say hello? I dinnae know you were friends of his.
trans: 哦，你为什么不打招呼？

Original: Krile:Not exactly. You see, Penelo...
Dialogue: Not exactly. You see, Penelo...
trans: 不完全是。

Original: Penelo:Vayne is fromour world. He's responsible for starting a war that destroyed myhome.
Dialogue: Vayne is from our world. He's responsible for starting a war that destroyed my home.
trans: 薇恩来自我们的世界。

Original: Lightning:You approached him without knowing who he was?
Dialogue: You approached him without knowing who he was?
trans: 你在不知道他是谁的情况下接近他？

Original: Cait Sith:He said he was summoned here by a god different from who summoned me, so we kept talking.
Dialogue: He said he was summoned here by a god different from who summoned me, so we kept talking.
trans: 他说他是被和召唤我的神不同的神召唤到这里来的，所以我们一直在说话。

Original: Ramza:You talked to this god before coming here?
Dialogue: You talked to this god before coming here?
trans: 你来这里之前跟这位神明谈过？

Original: Cait Sith:Aye, the goddess Materia summoned me.
Dialogue: Aye, the goddess Materia summoned me.
trans: 是的，女神玛泰利亚召唤了我。

Original: Cait Sith:Out of the blue, I'm in this world and she's telling me to join Cloud and the others.
Dialogue: Out of the blue, I'm in this world and she's telling me to join Cloud and the others.
trans: 出乎意料的是，我在这个世界上，她要我加入克劳德和其他人。

Original: Cait Sith:It happened so suddenly, with the lady saying she's a goddess and all, I didn't know what was going on.
Dialogue: It happened so suddenly, with the lady saying she's a goddess and all, I didn't know what was going on.
trans: 来得太突然了，那位女士说她是女神什么的，我不知道发生了什么。

Original: Lightning:That makes the two of us. So that's why you were gathering information.
Dialogue: That makes the two of us. So that's why you were gathering information.
trans: 这让我们两个。

Original: Krile:Even so, Vayne of all people...
Dialogue: Even so, Vayne of all people...
trans: 即便如此，所有人中的薇恩……

Original: Ramza:This is merely my impression, but Vayne strikes me as reasonable if he has no stake in the matter.
Dialogue: This is merely my impression, but Vayne strikes me as reasonable if he has no stake in the matter.
trans: 这只是我的印象，但如果韦恩与此事无关，我认为他是合理的。

Original: Penelo:You...might be right. He's only interested in his lineage and our world, Ivalice.
Dialogue: You...might be right. He's only interested in his lineage and our world, Ivalice.
trans: 你可能是对的。

Original: Cait Sith:He seemed to have no love lost for the god that sent him here, Spiritus.
Dialogue: He seemed to have no love lost for the god that sent him here, Spiritus.
trans: 他似乎对派他来这里的神 Spiritus 没有失去爱。

Original: Cait Sith:He was also going on about, "History is woven by man," and some such.
Dialogue: He was also going on about, "History is woven by man," and some such.
trans: 他还继续说，“历史是由人编织的”，诸如此类。

Original: Lightning:Did he tell you anything useful? Anything that might help us?
Dialogue: Did he tell you anything useful? Anything that might help us?
trans: 他有没有告诉你有用的东西？

Original: Cait Sith:What he told me was pretty much what I've heard from all of you.
Dialogue: What he told me was pretty much what I've heard from all of you.
trans: 他告诉我的几乎就是我从你们所有人那里听到的。

Original: Cait Sith:He did say that unlike Materia, Spiritus is standing by and watching his warriors destroy this world.
Dialogue: He did say that unlike Materia, Spiritus is standing by and watching his warriors destroy this world.
trans: 他确实说过，与 Materia 不同，Spiritus 正站在一旁看着他的战士们摧毁这个世界。

Original: Ramza:How queer. He created this world with Materia. Why would he let it be destroyed?
Dialogue: How queer. He created this world with Materia. Why would he let it be destroyed?
trans: 真奇怪。

Original: Lightning:There must be a reason he's letting the likes of the Emperor and Kefka run wild.
Dialogue: There must be a reason he's letting the likes of the Emperor and Kefka run wild.
trans: 他放任皇帝和凯夫卡之类的人狂奔肯定是有原因的。

Original: Krile:What happened after that?
Dialogue: What happened after that?
trans: 之后发生了什么？

Original: Cait Sith:We parted ways. There wasn't much else to talk about.
Dialogue: We parted ways. There wasn't much else to talk about.
trans: 我们分道扬镳。

Original: Cait Sith:Besides, my friends are here. And now you're my friends too.
Dialogue: Besides, my friends are here. And now you're my friends too.
trans: 此外，我的朋友们都在这里。

Original: Penelo:You don't need to exchange more information with him?
Dialogue: You don't need to exchange more information with him?
trans: 你不需要和他交换更多的信息？

Original: Cait Sith:I don't like dictators. And I don't trust politicians.
Dialogue: I don't like dictators. And I don't trust politicians.
trans: 我不喜欢独裁者。

Original: Krile:Well, that's good... I believe you.
Dialogue: Well, that's good... I believe you.
trans: 好吧，那很好……我相信你。

Original: Penelo:I'm sorry if it sounded like we doubted you...
Dialogue: I'm sorry if it sounded like we doubted you...
trans: 如果听起来我们怀疑你，我很抱歉......

Original: Cait Sith:Don't worry about it! I'll let you know if I remember anything else!
Dialogue: Don't worry about it! I'll let you know if I remember anything else!
trans: 别担心！

Original: Mog:Kupo! That monster... It's not like any other we've faced yet!
Dialogue: Kupo! That monster... It's not like any other we've faced yet!
trans: 库波！

Original: Mog:Earth attacks barely harm it, kupo! It's this first time we've seen this resistance!
Dialogue: Earth attacks barely harm it, kupo! It's this first time we've seen this resistance!
trans: 地球攻击几乎不会伤害它，kupo！

Original: Mog:Be careful, kupo!
Dialogue: Be careful, kupo!
trans: 小心点，库波！

Original: Sazh:So first there were these interdimensional Torsions, but now our objective is this crystal core...
Dialogue: So first there were these interdimensional Torsions, but now our objective is this crystal core...
trans: 所以首先是这些跨维度扭曲，但现在我们的目标是这个水晶核心......

Original: Cecil:Briefing him on our journey so far?
Dialogue: Briefing him on our journey so far?
trans: 向他介绍我们迄今为止的旅程？

Original: Sazh:Just what I needed! People who can tell the story better than I can!
Dialogue: Just what I needed! People who can tell the story better than I can!
trans: 正是我需要的！

Original: Cait Sith:It all sounds so complicated.
Dialogue: It all sounds so complicated.
trans: 这一切听起来很复杂。

Original: Cait Sith:Cloud, how 'bout it? Can you do your thing?
Dialogue: Cloud, how 'bout it? Can you do your thing?
trans: 云，怎么样？

Original: Cecil:...Your thing?
Dialogue: ...Your thing?
trans: ……你的事？

Original: Cloud:...He wants me to wrap up what's happened so far.
Dialogue: ...He wants me to wrap up what's happened so far.
trans: ...他要我总结到目前为止发生的事情。

Original: Shantotto:Is that something you can do? Perhaps you can show us a thing or two.
Dialogue: Is that something you can do? Perhaps you can show us a thing or two.
trans: 那是你能做的吗？

Original: Cecil:In that case, I would appreciate it too.
Dialogue: In that case, I would appreciate it too.
trans: 那样的话，我也很感激。

Original: Sazh:Hit us with it, kid!
Dialogue: Hit us with it, kid!
trans: 用它打我们，孩子！

Original: Cloud:Alright, I'll give it a shot...
Dialogue: Alright, I'll give it a shot...
trans: 好吧，我试试看……

Original: Cloud:This world we're in isn't our respective worlds; it's a fantasy created by Materia and Spiritus.
Dialogue: This world we're in isn't our respective worlds; it's a fantasy created by Materia and Spiritus.
trans: 我们所在的这个世界不是我们各自的世界；

Original: Cloud:Until recently, dimensional Torsions infested this world, opening rifts everywhere.
Dialogue: Until recently, dimensional Torsions infested this world, opening rifts everywhere.
trans: 直到最近，次元扭曲还在侵扰这个世界，到处都在开裂。

Original: Cloud:The source of the Torsions was the Blackened Will.
Dialogue: The source of the Torsions was the Blackened Will.
trans: 扭曲的源头是黑暗的意志。

Original: Mog:It possessed and used me to feed on everyone's powers, kupo.
Dialogue: It possessed and used me to feed on everyone's powers, kupo.
trans: 它拥有并利用我来吸取每个人的力量，库波。

Original: Shantotto:Then it manifested into a beast, most powerful after its feast.
Dialogue: Then it manifested into a beast, most powerful after its feast.
trans: 然后它化身为一头野兽，在它的盛宴之后最为强大。

Original: Cecil:We believe this Blackened Will had made its base here, and was trying to devour our home worlds.
Dialogue: We believe this Blackened Will had made its base here, and was trying to devour our home worlds.
trans: 我们相信这个 Blackened Will 已经在这里建立了基地，并试图吞噬我们的家园世界。

Original: Sazh:But we showed him! We took him down for good!
Dialogue: But we showed him! We took him down for good!
trans: 但我们向他展示了！

Original: Sazh:Unfortunately, according to Materia, there's still something sinister lurking out there...
Dialogue: Unfortunately, according to Materia, there's still something sinister lurking out there...
trans: 不幸的是，根据 Materia 的说法，那里仍然潜伏着一些险恶的东西......

Original: Cloud:Something that wants to destroy this world. We have no idea who or what it is.
Dialogue: Something that wants to destroy this world. We have no idea who or what it is.
trans: 想要毁灭这个世界的东西。

Original: Mog:Right now our goal is the crystal core, kupo. It's the foundation of this world.
Dialogue: Right now our goal is the crystal core, kupo. It's the foundation of this world.
trans: 现在我们的目标是晶核库波。

Original: Cloud:The fact that there are monsters and other strange things happening around the core...
Dialogue: The fact that there are monsters and other strange things happening around the core...
trans: 事实上，在核心周围发生了怪物和其他奇怪的事情......

Original: Mog:Is proof that someone with their sights on the core is opening rifts around it, kupo!
Dialogue: Is proof that someone with their sights on the core is opening rifts around it, kupo!
trans: 证明有人将目光投向了核心，正在围绕它打开裂隙，kupo！

Original: Shantotto:That's a power we share: through dimensions can we tear.
Dialogue: That's a power we share through dimensions can we tear.
trans: 这是我们通过维度共享的力量，我们可以撕裂吗？

Original: Cait Sith:What!? That's incredible!
Dialogue: What!? That's incredible!
trans: 什么！？

Original: Cecil:As long as you have the strength of will, you can create a passage in this world to get elsewhere.
Dialogue: As long as you have the strength of will, you can create a passage in this world to get elsewhere.
trans: 只要你有意志的力量，你就可以在这个世界上开辟出一条通往别处的通道。

Original: Sazh:Can't seem to use it to go back home or to other worlds, though.
Dialogue: Can't seem to use it to go back home or to other worlds, though.
trans: 不过，似乎不能用它回家或去其他世界。

Original: Mog:The power tends to be stronger in Spiritus's warriors, kupo. I hope they're not up to anything...
Dialogue: The power tends to be stronger in Spiritus's warriors, kupo. I hope they're not up to anything...
trans: Spiritus 的战士 kupo 中的力量往往更强。

Original: Cait Sith:I see, I see...
Dialogue: I see, I see...
trans: 我明白了，我明白了……

Original: Cait Sith:So first, we need to get to the core to see who or what is trying to get their hands on it.
Dialogue: So first, we need to get to the core to see who or what is trying to get their hands on it.
trans: 因此，首先，我们需要深入核心，看看是谁或什么东西试图得到它。

Original: Mog:Right, kupo! I'll guide you there. Follow me!
Dialogue: Right, kupo! I'll guide you there. Follow me!
trans: 对了，库波！

Original: Cait Sith:Thank you kindly!
Dialogue: Thank you kindly!
trans: 非常感谢你！

Original: Cait Sith:Bzzt......zzt...... Thank you kindly!
Dialogue: Bzzt......zzt...... Thank you kindly!
trans: Bzzt……zzt……谢谢！

Original: Vayne:...The crystal core. So there is where I will find my answer.
Dialogue: ...The crystal core. So there is where I will find my answer.
trans: ……晶核。

Original: Garland:You are intimate with a warrior of Materia?
Dialogue: You are intimate with a warrior of Materia?
trans: 你和一个魔石战士关系亲密？

Original: Vayne:We are exchanging information. I would you choose your words more carefully.
Dialogue: We are exchanging information. I would you choose your words more carefully.
trans: 我们正在交换信息。

Original: Cait Sith:Hmm, two gods and an entity that's consuming dimensions. What have I gotten myself into?
Dialogue: Hmm, two gods and an entity that's consuming dimensions. What have I gotten myself into?
trans: 嗯，两个神和一个消耗维度的实体。

Original: Vayne:You do not take the gods' words for truth, do you?
Dialogue: You do not take the gods' words for truth, do you?
trans: 你不会把神的话当作真理吧？

Original: Cait Sith:I'm just a fortune-telling machine. That's a mite harder question than I can answer.
Dialogue: I'm just a fortune-telling machine. That's a mite harder question than I can answer.
trans: 我只是一个算命机器。

Original: Vayne:So you say. However, you have a will of your own, do you not?
Dialogue: So you say. However, you have a will of your own, do you not?
trans: 所以你说。

Original: Cait Sith:...What about you? Are you doing what the gods tell you?
Dialogue: ...What about you? Are you doing what the gods tell you?

Original: Vayne:History is woven by man. In all worlds.
Dialogue: History is woven by man. In all worlds.
trans: 历史是人为编织的。

Original: Cait Sith:Nice sentiment, but there don't seem to be any other people in this world.
Dialogue: Nice sentiment, but there don't seem to be any other people in this world.
trans: 好心情，不过这个世界上好像没有其他人了。

Original: Vayne:Precisely. Here, there is neither nation nor society. Only those chosen by the gods' whim.
Dialogue: Precisely. Here, there is neither nation nor society. Only those chosen by the gods' whim.
trans: 恰恰。

Original: Vayne:It is most perverted. A man is human because of the societies he builds.
Dialogue: It is most perverted. A man is human because of the societies he builds.
trans: 这是最变态的。

Original: Cait Sith:However much a hero you may be in your world, what good is it without having someone to protect?
Dialogue: However much a hero you may be in your world, what good is it without having someone to protect?
trans: 不管你在你的世界里是多么的英雄，没有人保护又有什么好处呢？

Original: Vayne:I have a duty to my nation and my House Solidor.
Dialogue: I have a duty to my nation and my House Solidor.
trans: 我对我的国家和我的 House Solidor 负有责任。

Original: Vayne:I have no intention of accommodating the gods and their foolish games.
Dialogue: I have no intention of accommodating the gods and their foolish games.
trans: 我无意迁就诸神及其愚蠢的游戏。

Original: Cait Sith:I can relate... There's a pile of work waiting for me back home, too.
Dialogue: I can relate... There's a pile of work waiting for me back home, too.
trans: 我可以理解...回家后还有一大堆工作等着我。

Original: Cait Sith:But if Cloud and the gang are fighting for something here, I can't just leave them on their own.
Dialogue: But if Cloud and the gang are fighting for something here, I can't just leave them on their own.
trans: 但如果克劳德和那帮人在这里打架，我不能就这样放过他们。

Original: Vayne:I see... You will then join Materia's warriors.
Dialogue: I see... You will then join Materia's warriors.
trans: 我明白了......然后你将加入Materia的战士。

Original: Cait Sith:Yes, they're my friends. Although...
Dialogue: Yes, they're my friends. Although...
trans: 是的，他们是我的朋友。

Original: Vayne:For their sake, you desire the information I hold. Am I correct?
Dialogue: For their sake, you desire the information I hold. Am I correct?
trans: 为了他们，你想要我掌握的信息。

Original: Cait Sith:Leave it to a politician to sense an opportunity for collusion. This'll make things go much faster.
Dialogue: Leave it to a politician to sense an opportunity for collusion. This'll make things go much faster.
trans: 留给政治家去感受勾结的机会。

Original: Cait Sith:Naturally, one hand needs to wash the other. I'll cooperate with you.
Dialogue: Naturally, one hand needs to wash the other. I'll cooperate with you.
trans: 当然，一只手需要清洗另一只手。

Original: Cait Sith:I found some transmission devices, though one's missing a part. Do you know how to use these?
Dialogue: I found some transmission devices, though one's missing a part. Do you know how to use these?
trans: 我找到了一些传输设备，虽然其中缺少一部分。

Original: Vayne:Hm. So such technology exists here as well.
Dialogue: Hm. So such technology exists here as well.
trans: 嗯。

Original: Vayne:If you discovered them here, perhaps the missing part can be found in the surrounding rubble.
Dialogue: If you discovered them here, perhaps the missing part can be found in the surrounding rubble.
trans: 如果你在这里发现了它们，也许可以在周围的瓦砾中找到丢失的部分。

Original: Cait Sith:Then you take the one that works. I'll hold onto the one that needs fixing.
Dialogue: Then you take the one that works. I'll hold onto the one that needs fixing.
trans: 然后你选择那个有效的。

Original: Vayne:Very well. Then we are in agreement.
Dialogue: Very well. Then we are in agreement.
trans: 很好。

Original: Cait Sith:Alrighty. I'll hold up things on my end.
Dialogue: Alrighty. I'll hold up things on my end.
trans: 好吧。

Original: Vayne:Warriors are summoned here from worlds over. The perfect feeding ground for that which devours energy.
Dialogue: Warriors are summoned here from worlds over. The perfect feeding ground for that which devours energy.
trans: 战士们从世界各地被召唤到这里。

Original: Vayne:This world's existence is a threat to mine own.
Dialogue: This world's existence is a threat to mine own.
trans: 这个世界的存在，就是对我自己的威胁。

Original: Garland:You plan to destroy the crystal and with it this world.
Dialogue: You plan to destroy the crystal and with it this world.
trans: 你计划摧毁水晶和这个世界。

Original: Vayne:I even have a guide to lead me. Far wiser than challenging gods with unmeasured powers.
Dialogue: I even have a guide to lead me. Far wiser than challenging gods with unmeasured powers.
trans: 我什至有一个向导来带领我。

Original: Garland:Your tongue may be silken, but your fist chooses war. You are as much a slave to bloodshed as I.
Dialogue: Your tongue may be silken, but your fist chooses war. You are as much a slave to bloodshed as I.
trans: 你的舌头可能是柔滑的，但你的拳头选择了战争。

Original: Vayne:I dirty my hands to fulfill my duties.
Dialogue: I dirty my hands to fulfill my duties.
trans: 我脏了我的手来履行我的职责。

Original: Vayne:Do not conflate me with a bloodthirsty warrior like yourself.
Dialogue: Do not conflate me with a bloodthirsty warrior like yourself.
trans: 不要把我和你这样嗜血的战士混为一谈。

Original: Garland:There is strength to be gained in being true to oneself.
Dialogue: There is strength to be gained in being true to oneself.
trans: 忠于自己会获得力量。

Original: Vayne:A weak excuse.
Dialogue: A weak excuse.
trans: 一个软弱的借口。

Original: Garland:I will watch as you fight for your "duties."
Dialogue: I will watch as you fight for your "duties."
trans: 我会看着你为你的“职责”而战。

Original: Papalymo:We defeated the Blackened Will, but our memories are still hazy.
Dialogue: We defeated the Blackened Will, but our memories are still hazy.
trans: 我们打败了黑化意志，但我们的记忆依然模糊。

Original: Laguna:It's weird, right? I still feel like I'm forgetting something pretty important. Exactly the same as before.
Dialogue: It's weird, right? I still feel like I'm forgetting something pretty important. Exactly the same as before.
trans: 这很奇怪，对吧？

Original: Squall:(You look exactly the same as before too.)
Dialogue: (You look exactly the same as before too.)
trans: （你看起来也和以前一模一样。）

Original: Terra:Mog, is there anything you can tell us?
Dialogue: Mog, is there anything you can tell us?
trans: 莫格，你有什么可以告诉我们的吗？

Original: Mog:Anyone with the strength of will can create a Torsion here, kupo. Not just the Blackened Will.
Dialogue: Anyone with the strength of will can create a Torsion here, kupo. Not just the Blackened Will.
trans: 任何有意志力的人都可以在这里制造扭曲，kupo。

Original: Mog:These unique rifts bend time and space and sometimes create manikins, kupo.
Dialogue: These unique rifts bend time and space and sometimes create manikins, kupo.
trans: 这些独特的裂缝扭曲了时间和空间，有时会创造出人体模型，kupo。

Original: Layle:So Torsions don't exist solely because of the Blackened Will.
Dialogue: So Torsions don't exist solely because of the Blackened Will.
trans: 因此扭曲并不仅仅因为黑化意志而存在。

Original: Thancred:We all have the power to create them, Spiritus's warriors included.
Dialogue: We all have the power to create them, Spiritus's warriors included.
trans: 我们都有创造它们的力量，包括 Spiritus 的战士。

Original: Terra:But we've hardly used that power.
Dialogue: But we've hardly used that power.
trans: 但我们几乎没有使用过这种力量。

Original: Layle:Who's to say? What if we did and just forgot?
Dialogue: Who's to say? What if we did and just forgot?
trans: 谁说的？

Original: Papalymo:Or...our enemies could be using their powers as we speak.
Dialogue: Or...our enemies could be using their powers as we speak.
trans: 或者……我们的敌人可能正在我们说话时使用他们的力量。

Original: Mog:There's a possibility they stole our memories and experiences to weaken us, kupo.
Dialogue: There's a possibility they stole our memories and experiences to weaken us, kupo.
trans: 他们有可能窃取我们的记忆和经验来削弱我们，kupo。

Original: Mog:Or...we unconsciously got rid of our memories and went back in time in order to face a terrible foe, kupo.
Dialogue: Or...we unconsciously got rid of our memories and went back in time in order to face a terrible foe, kupo.
trans: 或者……我们不自觉地摆脱了记忆，回到了过去，去面对一个可怕的敌人，库波。

Original: Squall:(...Sounds plausible.)
Dialogue: (...Sounds plausible.)
trans: （……听起来很有道理。）

Original: Laguna:Whatever happened, we don't remember any of it.
Dialogue: Whatever happened, we don't remember any of it.
trans: 不管发生了什么，我们都不记得了。

Original: Mog:That's right. And even I don't know what happened to your memories, kupo.
Dialogue: That's right. And even I don't know what happened to your memories, kupo.
trans: 这是正确的。

Original: Thancred:If we all chose to forget, I'm okay with not remembering.
Dialogue: If we all chose to forget, I'm okay with not remembering.
trans: 如果我们都选择忘记，我可以不记得。

Original: Layle:Yeah, I suppose you're right.
Dialogue: Yeah, I suppose you're right.
trans: 是的，我想你是对的。

Original: Terra:But there are some of us who are worried. We need to do something.
Dialogue: But there are some of us who are worried. We need to do something.
trans: 但我们中有些人很担心。

Original: Papalymo:You'll simply need to trust the choice made by your past self.
Dialogue: You'll simply need to trust the choice made by your past self.
trans: 你只需要相信过去的自己所做的选择。

Original: Laguna:I can't remember at all if it was something done to us or something we did to ourselves!
Dialogue: I can't remember at all if it was something done to us or something we did to ourselves!
trans: 我完全不记得这是对我们做了什么，还是我们对自己做了什么！

Original: Layle:Yeah... In the meantime, let's tell everyone the happier version of what could've happened.
Dialogue: Yeah... In the meantime, let's tell everyone the happier version of what could've happened.
trans: 是的...与此同时，让我们告诉大家可能发生的事情的更快乐的版本。

Original: Jecht:Did ya hear? There's a chance we forced ourselves to go back in time some odd years when we came to this world.
Dialogue: Did ya hear? There's a chance we forced ourselves to go back in time some odd years when we came to this world.
trans: 你听到了吗？

Original: Galuf:Hmm, I still feel as old as ever... Why didn't I get any younger?
Dialogue: Hmm, I still feel as old as ever... Why didn't I get any younger?
trans: 嗯，我还是觉得我老了……为什么我没有变年轻？

Original: Jecht:It's just one of the theories. 'Sides, weren't you that age when you met Bartz and the others?
Dialogue: It's just one of the theories. 'Sides, weren't you that age when you met Bartz and the others?
trans: 这只是其中一种理论。

Original: Galuf:I must have chosen experience over youth. I wonder what those who chose youth were thinking.
Dialogue: I must have chosen experience over youth. I wonder what those who chose youth were thinking.
trans: 我一定是选择了经验而不是青春。

Original: Ace:People need to forget the past to move forward. Maybe that's exactly what we did to go on.
Dialogue: People need to forget the past to move forward. Maybe that's exactly what we did to go on.
trans: 人们需要忘记过去才能向前迈进。

Original: Jecht:Pretty stoic for a kid.
Dialogue: Pretty stoic for a kid.
trans: 对孩子来说相当坚忍。

Original: Serah:Then was it my decision to come here as the Serah who can fight, instead of the one too scared to do anything?
Dialogue: Then was it my decision to come here as the Serah who can fight, instead of the one too scared to do anything?
trans: 那么是不是我决定以能战斗的Serah的身份来到这里，而不是什么都不敢做的人？

Original: Jecht:Of course! Anyone who wants to save family would've done the same.
Dialogue: Of course! Anyone who wants to save family would've done the same.
trans: 当然！

Original: Galuf:You know what the future holds in store for Lightning and Hope, and yet you haven't told them.
Dialogue: You know what the future holds in store for Lightning and Hope, and yet you haven't told them.
trans: 你知道闪电和希望的未来会怎样，但你还没有告诉他们。

Original: Serah:Yeah... I want to, but I don't think they should know.
Dialogue: Yeah... I want to, but I don't think they should know.
trans: 是的……我想，但我认为他们不应该知道。

Original: Ace:Is that because they might change the future? Or destroy other possibilities?
Dialogue: Is that because they might change the future? Or destroy other possibilities?
trans: 那是因为他们可能会改变未来吗？

Original: Serah:There's that, but mostly because if it's something they chose, they need to get there on their own.
Dialogue: There's that, but mostly because if it's something they chose, they need to get there on their own.
trans: 就是这样，但主要是因为如果这是他们选择的东西，他们需要自己到达那里。

Original: Serah:I know it's unsettling to see a completely different me, but still...
Dialogue: I know it's unsettling to see a completely different me, but still...
trans: 我知道看到一个完全不同的我会令人不安，但仍然...

Original: Ace:It might be an enemy trick done to us for all we know. There's no point thinking about it.
Dialogue: It might be an enemy trick done to us for all we know. There's no point thinking about it.
trans: 据我们所知，这可能是敌人对我们的诡计。

Original: Warrior of Light:Did we choose this for ourselves, or was it chosen for us?
Dialogue: Did we choose this for ourselves, or was it chosen for us?
trans: 这是我们为自己选择的，还是为我们选择的？

Original: Cecil:I remember you said you don't recall anything other than fighting Garland.
Dialogue: I remember you said you don't recall anything other than fighting Garland.
trans: 我记得你说你除了和加兰德打架什么都不记得了。

Original: Warrior of Light:When I lost, I sense I lost much more than just the battle.
Dialogue: When I lost, I sense I lost much more than just the battle.
trans: 当我失败时，我觉得我失去的不仅仅是战斗。

Original: Warrior of Light:I may have also lost precious memories.
Dialogue: I may have also lost precious memories.
trans: 我可能也失去了宝贵的记忆。

Original: Cecil:I need to get it back. And it's something I need to do myself.
Dialogue: I need to get it back. And it's something I need to do myself.
trans: 我需要把它拿回来。

Original: Warrior of Light:If we used our willpower to lose our memories and experiences, or even if we had them stolen...
Dialogue: If we used our willpower to lose our memories and experiences, or even if we had them stolen...
trans: 如果我们用我们的意志力失去我们的记忆和经验，或者即使我们把它们偷走了......

Original: Warrior of Light:We should be able to get them back with that same willpower.
Dialogue: We should be able to get them back with that same willpower.
trans: 我们应该能够以同样的意志力让他们回来。

Original: Cecil:I wonder... Will I be able to get back this light that I lost by protecting this world?
Dialogue: I wonder... Will I be able to get back this light that I lost by protecting this world?
trans: 我在想……为了守护这个世界，失去的光能取回吗？

Original: Warrior of Light:Let us believe as we go forth. We may lack our memories, but we still have our allies and our ability to fight.
Dialogue: Let us believe as we go forth. We may lack our memories, but we still have our allies and our ability to fight.
trans: 让我们在前进时相信。

Original: Cecil:You're right.
Dialogue: You're right.
trans: 你说得对。

Original: Vayne:So, the center of the world lies just ahead.
Dialogue: So, the center of the world lies just ahead.
trans: 所以，世界的中心就在前方。

Original: Vaan:You were waiting to ambush us!
Dialogue: You were waiting to ambush us!
trans: 你等着伏击我们！

Original: Garland:You knew it would come to this.
Dialogue: You knew it would come to this.
trans: 你知道它会变成这样。

Original: Vayne:Indeed. I never expected the road to open without some dirt on my hands.
Dialogue: Indeed. I never expected the road to open without some dirt on my hands.
trans: 的确。

Original: Cait Sith:I dinnae like the sound of that. Just what are you planning to do?
Dialogue: I dinnae like the sound of that. Just what are you planning to do?
trans: 我非常喜欢它的声音。

Original: Vayne:You came to protect the crystal core and the world. I have no such desire.
Dialogue: You came to protect the crystal core and the world. I have no such desire.
trans: 你是来保护晶核和世界的。

Original: Vaan:Why does he know about the core!? What did you tell him!?
Dialogue: Why does he know about the core!? What did you tell him!?
trans: 为什么他会知道核心！？

Original: Cloud:Calm down. Cait Sith gave us information on him, too.
Dialogue: Calm down. Cait Sith gave us information on him, too.
trans: 冷静下来。

Original: Vayne:That arrangement also ends here.
Dialogue: That arrangement also ends here.
trans: 这种安排也到此结束。

Original: Cait Sith:You got that right!
Dialogue: You got that right!
trans: 你说对了！

Original: Cloud:Cait Sith, tell us later about everything you learned from this guy.
Dialogue: Cait Sith, tell us later about everything you learned from this guy.
trans: Cait Sith，稍后告诉我们你从这个人那里学到的一切。

Original: Warrior of Light:Will you continue to fight with us?
Dialogue: Will you continue to fight with us?
trans: 你会继续和我们一起战斗吗？

Original: Cait Sith:Certainly! I dinnae particularly care for reckless measures like destroying worlds.
Dialogue: Certainly! I dinnae particularly care for reckless measures like destroying worlds.
trans: 当然！

Original: Vayne:"Reckless"? I would say "reasonable."
Dialogue: "Reckless"? I would say "reasonable."
trans: “鲁莽”？

Original: Vaan:It doesn't matter. Why do you want to destroy this world anyway!?
Dialogue: It doesn't matter. Why do you want to destroy this world anyway!?
trans: 没关系。

Original: Vayne:Think rationally if you wish to save Ivalice.
Dialogue: Think rationally if you wish to save Ivalice.
trans: 如果你想拯救伊瓦利斯，请理性思考。

Original: Warrior of Light:What will happen to us and the gods if this world is destroyed?
Dialogue: What will happen to us and the gods if this world is destroyed?
trans: 如果这个世界被毁灭，我们和众神会怎样？

Original: Vayne:That is none of my concern.
Dialogue: That is none of my concern.
trans: 那不关我的事。

Original: Garland:This man does not care if the warriors who walk this earth are annihilated along with the world's destruction.
Dialogue: This man does not care if the warriors who walk this earth are annihilated along with the world's destruction.
trans: 这个男人不在乎行走在这个地球上的勇士们是否会随着世界的毁灭而消失。

Original: Cloud:That's your idea of "reasonable"? Putting a price on the lives of others?
Dialogue: That's your idea of "reasonable"? Putting a price on the lives of others?
trans: 这就是你所说的“合理”？

Original: Warrior of Light:You'll save nothing that way! These warriors have people waiting for them to come home, too!
Dialogue: You'll save nothing that way! These warriors have people waiting for them to come home, too!
trans: 那样你将一无所获！

Original: Garland:Hmph. At last the sword is drawn.
Dialogue: Hmph. At last the sword is drawn.
trans: 哼。

Original: Cloud:Let's say I don't like your way of doing things either.
Dialogue: Let's say I don't like your way of doing things either.
trans: 假设我也不喜欢你做事的方式。

Original: Warrior of Light:There may...must be a way to protect both those here and the peoples in worlds we came from.
Dialogue: There may...must be a way to protect both those here and the peoples in worlds we came from.
trans: 可能……一定有办法保护这里的人和我们来自的世界的人民。

Original: Warrior of Light:I refuse to give up, no matter how small the spark of hope may be!
Dialogue: I refuse to give up, no matter how small the spark of hope may be!
trans: 我拒绝放弃，不管希望的火花多么渺茫！

Original: Garland:So that's how your light shines, I see.
Dialogue: So that's how your light shines, I see.
trans: 这就是你的光芒闪耀的方式，我明白了。

Original: Garland:At last, a warrior worthy of my blade. Vayne, we fight together.
Dialogue: At last, a warrior worthy of my blade. Vayne, we fight together.
trans: 终于，一个配得上我的剑的战士了。

Original: Vayne:If we must. ...To arms!
Dialogue: If we must. ...To arms!
trans: 如果我们必须。

Original: Vaan:We won't let you get away with this!
Dialogue: We won't let you get away with this!
trans: 我们不会让你得逞的！

Original: Garland:Come! Show me the light you harbor!
Dialogue: Come! Show me the light you harbor!
trans: 来！

Original: Vayne:If I am in error, then you had best set me straight.
Dialogue: If I am in error, then you had best set me straight.
trans: 如果我错了，那么你最好纠正我。

Original: Vaan:You bet we will! We all feel the same!
Dialogue: You bet we will! We all feel the same!
trans: 你打赌我们会的！

Original: Warrior of Light:Verily, we shall not bend!
Dialogue: Verily, we shall not bend!
trans: 真的，我们不会屈服！

Original: Mog:The core is here, kupo, in the Crystal Chamber.
Dialogue: The core is here, kupo, in the Crystal Chamber.
trans: 核心就在这里，kupo，在水晶室里。

Original: Warrior of Light:The crystal core... The foundation of the world...
Dialogue: The crystal core... The foundation of the world...
trans: 晶核……世界的根基……

Original: Onion Knight:I don't know why, but this place feels familiar.
Dialogue: I don't know why, but this place feels familiar.
trans: 不知道为什么，这个地方感觉很熟悉。

Original: Edgar:Is there something similar in your world?
Dialogue: Is there something similar in your world?
trans: 你的世界里有类似的东西吗？

Original: Bartz:There was in mine. Well, kind of.
Dialogue: There was in mine. Well, kind of.
trans: 有在我的。

Original: Bartz:I get the same warm feeling in here like the place back home.
Dialogue: I get the same warm feeling in here like the place back home.
trans: 我在这里得到了和家乡一样温暖的感觉。

Original: Lightning:I don't have fond memories of crystal, but...
Dialogue: I don't have fond memories of crystal, but...
trans: 我对水晶没有美好的回忆，但是...

Original: Lightning:As you say, this place feels familiar. ...It's strange.
Dialogue: As you say, this place feels familiar. ...It's strange.
trans: 正如你所说，这个地方感觉很熟悉。

Original: Onion Knight:The core is the center of this worlda world created based on all of our homes.
Dialogue: The core is the center of this world—a world created based on all of our homes.
trans: 核心是这个世界的中心——一个基于我们所有家园而创造的世界。

Original: Tidus:Is that why it feels like we've been here before?
Dialogue: Is that why it feels like we've been here before?
trans: 这就是为什么感觉我们以前来过这里吗？

Original: Warrior of Light:Do not let your guard down. I feel a presence. Once with untempered will.
Dialogue: Do not let your guard down. I feel a presence. Once with untempered will.
trans: 不要放松警惕。

Original: Tidus:Then come on! We'll find 'em and show 'em what we got!
Dialogue: Then come on! We'll find 'em and show 'em what we got!
trans: 那就来吧！

Original: Edgar:Right. Then we might be able to save our own worlds.
Dialogue: Right. Then we might be able to save our own worlds.
trans: 正确的。

Original: Onion Knight:...I know we haven't done anything yet, but seeing the light here gives me hope.
Dialogue: ...I know we haven't done anything yet, but seeing the light here gives me hope.
trans: ...我知道我们还没有做任何事情，但是看到这里的光给了我希望。

Original: Warrior of Light:Come! Let's fight together.
Dialogue: Come! Let's fight together.
trans: 来！

Original: Tidus:"The light is with us!"
Dialogue: "The light is with us!"
trans: “光与我们同在！”

Original: Exdeath:Mwa ha ha... Devourer... Open the Rift that all may return to theVoid.
Dialogue: Mwa ha ha... Devourer... Open the Rift that all may return to the Void.
trans: Mwa ha ha... Devourer... 打开裂隙，所有人都可以返回虚空。

Original: Kefka:Hiding something so delicious from us! Oooh, what naughty gods.
Dialogue: Hiding something so delicious from us! Oooh, what naughty gods.
trans: 向我们隐藏了如此美味的东西！

Original: Cloud of Darkness:Where the balance is disrupted, that is where we exist.
Dialogue: Where the balance is disrupted, that is where we exist.
trans: 平衡被打破的地方，就是我们存在的地方。

Original: Spiritus:You think you are any different?
Dialogue: You think you are any different?
trans: 你觉得你有什么不同吗？

Original: Vayne:I answer to no god. I am ruled by no one.
Dialogue: I answer to no god. I am ruled by no one.
trans: 我不回答上帝。

Original: Spiritus:Then show me as you go against the order of this world.
Dialogue: Then show me as you go against the order of this world.
trans: 然后告诉我你违背这个世界的秩序。

Original: Vayne:Spiritus, why do you stand by as they destroy your creation?
Dialogue: Spiritus, why do you stand by as they destroy your creation?
trans: Spiritus，当他们摧毁你的造物时，你为什么袖手旁观？

Original: Vayne:If you had a duty to protect your world, you would not have summoned those with minds of destruction.
Dialogue: If you had a duty to protect your world, you would not have summoned those with minds of destruction.
trans: 如果你有责任保护你的世界，你就不会召唤那些有破坏思想的人。

Original: Spiritus:This is not "my world."
Dialogue: This is not "my world."
trans: 这不是“我的世界”。

Original: Spiritus:Mine is another world, one of unending strife. That is what maintains my realm.
Dialogue: Mine is another world, one of unending strife. That is what maintains my realm.
trans: 我的是另一个世界，一个无休止的冲突世界。

Original: Spiritus:This world was to be a place of respite for those warriors. Or so it was made to appear...
Dialogue: This world was to be a place of respite for those warriors. Or so it was made to appear...
trans: 这个世界将成为那些战士的喘息之所。

Original: Spiritus:If those warriors wish to continue their battles here, so be it.
Dialogue: If those warriors wish to continue their battles here, so be it.
trans: 如果那些战士想在这里继续他们的战斗，那就去吧。

Original: Vayne:Another world? Made to appear?
Dialogue: Another world? Made to appear?
trans: 另一个世界？

Original: Spiritus:A parallel world in which warriors fight endlessly of their own volition. This world is merely its counterbalance.
Dialogue: A parallel world in which warriors fight endlessly of their own volition. This world is merely its counterbalance.
trans: 战士们凭着自己的意志不断战斗的平行世界。

Original: Vayne:I have a home to return to! As does the urchin and all the others! Who do you think you are!?
Dialogue: I have a home to return to! As does the urchin and all the others! Who do you think you are!?
trans: 我有一个家可以回去！

Original: Spiritus:What are you going to do?
Dialogue: What are you going to do?
trans: 你会怎样做？

Original: Vayne:I will destroy this world.
Dialogue: I will destroy this world.
trans: 我要毁灭这个世界。

Original: Vayne:And then I will destroy everything. I will take back my life with my own hands.
Dialogue: And then I will destroy everything. I will take back my life with my own hands.
trans: 然后我会摧毁一切。

Original: Spiritus:Hmph... You cry for justice and in the end follow the order of this world.
Dialogue: Hmph... You cry for justice and in the end follow the order of this world.
trans: 哼……你为正义呐喊，到头来还是顺从了这个世界的秩序。

Original: Spiritus:Fight, my warrior. And feed my world!
Dialogue: Fight, my warrior. And feed my world!
trans: 战斗吧，我的战士。

Original: Mog:Look! There's something by the core, kupo!
Dialogue: Look! There's something by the core, kupo!
trans: 看！

Original: Firion:It's...latched onto the crystal? It's absorbing its light!
Dialogue: It's...latched onto the crystal? It's absorbing its light!
trans: 它……锁在水晶上？

Original: Vaan:So all we need to do is peel it off!
Dialogue: So all we need to do is peel it off!
trans: 所以我们需要做的就是把它剥下来！

Original: Cecil:Vaan! Who else is here!?
Dialogue: Vaan! Who else is here!?
trans: 梵！

Original: Kefka:He he he! The planesgorger is enjoying his meal.
Dialogue: He he he! The planesgorger is enjoying his meal.
trans: 嘿嘿嘿！

Original: Firion:Planesgorger!? Explain yourelf!
Dialogue: Planesgorger!? Explain yourelf!
trans: 飞机吞噬者！？

Original: Ultimecia:This one is but an infant... Planesgorgers devour everything...
Dialogue: This one is but an infant... Planesgorgers devour everything...
trans: 这只是一个婴儿……位面吞噬者吞噬一切……

Original: Ultimecia:They devour light and power, and once full, they await to hatch.
Dialogue: They devour light and power, and once full, they await to hatch.
trans: 它们吞噬光和能量，一旦充满，它们就等待孵化。

Original: Mog:An infant, kupo...!? How did that make its way in here!?
Dialogue: An infant, kupo...!? How did that make its way in here!?
trans: 婴儿，库波……！？

Original: Ultimecia:The new larvae gathered using the power of the Blackened Will as a guide...
Dialogue: The new larvae gathered using the power of the Blackened Will as a guide...
trans: 以黑化意志的力量为向导聚集的新幼虫……

Original: Exdeath:The planesgorgers wish to grow and devour the world! And give birth to nothingness!
Dialogue: The planesgorgers wish to grow and devour the world! And give birth to nothingness!
trans: 位面吞噬者希望扩张并吞噬世界！

Original: Mog:Kupo... This is all my fault, kupo...
Dialogue: Kupo... This is all my fault, kupo...
trans: 库波……都是我的错，库波……

Original: Vaan:Don't say that! Let's just focus on defeating that thing, 'kay?
Dialogue: Don't say that! Let's just focus on defeating that thing, 'kay?
trans: 别这么说！

Original: Kefka:Boooring! This crystal is on a one-way trip to roughed up one side and back down the other!
Dialogue: Boooring! This crystal is on a one-way trip to roughed up one side and back down the other!
trans: 嘘！

Original: Kefka:Oh, in case you didn't know, the Blackened Will was also an itty-bitty teeny-weeny part of a planesgorger♪
Dialogue: Oh, in case you didn't know, the Blackened Will was also an itty-bitty teeny-weeny part of a planesgorger♪
trans: 哦，如果你不知道的话，Blackened Will 也是位面吞噬者的一个小部件♪

Original: Exdeath:It used the moogle to consume the energy it needed to mature.
Dialogue: It used the moogle to consume the energy it needed to mature.
trans: 它用莫古利消耗成熟所需的能量。

Original: Exdeath:There must have been a problem with the host. That it would hatch in that form was unexpected.
Dialogue: There must have been a problem with the host. That it would hatch in that form was unexpected.
trans: 肯定是楼主有问题。

Original: Mog:A planesgorger was in me, kupo...?
Dialogue: A planesgorger was in me, kupo...?
trans: 一个位面吞噬者在我体内，库波……？

Original: Exdeath:But thanks to you, moogle, its larvae made its way to this world. I applaud you.
Dialogue: But thanks to you, moogle, its larvae made its way to this world. I applaud you.
trans: 但是多亏了你，moogle，它的幼虫才来到这个世界。

Original: Exdeath:It is only a matter of time until this world becomes as the Void!
Dialogue: It is only a matter of time until this world becomes as the Void!
trans: 这个世界成为虚空只是时间问题！

Original: Firion:Shut up! We're not going to let that happen!
Dialogue: Shut up! We're not going to let that happen!
trans: 住口！

Original: Vaan:You think we're gonna stand around while that thing gets bigger and eats our worlds? Not a chance!
Dialogue: You think we're gonna stand around while that thing gets bigger and eats our worlds? Not a chance!
trans: 你认为我们会在那个东西变大吞噬我们的世界时袖手旁观吗？

Original: Vayne:We can resolve this from our respective worlds.
Dialogue: We can resolve this from our respective worlds.
trans: 我们可以从我们各自的世界来解决这个问题。

Original: Vaan:Who asked you?
Dialogue: Who asked you?
trans: 谁问你的？

Original: Vayne:I have no desire to be a tool for these gods. Once the crystal is destroyed, we will be free.
Dialogue: I have no desire to be a tool for these gods. Once the crystal is destroyed, we will be free.
trans: 我不想成为这些神的工具。

Original: Cecil:Hold! The crystal won't last much longer!
Dialogue: Hold! The crystal won't last much longer!
trans: 抓住！

Original: Firion:We can make a break for it!
Dialogue: We can make a break for it!
trans: 我们可以为此休息一下！

Original: Vaan:Stay outta our way!
Dialogue: Stay outta our way!
trans: 别挡路！

Original: Mog:It's cracking, kupo...!!
Dialogue: It's cracking, kupo...!!
trans: 它开裂了，kupo...!!

Original: Cecil:No... What'll happen to this world now?
Dialogue: No... What'll happen to this world now?
trans: 不……这个世界现在会发生什么？

Original: Kefka:I'd be more worried about what's going to happen to me if I were you-hoo.
Dialogue: I'd be more worried about what's going to happen to me if I were you-hoo.
trans: 如果我是你，我会更担心我会发生什么。

Original: Mog:Th-the planesgorger's coming this way, kupo!
Dialogue: Th-the planesgorger's coming this way, kupo!
trans: 吞-位面吞食者正朝这边过来，库波！

Original: Firion:Don't take your eyes off the beast! We need to fight it!
Dialogue: Don't take your eyes off the beast! We need to fight it!
trans: 不要把你的眼睛从野兽身上移开！

Original: Mog:It may be little, but it's a planesgorger, kupo!
Dialogue: It may be little, but it's a planesgorger, kupo!
trans: 它可能很小，但它是位面吞噬者，库波！

Original: Mog:It's gotten tremendous power from the crystal, kupo!
Dialogue: It's gotten tremendous power from the crystal, kupo!
trans: 它从水晶中获得了巨大的力量，库珀！

Original: Mog:It can use the crystal's power to absorb some elemental attacks, kupo! Watch out!
Dialogue: It can use the crystal's power to absorb some elemental attacks, kupo! Watch out!
trans: 它可以利用水晶的力量吸收一些元素攻击，库珀！

Original: Firion:Even so, we've got to fight!
Dialogue: Even so, we've got to fight!
trans: 即便如此，我们也要战斗！

Original: Cecil:Indeed, we mustn't allow it to devour this world!
Dialogue: Indeed, we mustn't allow it to devour this world!
trans: 的确，不能让它吞噬这个世界！

Original: Yuri:We defeated it...but what about the crystal core?
Dialogue: We defeated it...but what about the crystal core?
trans: 我们打败了它……但是晶核呢？

Original: Y'shtola:...It shattered.
Dialogue: ...It shattered.
trans: ……它碎了。

Original: Warrior of Light:What is this light? ...It's brilliant...and full of...
Dialogue: What is this light? ...It's brilliant...and full of...
trans: 这是什么光？

Original: Warrior of Light:...The things I've lost.
Dialogue: ...The things I've lost.
trans: ……我丢失的东西。

Original: Chelinka:Your memories? Have they returned?
Dialogue: Your memories? Have they returned?
trans: 你的回忆？

Original: Warrior of Light:No, but I sense...something.
Dialogue: No, but I sense...something.
trans: 不，但我感觉到……某种东西。

Original: Squall:Now? Really?
Dialogue: Now? Really?
trans: 现在？

Original: Warrior of Light:Has the world's destruction begun!?
Dialogue: Has the world's destruction begun!?
trans: 世界的毁灭开始了吗！？

Original: Y'shtola:The world's foundation is ruined... ...Is this where it ends for us?
Dialogue: The world's foundation is ruined... ...Is this where it ends for us?
trans: 世界的根基被毁了…………这就是我们的结局吗？

Original: Materia:No. It is not the end of everything.
Dialogue: No. It is not the end of everything.
trans: 不，这不是一切的结束。

Original: Materia:...There is still time.
Dialogue: ...There is still time.
trans: ...还有时间。

Original: Yuri:It stopped! Did you do this?
Dialogue: It stopped! Did you do this?
trans: 停了！

Original: Materia:No. The core of darkness has sensed a shift in balance.
Dialogue: No. The core of darkness has sensed a shift in balance.
trans: 不，黑暗之心感觉到了平衡的转变。

Original: Y'shtola:...This is news. There is more than one core?
Dialogue: ...This is news. There is more than one core?
trans: ……这是新闻。

Original: Materia:The pillar of this world is created from a crystal of light and a crystal of darkness.
Dialogue: The pillar of this world is created from a crystal of light and a crystal of darkness.
trans: 这个世界的支柱是由光明的水晶和黑暗的水晶创造的。

Original: Materia:You have been traveling through the planes of that of light.
Dialogue: You have been traveling through the planes of that of light.
trans: 你一直在穿越光的位面。

Original: Onion Knight:Where there's light, there's darkness... Does that mean the darkness has become stronger?
Dialogue: Where there's light, there's darkness... Does that mean the darkness has become stronger?
trans: 有光的地方，就有黑暗……那是不是代表黑暗变强了？

Original: Materia:Only temporarily. The crystal core of darkness is sustaining the world for now.
Dialogue: Only temporarily. The crystal core of darkness is sustaining the world for now.
trans: 只是暂时的。

Original: Materia:But without both cores, the world will inevitably collapse.
Dialogue: But without both cores, the world will inevitably collapse.
trans: 但如果没有两个核心，世界将不可避免地崩溃。

Original: Chelinka:Um, is there anything we can do? I know this crystal has shattered...
Dialogue: Um, is there anything we can do? I know this crystal has shattered...
trans: 嗯，有什么我们可以做的吗？

Original: Materia:There is hope.
Dialogue: There is hope.
trans: 还有希望。

Original: Materia:That shining power you picked up...
Dialogue: That shining power you picked up...
trans: 你拾起的那闪耀的力量...

Original: Warrior of Light:The part of the crystal I absorbed?
Dialogue: The part of the crystal I absorbed?
trans: 我吸收的那部分水晶？

Original: Materia:You can all do the same.
Dialogue: You can all do the same.
trans: 你们都可以这样做。

Original: Materia:And when countless warriors have acquired that brilliance...
Dialogue: And when countless warriors have acquired that brilliance...
trans: 而当无数武者都获得了那种光彩……

Original: Materia:The crystal core of light may be revived.
Dialogue: The crystal core of light may be revived.
trans: 光之晶核或许可以复活。

Original: Y'shtola:None of the pieces here are as brilliant. The others must have been cast outside this realm.
Dialogue: None of the pieces here are as brilliant. The others must have been cast outside this realm.
trans: 这里的作品都没有那么精彩。

Original: Squall:The planes ruled by the dark crystal core. Our next goal.
Dialogue: The planes ruled by the dark crystal core. Our next goal.
trans: 由黑暗水晶核心统治的位面。

Original: Materia:It will be an arduous journey. However, the light will give you new power.
Dialogue: It will be an arduous journey. However, the light will give you new power.
trans: 这将是一段艰苦的旅程。

Original: Squall:What about the warriors of Spiritus? They seemed to want the world destroyed.
Dialogue: What about the warriors of Spiritus? They seemed to want the world destroyed.
trans: Spiritus 的战士呢？

Original: Materia:They must now seek the dark crystal core head for its world. They may even have already gained pieces of light.
Dialogue: They must now seek the dark crystal core head for its world. They may even have already gained pieces of light.
trans: 他们现在必须为它的世界寻找暗晶核头。

Original: Onion Knight:Way to stack the odds.
Dialogue: Way to stack the odds.
trans: 增加赔率的方法。

Original: Squall:We have no choice. You have a rival to worry about, too, right?
Dialogue: We have no choice. You have a rival to worry about, too, right?
trans: 我们别无选择。

Original: Onion Knight:Right. ...When the balance between light and darkness crumbles, that's when it appears.
Dialogue: Right. ...When the balance between light and darkness crumbles, that's when it appears.
trans: 正确的。

Original: Materia:Spirit moogle, can you guide these warriors?
Dialogue: Spirit moogle, can you guide these warriors?
trans: Spirit moogle，你能引导这些战士吗？

Original: Mog:Of course! I'll do my best, kupo!
Dialogue: Of course! I'll do my best, kupo!
trans: 当然！

Original: Mog:I'd like to borrow your power to get there, kupo.
Dialogue: I'd like to borrow your power to get there, kupo.
trans: 我想借用你的力量到达那里，kupo。

Original: Materia:Very well. Now go, my warriors. ...Protect this land.
Dialogue: Very well. Now go, my warriors. ...Protect this land.
trans: 很好。

Original: Warrior of Light:The light is with us. Let us come together for our friends, for our homes!
Dialogue: The light is with us. Let us come together for our friends, for our homes!
trans: 光与我们同在。

Original: Kuja:Heading off to another battle?
Dialogue: Heading off to another battle?
trans: 前往另一场战斗？

Original: Kuja:You're so predictable. Always searching for conflict and war.
Dialogue: You're so predictable. Always searching for conflict and war.
trans: 你太有预见性了

Original: Garland:And you? What keeps you going?
Dialogue: And you? What keeps you going?
trans: 你呢？

Original: Garland:This world was created not for war, but for respite. Absurd.
Dialogue: This world was created not for war, but for respite. Absurd.
trans: 创造这个世界不是为了战争，而是为了喘息。

Original: Garland:There is no meaning to a life devoid of struggle.
Dialogue: There is no meaning to a life devoid of struggle.
trans: 没有奋斗的人生是没有意义的。

Original: Kuja:So that's why you're sowing the seeds of battle?
Dialogue: So that's why you're sowing the seeds of battle?
trans: 所以这就是你播下战争种子的原因？

Original: Kuja:You stole his memories, didn't you?
Dialogue: You stole his memories, didn't you?
trans: 你偷走了他的记忆，是吗？

Original: Garland:Hmph. They are too pure for this world.
Dialogue: Hmph. They are too pure for this world.
trans: 哼。

Original: Warrior of Light:I have allies from other worlds who fought with me by order of the gods.
Dialogue: I have allies from other worlds who fought with me by order of the gods.
trans: 我有来自其他世界的盟友，他们奉神的命令与我并肩作战。

Original: Warrior of Light:They can finally rest their weary bodies. I refuse to allow you to take that from them!
Dialogue: They can finally rest their weary bodies. I refuse to allow you to take that from them!
trans: 他们终于可以让疲惫的身体得到休息。

Original: Garland:Weakling. You know nothing of this world's order.
Dialogue: Weakling. You know nothing of this world's order.
trans: 弱者。

Original: Garland:Every world has its reason.
Dialogue: Every world has its reason.
trans: 每个世界都有它的道理。

Original: Garland:You cling to the light without knowing why. You are no warrior!
Dialogue: You cling to the light without knowing why. You are no warrior!
trans: 你不明所以地执着于光。

Original: Garland:A brief moment of respite awaits you and your amnesiac allies through death!
Dialogue: A brief moment of respite awaits you and your amnesiac allies through death!
trans: 短暂的喘息时刻等待着你和你的失忆症盟友通过死亡！

Original: Warrior of Light:No! I will protect them!
Dialogue: No! I will protect them!
trans: 不！

Original: Warrior of Light:Nnh...!
Dialogue: Nnh...!

Original: Garland:Death will come for you time and time again, while I survive in eternity...
Dialogue: Death will come for you time and time again, while I survive in eternity...
trans: 死亡会一次又一次地为你降临，而我却活在永恒中……

Original: Garland:Let the will of light disappear!
Dialogue: Let the will of light disappear!
trans: 让光之意志消失！

Original: Kuja:But he found another way. He fought alongside his allies, and at times found ways to defeat us...
Dialogue: But he found another way. He fought alongside his allies, and at times found ways to defeat us...
trans: 但他找到了另一种方法。

Original: Kuja:I presume that brings you joy, yes?
Dialogue: I presume that brings you joy, yes?
trans: 我想这会给你带来快乐，是吗？

Original: Kuja:As the planesgorger's existence means neverending strife.
Dialogue: As the planesgorger's existence means neverending strife.
trans: 因为位面吞噬者的存在意味着永无休止的冲突。

Original: Garland:If you have such time to observe others, it's time you observed your own avarice.
Dialogue: If you have such time to observe others, it's time you observed your own avarice.
trans: 如果你有时间观察别人，那么该是你观察自己贪婪的时候了。

Original: Garland:Have you thought of why they let us live? Or how we choose to live?
Dialogue: Have you thought of why they let us live? Or how we choose to live?
trans: 你有没有想过他们为什么让我们活着？

Original: Garland:Or shall the great Garland educate you?
Dialogue: Or shall the great Garland educate you?
trans: 或者伟大的加兰会教育你吗？

Original: ???:...There is no worthy history here.
Dialogue: ...There is no worthy history here.
trans: ...这里没有有价值的历史。

Original: ???:What do you think of this world?
Dialogue: What do you think of this world?
trans: 你觉得这个世界怎么样？

Original: ???:A world in which the eats and faults of the dead disappear into chaos.
Dialogue: A world in which the eats and faults of the dead disappear into chaos.
trans: 一个死者的食物和错误消失在混乱中的世界。

Original: ???:I was...once.
Dialogue: I was...once.
trans: 我是……曾经。

Original: ???:"Was"? Once you're a l'Cie, there's no going back.
Dialogue: "Was"? Once you're a l'Cie, there's no going back.
trans: “曾是”？

Original: ???:It bears the same name, but differs in your world and mine.
Dialogue: It bears the same name, but differs in your world and mine.
trans: 它具有相同的名称，但在你我的世界中有所不同。

Original: ???:Seven, is it? You possess a heightened soul.
Dialogue: Seven, is it? You possess a heightened soul.
trans: 七，是吗？

Original: Seven:How do you know my name? Who are you? Where are we?
Dialogue: How do you know my name? Who are you? Where are we?
trans: 你怎么知道我的名字？

Original: Caius:I am Caius Ballad, protector of history.
Dialogue: I am Caius Ballad, protector of history.
trans: 我是凯厄斯巴拉德，历史的守护者。

Original: Caius:But in this world without history, I am but a warrior.
Dialogue: But in this world without history, I am but a warrior.
trans: 但在这个没有历史的世界里，我只是一个战士。

Original: Seven:That goddess, Materia, told me my friends were here.
Dialogue: That goddess, Materia, told me my friends were here.
trans: 那个女神，玛泰利亚，告诉我我的朋友们在这里。

Original: Seven:Have you seen them? They have uniforms like mine.
Dialogue: Have you seen them? They have uniforms like mine.
trans: 你见过他们吗？

Original: Seven:Apparently they're working with people from other worlds, like you.
Dialogue: Apparently they're working with people from other worlds, like you.
trans: 显然他们正在与来自其他世界的人一起工作，比如你。

Original: Caius:You must begin your journey.
Dialogue: You must begin your journey.
trans: 你必须开始你的旅程。

Original: Caius:Seek the knight they call Lightning, and you will find your friends.
Dialogue: Seek the knight they call Lightning, and you will find your friends.
trans: 寻找他们称之为闪电的骑士，你会找到你的朋友。

Original: Caius:...We will meet again at the appointed time.
Dialogue: ...We will meet again at the appointed time.
trans: ……我们会在约定的时间再见面的。

Original: Seven:Wait, but
Dialogue: Wait, but—
trans: 等等，但是——

Original: Caius:The goddess's knight remembers nothing of her duty.
Dialogue: The goddess's knight remembers nothing of her duty.
trans: 女神的骑士完全不记得她的职责。

Original: Caius:...Forgive me.
Dialogue: ...Forgive me.
trans: ...对不起。

Original: Rem:*cough cough*
Dialogue: *cough cough*
trans: *咳嗽*

Original: Garnet:Are you alright?
Dialogue: Are you alright?
trans: 你还好吗？

Original: Rem:Yes, thank you. The darkness must not agree with me...or something. Haha...
Dialogue: Yes, thank you. The darkness must not agree with me...or something. Haha...
trans: 是的，谢谢。

Original: Rem:(I'd been feeling so well lately, too...)
Dialogue: (I'd been feeling so well lately, too...)
trans: （我最近也感觉很好……）

Original: Garnet:Whoa! What was that!?
Dialogue: Whoa! What was that!?
trans: 哇！

Original: Mog:The sky is falling, kupo!
Dialogue: The sky is falling, kupo!
trans: 天塌下来了，库珀！

Original: Ashe:What about the ship? Can it fly?
Dialogue: What about the ship? Can it fly?
trans: 船呢？

Original: Sazh:No luck! Nothing's responding!
Dialogue: No luck! Nothing's responding!
trans: 没有运气！

Original: Setzer:There's a crack in the tail! We need to put her down, Sazh!
Dialogue: There's a crack in the tail! We need to put her down, Sazh!
trans: 尾巴上有个裂缝！

Original: Sazh:I'm trying! I can't see a damn thing, much less find a place to land!
Dialogue: I'm trying! I can't see a damn thing, much less find a place to land!
trans: 我想！

Original: Cecil:This does not bode well.
Dialogue: This does not bode well.
trans: 这可不是什么好兆头。

Original: Cecil:What was that!?
Dialogue: What was that!?
trans: 那是什么！？

Original: Layle:We're under attack! That one left us with a serious breach on our hands!
Dialogue: We're under attack! That one left us with a serious breach on our hands!
trans: 我们受到攻击了！

Original: Garnet:No! Is everyone alright?
Dialogue: No! Is everyone alright?
trans: 不！

Original: Layle:No one's hurt, but I don't know how long this ship'll hold...
Dialogue: No one's hurt, but I don't know how long this ship'll hold...
trans: 没有人受伤，但我不知道这艘船还能撑多久……

Original: Mog:Kupo! Everyone gather around me, and fast, kupo!
Dialogue: Kupo! Everyone gather around me, and fast, kupo!
trans: 库波！

Original: Setzer:What's that?
Dialogue: What's that?
trans: 那是什么？

Original: Mog:The armor won't last much longer, kupo! We need to escape!
Dialogue: The armor won't last much longer, kupo! We need to escape!
trans: 盔甲撑不了多久了，库珀！

Original: Ashe:How? Are there escape pods?
Dialogue: How? Are there escape pods?
trans: 如何？

Original: Cecil:Even if there were, there wouldn't be enough... Unless some of us...
Dialogue: Even if there were, there wouldn't be enough... Unless some of us...
trans: 即使有，也不够……除非我们中的一些人……

Original: Mog:Come on, Sazh! I'll save you all kupo!
Dialogue: Come on, Sazh! I'll save you all kupo!
trans: 加油，萨兹！

Original: Sazh:...The helm's busted, which means landing's out of the question. Now what do we do?
Dialogue: ...The helm's busted, which means landing's out of the question. Now what do we do?
trans: ......舵坏了，这意味着着陆是不可能的。

Original: Mog:Close your eyes, kupo! Hurry!
Dialogue: Close your eyes, kupo! Hurry!
trans: 闭上眼睛，库波！

Original: Layle:Heh... Some escape plan you got there.
Dialogue: Heh... Some escape plan you got there.
trans: 嘿...你有一些逃跑计划。

Original: Mog:I won't let anything bad happen to you...or your light, kupo.
Dialogue: I won't let anything bad happen to you...or your light, kupo.
trans: 我不会让任何不好的事情发生在你身上……或者你的光，库波。

Original: Mog:These coordinates...should do it, kupo... Please take care...of...
Dialogue: These coordinates...should do it, kupo... Please take care...of...
trans: 这些坐标……应该可以的，kupo……请照顾……的……

Original: Cecil:We are...on firm ground?
Dialogue: We are...on firm ground?
trans: 我们……脚踏实地？

Original: Ashe:There he is! He must've been thrown from the wreckage.
Dialogue: There he is! He must've been thrown from the wreckage.
trans: 他在那！

Original: Garnet:Oh, no! Is he breathing!?
Dialogue: Oh, no! Is he breathing!?
trans: 不好了！

Original: Setzer:He's not responding, but he's still warm.
Dialogue: He's not responding, but he's still warm.
trans: 他没有回应，但他仍然很温暖。

Original: Sazh:The little guy must've teleported us to safety.
Dialogue: The little guy must've teleported us to safety.
trans: 那个小家伙一定是把我们传送到了安全的地方。

Original: Layle:Looks like he's unconscious... Anyone's guess when he'll come to, though.
Dialogue: Looks like he's unconscious... Anyone's guess when he'll come to, though.
trans: 看起来他失去知觉了……不过谁也猜不到他什么时候会苏醒。

Original: Garnet:Did you try healing magic? Is there nothing we can do?
Dialogue: Did you try healing magic? Is there nothing we can do?
trans: 你试过治疗魔法吗？

Original: Setzer:He's a guardian spirit. We tried, but nothing worked.
Dialogue: He's a guardian spirit. We tried, but nothing worked.
trans: 他是守护灵。

Original: Ashe:Which means we are on our own to find our way...
Dialogue: Which means we are on our own to find our way...
trans: 这意味着我们要靠自己找到自己的路……

Original: Layle:Coming here was what we set out to do. Let's hide him someplace safe and think of what to do next.
Dialogue: Coming here was what we set out to do. Let's hide him someplace safe and think of what to do next.
trans: 来到这里是我们打算要做的。

Original: Cecil:So this is the World of Darkness...?
Dialogue: So this is the World of Darkness...?
trans: 这就是暗之世界……？

Original: Warrior of Light:With Mog asleep, we have no choice but to forge our own path.
Dialogue: With Mog asleep, we have no choice but to forge our own path.
trans: 莫格睡着了，我们别无选择，只能开辟自己的道路。

Original: Squall:Seems that way. What are we collecting now? "Brilliance"?
Dialogue: Seems that way. What are we collecting now? "Brilliance"?
trans: 好像是这样

Original: Edge:Oh, yeah, didn't you say you remembered something when you picked up that piece?
Dialogue: Oh, yeah, didn't you say you remembered something when you picked up that piece?
trans: 哦，对了，你不是说你捡到那块的时候想起了什么吗？

Original: Ace:You said it contained things you'd lost.
Dialogue: You said it contained things you'd lost.
trans: 你说它包含你丢失的东西。

Original: Warrior of Light:Yes, fragments. Memories of my journey...and my friends.
Dialogue: Yes, fragments. Memories of my journey...and my friends.
trans: 是的，碎片。

Original: Edge:Think we'll get them back, too? I can't shake this feeling I'm forgetting something important.
Dialogue: Think we'll get them back, too? I can't shake this feeling I'm forgetting something important.
trans: 认为我们也会让他们回来吗？

Original: Edge:Like I already knew Cecil and everyone else from the same world before we ended up here.
Dialogue: Like I already knew Cecil and everyone else from the same world before we ended up here.
trans: 就像在我们来到这里之前我已经认识塞西尔和来自同一个世界的其他人一样。

Original: Squall:The others from my world are concerned about the gaps in their memories too.
Dialogue: The others from my world are concerned about the gaps in their memories too.
trans: 来自我的世界的其他人也担心他们记忆中的空白。

Original: Warrior of Light:There is power in the light. Memories, experiences, will...
Dialogue: There is power in the light. Memories, experiences, will...
trans: 光中有力量。

Original: Warrior of Light:The moment you hold it, something inside you will change. ...That is all I can say.
Dialogue: The moment you hold it, something inside you will change. ...That is all I can say.
trans: 在你握住它的那一刻，你内心的某些东西会发生变化。

Original: Ace:There was a lot I'd forgotten even when I was still in Orience.
Dialogue: There was a lot I'd forgotten even when I was still in Orience.
trans: 甚至当我还在 Orience 的时候，我已经忘记了很多东西。

Original: Ace:I never imagined being unable to remember could cause such concern in your worlds...
Dialogue: I never imagined being unable to remember could cause such concern in your worlds...
trans: 我从没想过不记得会在你的世界里引起这样的担忧......

Original: ???:Ace!? Ace, is that you!?
Dialogue: Ace!? Ace, is that you!?
trans: 高手！？

Original: Edge:Oh ho! Who's this pretty lady?
Dialogue: Oh ho! Who's this pretty lady?
trans: 哦吼！

Original: Squall:One of Ace's classmates from the look of it.
Dialogue: One of Ace's classmates from the look of it.
trans: 看样子是艾斯的同学之一。

Original: Seven:And you must be the otherworlders. I've heard about you.
Dialogue: And you must be the otherworlders. I've heard about you.
trans: 你一定是其他世界的人。

Original: Ace:You met the goddess?
Dialogue: You met the goddess?
trans: 遇到女神了吗？

Original: Seven:Yes, and someone else, too. He opened a path of some sort that brought me here.
Dialogue: Yes, and someone else, too. He opened a path of some sort that brought me here.
trans: 是的，还有其他人。

Original: Edge:Well, that was nice of him!
Dialogue: Well, that was nice of him!
trans: 嗯，他真好！

Original: Seven:...I don't know much about him. I was just anxious to find my friends.
Dialogue: ...I don't know much about him. I was just anxious to find my friends.
trans: ……我对他了解不多。

Original: Warrior of Light:Rest assured, everyone here is on your side.
Dialogue: Rest assured, everyone here is on your side.
trans: 放心，这里的每个人都站在你这边。

Original: Seven:Your armor... Are you...a knight?
Dialogue: Your armor... Are you...a knight?
trans: 你的盔甲……你是……骑士吗？

Original: Squall:Why do you ask?
Dialogue: Why do you ask?
trans: 你为什么要问？

Original: Seven:I was told to find a knight named Lightning.
Dialogue: I was told to find a knight named Lightning.
trans: 我被告知要找到一个名叫闪电的骑士。

Original: Edge:Lightning a knight? She's got a sword, but knight ain't the first word I'd use to describe her.
Dialogue: Lightning a knight? She's got a sword, but knight ain't the first word I'd use to describe her.
trans: 闪电骑士？

Original: Ace:She's with us, but I believe she's former military.
Dialogue: She's with us, but I believe she's former military.
trans: 她和我们在一起，但我相信她以前是军人。

Original: Warrior of Light:A knight of the goddess...
Dialogue: A knight of the goddess...
trans: 女神的骑士...

Original: ???:As memories intersect...so does destiny.
Dialogue: As memories intersect...so does destiny.
trans: 当记忆相交……命运也是如此。

Original: Squall:An enemy!
Dialogue: An enemy!
trans: 敌人！

Original: Ace:Seven, we'll talk later. Can you support us?
Dialogue: Seven, we'll talk later. Can you support us?
trans: 七，我们以后再说。

Original: Seven:As if you had to ask!
Dialogue: As if you had to ask!
trans: 好像你不得不问！

Original: Yang:I braced for the worst, but...I had no idea Mog had such power.
Dialogue: I braced for the worst, but...I had no idea Mog had such power.
trans: 我做好了最坏的打算，但是……我不知道莫格有这么大的力量。

Original: Zell:The ship went down, but we all got out without a scrape!
Dialogue: The ship went down, but we all got out without a scrape!
trans: 船沉了，但我们都平安无事地逃了出来！

Original: Faris:Looks like he's really shaken off whatever had him before.
Dialogue: Looks like he's really shaken off whatever had him before.
trans: 看来他真的摆脱了之前的一切。

Original: Aerith:We'll have to thank him when he wakes up.
Dialogue: We'll have to thank him when he wakes up.
trans: 当他醒来时，我们必须感谢他。

Original: Lion:The attack... Was it magic?
Dialogue: The attack... Was it magic?
trans: 那攻击……是魔法吗？

Original: Firion:No. From the deck, I saw what looked like a giant sword.
Dialogue: No. From the deck, I saw what looked like a giant sword.
trans: 不对。从甲板上，我看到了一把看起来像是巨剑的东西。

Original: Zell:'A sword? In the sky?
Dialogue: A sword? In the sky?
trans: 一把剑？

Original: Firion:It obliterated the propulsion system, which is what caused this entire mess.
Dialogue: It obliterated the propulsion system, which is what caused this entire mess.
trans: 它摧毁了推进系统，这就是造成整个混乱的原因。

Original: Faris:What a shame... She was a fine boat.
Dialogue: What a shame... She was a fine boat.
trans: 真可惜……她是一艘好船。

Original: Lion:I'm sure we'll find ourselves face-to-face with this mysterious foe at some point.
Dialogue: I'm sure we'll find ourselves face-to-face with this mysterious foe at some point.
trans: 我相信我们会在某个时候与这个神秘的敌人面对面。

Original: Aerith:The World of Darkness seems a lot scarier than where we were before. The monsters may be stronger than what we're used to.
Dialogue: The World of Darkness seems a lot scarier than where we were before. The monsters may be stronger than what we're used to.
trans: 黑暗世界似乎比我们之前所在的地方更可怕。

Original: Zell:Aw, man...
Dialogue: Aw, man...
trans: 天啊...

Original: Firion:You knew what you were getting yourself into.
Dialogue: You knew what you were getting yourself into.
trans: 你知道你让自己陷入什么境地。

Original: Zell:Yeah, yeah!
Dialogue: Yeah, yeah!
trans: 是啊是啊！

Original: Yang:We need to be strong in this time of distress. For Mog.
Dialogue: We need to be strong in this time of distress. For Mog.
trans: 在这个困难时期，我们需要坚强。

Original: Faris:Let's keep going. When Mog wakes up, he'll see he's got nothing to worry about.
Dialogue: Let's keep going. When Mog wakes up, he'll see he's got nothing to worry about.
trans: 我们继续吧。

Original: Zidane:Is he a manikin!?
Dialogue: Is he a manikin!?
trans: 他是人体模型吗！？

Original: Auron:Something's different. ...He's not hostile.
Dialogue: Something's different. ...He's not hostile.
trans: 有些不同。

Original: Seifer:Well? You friend or foe? Out with it!
Dialogue: Well? You friend or foe? Out with it!
trans: 出色地？

Original: ???:Warriors with wills...of light.
Dialogue: Warriors with wills...of light.
trans: 拥有……光明意志的战士。

Original: Warrior of Light:He sounds...just like me. Who are you?
Dialogue: He sounds...just like me. Who are you?
trans: 他听起来……就像我一样。

Original: Dark Manikin (Warrior of Light):We are dark manikins born from the crystal core of darkness to protect this realm.
Dialogue: We are dark manikins born from the crystal core of darkness to protect this realm.
trans: 我们是从黑暗水晶核心中诞生的黑暗人体模型，以保护这个领域。

Original: Shantotto:You don't say? So unlike the light, the crystal of dark actually prepared for a fight.
Dialogue: You don't say? So unlike the light, the crystal of dark actually prepared for a fight.
trans: 你不说？

Original: Auron:Light and darkness: two sides of the same coin.
Dialogue: Light and darkness two sides of the same coin.
trans: 光明与黑暗是同一枚硬币的两个面。

Original: Zidane:You're protectors of this world? Why do you look like us?
Dialogue: You're protectors of this world? Why do you look like us?
trans: 你是这个世界的守护者？

Original: Dark Manikin (Warrior of Light):...Upon sensing a threat, the crystal created replicas of the protectors of light.
Dialogue: ...Upon sensing a threat, the crystal created replicas of the protectors of light.
trans: ...在感知到威胁时，水晶创造了光之保护者的复制品。

Original: Dark Manikin (Warrior of Light):We are mirror images that possess powers similar to yours.
Dialogue: We are mirror images that possess powers similar to yours.
trans: 我们是镜像，拥有与你们相似的力量。

Original: Seifer:If you're here, what did we need to come for?
Dialogue: If you're here, what did we need to come for?
trans: 如果你在这里，我们需要来做什么？

Original: Seifer:Fix your problems yourselves.
Dialogue: Fix your problems yourselves.
trans: 自己解决问题。

Original: Warrior of Light:He...and I are different. I sense no...light in his will.
Dialogue: He...and I are different. I sense no...light in his will.
trans: 他……我不一样。

Original: Dark Manikin (Warrior of Light):I am but a mere image. An empty vessel with no heart.
Dialogue: I am but a mere image. An empty vessel with no heart.
trans: 我只是一个形象。

Original: Seifer:Hmph. Then what good are you?
Dialogue: Hmph. Then what good are you?
trans: 哼。

Original: Auron:You came here for a reason, didn't you?
Dialogue: You came here for a reason, didn't you?
trans: 你来这里是有原因的，不是吗？

Original: Shantotto:Speak up, dear. I don't want to stand around here all year.
Dialogue: Speak up, dear. I don't want to stand around here all year.
trans: 说吧，亲爱的。

Original: Dark Manikin (Warrior of Light):Though we are empty...we may be of help.
Dialogue: Though we are empty...we may be of help.
trans: 虽然我们是空的......我们可能会有所帮助。

Original: Auron:Empty... I'm not one to deny your existence...
Dialogue: Empty... I'm not one to deny your existence...
trans: 空...我不是否认你存在的人...

Original: Warrior of Light:Warrior of the World of Darkness, do you wish to fight?
Dialogue: Warrior of the World of Darkness, do you wish to fight?
trans: 暗之世界的武者，你要战斗吗？

Original: Dark Manikin (Warrior of Light):Yes. Warrior of the World of Light, test your blade against mine!
Dialogue: Yes. Warrior of the World of Light, test your blade against mine!
trans: 是的。

Original: Dark Manikin (Warrior of Light):Warriors of the World of Light. You could not find it...
Dialogue: Warriors of the World of Light. You could not find it...
trans: 光之世界的勇士。

Original: Dark Manikin (Warrior of Light):The light shining in the darkness. I beg you defeat me...and find your own light!
Dialogue: The light shining in the darkness. I beg you defeat me...and find your own light!
trans: 灯光在黑暗中闪耀。

Original: Warrior of Light:Is that how it is...? Very well. In order to surpass myself, I will strike you down...
Dialogue: Is that how it is...? Very well. In order to surpass myself, I will strike you down...
trans: 是这样吗……？

Original: Dark Manikin (Warrior of Light):...Well done, warriors of the realm of light.
Dialogue: ...Well done, warriors of the realm of light.
trans: ……干得好，光之领域的战士们。

Original: Onion Knight:You tested us, didn't you?
Dialogue: You tested us, didn't you?
trans: 你考验了我们，不是吗？

Original: Dark Manikin (Warrior of Light):We may lack power, but there are many more of us than there are you.
Dialogue: We may lack power, but there are many more of us than there are you.
trans: 我们可能缺乏力量，但我们的人数比你们多得多。

Original: Dark Manikin (Warrior of Light):There is much to gain from each and every battle with us.
Dialogue: There is much to gain from each and every battle with us.
trans: 与我们的每一场战斗都有很多收获。

Original: Bartz:That's kinda exciting, meeting someone who looks and sounds just like me.
Dialogue: That's kinda exciting, meeting someone who looks and sounds just like me.
trans: 这有点令人兴奋，遇到一个看起来和听起来都像我的人。

Original: Terra:I find it a little frightening. I don't want to have to fight someone who's just like one of us.
Dialogue: I find it a little frightening. I don't want to have to fight someone who's just like one of us.
trans: 我觉得有点可怕。

Original: Dark Manikin (Warrior of Light):...The battles are not merely to test your strength.
Dialogue: ...The battles are not merely to test your strength.
trans: ......战斗不仅仅是为了测试你的实力。

Original: Dark Manikin (Warrior of Light):There are those of us who possess the brilliance you seek.
Dialogue: There are those of us who possess the brilliance you seek.
trans: 我们中有些人拥有您所寻求的才华。

Original: Y'shtola:The light we seek will instead come to us? A fine story.
Dialogue: The light we seek will instead come to us? A fine story.
trans: 我们寻求的光反而会来到我们身边？
