Original: Cait Sith:So we fight you dark manikins, and you fork over brilliance. Easy peasy.
Dialogue: So we fight you dark manikins, and you fork over brilliance. Easy peasy.
trans: 所以我们和你们这些黑暗的人体模型战斗，而你们却放弃了光彩。

Original: Onion Knight:Will they give it up that easily?
Dialogue: Will they give it up that easily?
trans: 他们会轻易放弃吗？

Original: Dark Manikin (Warrior of Light):It may depend on the individual.
Dialogue: It may depend on the individual.
trans: 这可能取决于个人。

Original: Dark Manikin (Warrior of Light):As we are empty vessels devoid of hearts, we are prone to succumb to the will of darkness.
Dialogue: As we are empty vessels devoid of hearts, we are prone to succumb to the will of darkness.
trans: 由于我们是没有心的空容器，我们很容易屈服于黑暗的意志。

Original: Y'shtola:And so there are those who would use you as puppets.
Dialogue: And so there are those who would use you as puppets.
trans: 所以有人要把你当傀儡。

Original: Terra:How awful!
Dialogue: How awful!
trans: 真可怕！

Original: Onion Knight:Right away, a few names come to mind...
Dialogue: Right away, a few names come to mind...
trans: 脑海里立刻浮现出几个名字……

Original: Cait Sith:We'll make sure to be on our guard whenever we come across one of you.
Dialogue: We'll make sure to be on our guard whenever we come across one of you.
trans: 每当我们遇到你们中的任何一个时，我们都会确保保持警惕。

Original: Dark Manikin (Warrior of Light):Warriors of the World of Light. You are our hope.
Dialogue: Warriors of the World of Light. You are our hope.
trans: 光之世界的勇士。

Original: Dark Manikin (Warrior of Light):Without the light's crystal core, the world is being sustained by the dark crystal alone.
Dialogue: Without the light's crystal core, the world is being sustained by the dark crystal alone.
trans: 没有光之晶核，世界只能靠黑暗水晶维持。

Original: Dark Manikin (Warrior of Light):...It is only a matter of time.
Dialogue: ...It is only a matter of time.
trans: ……只是时间问题。

Original: Onion Knight:The balance has already collapsed. ...We need to hurry.
Dialogue: The balance has already collapsed. ...We need to hurry.
trans: 平衡已经崩溃了。

Original: Terra:But is it enough for us to simply press forward?
Dialogue: But is it enough for us to simply press forward?
trans: 但是我们仅仅向前推进就够了吗？

Original: Dark Manikin (Warrior of Light):We are scattered all across this realm, fighting, waiting for you.
Dialogue: We are scattered all across this realm, fighting, waiting for you.
trans: 我们分散在这个领域，战斗，等待你。

Original: Bartz:Alrighty, time to go where the wind takes us!
Dialogue: Alrighty, time to go where the wind takes us!
trans: 好吧，是时候去风带我们去的地方了！

Original: Dark Manikin (Warrior of Light):Go. Fight what is ahead.
Dialogue: Go. Fight what is ahead.
trans: 去。

Original: Bartz:Leave it to me. Roaming's what I do best!
Dialogue: Leave it to me. Roaming's what I do best!
trans: 交给我。

Original: Onion Knight:It's not a perfect plan, but at least we have a goal.
Dialogue: It's not a perfect plan, but at least we have a goal.
trans: 这不是一个完美的计划，但至少我们有一个目标。

Original: Terra:Thank you for teaching us what you know.
Dialogue: Thank you for teaching us what you know.
trans: 感谢您将您所知道的传授给我们。

Original: Dark Manikin (Warrior of Light):The dark must work with the light.
Dialogue: The dark must work with the light.
trans: 黑暗必须与光一起工作。

Original: Garland:Here we have a creator of chaos.
Dialogue: Here we have a creator of chaos.
trans: 在这里，我们有一个混乱的创造者。

Original: Garland:Was it not you who destroyed their airship?
Dialogue: Was it not you who destroyed their airship?
trans: 不是你毁了他们的飞艇吗？

Original: Caius:Chaos is not what I desire.
Dialogue: Chaos is not what I desire.
trans: 混乱不是我想要的。

Original: Caius:You show no surprise being faced with an otherworldly being. You've been here long.
Dialogue: You show no surprise being faced with an otherworldly being. You've been here long.
trans: 面对一个超凡脱俗的存在，你并不感到惊讶。

Original: Garland:I hail from another world. There, I have battled the same foes in an endless war.
Dialogue: I hail from another world. There, I have battled the same foes in an endless war.
trans: 我来自另一个世界。

Original: Garland:However, this world of respite has assembled many warriors new to me.
Dialogue: However, this world of respite has assembled many warriors new to me.
trans: 然而，这个暂息世界聚集了许多对我来说陌生的战士。

Original: Garland:What is your purpose here? As a fellow agent of chaos, I will lend you my wisdom.
Dialogue: What is your purpose here? As a fellow agent of chaos, I will lend you my wisdom.
trans: 你来这里的目的是什么？

Original: Caius:In the world I come from, I was...a guardian of history.
Dialogue: In the world I come from, I was...a guardian of history.
trans: 在我来自的世界里，我是……历史的守护者。

Original: Caius:This realm is now being ravaged by world-eating wyrms, is it not?
Dialogue: This realm is now being ravaged by world-eating wyrms, is it not?
trans: 这个领域现在正在被食世巨龙蹂躏，不是吗？

Original: Garland:Indeed. Planesgorgers...the larvae of Shinryu are chewing holes throughout this world.
Dialogue: Indeed. Planesgorgers...the larvae of Shinryu are chewing holes throughout this world.
trans: 的确。

Original: Caius:Which is what connects this world with ours...
Dialogue: Which is what connects this world with ours...
trans: 是什么将这个世界与我们的世界联系起来......

Original: Caius:...The situation soon before us is the upheaval of order itself.
Dialogue: ...The situation soon before us is the upheaval of order itself.
trans: ...摆在我们面前的情况是秩序本身的剧变。

Original: Garland:Your precious history will surely be rewritten.
Dialogue: Your precious history will surely be rewritten.
trans: 你宝贵的历史一定会被改写。

Original: Garland:But the goddess Materia gathers warriors of light to face this "situation."
Dialogue: But the goddess Materia gathers warriors of light to face this "situation."
trans: 但是女神玛特里亚召集了光之战士来应对这种“情况”。

Original: Caius:I won't become the slave of any goddess.
Dialogue: I won't become the slave of any goddess.
trans: 我不会成为任何女神的奴隶。

Original: Caius:I have no good memories associated with that moniker.
Dialogue: I have no good memories associated with that moniker.
trans: 我没有与那个绰号相关的美好回忆。

Original: Garland:Then what will you do? Your history has already begun to crumble.
Dialogue: Then what will you do? Your history has already begun to crumble.
trans: 那你怎么办？

Original: Caius:Changing the future will change the past...
Dialogue: Changing the future will change the past...
trans: 改变未来就会改变过去……

Original: Caius:If history will inevitably be rewritten, I shall rid the past of tragedy.
Dialogue: If history will inevitably be rewritten, I shall rid the past of tragedy.
trans: 如果历史不可避免地要被改写，我将消除悲剧的过去。

Original: Garland:You think yourself a savior?
Dialogue: You think yourself a savior?
trans: 你以为自己是救世主？

Original: Caius:Think what you want.
Dialogue: Think what you want.
trans: 想想你想要什么。

Original: Caius:There is power in the order of other worlds. The power to change a tragic past.
Dialogue: There is power in the order of other worlds. The power to change a tragic past.
trans: 其他世界的秩序中存在着力量。

Original: Garland:You wish to change even the order of worlds...
Dialogue: You wish to change even the order of worlds...
trans: 你甚至想改变世界的秩序......

Original: Garland:...To go back in time and create the history you desire.
Dialogue: ...To go back in time and create the history you desire.
trans: ...回到过去，创造你想要的历史。

Original: Caius:Were you not once a knight with someone you mustforgive me, someone you wished to protect?
Dialogue: Were you not once a knight with someone you must—forgive me, someone you wished to protect?
trans: 你不是曾经是一个你必须——原谅我，一个你想保护的人的骑士吗？

Original: Garland:Here I am a warrior of ceaseless battle. But if you intend to pry further...
Dialogue: Here I am a warrior of ceaseless battle. But if you intend to pry further...
trans: 在这里，我是一个不断战斗的战士。

Original: Caius:I care not about your past. I have others to deal with.
Dialogue: I care not about your past. I have others to deal with.
trans: 我不在乎你的过去。

Original: Garland:They are searching for brilliance. Follow its light, and there you shall find your enemy.
Dialogue: They are searching for brilliance. Follow its light, and there you shall find your enemy.
trans: 他们正在寻找辉煌。

Original: Caius:I will heed your words.
Dialogue: I will heed your words.
trans: 我会留意你的话。

Original: Caius:Knight of the Goddess...it's time to end this eternal battle of ours.
Dialogue: Knight of the Goddess...it's time to end this eternal battle of ours.
trans: 女神的骑士……是时候结束我们之间永恒的战斗了。

Original: Caius:...Finally.
Dialogue: ...Finally.

Original: Lightning:Serah, you know this man?
Dialogue: Serah, you know this man?
trans: 塞拉，你认识这个人吗？

Original: Serah:You don't know him yet...but I do. And I need to protect you all from him!
Dialogue: You don't know him yet...but I do. And I need to protect you all from him!
trans: 你还不认识他……但我认识。

Original: Caius:So it's true. You don't remember. However, I did send a messenger.
Dialogue: So it's true. You don't remember. However, I did send a messenger.
trans: 所以这是真的。

Original: Seven:Sorry, there was so much going on. I didn't have time to tell them.
Dialogue: Sorry, there was so much going on. I didn't have time to tell them.
trans: 抱歉，事情太多了。

Original: Yda:You know him, too?
Dialogue: You know him, too?
trans: 你也认识他？

Original: Seven:When I arrived in this world, he told me to seek Lightning.
Dialogue: When I arrived in this world, he told me to seek Lightning.
trans: 当我来到这个世界时，他告诉我要寻找闪电。

Original: Seven:But she wasn't the knight he said she'd be, so I kept quiet.
Dialogue: But she wasn't the knight he said she'd be, so I kept quiet.
trans: 但她不是他说的那个骑士，所以我保持沉默。

Original: Lightning:A knight? Is that some sort of joke?
Dialogue: A knight? Is that some sort of joke?
trans: 一个骑士？

Original: Serah:No... You just don't remember.
Dialogue: No... You just don't remember.
trans: 不……你只是不记得了。

Original: Tidus:Is this our mixed-up memories again? Only Serah can remember stuff from the future, was it?
Dialogue: Is this our mixed-up memories again? Only Serah can remember stuff from the future, was it?
trans: 这又是我们错综复杂的回忆吗？

Original: Caius:In my world, you could say I am the nemesis of these sisters.
Dialogue: In my world, you could say I am the nemesis of these sisters.
trans: 在我的世界里，可以说我是这对姐妹的克星。

Original: Yda:Then that makes you a villain!
Dialogue: Then that makes you a villain!
trans: 那你就成了恶棍！

Original: Caius:...Hm. I found a purpose in this world.
Dialogue: ...Hm. I found a purpose in this world.

Original: Caius:Lightning... I desire to make amends to you.
Dialogue: Lightning... I desire to make amends to you.
trans: 闪电……我想补偿你。

Original: Serah:What are you up to?
Dialogue: What are you up to?
trans: 你要做什么？

Original: Caius:Seven...and Ace. You said you were from "Orience."
Dialogue: Seven...and Ace. You said you were from "Orience."
trans: 七……还有艾斯。

Original: Ace:How do you know my name? Who are you?
Dialogue: How do you know my name? Who are you?
trans: 你怎么知道我的名字？

Original: Caius:I did a little research.
Dialogue: I did a little research.
trans: 我做了一点研究。

Original: Caius:I learned that the crystals in your world grant you powers.
Dialogue: I learned that the crystals in your world grant you powers.
trans: 我了解到你世界中的水晶赋予你力量。

Original: Seven:The crystal's blessing... Then you know it makes us forget the dead.
Dialogue: The crystal's blessing... Then you know it makes us forget the dead.
trans: 水晶的祝福……那么你就知道它让我们忘记了死者。

Original: Caius:I have done terrible things due to my obsession over the ones I've lost.
Dialogue: I have done terrible things due to my obsession over the ones I've lost.
trans: 由于我对失去的东西的痴迷，我做了可怕的事情。

Original: Caius:My duty was to protect history. Instead, I distorted it.
Dialogue: My duty was to protect history. Instead, I distorted it.
trans: 我的职责是保护历史。

Original: Tidus:So what did you do to Lightning?
Dialogue: So what did you do to Lightning?
trans: 那你对闪电做了什么？

Original: Caius:But look at us now.
Dialogue: But look at us now.
trans: 但是看看我们现在。

Original: Caius:The power to forget the dead is most rational.
Dialogue: The power to forget the dead is most rational.
trans: 忘记死者的力量是最理性的。

Original: Caius:If we introduce the laws of Orience to our world through these tears...
Dialogue: If we introduce the laws of Orience to our world through these tears...
trans: 如果我们通过这些眼泪将东方法则引入我们的世界......

Original: Caius:History will be rewritten. My errors, the battles you've suffered, the many tragedies will be avoided and forgotten.
Dialogue: History will be rewritten. My errors, the battles you've suffered, the many tragedies will be avoided and forgotten.
trans: 历史将被改写。

Original: Ace:Connecting different worlds would make everything we've done here pointless.
Dialogue: Connecting different worlds would make everything we've done here pointless.
trans: 连接不同的世界会使我们在这里所做的一切变得毫无意义。

Original: Lightning:Thanks, but no thanks.
Dialogue: Thanks, but no thanks.
trans: 谢谢，但不用谢。

Original: Caius:Are you certain? You may have forgotten, but our battle ends in tragedy.
Dialogue: Are you certain? You may have forgotten, but our battle ends in tragedy.
trans: 你确定吗？

Original: Caius:Forgetting the dead will leave a happier history.
Dialogue: Forgetting the dead will leave a happier history.
trans: 忘记死者会留下更幸福的历史。

Original: Yda:Now I'm sure you're a villain! And I'm a mite livid!
Dialogue: Now I'm sure you're a villain! And I'm a mite livid!
trans: 现在我确定你是个恶棍！

Original: Tidus:I was just thinking the same thing! C'mon!
Dialogue: I was just thinking the same thing! C'mon!
trans: 我只是在想同样的事情！

Original: Tidus:There's something wrong with you if you think you're better off forgetting about those who've died!
Dialogue: There's something wrong with you if you think you're better off forgetting about those who've died!
trans: 如果你认为你最好忘记那些已经死去的人，那你就有问题了！

Original: Caius:Come, I will help you remember how fierce your battle with me was!
Dialogue: Come, I will help you remember how fierce your battle with me was!
trans: 来，我帮你记住你和我的战斗有多惨烈！

Original: Caius:All will vanish... Given that, the oblivescence of memory is an act of purification from the dead to the living...
Dialogue: All will vanish... Given that, the oblivescence of memory is an act of purification from the dead to the living...
trans: 一切都会消失……鉴于此，记忆的遗忘是一种从死者到生者的净化行为……

Original: Caius:Would you deny this?
Dialogue: Would you deny this?
trans: 你会否认这一点吗？

Original: Yuna:Please do not speak for those who would disappear! It is too tragic.
Dialogue: Please do not speak for those who would disappear! It is too tragic.
trans: 请不要为那些会消失的人说话！

Original: Caius:I believe we shall never see eye to eye... So by force shall I cause you to heed my atonement!
Dialogue: I believe we shall never see eye to eye... So by force shall I cause you to heed my atonement!
trans: 我相信我们永远不会意见一致……所以我要用武力让你听从我的赎罪！

Original: Caius:Heh... Even without your memories, you've proven you're still a goddess's knight.
Dialogue: Heh... Even without your memories, you've proven you're still a goddess's knight.
trans: 呵……就算没有记忆，你也证明了自己还是女神的骑士。

Original: Lightning:And now you're running away?
Dialogue: And now you're running away?
trans: 现在你逃跑了？

Original: Caius:The larvae of Shinryu are consuming this world. Seek them out to find the truth...and your memories.
Dialogue: The larvae of Shinryu are consuming this world. Seek them out to find the truth...and your memories.
trans: Shinryu 的幼虫正在吞噬这个世界。

Original: Caius:Do not forget... I've lived close to an eternity, and I've escaped death time and time again.
Dialogue: Do not forget... I've lived close to an eternity, and I've escaped death time and time again.
trans: 别忘了……我活得近乎永恒，我也一次又一次地逃过一劫。

Original: Caius:I have thrown the world into chaos because I cared for the dead. It's better that I forget.
Dialogue: I have thrown the world into chaos because I cared for the dead. It's better that I forget.
trans: 我让世界陷入混乱，因为我关心死者。

Original: Jecht:Ugh! Punk's just shooting his mouth off!
Dialogue: Ugh! Punk's just shooting his mouth off!
trans: 啊!

Original: Lightning:I don't remember him, but I do remember this...this feeling.
Dialogue: I don't remember him, but I do remember this...this feeling.
trans: 我不记得他了，但我确实记得这种……这种感觉。

Original: Serah:I wonder if he means it. That it's better to forget.
Dialogue: I wonder if he means it. That it's better to forget.
trans: 我想知道他是不是认真的。

Original: Serah:But you don't know because you're who you were before you became a knight.
Dialogue: But you don't know because you're who you were before you became a knight.
trans: 但你不知道，因为你是成为骑士之前的你。

Original: Lightning:Serah, why didn't you tell me about him!? What is he!?
Dialogue: Serah, why didn't you tell me about him!? What is he!?
trans: 塞拉，你为什么不告诉我他的事！？

Original: Jecht:Give it a rest. I thought we agreed we gotta remember stuff ourselves for it to mean anything.
Dialogue: Give it a rest. I thought we agreed we gotta remember stuff ourselves for it to mean anything.
trans: 休息一下。

Original: Rem:We forget...so we can move on...
Dialogue: We forget...so we can move on...
trans: 我们忘记了……所以我们可以继续……

Original: Rem:Even if it's sad to be forgotten...it's the right thing to do...
Dialogue: Even if it's sad to be forgotten...it's the right thing to do...
trans: 即使被遗忘很难过……这是正确的做法……

Original: Snow:Cheer up!
Dialogue: Cheer up!
trans: 开心点！

Original: Snow:You know we're not gonna figure anything out standin' here talking about it, right?
Dialogue: You know we're not gonna figure anything out standin' here talking about it, right?
trans: 你知道我们不会想出任何站在这里谈论它，对吧？

Original: Snow:We're gonna keep going until we find our light!
Dialogue: We're gonna keep going until we find our light!
trans: 我们要继续前进，直到找到我们的光！

Original: Lightning:Yeah, thanks, cheerleader. I suppose you remember him, too.
Dialogue: Yeah, thanks, cheerleader. I suppose you remember him, too.
trans: 是的，谢谢，啦啦队队长。

Original: Snow:Nope, not one bit.
Dialogue: Nope, not one bit.
trans: 不，一点也没有。

Original: Rem:But you fought him anyway.
Dialogue: But you fought him anyway.
trans: 但你还是和他打了起来。

Original: Snow:He's Serah's enemy. That's reason enough for me.
Dialogue: He's Serah's enemy. That's reason enough for me.
trans: 他是塞拉的敌人。

Original: Jecht:Ha! I like you, kid.
Dialogue: Ha! I like you, kid.
trans: 哈！

Original: Serah:Lightning, Rem. Let's keep going, okay?
Dialogue: Lightning, Rem. Let's keep going, okay?
trans: 闪电，雷姆。

Original: Serah:If Caius is up to something, I...need to stop him.
Dialogue: If Caius is up to something, I...need to stop him.
trans: 如果 Caius 有什么企图，我……需要阻止他。

Original: Snow:Yeah, let's do it! And don't worry, Serah. I'll protect everyone if I have to.
Dialogue: Yeah, let's do it! And don't worry, Serah. I'll protect everyone if I have to.
trans: 是的，让我们开始吧！

Original: Serah:I didn't think we'd have so much trouble finding this brilliance.
Dialogue: I didn't think we'd have so much trouble finding this brilliance.
trans: 我不认为我们会很难找到这种光彩。

Original: Papalymo:Serah, can you tell us more about this Caius fellow?
Dialogue: Serah, can you tell us more about this Caius fellow?
trans: Serah，你能告诉我们更多关于这个 Caius 家伙的事吗？

Original: Galuf:I'd also like to know more too about this man who wants to change history.
Dialogue: I'd also like to know more too about this man who wants to change history.
trans: 我也想更多地了解这个想要改变历史的人。

Original: Papalymo:So to make amends to Lightning, he wants to change history to avoid involving her in his war?
Dialogue: So to make amends to Lightning, he wants to change history to avoid involving her in his war?
trans: 所以为了赔罪闪电，他要改变历史，避免让闪电卷入他的战争？

Original: Serah:I don't know what he's up to, really. He's always been hard to read.
Dialogue: I don't know what he's up to, really. He's always been hard to read.
trans: 我不知道他在干什么，真的。

Original: Galuf:It sounds selfish to me.
Dialogue: It sounds selfish to me.
trans: 这对我来说听起来很自私。

Original: Galuf:It's a poor idea, using the ways of another world to solve the problems of your own.
Dialogue: It's a poor idea, using the ways of another world to solve the problems of your own.
trans: 用另一个世界的方法来解决你自己的问题，这是一个糟糕的主意。

Original: Yuna:I can't imagine being happier by not remembering those who've passed...
Dialogue: I can't imagine being happier by not remembering those who've passed...
trans: 我无法想象不记得那些已经过去的人会更快乐......

Original: Yuna:...It doesn't make any sense.
Dialogue: ...It doesn't make any sense.
trans: ......这没有任何意义。

Original: Aerith:You have a kind heart, Yuna.
Dialogue: You have a kind heart, Yuna.
trans: 你有一颗善良的心，尤娜。

Original: Galuf:Death is sad and permanent, but when someone close to you dies, it changes who you are.
Dialogue: Death is sad and permanent, but when someone close to you dies, it changes who you are.
trans: 死亡是悲伤和永恒的，但当你亲近的人去世时，它会改变你是谁。

Original: Yuna:It's their memories that give me the strength to fight.
Dialogue: It's their memories that give me the strength to fight.
trans: 是他们的回忆给了我战斗的力量。

Original: Ace:Can this be?
Dialogue: Can this be?
trans: 这可以吗？

Original: Ace:I thought we were all the same, and that we just happened to be from different worlds.
Dialogue: I thought we were all the same, and that we just happened to be from different worlds.
trans: 我以为我们都是一样的，我们只是碰巧来自不同的世界。

Original: Ace:I didn't realize the ways of Orience were so contrary to others.
Dialogue: I didn't realize the ways of Orience were so contrary to others.
trans: 我没有意识到 Orience 的方式与其他人如此相反。

Original: Ace:I thought we were in this together, but I can't even understand what they're going through.
Dialogue: I thought we were in this together, but I can't even understand what they're going through.
trans: 我以为我们在一起，但我什至不明白他们正在经历什么。

Original: Warrior of Light:Are you feeling alone?
Dialogue: Are you feeling alone?
trans: 你感到孤独吗？

Original: Ace:You wouldn't understand.
Dialogue: You wouldn't understand.
trans: 你不会明白的。

Original: Warrior of Light:I never told you my story. How could I? I myself had forgotten it.
Dialogue: I never told you my story. How could I? I myself had forgotten it.
trans: 我从未告诉过你我的故事。

Original: Ace:Are you like us?
Dialogue: Are you like us?
trans: 你和我们一样吗？

Original: Warrior of Light:Not exactly. But I'm not unlike you.
Dialogue: Not exactly. But I'm not unlike you.
trans: 不完全是。

Original: Warrior of Light:My journey was unknown to others.
Dialogue: My journey was unknown to others.
trans: 别人不知道我的旅程。

Original: King:Some sort of secret mission?
Dialogue: Some sort of secret mission?
trans: 某种秘密任务？

Original: Warrior of Light:No. I traveled to the past and destroyed the root of all evil.
Dialogue: No. I traveled to the past and destroyed the root of all evil.
trans: 不，我穿越到过去，摧毁了万恶之源。

Original: Warrior of Light:The people of my time don't know that evil ever even existed.
Dialogue: The people of my time don't know that evil ever even existed.
trans: 我那个时代的人甚至不知道邪恶曾经存在过。

Original: Ace:And you were okay with that?
Dialogue: And you were okay with that?
trans: 你还好吗？

Original: Warrior of Light:My battles were not for praise or reward. Is it not the same for you?
Dialogue: My battles were not for praise or reward. Is it not the same for you?
trans: 我的战斗不是为了赞美或奖励。

Original: Ace:Was there meaning to the battles we fought back in Orience?
Dialogue: Was there meaning to the battles we fought back in Orience?
trans: 我们在东方进行的战斗有意义吗？

Original: Warrior of Light:You left behind something for those who remain, and for history that may continue.
Dialogue: You left behind something for those who remain, and for history that may continue.
trans: 您为留下的人留下了一些东西，也为可能继续的历史留下了一些东西。

Original: Warrior of Light:Even if people may forget your existence, the light in your heart will never expire.
Dialogue: Even if people may forget your existence, the light in your heart will never expire.
trans: 即使人们可能会忘记你的存在，但你心中的光芒永远不会熄灭。

Original: Ace:The light...in my heart.
Dialogue: The light...in my heart.
trans: 光……在我心中。

Original: Chelinka:Caius is trying to change history...by changing the order of the worlds.
Dialogue: Caius is trying to change history...by changing the order of the worlds.
trans: Caius 试图改变历史……通过改变世界的秩序。

Original: Yuri:Right. I bet he's lying about wanting to make things right.
Dialogue: Right. I bet he's lying about wanting to make things right.
trans: 正确的。

Original: Chelinka:He said that the ways of Orience would bring happiness, but that's just how it works in your world, yes?
Dialogue: He said that the ways of Orience would bring happiness, but that's just how it works in your world, yes?
trans: 他说东方之道会带来幸福，但这就是它在你的世界中运作的方式，是吗？

Original: Ace:I don't know. Our lives were all about fighting and war.
Dialogue: I don't know. Our lives were all about fighting and war.
trans: 我不知道。

Original: Yuri:So even if Caius is able to pull it off, the same thing will probably happen in his world, too.
Dialogue: So even if Caius is able to pull it off, the same thing will probably happen in his world, too.
trans: 所以即使 Caius 能够成功，同样的事情也可能会发生在他的世界中。

Original: Chelinka:Even if you change history, some things can't change, and there's a cost to it...
Dialogue: Even if you change history, some things can't change, and there's a cost to it...
trans: 即使你改变了历史，有些事情是无法改变的，而且是要付出代价的……

Original: Yuri:We've witnessed that...
Dialogue: We've witnessed that...
trans: 我们亲眼目睹了...

Original: Yuri:Each world has its own rules for a reason.
Dialogue: Each world has its own rules for a reason.
trans: 每个世界都有自己的规则是有原因的。

Original: Yuri:So you, Lightning, and even us, we have to follow the respective rules of our worlds.
Dialogue: So you, Lightning, and even us, we have to follow the respective rules of our worlds.
trans: 所以你，闪电，甚至我们，都必须遵守各自世界的规则。

Original: Chelinka:We can't use our powers here like we could in our world, but we've chosen to use them to protect everyone.
Dialogue: We can't use our powers here like we could in our world, but we've chosen to use them to protect everyone.
trans: 我们不能像在我们的世界那样在这里使用我们的力量，但我们选择使用它们来保护每个人。

Original: Warrior of Light:We're here because we all possess the same light.
Dialogue: We're here because we all possess the same light.
trans: 我们在这里是因为我们都拥有同样的光。

Original: Warrior of Light:We've been allies since the beginning and we will continue to be.
Dialogue: We've been allies since the beginning and we will continue to be.
trans: 我们从一开始就是盟友，我们将继续如此。

Original: Ace:Thank you.
Dialogue: Thank you.
trans: 谢谢。

Original: Warrior of Light:If any of you loses your light, each and every one of us will take its place.
Dialogue: If any of you loses your light, each and every one of us will take its place.
trans: 如果你们中的任何人失去了光，我们每个人都会取而代之。

Original: Garland:Hmph. Say what you will, but the cycle of war continues.
Dialogue: Hmph. Say what you will, but the cycle of war continues.
trans: 哼。

Original: Garland:I have come to test the power of your light!
Dialogue: I have come to test the power of your light!
trans: 我是来试探你的光之威力的！

Original: Warrior of Light:I will strike you down as many times as it takes. ...Are you with me?
Dialogue: I will strike you down as many times as it takes. ...Are you with me?
trans: 我会尽可能多地击倒你。

Original: Ace:I am. I have faith in what you've told me.
Dialogue: I am. I have faith in what you've told me.
trans: 我是。

Original: King:Let's believe we have the light inside of us, too.
Dialogue: Let's believe we have the light inside of us, too.
trans: 让我们相信我们内心也有光。

Original: Garland:So, you crossed swords with the warriors of darkness... Let us see how much light you reclaimed!
Dialogue: So, you crossed swords with the warriors of darkness... Let us see how much light you reclaimed!
trans: 所以，你与黑暗的战士交锋了……让我们看看你夺回了多少光明！

Original: Warrior of Light:I am not the only warrior embracing light. With our light together, we will end this cycle of conflict!
Dialogue: I am not the only warrior embracing light. With our light together, we will end this cycle of conflict!
trans: 我不是唯一拥抱光明的战士。

Original: Serah:Caius is set on using the laws of Orience, and he's going to do whatever it takes.
Dialogue: Caius is set on using the laws of Orience, and he's going to do whatever it takes.
trans: Caius 开始使用 Orience 法则，他将不惜一切代价。

Original: Serah:He's going to use his position to try to change history to what he thinks it should be.
Dialogue: He's going to use his position to try to change history to what he thinks it should be.
trans: 他将利用自己的地位，试图将历史改变成他认为应该的样子。

Original: Squall:(...She seems to know a thing or two about it.)
Dialogue: (...She seems to know a thing or two about it.)
trans: （……她似乎知道一两件事。）

Original: Shantotto:Is it true a unique power is possessed by you two?
Dialogue: Is it true a unique power is possessed by you two?
trans: 你们两个真的拥有独特的力量吗？

Original: Yuri:Only back in our world.
Dialogue: Only back in our world.
trans: 只回到我们的世界。

Original: Chelinka:And it's not as if we can do whatever we'd like.
Dialogue: And it's not as if we can do whatever we'd like.
trans: 并不是说我们可以为所欲为。

Original: Chelinka:We're presented with possibilities.
Dialogue: We're presented with possibilities.
trans: 我们面临着各种可能性。

Original: Yuri:And we choose one from many.
Dialogue: And we choose one from many.
trans: 我们从众多中选择一个。

Original: Serah:So you can't go to worlds that aren't possible?
Dialogue: So you can't go to worlds that aren't possible?
trans: 所以你不能去不可能的世界？

Original: Yuri:That's right. I don't even know if they exist in the first place.
Dialogue: That's right. I don't even know if they exist in the first place.
trans: 这是正确的。

Original: Chelinka:And we don't want to see the possibilities we wouldn't want anyway.
Dialogue: And we don't want to see the possibilities we wouldn't want anyway.
trans: 而且我们不想看到我们不想看到的可能性。

Original: Lilisette:Is rewriting history...a bad thing?
Dialogue: Is rewriting history...a bad thing?
trans: 改写历史……是件坏事吗？

Original: Squall:...You're asking the wrong person.
Dialogue: ...You're asking the wrong person.
trans: ……你问错人了。

Original: Squall:But I'm not the one to decide if it's right or wrong.
Dialogue: But I'm not the one to decide if it's right or wrong.
trans: 但我不是决定它是对还是错的人。

Original: Lilisette:What do you say, Professor?
Dialogue: What do you say, Professor?
trans: 你说呢，教授？

Original: Shantotto:That is like asking, "What is just?"
Dialogue: That is like asking, "What is just?"
trans: 这就像在问，“什么是公正的？”

Original: Shantotto:Right or wrong, using your power to obtain what you desire is a must.
Dialogue: Right or wrong, using your power to obtain what you desire is a must.
trans: 对与错，用你的力量去获得你想要的是必须的。

Original: Serah:Whatever the case, I need to stop Caius before he can drag other worlds into this.
Dialogue: Whatever the case, I need to stop Caius before he can drag other worlds into this.
trans: 无论如何，我需要在 Caius 将其他世界拖入其中之前阻止他。

Original: Lilisette:You're right. I know dragging other worlds into his plan is a bad thing.
Dialogue: You're right. I know dragging other worlds into his plan is a bad thing.
trans: 你说得对。

Original: Yuri:Ace and the others from Orience are concerned about their values differing from everyone else's.
Dialogue: Ace and the others from Orience are concerned about their values differing from everyone else's.
trans: 艾斯和东方的其他人担心他们的价值观与其他人不同。

Original: Chelinka:I don't blame him. Anyone would be if they were told about the differing laws of other worlds. Let's do what we can to put their minds at ease.
Dialogue: I don't blame him. Anyone would be if they were told about the differing laws of other worlds. Let's do what we can to put their minds at ease.
trans: 我不怪他。

Original: Serah:You two can be really mature sometimes.
Dialogue: You two can be really mature sometimes.
trans: 你们两个有时真的很成熟。

Original: Serah:Even more than me sometimes.
Dialogue: Even more than me sometimes.
trans: 有时甚至比我还多。

Original: Yuri:That's not true. Chelinka here is afraid of gho
Dialogue: That's not true. Chelinka here is afraid of gho—
trans: 这不是真的。

Original: Chelinka:Yuri! Stop it! That was a long time ago.
Dialogue: Yuri! Stop it! That was a long time ago.
trans: 尤里！

Original: Lilisette:Different values indeed.
Dialogue: Different values indeed.
trans: 价值观确实不同。

Original: Rem:Dark manikins!
Dialogue: Dark manikins!
trans: 黑暗人体模型！

Original: Lightning:Is that supposed to be me?
Dialogue: Is that supposed to be me?
trans: 那应该是我吗？

Original: Dark Manikin (Lightning):Is it?
Dialogue: Is it?
trans: 是吗？

Original: Hope:They seem strange. More...subdued than those before.
Dialogue: They seem strange. More...subdued than those before.
trans: 他们看起来很奇怪。

Original: Dark Manikin (Serah):Maybe. We've allied with Caius.
Dialogue: Maybe. We've allied with Caius.
trans: 或许。

Original: Lightning:Hah... You look like Serah, but obviously you're nothing like her.
Dialogue: Hah... You look like Serah, but obviously you're nothing like her.
trans: 哈……你看起来像塞拉，但显然你一点也不像她。

Original: Dark Manikin (Hope):But we may be happier, Light.
Dialogue: But we may be happier, Light.
trans: 但我们可能会更快乐，光。

Original: Lightning:Don't call me that.
Dialogue: Don't call me that.
trans: 别那样叫我

Original: Dark Manikin (Serah):Come on, Sis.
Dialogue: Come on, Sis.
trans: 来吧，姐姐。

Original: Lightning:I don't need to listen to this. Let's go.
Dialogue: I don't need to listen to this. Let's go.
trans: 我不需要听这个。

Original: Rem:Wait, even if Caius did get to them, they might have the brilliance we need.
Dialogue: Wait, even if Caius did get to them, they might have the brilliance we need.
trans: 等等，即使 Caius 确实找到了他们，他们也可能拥有我们需要的才华。

Original: Dark Manikin (Lightning):Lightning from the World of Light, you must ally with Caius.
Dialogue: Lightning from the World of Light, you must ally with Caius.
trans: 来自光之世界的闪电，你必须与 Caius 结盟。

Original: Dark Manikin (Lightning):You don't know because you don't remember. The strife "I" had to endure...
Dialogue: You don't know because you don't remember. The strife "I" had to endure...
trans: 你不知道，因为你不记得。

Original: Dark Manikin (Serah):Caius plans to rewrite everything. Even the mistakes of my past.
Dialogue: Caius plans to rewrite everything. Even the mistakes of my past.
trans: Caius 计划重写一切。

Original: Dark Manikin (Serah):I can have a happy, simple life, just like you wanted for me.
Dialogue: I can have a happy, simple life, just like you wanted for me.
trans: 我可以过上幸福、简单的生活，就像你想要的那样。

Original: Lightning:Don't act like you know us! You're nothing but empty vessels.
Dialogue: Don't act like you know us! You're nothing but empty vessels.
trans: 别装作你认识我们！

Original: Hope:Stop it!
Dialogue: Stop it!
trans: 停下来！

Original: Hope:You have no right to talk about her!
Dialogue: You have no right to talk about her!
trans: 你没有资格说她！

Original: Dark Manikin (Hope):Isn't there a part of you that wonders what it would be like if things had been different?
Dialogue: Isn't there a part of you that wonders what it would be like if things had been different?
trans: 难道你们中没有一部分人想知道如果事情不一样会是什么样子吗？

Original: Dark Manikin (Hope):I know you still remember her face, what happened to her. Doesn't it hurt?
Dialogue: I know you still remember her face, what happened to her. Doesn't it hurt?
trans: 我知道你还记得她的脸，记得她的遭遇。

Original: Dark Manikin (Hope):That can change. You can make the pain go away.
Dialogue: That can change. You can make the pain go away.
trans: 那可以改变。

Original: Hope:I've prayed for the past to change. I have lots of regrets. It hurts, like you said.
Dialogue: I've prayed for the past to change. I have lots of regrets. It hurts, like you said.
trans: 我祈祷过去能改变。

Original: Hope:But even so...
Dialogue: But even so...
trans: 但即便如此...

Original: Hope:I never once wanted to forget!
Dialogue: I never once wanted to forget!
trans: 我从来不想忘记！

Original: Hope:Years ago, I met Light and all my other friends. It was a hard time in my life, but the memories are precious.
Dialogue: Years ago, I met Light and all my other friends. It was a hard time in my life, but the memories are precious.
trans: 多年前，我遇到了 Light 和我所有的朋友。

Original: Dark Manikin (Hope):You wouldn't be in pain if you hadn't met them.
Dialogue: You wouldn't be in pain if you hadn't met them.
trans: 如果你没有遇到他们，你就不会痛苦。

Original: Hope:It doesn't matter how bad the situation is. There's always hope in things to come.
Dialogue: It doesn't matter how bad the situation is. There's always hope in things to come.
trans: 不管情况有多糟糕。

Original: Hope:There's no value in what never happened! Everyone holds hope for the future, that's what keeps us going!
Dialogue: There's no value in what never happened! Everyone holds hope for the future, that's what keeps us going!
trans: 从未发生过的事没有价值！

Original: Hope:So stop trying to disparage me and my feelings!
Dialogue: So stop trying to disparage me and my feelings!
trans: 所以不要试图贬低我和我的感受！

Original: Rem:Hope...in things to come...
Dialogue: Hope...in things to come...
trans: 希望……在未来的事情中……

Original: Hope:Let's do it, Light! Let's show them that their empty words are meaningless!
Dialogue: Let's do it, Light! Let's show them that their empty words are meaningless!
trans: 让我们开始吧，光！

Original: Dark Manikin (Hope):Why do you choose the hard road? You gave your friends no small amount of grief that time, didn't you?
Dialogue: Why do you choose the hard road? You gave your friends no small amount of grief that time, didn't you?
trans: 为什么选择艰难的道路？

Original: Dark Manikin (Serah):Yeah, Hope. You want to forget all the trouble you caused, right? Well, me too.
Dialogue: Yeah, Hope. You want to forget all the trouble you caused, right? Well, me too.
trans: 是的，希望。

Original: Hope:No! We were fighting...fighting against our fate!
Dialogue: No! We were fighting...fighting against our fate!
trans: 不！

Original: Hope:I'm going to accept my past and fight. For the future. For everything from now on... For everyone!
Dialogue: I'm going to accept my past and fight. For the future. For everything from now on... For everyone!
trans: 我要接受我的过去并战斗。

Original: Hope:Is this...the brilliance?
Dialogue: Is this...the brilliance?
trans: 这就是……光彩？

Original: Hope:My memories...of times I'd lost...
Dialogue: My memories...of times I'd lost...
trans: 我的记忆……我失去的时候……

Original: Serah:Hope! Do you remember?
Dialogue: Hope! Do you remember?
trans: 希望！

Original: Hope:I think so. I know who the Serah standing in front of me is.
Dialogue: I think so. I know who the Serah standing in front of me is.
trans: 我想是这样。

Original: Lightning:There was nothing in mine.
Dialogue: There was nothing in mine.
trans: 我的里面什么都没有。

Original: Serah:Wait, so that means Hope, you have your memories as an adult.
Dialogue: Wait, so that means Hope, you have your memories as an adult.
trans: 等等，这意味着希望，你有你作为一个成年人的记忆。

Original: Hope:Yeah, I may look like this, but I'm older than you remember.
Dialogue: Yeah, I may look like this, but I'm older than you remember.
trans: 是的，我可能看起来像这样，但我比你记得的要老。

Original: Serah:I wonder if it's because of Caius.
Dialogue: I wonder if it's because of Caius.
trans: 我想知道是不是因为 Caius。

Original: Hope:No, I'm beginning to remember what happened when I came to this world.
Dialogue: No, I'm beginning to remember what happened when I came to this world.
trans: 不对，我开始记起自己来到这个世界时发生的事情。

Original: Hope:When I was drifting between dimensions, I chose this appearance.
Dialogue: When I was drifting between dimensions, I chose this appearance.
trans: 当我漂泊在次元之间时，我选择了这个样子。

Original: Lightning:Why wouldn't you choose your older self? Wouldn't he be stronger?
Dialogue: Why wouldn't you choose your older self? Wouldn't he be stronger?
trans: 你为什么不选择年长的自己？

Original: Serah:Hope has always been strong, even when he was a kid.
Dialogue: Hope has always been strong, even when he was a kid.
trans: 希望一直很坚强，即使在他还是个孩子的时候也是如此。

Original: Hope:I chose this because this is what I looked like when I was with you, Light.
Dialogue: I chose this because this is what I looked like when I was with you, Light.
trans: 我选择这个是因为这就是我和你在一起时的样子，Light。

Original: Hope:When I grew up, you were far away. So far, there was no chance of ever seeing you again.
Dialogue: When I grew up, you were far away. So far, there was no chance of ever seeing you again.
trans: 当我长大的时候，你离我很远。

Original: Lightning:...My battle with Caius?
Dialogue: ...My battle with Caius?
trans: ……我和凯厄斯的战斗？

Original: Serah:Well, I guess there's no hiding it anymore.
Dialogue: Well, I guess there's no hiding it anymore.
trans: 好吧，我想已经没有隐藏它了。

Original: Hope:Are you sure, Serah?
Dialogue: Are you sure, Serah?
trans: 你确定吗，塞拉？

Original: Serah:You became the Knight of Etro, and you were caught in an eternal battle with Caius.
Dialogue: You became the Knight of Etro, and you were caught in an eternal battle with Caius.
trans: 你成为了 Etro 的骑士，并陷入了与 Caius 的永恒战斗。

Original: Hope:Serah, I, and all the others, we tried to protect history from Caius because that was what you wanted.
Dialogue: Serah, I, and all the others, we tried to protect history from Caius because that was what you wanted.
trans: Serah、我和所有其他人，我们试图保护历史不受 Caius 的影响，因为那是你想要的。

Original: Serah:When you remember everything, you'll also remember how much pain it caused you.
Dialogue: When you remember everything, you'll also remember how much pain it caused you.
trans: 当你记住一切时，你也会记得它给你带来了多少痛苦。

Original: Lightning:I'd rather know. And I'll face whatever future awaits.
Dialogue: I'd rather know. And I'll face whatever future awaits.
trans: 我宁愿知道。

Original: Hope:I knew you'd say that.
Dialogue: I knew you'd say that.
trans: 我就知道你会这么说。

Original: Dark Manikin (Snow):Even in a different world, you're still the same ol' Light.
Dialogue: Even in a different world, you're still the same ol' Light.
trans: 即使在不同的世界，你仍然是一样的光。

Original: Serah:There's more of them!?
Dialogue: There's more of them!?
trans: 还有更多！？

Original: Dark Manikin (Sazh):Aww, you really think so little of me!? I don't trust that Caius one bit.
Dialogue: Aww, you really think so little of me!? I don't trust that Caius one bit.
trans: 呜呜呜，你真的太小看我了！？

Original: Dark Manikin (Vanille):But we're just reflections, so it's hard to tell what's right from wrong.
Dialogue: But we're just reflections, so it's hard to tell what's right from wrong.
trans: 但我们只是倒影，所以很难分辨是非。

Original: Dark Manikin (Sazh):That's right. We have good memories and bad ones, but we don't have the hearts to feel anything.
Dialogue: That's right. We have good memories and bad ones, but we don't have the hearts to feel anything.
trans: 这是正确的。

Original: Dark Manikin (Snow):That's why you need to fight us and find out for us!
Dialogue: That's why you need to fight us and find out for us!
trans: 这就是为什么你需要与我们战斗并为我们找出答案！

Original: Lightning:You don't have to ask twice.
Dialogue: You don't have to ask twice.
trans: 你不必问两次。

Original: Sazh:I don't know how I feel about fighting a non-manikin me... Even if you say you're empty inside, you're still alive, yeah?
Dialogue: I don't know how I feel about fighting a non-manikin me... Even if you say you're empty inside, you're still alive, yeah?
trans: 我不知道和一个非人体模型的我战斗是什么感觉……即使你说你内心是空的，你还活着，是吗？

Original: Dark Manikin (Sazh):Yeah... We're alive. But listen...we got nothing in us...and that makes us real impressionable to all sorts of different ways of thinking.
Dialogue: Yeah... We're alive. But listen...we got nothing in us...and that makes us real impressionable to all sorts of different ways of thinking.
trans: 是的……我们还活着。

Original: Dark Manikin (Sazh):That's why we're gonna trust us from the World of Light.
Dialogue: That's why we're gonna trust us from the World of Light.
trans: 这就是为什么我们要信任来自 World of Light 的我们。

Original: Vanille:Sounds that Sazh also has a pretty good head on his shoulders. This'll work out. Let's trust us, too.
Dialogue: Sounds that Sazh also has a pretty good head on his shoulders. This'll work out. Let's trust us, too.
trans: 听起来 Sazh 的头脑也很不错。

Original: Dark Manikin (Snow):Nice... Alright, then! Here's to hoping this little light of mine is gonna help you guys out some...
Dialogue: Nice... Alright, then! Here's to hoping this little light of mine is gonna help you guys out some...
trans: 不错……那好吧！

Original: Snow:Yeah! Let's do this!
Dialogue: Yeah! Let's do this!
trans: 是的！

Original: Sazh:Whoa! The memories really just come flooding back, don't they?
Dialogue: Whoa! The memories really just come flooding back, don't they?
trans: 哇！

Original: Vanille:What a strange feeling. It's like...I'm not me anymore.
Dialogue: What a strange feeling. It's like...I'm not me anymore.
trans: 多么奇怪的感觉。

Original: Cloud:You forgot that you forgot, didn't you?
Dialogue: You forgot that you forgot, didn't you?
trans: 你忘了你忘了，不是吗？

Original: Warrior of Light:I know how strange it must feel.
Dialogue: I know how strange it must feel.
trans: 我知道那感觉有多奇怪。

Original: Snow:But now I know. I can never take his side.
Dialogue: But now I know. I can never take his side.
trans: 但现在我知道了。

Original: Snow:I never wanted to forget. I'm glad I remembered.
Dialogue: I never wanted to forget. I'm glad I remembered.
trans: 我从来不想忘记。

Original: Vanille:It hurts, and there are a lot of sad memories, but I don't want to erase any of it.
Dialogue: It hurts, and there are a lot of sad memories, but I don't want to erase any of it.
trans: 很痛，也有很多悲伤的回忆，但我一点也不想抹去。

Original: Sazh:Man, now I remember what that Caius did!
Dialogue: Man, now I remember what that Caius did!
trans: 伙计，现在我记得那个 Caius 做了什么！

Original: Sazh:I don't know how he thinks he's going to pull this off, the whole changing the past thing.
Dialogue: I don't know how he thinks he's going to pull this off, the whole changing the past thing.
trans: 我不知道他怎么想他会成功，整个改变过去的事情。

Original: Vaan:He said he wanted to make things right with Lightning.
Dialogue: He said he wanted to make things right with Lightning.
trans: 他说他想用 Lightning 解决问题。

Original: Vanille:I don't believe that at all. He's just doing what he wants to do.
Dialogue: I don't believe that at all. He's just doing what he wants to do.
trans: 我根本不相信。

Original: Snow:He's put us through enough as it is. I'm never taking his side.
Dialogue: He's put us through enough as it is. I'm never taking his side.
trans: 他已经让我们受够了。

Original: Warrior of Light:We need to find him before it's too late. He's headed for the planesgorgers.
Dialogue: We need to find him before it's too late. He's headed for the planesgorgers.
trans: 我们需要在为时已晚之前找到他。

Original: Vaan:Look at that!
Dialogue: Look at that!
trans: 看那个！

Original: Cloud:Did the dark manikins leave behind a sign to show us the way?
Dialogue: Did the dark manikins leave behind a sign to show us the way?
trans: 黑色人体模型有没有留下一个标志给我们指路？

Original: Warrior of Light:They must have not been touched by darkness.
Dialogue: They must have not been touched by darkness.
trans: 他们一定没有被黑暗触及。

Original: Snow:Then let's get this show on the road!
Dialogue: Then let's get this show on the road!
trans: 那就让我们把这个节目上路吧！

Original: Cyan:Thou art more advanced in years than it would appear.
Dialogue: Thou art more advanced in years than it would appear.
trans: 你比看起来更老。

Original: Hope:Yes. I don't believe I'm quite your age...but maybe around Edgar's.
Dialogue: Yes. I don't believe I'm quite your age...but maybe around Edgar's.
trans: 是的。

Original: Edgar:Perhaps that's why you seem so mature.
Dialogue: Perhaps that's why you seem so mature.
trans: 也许这就是你看起来如此成熟的原因。

Original: Tidus:Uh-oh, I should be more polite when I talk to you now, huh?
Dialogue: Uh-oh, I should be more polite when I talk to you now, huh?
trans: 呃哦，我现在跟你说话应该客气点吧？

Original: Hope:No, please, don't do that.
Dialogue: No, please, don't do that.
trans: 不，请不要那样做。

Original: Vivi:Hmm, so that means...
Dialogue: Hmm, so that means...
trans: 嗯，也就是说……

Original: Vivi:...You're really old.
Dialogue: ...You're really old.
trans: ……你真的老了。

Original: Hope:I...I don't think I'm THAT old.
Dialogue: I...I don't think I'm THAT old.
trans: 我……我觉得我没那么老。

Original: Edgar:Grownups are all ancient in a child's eyes.
Dialogue: Grownups are all ancient in a child's eyes.
trans: 在孩子眼里，大人都是古老的。

Original: Hope:Oof...that one hurt, though...
Dialogue: Oof...that one hurt, though...
trans: 哎呀……那个人受伤了，但是……

Original: Tidus:Buck up! Hey, you're still a kid on the outside!
Dialogue: Buck up! Hey, you're still a kid on the outside!
trans: 振作起来！

Original: Cyan:And it's also good to be young at heart.
Dialogue: And it's also good to be young at heart.
trans: 保持一颗年轻的心也很好。

Original: Hope:I guess...
Dialogue: I guess...
trans: 我猜...

Original: Hope:This feels strange.
Dialogue: This feels strange.
trans: 这感觉很奇怪。

Original: Vincent:You'll get used to it.
Dialogue: You'll get used to it.
trans: 你会习惯的。

Original: Hope:You too?
Dialogue: You too?
trans: 你也是？

Original: Vincent:I did back in my world. I've lived a lot longer than you'd think.
Dialogue: I did back in my world. I've lived a lot longer than you'd think.
trans: 我确实回到了我的世界。

Original: Hope:I had no idea.
Dialogue: I had no idea.
trans: 我不知道。

Original: Vincent:It's not a story worth sharing.
Dialogue: It's not a story worth sharing.
trans: 这不是一个值得分享的故事。

Original: Vincent:You said you cherished the time you spent with Lightning.
Dialogue: You said you cherished the time you spent with Lightning.
trans: 你说你很珍惜和闪电一起度过的时光。

Original: Hope:I do. I couldn't as an adult.
Dialogue: I do. I couldn't as an adult.
trans: 我愿意。

Original: Vincent:You want to protect that memory, don't you?
Dialogue: You want to protect that memory, don't you?
trans: 你想保护那个记忆，不是吗？

Original: Hope:Of course.
Dialogue: Of course.
trans: 当然。

Original: Vincent:Then do just that.
Dialogue: Then do just that.
trans: 然后就这样做。

Original: Vincent:Holding onto regrets is nothing but a waste of time.
Dialogue: Holding onto regrets is nothing but a waste of time.
trans: 抱着遗憾无非是浪费时间。

Original: Lightning:Caius!
Dialogue: Caius!
trans: 凯厄斯！

Original: Caius:Have you come to join me? Have you learned the truth and wish to change the past?
Dialogue: Have you come to join me? Have you learned the truth and wish to change the past?
trans: 你来加入我了吗？

Original: Lightning:I fought because I chose to. I don't want your pity.
Dialogue: I fought because I chose to. I don't want your pity.
trans: 我战斗是因为我选择了。

Original: Caius:This wyrm will feed and become an adult. Then I will be able to change the ways of our world.
Dialogue: This wyrm will feed and become an adult. Then I will be able to change the ways of our world.
trans: 这只龙会进食并成为成年人。

Original: Caius:Rem, was it? You shoulder a terrible burden, bound to the order of your world.
Dialogue: Rem, was it? You shoulder a terrible burden, bound to the order of your world.
trans: 雷姆，是吗？

Original: Caius:If the orders of our worlds are altered, won't you be freed from your fate?
Dialogue: If the orders of our worlds are altered, won't you be freed from your fate?
trans: 如果我们世界的秩序被改变，你会不会从你的命运中解脱出来？

Original: Caius:Your fate of being forgotten as your body slowly
Dialogue: Your fate of being forgotten as your body slowly—
trans: 你被遗忘的宿命随着你的身体慢慢——

Original: Rem:Stop it!
Dialogue: Stop it!
trans: 停下来！

Original: Caius:If you join me, you and your world can change.
Dialogue: If you join me, you and your world can change.
trans: 如果你加入我，你和你的世界都会改变。

Original: Rem:......There is a part of me that would like to go with you.
Dialogue: ......There is a part of me that would like to go with you.
trans: ......我有一部分想要和你一起去。

Original: Rem:But I need to accept my fate.
Dialogue: But I need to accept my fate.
trans: 但我需要接受我的命运。

Original: Rem:I need to face it and fight.
Dialogue: I need to face it and fight.
trans: 我需要面对它并战斗。

Original: Rem:Everyone I've met here has had to do the same.
Dialogue: Everyone I've met here has had to do the same.
trans: 我在这里遇到的每个人都不得不这样做。

Original: Rem:So I will too!
Dialogue: So I will too!
trans: 所以我也会！

Original: Ace:The ways of our world are our problem.
Dialogue: The ways of our world are our problem.
trans: 我们世界的方式就是我们的问题。

Original: Seven:And other worlds can't be changed with our ways.
Dialogue: And other worlds can't be changed with our ways.
trans: 其他世界无法用我们的方式改变。

Original: Serah:You say you want to make things right, but you're just hurting my sister even more!
Dialogue: You say you want to make things right, but you're just hurting my sister even more!
trans: 嘴上说着要把事情办好，其实是在害我妹妹！

Original: Serah:Using the fact that she's lost her memories to throw her off...
Dialogue: Using the fact that she's lost her memories to throw her off...
trans: 利用她失去记忆的事实来甩掉她……

Original: Serah:That's going to end now! I won't let you hurt her anymore!
Dialogue: That's going to end now! I won't let you hurt her anymore!
trans: 现在就要结束了！

Original: Caius:So that is the future you choose?
Dialogue: So that is the future you choose?
trans: 那就是你选择的未来？

Original: Rem:That's right. We choose how to live our lives. We choose our own path.
Dialogue: That's right. We choose how to live our lives. We choose our own path.
trans: 这是正确的。

Original: Ace:I won't let anyone get in the way of that, and I'm not going to change my beliefs because of yours!
Dialogue: I won't let anyone get in the way of that, and I'm not going to change my beliefs because of yours!
trans: 我不会让任何人妨碍它，我不会因为你的而改变我的信念！

Original: Seven:You wanted an answer, you got one.
Dialogue: You wanted an answer, you got one.
trans: 你想要一个答案，你得到了一个。

Original: Lightning:You heard them, Caius.
Dialogue: You heard them, Caius.
trans: 你听到了，凯厄斯。

Original: Lightning:Our eternal battle ends here!
Dialogue: Our eternal battle ends here!
trans: 我们永恒的战斗到此结束！

Original: Caius:Very well, Knight of the Goddess.
Dialogue: Very well, Knight of the Goddess.
trans: 很好，女神的骑士。

Original: Caius:Accept it, Knight of the Goddess. Shinryu is the key to breaking the gods' curse.
Dialogue: Accept it, Knight of the Goddess. Shinryu is the key to breaking the gods' curse.
trans: 接受吧，女神的骑士。

Original: Caius:That world itself will be atonement. The gods will be unable to touch that world, and you, too, will truly be free.
Dialogue: That world itself will be atonement. The gods will be unable to touch that world, and you, too, will truly be free.
trans: 那个世界本身就是赎罪。

Original: Lightning:What are you babbling about? I've got things I want to protect, and I don't have time for your unilateral view on the matter.
Dialogue: What are you babbling about? I've got things I want to protect, and I don't have time for your unilateral view on the matter.
trans: 你在唠叨什么？

Original: Caius:Heh... Warrior Goddess, let us now this once celebrate!
Dialogue: Heh... Warrior Goddess, let us now this once celebrate!
trans: 呵……战神，让我们一起庆祝这一次吧！

Original: Caius:It's gone. I have no reason to stay in this world.
Dialogue: It's gone. I have no reason to stay in this world.
trans: 它消失了。

Original: Lightning:Stop it!
Dialogue: Stop it!
trans: 停下来！

Original: Caius:Distorting order, putting lives to rest.
Dialogue: Distorting order, putting lives to rest.
trans: 扰乱秩序，安息生命。

Original: Caius:Isolating the world of the living into nothing.
Dialogue: Isolating the world of the living into nothing.
trans: 将生者的世界隔离为虚无。

Original: Caius:You don't remember what chaos brought to our world.
Dialogue: You don't remember what chaos brought to our world.
trans: 你不记得给我们的世界带来了什么混乱。

Original: Caius:Could these Torsions be used to rewrite this world's order?
Dialogue: Could these Torsions be used to rewrite this world's order?
trans: 这些扭曲能用来改写这个世界的秩序吗？

Original: Caius:Then I may truly be able to atone for my sins.
Dialogue: Then I may truly be able to atone for my sins.
trans: 到时候我或许真的可以赎罪了。

Original: Seven:Don't listen to him, Lightning.
Dialogue: Don't listen to him, Lightning.
trans: 闪电，别听他的。

Original: Lightning:I won't let you do that!
Dialogue: I won't let you do that!
trans: 我不会让你那样做的！

Original: Caius:Very well. Then let this monster drag you into the chaos.
Dialogue: Very well. Then let this monster drag you into the chaos.
trans: 很好。

Original: Caius:You will drown, and our eternal battle will finally come to an end!
Dialogue: You will drown, and our eternal battle will finally come to an end!
trans: 你会被淹死，我们永恒的战斗终于结束了！

Original: Hope:She's not alone! I'm here too!
Dialogue: She's not alone! I'm here too!
trans: 她不是一个人！

Original: Hope:I don't want our world's future or past to be erased!
Dialogue: I don't want our world's future or past to be erased!
trans: 我不希望我们世界的未来或过去被抹去！

Original: Hope:The person I am now...I know I can protect you and the future!
Dialogue: The person I am now...I know I can protect you and the future!
trans: 现在的我……我知道我可以保护你和未来！

Original: Lightning:Then let's fight.
Dialogue: Then let's fight.
trans: 那我们就打吧。

Original: Caius:Being unable to let go of the past means you don't understand what the future holds.
Dialogue: Being unable to let go of the past means you don't understand what the future holds.
trans: 无法放下过去意味着你不明白未来会怎样。

Original: Caius:You poor souls. You continue to fight as puppets of the gods.
Dialogue: You poor souls. You continue to fight as puppets of the gods.
trans: 你们这些可怜的人。

Original: Caius:Be prepared to face devastation!
Dialogue: Be prepared to face devastation!
trans: 准备好面对灾难！

Original: Tidus:Ugh! I am so sick of people going on about the dead this and the dead that! Give it a rest already!
Dialogue: Ugh! I am so sick of people going on about the dead this and the dead that! Give it a rest already!
trans: 啊!

Original: Caius:Enough... Playtime is over!
Dialogue: Enough... Playtime is over!
trans: 够了……游戏时间结束！

Original: Seven:Don't let your guard down!
Dialogue: Don't let your guard down!
trans: 不要放松警惕！

Original: Rem:Do you know what we're up against?
Dialogue: Do you know what we're up against?
trans: 你知道我们的对手是什么吗？

Original: Seven:Yeah... I had my own run-in before I hooked up with you guys...
Dialogue: Yeah... I had my own run-in before I hooked up with you guys...
trans: 是的......在我和你们联系之前我有自己的磨合......

Original: Seven:It's got a pretty tough resistance to physical attacks. Better to focus on magic... Be ready for anything.
Dialogue: It's got a pretty tough resistance to physical attacks. Better to focus on magic... Be ready for anything.
trans: 它对物理攻击有很强的抵抗力。

Original: Caius:I refuse to disappear. I have yet to fulfill my duty.
Dialogue: I refuse to disappear. I have yet to fulfill my duty.
trans: 我拒绝消失。

Original: Seven:He just can't get enough, can he?
Dialogue: He just can't get enough, can he?
trans: 他就是受够了，不是吗？

Original: Serah:Your light!
Dialogue: Your light!
trans: 你的光！

Original: Lightning:So that's what he meant, "knight of the goddess."
Dialogue: So that's what he meant, "knight of the goddess."
trans: 这就是他的意思，“女神的骑士”。

Original: Hope:You remember!
Dialogue: You remember!
trans: 你记得！

Original: Lightning:I do. My battle against Caius, Serah's journey, and you, Hope, all grown up.
Dialogue: I do. My battle against Caius, Serah's journey, and you, Hope, all grown up.
trans: 我愿意。

Original: Lightning:I'm sorry...for everything.
Dialogue: I'm sorry...for everything.
trans: 我对这一切很抱歉。

Original: Hope:It's okay! I'm just glad to be with you right here, right now.
Dialogue: It's okay! I'm just glad to be with you right here, right now.
trans: 没关系！

Original: Serah:That's right! Everyone's here. It's kinda strange when you think about it.
Dialogue: That's right! Everyone's here. It's kinda strange when you think about it.
trans: 这是正确的！

Original: Lightning:There are still a lot of us who don't remember.
Dialogue: There are still a lot of us who don't remember.
trans: 我们中还有很多人不记得了。

Original: Seven:Do we keep going until we happen to come across more? That might take a while.
Dialogue: Do we keep going until we happen to come across more? That might take a while.
trans: 我们是否继续前进，直到碰巧遇到更多？

Original: Cecil:Without a ship, it's going to make for a difficult journey.
Dialogue: Without a ship, it's going to make for a difficult journey.
trans: 没有船，这将是一段艰难的旅程。

Original: Serah:Mog! You're awake!
Dialogue: Mog! You're awake!
trans: 猫！

Original: Mog:Yesiree, kupo! You didn't think that was the end of me, did you?
Dialogue: Yesiree, kupo! You didn't think that was the end of me, did you?
trans: 是的，库波！

Original: Mog:So!? Where's that nasty planesgorger, kupo?
Dialogue: So!? Where's that nasty planesgorger, kupo?
trans: 所以！？

Original: Seven:...We took care of the one that was here. You sure are an antsy moogle...
Dialogue: ...We took care of the one that was here. You sure are an antsy moogle...
trans: ......我们照顾了这里的那个。

Original: Cecil:We were talking about how we were to travel.
Dialogue: We were talking about how we were to travel.
trans: 我们正在谈论我们将如何旅行。

Original: Mog:I know just the thing, kupo!
Dialogue: I know just the thing, kupo!
trans: 我只知道这件事，库波！

Original: Lightning:What is it?
Dialogue: What is it?
trans: 它是什么？

Original: Mog:A new ship was being prepared while I was asleep, kupo!
Dialogue: A new ship was being prepared while I was asleep, kupo!
trans: 趁我睡着，一艘新船正在准备中，库波！

Original: Hope:An airship? Are you sure it's not a trap?
Dialogue: An airship? Are you sure it's not a trap?
trans: 飞艇？

Original: Mog:It's real, kupo! I even pinched my bobble to make sure!
Dialogue: It's real, kupo! I even pinched my bobble to make sure!
trans: 这是真的，库波！

Original: Mog:But the inside of the ship isn't in the best condition, kupo.
Dialogue: But the inside of the ship isn't in the best condition, kupo.
trans: 但是船的内部状况不佳，库波。

Original: Lightning:Empty on the inside. A fitting vessel for this place.
Dialogue: Empty on the inside. A fitting vessel for this place.
trans: 里面是空的。

Original: Mog:But it's big enough for everyone, kupo!
Dialogue: But it's big enough for everyone, kupo!
trans: 但它对每个人来说都足够大了，kupo！

Original: Cecil:But who...?
Dialogue: But who...?
trans: 但是谁……？

Original: Seven:The goddess Materia?
Dialogue: The goddess Materia?
trans: 女神马特里亚？

Original: Serah:Do you know, Mog?
Dialogue: Do you know, Mog?
trans: 你知道吗，莫格？

Original: Mog:Nope, but you should come and see for yourselves, kupo!
Dialogue: Nope, but you should come and see for yourselves, kupo!
trans: 不，但是你应该亲自来看看，库波！

Original: Kuja:It was you, wasn't it?
Dialogue: It was you, wasn't it?
trans: 是你，不是吗？

Original: Kuja:What is your obsession with them?
Dialogue: What is your obsession with them?
trans: 你对他们的痴迷是什么？

Original: Golbez:Light and darkness. One can't exist without the other.
Dialogue: Light and darkness. One can't exist without the other.
trans: 光明与黑暗。

Original: Golbez:Those who have lost their light may find the most hallowed light in this dark realm.
Dialogue: Those who have lost their light may find the most hallowed light in this dark realm.
trans: 那些失去了光明的人，也许会在这个黑暗的领域找到最神圣的光明。

Original: Kuja:You're hoping they'll stop hating you.
Dialogue: You're hoping they'll stop hating you.
trans: 你希望他们不再恨你。

Original: Golbez:This is not about me.
Dialogue: This is not about me.
trans: 这与我无关。

Original: Golbez:However, if he retrieves his light, he will also retrieve the bonds he shares with his allies.
Dialogue: However, if he retrieves his light, he will also retrieve the bonds he shares with his allies.
trans: 然而，如果他取回了他的光，他也将取回他与盟友共享的纽带。

Original: Kuja:And the sorrow.
Dialogue: And the sorrow.
trans: 和悲伤。

Original: Golbez:That must be overcome. There is no joy or misery without memories.
Dialogue: That must be overcome. There is no joy or misery without memories.
trans: 必须克服这一点。

Original: Golbez:Cecil... You must find yourself.
Dialogue: Cecil... You must find yourself.
trans: 塞西尔……你必须找到你自己。

Original: Materia:You have come to ask about the airship?
Dialogue: You have come to ask about the airship?
trans: 你是来问飞艇的事的？

Original: Bartz:We're glad to have a new one, but did you prepare it for us?
Dialogue: We're glad to have a new one, but did you prepare it for us?
trans: 我们很高兴有一个新的，但是你为我们准备了吗？

Original: Celes:Based on the others' inspection, it resembles, but is distinct from our ship in the World of Light.
Dialogue: Based on the others' inspection, it resembles, but is distinct from our ship in the World of Light.
trans: 根据别人的观察，它和我们光之世界的飞船很像，但又不一样。

Original: Yuna:For a divine gift, there's something odd about its construction...
Dialogue: For a divine gift, there's something odd about its construction...
trans: 作为一份神圣的礼物，它的构造有些奇怪……

Original: Materia:Unlike your previous airship, I did not prepare this one.
Dialogue: Unlike your previous airship, I did not prepare this one.
trans: 和你之前的飞艇不同，这艘我没有准备。

Original: Materia:It was born of a strong will...
Dialogue: It was born of a strong will...
trans: 它诞生于坚强的意志...

Original: Squall:Willpower... Did one of us make it?
Dialogue: Willpower... Did one of us make it?
trans: 意志力……我们中有人成功了吗？

Original: Celes:But we were all engaged in battle away from Mog.
Dialogue: But we were all engaged in battle away from Mog.
trans: 但我们都在远离莫格的地方参与战斗。

Original: Mog:I was still unconscious, so I wouldn't know if anyone else came by, kupo...
Dialogue: I was still unconscious, so I wouldn't know if anyone else came by, kupo...
trans: 我还昏迷不醒，不知道有没有人过来，库波……

Original: Materia:It is someone who is close to you... ...One who harbors light in the depths of darkness.
Dialogue: It is someone who is close to you... ...One who harbors light in the depths of darkness.
trans: 那是一个离你很近的人…… 一个在黑暗深处藏着光明的人。

Original: Yuna:You're ever reticent.
Dialogue: You're ever reticent.
trans: 你总是沉默寡言。

Original: Materia:I have not concluded his light is to be trusted...
Dialogue: I have not concluded his light is to be trusted...
trans: 我还没有断定他的光是值得信赖的......

Original: Squall:Whatever. Can we fly in that thing, or is it just an illusion?
Dialogue: Whatever. Can we fly in that thing, or is it just an illusion?
trans: 任何。

Original: Materia:In this world, a strong will is the power to create.
Dialogue: In this world, a strong will is the power to create.
trans: 在这个世界上，坚强的意志就是创造的力量。

Original: Materia:I leave the decision to board it in your hands.
Dialogue: I leave the decision to board it in your hands.
trans: 我把登机的决定权交给你。

Original: Bartz:Well, let's give it a try. The rest is up to where the wind blows.
Dialogue: Well, let's give it a try. The rest is up to where the wind blows.
trans: 好吧，让我们试一试。

Original: Squall:(Willpower is the power to create...?)
Dialogue: (Willpower is the power to create...?)
trans: （意志力是创造的力量……？）

Original: Squall:(...There's more in this world than just what the gods created?)
Dialogue: (...There's more in this world than just what the gods created?)
trans: （……这个世界，除了神所创造的，还有更多？）

Original: Squall:(...Could someone then create a location from memory?)
Dialogue: (...Could someone then create a location from memory?)
trans: （......然后有人可以根据记忆创建一个位置吗？）

Original: Bartz:Let's go, Squall! Everyone's waiting at the airship!
Dialogue: Let's go, Squall! Everyone's waiting at the airship!
trans: 走吧，斯考尔！

Original: Vaan:You know, Sazh, being a new airship and all, you don't have to be the only one to pilot it.
Dialogue: You know, Sazh, being a new airship and all, you don't have to be the only one to pilot it.
trans: 你知道，Sazh，作为一艘新的飞艇，你不必是唯一一个驾驶它的人。

Original: Sazh:...Ah, sure thing. Just sit tight till I find a place to put us down.
Dialogue: ...Ah, sure thing. Just sit tight till I find a place to put us down.
trans: ……啊，没问题。

Original: Balthier:I don't think so, Vaan. It's still too soon for you.
Dialogue: I don't think so, Vaan. It's still too soon for you.
trans: 我不这么认为，梵。

Original: Balthier:But changing pilots is a good idea. I'll lose my touch if I don't stretch my wings from time to time.
Dialogue: But changing pilots is a good idea. I'll lose my touch if I don't stretch my wings from time to time.
trans: 但更换飞行员是个好主意。

Original: Setzer:Can we expect smooth sailing from a brigand? Better I take the wheel.
Dialogue: Can we expect smooth sailing from a brigand? Better I take the wheel.
trans: 能指望强盗一帆风顺吗？

Original: Balthier:To the gentry my foot... What if an enemy catches us during your genteel pleasure cruise?
Dialogue: To the gentry my foot... What if an enemy catches us during your genteel pleasure cruise?
trans: 绅士们，我的脚...如果敌人在您的绅士游轮上抓住我们怎么办？

Original: Faris:An "air" ship, eh...? It does have its charm...
Dialogue: An "air" ship, eh...? It does have its charm...
trans: 一艘“空中”飞船，嗯……？

Original: Sazh:Yeah, yeah, keep your shirts on! You all can fight it out after we land!
Dialogue: Yeah, yeah, keep your shirts on! You all can fight it out after we land!
trans: 是的，是的，穿上你的衬衫！

Original: Faris:What about you? I reckon you've more than a passing interest in flying.
Dialogue: What about you? I reckon you've more than a passing interest in flying.
trans: 你呢？

Original: Cecil:I...will pass.
Dialogue: I...will pass.
trans: 我……会过去的。

Original: Cecil:I was once proud to lead an air brigade...but...
Dialogue: I was once proud to lead an air brigade...but...
trans: 我曾经为领导一个空军旅而自豪……但是……

Original: Cecil:I have no right to enjoy the skies. Not after the harm I brought to the innocent.
Dialogue: I have no right to enjoy the skies. Not after the harm I brought to the innocent.
trans: 我没有权利享受天空。

Original: Faris:Same as ever. It wouldn't hurt to have a wee more faith in yourself, hear?
Dialogue: Same as ever. It wouldn't hurt to have a wee more faith in yourself, hear?
trans: 一如既往。

Original: Sazh:Sorry to interrupt here, but...
Dialogue: Sorry to interrupt here, but...
trans: 抱歉打断这里，但是...

Original: Balthier:Blast... Not more trouble...
Dialogue: Blast... Not more trouble...
trans: 爆炸...不再麻烦...

Original: Sazh:Your pilot has mysteriously lost control...
Dialogue: Your pilot has mysteriously lost control...
trans: 你的飞行员神秘地失去了控制......

Original: Onion Knight:I'm glad we landed safely, but now the airship won't budge.
Dialogue: I'm glad we landed safely, but now the airship won't budge.
trans: 我很高兴我们安全着陆，但现在飞艇不会移动了。

Original: Cater:Sazh and the others seem to think the ship was programmed with this course.
Dialogue: Sazh and the others seem to think the ship was programmed with this course.
trans: Sazh 和其他人似乎认为这艘船是按照这个航向编程的。

Original: Lilisette:Is something the matter?
Dialogue: Is something the matter?
trans: 有什么事吗？

Original: Cecil:This mountain... It is familiar to me.
Dialogue: This mountain... It is familiar to me.
trans: 这座山……我很熟悉。

Original: Cater:But we've never been here before. Dj vu?
Dialogue: But we've never been here before. Déjà vu?
trans: 但我们以前从未来过这里。

Original: Palom:That's all? You don't remember anything else?
Dialogue: That's all? You don't remember anything else?
trans: 就这样？

Original: Palom:Then follow me!
Dialogue: Then follow me!
trans: 那就跟我来吧！

Original: Cecil:Palom! Where are you?
Dialogue: Palom! Where are you—?
trans: 帕隆！

Original: Palom:Over here! I can help you remember!
Dialogue: Over here! I can help you remember!
trans: 在这里！

Original: Lilisette:It's a giant mirror!
Dialogue: It's a giant mirror!
trans: 这是一面巨大的镜子！

Original: Onion Knight:There's also a faint sense of a crystal.
Dialogue: There's also a faint sense of a crystal.
trans: 还有淡淡的水晶感。

Original: Cecil:I sense nostalgia...and warmth.
Dialogue: I sense nostalgia...and warmth.
trans: 我感到怀旧……和温暖。

Original: Cecil:Is this where my memories lie?
Dialogue: Is this where my memories lie?
trans: 这就是我的记忆所在吗？

Original: Cater:Are you sure we're in the right place?
Dialogue: Are you sure we're in the right place?
trans: 你确定我们来对地方了吗？

Original: Palom:Of course. I could never forget.
Dialogue: Of course. I could never forget.
trans: 当然。

Original: Cecil:They are within reach, but...something is still missing.
Dialogue: They are within reach, but...something is still missing.
trans: 他们触手可及，但是……仍然缺少一些东西。

Original: Onion Knight:If something seems missing, it's just like anyplace else we've visited so far.
Dialogue: If something seems missing, it's just like anyplace else we've visited so far.
trans: 如果似乎缺少某些东西，那就像我们到目前为止访问过的任何其他地方一样。

Original: Onion Knight:It's going to take more than hints like this to jump-start Cecil's memory.
Dialogue: It's going to take more than hints like this to jump-start Cecil's memory.
trans: 要唤醒 Cecil 的记忆，需要的不仅仅是这样的提示。

Original: Palom:Ugh! Why do you have to be so difficult!?
Dialogue: Ugh! Why do you have to be so difficult!?
trans: 啊!

Original: Cecil:There may be a clue in the mirror.
Dialogue: There may be a clue in the mirror.
trans: 镜子里可能有线索。

Original: Lilisette:Look! There's someone there.
Dialogue: Look! There's someone there.
trans: 看！

Original: ???:You aren't ready to face the truth?
Dialogue: You aren't ready to face the truth?
trans: 你还没准备好面对真相？

Original: ???:You are weak, hiding behind your dark armor.
Dialogue: You are weak, hiding behind your dark armor.
trans: 你很虚弱，躲在你的深色盔甲后面。

Original: Cecil:Are you...me...?
Dialogue: Are you...me...?

Original: Onion Knight:Cecil, wait!
Dialogue: Cecil, wait!
trans: 塞西尔，等等！

Original: Lilisette:He's inside the mirror! How are we supposed o get him out of there?
Dialogue: He's inside the mirror! How are we supposed o get him out of there?
trans: 他在镜子里面！

Original: Seven:They aren't fighting, though. What should we do?
Dialogue: They aren't fighting, though. What should we do?
trans: 不过，他们并没有打架。

Original: Warrior of Light:They appear to be talking. Let us watch over them for now.
Dialogue: They appear to be talking. Let us watch over them for now.
trans: 他们似乎在说话。

Original: Cecil?:Do you have the courage to learn the truth?
Dialogue: Do you have the courage to learn the truth?
trans: 你有勇气了解真相吗？

Original: Cecil:You're a sacred knighta paladin.
Dialogue: You're a sacred knight—a paladin.
trans: 你是一个神圣的骑士——一个圣骑士。

Original: Cecil:Did I wish for that?
Dialogue: Did I wish for that?
trans: 我希望那样吗？

Original: Cecil?:Yes, but even with this light...
Dialogue: Yes, but even with this light...
trans: 是的，但即使有这种光...

Original: Cecil?:Many a fault was committed.
Dialogue: Many a fault was committed.
trans: 犯了很多错误。

Original: Cecil?:Which is why I chose to seal these memories before coming to this world.
Dialogue: Which is why I chose to seal these memories before coming to this world.
trans: 所以我才选择封印这些记忆，然后来到这个世界。

Original: Cecil?:All because...
Dialogue: All because...
trans: 都是因为...

Original: Cecil:...I am weak.
Dialogue: ...I am weak.
trans: ...我没有力气。

Original: Cecil?:Regaining your memories will cause you pain and suffering.
Dialogue: Regaining your memories will cause you pain and suffering.
trans: 恢复你的记忆会给你带来痛苦和折磨。

Original: Cecil?:The sacrifices I made as a paladin do not compare to what you know as a dark knight.
Dialogue: The sacrifices I made as a paladin do not compare to what you know as a dark knight.
trans: 我作为圣骑士所做的牺牲无法与你所知的黑暗骑士相提并论。

Original: Cecil?:We used our hatred as strength, but the truth rendered it useless.
Dialogue: We used our hatred as strength, but the truth rendered it useless.
trans: 我们用仇恨作为力量，但事实使它变得毫无用处。

Original: Cecil?:Do you still wish to become a paladin? To leave behind your ignorant bliss?
Dialogue: Do you still wish to become a paladin? To leave behind your ignorant bliss?
trans: 你还想成为圣骑士吗？

Original: Cecil:I wish...to move on.
Dialogue: I wish...to move on.
trans: 我希望……继续前进。

Original: Cecil:My past may be filled with tragedy, but it's something I mus tface.
Dialogue: My past may be filled with tragedy, but it's something I mus tface.
trans: 我的过去可能充满了悲剧，但这是我必须面对的。

Original: Kain:We will face it together.
Dialogue: We will face it together.
trans: 我们将共同面对。

Original: Kain:We all have a past and our own burdens to bear.
Dialogue: We all have a past and our own burdens to bear.
trans: 我们都有自己的过去和自己的负担。

Original: Lilisette:He's right! We're all here for you.
Dialogue: He's right! We're all here for you.
trans: 他是对的！

Original: Seven:You can count on us.
Dialogue: You can count on us.
trans: 你可以依靠我们。

Original: Warrior of Light:We have come to trust you and your powers.
Dialogue: We have come to trust you and your powers.
trans: 我们开始信任你和你的力量。

Original: Warrior of Light:If your enemy draws his sword, we will fight by your side as proof of the bonds we share.
Dialogue: If your enemy draws his sword, we will fight by your side as proof of the bonds we share.
trans: 如果你的敌人拔出他的剑，我们将与你并肩作战，作为我们共同纽带的证明。

Original: Cecil:Thank you, everyone...
Dialogue: Thank you, everyone...
trans: 谢谢大家...

Original: Cecil:I will take back the light, and I will use both light and darkness as strength!
Dialogue: I will take back the light, and I will use both light and darkness as strength!
trans: 我会夺回光明，我会以光明与黑暗为力量！

Original: Cecil?:Then so be it... Shatter me, hollow as I may be, with your allies at your side!
Dialogue: Then so be it... Shatter me, hollow as I may be, with your allies at your side!
trans: 那就这样吧……粉碎我，尽管我可能是空洞的，但你的盟友就在你身边！

Original: Cecil (Paladin):I am a reflection of your memories...
Dialogue: I am a reflection of your memories...
trans: 我是你记忆的倒影...

Original: Cecil (Paladin):But this time is different... Shatter me to gain your light.
Dialogue: But this time is different... Shatter me to gain your light.
trans: 但这次不一样...粉碎我以获得你的光芒。

Original: Cecil (Dark Knight):...Very well. I will pour everything I have into defeating you.
Dialogue: ...Very well. I will pour everything I have into defeating you.

Original: Cecil (Paladin):Surely then...will I claim victory over myself.
Dialogue: Surely then...will I claim victory over myself.
trans: 那么……我一定会宣布战胜自己。

Original: Cecil:This brilliance... Are these...my memories?
Dialogue: This brilliance... Are these...my memories?
trans: 这光彩……难道是……我的记忆？

Original: Zidane:Is that the real you?
Dialogue: Is that the real you?
trans: 那是真实的你吗？

Original: Cecil:I remembered. The dark knight became a paladin.
Dialogue: I remembered. The dark knight became a paladin.
trans: 我记得。

Original: Cecil:I remember everything, which is why I must have taken on this appearance.
Dialogue: I remember everything, which is why I must have taken on this appearance.
trans: 我记得一切，这就是为什么我必须呈现这个样子。

Original: Zidane:You don't look too happy about it. Isn't this what you wanted?
Dialogue: You don't look too happy about it. Isn't this what you wanted?
trans: 你看起来不太高兴。

Original: Cecil:I was driven out of my home. I obtained this holy power to put the past behind me.
Dialogue: I was driven out of my home. I obtained this holy power to put the past behind me.
trans: 我被赶出了家门。

Original: Cecil:But on my journey to this world, I subconsciously gave up those memories.
Dialogue: But on my journey to this world, I subconsciously gave up those memories.
trans: 但在来到这个世界的旅途中，我下意识地放弃了那些记忆。

Original: Cecil:...Perhaps I wished to go back to a time when I had the king's trust, when I fought alongside my friends.
Dialogue: ...Perhaps I wished to go back to a time when I had the king's trust, when I fought alongside my friends.
trans: ……或许我想回到得到国王的信任，与朋友们并肩作战的时代。

Original: Cecil:Though I gained the power of the paladin, I lost much more in return.
Dialogue: Though I gained the power of the paladin, I lost much more in return.
trans: 虽然我获得了圣骑士的力量，但作为回报，我失去了更多。

Original: Cecil:A part of me has always regretted my actions.
Dialogue: A part of me has always regretted my actions.
trans: 我的一部分一直对自己的行为感到后悔。

Original: Palom:...Don't say that.
Dialogue: ...Don't say that.
trans: ……别这么说。

Original: Garnet:What is it, Palom?
Dialogue: What is it, Palom?
trans: 什么事，帕洛姆？

Original: Palom:I've been waiting so long for you to remember.
Dialogue: I've been waiting so long for you to remember.
trans: 我等了你这么久，才想起你。

Original: Palom:Don't you know what would've happened to our world without you?
Dialogue: Don't you know what would've happened to our world without you?
trans: 你不知道如果没有你，我们的世界会怎样？

Original: Garnet:Why are you crying?
Dialogue: Why are you crying?
trans: 你哭什么？

Original: Palom:I'm not! And if I was, they'd be tears of pity!
Dialogue: I'm not! And if I was, they'd be tears of pity!
trans: 我不是！

Original: Cecil:Do you remember everything?
Dialogue: Do you remember everything?
trans: 你记得一切吗？

Original: Palom:Of course!
Dialogue: Of course!
trans: 当然！

Original: Palom:Why would you so easily try to forget the memories you had with all of us?
Dialogue: Why would you so easily try to forget the memories you had with all of us?
trans: 为什么你会如此轻易地试图忘记你与我们所有人的回忆？

Original: Palom:Did you already forget about the things and people you wanted to protect!?
Dialogue: Did you already forget about the things and people you wanted to protect!?
trans: 你是不是已经忘记了想要保护的人和事！？

Original: Palom:...I thought we finally got you back.
Dialogue: ...I thought we finally got you back.
trans: ......我以为我们终于让你回来了。

Original: Palom:But all you have are regrets! It's like you don't even remember the good you've done...
Dialogue: But all you have are regrets! It's like you don't even remember the good you've done...
