trans: 可你只有遗憾！

Original: Cecil:Forgive me.
Dialogue: Forgive me.
trans: 对不起。

Original: Palom:Why! Tell me why grown-ups have to be such pains in the butt...
Dialogue: Why! Tell me why grown-ups have to be such pains in the butt...
trans: 为什么！

Original: Zidane:Take it easy.
Dialogue: Take it easy.
trans: 别紧张。

Original: Zidane:I don't know what you guys went through, but every life has meaning.
Dialogue: I don't know what you guys went through, but every life has meaning.
trans: 我不知道你们经历了什么，但每一个生命都有意义。

Original: Garnet:Yes, we all have a purpose.
Dialogue: Yes, we all have a purpose.
trans: 是的，我们都有一个目的。

Original: Cecil:I...I am weak.
Dialogue: I...I am weak.
trans: 我……我很虚弱。

Original: Cecil:I despised my own brother in a war that destroyed the lives of many. I wanted to shy away from that reality.
Dialogue: I despised my own brother in a war that destroyed the lives of many. I wanted to shy away from that reality.
trans: 在一场摧毁许多人生命的战争中，我鄙视自己的兄弟。

Original: Firion:Your own brother... That must have been tough...
Dialogue: Your own brother... That must have been tough...
trans: 你自己的兄弟……那一定很艰难……

Original: Bartz:Come on, guys. Let's give him a break.
Dialogue: Come on, guys. Let's give him a break.
trans: 拜托了伙计们。

Original: Bartz:Who cares if he's a dark knight or a paladin? Cecil is Cecil.
Dialogue: Who cares if he's a dark knight or a paladin? Cecil is Cecil.
trans: 谁在乎他是黑暗骑士还是圣骑士？

Original: Bartz:You don't need to figure out all the answers right away.
Dialogue: You don't need to figure out all the answers right away.
trans: 您不需要立即找出所有答案。

Original: Cecil:...Bartz. I am sorry... I...
Dialogue: ...Bartz. I am sorry... I...

Original: Bartz:No need for that.
Dialogue: No need for that.
trans: 没必要。

Original: Bartz:Now, come on! We've got stuff to do!
Dialogue: Now, come on! We've got stuff to do!
trans: 现在，来吧！

Original: Bartz:Hanging in there?
Dialogue: Hanging in there?
trans: 挂在那里？

Original: Cecil:Yes... My memories caught me off guard... It is something I was able to hide better back in my world.
Dialogue: Yes... My memories caught me off guard... It is something I was able to hide better back in my world.
trans: 是的......我的记忆让我措手不及......这是我能够更好地隐藏在我的世界中的东西。

Original: Cecil:How do you manage to stay so positive and self-assured?
Dialogue: How do you manage to stay so positive and self-assured?
trans: 你是如何设法保持如此积极和自信的？

Original: Cecil:Have you yourself had to overcome a past tragedy?
Dialogue: Have you yourself had to overcome a past tragedy?
trans: 您自己必须克服过去的悲剧吗？

Original: Bartz:It was his dying wish that I go out and travel the world.
Dialogue: It was his dying wish that I go out and travel the world.
trans: 他临终前的愿望是我出去环游世界。

Original: Bartz:It didn't even occur to me that I'd end up being part of such a grand adventure.
Dialogue: It didn't even occur to me that I'd end up being part of such a grand adventure.
trans: 我什至没有想到我最终会成为如此伟大冒险的一部分。

Original: Galuf:When we first met, you were already ready to move on.
Dialogue: When we first met, you were already ready to move on.
trans: 当我们第一次见面时，你已经准备好继续前进了。

Original: Bartz:That's right. If it wasn't for Boko, I might never have gone back to help you.
Dialogue: That's right. If it wasn't for Boko, I might never have gone back to help you.
trans: 这是正确的。

Original: Galuf:Considering your lineage, perhaps it was fate.
Dialogue: Considering your lineage, perhaps it was fate.
trans: 考虑到你的血统，也许这是命运。

Original: Galuf:I'm sorry for putting you through so much.
Dialogue: I'm sorry for putting you through so much.
trans: 我很抱歉让你经历了这么多。

Original: Bartz:Don't say that. I'm happy I did what I did.
Dialogue: Don't say that. I'm happy I did what I did.
trans: 别这么说。

Original: Bartz:I would've regretted it otherwise.
Dialogue: I would've regretted it otherwise.
trans: 否则我会后悔的。

Original: Cecil:The regret of not taking action...
Dialogue: The regret of not taking action...
trans: 没有行动的遗憾……

Original: Y'shtola:Do you regret following your beliefs?
Dialogue: Do you regret following your beliefs?
trans: 你后悔追随你的信仰吗？

Original: Y'shtola:That is kindness, not weakness.
Dialogue: That is kindness, not weakness.
trans: 那是善良，而不是软弱。

Original: Bartz:That's right! The Cecil we know is strong and kind.
Dialogue: That's right! The Cecil we know is strong and kind.
trans: 这是正确的！

Original: Bartz:I have no doubt in my mind that that's the Cecil everyone from your world also believes in.
Dialogue: I have no doubt in my mind that that's the Cecil everyone from your world also believes in.
trans: 我毫不怀疑，这就是你们世界的每个人都相信的塞西尔。

Original: Dark Manikin (Yang):...Very good.
Dialogue: ...Very good.
trans: ...非常好。

Original: Bartz:Again? And this time, it's Yang and Edge.
Dialogue: Again? And this time, it's Yang and Edge.
trans: 再次？

Original: Dark Manikin (Edge):And we have our memories. Do you want to know what Cecil has done?
Dialogue: And we have our memories. Do you want to know what Cecil has done?
trans: 我们有我们的记忆。

Original: Y'shtola:What do you mean?
Dialogue: What do you mean?
trans: 你是什​​么意思？

Original: Dark Manikin (Yang):The war became far more violent after he gained the power of the paladin.
Dialogue: The war became far more violent after he gained the power of the paladin.
trans: 在他获得圣骑士的力量后，战争变得更加激烈。

Original: Dark Manikin (Yang):We lost homes and friends. Some even sacrificed their own lives to protect him.
Dialogue: We lost homes and friends. Some even sacrificed their own lives to protect him.
trans: 我们失去了家园和朋友。

Original: Dark Manikin (Yang):This man's weakness destroyed many lives.
Dialogue: This man's weakness destroyed many lives.
trans: 这个人的弱点毁了很多人的生命。

Original: Dark Manikin (Edge):Hey, Cecil. Don't you think things might be better off if everything became nothing?
Dialogue: Hey, Cecil. Don't you think things might be better off if everything became nothing?
trans: 嘿，塞西尔。

Original: Dark Manikin (Edge):Maybe that's how you can protect everyone.
Dialogue: Maybe that's how you can protect everyone.
trans: 也许这就是您可以保护每个人的方式。

Original: Cecil:Yang, Edge. Is that how you really feel?
Dialogue: Yang, Edge. Is that how you really feel?
trans: 杨，边。

Original: Bartz:Of course not!
Dialogue: Of course not!
trans: 当然不是！

Original: Bartz:How can you even ask that?
Dialogue: How can you even ask that?
trans: 你怎么能这样问？

Original: Bartz:You really think that's how they feel?
Dialogue: You really think that's how they feel?
trans: 你真的认为那是他们的感受吗？

Original: Bartz:You need to trust them. The real Yang and Edge!
Dialogue: You need to trust them. The real Yang and Edge!
trans: 你需要信任他们。

Original: Y'shtola:With your beliefs and your kindness, you should be able to trust your friends, should you not?
Dialogue: With your beliefs and your kindness, you should be able to trust your friends, should you not?
trans: 以你的信念和善良，你应该能够信任你的朋友，不是吗？

Original: Cecil:I do trust them.
Dialogue: I do trust them.
trans: 我确实信任他们。

Original: Cecil:My allies, my friends!
Dialogue: My allies, my friends!
trans: 我的盟友，我的朋友们！

Original: Galuf:Good, good. If you can't believe in yourself, believe in your friends.
Dialogue: Good, good. If you can't believe in yourself, believe in your friends.
trans: 好好。

Original: Galuf:...But "nothing"? That's an unpleasant idea you've brought up.
Dialogue: ...But "nothing"? That's an unpleasant idea you've brought up.
trans: ……但是“什么都没有”？

Original: Dark Manikin (Edge):If you can't accept it, how 'bout we make you!
Dialogue: If you can't accept it, how 'bout we make you!
trans: 如果你不能接受，我们让你如何！

Original: Edge:I get how Lightning and Hope feel, some yutz with my face talking for me.
Dialogue: I get how Lightning and Hope feel, some yutz with my face talking for me.
trans: 我明白 Lightning 和 Hope 的感觉，一些 yutz 用我的脸为我说话。

Original: Edge:It really ticks me off!
Dialogue: It really ticks me off!
trans: 这真的让我很生气！

Original: Yang:Indeed, let us not abide this. Memories or not, Lord Cecil is our ally!
Dialogue: Indeed, let us not abide this. Memories or not, Lord Cecil is our ally!
trans: 的确，让我们不要容忍这一点。

Original: Dark Manikin (Yang):Hm... Will you say the same after recalling tragedy?
Dialogue: Hm... Will you say the same after recalling tragedy?
trans: 嗯……回想起悲剧后，你会说同样的话吗？

Original: Edge:Bring it on! No memories're gonna keep us down!
Dialogue: Bring it on! No memories're gonna keep us down!
trans: 来吧！

Original: Yang:How can this be? How could I have forgotten...?
Dialogue: How can this be? How could I have forgotten...?
trans: 怎么会这样？

Original: Edge:I...I can't believe this. I'm nothing but a failure.
Dialogue: I...I can't believe this. I'm nothing but a failure.
trans: 我……我不敢相信。

Original: Layle:Aw, that's not like you. What happened to the arrogant prince we know and love?
Dialogue: Aw, that's not like you. What happened to the arrogant prince we know and love?
trans: 哦，那不像你。

Original: Edge:It was all my fault! And I'd forgotten everything.
Dialogue: It was all my fault! And I'd forgotten everything.
trans: 都是我的错！

Original: Edge:How can I be my usual self after being faced with something like this?
Dialogue: How can I be my usual self after being faced with something like this?
trans: 遇到这样的事情，我怎么能做回平常的自己呢？

Original: Yang:I had also sealed away my shameful past.
Dialogue: I had also sealed away my shameful past.
trans: 我也封印了我可耻的过去。

Original: Layle:You guys are really bumming me out.
Dialogue: You guys are really bumming me out.
trans: 你们真让我失望。

Original: Cloud:I don't get it. Were you only fighting for others?
Dialogue: I don't get it. Were you only fighting for others?
trans: 我不明白。

Original: Cloud:You're all responsibility and no wishes of your own?
Dialogue: You're all responsibility and no wishes of your own?
trans: 你们全是责任，没有自己的意愿？

Original: Kain:Don't be too hard on them. That's what comes with their positions.
Dialogue: Don't be too hard on them. That's what comes with their positions.
trans: 不要对他们太苛刻。

Original: Edge:Kain, you knew my name. Does that mean you never lost your memories?
Dialogue: Kain, you knew my name. Does that mean you never lost your memories?
trans: 凯恩，你知道我的名字。

Original: Kain:I knew a little more than you did.
Dialogue: I knew a little more than you did.
trans: 我知道的比你多一点。

Original: Yang:I apologize for ever doubting you...
Dialogue: I apologize for ever doubting you...
trans: 我为曾经怀疑你而道歉...

Original: Yang:You fought bravely alongside Lord Cecil.
Dialogue: You fought bravely alongside Lord Cecil.
trans: 你与塞西尔勋爵并肩作战。

Original: Kain:I chose this.
Dialogue: I chose this.
trans: 我选择了这个。

Original: Kain:In this world, we can be true allies under no one else's control.
Dialogue: In this world, we can be true allies under no one else's control.
trans: 在这个世界上，我们可以成为真正的盟友，不受任何人的控制。

Original: Edge:Wait, do you mean Golbez is in his right mind!?
Dialogue: Wait, do you mean Golbez is in his right mind!?
trans: 等等，你是说 Golbez 的头脑是正常的！？

Original: Cloud:That's the man in black commanding the airship fleet?
Dialogue: That's the man in black commanding the airship fleet?
trans: 那就是指挥飞艇舰队的黑衣人？

Original: Kain:He's Cecil's elder brother.
Dialogue: He's Cecil's elder brother.
trans: 他是塞西尔的哥哥。

Original: Yda:Brothers at war with each other? It's too cruel...!
Dialogue: Brothers at war with each other? It's too cruel...!
trans: 兄弟之间的战争？

Original: Yang:Lord Cecil was extremely distressed to discover the fact.
Dialogue: Lord Cecil was extremely distressed to discover the fact.
trans: 塞西尔勋爵发现这一事实，极为痛心。

Original: Kain:I encountered Golbez before joining you all.
Dialogue: I encountered Golbez before joining you all.
trans: 在加入你们所有人之前，我遇到了 Golbez。

Original: Kain:He was in his right mind then, though I know not how he fares now. I'm here of my own will.
Dialogue: He was in his right mind then, though I know not how he fares now. I'm here of my own will.
trans: 那时他头脑正常，虽然我不知道他现在过得怎么样。

Original: Cloud:You're really hung up on personal motivation.
Dialogue: You're really hung up on personal motivation.
trans: 你真的很迷恋个人动机。

Original: Layle:Edge, you don't worry too much about it either.
Dialogue: Edge, you don't worry too much about it either.
trans: Edge，你也别太担心了。

Original: Layle:Your memories are back. Don't you remember what you wanted to do? Who you wanted to protect?
Dialogue: Your memories are back. Don't you remember what you wanted to do? Who you wanted to protect?
trans: 你的记忆回来了。

Original: Layle:There's gotta be something! Unless you didn't get everything back...?
Dialogue: There's gotta be something! Unless you didn't get everything back...?
trans: 一定有什么东西！

Original: Edge:I did! And of course I do!
Dialogue: I did! And of course I do!
trans: 我做到了！

Original: Layle:Then you know what you need to do.
Dialogue: Then you know what you need to do.
trans: 然后你就知道你需要做什么了。

Original: Kain:Regaining all your memories at once is quite a burden. Take your time.
Dialogue: Regaining all your memories at once is quite a burden. Take your time.
trans: 一次取回所有的记忆是相当大的负担。

Original: Cecil:My friends are shaken by the return of their memories.
Dialogue: My friends are shaken by the return of their memories.
trans: 我的朋友们因恢复记忆而震惊。

Original: Cecil:I must be strong for everyone.
Dialogue: I must be strong for everyone.
trans: 为了大家，我必须坚强。

Original: Warrior of Light:You cannot take on everything alone.
Dialogue: You cannot take on everything alone.
trans: 你不能独自承担一切。

Original: Warrior of Light:Let us help.
Dialogue: Let us help.
trans: 让我们帮忙。

Original: Cecil:The light within you shines ever brightly.
Dialogue: The light within you shines ever brightly.
trans: 你内在的光芒永远闪耀。

Original: Cecil:The holy power I regained does not compare.
Dialogue: The holy power I regained does not compare.
trans: 我夺回的圣力根本比不上。

Original: Warrior of Light:Light and darkness are not necessarily opposing elements.
Dialogue: Light and darkness are not necessarily opposing elements.
trans: 光明与黑暗不一定是对立的元素。

Original: Warrior of Light:Nor is one right and one wrong.
Dialogue: Nor is one right and one wrong.
trans: 也不是一对一错。

Original: Onion Knight:They're essentially two sides of the same coin.
Dialogue: They're essentially two sides of the same coin.
trans: 它们本质上是同一枚硬币的两面。

Original: Prishe:Besides, the darkness that burdens people isn't always so bad.
Dialogue: Besides, the darkness that burdens people isn't always so bad.
trans: 此外，给人们带来负担的黑暗并不总是那么糟糕。

Original: Prishe:People are weak, but isn't that why they're also kind?
Dialogue: People are weak, but isn't that why they're also kind?
trans: 人是软弱的，但这不也是善良的吗？

Original: Cecil:...Being weak makes you kind?
Dialogue: ...Being weak makes you kind?
trans: ......软弱使你善良？

Original: Seven:The definition of good and bad is ambiguous, and I don't know what's truly good.
Dialogue: The definition of good and bad is ambiguous, and I don't know what's truly good.
trans: 好与坏的定义是模棱两可的，我不知道什么才是真正的好。

Original: Seven:But I'm sure there are people you touched with your kindness.
Dialogue: But I'm sure there are people you touched with your kindness.
trans: 但我敢肯定，有些人被你的善意感动了。

Original: Seifer:I don't know how much of a bad guy you are, but you chose to do what you did.
Dialogue: I don't know how much of a bad guy you are, but you chose to do what you did.
trans: 我不知道你有多坏，但你选择了做你所做的事。

Original: Seifer:And being withdrawn and overthinking the past is just as good as not thinking at all, chicken-wuss.
Dialogue: And being withdrawn and overthinking the past is just as good as not thinking at all, chicken-wuss.
trans: 退缩和过度思考过去与根本不思考一样好，胆小鬼。

Original: Seven:You always have to be you, huh?
Dialogue: You always have to be you, huh?
trans: 你必须永远是你，对吧？

Original: Onion Knight:I wouldn't use those exact words, but he's right.
Dialogue: I wouldn't use those exact words, but he's right.
trans: 我不会用那些确切的词，但他是对的。

Original: Onion Knight:Blaming yourself for the past isn't going to get you anywhere.
Dialogue: Blaming yourself for the past isn't going to get you anywhere.
trans: 为过去责备自己不会让你有任何进展。

Original: Warrior of Light:Being a warrior of both light and darkness, there must be something only you can do.
Dialogue: Being a warrior of both light and darkness, there must be something only you can do.
trans: 作为光明与黑暗的战士，一定有只有你能做到的事情。

Original: Warrior of Light:And when you discover what that is, we will all fight by your side.
Dialogue: And when you discover what that is, we will all fight by your side.
trans: 当你发现那是什么时，我们都会与你并肩作战。

Original: Cecil:Something I can do. Something I must do.
Dialogue: Something I can do. Something I must do.
trans: 我能做的事。

Original: Cecil:Right. I must move on.
Dialogue: Right. I must move on.
trans: 正确的。

Original: Cecil:You have opened my eyes. Thank you.
Dialogue: You have opened my eyes. Thank you.
trans: 你让我大开眼界。

Original: Golbez:I see you've regained the holy power.
Dialogue: I see you've regained the holy power.
trans: 我看你已经恢复了神圣的力量。

Original: Golbez:With the guidance of these hands coated with darkness.
Dialogue: With the guidance of these hands coated with darkness.
trans: 在这些涂满黑暗的手的引导下。

Original: Ramza:Your guidance?
Dialogue: Your guidance?
trans: 你的指导？

Original: Ramza:You were behind this? You lead Cecil there and allowed him to regain his memories!?
Dialogue: You were behind this? You lead Cecil there and allowed him to regain his memories!?
trans: 你是幕后黑手？

Original: Cecil:Is that true?
Dialogue: Is that true?
trans: 真的吗？

Original: Golbez:I merely showed you the way. The rest was due to your own will and the bonds you share with your allies.
Dialogue: I merely showed you the way. The rest was due to your own will and the bonds you share with your allies.
trans: 我只是给你指明了道路。

Original: Zidane:Weren't you worried?
Dialogue: Weren't you worried?
trans: 你不担心吗？

Original: Cecil:I sense no evil from you. You are in control of yourself.
Dialogue: I sense no evil from you. You are in control of yourself.
trans: 我从你身上感觉不到任何邪恶。

Original: Golbez:I was concerned as you'd lost your power. I'd been waiting for you to regain it.
Dialogue: I was concerned as you'd lost your power. I'd been waiting for you to regain it.
trans: 我很担心你失去了力量。

Original: Vaan:You don't seem like such a bad guy. Why did you act like you don't like us?
Dialogue: You don't seem like such a bad guy. Why did you act like you don't like us?
trans: 你看起来不像是个坏人。

Original: Golbez:...My sins shall never be forgotten or forgiven.
Dialogue: ...My sins shall never be forgotten or forgiven.
trans: ......我的罪恶永远不会被遗忘或宽恕。

Original: Golbez:Cecil! You must use that power to defeat me!
Dialogue: Cecil! You must use that power to defeat me!
trans: 塞西尔！

Original: Cecil:Why!? There is no reason for us to fight in this world!
Dialogue: Why!? There is no reason for us to fight in this world!
trans: 为什么！？

Original: Golbez:Can you forgive me? For letting nations burn and killing countless innocent souls?
Dialogue: Can you forgive me? For letting nations burn and killing countless innocent souls?
trans: 你能原谅我吗？

Original: Cecil:That... I...
Dialogue: That... I...

Original: Vaan:I thought he's not brainwashed! Why do you have to fight?
Dialogue: I thought he's not brainwashed! Why do you have to fight?
trans: 我还以为他没被洗脑呢！

Original: Zidane:...It's not that simple.
Dialogue: ...It's not that simple.
trans: ……没那么简单。

Original: Ramza:Even family can stray far enough to become strangers or enemies.
Dialogue: Even family can stray far enough to become strangers or enemies.
trans: 甚至家人也可能走得太远，变成陌生人或敌人。

Original: Vaan:You're both alive, you're both here, so just talk it over!
Dialogue: You're both alive, you're both here, so just talk it over!
trans: 你们都还活着，你们都在这里，那就好好谈谈吧！

Original: Ramza:I understand how you feel, but this is a choice Cecil has to make.
Dialogue: I understand how you feel, but this is a choice Cecil has to make.
trans: 我理解你的感受，但这是塞西尔必须做出的选择。

Original: Cecil:I...am not ready...
Dialogue: I...am not ready...
trans: 我还没准备好...

Original: Golbez:If you lack the courage, I will strike first!
Dialogue: If you lack the courage, I will strike first!
trans: 胆子不够，我先下手为强！

Original: Cecil:Everyone, please... With me!
Dialogue: Everyone, please... With me!
trans: 大家，请……和我一起！

Original: Golbez:Cecil, you and I are as incompatible as light and darkness!
Dialogue: Cecil, you and I are as incompatible as light and darkness!
trans: 塞西尔，你我就像光明与黑暗一样格格不入！

Original: Cecil:You're wrong!
Dialogue: You're wrong!
trans: 你错了！

Original: Cecil:I have learned from my friends... Light and dark are two sides of the same coin...
Dialogue: I have learned from my friends... Light and dark are two sides of the same coin...
trans: 我从我的朋友那里学到...光明与黑暗是同一枚硬币的两个面...

Original: Golbez:Then prove it with that sword!
Dialogue: Then prove it with that sword!
trans: 那就用那把剑来证明吧！

Original: Golbez:You lack the courage to finish it.
Dialogue: You lack the courage to finish it.
trans: 你缺乏完成它的勇气。

Original: Vivi:Why are you fighting? You're family.
Dialogue: Why are you fighting? You're family.
trans: 你为什么要打架？

Original: Golbez:Indeed we share the same blood. But I have caused much pain and suffering.
Dialogue: Indeed we share the same blood. But I have caused much pain and suffering.
trans: 的确，我们拥有相同的血统。

Original: Golbez:Evil took over me and reached the dark corners of my heart.
Dialogue: Evil took over me and reached the dark corners of my heart.
trans: 邪恶接管了我，到达了我内心的黑暗角落。

Original: Golbez:Even if I were to return to my world, there is no place for me there.
Dialogue: Even if I were to return to my world, there is no place for me there.
trans: 就算回到我的世界，那里也没有我的位置。

Original: Terra:So you wish for him to take your life?
Dialogue: So you wish for him to take your life?
trans: 所以你希望他夺走你的生命？

Original: Cait Sith:Not everything has to be so complicated.
Dialogue: Not everything has to be so complicated.
trans: 并非所有事情都必须如此复杂。

Original: Cait Sith:I understand your situation, but you need to look at what you're doing to those around you.
Dialogue: I understand your situation, but you need to look at what you're doing to those around you.
trans: 我理解你的情况，但你需要看看你对周围的人做了什么。

Original: Cait Sith:You're causing them trouble with your selfish logic. I don't like that at all.
Dialogue: You're causing them trouble with your selfish logic. I don't like that at all.
trans: 你的自私逻辑给他们带来了麻烦。

Original: Golbez:I don't expect nor need you to understand.
Dialogue: I don't expect nor need you to understand.
trans: 我不期望也不需要你理解。

Original: Vivi:And he's gone...
Dialogue: And he's gone...
trans: 而他走了...

Original: Terra:We can't just leave him be. He's a danger to himself.
Dialogue: We can't just leave him be. He's a danger to himself.
trans: 我们不能就这样放过他。

Original: Cecil:I know, but...I doubted what was right.
Dialogue: I know, but...I doubted what was right.
trans: 我知道，但是……我怀疑什么是对的。

Original: Cecil:When I think of all that has happened, I do not quite know how I feel yet.
Dialogue: When I think of all that has happened, I do not quite know how I feel yet.
trans: 当我想起发生的一切时，我还不太清楚自己的感受。

Original: Vivi:He must've done some really bad things.
Dialogue: He must've done some really bad things.
trans: 他肯定做了一些非常糟糕的事情。

Original: Cait Sith:But disappearing in this strange world seems irresponsible.
Dialogue: But disappearing in this strange world seems irresponsible.
trans: 但是消失在这个陌生的世界里似乎是不负责任的。

Original: Cait Sith:There must be a way for him to take responsibility in his own world.
Dialogue: There must be a way for him to take responsibility in his own world.
trans: 一定有办法让他在自己的世界里承担责任。

Original: Cecil:He did. He tried.
Dialogue: He did. He tried.
trans: 他做到了。

Original: Cecil:When he became free of the evil, he was determined to destroy it.
Dialogue: When he became free of the evil, he was determined to destroy it.
trans: 当他摆脱邪恶时，他决心摧毁它。

Original: Terra:It won't do him any good to disappear here.
Dialogue: It won't do him any good to disappear here.
trans: 消失在这里对他没有任何好处。

Original: Cait Sith:That wouldn't sit well with you either, would it?
Dialogue: That wouldn't sit well with you either, would it?
trans: 那也不适合你，是吗？

Original: Cait Sith:Do you know where he went?
Dialogue: Do you know where he went?
trans: 你知道他去哪儿了吗？

Original: Mog:No, kupo.
Dialogue: No, kupo.
trans: 无权利。

Original: Mog:But with Cecil's strength of will, he may be able to lead us to him, kupo!
Dialogue: But with Cecil's strength of will, he may be able to lead us to him, kupo!
trans: 但以塞西尔的意志力，他或许能带领我们找到他，库波！

Original: Terra:We can open Torsions, too... You need to try, Cecil!
Dialogue: We can open Torsions, too... You need to try, Cecil!
trans: 我们也可以打开 Torsions……塞西尔，你需要试试！

Original: Cecil:I will.
Dialogue: I will.
trans: 我会。

Original: Cecil:I don't wish to lose my brother. Not here.
Dialogue: I don't wish to lose my brother. Not here.
trans: 我不想失去我的兄弟。

Original: Golbez:Dark warlock, Exdeath. What are you doing here?
Dialogue: Dark warlock, Exdeath. What are you doing here?
trans: 黑暗术士，Exdeath。

Original: Exdeath:Connecting time and space.
Dialogue: Connecting time and space.
trans: 连接时间和空间。

Original: Golbez:What do you mean?
Dialogue: What do you mean?
trans: 你是什​​么意思？

Original: Exdeath:These are no ordinary passages. As I recall, you were able to summon your fleet.
Dialogue: These are no ordinary passages. As I recall, you were able to summon your fleet.
trans: 这些不是普通的段落。

Original: Exdeath:You also prepared an airship to guide your brother.
Dialogue: You also prepared an airship to guide your brother.
trans: 你还准备了一艘飞艇来为你的兄弟导航。

Original: Exdeath:How very human of you. Hardly tinged with evil.
Dialogue: How very human of you. Hardly tinged with evil.
trans: 你多么人性化。

Original: Golbez:I've heard enough. Step aside.
Dialogue: I've heard enough. Step aside.
trans: 我听够了。

Original: Exdeath:Mwahaha... There is no need to hurry.
Dialogue: Mwahaha... There is no need to hurry.
trans: 哇哈哈……不用着急。

Original: Exdeath:These powers allow me to do such as this.
Dialogue: These powers allow me to do such as this.
trans: 这些力量允许我这样做。

Original: Golbez:You used the Torsions to bend space and time.
Dialogue: You used the Torsions to bend space and time.
trans: 您使用了 Torsions 来弯曲空间和时间。

Original: Golbez:Others with such powers may well use them to trap my brother.
Dialogue: Others with such powers may well use them to trap my brother.
trans: 其他拥有这种力量的人很可能会利用它们来困住我的兄弟。

Original: Exdeath:Golbez, you desire to vanish from this world for your sins.
Dialogue: Golbez, you desire to vanish from this world for your sins.
trans: Golbez，你想因为你的罪孽从这个世界上消失。

Original: Exdeath:Then heed my words.
Dialogue: Then heed my words.
trans: 然后注意我的话。

Original: Golbez:You mistake me for a desperate fool.
Dialogue: You mistake me for a desperate fool.
trans: 你误会我是一个绝望的傻瓜。

Original: Golbez:I wish to make things right to bring order to my world while I can.
Dialogue: I wish to make things right to bring order to my world while I can.
trans: 我希望在我力所能及的时候把事情做好，让我的世界秩序井​​然。

Original: Exdeath:Mwahaha... 'Tis the same thing.
Dialogue: Mwahaha... 'Tis the same thing.
trans: Mwahaha...'这是同一件事。

Original: Exdeath:You are the vessel for evil. Without you, it will be no more.
Dialogue: You are the vessel for evil. Without you, it will be no more.
trans: 你是邪恶的容器。

Original: Golbez:So what will you do? Do you wish to kill me?
Dialogue: So what will you do? Do you wish to kill me?
trans: 那你会怎么做？

Original: Golbez:Spiritus would not be happy if his warriors waged war against one another.
Dialogue: Spiritus would not be happy if his warriors waged war against one another.
trans: 如果他的战士们互相开战，斯皮里图斯会不高兴。

Original: Exdeath:This forest once imprisoned me.
Dialogue: This forest once imprisoned me.
trans: 这片森林曾经囚禁过我。

Original: Exdeath:Now I will imprison you, and banish this place to where not even the gods can reach you!
Dialogue: Now I will imprison you, and banish this place to where not even the gods can reach you!
trans: 现在我要将你囚禁起来，放逐到连神都无法触及的地方！

Original: Golbez:And I will be alone and unable to do any harm.
Dialogue: And I will be alone and unable to do any harm.
trans: 而我将独自一人，无法造成任何伤害。

Original: Yuffie:Why is Cecil being such a bummer? He got his memories back.
Dialogue: Why is Cecil being such a bummer? He got his memories back.
trans: 为什么塞西尔这么无赖？

Original: Irvine:I don't know. One would think he remembered the good as well as the bad.
Dialogue: I don't know. One would think he remembered the good as well as the bad.
trans: 我不知道。

Original: Kain:He's always been burdened with a strong sense of responsibility.
Dialogue: He's always been burdened with a strong sense of responsibility.
trans: 他一直背负着强烈的责任感。

Original: Kain:He was raised by theKing of Baronand appointed captain of theRed Wingsat a young age.
Dialogue: He was raised by the King of Baron and appointed captain of the Red Wings at a young age.
trans: 他由男爵国王抚养长大，年纪轻轻就被任命为红翼队队长。

Original: Layle:But not all royalty is like that. There are some commonplace kings who fancy themselves ladykillers.
Dialogue: But not all royalty is like that. There are some commonplace kings who fancy themselves ladykillers.
trans: 但并非所有的皇室都是这样。

Original: Edgar:To not make advances would otherwise be rude to the lady.
Dialogue: To not make advances would otherwise be rude to the lady.
trans: 否则，不取得进展对这位女士来说是无礼的。

Original: Yuffie:Speaking of bummers!
Dialogue: Speaking of bummers!
trans: 说到无赖！

Original: Edge:What is it, Yuffie? I don't have time
Dialogue: What is it, Yuffie? I don't have time—
trans: 什么事，尤菲？

Original: Yuffie:You don't have time for what? To be your arrogant, loudmouth self?
Dialogue: You don't have time for what? To be your arrogant, loudmouth self?
trans: 你没有时间做什么？

Original: Edge:Watch it! You don't know what I'm going
Dialogue: Watch it! You don't know what I'm going—
trans: 看它！

Original: Edge:Hey! Give that back!
Dialogue: Hey! Give that back!
trans: 嘿！

Original: Yuffie:You're not gonna catch me feeling sorry for yourself!
Dialogue: You're not gonna catch me feeling sorry for yourself!
trans: 你不会发现我为自己感到难过！

Original: Irvine:She always knows how to have fun.
Dialogue: She always knows how to have fun.
trans: 她总是知道如何玩得开心。

Original: Edgar:Am I really commonplace?
Dialogue: Am I really commonplace?
trans: 我真的很普通吗？

Original: Kain:No. You emanate royalty.
Dialogue: No. You emanate royalty.
trans: 不，你散发着皇室气息。

Original: Layle:I don't do well around people too serious or formal anyway. You're just right in my book.
Dialogue: I don't do well around people too serious or formal anyway. You're just right in my book.
trans: 无论如何，我在太严肃或太正式的人面前表现不佳。

Original: Edge:Come back here!
Dialogue: Come back here!
trans: 回到这来！

Original: Yuffie:In your dreams!
Dialogue: In your dreams!
trans: 在你梦里！

Original: Layle:That's not to say I'm a fan of loud and rambunctious either.
Dialogue: That's not to say I'm a fan of loud and rambunctious either.
trans: 这并不是说我喜欢大声喧哗。

Original: Irvine:Why don't you give 'em a little knock back?
Dialogue: Why don't you give 'em a little knock back?
trans: 你为什么不给他们一点回击？

Original: Edgar:I wouldn't do that if I were you. I'd be worried about payback.
Dialogue: I wouldn't do that if I were you. I'd be worried about payback.
trans: 如果我是你，我不会那样做。

Original: Kain:Ha. I couldn't ask for better comrades.
Dialogue: Ha. I couldn't ask for better comrades.
trans: 哈。

Original: Kain:They just need time. They'll be back to their old selves sooner than later.
Dialogue: They just need time. They'll be back to their old selves sooner than later.
trans: 他们只是需要时间。

Original: Cecil:It worked!
Dialogue: It worked!
trans: 有效！

Original: Edgar:It did indeed! The bond of family is strong.
Dialogue: It did indeed! The bond of family is strong.
trans: 确实如此！

Original: Golbez:You've finally come to end this.
Dialogue: You've finally come to end this.
trans: 你终于来结束这一切了。

Original: Cecil:No! I...don't know anything yet.
Dialogue: No! I...don't know anything yet.
trans: 不！

Original: Sabin:Why don't you start by calling him "brother"?
Dialogue: Why don't you start by calling him "brother"?
trans: 你为什么不先叫他“兄弟”呢？

Original: Ramza:This is their affair. We should let them decide what should be done.
Dialogue: This is their affair. We should let them decide what should be done.
trans: 这是他们的事。

Original: Zidane:They've been apart for so long. They're going to need time to get close.
Dialogue: They've been apart for so long. They're going to need time to get close.
trans: 他们已经分开这么久了。

Original: Sabin:Why are things so complicated in other worlds?
Dialogue: Why are things so complicated in other worlds?
trans: 为什么异世界的事情那么复杂？

Original: Edgar:There's a reason behind everything. For now, let's focus on the problem at hand.
Dialogue: There's a reason behind everything. For now, let's focus on the problem at hand.
trans: 一切背后都有原因。

Original: Golbez:Cecil, I don't want your pity.
Dialogue: Cecil, I don't want your pity.
trans: 塞西尔，我不要你的怜悯。

Original: Golbez:Perhaps I will take their lives. Then your hatred should be enough to do what you should've done before!
Dialogue: Perhaps I will take their lives. Then your hatred should be enough to do what you should've done before!
trans: 也许我会夺走他们的生命。

Original: Edgar:It looks like we have a fight on our hands.
Dialogue: It looks like we have a fight on our hands.
trans: 看来我们要打架了。

Original: Ramza:Why do you make no effort to listen to us!?
Dialogue: Why do you make no effort to listen to us!?
trans: 你为什么不努力听我们说话！？

Original: Cecil:I'm left with no choice.
Dialogue: I'm left with no choice.
trans: 我别无选择。

Original: Golbez:Fight for the sake of your friends!
Dialogue: Fight for the sake of your friends!
trans: 为了你的朋友而战！

Original: Cecil:Why do you continue this villainous act? There is no more need to fight!
Dialogue: Why do you continue this villainous act? There is no more need to fight!
trans: 你为什么要继续这种恶行？

Original: Golbez:You are the only one who thinks that way.
Dialogue: You are the only one who thinks that way.
trans: 你是唯一一个这样想的人。

Original: Golbez:My sins...cannot be forgiven so easily!
Dialogue: My sins...cannot be forgiven so easily!
trans: 我的罪孽……可不是那么容易被原谅的！

Original: Exdeath:Mwahaha! Here you are.
Dialogue: Mwahaha! Here you are.
trans: 哇！

Original: Exdeath:How convenient.
Dialogue: How convenient.
trans: 多么方便。

Original: Edge:What's wrong with him? Why isn't he doing anything?
Dialogue: What's wrong with him? Why isn't he doing anything?
trans: 他究竟怎么了？

Original: Cecil:He...he can't! You must try to fight it!
Dialogue: He...he can't! You must try to fight it!
trans: 他……他不能！

Original: Exdeath:There is no need.
Dialogue: There is no need.
trans: 没有必要。

Original: Exdeath:He is about to fall into an eternal slumber. He will return to the Void.
Dialogue: He is about to fall into an eternal slumber. He will return to the Void.
trans: 他即将陷入永恒的沉睡。

Original: Exdeath:Left only with his sins and his darkness, he will disappear to a place out of reach by all.
Dialogue: Left only with his sins and his darkness, he will disappear to a place out of reach by all.
trans: 只剩下他的罪恶和黑暗，他将消失在一个所有人都无法触及的地方。

Original: Exdeath:Does he not deserve this punishment for his actions?
Dialogue: Does he not deserve this punishment for his actions?
trans: 难道他不应该为他的行为受到这种惩罚吗？

Original: Bartz:You're the only one who thinks the Void is something great!
Dialogue: You're the only one who thinks the Void is something great!
trans: 你是唯一认为 Void 很棒的人！

Original: Bartz:All alone, devoid of feelings... You can't justify sending anyone to a place like that!
Dialogue: All alone, devoid of feelings... You can't justify sending anyone to a place like that!
trans: 一个人，没有感情……你不能为把任何人送到那样的地方找借口！

Original: Cecil:You need to live to atone for your sins.
Dialogue: You need to live to atone for your sins.
trans: 你需要活着来赎罪。

Original: Cecil:Unhand my brother at once!
Dialogue: Unhand my brother at once!
trans: 立刻放开我的兄弟！

Original: Exdeath:Mwa-haha... I am the villain? For sealing away evil?
Dialogue: Mwa-haha... I am the villain? For sealing away evil?
trans: 哇哈哈……我是反派？

Original: Exdeath:I shall give this one what he desires.
Dialogue: I shall give this one what he desires.
trans: 我会给这个人他想要的。

Original: Cecil:None shall let you do as you please!
Dialogue: None shall let you do as you please!
trans: 没人能让你为所欲为！

Original: Exdeath:Is this not what he desires...and deserves?
Dialogue: Is this not what he desires...and deserves?
trans: 这难道不是他想要的……和应得的吗？

Original: Galuf:We will fight you as many times as you want. And we will always win!
Dialogue: We will fight you as many times as you want. And we will always win!
trans: 你想打多少次我们就打多少次。

Original: Exdeath:Mwahaha! You will regret those words!
Dialogue: Mwahaha! You will regret those words!
trans: 哇哈哈！

Original: Cecil:You're awake!
Dialogue: You're awake!
trans: 你醒了！

Original: Golbez:Cecil? ...I was bound by Exdeath, was I not?
Dialogue: Cecil? ...I was bound by Exdeath, was I not?
trans: 塞西尔？

Original: Golbez:Take your allies and leave. This is a false place he created.
Dialogue: Take your allies and leave. This is a false place he created.
trans: 带上你的盟友离开。

Original: Bartz:Wait, the mist is clearing.
Dialogue: Wait, the mist is clearing.
trans: 等等，迷雾散去。

Original: Bartz:So this is what it looks like.
Dialogue: So this is what it looks like.
trans: 这就是它的样子。

Original: Golbez:His influence over this place is gone.
Dialogue: His influence over this place is gone.
trans: 他对这个地方的影响力消失了。

Original: Cecil:You worried for our safety.
Dialogue: You worried for our safety.
trans: 你担心我们的安全。

Original: Golbez:I didn't expect to be alive this long.
Dialogue: I didn't expect to be alive this long.
trans: 没想到能活这么久。

Original: Galuf:Young man.
Dialogue: Young man.
trans: 年轻人。

Original: Golbez:I suppose in your eyes I am young.
Dialogue: I suppose in your eyes I am young.
trans: 我想在你眼里我还年轻。

Original: Galuf:We're from different worlds, and I don't know what you did.
Dialogue: We're from different worlds, and I don't know what you did.
trans: 我们来自不同的世界，我不知道你做了什么。

Original: Galuf:But if you wish to atone...
Dialogue: But if you wish to atone...
trans: 但如果你想赎罪...

Original: Galuf:The answer doesn't lie in death.
Dialogue: The answer doesn't lie in death.
trans: 答案不在于死亡。

Original: Galuf:Surrendering to the Void helps no one.
Dialogue: Surrendering to the Void helps no one.
trans: 屈服于虚空对任何人都没有帮助。

Original: Galuf:If you truly wish to repent, you must live until your time comes.
Dialogue: If you truly wish to repent, you must live until your time comes.
trans: 如果你真的想悔改，你必须活到你的时间到来。

Original: Golbez:Hmph. I shall contemplate the words of my elders.
Dialogue: Hmph. I shall contemplate the words of my elders.
trans: 哼。

Original: Bartz:Why don't you come with us? There's a lot you probably want to talk about.
Dialogue: Why don't you come with us? There's a lot you probably want to talk about.
trans: 你为什么不和我们一起去？

Original: Golbez:There is still something I need to do.
Dialogue: There is still something I need to do.
trans: 我还有事情要做。

Original: Golbez:And you need time to collect your thoughts.
Dialogue: And you need time to collect your thoughts.
trans: 你需要时间来收集你的想法。

Original: Cecil:Wait, I
Dialogue: Wait, I—
trans: 等等，我——

Original: Bartz:He didn't hear you. Should we go after him?
Dialogue: He didn't hear you. Should we go after him?
trans: 他没有听到你的话。

Original: Cecil:No, we both need more time.
Dialogue: No, we both need more time.
trans: 不，我们都需要更多时间。

Original: Bartz:I guess we'll let the wind take us where it takes us.
Dialogue: I guess we'll let the wind take us where it takes us.
trans: 我想我们会让风把我们带到它去的地方。

Original: Cecil:Perhaps Mog may know where we are.
Dialogue: Perhaps Mog may know where we are.
trans: 也许莫格知道我们在哪里。

Original: Galuf:Everyone must be surprised, seeing their surroundings suddenly change.
Dialogue: Everyone must be surprised, seeing their surroundings suddenly change.
trans: 看到周围突然发生变化，所有人一定都吃了一惊。

Original: Spiritus:Golbez. I let you make your own choice, and you chose death.
Dialogue: Golbez. I let you make your own choice, and you chose death.
trans: 戈尔贝兹。

Original: Spiritus:I cannot turn a blind eye to those who wish to break free from strife.
Dialogue: I cannot turn a blind eye to those who wish to break free from strife.
trans: 我不能对那些想摆脱纷争的人视而不见。

Original: Spiritus:You must all fight amongst yourselves. There is no meaning in rest.
Dialogue: You must all fight amongst yourselves. There is no meaning in rest.
trans: 你们都必须自相残杀。

Original: Spiritus:However, if this world becomes uncontrollable, the other world will also cease to exist.
Dialogue: However, if this world becomes uncontrollable, the other world will also cease to exist.
trans: 但是，如果这个世界变得无法控制，那么另一个世界也将不复存在。

Original: Spiritus:Perhaps it is time I intervene.
Dialogue: Perhaps it is time I intervene.
trans: 也许是我介入的时候了。

Original: Spiritus:...No, not yet. Their motives are bringing them together.
Dialogue: ...No, not yet. Their motives are bringing them together.
trans: ...还没有。

Original: Spiritus:Unlike Materia, I will not enslave my warriors with objectives.
Dialogue: Unlike Materia, I will not enslave my warriors with objectives.
trans: 与 Materia 不同，我不会用目标来奴役我的战士。

Original: Materia:There is light within one of Spiritus's warriors.
Dialogue: There is light within one of Spiritus's warriors.
trans: Spiritus 的一名战士体内有光。

Original: Materia:But one should not trust so easily. Memories, at times, can be rattling.
Dialogue: But one should not trust so easily. Memories, at times, can be rattling.
trans: 但是一个人不应该那么容易相信。

Original: Materia:I am the only one who can protect this world.
Dialogue: I am the only one who can protect this world.
trans: 我是唯一能保护这个世界的人。

Original: Materia:I will not let anyone destroy this fantasy.
Dialogue: I will not let anyone destroy this fantasy.
trans: 我不会让任何人破坏这个幻想。

Original: Mog:This area is unstable, kupo. There may be a planesgorger!
Dialogue: This area is unstable, kupo. There may be a planesgorger!
trans: 这个地区不稳定，库波。

Original: Faris:These ruins probably house some tough monsters as well.
Dialogue: These ruins probably house some tough monsters as well.
trans: 这些遗迹可能也住着一些强悍的怪物。

Original: Mog:Keep your wits about you, kupo!
Dialogue: Keep your wits about you, kupo!
trans: 保持你的智慧，库波！

Original: Krile:Is it true that the forest we were in was a creation of Exdeath?
Dialogue: Is it true that the forest we were in was a creation of Exdeath?
trans: 我们所在的森林真的是艾克斯迪斯的杰作吗？

Original: Mog:I didn't know anyone could create such illusions, kupo.
Dialogue: I didn't know anyone could create such illusions, kupo.
trans: 我不知道有谁能制造出这样的幻觉，库波。

Original: Mog:He must've chosen a space that was made unstable by the planesgorger, kupo!
Dialogue: He must've chosen a space that was made unstable by the planesgorger, kupo!
trans: 他一定是选择了一个被位面吞噬者 kupo 弄得不稳定的空间！

Original: Krile:That forest was scary. I didn't want to fight there.
Dialogue: That forest was scary. I didn't want to fight there.
trans: 那片森林很可怕。

Original: Papalymo:They can easily recreate locations that belong in our memories.
Dialogue: They can easily recreate locations that belong in our memories.
trans: 他们可以轻松地重建属于我们记忆中的地点。

Original: Faris:So we'll have to deal with it again?
Dialogue: So we'll have to deal with it again?
trans: 所以我们将不得不再次处理它？

Original: Papalymo:They won't affect you if you stay true to your beliefs.
Dialogue: They won't affect you if you stay true to your beliefs.
trans: 如果您坚持自己的信念，它们就不会影响您。

Original: Edge:My beliefs, huh.
Dialogue: My beliefs, huh.
trans: 我的信念，嗯。

Original: Edge:When I got my memories back, everyone asked me what I wanted, what my goal was.
Dialogue: When I got my memories back, everyone asked me what I wanted, what my goal was.
trans: 当我恢复记忆时，每个人都问我想要什么，我的目标是什么。

Original: Cecil:And your answer?
Dialogue: And your answer?
trans: 你的答案呢？

Original: Edge:I didn't have one then. Everything came rushing back, and all I could focus on was what I'd lost.
Dialogue: I didn't have one then. Everything came rushing back, and all I could focus on was what I'd lost.
trans: 那时我没有。

Original: Edge:But there are people I want to protect in my world and in this one.
Dialogue: But there are people I want to protect in my world and in this one.
trans: 但在我的世界和这个世界里，有些人是我想保护的。

Original: Edge:And this time I'm gonna protect them! That's what I want.
Dialogue: And this time I'm gonna protect them! That's what I want.
trans: 而这一次，我要保护他们！

Original: Cecil:I think I know, too, what I desire.
Dialogue: I think I know, too, what I desire.
trans: 我想我也知道我想要什么。

Original: Cecil:The sacrifices, my brother's sins. Neither will easily be forgiven.
Dialogue: The sacrifices, my brother's sins. Neither will easily be forgiven.
trans: 牺牲，我兄弟的罪过。

Original: Cecil:But I must learn about my family, about him.
Dialogue: But I must learn about my family, about him.
trans: 但我必须了解我的家人，了解他。

Original: Faris:The idea of a sibling isn't so bad after all, huh?
Dialogue: The idea of a sibling isn't so bad after all, huh?
trans: 兄弟姐妹的想法毕竟不是那么糟糕，是吧？

Original: Faris:Despite the past, you want to know about him, don't you?
Dialogue: Despite the past, you want to know about him, don't you?
trans: 尽管有过去，但你想了解他，不是吗？

Original: Cecil:Of course. I'd been an orphan all this time.
Dialogue: Of course. I'd been an orphan all this time.
trans: 当然。

Original: Cecil:My father's love taught me what it was like to have family.
Dialogue: My father's love taught me what it was like to have family.
trans: 父亲的爱教会了我拥有家庭的滋味。

Original: Cecil:After I discovered the truth about Golbez, we were torn apart. I know nothing of him as a brother.
Dialogue: After I discovered the truth about Golbez, we were torn apart. I know nothing of him as a brother.
trans: 在我发现关于 Golbez 的真相后，我们分道扬镳了。

Original: Faris:You two are more alike than you know. You'll get along fine.
Dialogue: You two are more alike than you know. You'll get along fine.
trans: 你们两个比你知道的更相似。

Original: Cecil:We are?
Dialogue: We are?
trans: 我们是？

Original: Krile:You two think a lot alike! Haven't you noticed?
Dialogue: You two think a lot alike! Haven't you noticed?
trans: 你们两个想法很像！

Original: Papalymo:You were both blaming yourselves for everything that happened in the past.
Dialogue: You were both blaming yourselves for everything that happened in the past.
trans: 你们都在为过去发生的一切责备自己。

Original: Cecil:I... You're right.
Dialogue: I... You're right.
trans: 我……你说得对。

Original: Edge:Don't worry about us. Do what feels right.
Dialogue: Don't worry about us. Do what feels right.
trans: 别担心我们。

Original: Edge:Your biggest enemy was your brother. That's life for you.
Dialogue: Your biggest enemy was your brother. That's life for you.
trans: 你最大的敌人是你的兄弟。

Original: Cecil:Thank you. I will talk to him when we meet again.
Dialogue: Thank you. I will talk to him when we meet again.
trans: 谢谢。

Original: Cecil:The planesgorger!
Dialogue: The planesgorger!
trans: 位面吞噬者！

Original: Palom:Look at that ugly mug! Let's take it down!
Dialogue: Look at that ugly mug! Let's take it down!
trans: 看看那个丑陋的杯子！

Original: Edge:Don't judge a guy by his face... But we do need to defeat it to protect our worlds.
Dialogue: Don't judge a guy by his face... But we do need to defeat it to protect our worlds.
trans: 不要以貌取人……但我们确实需要打败它来保护我们的世界。

Original: Kain:Then there's only one thing to do.
Dialogue: Then there's only one thing to do.
trans: 然后只有一件事要做。

Original: Yang:We shall fight!
Dialogue: We shall fight!
trans: 我们要战斗！

Original: Cecil:Are you with me?
Dialogue: Are you with me?
trans: 你和我在一起吗？

Original: Kain:Of course, we're with you.
Dialogue: Of course, we're with you.
trans: 当然，我们和你在一起。

Original: Zidane:Huh? We left the airship at the top of the mountain. Why's it here?
Dialogue: Huh? We left the airship at the top of the mountain. Why's it here?
trans: 嗯？

Original: Golbez:I've been waiting. I see you managed to make it out alive.
Dialogue: I've been waiting. I see you managed to make it out alive.
trans: 我一直在等

Original: Golbez:I've disabled the automatic piloting sequence of this airship. You may use it to go anywhere you please.
Dialogue: I've disabled the automatic piloting sequence of this airship. You may use it to go anywhere you please.
trans: 我已经关闭了这艘飞艇的自动驾驶程序。

Original: Cecil:I...I call you that, but I don't know if I should.
Dialogue: I...I call you that, but I don't know if I should.
trans: 我……我这么叫你，但我不知道我是否应该这样称呼你。

Original: Cecil:I have something to ask of you. Will you join us on our mission?
Dialogue: I have something to ask of you. Will you join us on our mission?
trans: 我有件事想问你。

Original: Cecil:I feel there are things we can overcome because we are in a world not our own.
Dialogue: I feel there are things we can overcome because we are in a world not our own.
trans: 我觉得有些事情我们可以克服，因为我们生活在一个不属于我们自己的世界中。

Original: Golbez:I cannot agree to that just yet.
Dialogue: I cannot agree to that just yet.
trans: 我现在还不能同意。

Original: Golbez:I first must find my path to redemption. But there may come a time I lend you my strength.
Dialogue: I first must find my path to redemption. But there may come a time I lend you my strength.
trans: 我首先必须找到我的救赎之路。

Original: Cecil:I understand. Thank you.
Dialogue: I understand. Thank you.
trans: 我明白。

Original: Cecil:Until we meet again, Brother.
Dialogue: Until we meet again, Brother.
trans: 直到我们再次见面，兄弟。

Original: Golbez:Until we meet again.
Dialogue: Until we meet again.
trans: 直到我们再次见面。

Original: Zidane:Hey! You finally called him brother to his face.
Dialogue: Hey! You finally called him brother to his face.
trans: 嘿！

Original: Cloud:You didn't even realize, did you?
Dialogue: You didn't even realize, did you?
trans: 你甚至没有意识到，是吗？

Original: Zidane:"Brother." It has a nice ring to it, don't you think?
Dialogue: "Brother." It has a nice ring to it, don't you think?
trans: “兄弟。”

Original: Cecil:I do not know. Perhaps he thought it a nuisance.
Dialogue: I do not know. Perhaps he thought it a nuisance.
trans: 我不知道。

Original: Zidane:I don't think so. I could tell b his tone even under all that armor.
Dialogue: I don't think so. I could tell b his tone even under all that armor.
trans: 我不这么认为。

Original: Zidane:He appreciated it.
Dialogue: He appreciated it.
trans: 他很感激。

Original: Vaan:You cheated!
Dialogue: You cheated!
trans: 你作弊！

Original: Setzer:Real men don't cheat or go back on their word. It's decided. I will pilot the airship.
Dialogue: Real men don't cheat or go back on their word. It's decided. I will pilot the airship.
trans: 真正的男人不会欺骗或食言。

Original: Vaan:It's like those dice had a mind of their own. I want a do-over!
Dialogue: It's like those dice had a mind of their own. I want a do-over!
trans: 就像那些骰子有自己的想法一样。

Original: Setzer:You're acting like a child. Though I suppose you are one.
Dialogue: You're acting like a child. Though I suppose you are one.
trans: 你表现得像个孩子。

Original: Vaan:You're not playing fair!
Dialogue: You're not playing fair!
trans: 你不公平！

Original: Setzer:Cecil, are you finished? I'll be your pilot this time.
Dialogue: Cecil, are you finished? I'll be your pilot this time.
trans: 塞西尔，你完成了吗？

Original: Setzer:Though I see no reason you would mind.
Dialogue: Though I see no reason you would mind.
trans: 虽然我看不出你会介意的理由。

Original: Cloud:You two were still arguing about that?
Dialogue: You two were still arguing about that?
trans: 你们两个还在为这个吵架？

Original: Vaan:Setzer cheated! It didn't count.
Dialogue: Setzer cheated! It didn't count.
trans: 塞策被骗了！

Original: Cecil:I truly do not mind who pilots the ship.
Dialogue: I truly do not mind who pilots the ship.
trans: 我真的不介意谁驾驶这艘船。

Original: Cecil:But it seems to be ready to take off.
Dialogue: But it seems to be ready to take off.
trans: 但它似乎已经准备好起飞了。

Original: Balthier:You really thought you could beat the fastest sky pirate of them all?
Dialogue: You really thought you could beat the fastest sky pirate of them all?
trans: 你真的认为你能打败他们中速度最快的空贼吗？

Original: Vaan:Hey! No fair!
Dialogue: Hey! No fair!
trans: 嘿！

Original: Setzer:My ship!
Dialogue: My ship!
trans: 我的船！

Original: Balthier:Step aboard before I leave you all behind!
Dialogue: Step aboard before I leave you all behind!
trans: 在我把你们都抛在后面之前上船！

Original: Cloud:Never a dull moment around here.
Dialogue: Never a dull moment around here.
trans: 在这里永远不会沉闷。

Original: Cecil:Haha. Alright. Best be on our way.
Dialogue: Haha. Alright. Best be on our way.
trans: 哈哈。

Original: Zidane:Things would be so much easier if brothers got along.
Dialogue: Things would be so much easier if brothers got along.
trans: 如果兄弟们和睦相处，事情就会容易得多。

Original: Penelo:Zidane's been lost in thought since the whole thing with Cecil.
Dialogue: Zidane's been lost in thought since the whole thing with Cecil.
trans: 自从与塞西尔的整件事之后，齐达内就陷入了沉思。

Original: Maria:I think I understand.
Dialogue: I think I understand.
trans: 我想我明白。

Original: Maria:Do you have any brothers?
Dialogue: Do you have any brothers?
trans: 你有兄弟吗？

Original: Penelo:Yes, older ones.
Dialogue: Yes, older ones.
trans: 是的，年纪大的。

Original: Penelo:They're knights, and they taught me martial arts.
Dialogue: They're knights, and they taught me martial arts.
trans: 他们是骑士，他们教我武术。

Original: Maria:How wonderful.
Dialogue: How wonderful.
trans: 多么美妙。

Original: Penelo:They are. They were. I lost them in the war.
Dialogue: They are. They were. I lost them in the war.
trans: 他们是。

Original: Maria:Oh, I'm so sorry to hear that.
Dialogue: Oh, I'm so sorry to hear that.
trans: 哦，听到这个我很难过。

Original: Penelo:It's all right. I remember clearly who they were and what they stood for.
Dialogue: It's all right. I remember clearly who they were and what they stood for.
trans: 没关系。

Original: Vanille:You have an older brother, too, don't you, Maria?
Dialogue: You have an older brother, too, don't you, Maria?
trans: 你也有一个哥哥，不是吗，玛丽亚？

Original: Maria:Yes, but...
Dialogue: Yes, but...
trans: 对，但是...

Original: Vanille:Oh, I don't mean to pry. We all have stuff in our past that's hard to talk about.
Dialogue: Oh, I don't mean to pry. We all have stuff in our past that's hard to talk about.
trans: 哦，我不是故意撬的。

Original: Maria:Thank you. I just hope that when I see him again, things will be back to normal.
Dialogue: Thank you. I just hope that when I see him again, things will be back to normal.
trans: 谢谢。

Original: Maria:Maybe Zidane's worried about the same thing.
Dialogue: Maybe Zidane's worried about the same thing.
trans: 也许齐达内也在担心同样的事情。

Original: Zidane:Are all you ladies worried about little ol' me?
Dialogue: Are all you ladies worried about little ol' me?
trans: 你们女士们都担心我吗？

Original: Maria:A little less now! Though you do seem to be concerned about your brother...or maybe family.
Dialogue: A little less now! Though you do seem to be concerned about your brother...or maybe family.
trans: 现在少了一点！

Original: Zidane:It's complicated.
Dialogue: It's complicated.
trans: 情况很复杂。

Original: Zidane:But there's no use thinking about it right now. I just wanted to talk to you pretty girls.
Dialogue: But there's no use thinking about it right now. I just wanted to talk to you pretty girls.
trans: 但是现在想这些也没有用。

Original: Vanille:What do you all think about Golbez?
Dialogue: What do you all think about Golbez?
trans: 大家觉得 Golbez 怎么样？

Original: Vanille:Is it wrong for someone who did a bad thing to want to disappear?
Dialogue: Is it wrong for someone who did a bad thing to want to disappear?
trans: 做了坏事的人想消失有错吗？

Original: Penelo:I don't know the answer to that. I mean, if you disappear...that's forever.
Dialogue: I don't know the answer to that. I mean, if you disappear...that's forever.
trans: 我不知道答案。

Original: Zidane:I don't think people should jump at the chance to quash someone who did something bad.
Dialogue: I don't think people should jump at the chance to quash someone who did something bad.
trans: 我认为人们不应该抓住机会平息做坏事的人。

Original: Zidane:It's not easy to determine what's "good" and what's "bad."
Dialogue: It's not easy to determine what's "good" and what's "bad."
trans: 确定什么是“好”什么是“坏”并不容易。

Original: Maria:That's true. And dying means you lose your chance at redemption.
Dialogue: That's true. And dying means you lose your chance at redemption.
trans: 这是真的。

Original: Vanille:Right. I've come to think like that too.
Dialogue: Right. I've come to think like that too.
trans: 正确的。

Original: Zidane:If Cecil weren't so darn stubborn...
Dialogue: If Cecil weren't so darn stubborn...
trans: 如果塞西尔不是那么固执的话……

Original: Maria:It seems to run in the family.
Dialogue: It seems to run in the family.
trans: 它似乎在家庭中运行。

Original: Vanille:They both seem to burden themselves with so much, too.
Dialogue: They both seem to burden themselves with so much, too.
trans: 他们俩似乎也背负了太多的负担。

Original: Penelo:He shouldn't feel like he's responsible for everything...
Dialogue: He shouldn't feel like he's responsible for everything...
trans: 他不应该觉得自己对一切负责……

Original: Zidane:Well, let's do what we can for them in the meantime.
Dialogue: Well, let's do what we can for them in the meantime.
trans: 好吧，让我们在此期间为他们尽我们所能。

Original: Balthier:Can everyone hear me?
Dialogue: Can everyone hear me?
trans: 每个人都能听到我说话吗？

Original: Warrior of Light:Yes. What seems to be the problem, Balthier?
Dialogue: Yes. What seems to be the problem, Balthier?
trans: 是的。

Original: Balthier:In front of us stands a colossal tree of impassable height. Sound familiar to any of you?
Dialogue: In front of us stands a colossal tree of impassable height. Sound familiar to any of you?
trans: 在我们面前矗立着一棵高不可攀的巨树。

Original: Lenna:A giant tree...worries me.
Dialogue: A giant tree...worries me.
trans: 一棵大树……让我担心。

Original: Zidane:It can't be...!
Dialogue: It can't be...!
trans: 这不可能……！

Original: Zidane:No, it's different from anything else I've seen here... It's the spitting image of the one we know.
Dialogue: No, it's different from anything else I've seen here... It's the spitting image of the one we know.
trans: 不，它与我在这里看到的任何其他东西都不一样……这是我们所知道的随地吐痰的形象。

Original: Lenna:Maybe someone else did the same for this tree.
Dialogue: Maybe someone else did the same for this tree.
trans: 也许其他人对这棵树做了同样的事情。

Original: Balthier:If it's going to be trouble, I can always go around it.
Dialogue: If it's going to be trouble, I can always go around it.
trans: 如果这会很麻烦，我总能绕过它。

Original: Zidane:No, that tree's more than just big. We'd better check it out.
Dialogue: No, that tree's more than just big. We'd better check it out.
trans: 不，那棵树不仅仅是大。

Original: Mog:I can sense brilliance there, too, kupo!
Dialogue: I can sense brilliance there, too, kupo!
trans: 我也能感觉到那里的光辉，库波！

Original: Mog:And there's always a chance Shinryu's larvae are around with something of that size!
Dialogue: And there's always a chance Shinryu's larvae are around with something of that size!
trans: 而且 Shinryu 的幼虫总是有可能有那么大的东西！

Original: Lenna:Is it possible to land atop the tree?
Dialogue: Is it possible to land atop the tree?
trans: 有可能降落在树顶上吗？

Original: Balthier:I cannot say for sure without knowing what its structure is like.
Dialogue: I cannot say for sure without knowing what its structure is like.
trans: 如果不知道它的结构是什么样的，我不能肯定地说。

Original: Zidane:In our world, it was sealed so that no one could get close.
Dialogue: In our world, it was sealed so that no one could get close.
trans: 在我们的世界里，它是封闭的，任何人都无法靠近。

Original: Garnet:It might be too dangerous to go by airship.
Dialogue: It might be too dangerous to go by airship.
trans: 乘坐飞艇可能太危险了。

Original: Zidane:Yeah. Let's set down a ways off and hoof it.
Dialogue: Yeah. Let's set down a ways off and hoof it.
trans: 是的。

Original: Balthier:Understood. I'll search for a nice landing spot nearby.
Dialogue: Understood. I'll search for a nice landing spot nearby.
trans: 明白了。

Original: Mog:There's someone here, kupo!
Dialogue: There's someone here, kupo!
trans: 这里有人，库波！

Original: Vivi:A friend of someone's, maybe?
Dialogue: A friend of someone's, maybe?
trans: 也许是某人的朋友？

Original: Lenna:In that case, it's good that we landed.
Dialogue: In that case, it's good that we landed.
trans: 在那种情况下，我们降落是件好事。

Original: Garnet:But we can't tell if it's a friend or enemy yet.
Dialogue: But we can't tell if it's a friend or enemy yet.
trans: 但我们还不能确定它是朋友还是敌人。

Original: Warrior of Light:I would like to know more about the area. Let us find them.
Dialogue: I would like to know more about the area. Let us find them.
trans: 我想了解更多有关该地区的信息。

Original: Vivi:The Iifa Tree... I wonder who's there...
Dialogue: The Iifa Tree... I wonder who's there...
trans: Iifa 树...我想知道那里是谁...

Original: Vivi:Ah! Wait...!
Dialogue: Ah! Wait...!
trans: 啊!

Original: Vivi:Somebody...!
Dialogue: Somebody...!
trans: 有人……！

Original: Zidane:Has anyone seen Vivi?
Dialogue: Has anyone seen Vivi?
trans: 有人见过薇薇吗？

Original: Quistis:Wasn't he with you?
Dialogue: Wasn't he with you?
trans: 他没和你在一起吗？

Original: Zidane:I haven't seen him for a while. I thought maybe he fell from the airship.
Dialogue: I haven't seen him for a while. I thought maybe he fell from the airship.
trans: 我有一段时间没见到他了。

Original: Balthier:And here I thought I was driving rather well.
Dialogue: And here I thought I was driving rather well.
trans: 在这里，我认为我的驾驶相当不错。

Original: Zidane:It's not you. Vivi's fallen like that before, so I was just worried.
Dialogue: It's not you. Vivi's fallen like that before, so I was just worried.
trans: 不是你。

Original: Zidane:Have you seen him, Seifer?
Dialogue: Have you seen him, Seifer?
trans: 你见过他吗，塞弗？

Original: Seifer:The kid with the hat? Isn't that him over there?
Dialogue: The kid with the hat? Isn't that him over there?
trans: 戴帽子的孩子？

Original: Vivi?:U-umm... I...
Dialogue: U-umm... I...

Original: Mog:There's someone over there, kupo! I think they might be someone's friend!
Dialogue: There's someone over there, kupo! I think they might be someone's friend!
trans: 那边有人，库波！

Original: Quistis:What a relief! I was worried it might be an enemy.
Dialogue: What a relief! I was worried it might be an enemy.
trans: 终于解脱了！

Original: Balthier:It would be quite unfortunate to run into Spiritus's minions so soon after landing.
Dialogue: It would be quite unfortunate to run into Spiritus's minions so soon after landing.
trans: 落地这么快就撞上了斯皮里图斯的爪牙，实在是太可惜了。

Original: Seifer:You chicken-wuss...
Dialogue: You chicken-wuss...
trans: 你个胆小鬼……

Original: Balthier:Impertinent as always, I see.
Dialogue: Impertinent as always, I see.
trans: 一如既往的无礼，我明白了。

Original: Balthier:I'm afraid to inform you that that is not called "courage," but "recklessness."
Dialogue: I'm afraid to inform you that that is not called "courage," but "recklessness."
trans: 恕我直言，这不叫“勇敢”，而是“鲁莽”。

Original: Seifer:What was that!?
Dialogue: What was that!?
trans: 那是什么！？

Original: Mog:I think they're one of Materia's warriors! We should find them as soon as possible!
Dialogue: I think they're one of Materia's warriors! We should find them as soon as possible!
trans: 我认为他们是 Materia 的战士之一！

Original: Vivi?:I-it's nothing. I'm...fine.
Dialogue: I-it's nothing. I'm...fine.
trans: 我——没什么。

Original: Zidane:Fine, huh...
Dialogue: Fine, huh...
trans: 好吧，嗯...

Original: Zidane:Then let's go meet up with the others.
Dialogue: Then let's go meet up with the others.
trans: 那我们就去和其他人汇合吧。

Original: Seven:Who are you?
Dialogue: Who are you?
trans: 你是谁？

Original: ???:Hmm... What unfamiliar clothing. Perhaps they hail from another world.
Dialogue: Hmm... What unfamiliar clothing. Perhaps they hail from another world.
trans: 嗯……好陌生的衣服。

Original: ???:Have you met a man with a tail in your travels?
Dialogue: Have you met a man with a tail in your travels?
trans: 你在旅行中遇到过长尾巴的男人吗？

Original: Lightning:You must be a friend of Zidane's, then. He should be here shortly.
Dialogue: You must be a friend of Zidane's, then. He should be here shortly.
trans: 那么你一定是齐达内的朋友。

Original: ???:Please don't tell me you forgot my name.
Dialogue: Please don't tell me you forgot my name.
trans: 请不要告诉我你忘记了我的名字。

Original: Zidane:No, I remember. You're Helga. No, Christine? You used to live next door to me...Ratchel?
Dialogue: No, I remember. You're Helga. No, Christine? You used to live next door to me...Ratchel?
trans: 不，我记得。

Original: Steiner:Zidane! How dare you insult our precious comrade, Freya!?
Dialogue: Zidane! How dare you insult our precious comrade, Freya!?
trans: 齐达内！

Original: Steiner:Or could it be you've also lost your memory?
Dialogue: Or could it be you've also lost your memory?
trans: 还是说你也失忆了？

Original: Zidane:I'm just kiddin'. You know I never forget a pretty girl's name.
Dialogue: I'm just kiddin'. You know I never forget a pretty girl's name.
trans: 我只是在开玩笑。

Original: Freya:You never change, Zidane.
Dialogue: You never change, Zidane.
trans: 你永远不会改变，齐达内。

Original: Freya:Allow me to introduce myself, otherworlders. I am Freya, a dragon knight.
Dialogue: Allow me to introduce myself, otherworlders. I am Freya, a dragon knight.
trans: 请允许我自我介绍一下，异界人士。

Original: Freya:I have undertaken orders from the goddess Materia to meet you all here.
Dialogue: I have undertaken orders from the goddess Materia to meet you all here.
trans: 奉女神魔石之命，在此与大家会合。

Original: Lightning:I can tell by the way you treat these two that you're really friends.
Dialogue: I can tell by the way you treat these two that you're really friends.
trans: 从你对待这两个人的方式我可以看出你们是真正的朋友。

Original: Freya:We are, indeed. I am glad to see you all in good health. Sadly, the same cannot be said of this world...
Dialogue: We are, indeed. I am glad to see you all in good health. Sadly, the same cannot be said of this world...
trans: 我们确实是。

Original: Seven:So you know. Did Materia tell you everything?
Dialogue: So you know. Did Materia tell you everything?
trans: 所以你知道。

Original: Freya:For the most part. It came with a warning.
Dialogue: For the most part. It came with a warning.
trans: 大多数情况下。

Original: Steiner:What sort of warning!?
Dialogue: What sort of warning!?
trans: 什么样的警告！？

Original: Freya:It was about the Iifa Tree.
Dialogue: It was about the Iifa Tree.
trans: 这是关于 Iifa 树的。

Original: Freya:It was not made by the gods.
Dialogue: It was not made by the gods.
trans: 它不是神造的。

Original: Freya:...It was summoned by Kuja.
Dialogue: ...It was summoned by Kuja.
trans: ……是九爷召唤的。

Original: Seven:They said that Spiritus' warriors could summon lands they had a connection to by sheer willpower.
Dialogue: They said that Spiritus' warriors could summon lands they had a connection to by sheer willpower.
trans: 他们说 Spiritus 的战士可以通过纯粹的意志力召唤与他们有联系的土地。

Original: Seven:Is that tree special to Kuja?
Dialogue: Is that tree special to Kuja?
trans: 那棵树是九爷特有的吗？

Original: Steiner:Not just Kuja, but everyone in our world.
Dialogue: Not just Kuja, but everyone in our world.
trans: 不只是 Kuja，而是我们世界上的每个人。

Original: Steiner:Grr... I cannot just stand by any longer!
Dialogue: Grr... I cannot just stand by any longer!
trans: 呜……我不能再袖手旁观了！

Original: Freya:I tried to investigate the tree, but encountered a cavern along the way.
Dialogue: I tried to investigate the tree, but encountered a cavern along the way.
trans: 我试图调查这棵树，但沿途遇到了一个洞穴。

Original: Freya:The entrance was blocked with ice that I could not move.
Dialogue: The entrance was blocked with ice that I could not move.
trans: 入口被冰封住了，我无法移动。

Original: Lightning:Well, that should be no problem for us.
Dialogue: Well, that should be no problem for us.
trans: 好吧，那对我们来说应该没有问题。

Original: Lightning:Our mages and muscleheads can take care of that.
Dialogue: Our mages and muscleheads can take care of that.
trans: 我们的法师和 muscleheads 可以解决这个问题。

Original: Zidane:I wonder what he's up to...
Dialogue: I wonder what he's up to...
trans: 我想知道他在干什么...

Original: Seven:What's wrong, Zidane? You look pale.
Dialogue: What's wrong, Zidane? You look pale.
trans: 怎么了，齐达内？

Original: Zidane:I-it's nothing! Sorry for worrying you.
Dialogue: I-it's nothing! Sorry for worrying you.
trans: 我——没什么！

Original: Mog:Did you find your friend, kupo?
Dialogue: Did you find your friend, kupo?
trans: 你找到你的朋友了吗，库波？

Original: Steiner:Yes, Mog. Have you learned anything else about the area?
Dialogue: Yes, Mog. Have you learned anything else about the area?
trans: 是的，莫格。

Original: Zidane:Then what are we waiting for? You coming, Freya?
Dialogue: Then what are we waiting for? You coming, Freya?
trans: 那我们还等什么呢？

Original: Freya:But of course. I shall wield my spear for the sake of the world.
Dialogue: But of course. I shall wield my spear for the sake of the world.
trans: 但是当然。

Original: Garnet:So this is the cave Freya was talking about. The entrance is blocked, like she said...
Dialogue: So this is the cave Freya was talking about. The entrance is blocked, like she said...
trans: 这就是芙蕾雅所说的洞穴。

Original: Papalymo:Is this how it was in your world?
Dialogue: Is this how it was in your world?
trans: 你的世界是这样的吗？

Original: Garnet:Yes. Back home, Vivi was able to dispel the ice with magic.
Dialogue: Yes. Back home, Vivi was able to dispel the ice with magic.
trans: 是的。

Original: Vivi?:Huh? R-right... Umm...
Dialogue: Huh? R-right... Umm...
trans: 嗯？

Original: Palom:Hey now! I won't let Vivi be the only one to show off his spells!
Dialogue: Hey now! I won't let Vivi be the only one to show off his spells!
trans: 嘿现在！

Original: Palom:I can cast fire, too!
Dialogue: I can cast fire, too!
trans: 我也会放火！

Original: Terra:Do you need our magic?
Dialogue: Do you need our magic?
trans: 你需要我们的魔法吗？

Original: Palom:You're going to help, too? Let's all three of us compete to see who gets to do it!
Dialogue: You're going to help, too? Let's all three of us compete to see who gets to do it!
trans: 你也要帮忙？

Original: Terra:Since you can both do it, I'll happily watch from the sidelines.
Dialogue: Since you can both do it, I'll happily watch from the sidelines.
trans: 既然你们都能做到，我就乐意在一旁观看。

Original: Palom:What? But that's boring!
Dialogue: What? But that's boring!
trans: 什么？

Original: Palom:Wouldn't it have been fun to compete against Terra?
Dialogue: Wouldn't it have been fun to compete against Terra?
trans: 与 Terra 竞争不是很有趣吗？

Original: Vivi?:Um... I don't mind...
Dialogue: Um... I don't mind...
trans: 嗯……我不介意……

Original: Palom:You okay, Vivi? Does your stomach hurt?
Dialogue: You okay, Vivi? Does your stomach hurt?
trans: 你还好吗，薇薇？

Original: Terra:Is something the matter? There's no need to be afraid.
Dialogue: Is something the matter? There's no need to be afraid.
trans: 有什么事吗？

Original: Papalymo:Enough. I'll do it myself...
Dialogue: Enough. I'll do it myself...
trans: 足够的。

Original: Palom:Aww! You cheated, Papalymo!
Dialogue: Aww! You cheated, Papalymo!
trans: 哇！

Original: Papalymo:We don't have time for childish fights.
Dialogue: We don't have time for childish fights.
trans: 我们没有时间进行幼稚的争吵。

Original: Palom:Big talk from another little kid!
Dialogue: Big talk from another little kid!
trans: 来自另一个小孩的大话！

Original: Garnet:Thank you, Papalymo.
Dialogue: Thank you, Papalymo.
trans: 谢谢你，Papalymo。

Original: Terra:I wonder what's inside...
Dialogue: I wonder what's inside...
trans: 我想知道里面是什么...

Original: Garnet:It's not exactly the same as the one from our world, but I can feel wind...
Dialogue: It's not exactly the same as the one from our world, but I can feel wind...
trans: 和我们世界的不太一样，但我能感觉到风……

Original: Garnet:I think this will lead us to the Iifa Tree.
Dialogue: I think this will lead us to the Iifa Tree.
trans: 我想这会把我们引向 Iifa 树。

Original: Palom:If there's more ice up ahead, I want to melt it!
Dialogue: If there's more ice up ahead, I want to melt it!
trans: 如果前面有更多的冰，我要把它融化！

Original: Papalymo:Fine. In any case, shall we get moving?
Dialogue: Fine. In any case, shall we get moving?
trans: 美好的。

Original: Palom:Let's go, Vivi!
Dialogue: Let's go, Vivi!
trans: 走吧，薇薇！

Original: Kuja:Heh... Did you see that?
Dialogue: Heh... Did you see that?
trans: 呵……你看到了吗？

Original: Kuja:In the end, a puppet is just a puppet. You're utterly replaceable.
Dialogue: In the end, a puppet is just a puppet. You're utterly replaceable.
trans: 傀儡终究只是傀儡。

Original: Vivi:Why did you kidnap me?
Dialogue: Why did you kidnap me?
trans: 你为什么要绑架我？

Original: Kuja:All I did was exchange one puppet for another. No one has even noticed.
Dialogue: All I did was exchange one puppet for another. No one has even noticed.
trans: 我所做的只是将一个木偶换成另一个。

Original: Vivi:That's not true...
Dialogue: That's not true...
trans: 这不是真的...

Original: Kuja:How are you enjoying your front row seat?
Dialogue: How are you enjoying your front row seat?
trans: 您感觉前排座位如何？

Original: Kuja:I will show you a play that you'll never forget.
Dialogue: I will show you a play that you'll never forget.
trans: 我会给你看一场你永远不会忘记的戏。

Original: Vivi:...You're the one who summoned the Iifa Tree and Ice Cavern, aren't you?
Dialogue: ...You're the one who summoned the Iifa Tree and Ice Cavern, aren't you?
trans: ……你是召唤出伊法树和冰洞的人吧？

Original: Kuja:What of it?
Dialogue: What of it?
trans: 怎么了？

Original: Kuja:The audience is not allowed to ask questions. Their job is merely to watch the drama unfold.
Dialogue: The audience is not allowed to ask questions. Their job is merely to watch the drama unfold.
trans: 不允许观众提问。

Original: Kuja:You cannot meddle in the affairs of the actors.
Dialogue: You cannot meddle in the affairs of the actors.
trans: 你不能干涉演员的事情。

Original: Kuja:Whatever happens on the stage is up to the director.
Dialogue: Whatever happens on the stage is up to the director.
trans: 舞台上发生什么，导演说了算。

Original: Kuja:No one can interfere.
Dialogue: No one can interfere.
trans: 没有人可以干涉。

Original: Vivi:(Hmm... Something seems different about him...)
Dialogue: (Hmm... Something seems different about him...)
trans: （嗯……他好像有点不一样了……）

Original: Vivi:...Are you upset?
Dialogue: ...Are you upset?
trans: ...你难过吗？

Original: Kuja:Upset? Me? You think me capable of such an ugly emotion?
Dialogue: Upset? Me? You think me capable of such an ugly emotion?
trans: 沮丧的？

Original: Kuja:Aren't you the one who's upset?
Dialogue: Aren't you the one who's upset?
trans: 生气的人不是你吗？

Original: Kuja:"I'm not a puppet." "I'm Zidane's friend." That's what you want to say, isn't it?
Dialogue: "I'm not a puppet." "I'm Zidane's friend." That's what you want to say, isn't it?
trans: “我不是木偶。”

Original: Vivi:Nngh... Zidane...
Dialogue: Nngh... Zidane...
trans: 唔……齐达内……

Original: Kuja:Zidane, Zidane, Zidane. That's all you ever say!
Dialogue: Zidane, Zidane, Zidane. That's all you ever say!
trans: 齐达内，齐达内，齐达内。

Original: Kuja:Is that out of friendship? Trust? Whatever it is, you disgust me!
Dialogue: Is that out of friendship? Trust? Whatever it is, you disgust me!
trans: 是出于友情吗？

Original: Vivi:What happened...Kuja...?
Dialogue: What happened...Kuja...?
trans: 发生了什么……库亚……？

Original: Kain:So you're a dragon knight... Your skills certainly do bear resemblance to my own.
Dialogue: So you're a dragon knight... Your skills certainly do bear resemblance to my own.
trans: 原来你是龙骑士……你的技能确实和我的有相似之处。

Original: Freya:I thought the same.
Dialogue: I thought the same.
trans: 我也是这么想的。

Original: Freya:It's a wonderful thing. Even though we hail from different worlds, there are still similarities among them.
Dialogue: It's a wonderful thing. Even though we hail from different worlds, there are still similarities among them.
trans: 这是一件美妙的事情。

Original: Lenna:Are you a dragon knight, too, Cid?
Dialogue: Are you a dragon knight, too, Cid?
trans: 希德，你也是龙骑士吗？

Original: Cid:Me? Why, do I look like one?
Dialogue: Me? Why, do I look like one?
trans: 我？

Original: Edgar:Your skills in battle do bear a striking resemblance.
Dialogue: Your skills in battle do bear a striking resemblance.
trans: 你们的战斗技巧确实有惊人的相似之处。

Original: Cid:Don't rope me in with those stiffs. We're nothing alike!
Dialogue: Don't rope me in with those stiffs. We're nothing alike!
trans: 不要用那些僵硬的东西来拉拢我。

Original: Freya:The world is full of all sorts of people.
Dialogue: The world is full of all sorts of people.
trans: 世界上到处都是形形色色的人。

Original: Freya:I left my homeland behind... So when it was in trouble, I...
Dialogue: I left my homeland behind... So when it was in trouble, I...
trans: 我离开了我的祖国……所以当它有难的时候，我……

Original: Freya:Despite my efforts, I was unable to help in their moment of need.
Dialogue: Despite my efforts, I was unable to help in their moment of need.
trans: 尽管我做出了努力，但我无法在他们需要的时候提供帮助。

Original: Kain:What you did for your country was admirable. I've only ever used my powers for myself.
Dialogue: What you did for your country was admirable. I've only ever used my powers for myself.
trans: 你为你的国家所做的一切令人钦佩。

Original: Cid:Just look at those two! They look like someone died around here!
Dialogue: Just look at those two! They look like someone died around here!
trans: 看看那两个！

Original: Lenna:Hehe. You are certainly nothing alike.
Dialogue: Hehe. You are certainly nothing alike.
trans: 呵呵。

Original: Freya:In any case, it is in the past now. I will resign them to memories. Our focus should be on the mission before us.
Dialogue: In any case, it is in the past now. I will resign them to memories. Our focus should be on the mission before us.
trans: 不管怎样，现在已经过去了。

Original: Maria:The dragoons I know are proud and righteous people.
Dialogue: The dragoons I know are proud and righteous people.
trans: 我认识的龙骑兵都是骄傲正直的人。

Original: Lenna:You two are no different.
Dialogue: You two are no different.
trans: 你们两个没有什么不同。

Original: Edgar:Indeed. You're both reliable and trustworthy allies.
Dialogue: Indeed. You're both reliable and trustworthy allies.
trans: 的确。

Original: Kain:Though our worlds may be different, why don't we exchange what we know, as one dragoon to another?
Dialogue: Though our worlds may be different, why don't we exchange what we know, as one dragoon to another?
trans: 虽然我们的世界可能不同，但我们为什么不交换我们所知道的，作为一个龙骑兵到另一个？

Original: Freya:I would like that. I feel I have much to learn from you.
Dialogue: I would like that. I feel I have much to learn from you.
trans: 我愿意那样。

Original: Cid:And why just this guy? What about the rest of us, huh!?
Dialogue: And why just this guy? What about the rest of us, huh!?
trans: 为什么只有这个人？

Original: Freya:I am certain there are things I could learn from everyone here. I want to know more about the other worlds.
Dialogue: I am certain there are things I could learn from everyone here. I want to know more about the other worlds.
trans: 我确信我可以从这里的每个人身上学到一些东西。

Original: Cid:Well, why didn't you say so? I'll teach you everything I know about the Highwind!
Dialogue: Well, why didn't you say so? I'll teach you everything I know about the Highwind!
trans: 嗯，你为什么不这么说？

Original: Dark Manikin (Zidane):Why you...! I will not hand over the brilliance!
Dialogue: Why you...! I will not hand over the brilliance!
trans: 为什么你...！

Original: Black Waltz 3:Kwahaha! You are no match for me!
Dialogue: Kwahaha! You are no match for me!
trans: 哇哈哈！

Original: Steiner:Are you alright?
Dialogue: Are you alright?
trans: 你还好吗？

Original: Squall:Zidane's dark manikin. Are you in your right mind?
Dialogue: Zidane's dark manikin. Are you in your right mind?
trans: 齐达内的黑色人体模型。

Original: Dark Manikin (Zidane):You're...of the light... I have brilliance.
Dialogue: You're...of the light... I have brilliance.
trans: 你是……光明的……我有光彩。

Original: Eiko:We can worry about that later! If we don't do something, this guy is gonna win!
Dialogue: We can worry about that later! If we don't do something, this guy is gonna win!
trans: 我们可以稍后再担心！

Original: Dark Manikin (Zidane):Please, help me! I can't do this alone!
Dialogue: Please, help me! I can't do this alone!
trans: 请帮我！

Original: Steiner:You need not ask. We will lend you our aid!
Dialogue: You need not ask. We will lend you our aid!
trans: 你不用问。

Original: Squall:Take it easy. Leave the rest to us.
Dialogue: Take it easy. Leave the rest to us.
trans: 别紧张。

Original: Black Waltz 3:Kwahaha... No matter how many of you Hmm?
Dialogue: Kwahaha... No matter how many of you— Hmm?
trans: 哇哈哈哈……不管你们有多少——嗯？

Original: Vivi?:A-ahh... Uhh...
Dialogue: A-ahh... Uhh...
trans: 啊啊啊啊啊啊啊

Original: Black Waltz 3:I see. So there are puppets here, too... It reeks of Kuja's doing.
Dialogue: I see. So there are puppets here, too... It reeks of Kuja's doing.
trans: 我懂了。

Original: Steiner:How dare you say that!
Dialogue: How dare you say that!
trans: 你怎么敢这么说！

Original: Steiner:This is our friend, Master Vivi!
Dialogue: This is our friend, Master Vivi!
trans: 这就是我们的朋友薇薇大师！

Original: Eiko:That's right! So stop being so mean!
Dialogue: That's right! So stop being so mean!
trans: 这是正确的！

Original: Squall:Can you fight?
