Dialogue: Can you fight?
trans: 你能打吗？

Original: Vivi?:I will fight...with everyone.
Dialogue: I will fight...with everyone.
trans: 我会……和大家一起战斗。

Original: Black Waltz 3:Then I will burn you all until there is no difference between human and puppet!
Dialogue: Then I will burn you all until there is no difference between human and puppet!
trans: 那我就把你们都烧死，直到人和傀儡没有区别！

Original: Zidane:Did Kuja send you?
Dialogue: Did Kuja send you?
trans: 库贾派你来的？

Original: Black Waltz 3:Kwahaha... Does it matter who sent me?
Dialogue: Kwahaha... Does it matter who sent me?
trans: 哇哈哈……谁派我来的重要吗？

Original: Black Waltz 3:I'm here. And it is once again my mission to destroy all of you!
Dialogue: I'm here. And it is once again my mission to destroy all of you!
trans: 我在这。

Original: Zidane:He just won't listen...
Dialogue: He just won't listen...
trans: 他就是不听...

Original: Dark Manikin (Zidane):Thanks for your help back there.
Dialogue: Thanks for your help back there.
trans: 感谢您在那里的帮助。

Original: Cyan:So thou wert protecting the brilliance.
Dialogue: So thou wert protecting the brilliance.
trans: 所以你一直在保护光彩。

Original: Bartz:It looks like this Zidane hasn't been tricked by anyone.
Dialogue: It looks like this Zidane hasn't been tricked by anyone.
trans: 看来这个齐达内并没有被人坑过。

Original: Zidane:I expect nothing less of myself! Wasn't it tough being on your own?
Dialogue: I expect nothing less of myself! Wasn't it tough being on your own?
trans: 我对自己的期望不亚于此！

Original: Dark Manikin (Zidane):Not at all. Dark manikins were created for that purpose.
Dialogue: Not at all. Dark manikins were created for that purpose.
trans: 一点也不。

Original: Krile:Mog said that Shinryu's larvae might be around here.
Dialogue: Mog said that Shinryu's larvae might be around here.
trans: Mog 说 Shinryu 的幼虫可能就在这附近。

Original: Dark Manikin (Zidane):It's inside the Iifa Tree. But the tree is sealed, so I can't go in there.
Dialogue: It's inside the Iifa Tree. But the tree is sealed, so I can't go in there.
trans: 它在 Iifa 树内。

Original: Zidane:Do you know if anything happened when that tree was summoned?
Dialogue: Do you know if anything happened when that tree was summoned?
trans: 你知道那棵树被召唤时发生了什么事吗？

Original: Zidane:Did you see Kuja or hear anything?
Dialogue: Did you see Kuja or hear anything?
trans: 你看到Kuja或听到什么了吗？

Original: Dark Manikin (Zidane):I don't have a heart, so I can't say for sure, but...
Dialogue: I don't have a heart, so I can't say for sure, but...
trans: 我没有心，所以我不能肯定地说，但是...

Original: Dark Manikin (Zidane):Kuja seemed different, like he'd lost his cool.
Dialogue: Kuja seemed different, like he'd lost his cool.
trans: Kuja 看起来不一样了，就像他失去了冷静。

Original: Cyan:Kuja, losing his composure? But why...
Dialogue: Kuja, losing his composure? But why...
trans: 库亚，失态了？

Original: Dark Manikin (Zidane):Dark manikins don't understand what others are thinking.
Dialogue: Dark manikins don't understand what others are thinking.
trans: 黑暗的人体模型不明白别人在想什么。

Original: Dark Manikin (Zidane):But...Kuja looked like he was obsessed with the me from the World of Light.
Dialogue: But...Kuja looked like he was obsessed with the me from the World of Light.
trans: 但是……库亚一副对光之世界的我着迷的样子。

Original: Krile:Zidane? But why? Because they're enemies...?
Dialogue: Zidane? But why? Because they're enemies...?
trans: 齐达内？

Original: Bartz:His goal was to change his fate, wasn't it?
Dialogue: His goal was to change his fate, wasn't it?
trans: 他的目的不是为了改变自己的命运吗？

Original: Bartz:So why are we enemies in this world? He's even helped us before.
Dialogue: So why are we enemies in this world? He's even helped us before.
trans: 那么为什么我们在这个世界上是敌人呢？

Original: Cyan:He seemed to me different from Kefka, one filled with ill intent...
Dialogue: He seemed to me different from Kefka, one filled with ill intent...
trans: 在我看来，他和凯夫卡不同，一个充满恶意的人……

Original: Krile:Maybe he just wants to see Zidane and his friends suffer, like Exdeath.
Dialogue: Maybe he just wants to see Zidane and his friends suffer, like Exdeath.
trans: 也许他只是想看到齐达内和他的朋友们受苦，就像埃克斯迪思一样。

Original: Zidane:No... I think it's more complex than that.
Dialogue: No... I think it's more complex than that.
trans: 不......我认为它比那更复杂。

Original: Zidane:He's up ahead, isn't he?
Dialogue: He's up ahead, isn't he?
trans: 他在前面，不是吗？

Original: Dark Manikin (Zidane):Yup. He may even be watching from nearby.
Dialogue: Yup. He may even be watching from nearby.
trans: 是的。

Original: Bartz:I wonder if we'll have to fight him...
Dialogue: I wonder if we'll have to fight him...
trans: 我想知道我们是否必须与他战斗...

Original: Cyan:Well, we won't get any anwers by standing around here.
Dialogue: Well, we won't get any anwers by standing around here.
trans: 好吧，我们站在这里不会得到任何答案。

Original: Cyan:We must proceed. Thank you for your help.
Dialogue: We must proceed. Thank you for your help.
trans: 我们必须继续。

Original: Dark Manikin (Zidane):No problem!
Dialogue: No problem!
trans: 没问题！

Original: Krile:Let's go, Vivi.
Dialogue: Let's go, Vivi.
trans: 走吧，薇薇。

Original: Vivi?:Ah... Okay...
Dialogue: Ah... Okay...
trans: 啊好吧...

Original: Dark Manikin (Zidane):...Hey. About that guy...
Dialogue: ...Hey. About that guy...

Original: Zidane:I know.
Dialogue: I know.
trans: 我知道。

Original: Zidane:I don't want the others to worry, so I haven't said anything. But I'll do something about it.
Dialogue: I don't want the others to worry, so I haven't said anything. But I'll do something about it.
trans: 我不想让其他人担心，所以我什么也没说。

Original: Dark Manikin (Zidane):...Alright then. Thanks.
Dialogue: ...Alright then. Thanks.
trans: ……那好吧。

Original: Zidane:Thanks! Same to you.
Dialogue: Thanks! Same to you.
trans: 谢谢！

Original: Zidane:You've still got things to do, don't you?
Dialogue: You've still got things to do, don't you?
trans: 你还有事情要做，不是吗？

Original: Dark Manikin (Zidane):That's right. Take care of yourself.
Dialogue: That's right. Take care of yourself.
trans: 这是正确的。

Original: Vivi:What are you going to do with Zidane and the others?
Dialogue: What are you going to do with Zidane and the others?
trans: 你打算对齐达内和其他人做什么？

Original: Vivi:And why the Iifa Tree...
Dialogue: And why the Iifa Tree...
trans: 为什么 Iifa 树...

Original: Kuja:...It's not the stage I had hoped for.
Dialogue: ...It's not the stage I had hoped for.
trans: ……这不是我所希望的舞台。

Original: Kuja:...How ironic.
Dialogue: ...How ironic.
trans: ...多么讽刺。

Original: Seymour:Exdeath's magic summoned a part of his own world here.
Dialogue: Exdeath's magic summoned a part of his own world here.
trans: 艾克斯迪斯的魔法在这里召唤了他自己世界的一部分。

Original: Seymour:Be it illusion or reality, it shook the hearts of Materia's warriors.
Dialogue: Be it illusion or reality, it shook the hearts of Materia's warriors.
trans: 无论是幻境还是现实，都震撼着魔石战士的心。

Original: Seymour:Isn't it fascinating?
Dialogue: Isn't it fascinating?
trans: 是不是很迷人？

Original: Kuja:Hardly. Should I be impressed?
Dialogue: Hardly. Should I be impressed?
trans: 几乎不。

Original: Seymour:Heh... Did you not know?
Dialogue: Heh... Did you not know?
trans: 呵……你不知道吗？

Original: Seymour:Most of Spiritus's warriors know their fate.
Dialogue: Most of Spiritus's warriors know their fate.
trans: Spiritus 的大多数战士都知道自己的命运。

Original: Seymour:That's why we try to defy it and were made to battle our worst enemies.
Dialogue: That's why we try to defy it and were made to battle our worst enemies.
trans: 这就是为什么我们试图反抗它，并被迫与我们最坏的敌人作战。

Original: Kuja:You talk a lot, but just what is it you're trying to say?
Dialogue: You talk a lot, but just what is it you're trying to say?
trans: 你说了很多，但你到底想说什么？

Original: Seymour:You were destroyed in your own world, weren't you?
Dialogue: You were destroyed in your own world, weren't you?
trans: 你在自己的世界里被摧毁了，不是吗？

Original: Kuja:...What of it? What does it have to do with you?
Dialogue: ...What of it? What does it have to do with you?
trans: ……那又怎样？

Original: Seymour:Coincidentally, you and I are the same.
Dialogue: Coincidentally, you and I are the same.
trans: 巧合的是，你和我是一样的。

Original: Seymour:In myhome world, my form is preserved bypyreflies...
Dialogue: In my home world, my form is preserved by pyreflies...
trans: 在我的家乡世界，我的形态由萤火虫保存...

Original: Seymour:But in this world, that notion doesn't exist.
Dialogue: But in this world, that notion doesn't exist.
trans: 但是在这个世界上，这个概念是不存在的。

Original: Seymour:...Which means that Spiritus may have revived us.
Dialogue: ...Which means that Spiritus may have revived us.
trans: ...这意味着 Spiritus 可能使我们复活了。

Original: Seymour:How much value does one brought back from beyond the grave by a god have?
Dialogue: How much value does one brought back from beyond the grave by a god have?
trans: 一个神从坟墓里带回来的人有多少价值？

Original: Seymour:I think that life is meaningless, which is why I seek the release of death...
Dialogue: I think that life is meaningless, which is why I seek the release of death...
trans: 我认为生命没有意义，所以我寻求死亡的解脱……

Original: Seymour:Are you not the same?
Dialogue: Are you not the same?
trans: 你不一样吗？

Original: Kuja:...Don't make me laugh.
Dialogue: ...Don't make me laugh.
trans: ……别逗我笑。

Original: Kuja:I am living here for my own purposes.
Dialogue: I am living here for my own purposes.
trans: 我住在这里是为了我自己的目的。

Original: Seymour:As a puppet made to dance upon the gods' stage?
Dialogue: As a puppet made to dance upon the gods' stage?
trans: 做一个在众神舞台上跳舞的木偶？

Original: Kuja:Me? A puppet!?
Dialogue: Me? A puppet!?
trans: 我？

Original: Kuja:Do not speak as if you know!
Dialogue: Do not speak as if you know!
trans: 不要说得好像你知道一样！

Original: Seymour:Very well. But let me leave you with a word of advice.
Dialogue: Very well. But let me leave you with a word of advice.
trans: 很好。

Original: Seymour:Those who have played their role on the gods' stage may be cast aside without hesitation...
Dialogue: Those who have played their role on the gods' stage may be cast aside without hesitation...
trans: 在封神台上发挥过作用的人，说不定会被毫不犹豫地唾弃……

Original: Kuja:...The audacity of some people.
Dialogue: ...The audacity of some people.
trans: ......有些人的胆大包天。

Original: Kuja:I am not a puppet whose strings are being pulled, no matter which world we are in!
Dialogue: I am not a puppet whose strings are being pulled, no matter which world we are in!
trans: 无论在哪个世界，我都不是被人牵线的木偶！

Original: Kuja:Hmm... Perhaps it's time to turn this boring world into the stage I dreamed of!
Dialogue: Hmm... Perhaps it's time to turn this boring world into the stage I dreamed of!
trans: 嗯……也许是时候把这个无聊的世界变成我梦寐以求的舞台了！

Original: Kuja:This is...not the stage I dreamed of.
Dialogue: This is...not the stage I dreamed of.
trans: 这……不是我梦寐以求的舞台。

Original: Kuja:It can't be! Not this tree!
Dialogue: It can't be! Not this tree!
trans: 这不可能！

Original: Kuja:...Is this all I'm capable of after all?
Dialogue: ...Is this all I'm capable of after all?
trans: ……这就是我所能做到的吗？

Original: Kuja:I'm just...a failed puppet.
Dialogue: I'm just...a failed puppet.
trans: 我只是……一个失败的傀儡。

Original: Kuja:Hahaha... AHAHAHAHA!
Dialogue: Hahaha... AHAHAHAHA!
trans: 哈哈哈……啊哈哈哈哈！

Original: Kain:What's the matter? Are you unwell?
Dialogue: What's the matter? Are you unwell?
trans: 怎么了？

Original: Vivi?:O-oh... I'm fine...
Dialogue: O-oh... I'm fine...
trans: 哦哦...我很好...

Original: Eiko:Are you sure? You can tell me, Vivi!
Dialogue: Are you sure? You can tell me, Vivi!
trans: 你确定吗？

Original: Eiko:I'm here for you, so if you need anything, just say the word!
Dialogue: I'm here for you, so if you need anything, just say the word!
trans: 我在这里等你，所以如果你需要什么，尽管说！

Original: Prishe:That's weird. I can't read him at all.
Dialogue: That's weird. I can't read him at all.
trans: 这很奇怪。

Original: Prishe:But it's not just Vivi. There are others, too...
Dialogue: But it's not just Vivi. There are others, too...
trans: 但不仅仅是薇薇。

Original: Warrior of Light:Is something the matter?
Dialogue: Is something the matter?
trans: 有什么事吗？

Original: Prishe:Yeah, with you! Maybe it just doesn't work with people from other worlds...
Dialogue: Yeah, with you! Maybe it just doesn't work with people from other worlds...
trans: 是的，和你在一起！

Original: Firion:What do you mean, Prishe?
Dialogue: What do you mean, Prishe?
trans: 你是什​​么意思，普利希？

Original: Layle:Really? You, a mind reader?
Dialogue: Really? You, a mind reader?
trans: 真的吗？

Original: Prishe:What's that supposed to mean!?
Dialogue: What's that supposed to mean!?
trans: 那是什么意思！？

Original: Prishe:Anyway, something tells me I shouldn't go too deep into this...
Dialogue: Anyway, something tells me I shouldn't go too deep into this...
trans: 不管怎样，有件事告诉我，我不应该深入了解这个……

Original: Layle:I'll kindly ask you not peek into my heart. Just thinking about it gives me the creeps. Right, Vivi?
Dialogue: I'll kindly ask you not peek into my heart. Just thinking about it gives me the creeps. Right, Vivi?
trans: 我会恳请你不要偷看我的心。

Original: Vivi?:My... My heart...
Dialogue: My... My heart...
trans: 我的……我的心……

Original: Warrior of Light:I see. Your silence is your way of showing consideration toward your comrades.
Dialogue: I see. Your silence is your way of showing consideration toward your comrades.
trans: 我懂了。

Original: Firion:There's no need to hold back, Vivi. This is an important place to you and your friends.
Dialogue: There's no need to hold back, Vivi. This is an important place to you and your friends.
trans: 没必要退缩，薇薇。

Original: Firion:If you're worried, tell us. We can share the load.
Dialogue: If you're worried, tell us. We can share the load.
trans: 如果您担心，请告诉我们。

Original: Vivi?:Could I really be...considerate...?
Dialogue: Could I really be...considerate...?
trans: 我真的可以……体谅……吗？

Original: Eiko:Of course! There's no doubt about it!
Dialogue: Of course! There's no doubt about it!
trans: 当然！

Original: Eiko:You've got a big heart, after all!
Dialogue: You've got a big heart, after all!
trans: 毕竟你有一颗大心脏！

Original: Prishe:I guess he just can't put it into words. But as long as we're together, you should be fine, so let's get a move on!
Dialogue: I guess he just can't put it into words. But as long as we're together, you should be fine, so let's get a move on!
trans: 我猜他只是无法用语言表达出来。

Original: Layle:You can take your time and tell us while we try to find our way out of this meat locker.
Dialogue: You can take your time and tell us while we try to find our way out of this meat locker.
trans: 在我们设法离开这个肉柜的时候，你可以慢慢来告诉我们。

Original: Kuja:Hahaha! Look at those fools!
Dialogue: Hahaha! Look at those fools!
trans: 哈哈哈！

Original: Kuja:Talking to a puppet, pretending to be friends!
Dialogue: Talking to a puppet, pretending to be friends!
trans: 和木偶说话，假装是朋友！

Original: Vivi:...What is he? And why can he talk?
Dialogue: ...What is he? And why can he talk?
trans: ...他是什么？

Original: Kuja:I told you: he's a puppet.
Dialogue: I told you he's a puppet.
trans: 我告诉过你他是个傀儡。

Original: Kuja:He is a dark manikin of you, born from the crystal core of darkness.
Dialogue: He is a dark manikin of you, born from the crystal core of darkness.
trans: 他是你的黑暗模型，诞生于黑暗的水晶核心。

Original: Kuja:Though I did make some...changes.
Dialogue: Though I did make some...changes.
trans: 虽然我确实做了一些……改变。

Original: Vivi:So that's why he can talk...
Dialogue: So that's why he can talk...
trans: 这就是为什么他会说话...

Original: Vivi:I know...he has a heart, too.
Dialogue: I know...he has a heart, too.
trans: 我知道……他也有一颗心。

Original: Kuja:...It's pointless to pretend.
Dialogue: ...It's pointless to pretend.
trans: ……假装没有意义。

Original: Kuja:You're scared, aren't you? You know that nothing will happen even if you die here.
Dialogue: You're scared, aren't you? You know that nothing will happen even if you die here.
trans: 你很害怕，是吗？

Original: Kuja:Look there.
Dialogue: Look there.
trans: 看这里。

Original: Kuja:It's just as I said. He will soon betray all your precious comrades.
Dialogue: It's just as I said. He will soon betray all your precious comrades.
trans: 正如我所说。

Original: Kuja:I can't wait to see the look on Zidane's face!
Dialogue: I can't wait to see the look on Zidane's face!
trans: 迫不及待想看看齐达内的表情了！

Original: Garnet:Zidane. About Vivi...
Dialogue: Zidane. About Vivi...
trans: 齐达内。

Original: Zidane:I know.
Dialogue: I know.
trans: 我知道。

Original: Zidane:I promised I'd do something about it...to the other me.
Dialogue: I promised I'd do something about it...to the other me.
trans: 我答应过我会为此做点什么……对另一个我。

Original: Garnet:But how...
Dialogue: But how...
trans: 但是怎么...

Original: Zidane:Watch out!
Dialogue: Watch out!
trans: 小心！

Original: Garnet:Oh no! Zidane!
Dialogue: Oh no! Zidane!
trans: 不好了！

Original: Ramza:Vivi!? Did you do that!?
Dialogue: Vivi!? Did you do that!?
trans: 薇薇！？

Original: Vivi?:Uh... Um... I...
Vivi?:I'm sorry... I'm sorry...
Dialogue: I'm sorry... I'm sorry...
trans: 对不起……对不起……

Original: Cloud:He's lost consciousness. Is he a dark manikin?
Dialogue: He's lost consciousness. Is he a dark manikin?
trans: 他失去了知觉。

Original: Vivi?:But I... We...
Dialogue: But I... We...
trans: 但是我……我们……

Original: Vivi?:...are puppets...
Dialogue: ...are puppets...
trans: ……是木偶……

Original: Vivi?:...who must defeat Zidane...
Dialogue: ...who must defeat Zidane...
trans: ...谁必须打败齐达内...

Original: Ramza:Assassins! They must have been sent by Kuja.
Dialogue: Assassins! They must have been sent by Kuja.
trans: 刺客！

Original: Cloud:"Puppets," huh... There's a sick joke.
Dialogue: "Puppets," huh... There's a sick joke.
trans: “木偶”，嗯……这是个恶心的笑话。

Original: Garnet:Can you stand, Zidane?
Dialogue: Can you stand, Zidane?
trans: 你能站得住吗，齐达内？

Original: Zidane:Yeah... This is nothing.
Dialogue: Yeah... This is nothing.
trans: 是的……这没什么。

Original: Cloud:Can you fight?
Dialogue: Can you fight?
trans: 你能打吗？

Original: Cloud:He looks like one of your friends, so it's fine if you leave it to us.
Dialogue: He looks like one of your friends, so it's fine if you leave it to us.
trans: 他看起来像你的一个朋友，所以你交给我们也可以。

Original: Zidane:No... I'll fight. Garnet?
Dialogue: No... I'll fight. Garnet?
trans: 不……我会战斗。

Original: Garnet:Yes. We have to!
Dialogue: Yes. We have to!
trans: 是的。

Original: Vivi?:I'm sorry...!
Dialogue: I'm sorry...!
trans: 对不起...！

Original: Garnet:Vivi... Do we have to fight?
Dialogue: Vivi... Do we have to fight?
trans: 薇薇……要打架吗？

Original: Vivi?:I-if I don't, I can't stay like this...
Dialogue: I-if I don't, I can't stay like this...
trans: 我、如果我不这样做，我就不能一直这样……

Original: Vivi?:So...I'm sorry...!
Dialogue: So...I'm sorry...!
trans: 所以我很抱歉...！

Original: Freya:Is this Kuja's doing?
Dialogue: Is this Kuja's doing?
trans: 这是库贾干的？

Original: Zidane:Dammit! Doesn't he know this won't change anything? Just what is he trying to do?
Dialogue: Dammit! Doesn't he know this won't change anything? Just what is he trying to do?
trans: 该死！

Original: Vivi?:A-ahh... Everyone...
Dialogue: A-ahh... Everyone...
trans: 啊啊啊……大家……

Original: Sazh:So he was a dark manikin after all.
Dialogue: So he was a dark manikin after all.
trans: 所以他毕竟是一个黑暗的人体模型。

Original: Rem:He used magic to change his appearance so we wouldn't notice.
Dialogue: He used magic to change his appearance so we wouldn't notice.
trans: 他用魔法改变了他的外表，所以我们不会注意到。

Original: Zidane:...Don't disappear.
Dialogue: ...Don't disappear.
trans: ……不要消失。

Original: Freya:You held back... You have strength left, haven't you? Now stand.
Dialogue: You held back... You have strength left, haven't you? Now stand.
trans: 你忍住了……你还有力气，不是吗？

Original: Vivi?:But I... I tricked everyone...
Dialogue: But I... I tricked everyone...
trans: 但是我……我骗了所有人……

Original: Zidane:No, you didn't.
Dialogue: No, you didn't.
trans: 不，你没有。

Original: Zidane:We knew you weren't the real Vivi.
Dialogue: We knew you weren't the real Vivi.
trans: 我们知道你不是真正的薇薇。

Original: Vivi?:Then why...?
Dialogue: Then why...?
trans: 那么为什么...？

Original: Zidane:Don't know. I didn't really have a reason.
Dialogue: Don't know. I didn't really have a reason.
trans: 不知道。

Original: Sazh:But this was Kuja's doing, not yours.
Dialogue: But this was Kuja's doing, not yours.
trans: 但这是 Kuja 做的，不是你做的。

Original: Rem:Dark manikins are easy to control.
Dialogue: Dark manikins are easy to control.
trans: 深色人体模型易于控制。

Original: Vivi?:Y-yes, but...
Dialogue: Y-yes, but...
trans: 是-是的，但是...

Original: Vivi?:I did what Kuja told me to do because...
Dialogue: I did what Kuja told me to do because...
trans: 我按照 Kuja 的吩咐做了，因为……

Original: Vivi?:I wanted to know what it felt like to be alive.
Dialogue: I wanted to know what it felt like to be alive.
trans: 我想知道活着是什么感觉。

Original: Freya:Hmm... You still have traces of Vivi in you. I suppose he took advantage of that.
Dialogue: Hmm... You still have traces of Vivi in you. I suppose he took advantage of that.
trans: 嗯……你身上还有薇薇的痕迹。

Original: Zidane:Now that you've traveled with us, do you understand?
Dialogue: Now that you've traveled with us, do you understand?
trans: 既然你已经和我们一起旅行了，你明白了吗？

Original: Vivi?:No, not yet...
Dialogue: No, not yet...
trans: 还没有...

Original: Vivi?:But you're very precious to the real me...
Dialogue: But you're very precious to the real me...
trans: 但你对真正的我来说非常珍贵...

Original: Vivi?:That much I understand.
Dialogue: That much I understand.
trans: 就这么多我明白了。

Original: Vivi?:That's why I want you to rescue him. He's been captured.
Dialogue: That's why I want you to rescue him. He's been captured.
trans: 这就是为什么我要你救他。

Original: Sazh:Do you know where he is, Mog?
Dialogue: Do you know where he is, Mog?
trans: 你知道他在哪儿吗，莫格？

Original: Mog:No... I can't tell, kupo...
Dialogue: No... I can't tell, kupo...
trans: 不……我不知道，库波……

Original: Vivi?:Kuja seemed strange.
Dialogue: Kuja seemed strange.
trans: 来似乎很奇怪。

Original: Vivi?:I don't understand sadness or anger, but...
Dialogue: I don't understand sadness or anger, but...
trans: 我不懂悲伤或愤怒，但...

Original: Vivi?:I think that's what it is.
Dialogue: I think that's what it is.
trans: 我想就是这样。

Original: Mog:His feelings might be interfering with his dimensional coordinates...
Dialogue: His feelings might be interfering with his dimensional coordinates...
trans: 他的感觉可能会干扰他的次元坐标……

Original: Mog:Kupopo... Kupo! I found him!
Dialogue: Kupopo... Kupo! I found him!
trans: 笨……笨！

Original: Mog:He's inside that big tree, kupo! I can sense a strong will right next to Shinryu's larvae.
Dialogue: He's inside that big tree, kupo! I can sense a strong will right next to Shinryu's larvae.
trans: 他在那棵大树里面，库波！

Original: Rem:Then what are we waiting for?
Dialogue: Then what are we waiting for?
trans: 那我们还等什么呢？

Original: Vivi?:Please, save the real me...
Dialogue: Please, save the real me...
trans: 请拯救真正的我...

Original: Zidane:What are you saying? You're coming with us!
Dialogue: What are you saying? You're coming with us!
trans: 你在说什么？

Original: Zidane:We're not just going to leave you here.
Dialogue: We're not just going to leave you here.
trans: 我们不只是要把你留在这里。

Original: Zidane:You've been helping us out in Vivi's place. Can you lend us a hand for just a little longer?
Dialogue: You've been helping us out in Vivi's place. Can you lend us a hand for just a little longer?
trans: 你一直在代替薇薇帮助我们。

Original: Vivi?:But I'm just a fake...
Dialogue: But I'm just a fake...
trans: 可我只是个假...

Original: Zidane:You're not a fake. You're just a different person!
Dialogue: You're not a fake. You're just a different person!
trans: 你不是假的。

Original: Zidane:Vivi is Vivi. And you are you.
Dialogue: Vivi is Vivi. And you are you.
trans: 薇薇就是薇薇。

Original: Freya:No matter who you are, you have a heart. That will pave the way for you.
Dialogue: No matter who you are, you have a heart. That will pave the way for you.
trans: 不管你是谁，你都有一颗心。

Original: Vivi?:Can I really...help...?
Dialogue: Can I really...help...?
trans: 我真的可以……帮助……吗？

Original: Zidane:Of course you can! You know you can!
Dialogue: Of course you can! You know you can!
trans: 当然可以！

Original: Vivi?:Right... I'll do my best.
Dialogue: Right... I'll do my best.
trans: 好吧……我会尽力的。

Original: Zidane:That's the spirit! Now let's go!
Dialogue: That's the spirit! Now let's go!
trans: 就是那种精神！

Original: Palom:I knew you weren't Vivi the whole time! Uh-huh, I wasn't fooled for a second!
Dialogue: I knew you weren't Vivi the whole time! Uh-huh, I wasn't fooled for a second!
trans: 我一直都知道你不是薇薇！

Original: Eiko:Yes, you were. You totally fell for it, Palom!
Dialogue: Yes, you were. You totally fell for it, Palom!
trans: 对，就是你。

Original: Vivi?:Did you know, Miss Eiko?
Dialogue: Did you know, Miss Eiko?
trans: 你知道吗，英子小姐？

Original: Eiko:You don't need to call me "miss"! Just "Eiko" is fine!
Dialogue: You don't need to call me "miss"! Just "Eiko" is fine!
trans: 你不用叫我“小姐”！

Original: Eiko:Actually, when you said you would try your best...I could tell that you wanted to stay with us.
Dialogue: Actually, when you said you would try your best...I could tell that you wanted to stay with us.
trans: 事实上，当你说你会尽力而为时……我看得出来你想和我们在一起。

Original: Eiko:That's why I didn't say anything. I didn't want you to have to leave.
Dialogue: That's why I didn't say anything. I didn't want you to have to leave.
trans: 这就是我什么也没说的原因。

Original: Raijin:Sounds like she didn't notice at all, either, ya know.
Dialogue: Sounds like she didn't notice at all, either, ya know.
trans: 听起来她也根本没有注意到，你知道的。

Original: Vaan:They look exactly the same. But he was so timid, it was weird.
Dialogue: They look exactly the same. But he was so timid, it was weird.
trans: 它们看起来完全一样。

Original: Vaan:I guess he was just scared, though.
Dialogue: I guess he was just scared, though.
trans: 不过我猜他只是害怕了。

Original: Yuna:It's so strange... Looking the same, but being a completely different person...
Dialogue: It's so strange... Looking the same, but being a completely different person...
trans: 好奇怪……长得一样，却完全是另外一个人……

Original: Palom:Hey, hey! Don't I look cool?
Dialogue: Hey, hey! Don't I look cool?
trans: 嘿嘿！

Original: Vivi?:Huh? Uhm...I guess.
Dialogue: Huh? Uhm...I guess.
trans: 嗯？

Original: Eiko:You're such a child! You made Vivi your follower, so you just want to make him your follower, too.
Dialogue: You're such a child! You made Vivi your follower, so you just want to make him your follower, too.
trans: 你真是个孩子！

Original: Raijin:Friendship isn't a one-sided thing. Each needs to be able to rely on the other, ya know.
Dialogue: Friendship isn't a one-sided thing. Each needs to be able to rely on the other, ya know.
trans: 友谊不是单方面的。

Original: Vaan:Aren't you one of Seifer's followers, though?
Dialogue: Aren't you one of Seifer's followers, though?
trans: 不过，你不是 Seifer 的追随者之一吗？

Original: Raijin:It's not like that! We're friends, ya know!
Dialogue: It's not like that! We're friends, ya know!
trans: 不像那样！

Original: Yuna:Please don't fight. You'll scare our new friend.
Dialogue: Please don't fight. You'll scare our new friend.
trans: 请不要打架。

Original: Vivi?:Um... It sounds hard to be friends...
Dialogue: Um... It sounds hard to be friends...
trans: 嗯……做朋友听起来很难……

Original: Eiko:It's not! After all, you and I are friends already!
Dialogue: It's not! After all, you and I are friends already!
trans: 它不是！

Original: Eiko:And I'm sure you'll be great friends with the real Vivi!
Dialogue: And I'm sure you'll be great friends with the real Vivi!
trans: 我相信你会和真正的 Vivi 成为好朋友！

Original: Vivi?:...That would be nice.
Dialogue: ...That would be nice.
trans: ...那样就好了。

Original: Yuna:You'll be fine if you believe in yourself. Now then, I see the tree over there.
Dialogue: You'll be fine if you believe in yourself. Now then, I see the tree over there.
trans: 如果你相信自己，你会没事的。

Original: Palom:Yay! I'm gonna get there first!
Dialogue: Yay! I'm gonna get there first!
trans: 耶！

Original: Eiko:Wait! Don't run off alone! Come on, we have to catch him.
Dialogue: Wait! Don't run off alone! Come on, we have to catch him.
trans: 等待！

Original: Vaan:Those kids sure are lively!
Dialogue: Those kids sure are lively!
trans: 那些孩子一定很活泼！

Original: Raijin:Wait a second! The adults should go after them, ya know?
Dialogue: Wait a second! The adults should go after them, ya know?
trans: 等一下！

Original: Kuja:Why... How dare they be in such high spirits!?
Dialogue: Why... How dare they be in such high spirits!?
trans: 为什么……他们竟然敢这么兴致勃勃！？

Original: Kuja:They accepted that puppet into the fold without question! Even after he betrayed them!
Dialogue: They accepted that puppet into the fold without question! Even after he betrayed them!
trans: 他们毫无疑问地收下了那个傀儡！

Original: Vivi:So the other me is still okay...
Dialogue: So the other me is still okay...
trans: 所以另一个我还好...

Original: Vivi:That's a relief.
Dialogue: That's a relief.
trans: 那是一种解脱。

Original: Kuja:You're not bothered, even knowing how easily replaceable you are?
Dialogue: You're not bothered, even knowing how easily replaceable you are?
trans: 你不介意，即使知道你是多么容易被替换？

Original: Vivi:It's hard to explain it, but...
Dialogue: It's hard to explain it, but...
trans: 很难解释，但是...

Original: Vivi:He feels like a little brother to me.
Dialogue: He feels like a little brother to me.
trans: 他对我来说就像一个小弟弟。

Original: Kuja:...A brother?
Dialogue: ...A brother?
trans: ……兄弟？

Original: Kuja:You insolent!
Dialogue: You insolent—!
trans: 你这个无礼——！

Original: Kuja:I will set the stage for Zidane...with your corpse!
Dialogue: I will set the stage for Zidane...with your corpse!
trans: 我会用你的尸体为齐达内做准备！

Original: Vivi:Nngh... Ugh... Z-Zidane...
Dialogue: Nngh... Ugh... Z-Zidane...
trans: 唔……呃……齐达内……

Original: Y'shtola:...It appears we can go no further.
Dialogue: ...It appears we can go no further.
trans: ……看来是走不下去了。

Original: Edgar:There's some sort of magic blocking our way, isn't there?
Dialogue: There's some sort of magic blocking our way, isn't there?
trans: 有某种魔法挡住了我们的去路，不是吗？

Original: Shantotto:I suggest you put your theory to the test!
Dialogue: I suggest you put your theory to the test!
trans: 我建议你把你的理论付诸实践！

Original: Lenna:He was pushed back! It must be a magic barrier.
Dialogue: He was pushed back! It must be a magic barrier.
trans: 他被推了回去！

Original: Edgar:Undoubtedly... But doesn't our objective lie inside?
Dialogue: Undoubtedly... But doesn't our objective lie inside?
trans: 无疑……可是我们的目的不就在里面吗？

Original: Eiko:But I don't know about this place.
Dialogue: But I don't know about this place.
trans: 但是我不知道这个地方。

Original: Y'shtola:Is it possible for you to dispel the barrier?
Dialogue: Is it possible for you to dispel the barrier?
trans: 你能解除结界吗？

Original: Shantotto:After a quick inspection, I believe it capable of individual detection.
Dialogue: After a quick inspection, I believe it capable of individual detection.
trans: 经过快速检查，我相信它能够进行单独检测。

Original: Eiko:What do you mean?
Dialogue: What do you mean?
trans: 你是什​​么意思？

Original: Edgar:She means it only allows certain people in.
Dialogue: She means it only allows certain people in.
trans: 她的意思是它只允许某些人进入。

Original: Lenna:Kuja is the one who summoned this place, so I suppose the one he wants to let in is...
Dialogue: Kuja is the one who summoned this place, so I suppose the one he wants to let in is...
trans: Kuja 是召唤这里的人，所以我想他想要让进来的人是……

Original: Zidane:Sorry I'm late, guys. What's the hold up?
Dialogue: Sorry I'm late, guys. What's the hold up?
trans: 对不起，我来晚了，伙计们。

Original: Y'shtola:An invisible barrier is blocking our path. You, however, might be able to pass.
Dialogue: An invisible barrier is blocking our path. You, however, might be able to pass.
trans: 一道无形的屏障挡住了我们的去路。

Original: Zidane:...You're right.
Dialogue: ...You're right.
trans: ...你说得对。

Original: Eiko:Wow! Now we can all get through!
Dialogue: Wow! Now we can all get through!
trans: 哇！

Original: Lenna:Thank goodness.
Dialogue: Thank goodness.
trans: 谢天谢地。

Original: Shantotto:The enemy is drawn to you, Zidane.
Dialogue: The enemy is drawn to you, Zidane.
trans: 敌人被你吸引了，齐达内。

Original: Y'shtola:Indeed. I don't know why, but he is definitely after you.
Dialogue: Indeed. I don't know why, but he is definitely after you.
trans: 的确。

Original: Zidane:Aww, are you worried for me?
Dialogue: Aww, are you worried for me?
trans: 哇，你是在为我担心吗？

Original: Lenna:Please don't laugh. We are truly concerned. We don't know what traps possibly lie ahead.
Dialogue: Please don't laugh. We are truly concerned. We don't know what traps possibly lie ahead.
trans: 请不要笑。

Original: Zidane:Even so...I have to keep going forward. There's someone I need to save.
Dialogue: Even so...I have to keep going forward. There's someone I need to save.
trans: 即便如此……我还要继续前进。

Original: Eiko:That's right! Vivi's waiting for us!
Dialogue: That's right! Vivi's waiting for us!
trans: 这是正确的！

Original: Zidane:Vivi...and him.
Dialogue: Vivi...and him.
trans: 薇薇……还有他。

Original: Zidane:Let's get moving! You're joining, right?
Dialogue: Let's get moving! You're joining, right?
trans: 让我们开始吧！

Original: Lenna:Of course. I will not abandon you here.
Dialogue: Of course. I will not abandon you here.
trans: 当然。

Original: Edgar:Hmm... I suppose I must try again...
Dialogue: Hmm... I suppose I must try again...
trans: 嗯……我想我必须再试一次……

Original: Eiko:Hurry up! We don't have time for this!
Dialogue: Hurry up! We don't have time for this!
trans: 赶快！

Original: Shantotto:Ohoho! Pardon me for mocking you, but are you afraid of something shocking you?
Dialogue: Ohoho! Pardon me for mocking you, but are you afraid of something shocking you?
trans: 呵呵！

Original: Edgar:How dare you laugh at me!
Dialogue: How dare you laugh at me!
trans: 你居然敢笑我！

Original: Edgar:But enough of that... Let us hurry on.
Dialogue: But enough of that... Let us hurry on.
trans: 但够了......让我们快点。

Original: Dark Manikin (Eiko):We've been waiting for you!
Dialogue: We've been waiting for you!
trans: 我们一直在等你！

Original: Dark Manikin (Steiner):We have something to tell you, warriors of the World of Light.
Dialogue: We have something to tell you, warriors of the World of Light.
trans: 我们有话要告诉你们，光之世界的战士们。

Original: Zidane:You guys are just like your real selves, too!
Dialogue: You guys are just like your real selves, too!
trans: 你们也像真正的自己一样！

Original: Dark Manikin (Garnet):Of course. Even so, we're still just imitations...
Dialogue: Of course. Even so, we're still just imitations...
trans: 当然。

Original: Zidane:I guess you're right. You remind me more of Garnet from when we first met.
Dialogue: I guess you're right. You remind me more of Garnet from when we first met.
trans: 我想你是对的。

Original: Zidane:...It was love at first sight.
Dialogue: ...It was love at first sight.
trans: ...那是一见钟情。

Original: Garnet:When you're done reminiscing, shall we listen to what they have to say?
Dialogue: When you're done reminiscing, shall we listen to what they have to say?
trans: 回忆完了，我们要不要听听他们怎么说？

Original: Dark Manikin (Steiner):It's about Kuja...
Dialogue: It's about Kuja...
trans: 是关于库贾...

Original: Dark Manikin (Freya):He appeared before us, while we were defending the World of Darkness.
Dialogue: He appeared before us, while we were defending the World of Darkness.
trans: 他出现在我们面前，而我们正在守卫黑暗世界。

Original: Kuja:...What pitiful puppets.
Dialogue: ...What pitiful puppets.
trans: ……好可怜的傀儡。

Original: Dark Manikin (Steiner):We are defending this world as ordained by the crystal core of darkness!
Dialogue: We are defending this world as ordained by the crystal core of darkness!
trans: 我们正在捍卫黑暗晶核命定的这个世界！

Original: Dark Manikin (Freya):I don't recall ever being pitied by Spiritus's warriors.
Dialogue: I don't recall ever being pitied by Spiritus's warriors.
trans: 我不记得曾经被 Spiritus 的战士们怜悯过。

Original: Kuja:Haha... HAHAHAHA!
Dialogue: Haha... HAHAHAHA!
trans: 哈哈哈哈哈哈！

Original: Kuja:You all have such empty existences. I can't help but laugh.
Dialogue: You all have such empty existences. I can't help but laugh.
trans: 你们都有如此空虚的存在。

Original: Kuja:After you've saved this world, it will have no more use for you.
Dialogue: After you've saved this world, it will have no more use for you.
trans: 你拯救了这个世界，它对你就没有用了。

Original: Kuja:You'll have nowhere to return.
Dialogue: You'll have nowhere to return.
trans: 你将无处可退。

Original: Kuja:That will be the end for you.
Dialogue: That will be the end for you.
trans: 那将是你的结局。

Original: Kuja:You'll simply...stop.
Dialogue: You'll simply...stop.
trans: 你会简单地...停止。

Original: Kuja:You do not know fear. You do not feel your fight to be unjust. You do not oppose your master.
Dialogue: You do not know fear. You do not feel your fight to be unjust. You do not oppose your master.
trans: 你不知道恐惧。

Original: Kuja:In order to make you such controllable puppets, the crystal core of darkness did not give you hearts.
Dialogue: In order to make you such controllable puppets, the crystal core of darkness did not give you hearts.
trans: 黑暗晶核为了让你们变成这样可控的傀儡，并没有给你们红心。

Original: Dark Manikin (Garnet):Even if that's true, we have no intention of running from what we must do.
Dialogue: Even if that's true, we have no intention of running from what we must do.
trans: 即使那是真的，我们也无意逃避我们必须做的事情。

Original: Dark Manikin (Steiner):Exactly! We will fulfill our duties, whether we can feel or not.
Dialogue: Exactly! We will fulfill our duties, whether we can feel or not.
trans: 确切地！

Original: Kuja:I see... And do you feel the same?
Dialogue: I see... And do you feel the same?
trans: 我明白了……你也有同感吗？

Original: Dark Manikin (Vivi):I... My heart...
Dialogue: I... My heart...
trans: 我……我的心……

Original: Dark Manikin (Garnet):Then he took the very same Vivi that is with you now.
Dialogue: Then he took the very same Vivi that is with you now.
trans: 然后他拿走了和你现在一样的薇薇。

Original: Dark Manikin (Freya):For a time, things passed just as Kuja said they would, but it seems like there are no ill feelings between you.
Dialogue: For a time, things passed just as Kuja said they would, but it seems like there are no ill feelings between you.
trans: 一时间，事情果然如库贾所说的那样过去了，但你们之间似乎并没有什么嫌隙。

Original: Zidane:Us? No way! He's been a great help.
Dialogue: Us? No way! He's been a great help.
trans: 我们？

Original: Vivi?:Is it okay...for me to stay...?
Dialogue: Is it okay...for me to stay...?
trans: 可以……让我留下来吗……？

Original: Dark Manikin (Freya):We were originally made to help the warriors from the World of Light. It's best you do what is expected of you.
Dialogue: We were originally made to help the warriors from the World of Light. It's best you do what is expected of you.
trans: 我们最初是为了帮助光之世界的战士而生的。

Original: Dark Manikin (Garnet):Kuja has lost control of himself. He is in the depths of despair.
Dialogue: Kuja has lost control of himself. He is in the depths of despair.
trans: Kuja 已经失去了对自己的控制。

Original: Dark Manikin (Garnet):We cannot guess his reasons, nor understand his feelings, but we know that he is dangerous.
Dialogue: We cannot guess his reasons, nor understand his feelings, but we know that he is dangerous.
trans: 我们无法猜测他的原因，也无法理解他的感受，但我们知道他很危险。

Original: Dark Manikin (Garnet):Please be careful.
Dialogue: Please be careful.
trans: 请小心。

Original: Garnet:Thank you... I guess the other me was worried about Zidane, too.
Dialogue: Thank you... I guess the other me was worried about Zidane, too.
trans: 谢谢……我想另一个我也很担心齐达内。

Original: Zidane:There's no need for you two to fight over me...
Dialogue: There's no need for you two to fight over me...
trans: 你们两个没必要为了我争...

Original: Garnet:Zidane! Were you even listening to what they were saying!?
Dialogue: Zidane! Were you even listening to what they were saying!?
trans: 齐达内！

Original: Zidane:I was joking!
Dialogue: I was joking!
trans: 我在开玩笑！

Original: Zidane:Sounds like we need to be extra careful with Kuja. We'd better brace ourselves for the worst.
Dialogue: Sounds like we need to be extra careful with Kuja. We'd better brace ourselves for the worst.
trans: 听起来我们需要对 Kuja 格外小心。

Original: Freya:Indeed... And what he said about exhausting one's use after saving the world is a bit...troubling.
Dialogue: Indeed... And what he said about exhausting one's use after saving the world is a bit...troubling.
trans: 确实……而且他说的拯救世界后用尽自己的用处，就有点……麻烦了。

Original: Jecht:We're not much different, though.
Dialogue: We're not much different, though.
trans: 不过，我们并没有太大的不同。

Original: Galuf:Could it be that Kuja has already been destroyed in his world...?
Dialogue: Could it be that Kuja has already been destroyed in his world...?
trans: 难不成，九爷已经在他的世界毁灭了……？

Original: Freya:...Perhaps that is the fate he is trying to change.
Dialogue: ...Perhaps that is the fate he is trying to change.
trans: ……或许这就是他想要改变的命运。

Original: Galuf:So once this world is saved, he won't have a place to return to...
Dialogue: So once this world is saved, he won't have a place to return to...
trans: 所以这个世界一旦得救，他就无处可归……

Original: Zidane:But he has no intention of doing what the gods want.
Dialogue: But he has no intention of doing what the gods want.
trans: 但他无意按照众神的意愿去做。

Original: Zidane:...He's such a pain.
Dialogue: ...He's such a pain.
trans: ......他真是个痛苦的人。

Original: Galuf:His contradictory thoughts caused him to spiral out of control... Do you think we can stop him?
Dialogue: His contradictory thoughts caused him to spiral out of control... Do you think we can stop him?
trans: 他矛盾的想法让他失控了……你觉得我们能阻止他吗？

Original: Zidane:We have to try. If he can be saved...I want to save him.
Dialogue: We have to try. If he can be saved...I want to save him.
trans: 我们必须尝试。

Original: Kuja:...You're late.
Dialogue: ...You're late.
trans: ...你迟到了。

Original: Vivi:Ngh... Guys... Zidane...
Dialogue: Ngh... Guys... Zidane...
trans: 唔……伙计们……齐达内……

Original: Kuja:Zidane... You truly are remarkable.
Dialogue: Zidane... You truly are remarkable.
trans: 齐达内……你真的很了不起。

Original: Kuja:You're courageous and care about your comrades. Truly a flawless hero...
Dialogue: You're courageous and care about your comrades. Truly a flawless hero...
trans: 你很勇敢，很关心你的战友。

Original: Kuja:Even so...you cannot defeat me.
Dialogue: Even so...you cannot defeat me.
trans: 即便如此……你也打不过我。

Original: Kuja:Do you think you can stop a man who fights tooth and nail against his preordained death?
Dialogue: Do you think you can stop a man who fights tooth and nail against his preordained death?
trans: 你认为你能阻止一个为他注定的死亡而竭尽全力的人吗？

Original: Kuja:If you end this, you'll be putting an end to me and the other puppets, including him.
Dialogue: If you end this, you'll be putting an end to me and the other puppets, including him.
trans: 如果你结束这一切，你就会结束我和其他傀儡，包括他。

Original: Zidane:Is that the reason why you kidnapped and hurt Vivi!?
Dialogue: Is that the reason why you kidnapped and hurt Vivi!?
trans: 这就是你绑架伤害薇薇的理由！？

Original: Kuja:That's right!
Dialogue: That's right!
trans: 这是正确的！

Original: Kuja:Behold his pain and suffering! He wishes to live, therefore he desires to escape!
Dialogue: Behold his pain and suffering! He wishes to live, therefore he desires to escape!
trans: 看他的痛苦和苦难！

Original: Kuja:And there is no one who can stop this!
Dialogue: And there is no one who can stop this!
trans: 而且没有人能阻止这一切！

Original: Vivi:The other...me...
Dialogue: The other...me...
trans: 另一个……我……

Original: Kuja:Lowly puppets... What a farce.
Dialogue: Lowly puppets... What a farce.
trans: 低贱的傀儡……真是一场闹剧。

Original: Aerith:Something's wrong with Kuja...
Dialogue: Something's wrong with Kuja...
trans: 库贾出事了……

Original: Aerith:His eyes are different than that time he helped us.
Dialogue: His eyes are different than that time he helped us.
trans: 他的眼光和那次他帮助我们的时候不一样了。

Original: Kuja:I've had enough! I've always played the clown!
Dialogue: I've had enough! I've always played the clown!
trans: 我受够了！

Original: Kuja:Trying to escape the gods and my fate, but failing again and again!
Dialogue: Trying to escape the gods and my fate, but failing again and again!
trans: 试图逃避众神和我的命运，但一次又一次失败！

Original: Kuja:I tire of this play! I tire of this stage and this role and...everyone!
Dialogue: I tire of this play! I tire of this stage and this role and...everyone!
trans: 这部剧看腻了！

Original: Tidus:You alright, Vivi?
Dialogue: You alright, Vivi?
trans: 你还好吗，薇薇？

Original: Vivi:Yes. I'm fine! But the other me...
Dialogue: Yes. I'm fine! But the other me...
trans: 是的。

Original: Zidane:Do we really have to fight, Kuja?
Dialogue: Do we really have to fight, Kuja?
trans: 我们真的必须战斗吗，Kuja？

Original: Kuja:Playing the cool, collected hero, Zidane? You want to steal the spotlight, don't you!?
Dialogue: Playing the cool, collected hero, Zidane? You want to steal the spotlight, don't you!?
trans: 扮演冷静、镇定的英雄齐达内？

Original: Zidane:No! Just listen to me!
Dialogue: No! Just listen to me!
trans: 不！

Original: Tidus:If he keeps this up, this whole area's done for!
Dialogue: If he keeps this up, this whole area's done for!
trans: 如果他再这样下去，整个地区就完蛋了！

Original: Aerith:And he won't listen to us...
Dialogue: And he won't listen to us...
trans: 他不会听我们的...

Original: Zidane:I know. And if my words won't work, then...
Dialogue: I know. And if my words won't work, then...
trans: 我知道。

Original: Zidane:I'll fight him until he's satisfied!
Dialogue: I'll fight him until he's satisfied!
trans: 我要和他斗到他满意为止！

Original: Kuja:Ahahaha! Come, Zidane, let us put on a show to remember!
Dialogue: Ahahaha! Come, Zidane, let us put on a show to remember!
trans: 啊哈哈哈！

Original: Zidane:Kuja! Enough of this!
Dialogue: Kuja! Enough of this!
trans: 九爷！

Original: Kuja:Your words are meaningless, Zidane!
Dialogue: Your words are meaningless, Zidane!
trans: 你的话毫无意义，齐达内！

Original: Kuja:You can all burn, along with this hideous tree!
Dialogue: You can all burn, along with this hideous tree!
trans: 你们都可以燃烧，连同这棵可怕的树！

Original: Vivi:Please wait just a little longer...other me...
Dialogue: Please wait just a little longer...other me...
trans: 请稍等一下……其他的我……

Original: Vivi:Kuja... I know you kidnapped me instead of my other comrades for a reason.
Dialogue: Kuja... I know you kidnapped me instead of my other comrades for a reason.
trans: Kuja...我知道你绑架我而不是我的其他同志是有原因的。

Original: Kuja:Huff... Huff... To think you could understand...
Dialogue: Huff... Huff... To think you could understand...
trans: 呵……呵……没想到你能看得懂……

Original: Kuja:...I must look like a fool to you... A true clown...
Dialogue: ...I must look like a fool to you... A true clown...
trans: ......在你看来我一定像个傻瓜......一个真正的小丑......

Original: Vivi:...I don't know if what we feel is the same.
Dialogue: ...I don't know if what we feel is the same.
trans: ……不知道我们的感受是不是一样。

Original: Vivi:I can't forgive you yet for the things you did back home...
Dialogue: I can't forgive you yet for the things you did back home...
trans: 我还不能原谅你在家里做的事...

Original: Vivi:I'm scared, too. And...lonely.
Dialogue: I'm scared, too. And...lonely.
trans: 我也很害怕

Original: Auron:Let him speak.
Dialogue: Let him speak.
trans: 让他说话。

Original: Vivi:But after I came to this world, I met a lot of people... People who will remember me.
Dialogue: But after I came to this world, I met a lot of people... People who will remember me.
trans: 但是来到这个世界之后，我遇到了很多人……会记住我的人。

Original: Vivi:And as long as they don't forget me, then in those memories...
Dialogue: And as long as they don't forget me, then in those memories...
trans: 而只要他们不忘记我，那么在那些回忆中……

Original: Vivi:They'll be a place to call home.
Dialogue: They'll be a place to call home.
trans: 他们将是一个可以称之为家的地方。

Original: Vivi:That's why I'm not afraid on this journey. I'm happy to have met everyone.
Dialogue: That's why I'm not afraid on this journey. I'm happy to have met everyone.
trans: 这就是为什么我在这段旅程中不害怕。

Original: Vivi:Kuja... There's still a place for you, even after life ends.
Dialogue: Kuja... There's still a place for you, even after life ends.
trans: Kuja... 即使在生命结束之后，你仍然有一席之地。

Original: Kuja:Idealism... That's all that is. This is a tragedy, and nothing can change that.
Dialogue: Idealism... That's all that is. This is a tragedy, and nothing can change that.
trans: 理想主义……仅此而已。

Original: Shadow:...He won't go far. He's simply hiding.
Dialogue: ...He won't go far. He's simply hiding.
trans: ……他不会走远的。

Original: Auron:Living on in the memories of others... Hmph, I never thought of it that way.
Dialogue: Living on in the memories of others... Hmph, I never thought of it that way.
trans: 活在别人的记忆里……哼，我从来没有那样想过。

Original: Zidane:It seems like you remembered something, Vivi.
Dialogue: It seems like you remembered something, Vivi.
trans: 薇薇，你好像想起了什么。

Original: Vivi:Uh-huh. When I talked to Kuja...
Dialogue: Uh-huh. When I talked to Kuja...
trans: 嗯。

Original: Shadow:In memories, huh...
Dialogue: In memories, huh...
trans: 回忆里，嗯...

Original: Auron:Is that...brilliance...?
Dialogue: Is that...brilliance...?
trans: 那是……光彩……？

Original: Vivi:It's the other me!
Dialogue: It's the other me!
trans: 是另一个我！

Original: Zidane:Hang in there!
Dialogue: Hang in there!
trans: 坚持住！

Original: Vivi:...Are you okay?
Dialogue: ...Are you okay?
trans: ...你还好吗？

Original: Dark Manikin (Vivi):I don't know... I feel...weak...
Dialogue: I don't know... I feel...weak...
trans: 我不知道……我觉得……虚弱……

Original: Onion Knight:He looks like a dark manikin again.
Dialogue: He looks like a dark manikin again.
trans: 他看起来又像一个黑色的人体模型了。

Original: Dark Manikin (Vivi):I'm sorry... This is the real me...
Dialogue: I'm sorry... This is the real me...
trans: 对不起……这才是真正的我……

Original: Vivi:There's no need to apologize.
Dialogue: There's no need to apologize.
trans: 没有必要道歉。

Original: Vivi:Thank you for helping my friends.
Dialogue: Thank you for helping my friends.
trans: 谢谢你帮助我的朋友。

Original: Dark Manikin (Vivi):Aren't you...mad?
Dialogue: Aren't you...mad?
trans: 你不是……疯了吗？

Original: Vivi:I was...surprised at first. But then I started to see you as a little brother...
Dialogue: I was...surprised at first. But then I started to see you as a little brother...
trans: 我一开始……很惊讶。

Original: Vivi:I wish we could have talked more... This is the only place I can meet others like me anymore.
Dialogue: I wish we could have talked more... This is the only place I can meet others like me anymore.
trans: 我希望我们能谈得更多……这是我唯一能再遇到像我这样的人的地方。

Original: Dark Manikin (Vivi):I liked...traveling with everyone...
Dialogue: I liked...traveling with everyone...
trans: 我喜欢……和大家一起旅行……

Original: Dark Manikin (Vivi):I wanted to learn...about hearts and life...
Dialogue: I wanted to learn...about hearts and life...
trans: 我想学习……关于心灵和生活……

Original: Dark Manikin (Vivi):And I think I...understand now...
Dialogue: And I think I...understand now...
trans: 我想我……现在明白了……

Original: Steiner:Master Vivi of the World of Darkness is disappearing!
Dialogue: Master Vivi of the World of Darkness is disappearing!
trans: 黑暗世界的主人薇薇消失了！

Original: Zidane:He has so much brilliance...
Dialogue: He has so much brilliance...
trans: 他有太多的光彩...

Original: Dark Manikin (Vivi):Take this...brilliance...
Dialogue: Take this...brilliance...
trans: 拿着这个……光彩……

Original: Dark Manikin (Vivi):Save...the world...
Dialogue: Save...the world...
trans: 拯救世界...

Original: Ace:He's...gone.
Dialogue: He's...gone.
trans: 他走了。

Original: Firion:To think he was hiding so much brilliance in that little body.
Dialogue: To think he was hiding so much brilliance in that little body.
trans: 没想到他那小小的身躯竟然藏着如此多的光彩。

Original: Vivi:Thank you. I won't forget you.
Dialogue: Thank you. I won't forget you.
trans: 谢谢。

Original: Ace:I also have memories of him in this world.
Dialogue: I also have memories of him in this world.
trans: 我在这个世界上也有他的记忆。

Original: Onion Knight:Parting ways with comrades is part of the journey...
Dialogue: Parting ways with comrades is part of the journey...
trans: 与战友分道扬镳是旅途的一部分……

Original: Firion:But you have to make the most of every meeting and parting.
Dialogue: But you have to make the most of every meeting and parting.
trans: 但你必须充分利用每一次相遇和离别。

Original: Firion:He was our comrade. We won't forget him, either.
Dialogue: He was our comrade. We won't forget him, either.
trans: 他是我们的同志。

Original: Vivi:...Thank you.
Dialogue: ...Thank you.

Original: Zidane:Hey, Vivi... Do you hate Kuja for what he did?
Dialogue: Hey, Vivi... Do you hate Kuja for what he did?
trans: 嘿，Vivi……你讨厌 Kuja 的所作所为吗？

Original: Vivi:I still can't forgive him for what he did in our world, but...
Dialogue: I still can't forgive him for what he did in our world, but...
trans: 我仍然不能原谅他在我们这个世界上所做的一切，但是……

Original: Vivi:But I know that he feels sad and lonely.
Dialogue: But I know that he feels sad and lonely.
trans: 但我知道他感到悲伤和孤独。

Original: Vivi:And...no matter what terrible things he did, I knew you would want to save him, so...
Dialogue: And...no matter what terrible things he did, I knew you would want to save him, so...
trans: 而且……不管他做了什么可怕的事情，我知道你会想救他，所以……

Original: Vivi:I want to go with you.
Dialogue: I want to go with you.
trans: 我想和你一起去。

Original: Zidane:...Thanks, Vivi.
Dialogue: ...Thanks, Vivi.
trans: ……谢谢，薇薇。

Original: Steiner:I agree. I cannot overcome my hatred so easily...
Dialogue: I agree. I cannot overcome my hatred so easily...
trans: 我同意。

Original: Steiner:But I know I cannot move forward with only that in my heart.
Dialogue: But I know I cannot move forward with only that in my heart.
trans: 但我知道我不能只心中有那个。

Original: Onion Knight:Have you saved Kuja before? ...Even though he's your enemy?
Dialogue: Have you saved Kuja before? ...Even though he's your enemy?
trans: 你以前救过Kuja吗？

Original: Zidane:I saved him because he was within reach...
Dialogue: I saved him because he was within reach...
trans: 我救了他，因为他触手可及……

Original: Zidane:And he's something of an older brother to me, even though I didn't know for a long time...
Dialogue: And he's something of an older brother to me, even though I didn't know for a long time...
trans: 他对我来说有点像哥哥，尽管我很长一段时间都不知道……

Original: Zidane:We weren't close or anything. But I couldn't just cast him aside.
Dialogue: We weren't close or anything. But I couldn't just cast him aside.
trans: 我们不亲密或任何东西。

Original: Ace:But you still want to save him in this world.
Dialogue: But you still want to save him in this world.
trans: 可你还想在这个世界上救他一命。

Original: Onion Knight:If that's what you guys want, we're not about to stop you!
Dialogue: If that's what you guys want, we're not about to stop you!
trans: 如果那是你们想要的，我们不会阻止你们！

Original: Zidane:Sorry for dragging you guys along.
Dialogue: Sorry for dragging you guys along.
trans: 抱歉拖你们了。

Original: Ace:Don't worry about it. Things could get a lot worse if we just let Kuja have his way.
Dialogue: Don't worry about it. Things could get a lot worse if we just let Kuja have his way.
trans: 别担心。

Original: Zidane:You're right. Alright, let's get going then!
Dialogue: You're right. Alright, let's get going then!
trans: 你说得对。

Original: Eiko:Welcome back, Vivi! We were worried about you!
Dialogue: Welcome back, Vivi! We were worried about you!
trans: 欢迎回来，薇薇！

Original: Vivi:Thank you.
Dialogue: Thank you.
trans: 谢谢。

Original: Palom:By the way, I could definitely tell that the other Vivi wasn't you!
Dialogue: By the way, I could definitely tell that the other Vivi wasn't you!
trans: 对了，我可以确定另一个薇薇不是你！

Original: Palom:His face didn't fool me for one second!
Dialogue: His face didn't fool me for one second!
trans: 他的脸没有骗过我一秒钟！

Original: Eiko:It's nothing to brag about. Everyone could tell. In any case...
Dialogue: It's nothing to brag about. Everyone could tell. In any case...
trans: 这没什么好吹嘘的。

Original: Eiko:Kuja did mean things to you, didn't he? Did he say anything to you?
Dialogue: Kuja did mean things to you, didn't he? Did he say anything to you?
trans: Kuja 确实对你很重要，不是吗？

Original: Vivi:Oh, that's right. I have to tell Zidane what Kuja said.
Dialogue: Oh, that's right. I have to tell Zidane what Kuja said.
trans: 哦，对了。

Original: Zidane:About me?
Dialogue: About me?
trans: 关于我？

Original: Vivi:No, no... About the Iifa Tree.
Dialogue: No, no... About the Iifa Tree.
trans: 不，不……关于 Iifa 树。

Original: Vivi:Kuja wanted to make this world into a stage and tried to summon something from our world.
Dialogue: Kuja wanted to make this world into a stage and tried to summon something from our world.
trans: 九子想把这个世界变成舞台，想要从我们的世界召唤出什么来。

Original: Vivi:But...this wasn't what he wanted. He felt like he had failed...
Dialogue: But...this wasn't what he wanted. He felt like he had failed...
trans: 可是……这不是他想要的。

Original: Freya:Hmm... I suppose this place holds many memories for Kuja.
Dialogue: Hmm... I suppose this place holds many memories for Kuja.
trans: 嗯……我想这个地方承载着库亚许多的回忆。

Original: Freya:He was defeated by us and shown mercy by Zidane here...
Dialogue: He was defeated by us and shown mercy by Zidane here...
trans: 他在这里被我们打败，被齐达内手下留情……

Original: Tidus:Sounds like this guy just can't let go of the past.
Dialogue: Sounds like this guy just can't let go of the past.
trans: 听起来这家伙就是放不下过去。

Original: Palom:So that's why he was so mad!
Dialogue: So that's why he was so mad!
trans: 所以他才这么生气！

Original: Vivi:I think he needs to find a reason for living in this world...
Dialogue: I think he needs to find a reason for living in this world...
trans: 我觉得他需要找到活在这个世界上的理由……

Original: Tidus:...He's not the only one without someplace to return to. Even so, the people here go on living in their own way.
Dialogue: ...He's not the only one without someplace to return to. Even so, the people here go on living in their own way.
trans: ……他不是唯一一个无家可归的人。

Original: Freya:I wonder what he's up to now... Shall we find him and extend a helping hand?
Dialogue: I wonder what he's up to now... Shall we find him and extend a helping hand?
trans: 不知道他现在在忙什么……我们要不要找到他，伸出援手？

Original: Zidane:If he's somewhere we can reach, then let's!
Dialogue: If he's somewhere we can reach, then let's!
trans: 如果他在我们能到达的地方，那就让我们去吧！

Original: Zidane:And I'll do it because I want to.
Dialogue: And I'll do it because I want to.
trans: 我会这样做，因为我想这样做。

Original: Zidane:Even if we can't change fate...
Dialogue: Even if we can't change fate...
trans: 就算改变不了命运...

Original: Tidus:Going with the flow and doing it because you want to are two different things.
Dialogue: Going with the flow and doing it because you want to are two different things.
trans: 顺其自然，因为你想做是两件不同的事情。

Original: Zidane:You got that right!
Dialogue: You got that right!
trans: 你说对了！

Original: Tidus:I won't let you be the only one looking cool around here.
Dialogue: I won't let you be the only one looking cool around here.
trans: 我不会让你成为这里唯一看起来很酷的人。

Original: Freya:Birds of a feather...
Dialogue: Birds of a feather...
trans: 物以类聚...

Original: Freya:Now then...we're almost inside. Shall we?
Dialogue: Now then...we're almost inside. Shall we?
trans: 那么……我们快进去了。

Original: Cater:Do you all...remember that dark manikin of Vivi?
Dialogue: Do you all...remember that dark manikin of Vivi?
trans: 你们都……还记得薇薇那个黑色的人体模型吗？

Original: King:Yes. I have memories of both his words and actions.
Dialogue: Yes. I have memories of both his words and actions.
trans: 是的。

Original: Rem:If we return, we may forget...
Dialogue: If we return, we may forget...
trans: 如果我们回来，我们可能会忘记...

Original: Ace:And not just Vivi, either. Everyone here.
Dialogue: And not just Vivi, either. Everyone here.
trans: 也不只是 Vivi。

Original: Freya:They seem troubled.
Dialogue: They seem troubled.
trans: 他们似乎很烦恼。

Original: Freya:They all wear the same uniform, too. Could they be from the same world?
Dialogue: They all wear the same uniform, too. Could they be from the same world?
trans: 他们也都穿着同样的制服。

Original: Vivi:That's right. The world Ace and the others are from is very special.
Dialogue: That's right. The world Ace and the others are from is very special.
trans: 这是正确的。

Original: Vivi:When someone dies, all memories of them disappear...
Dialogue: When someone dies, all memories of them disappear...
trans: 当一个人死去时，关于他们的所有记忆都会消失……

Original: Freya:How terrible...
Dialogue: How terrible...
trans: 多么可怕...

Original: Cater:It's not, really. We actually thought it was a good thing.
Dialogue: It's not, really. We actually thought it was a good thing.
trans: 不是，真的。

Original: King:Remembering the dead might prevent you from focusing on the battle before you.
Dialogue: Remembering the dead might prevent you from focusing on the battle before you.
trans: 记住死者可能会阻止你专注于你面前的战斗。

Original: Rem:...Do you think we're heartless?
Dialogue: ...Do you think we're heartless?
trans: ……你觉得我们没心没肺吗？

Original: Freya:No. The rules of each world are different.
Dialogue: No. The rules of each world are different.
trans: 不，每个世界的规则都不一样。

Original: Freya:In a world where children like yourselves are forced to fight, it may be the right thing to do.
Dialogue: In a world where children like yourselves are forced to fight, it may be the right thing to do.
trans: 在一个像你们这样的孩子被迫战斗的世界里，这可能是正确的做法。

Original: Vivi:That's right! Someone very precious to you, too.
Dialogue: That's right! Someone very precious to you, too.
trans: 这是正确的！

Original: Ace:Why did he continue to fight even without his memories?
Dialogue: Why did he continue to fight even without his memories?
trans: 为什么他在没有记忆的情况下还要继续战斗？

Original: Freya:Nobody knows. Not even he himself.
Dialogue: Nobody knows. Not even he himself.
trans: 没人知道。

Original: Freya:He has forgotten everything. Even his hometown... Even me...
Dialogue: He has forgotten everything. Even his hometown... Even me...
trans: 他已经忘记了一切。

Original: Cater:Are you okay with that, Freya? Don't you want him to remember?
Dialogue: Are you okay with that, Freya? Don't you want him to remember?
trans: 你能接受吗，芙蕾雅？

Original: Freya:...At first, I did. Being forgotten was agonizing.
Dialogue: ...At first, I did. Being forgotten was agonizing.
trans: ......起初，我做到了。

Original: Freya:But now...I am just happy he's alive.
Dialogue: But now...I am just happy he's alive.
trans: 但是现在……我很高兴他还活着。

Original: King:Still... If he's forgotten everything, doesn't that mean it can't go back to the way it was before?
Dialogue: Still... If he's forgotten everything, doesn't that mean it can't go back to the way it was before?
trans: 还是……如果他什么都忘记了，那岂不是再也回不到从前了？

Original: Freya:Perhaps not. But as long as he still draws breath...
Dialogue: Perhaps not. But as long as he still draws breath...
trans: 也许不是。

Original: Freya:We can make new memories.
Dialogue: We can make new memories.
trans: 我们可以创造新的回忆。

Original: Vivi:Even if you'll eventually forget those who die...
Dialogue: Even if you'll eventually forget those who die...
trans: 即使你最终会忘记那些死去的人......

Original: Vivi:You can still make memories with them now while they're alive.
Dialogue: You can still make memories with them now while they're alive.
trans: 在他们还活着的时候，你现在仍然可以和他们一起回忆。

Original: King:"Now," huh...
Dialogue: "Now," huh...

Original: Rem:Like on this journey!
Dialogue: Like on this journey!
trans: 喜欢这次旅行！

Original: Vivi:That's right! I want to make as many memories as I can while I'm alive.
Dialogue: That's right! I want to make as many memories as I can while I'm alive.
trans: 这是正确的！

Original: Vivi:Even if someday I forget the time I spent here...
Dialogue: Even if someday I forget the time I spent here...
trans: 即使有一天我忘记了我在这里度过的时光......

Original: Vivi:I'm still happy to be together with my friends at this very moment.
Dialogue: I'm still happy to be together with my friends at this very moment.
trans: 此时此刻，我仍然很高兴能和我的朋友们在一起。

Original: Ace:Vivi... You've got a strong heart.
Dialogue: Vivi... You've got a strong heart.
trans: 薇薇……你有一颗坚强的心。

Original: Freya:What are you saying? Everyone has their own strength.
Dialogue: What are you saying? Everyone has their own strength.
trans: 你在说什么？

Original: Freya:I think you are all strong.
Dialogue: I think you are all strong.
trans: 我觉得你们都很坚强。

Original: Freya:You live each day to the fullest, even knowing someday you will be forgotten. Is that not strength, too?
Dialogue: You live each day to the fullest, even knowing someday you will be forgotten. Is that not strength, too?
trans: 你过着充实的每一天，即使知道有一天你会被遗忘。

Original: Rem:I guess you've got a point.
Dialogue: I guess you've got a point.
trans: 我想你说得有道理。

Original: Ace:I'll do my best to focus on making memories "now."
Dialogue: I'll do my best to focus on making memories "now."
trans: 我会尽力专注于“现在”的回忆。

Original: Ace:We may lose our memories of the people who die, but what they taught us lives on.
Dialogue: We may lose our memories of the people who die, but what they taught us lives on.
trans: 我们可能会失去对死去的人的记忆，但他们教给我们的东西会继续存在。

Original: Kuja:I've had enough... I will put an end to this farce.
Dialogue: I've had enough... I will put an end to this farce.
trans: 我受够了……我会结束这场闹剧的。

Original: Kuja:What!?
Dialogue: What!?
trans: 什么！？

Original: Kuja:Is that... I see... So they were called to this world, too.
Dialogue: Is that... I see... So they were called to this world, too.
trans: 那个……原来如此……所以他们也被召唤到了这个世界上。

Original: Kuja:Your roles are insignificant.
Dialogue: Your roles are insignificant.
trans: 你的角色是微不足道的。

Original: Kuja:You have no place in this play. I will end it all!
Dialogue: You have no place in this play. I will end it all!
trans: 这场戏没有你的位置。

Original: Zidane:Do we have to get rid of this guy before we get to Kuja?
Dialogue: Do we have to get rid of this guy before we get to Kuja?
trans: 是不是一定要在到达库贾之前解决掉这家伙？

Original: Mog:That's right, kupo!
Dialogue: That's right, kupo!
trans: 没错，库波！

Original: Vivi:So then Kuja's fought this enemy already?
Dialogue: So then Kuja's fought this enemy already?
trans: 那么 Kuja 已经与这个敌人战斗了吗？

Original: King:Or maybe Kuja put Shinryu's larvae up to the task.
Dialogue: Or maybe Kuja put Shinryu's larvae up to the task.
trans: 或者也许 Kuja 让 Shinryu 的幼虫完成了任务。

Original: Mog:Even as one of Spiritus's warriors, he can't summon like this without Shinryu's larvae, kupo.
Dialogue: Even as one of Spiritus's warriors, he can't summon like this without Shinryu's larvae, kupo.
trans: 即便身为斯皮鲁图斯的战士之一，没有神龙的幼虫库珀，他也无法这样召唤。

Original: Zell:So you mean Kuja didn't call it here, but used this place because it was already here?
Dialogue: So you mean Kuja didn't call it here, but used this place because it was already here?
trans: 所以你的意思是 Kuja 没有在这里调用它，而是因为它已经在这里而使用了这个地方？

Original: Zidane:And Kuja's already gotten past it...
Dialogue: And Kuja's already gotten past it...
trans: Kuja 已经过去了...

Original: Zidane:Did he fight it alone?
Dialogue: Did he fight it alone?
trans: 是他一个人打的吗？

Original: King:Does it matter? It's still here.
Dialogue: Does it matter? It's still here.
trans: 有关系吗？

Original: Zell:Right! So get ready!
Dialogue: Right! So get ready!
trans: 正确的！

Original: Vivi:Come on, Zidane. Let's go!
Dialogue: Come on, Zidane. Let's go!
trans: 加油，齐达内。

Original: Vivi:Is it injured...? Was that Kuja's doing?
Dialogue: Is it injured...? Was that Kuja's doing?
trans: 是不是受伤了……？

Original: Zidane:It might be his way of taking responsibility for all this...
Dialogue: It might be his way of taking responsibility for all this...
trans: 这可能是他对这一切负责的方式……

Original: Freya:In any case, this creature is still in our way.
Dialogue: In any case, this creature is still in our way.
trans: 无论如何，这个生物仍然挡着我们的路。

Original: Steiner:That's right! We must brace ourselves for battle!
Dialogue: That's right! We must brace ourselves for battle!
trans: 这是正确的！

Original: Garnet:Even though we defeated Shinryu's larvae, nothing's changed...
Dialogue: Even though we defeated Shinryu's larvae, nothing's changed...
trans: 虽然打倒了神龙的幼虫，但一切都没有改变……

Original: Mog:A very intense will is distorting the dimension, kupo!
Dialogue: A very intense will is distorting the dimension, kupo!
trans: 非常强烈的意志正在扭曲次元，库波！

Original: Mog:Their will is strong enough to maintain this space even without the larvae, kupo!
Dialogue: Their will is strong enough to maintain this space even without the larvae, kupo!
trans: 即使没有幼虫，它们的意志也足以维持这个空间，库珀！

Original: Zidane:That means he's still here.
Dialogue: That means he's still here.
trans: 也就是说他还在这里。

Original: Steiner:I-i-is that...!?
Dialogue: I-i-is that...!?
trans: 我、我、那个是……！？

Original: Cid:Fog...? But it's sunny out.
Dialogue: Fog...? But it's sunny out.
trans: 多雾路段...？

Original: Cid:Huh? Sounds like it's no ordinary mist.
Dialogue: Huh? Sounds like it's no ordinary mist.
trans: 嗯？

Original: Garnet:It hardens people's hearts and makes them fight. It's caused many conflicts in our world.
Dialogue: It hardens people's hearts and makes them fight. It's caused many conflicts in our world.
trans: 它使人们的心变得刚硬并使他们战斗。

Original: Freya:It was used as energy for airships, though it held a much darker power...
Dialogue: It was used as energy for airships, though it held a much darker power...
trans: 它被用作飞艇的能源，尽管它拥有更黑暗的力量......

Original: Mog:Kupo! I sense a super strong monster, kupo!
Dialogue: Kupo! I sense a super strong monster, kupo!
trans: 买吧！

Original: Garnet:Most likely that one born from the mist...
Dialogue: Most likely that one born from the mist...
trans: 多半是从迷雾中诞生的……

Original: Steiner:We must defeat it before it can affect the world!
Dialogue: We must defeat it before it can affect the world!
trans: 我们必须在它影响世界之前打败它！

Original: Freya:But this is unusual with the mist around...
Dialogue: But this is unusual with the mist around...
trans: 但这在周围的雾气中很不寻常……

Original: Zidane:It's too quiet.
Dialogue: It's too quiet.
trans: 太安静了。

Original: Garnet:Yes. There should be more dangerous monsters here.
Dialogue: Yes. There should be more dangerous monsters here.
trans: 是的。

Original: Cid:What the $#&% are you doing standing around here talking for!?
Dialogue: What the $#&% are you doing standing around here talking for!?
trans: $#&% 你站在这里说话到底在干什么！？

Original: Cid:You got a responsibility to bring down the monsters from your own world!
Dialogue: You got a responsibility to bring down the monsters from your own world!
trans: 你有责任打倒你自己世界的怪物！

Original: Zidane:Cid's right. Let's get a move on!
Dialogue: Cid's right. Let's get a move on!
trans: 西德是对的。

Original: Kuja:GUAH...!
Dialogue: GUAH...!

Original: Kuja:I must be so...unsightly... Haha...
Dialogue: I must be so...unsightly... Haha...
trans: 我一定是太……难看……哈哈……

Original: Soulcage:Even having summoned me, you attempt to stop me...
Dialogue: Even having summoned me, you attempt to stop me...
trans: 就算召唤了我，还想阻止我……

Original: Kuja:This is...not your stage. It was...my mistake.
Dialogue: This is...not your stage. It was...my mistake.
trans: 这……不是你的舞台。

Original: Soulcage:Your self-ordained mission is meaningless.
Dialogue: Your self-ordained mission is meaningless.
trans: 你自己定下的使命毫无意义。

Original: ???:You okay?
Dialogue: You okay?
trans: 你还好吗？

Original: Kuja:Zidane... The lead should not know what goes on behind the scenes.
Dialogue: Zidane... The lead should not know what goes on behind the scenes.
trans: 齐达内…… 主角应该不知道幕后的事情。

Original: Kuja:I'm culling the unnecessary scenes from the play...away from the audience's eyes.
Dialogue: I'm culling the unnecessary scenes from the play...away from the audience's eyes.
trans: 我正在剔除剧中不必要的场景……远离观众的视线。

Original: Steiner:...Are you trying to defeat this monster on your own?
Dialogue: ...Are you trying to defeat this monster on your own?
trans: ......你是想独自打败这个怪物吗？

Original: Freya:Is that your way of taking responsibility?
Dialogue: Is that your way of taking responsibility?
trans: 这是你承担责任的方式吗？

Original: Vivi:That's enough, Kuja... You can barely stand...
Dialogue: That's enough, Kuja... You can barely stand...
trans: 够了，Kuja……你快站不住了……

Original: Kuja:Even if I fall here...nothing changes. Nothing at all.
Dialogue: Even if I fall here...nothing changes. Nothing at all.
trans: 就算我倒在这里……也没什么变化。

Original: Soulcage:...It is as I expected.
Dialogue: ...It is as I expected.
trans: ……果然如我所料。

Original: Soulcage:I am connected to a different world...
Dialogue: I am connected to a different world...
trans: 我连接到一个不同的世界...

Original: Soulcage:I cannot send the overflowing willpower form this world to Gaia...
Dialogue: I cannot send the overflowing willpower form this world to Gaia...
trans: 我不能把这个世界溢出的意志力送到盖亚……

Original: Soulcage:Was I not called here to use my power and force your surrender?
Dialogue: Was I not called here to use my power and force your surrender?
trans: 我不是被叫来用我的力量逼你投降的吗？

Original: Kuja:...I don't need you. I want not to use any more paltry tricks.
Dialogue: ...I don't need you. I want not to use any more paltry tricks.
trans: ……我不需要你。

Original: Kuja:A never-ending story...is not one worth hearing.
Dialogue: A never-ending story...is not one worth hearing.
trans: 没完没了的故事……不值得听。

Original: Kuja:I leave the finale to you, Zidane.
Dialogue: I leave the finale to you, Zidane.
trans: 我把结局留给你，齐达内。

Original: Zidane:I won't let you do this alone.
Dialogue: I won't let you do this alone.
trans: 我不会让你一个人做这件事的。

Original: Steiner:And neither will I!
Dialogue: And neither will I!
trans: 我也不会！

Original: Freya:We are with you, whether you like it or not.
Dialogue: We are with you, whether you like it or not.
trans: 我们和你在一起，不管你喜不喜欢。

Original: Freya:I lend my spear to your cause!
Dialogue: I lend my spear to your cause!
trans: 我把我的长矛借给你的事业！

Original: Kuja:Should I not suffer punishment? Do you not remember what I've done to you?
Dialogue: Should I not suffer punishment? Do you not remember what I've done to you?
trans: 我不应该受到惩罚吗？

Original: Garnet:You're right. Countless people were sacrificed...
Dialogue: You're right. Countless people were sacrificed...
trans: 你说得对。

Original: Garnet:But blaming you for all those crimes won't solve anything.
Dialogue: But blaming you for all those crimes won't solve anything.
trans: 但将所有这些罪行归咎于你并不能解决任何问题。

Original: Garnet:Even if you made the wrong choice and wanted war... You're still a citizen of Gaia, like us.
Dialogue: Even if you made the wrong choice and wanted war... You're still a citizen of Gaia, like us.
trans: 即使你做出了错误的选择并想要发动战争……你仍然是盖亚的公民，就像我们一样。

Original: Zidane:There were lives I couldn't save.
Dialogue: There were lives I couldn't save.
trans: 有些生命我无法挽救。

Original: Zidane:I have my regrets, and I've thrown my tantrums.
Dialogue: I have my regrets, and I've thrown my tantrums.
trans: 我有我的遗憾，我已经发脾气了。

Original: Zidane:My weakness was detestable.
Dialogue: My weakness was detestable.
trans: 我的弱点令人厌恶。

Original: Zidane:But instead of getting mad at others and taking their lives... I decided to save them instead.
Dialogue: But instead of getting mad at others and taking their lives... I decided to save them instead.
trans: 但是我没有生别人的气并夺走他们的生命……我决定拯救他们。

Original: Vivi:You have to live.
Dialogue: You have to live.
trans: 你必须生活。

Original: Vivi:Even if you know it will end, you have to live in the time that you have left, Kuja.
Dialogue: Even if you know it will end, you have to live in the time that you have left, Kuja.
trans: 即使你知道它会结束，你也必须活在你离开的时间里，Kuja。

Original: Kuja:Haha... This play really is a flop...
Dialogue: Haha... This play really is a flop...
trans: 哈哈。。。这部剧真的很烂。。。

Original: Kuja:I can't even hate my enemies... How ironic...
Dialogue: I can't even hate my enemies... How ironic...
trans: 我什至不能恨我的敌人……多么讽刺……

Original: Zidane:That may be, but we're all in agreement.
Dialogue: That may be, but we're all in agreement.
trans: 可能是这样，但我们都同意。

Original: Zidane:We stand with you, Kuja.
Dialogue: We stand with you, Kuja.
trans: 我们和你站在一起，Kuja。

Original: Zidane:And we don't need a reason to help you, other than that we can.
Dialogue: And we don't need a reason to help you, other than that we can.
trans: 我们不需要理由来帮助你，除了我们可以。

Original: Zidane:We'll protect you, and this world!
Dialogue: We'll protect you, and this world!
trans: 我们会保护你，保护这个世界！

Original: Kuja:I've come this far. I suppose I don't mind playing a supporting role for once.
Dialogue: I've come this far. I suppose I don't mind playing a supporting role for once.
trans: 我已经走到这一步了。

Original: Zidane:That's the spirit!
Dialogue: That's the spirit!
trans: 就是那种精神！

Original: Kuja:...And so the curtain rises on the final act!
Dialogue: ...And so the curtain rises on the final act!
trans: ……最后一幕拉开了帷幕！

Original: Soulcage:You attempt to fulfill your mission, your reason for being in this world...
Dialogue: You attempt to fulfill your mission, your reason for being in this world...
trans: 你试图完成你的使命，你存在于这个世界上的理由......

Original: Soulcage:So I will also carry out the purpose for which I was summoned.
Dialogue: So I will also carry out the purpose for which I was summoned.
trans: 所以我也会执行我被召唤的目的。

Original: Kuja:Unfortunately for you, you have no place upon this stage.
Dialogue: Unfortunately for you, you have no place upon this stage.
trans: 不幸的是，你在这个舞台上没有位置。

Original: Kuja:And all useless props will be disposed of accordingly.
Dialogue: And all useless props will be disposed of accordingly.
trans: 所有无用的道具都会被相应地处理掉。

Original: Zidane:You won't be alone! We're all with you!
Dialogue: You won't be alone! We're all with you!
trans: 你不会孤单！

Original: Vivi:The monster is gone, but this place is still the same...
Dialogue: The monster is gone, but this place is still the same...
trans: 怪物不见了，但这里还是老样子……

Original: Mog:It looks like this space has stabilized, kupo.
Dialogue: It looks like this space has stabilized, kupo.
trans: 看来这个空间已经稳定下来了，库珀。

Original: Mog:Your will was super strong, kupo! You maintained a part of a different world here!
Dialogue: Your will was super strong, kupo! You maintained a part of a different world here!
trans: 你的意志超强的，库波！

Original: Kuja:Do you mean I've rewritten the gods' world?
Dialogue: Do you mean I've rewritten the gods' world?
trans: 你是说我重写了众神世界？

Original: Mog:Looks like it, kupo!
Dialogue: Looks like it, kupo!
trans: 看起来像，库波！

Original: Mog:If Shinryu's larvae aren't here, the Torsion connecting to another world is gone, kupo.
Dialogue: If Shinryu's larvae aren't here, the Torsion connecting to another world is gone, kupo.
trans: 如果 Shinryu 的幼虫不在这里，连接到另一个世界的 Torsion 就消失了，kupo。

Original: Zidane:And we gathered all the brilliance here. Should we just leave it as is?
Dialogue: And we gathered all the brilliance here. Should we just leave it as is?
trans: 我们在这里聚集了所有的光彩。

Original: Mog:Well, there's not much we can do about it, kupo.
Dialogue: Well, there's not much we can do about it, kupo.
trans: 好吧，我们对此无能为力，kupo。

Original: Mog:We have to leave it up to the gods, kupo.
Dialogue: We have to leave it up to the gods, kupo.
trans: 我们必须把它留给众神，库波。

Original: Vaan:Not exactly a solid plan, Mog...
Dialogue: Not exactly a solid plan, Mog...
trans: 这不是一个可靠的计划，Mog...

Original: Mog:What else can I do, kupo? If I don't know, I just don't know!
Dialogue: What else can I do, kupo? If I don't know, I just don't know!
trans: 我还能做什么，库波？

Original: Kuja:They accept what they cannot do... And I... My will...
Dialogue: They accept what they cannot do... And I... My will...
trans: 他们接受他们做不到的事……而我……我的意志……

Original: Vivi:Why do you compare yourself? Is it so bad being different from Zidane?
Dialogue: Why do you compare yourself? Is it so bad being different from Zidane?
trans: 你为什么要比较自己？

Original: Vaan:I don't get it. Aren't you two brothers?
Dialogue: I don't get it. Aren't you two brothers?
trans: 我不明白。

Original: Zidane:No... It's fine.
Dialogue: No... It's fine.
trans: 不，还好。

Original: Kuja:We're not like normal brothers. We have no parents.
Dialogue: We're not like normal brothers. We have no parents.
trans: 我们不像普通的兄弟。

Original: Kuja:The only thing we have in common with other siblings is being unable to choose them.
Dialogue: The only thing we have in common with other siblings is being unable to choose them.
trans: 我们与其他兄弟姐妹的唯一共同点是无法选择他们。

Original: Zidane:The feeling's mutual! Who would ever choose you as a brother!?
Dialogue: The feeling's mutual! Who would ever choose you as a brother!?
trans: 感情是相互的！

Original: Kuja:Haha... Things are finally getting interesting.
Dialogue: Haha... Things are finally getting interesting.
trans: 哈哈……事情终于有趣起来了。

Original: Kuja:I think I'll enjoy the story a little longer. I'll take complaints later.
Dialogue: I think I'll enjoy the story a little longer. I'll take complaints later.
trans: 我想我会更喜欢这个故事。

Original: Vivi:...There he goes.
Dialogue: ...There he goes.

Original: Cecil:Will he not be tainted by darkness again? He may send assassins after us...
Dialogue: Will he not be tainted by darkness again? He may send assassins after us...
trans: 他不会再被黑暗玷污了吗？

Original: Zidane:It's just a feeling, but...even if we fight, I don't think he'll do that again.
Dialogue: It's just a feeling, but...even if we fight, I don't think he'll do that again.
trans: 这只是一种感觉，但是……即使我们吵架，我也不认为他会再那样做。

Original: Zidane:He might not know what he's living for here yet...
