Dialogue: He might not know what he's living for here yet...
trans: 他可能还不知道自己住在这里是为了什么……

Original: Zidane:But he's decided to live whatever time he's got left.
Dialogue: But he's decided to live whatever time he's got left.
trans: 但他决定活到剩下的时间。

Original: Vivi:If he makes a mistake...I'll stop him. If he's somewhere I can reach...I'll speak to him.
Dialogue: If he makes a mistake...I'll stop him. If he's somewhere I can reach...I'll speak to him.
trans: 如果他犯了错误……我会阻止他。

Original: Zidane:Yeah. Let's do that. Are you guys okay with that?
Dialogue: Yeah. Let's do that. Are you guys okay with that?
trans: 是的。

Original: Cecil:We have no reason to doubt you and your friends, Zidane.
Dialogue: We have no reason to doubt you and your friends, Zidane.
trans: 我们没有理由怀疑你和你的朋友，齐达内。

Original: Mog:Then let's get going to the next area, kupo!
Dialogue: Then let's get going to the next area, kupo!
trans: 那么我们就去下一个区域，kupo！

Original: Cid:$#&%! How could I lose to Setzer!?
Dialogue: $#&%! How could I lose to Setzer!?

Original: Vaan:You guys decided the pilot without me!?
Dialogue: You guys decided the pilot without me!?
trans: 没有我，你们就决定了飞行员！？

Original: Cid:Of course we did! You weren't even in the running! No fool'd put an inexperienced brat like you in the cockpit!
Dialogue: Of course we did! You weren't even in the running! No fool'd put an inexperienced brat like you in the cockpit!
trans: 我们当然做到了！

Original: Vaan:I'm no amateur! Come on, I can fly, too!
Dialogue: I'm no amateur! Come on, I can fly, too!
trans: 我不是业余的！

Original: Vaan:And anyway, you shouldn't gamble with Setzer. He cheats.
Dialogue: And anyway, you shouldn't gamble with Setzer. He cheats.
trans: 无论如何，你不应该和 Setzer 一起赌博。

Original: Cid:WHAT!? That $#&%! I lost big time!
Dialogue: WHAT!? That $#&%! I lost big time!
trans: 什么！？

Original: Vaan:You can't just name the airship like that!
Dialogue: You can't just name the airship like that!
trans: 不能随便给飞艇起名字！

Original: Zidane:Hahaha! There's never a dull moment with these guys.
Dialogue: Hahaha! There's never a dull moment with these guys.
trans: 哈哈哈！

Original: Vivi:Yeah... I like our new friends.
Dialogue: Yeah... I like our new friends.
trans: 是的...我喜欢我们的新朋友。

Original: Vivi:Even if I'm scared...I can still be brave. Not because I want to defeat my enemy, but because I want to protect my friends.
Dialogue: Even if I'm scared...I can still be brave. Not because I want to defeat my enemy, but because I want to protect my friends.
trans: 即使我害怕……我仍然可以勇敢。

Original: Zidane:Yeah, same here.
Dialogue: Yeah, same here.
trans: 是的，这里也一样。

Original: Cecil:Are you two ready to go? The journey isn't over yet.
Dialogue: Are you two ready to go? The journey isn't over yet.
trans: 你们两个准备好出发了吗？

Original: Zidane:I was born ready! Let's go!
Dialogue: I was born ready! Let's go!
trans: 我天生就准备好了！

Original: Spiritus:So Kuja rewrote the world.
Dialogue: So Kuja rewrote the world.
trans: 所以Kuja重写了这个世界。

Original: Spiritus:This place has always been unstable...
Dialogue: This place has always been unstable...
trans: 这个地方一直不稳定...

Original: Spiritus:But even if he overwrites what is here, it has no influence on my world.
Dialogue: But even if he overwrites what is here, it has no influence on my world.
trans: 但就算他覆盖了这里的东西，对我的世界也没有任何影响。

Original: Spiritus:This realm is meant to be a respite for the warriors.
Dialogue: This realm is meant to be a respite for the warriors.
trans: 这个领域是为了给战士们一个喘息的机会。

Original: Spiritus:They should change it however they see fit.
Dialogue: They should change it however they see fit.
trans: 他们应该按照他们认为合适的方式进行更改。

Original: Spiritus:I cannot imagine Materia taking this so lightly, though...
Dialogue: I cannot imagine Materia taking this so lightly, though...
trans: 不过，我无法想象 Materia 会如此轻视它……

Original: Spiritus:Hmph... She can do whatever she wishes with this trivial little world.
Dialogue: Hmph... She can do whatever she wishes with this trivial little world.
trans: 哼…… 这区区小天地，她可以为所欲为。

Original: Spiritus:My only concern is my world alone!
Dialogue: My only concern is my world alone!
trans: 我唯一关心的是我的世界！

Original: Materia:How could it be? This world has been altered by one of Spiritus's warriors...
Dialogue: How could it be? This world has been altered by one of Spiritus's warriors...
trans: 怎么会这样？

Original: Materia:This is precisely why I opposed his aim of giving them both their memories and unbridled power!
Dialogue: This is precisely why I opposed his aim of giving them both their memories and unbridled power!
trans: 这就是为什么我反对他给他们记忆和肆无忌惮的力量的目的！

Original: Materia:The warriors were meant to rest under my protection...
Dialogue: The warriors were meant to rest under my protection...
trans: 战士们注定要在我的保护下安息……

Original: Materia:They were supposed to forget their painful past and restore their spirits here.
Dialogue: They were supposed to forget their painful past and restore their spirits here.
trans: 他们本该忘记痛苦的过去，在这里恢复精神。

Original: Materia:...Who must be dealt with first? Kuja? Or Spiritus?
Dialogue: ...Who must be dealt with first? Kuja? Or Spiritus?
trans: ……首先要对付谁？

Original: Materia:No... Spiritus's warriors are strong. I mustn't be reckless and send my warriors to their deaths.
Dialogue: No... Spiritus's warriors are strong. I mustn't be reckless and send my warriors to their deaths.
trans: 不... Spiritus 的战士很强大。

Original: Materia:I will keep watch a little longer and summon new warriors to gather brilliance...
Dialogue: I will keep watch a little longer and summon new warriors to gather brilliance...
trans: 我会再守望一会，召唤新的勇士，凝聚光辉……

Original: Materia:And when they are strong enough, they will defend this world from them.
Dialogue: And when they are strong enough, they will defend this world from them.
trans: 当他们足够强大时，他们将保卫这个世界免受他们的侵害。

Original: Materia:Together, we will protect this world...!
Dialogue: Together, we will protect this world...!
trans: 我们将一起保护这个世界……！

Original: Materia:There are those you know fighting to protect this world.
Dialogue: There are those you know fighting to protect this world.
trans: 您认识一些为保护这个世界而战的人。

Original: ???:No. You're making them fight.
Dialogue: No. You're making them fight.
trans: 不，你让他们打架。

Original: ???:Besides, didn't you say they won't even remember me?
Dialogue: Besides, didn't you say they won't even remember me?
trans: 再说了，你不是说他们连我都不记得了吗？

Original: Materia:It was done so that she can fight.
Dialogue: It was done so that she can fight.
trans: 这样做是为了让她可以战斗。

Original: ???:But Yuna's finished with that.
Dialogue: But Yuna's finished with that.
trans: 但 Yuna 已经结束了。

Original: ???:You just decided to do that on your own.
Dialogue: You just decided to do that on your own.
trans: 你只是决定自己做。

Original: Materia:I have a duty to protect this world.
Dialogue: I have a duty to protect this world.
trans: 我有责任保护这个世界。

Original: Materia:And the safety of this world means rest for all of you.
Dialogue: And the safety of this world means rest for all of you.
trans: 这个世界的安全意味着你们所有人的安息。

Original: ???:Are you even listening to me?
Dialogue: Are you even listening to me?
trans: 你甚至在听我说话吗？

Original: ???:Not like it matters. You're not going to let me go home anyway.
Dialogue: Not like it matters. You're not going to let me go home anyway.
trans: 不喜欢它重要。

Original: ???:What should I do when I meet up with Yuna?
Dialogue: What should I do when I meet up with Yuna?
trans: 和尤娜见面该怎么办？

Original: Materia:You'll be able to see her once you leave this place.
Dialogue: You'll be able to see her once you leave this place.
trans: 一旦你离开这个地方，你就能见到她。

Original: Materia:But do not forget: they won't be the same people you knew.
Dialogue: But do not forget they won't be the same people you knew.
trans: 但不要忘记他们不会是您认识的同一个人。

Original: ???:So then what? Just say, "Nice to meet you"?
Dialogue: So then what? Just say, "Nice to meet you"?
trans: 那又怎样？

Original: Materia:That's correct. It will give their hearts some needed respite.
Dialogue: That's correct. It will give their hearts some needed respite.
trans: 这是正确的。

Original: ???:Give whose what a respite now?
Dialogue: Give whose what a respite now?
trans: 现在给谁一个喘息的机会？

Original: ???:Stop deciding things for me.
Dialogue: Stop deciding things for me.
trans: 不要再为我决定事情了。

Original: ???:I'll make my own choices.
Dialogue: I'll make my own choices.
trans: 我会做出自己的选择。

Original: Materia:I summoned warriors who possess powerful wills...
Dialogue: I summoned warriors who possess powerful wills...
trans: 我召唤了拥有强大意志的战士……

Original: Materia:But humans can easily lose their way... I pray they do not stray from the path.
Dialogue: But humans can easily lose their way... I pray they do not stray from the path.
trans: 但是人类很容易迷失方向……我祈祷他们不要偏离正路。

Original: Setzer:Is that a storm...?
Dialogue: Is that a storm...?
trans: 是暴风雨吗……？

Original: Zack:Drive safely now! There are children aboard.
Dialogue: Drive safely now! There are children aboard.
trans: 现在安全驾驶！

Original: Setzer:The clouds ahead are unbelievably large...
Dialogue: The clouds ahead are unbelievably large...
trans: 前方的云大得令人难以置信……

Original: Setzer:Is it unusual in this world, Mog?
Dialogue: Is it unusual in this world, Mog?
trans: 莫格，这世界上不寻常吗？

Original: Mog:Kupo kupo... Yes. Something seems to be wrong with the space-time continuum.
Dialogue: Kupo kupo... Yes. Something seems to be wrong with the space-time continuum.
trans: Kupo kupo... 是的。

Original: Tidus:Did you detect something?
Dialogue: Did you detect something?
trans: 你有没有发现什么？

Original: Mog:It seems like there's brilliance nearby! That's what's causing the distortion, kupo!
Dialogue: It seems like there's brilliance nearby! That's what's causing the distortion, kupo!
trans: 附近好像有光华！

Original: Lightning:It's most likely an enemy.
Dialogue: It's most likely an enemy.
trans: 很有可能是敌人。

Original: Yuna:Isn't it possible it's friendly, though?
Dialogue: Isn't it possible it's friendly, though?
trans: 不过，这不可能是友好的吗？

Original: Mog:I won't know until we get closer, kupo.
Dialogue: I won't know until we get closer, kupo.
trans: 等我们走近了我才知道，库波。

Original: Setzer:I'm landing the ship. Carefulit may be a bumpy ride!
Dialogue: I'm landing the ship. Careful—it may be a bumpy ride!
trans: 我要登船了

Original: Firion:Those clouds... Could it be...?
Dialogue: Those clouds... Could it be...?
trans: 那些云……难道是……？

Original: Yuna:Though I knew I had never seen that devastated town before, something about it felt familiar.
Dialogue: Though I knew I had never seen that devastated town before, something about it felt familiar.
trans: 虽然我知道我以前从未见过那个被毁坏的小镇，但对它的某些感觉却很熟悉。

Original: Yuna:And even knowing it was created by the gods, we all gazed at it so sadly...
Dialogue: And even knowing it was created by the gods, we all gazed at it so sadly...
trans: 明明知道是神造的，我们都这么难过的看着它……

Original: Lightning:They've got poor taste.
Dialogue: They've got poor taste.
trans: 他们的品味很差。

Original: Zack:You know this place? I feel like I've seen it before, too.
Dialogue: You know this place? I feel like I've seen it before, too.
trans: 你知道这个地方吗？

Original: Zack:I guess it reminds me of the slums...
Dialogue: I guess it reminds me of the slums...
trans: 我想这让我想起了贫民窟……

Original: Zack:No, the slums were different. It wasn't deserted like this. It was full of life.
Dialogue: No, the slums were different. It wasn't deserted like this. It was full of life.
trans: 不，贫民窟不一样。

Original: Zack:...Then again, I don't know what became of it after that. ...Huh?
Dialogue: ...Then again, I don't know what became of it after that. ...Huh?
trans: ……话又说回来了，不知道后来怎么样了。

Original: Tidus:Maybe it's part of the enemy's plan. They might be trying to scare us.
Dialogue: Maybe it's part of the enemy's plan. They might be trying to scare us.
trans: 也许这是敌人计划的一部分。

Original: Lightning:Back in my world, it took years to reach this level of destruction.
Dialogue: Back in my world, it took years to reach this level of destruction.
trans: 回到我的世界，达到这种破坏程度需要数年时间。

Original: Lightning:Even if someone purposely made it this way, I won't be shaken by it.
Dialogue: Even if someone purposely made it this way, I won't be shaken by it.
trans: 即使有人故意这样做，我也不会因此而动摇。

Original: Lightning:What do you think?
Dialogue: What do you think?
trans: 你怎么认为？

Original: Tidus:Hmm... It's complicated.
Dialogue: Hmm... It's complicated.
trans: 嗯……很复杂。

Original: Jecht:We have a city like this, too. But still...to look at ruins like these after all this time...
Dialogue: We have a city like this, too. But still...to look at ruins like these after all this time...
trans: 我们也有这样的城市。

Original: Yuna:This is...a fake, right?
Dialogue: This is...a fake, right?
trans: 这是……假的吧？

Original: Mog:If you're asking about the shape of this world, that cloud over there is causing a huge distortion, kupo.
Dialogue: If you're asking about the shape of this world, that cloud over there is causing a huge distortion, kupo.
trans: 如果你问的是这个世界的形状，那边的云造成了巨大的扭曲，库波。

Original: Mog:I think most places originally from the World of Darkness are like this, kupo.
Dialogue: I think most places originally from the World of Darkness are like this, kupo.
trans: 我想大多数原本来自黑暗世界的地方都是这样的，库珀。

Original: Lightning:Will we find the brilliance in that storm, Mog?
Dialogue: Will we find the brilliance in that storm, Mog?
trans: 我们会在那场风暴中找到光彩吗，莫格？

Original: Mog:That storm looks dangerous, kupo. Let's search this town first!
Dialogue: That storm looks dangerous, kupo. Let's search this town first!
trans: 那场风暴看起来很危险，库珀。

Original: Mog:Kupo! My pompom is tingling, kupo!
Dialogue: Kupo! My pompom is tingling, kupo!
trans: 外套！

Original: Mog:It senses a strong will in someone over there, kupo!
Dialogue: It senses a strong will in someone over there, kupo!
trans: 它感觉到那边有人有强烈的意志，库波！

Original: Mog:It might be someone with a connection...to Yuna, kupo!
Dialogue: It might be someone with a connection...to Yuna, kupo!
trans: 可能是与尤娜有联系的人，库波！

Original: Yuna:Me? I wonder who it could be...
Dialogue: Me? I wonder who it could be...
trans: 我？

Original: Tidus:If they have a connection to Yuna, shouldn't all of us know them?
Dialogue: If they have a connection to Yuna, shouldn't all of us know them?
trans: 如果他们与尤娜有联系，我们不应该都认识他们吗？

Original: Mog:I don't get that feeling, kupo... Let's be careful!
Dialogue: I don't get that feeling, kupo... Let's be careful!
trans: 我没有那种感觉，库波……我们要小心点！

Original: Yuna:I wondered who it could be...
Dialogue: I wondered who it could be...
trans: 我想知道它可能是谁......

Original: Yuna:Sadly, I didn't remember her at all.
Dialogue: Sadly, I didn't remember her at all.
trans: 可悲的是，我根本不记得她。

Original: ???:You're really here.
Dialogue: You're really here.
trans: 你真的在这里。

Original: Yuna:Oh! Um...
Dialogue: Oh! Um...
trans: 哦！

Original: Warrior of Light:Mog said she might be someone you know. Is she an ally of ours?
Dialogue: Mog said she might be someone you know. Is she an ally of ours?
trans: 莫格说她可能是你认识的人。

Original: ???:Sorry, but I don't know you. The only one I know here is Yuna.
Dialogue: Sorry, but I don't know you. The only one I know here is Yuna.
trans: 对不起，我不认识你。

Original: Tidus:...An old acquaintance of Yuna's?
Dialogue: ...An old acquaintance of Yuna's?
trans: ……尤娜的老熟人？

Original: Auron:...Not that I know of.
Dialogue: ...Not that I know of.
trans: ...从来没听说过。

Original: ???:But I know you. You're a legendaryguardian. And you're Wakka, fromBesaid.
Dialogue: But I know you. You're a legendary guardian. And you're Wakka, from Besaid.
trans: 但我认识你。

Original: Wakka:Huh? Have we met before?
Dialogue: Huh? Have we met before?
trans: 嗯？

Original: ???:"Are you a warrior of Spira?"
Dialogue: "Are you a warrior of Spira?"
trans: “你是斯皮拉的战士吗？”

Original: ???:...You really don't remember, do you?
Dialogue: ...You really don't remember, do you?
trans: ……你真的不记得了吧？

Original: Yuna:I...I'm so sorry.
Dialogue: I...I'm so sorry.
trans: 我……我很抱歉。

Original: Yuna:I just can't seem to recall who you are...
Dialogue: I just can't seem to recall who you are...
trans: 我只是想不起来你是谁...

Original: ???:It's fine. I knew this would happen. It's that goddess's fault you forgot in the first place.
Dialogue: It's fine. I knew this would happen. It's that goddess's fault you forgot in the first place.
trans: 没关系。

Original: Paine:I'm Paine.
Dialogue: I'm Paine.
trans: 我是潘恩。

Original: Paine:"Nice to meet you."
Dialogue: "Nice to meet you."
trans: “很高兴见到你。”

Original: Yuna:But it wasn't our first time meeting.
Dialogue: But it wasn't our first time meeting.
trans: 但这不是我们第一次见面。

Original: Yuna:I'm so sorry I made you say such a terrible thing, Paine...
Dialogue: I'm so sorry I made you say such a terrible thing, Paine...
trans: 我很抱歉我让你说了这么可怕的话，潘恩……

Original: Warrior of Light:If you've met Materia, then that means you know what's happening here. Would you lend us your strength?
Dialogue: If you've met Materia, then that means you know what's happening here. Would you lend us your strength?
trans: 如果您遇到过 Materia，那就意味着您知道这里发生了什么。

Original: Paine:Hmm... Don't know. Nobody knows who I am, after all.
Dialogue: Hmm... Don't know. Nobody knows who I am, after all.
trans: 嗯……不知道。

Original: Wakka:Is it a good idea to bring her along? We don't know anything about her, so she could possibly be our enemy...
Dialogue: Is it a good idea to bring her along? We don't know anything about her, so she could possibly be our enemy...
trans: 带她一起去是个好主意吗？

Original: Tidus:Whoa! ...Did you remember something, Yuna?
Dialogue: Whoa! ...Did you remember something, Yuna?
trans: 哇！

Original: Yuna:Um... Well... No, not really.
Dialogue: Um... Well... No, not really.
trans: 嗯……嗯……不，不是真的。

Original: Yuna:...But I know you aren't our enemy, even though I can't remember who you are.
Dialogue: ...But I know you aren't our enemy, even though I can't remember who you are.
trans: ……但我知道你不是我们的敌人，虽然我不记得你是谁。

Original: Paine:...Stop looking so sad already.
Dialogue: ...Stop looking so sad already.
trans: ......别再看起来那么悲伤了。

Original: Paine:I appreciate the sentiment, Yuna.
Dialogue: I appreciate the sentiment, Yuna.
trans: 我很欣赏这种情绪，尤娜。

Original: Yuna:But I feel terrible...
Dialogue: But I feel terrible...
trans: 但是我觉得很可怕...

Original: Yuna:I know you're someone very important to me, and yet I've completely forgotten...
Dialogue: I know you're someone very important to me, and yet I've completely forgotten...
trans: 我知道你对我来说是很重要的人，但我却完全忘记了……

Original: Paine:No, no, no. You've got it all wrong!
Dialogue: No, no, no. You've got it all wrong!
trans: 不不不。

Original: Paine:Was Yuna always like this?
Dialogue: Was Yuna always like this?
trans: 尤娜一直都是这样吗？

Original: Auron:To my knowledge, yes.
Dialogue: To my knowledge, yes.
trans: 据我所知，是的。

Original: Auron:...But to your knowledge, perhaps she was different.
Dialogue: ...But to your knowledge, perhaps she was different.
trans: ……但据你所知，也许她不一样。

Original: Auron:Seeing as you're an acquaintance of Yuna's, why not come with us?
Dialogue: Seeing as you're an acquaintance of Yuna's, why not come with us?
trans: 既然你是尤娜的熟人，不如跟我们一起去吧？

Original: Auron:If you don't like it, you can get off the airship wherever you please.
Dialogue: If you don't like it, you can get off the airship wherever you please.
trans: 如果你不喜欢，你可以随便下飞艇。

Original: Warrior of Light:There seem to be discrepancies in some of our memories.
Dialogue: There seem to be discrepancies in some of our memories.
trans: 我们的一些记忆似乎有些出入。

Original: Warrior of Light:Traveling together may give you a chance to resolve these differences.
Dialogue: Traveling together may give you a chance to resolve these differences.
trans: 一起旅行可能会让你们有机会解决这些分歧。

Original: Paine:I'll do that. I didn't plan on leaving Yuna like this anyway.
Dialogue: I'll do that. I didn't plan on leaving Yuna like this anyway.
trans: 我会去做。

Original: Yuna:Everyone wanted to know more about Paine, including us.
Dialogue: Everyone wanted to know more about Paine, including us.
trans: 每个人都想更多地了解 Paine，包括我们。

Original: Paine:You want me to introduce myself?
Dialogue: You want me to introduce myself?
trans: 要我自我介绍吗？

Original: Zidane:Yeah! Like how you met Yuna, or what you think about this world.
Dialogue: Yeah! Like how you met Yuna, or what you think about this world.
trans: 是的！

Original: Yuna:But you hate those kinds of things, don't you? I'm so sorry we pushed you.
Dialogue: But you hate those kinds of things, don't you? I'm so sorry we pushed you.
trans: 但是你讨厌那些东西，不是吗？

Original: Paine:I'll have to pass.
Dialogue: I'll have to pass.
trans: 我必须通过。

Original: Zidane:Bummer... If you change your mind, let us know.
Dialogue: Bummer... If you change your mind, let us know.
trans: Bummer... 如果您改变主意，请告诉我们。

Original: Serah:Take your time getting used to us. At first, people didn't know who I was, either.
Dialogue: Take your time getting used to us. At first, people didn't know who I was, either.
trans: 慢慢来适应我们。

Original: Wakka:You're a friend of Yuna's, right?
Dialogue: You're a friend of Yuna's, right?
trans: 你是尤娜的朋友，对吧？

Original: Wakka:I feel like I should know you. But I can't remember where we met...
Dialogue: I feel like I should know you. But I can't remember where we met...
trans: 我觉得我应该认识你。

Original: Paine:Well, don't feel bad. I don't know this version of you. You're less tubby than when I met you.
Dialogue: Well, don't feel bad. I don't know this version of you. You're less tubby than when I met you.
trans: 好吧，别难过。

Original: Serah:Compared to the time my sister comes from, I'm from the future.
Dialogue: Compared to the time my sister comes from, I'm from the future.
trans: 与我姐姐来自的时间相比，我来自未来。

Original: Serah:And if you're also from the future, Paine... That must mean Wakka gets tubby, right?
Dialogue: And if you're also from the future, Paine... That must mean Wakka gets tubby, right?
trans: 如果你也来自未来，Paine...那一定意味着 Wakka 变胖了，对吧？

Original: Wakka:Stop saying that word! I'm not tubby! I'm a professional blitzball player!
Dialogue: Stop saying that word! I'm not tubby! I'm a professional blitzball player!
trans: 别说那个词了！

Original: Tidus:Tubby, huh... That's why you can't neglect your training.
Dialogue: Tubby, huh... That's why you can't neglect your training.
trans: 塔比，嗯……这就是为什么你不能忽视你的训练。

Original: Zidane:She looks upset.
Dialogue: She looks upset.
trans: 她看起来很沮丧。

Original: Zidane:Did Tidus do something rude to you?
Dialogue: Did Tidus do something rude to you?
trans: Tidus 对你做了什么粗鲁的事吗？

Original: Paine:Not really.
Dialogue: Not really.
trans: 并不真地。

Original: Zidane:Tidus, you had better apologize.
Dialogue: Tidus, you had better apologize.
trans: Tidus，你最好道歉。

Original: Zidane:Especially to people like her...
Dialogue: Especially to people like her...
trans: 尤其是对她这样的人...

Original: Tidus:Why do I need to apologize!?
Dialogue: Why do I need to apologize!?
trans: 我为什么要道歉！？

Original: Tidus:I remember everyone I met in Spira!
Dialogue: I remember everyone I met in Spira!
trans: 我记得我在 Spira 遇到的每一个人！

Original: Tidus:I mean...
Dialogue: I mean...
trans: 我是说...

Original: Tidus:...I remember everything about our journey.
Dialogue: ...I remember everything about our journey.
trans: ...我记得我们旅途中的一切。

Original: Tidus:Even what happened to me...
Dialogue: Even what happened to me...
trans: 甚至发生在我身上的事...

Original: Yuna:I wonder how I knew you, Paine. What kind of connection did we have...?
Dialogue: I wonder how I knew you, Paine. What kind of connection did we have...?
trans: 我想知道我是怎么认识你的，潘恩。

Original: Serah:There's no point worrying about it now. You'll remember eventually.
Dialogue: There's no point worrying about it now. You'll remember eventually.
trans: 现在担心它没有意义。

Original: Yuna:...It's not just myself I'm worried about, but Spira as well.
Dialogue: ...It's not just myself I'm worried about, but Spira as well.
trans: ……担心的不只是我自己，还有斯皮拉。

Original: Yuna:Because Paine is so strong...
Dialogue: Because Paine is so strong...
trans: 因为潘恩太强了...

Original: Yuna:It makes me think that the people in Spira's future have to be strong, too.
Dialogue: It makes me think that the people in Spira's future have to be strong, too.
trans: 这让我觉得 Spira 未来的人也必须坚强。

Original: Paine:You're worried about everyone.
Dialogue: You're worried about everyone.
trans: 你担心每个人。

Original: Paine:Nothing.
Dialogue: Nothing.
trans: 没有什么。

Original: Zidane:You sure don't beat around the bush. But you don't seem like a bad egg to me.
Dialogue: You sure don't beat around the bush. But you don't seem like a bad egg to me.
trans: 你可别拐弯抹角。

Original: Zidane:I meant it as a good thing.
Dialogue: I meant it as a good thing.
trans: 我的意思是这是一件好事。

Original: Zidane:I wanted to lighten the mood a little since you and Yuna seem to be troubled by all this...
Dialogue: I wanted to lighten the mood a little since you and Yuna seem to be troubled by all this...
trans: 既然你和尤娜似乎正在为这一切烦恼，我想稍微缓和一下气氛……

Original: Paine:...Nobody asked for your help.
Dialogue: ...Nobody asked for your help.
trans: ......没有人寻求你的帮助。

Original: Wakka:Oh, man... Now she's mad.
Dialogue: Oh, man... Now she's mad.
trans: 哦，伙计……现在她疯了。

Original: Tidus:Yeesh. I don't envy you, Zidane, that's for sure.
Dialogue: Yeesh. I don't envy you, Zidane, that's for sure.
trans: 是的。

Original: Serah:Don't think so hard about it. If you travel together, you'll figure it out at some point.
Dialogue: Don't think so hard about it. If you travel together, you'll figure it out at some point.
trans: 不要想那么多。

Original: Paine:Wouldn't that be nice.
Dialogue: Wouldn't that be nice.
trans: 那不是很好吗？

Original: Yuna:It was like Paine said. The me of that time was working hard for the sake of everyone...
Dialogue: It was like Paine said. The me of that time was working hard for the sake of everyone...
trans: 就像佩恩说的那样。

Original: Yuna:I thought only of others and never stopped to think about myself.
Dialogue: I thought only of others and never stopped to think about myself.
trans: 我只想着别人，从来没有停下来想过自己。

Original: The Emperor:Show yourself, you insolent fool.
Dialogue: Show yourself, you insolent fool.
trans: 展示你自己，你这个无礼的傻瓜。

Original: Seymour:Insolent, am I?
Dialogue: Insolent, am I?
trans: 无礼，是吗？

Original: The Emperor:And what business have you with it?
Dialogue: And what business have you with it?
trans: 你跟它有什么关系？

Original: Seymour:A partnership. It seems I also have ties to this place.
Dialogue: A partnership. It seems I also have ties to this place.
trans: 伙伴关系。

Original: Seymour:And a ruler needs resources, does he not?
Dialogue: And a ruler needs resources, does he not?
trans: 统治者需要资源，不是吗？

Original: The Emperor:You feign to offer me an alliance...
Dialogue: You feign to offer me an alliance...
trans: 你假装要和我结盟...

Original: The Emperor:But you're naught but a wolf in sheep's clothing.
Dialogue: But you're naught but a wolf in sheep's clothing.
trans: 但你不过是披着羊皮的狼。

Original: Seymour:It's better than being betrayed by a trusted confidant, is it not?
Dialogue: It's better than being betrayed by a trusted confidant, is it not?
trans: 总比被信任的心腹背叛好吧不是吗？

Original: The Emperor:You mean the dark knight... He was merely a sacrificial pawn.
Dialogue: You mean the dark knight... He was merely a sacrificial pawn.
trans: 你是说黑暗骑士……他只是一个牺牲品。

Original: Seymour:...If you say so.
Dialogue: ...If you say so.
trans: ……如果你这么说。

Original: Seymour:Now then, the moogle's group draws ever closer to you.
Dialogue: Now then, the moogle's group draws ever closer to you.
trans: 那么，莫古利一行人离你越来越近了。

Original: The Emperor:My castle will not be shaken by mere worms.
Dialogue: My castle will not be shaken by mere worms.
trans: 我的城堡不会被蠕虫动摇。

Original: Seymour:And yet a single hole eaten through the walls can bring down an entire hall, can it not?
Dialogue: And yet a single hole eaten through the walls can bring down an entire hall, can it not?
trans: 然而，墙上被吃掉一个洞就可以摧毁整个大厅，不是吗？

Original: Seymour:...I suggest exterminating the pests before they infest your fortress.
Dialogue: ...I suggest exterminating the pests before they infest your fortress.
trans: ......我建议在害虫侵扰你的堡垒之前消灭它们。

Original: The Emperor:Hmph... Just what are you trying to do?
Dialogue: Hmph... Just what are you trying to do?
trans: 哼……你到底想干什么？

Original: Seymour:I would like to use this castle, if only for a moment.
Dialogue: I would like to use this castle, if only for a moment.
trans: 我想使用这座城堡，哪怕只是片刻。

Original: Seymour:I desire nothing more than to break their willsthe source of their power in this world.
Dialogue: I desire nothing more than to break their wills—the source of their power in this world.
trans: 我只想打破他们的意志——他们在这个世界上的力量之源。

Original: Seymour:Next you see them, they will be so thoroughly crushed that they can barely crawl
Dialogue: Next you see them, they will be so thoroughly crushed that they can barely crawl—
trans: 接下来你看到他们，他们会被压得连爬都爬不起来——

Original: Seymour:Like the very worms they are.
Dialogue: Like the very worms they are.
trans: 就像他们是蠕虫一样。

Original: The Emperor:Interesting... Is that truly your desire?
Dialogue: Interesting... Is that truly your desire?
trans: 有趣……那真的是你的愿望吗？

Original: Seymour:It would benefit us both, would it not?
Dialogue: It would benefit us both, would it not?
trans: 这对我们双方都有好处，不是吗？

Original: The Emperor:Then know this: I will not forgive any damage done to the foundation of my rule.
Dialogue: Then know this I will not forgive any damage done to the foundation of my rule.
trans: 然后知道这一点，我不会原谅对我的统治基础造成的任何损害。

Original: Seymour:...Indeed, it changes not what I intend to do.
Dialogue: ...Indeed, it changes not what I intend to do.
trans: ……的确，这并没有改变我打算做的事情。

Original: Yuna:Even though we were journeying together, I still couldn't seem to remember...
Dialogue: Even though we were journeying together, I still couldn't seem to remember...
trans: 即使我们一起旅行，我似乎仍然不记得......

Original: Yuna:I was trying too hard, just like before.
Dialogue: I was trying too hard, just like before.
trans: 我太努力了，就像以前一样。

Original: Yuna:That's why Paine...
Dialogue: That's why Paine...
trans: 这就是为什么佩恩...

Original: Paine:...You're really an adult?
Dialogue: ...You're really an adult?
trans: ……你真的是大人吗？

Original: Laguna:Doesn't look it, right? But that's what he says!
Dialogue: Doesn't look it, right? But that's what he says!
trans: 看起来不像，对吧？

Original: Laguna:It seems like the discrepancies in our memories is reflected in our appearances.
Dialogue: It seems like the discrepancies in our memories is reflected in our appearances.
trans: 我们记忆中的差异似乎反映在我们的外表上。

Original: Eiko:But I'm sure you'll remember eventually!
Dialogue: But I'm sure you'll remember eventually!
trans: 但我相信你最终会记得！

Original: Eiko:Paine might be sad for now, but Yuna will definitely remember!
Dialogue: Paine might be sad for now, but Yuna will definitely remember!
trans: 潘恩现在可能会难过，但尤娜一定会记住的！

Original: Paine:Pitied by a child...
Dialogue: Pitied by a child...
trans: 被孩子嫌弃了...

Original: Paine:...Or are you an adult, too?
Dialogue: ...Or are you an adult, too?
trans: ……还是你也是大人？

Original: Laguna:Naw, Eiko is as much a child as she looks. But, well...it's complicated.
Dialogue: Naw, Eiko is as much a child as she looks. But, well...it's complicated.
trans: 不，Eiko 和她看起来一样像个孩子。

Original: Eiko:How rude! Even though I'm small, I'm still a lady!
Dialogue: How rude! Even though I'm small, I'm still a lady!
trans: 太粗鲁了！

Original: Laguna:Whoops! You're right! I hope you'll forgive ol' Laguna!
Dialogue: Whoops! You're right! I hope you'll forgive ol' Laguna!
trans: 哎呀！

Original: Layle:What's with the long face? Are you really that bothered by it?
Dialogue: What's with the long face? Are you really that bothered by it?
trans: 长脸怎么了？

Original: Yuna:Yes...and no. Maybe.
Dialogue: Yes...and no. Maybe.
trans: 是的……也不是。

Original: Yuna:Lightning and Cecil found both their brilliance and memories after meeting people they knew.
Dialogue: Lightning and Cecil found both their brilliance and memories after meeting people they knew.
trans: 闪电和塞西尔在遇到认识的人后发现了自己的才华和记忆。

Original: Yuna:And now that Paine's here, I feel like I need to remember.
Dialogue: And now that Paine's here, I feel like I need to remember.
trans: 现在潘恩在这里，我觉得我需要记住。

Original: Layle:"Need to," huh...
Dialogue: "Need to," huh...

Original: Layle:You're pretty hard on yourself.
Dialogue: You're pretty hard on yourself.
trans: 你对自己太苛刻了。

Original: Paine:Stop trying so hard.
Dialogue: Stop trying so hard.
trans: 别那么努力了。

Original: Yuna:But why?
Dialogue: But why?
trans: 但为什么？

Original: Paine:I don't want you trying so hard for me.
Dialogue: I don't want you trying so hard for me.
trans: 我不要你为了我这么努力。

Original: Yuna:But I...
Dialogue: But I...
trans: 但是我...

Original: Eiko:Hey! That's harsh!
Dialogue: Hey! That's harsh!
trans: 嘿！

Original: Layle:...It must be hard being so tactless.
Dialogue: ...It must be hard being so tactless.
trans: ……这么不老实，一定很辛苦吧。

Original: Layle:You won't be able to do anything if you're that worried about those around you.
Dialogue: You won't be able to do anything if you're that worried about those around you.
trans: 如果您担心周围的人，您将无能为力。

Original: Seymour:Well... This is a rare treat.
Dialogue: Well... This is a rare treat.
trans: 嗯……难得的款待。

Original: Layle:Tsk. I doubt anyone called you. To what do we owe the pleasure?
Dialogue: Tsk. I doubt anyone called you. To what do we owe the pleasure?
trans: 啧啧。

Original: Seymour:I came to tell you about this woman. Who she is and her connection to you...
Dialogue: I came to tell you about this woman. Who she is and her connection to you...
trans: 我是来告诉你这个女人的。

Original: Paine:Well, you're no friend of mine. ...Though I guess I know as much about you as anyone else.
Dialogue: Well, you're no friend of mine. ...Though I guess I know as much about you as anyone else.
trans: 好吧，你不是我的朋友。

Original: Seymour:Spiritus told me about what happened after I perished.
Dialogue: Spiritus told me about what happened after I perished.
trans: Spiritus 告诉我我死后发生的事情。

Original: Seymour:And embarked on a journey with you.
Dialogue: And embarked on a journey with you.
trans: 和你一起踏上了旅程。

Original: Seymour:All for the purpose of fulfilling a selfish wish.
Dialogue: All for the purpose of fulfilling a selfish wish.
trans: 一切都是为了完成一个自私的愿望。

Original: Seymour:Though the people were counting on her to be their strength, she betrayed their hopes. Just how many despaired, I wonder...
Dialogue: Though the people were counting on her to be their strength, she betrayed their hopes. Just how many despaired, I wonder...
trans: 尽管人们指望她成为他们的力量，但她辜负了他们的希望。

Original: Yuna:I would never...!
Dialogue: I would never...!
trans: 我永不...！

Original: Seymour:And what's worse... You've completely forgotten and have immersed yourself in self-sacrifice once more.
Dialogue: And what's worse... You've completely forgotten and have immersed yourself in self-sacrifice once more.
trans: 更糟糕的是……你完全忘记了，又一次沉浸在自我牺牲中。

Original: Laguna:Don't listen to him, Yuna. I have a bad feeling about what he's saying.
Dialogue: Don't listen to him, Yuna. I have a bad feeling about what he's saying.
trans: 尤娜，别听他的。

Original: Layle:You came just to say that? Don't you have better things to do?
Dialogue: You came just to say that? Don't you have better things to do?
trans: 你来就是为了说这个？

Original: Layle:Do you think anyone will believe what you're saying?
Dialogue: Do you think anyone will believe what you're saying?
trans: 你认为有人会相信你说的话吗？

Original: Seymour:She knows this to be truth.
Dialogue: She knows this to be truth.
trans: 她知道这是事实。

Original: Yuna:What!? Did I do something like that!?
Dialogue: What!? Did I do something like that!?
trans: 什么！？

Original: Paine:Wanna get hurt?
Dialogue: Wanna get hurt?
trans: 想受伤？

Original: Eiko:That's right! If you bully Yuna, I won't forgive you!
Dialogue: That's right! If you bully Yuna, I won't forgive you!
trans: 这是正确的！

Original: Seymour:That's fine with me... Let chaos consume you.
Dialogue: That's fine with me... Let chaos consume you.
trans: 我没意见……让混乱吞噬你吧。

Original: Seymour:How intriguing... Seeing you defend someone who has forgotten you...
Dialogue: How intriguing... Seeing you defend someone who has forgotten you...
trans: 多么有趣……看到你为一个忘记你的人辩护……

Original: Paine:I decide who I fight.
Dialogue: I decide who I fight.
trans: 我决定我和谁战斗。

Original: Tidus:You never change, do you?
Dialogue: You never change, do you?
trans: 你永远不会改变，是吗？

Original: Yuna:What should I do...?
Dialogue: What should I do...?
trans: 我应该怎么办...？

Original: Paine:Don't let him shake you. What he says doesn't matter.
Dialogue: Don't let him shake you. What he says doesn't matter.
trans: 不要让他动摇你。

Original: Yuna:What he said probably wasn't true.
Dialogue: What he said probably wasn't true.
trans: 他说的可能不是真的。

Original: Yuna:I think he just wanted to dishearten us...
Dialogue: I think he just wanted to dishearten us...
trans: 我想他只是想让我们灰心……

Original: Seymour:You are strong, Lady Yuna... Your will is still firm.
Dialogue: You are strong, Lady Yuna... Your will is still firm.
trans: 你很强，尤娜大人……你的意志依然坚定。

Original: Seymour:To you, I'm someone who should not exist, aren't I?
Dialogue: To you, I'm someone who should not exist, aren't I?
trans: 对你来说，我是不应该存在的人，不是吗？

Original: Yuna:What do you mean?
Dialogue: What do you mean?
trans: 你是什​​么意思？

Original: Seymour:You think some people deserve to exist, while others don't. That man, for example, is one you believe should exist.
Dialogue: You think some people deserve to exist, while others don't. That man, for example, is one you believe should exist.
trans: 你认为有些人应该存在，而另一些人则不应该。

Original: Tidus:What are you rambling on about, Seymour!?
Dialogue: What are you rambling on about, Seymour!?
trans: 你在胡说八道什么，西摩！？

Original: Seymour:Let me remind you what happened.
Dialogue: Let me remind you what happened.
trans: 让我提醒你发生了什么事。

Original: Seymour:You went on a journey with her to save him.
Dialogue: You went on a journey with her to save him.
trans: 你和她一起踏上了拯救他的旅程。

Original: Seymour:You selfishly decided who deserved to live and did not.
Dialogue: You selfishly decided who deserved to live and did not.
trans: 你自私地决定谁应该活下去，谁不应该活下去。

Original: Seymour:You cared not for the others who perished and thought only of your own emotions.
Dialogue: You cared not for the others who perished and thought only of your own emotions.
trans: 你不关心其他死去的人，只想着你自己的情绪。

Original: Paine:He's wrong. Don't listen to him.
Dialogue: He's wrong. Don't listen to him.
trans: 他错了。

Original: Seymour:Am I?
Dialogue: Am I?
trans: 我是吗？

Original: Seymour:Did the grand summoner not embark on a journey to find clues of this man's whereabouts?
Dialogue: Did the grand summoner not embark on a journey to find clues of this man's whereabouts?
trans: 大召唤师不是踏上了寻找这个男人下落线索的旅程吗？

Original: Paine:So what!? In the end, Yuna
Dialogue: So what!? In the end, Yuna—
trans: 所以呢！？

Original: Paine:...I'm gonna hurt you!
Dialogue: ...I'm gonna hurt you!
trans: ……我要伤害你！

Original: Seymour:But of course. Next we meet.
Dialogue: But of course. Next we meet.
trans: 但是当然。

Original: Ramza:Taking advantage of the blanks in someone's memories... How knavish. And there's nothing we can do about it.
Dialogue: Taking advantage of the blanks in someone's memories... How knavish. And there's nothing we can do about it.
trans: 利用某人记忆中的空白……多么无耻。

Original: Tidus:You were...looking for me?
Dialogue: You were...looking for me?
trans: 你在……找我？

Original: Yuna:I don't know... I can't remember. Did I really do something for my own sake...?
Dialogue: I don't know... I can't remember. Did I really do something for my own sake...?
trans: 我不知道……我不记得了。

Original: Paine:No! He's wrong!
Dialogue: No! He's wrong!
trans: 不！

Original: Quistis:Calm down, Paine. There's no point in pushing yourself.
Dialogue: Calm down, Paine. There's no point in pushing yourself.
trans: 冷静点，潘恩。

Original: Paine:You guys have no idea what's going on here.
Dialogue: You guys have no idea what's going on here.
trans: 你们不知道这里发生了什么。

Original: Freya:But it is because of that we can be of help.
Dialogue: But it is because of that we can be of help.
trans: 但正因为如此，我们才能提供帮助。

Original: Ramza:Why not explain it to us? If we understand what's going on, there might be something we can do.
Dialogue: Why not explain it to us? If we understand what's going on, there might be something we can do.
trans: 为什么不向我们解释一下呢？

Original: Freya:...Paine does not want you to rush to get your memories of her back.
Dialogue: ...Paine does not want you to rush to get your memories of her back.
trans: ...Paine 不想让你急于找回关于她的记忆。

Original: Freya:Regaining one's lost memories is no easy feat...
Dialogue: Regaining one's lost memories is no easy feat...
trans: 找回失去的记忆绝非易事...

Original: Freya:Moreover, it is difficult to bear the sight of someone trying so hard...
Dialogue: Moreover, it is difficult to bear the sight of someone trying so hard...
trans: 更何况，这样努力的人，都让人看不惯……

Original: Quistis:It seems Paine can be clumsy with her words, so we thought it best for us to explain it in her stead.
Dialogue: It seems Paine can be clumsy with her words, so we thought it best for us to explain it in her stead.
trans: 佩恩似乎说话笨拙，所以我们认为最好由我们来代替她解释。

Original: Freya:She wishes for you to be positive. That is all.
Dialogue: She wishes for you to be positive. That is all.
trans: 她希望你积极向上。

Original: Yuna:Be positive... But is that enough...?
Dialogue: Be positive... But is that enough...?
trans: 积极……但这就够了吗……？

Original: Ramza:Seymour's story is extreme. You ought not put too much thought into it.
Dialogue: Seymour's story is extreme. You ought not put too much thought into it.
trans: 西摩的故事很极端。

Original: Tidus:My head hurts just remembering it... There's no point in thinking at a time like this.
Dialogue: My head hurts just remembering it... There's no point in thinking at a time like this.
trans: 光是想起来我就头疼……这种时候想也没什么意义。

Original: Yuna:...I understand. It won't be easy, but...I'll give it a try.
Dialogue: ...I understand. It won't be easy, but...I'll give it a try.
trans: ...我明白。

Original: Yuna:It felt strange trying to do my best to not do my best.
Dialogue: It felt strange trying to do my best to not do my best.
trans: 尽力而为而不是尽力而为的感觉很奇怪。

Original: Yuna:But at that time, I really did try my hardest just to be positive.
Dialogue: But at that time, I really did try my hardest just to be positive.
trans: 但是那个时候，我真的很努力，只是为了积极。

Original: Jecht:All of Materia's warriors seem to be having trouble with their memories. Even Yuna.
Dialogue: All of Materia's warriors seem to be having trouble with their memories. Even Yuna.
trans: Materia 的所有战士似乎都对他们的记忆有问题。

Original: Squall:But Spiritus' warriors don't.
Dialogue: But Spiritus' warriors don't.
trans: 但 Spiritus 的战士们没有。

Original: Jecht:Yeah. He filled in all our blanks, even for things we don't want to remember.
Dialogue: Yeah. He filled in all our blanks, even for things we don't want to remember.
trans: 是的。

Original: Jecht:It just makes my head hurt.
Dialogue: It just makes my head hurt.
trans: 这只会让我头疼。

Original: Kain:Our memories are not all good things.
Dialogue: Our memories are not all good things.
trans: 我们的记忆并不都是美好的。

Original: Kain:Within them can lie resentment, hatred, a longing for unfulfilled wishes...
Dialogue: Within them can lie resentment, hatred, a longing for unfulfilled wishes...
trans: 在他们内心深处可能存在怨恨、仇恨、对未实现愿望的渴望……

Original: Kain:It seems Spiritus thinks those things give them power in battle.
Dialogue: It seems Spiritus thinks those things give them power in battle.
trans: 似乎 Spiritus 认为这些东西给了他们在战斗中的力量。

Original: Hope:In this world, a person's emotional strength becomes their power...
Dialogue: In this world, a person's emotional strength becomes their power...
trans: 在这个世界上，一个人的情感力量就是他们的力量……

Original: Hope:I wonder if it's the same for negative emotions, too.
Dialogue: I wonder if it's the same for negative emotions, too.
trans: 我想知道负面情绪是否也一样。

Original: Squall:(Now that you mention it...)
Dialogue: (Now that you mention it...)
trans: （既然你提到了……）

Original: Raijin:Poor Yuna. Lost her memories, and now followed around by that Seymour guy, ya know?
Dialogue: Poor Yuna. Lost her memories, and now followed around by that Seymour guy, ya know?
trans: 可怜的尤娜。

Original: Seifer:Hmph. If he wants a fight, he'll get one.
Dialogue: Hmph. If he wants a fight, he'll get one.
trans: 哼。

Original: Seifer:The next time we meet, I'll cut him down before he can get a word out.
Dialogue: The next time we meet, I'll cut him down before he can get a word out.
trans: 下次我们见面时，我会在他开口之前打断他。

Original: Squall:(The only reason he has sympathy for Yuna is because he wants to be a sorceress's knight.)
Dialogue: (The only reason he has sympathy for Yuna is because he wants to be a sorceress's knight.)
trans: （他同情尤娜的唯一原因是因为他想成为女巫的骑士。）

Original: Squall:Maybe it's better to fight without any memories...
Dialogue: Maybe it's better to fight without any memories...
trans: 也许在没有任何记忆的情况下战斗会更好……

Original: Kain:Spiritus seems to be very good at using people's emotions.
Dialogue: Spiritus seems to be very good at using people's emotions.
trans: Spiritus 似乎很擅长利用人们的情绪。

Original: Jecht:And what about Materia? Were you told anything?
Dialogue: And what about Materia? Were you told anything?
trans: 那么Materia呢？

Original: Hope:I think a lot of our comrades were already in this world when they came to.
Dialogue: I think a lot of our comrades were already in this world when they came to.
trans: 我想我们很多战友来的时候已经在这个世界上了。

Original: Hope:But it seems Materia's become more cautious since the World of Light's crystal core shattered, telling everyone about the situation since.
Dialogue: But it seems Materia's become more cautious since the World of Light's crystal core shattered, telling everyone about the situation since.
trans: 不过自从光之世界的晶核碎裂之后，魔石似乎更加谨慎了，将之后的情况告诉了大家。

Original: Kain:...The gods originally made this world as a place of respite for us.
Dialogue: ...The gods originally made this world as a place of respite for us.
trans: ......众神最初将这个世界作为我们喘息的地方。

Original: Jecht:So does she think losing our memories is going to make us happy? ...And here I thought I was a dunce at emotions!
Dialogue: So does she think losing our memories is going to make us happy? ...And here I thought I was a dunce at emotions!
trans: 那么她认为失去我们的记忆会让我们快乐吗？

Original: Hope:Forgetting...makes you happier... That reminds me!
Dialogue: Forgetting...makes you happier... That reminds me!
trans: 遗忘……让你更快乐……这让我想起了！

Original: Hope:There's no way... No. If that's the case...
Dialogue: There's no way... No. If that's the case...
trans: 没办法……不行，那样的话……

Original: Jecht:We can't hear you when you mumble. Care to share with the rest of the class?
Dialogue: We can't hear you when you mumble. Care to share with the rest of the class?
trans: 当你喃喃自语时，我们听不到你的声音。

Original: Hope:Umm... I might have told you that I'm much older than I look.
Dialogue: Umm... I might have told you that I'm much older than I look.
trans: 嗯……我可能已经告诉过你，我比看起来要老得多。

Original: Squall:You said you chose that appearance.
Dialogue: You said you chose that appearance.
trans: 你说你选择了那个样子。

Original: Hope:Yes. And, at that time...
Dialogue: Yes. And, at that time...
trans: 是的。

Original: Hope:...I remember Materia helping me.
Dialogue: ...I remember Materia helping me.
trans: ...我记得魔晶石帮过我。

Original: Kain:Are you suggesting Spiritus has the power to give memories, and Materia has the power to take them and give respite?
Dialogue: Are you suggesting Spiritus has the power to give memories, and Materia has the power to take them and give respite?
trans: 你是在暗示 Spiritus 有能力提供记忆，而 Materia 有能力带走它们并给予喘息的机会？

Original: Squall:(...How absurd.)
Dialogue: (...How absurd.)
trans: （……多么荒唐。）

Original: Jecht:So what then!? Are we supposed to just leave her be even when Yuna's suffering!?
Dialogue: So what then!? Are we supposed to just leave her be even when Yuna's suffering!?
trans: 那又怎样！？

Original: Hope:It's just a theory, but maybe the memories Materia took from us were being held by Spiritus.
Dialogue: It's just a theory, but maybe the memories Materia took from us were being held by Spiritus.
trans: 这只是一个理论，但也许 Materia 从我们身上夺走的记忆是由 Spiritus 持有的。

Original: Hope:And now those memories are manifesting themselves in this world as brilliance.
Dialogue: And now those memories are manifesting themselves in this world as brilliance.
trans: 而现在，那些记忆正在这个世界上以光辉的形式显现出来。

Original: Kain:You might be right. Whenever we get our hands on brilliance, it seems we regain our memories.
Dialogue: You might be right. Whenever we get our hands on brilliance, it seems we regain our memories.
trans: 你可能是对的。

Original: Squall:(Isn't that a bit irresponsible?)
Dialogue: (Isn't that a bit irresponsible?)
trans: （是不是有点不负责任？）

Original: Jecht:If that's the case, then we need to find Yuna's memories.
Dialogue: If that's the case, then we need to find Yuna's memories.
trans: 既然如此，那就得找到尤娜的记忆了。

Original: Raijin:You all look so serious. We should get going, ya know?
Dialogue: You all look so serious. We should get going, ya know?
trans: 你们看起来都很严肃。

Original: Seifer:Leave 'em alone. They're just talking nonsense.
Dialogue: Leave 'em alone. They're just talking nonsense.
trans: 别管他们。

Original: Hope:Thanks. We'll be on our way shortly, so go on ahead.
Dialogue: Thanks. We'll be on our way shortly, so go on ahead.
trans: 谢谢。

Original: Squall:(How old is he again?)
Dialogue: (How old is he again?)
trans: （他又多少岁了？）

Original: Jecht:Let's go. Nothing's gonna happen by us standing around here waiting.
Dialogue: Let's go. Nothing's gonna happen by us standing around here waiting.
trans: 我们走吧。

Original: Yuna:Sir Jecht said that Spiritus told his warriors all kinds of things about us
Dialogue: Sir Jecht said that Spiritus told his warriors all kinds of things about us—
trans: Jecht 爵士说 Spiritus 告诉他的战士们关于我们的各种事情——

Original: Yuna:Biased things to make them want to fight us.
Dialogue: Biased things to make them want to fight us.
trans: 有偏见的事情使他们想与我们作战。

Original: Yuna:But why would he do such a thing...?
Dialogue: But why would he do such a thing...?
trans: 可是，他为什么要这么做……？

Original: Spiritus:The world after your death is vibrant and full of life...
Dialogue: The world after your death is vibrant and full of life...
trans: 你死后的世界充满生机和活力......

Original: Spiritus:Do you know why?
Dialogue: Do you know why?
trans: 你知道为什么吗？

Original: Seymour:The people of Spira abhorred me and projected that same hatred onto my entire race.
Dialogue: The people of Spira abhorred me and projected that same hatred onto my entire race.
trans: Spira 的人民憎恶我，并将同样的仇恨投射到我的整个种族身上。

Original: Spiritus:Their home is now occupied by others.
Dialogue: Their home is now occupied by others.
trans: 他们的家现在被别人占领了。

Original: Spiritus:The remaining few now wait to die out in solitude.
Dialogue: The remaining few now wait to die out in solitude.
trans: 剩下的少数人现在等待孤独地死去。

Original: Seymour:...I understand what you are trying to do.
Dialogue: ...I understand what you are trying to do.
trans: ...我明白你想做什么。

Original: Seymour:You wish to light a fire in those who have lost and spur them into battle.
Dialogue: You wish to light a fire in those who have lost and spur them into battle.
trans: 你希望在那些失败的人身上点燃一把火，并激励他们投入战斗。

Original: Spiritus:One's will is power in this world.
Dialogue: One's will is power in this world.
trans: 在这个世界上，意志就是力量。

Original: Spiritus:My warriors need only be strong.
Dialogue: My warriors need only be strong.
trans: 我的战士只需要坚强。

Original: Seymour:Then I shall consider it an honor to be chosen by you.
Dialogue: Then I shall consider it an honor to be chosen by you.
trans: 那么我会认为被你选中是我的荣幸。

Original: Seymour:Now then... I felt strong presences nearby...
Dialogue: Now then... I felt strong presences nearby...
trans: 那么……我感觉到附近有强大的气息……

Original: Dark Manikin (Auron):Are you after the brilliance?
Dialogue: Are you after the brilliance?
trans: 你追求光彩吗？

Original: Seymour:How interesting... Puppet soldiers with no emotion.
Dialogue: How interesting... Puppet soldiers with no emotion.
trans: 好有趣……没有感情的傀儡兵。

Original: Dark Manikin (Wakka):Are you...an enemy...?
Dialogue: Are you...an enemy...?
trans: 你……是敌人……？

Original: Dark Manikin (Auron):If you intend to enter this area, we'll strike you down.
Dialogue: If you intend to enter this area, we'll strike you down.
trans: 如果你打算进入这个区域，我们会把你打倒。

Original: Seymour:I see... The more emotional the original was, the more distant their puppet becomes.
Dialogue: I see... The more emotional the original was, the more distant their puppet becomes.
trans: 原来如此……原作越是情绪化，他们的人偶就越是疏远。

Original: Seymour:And I suppose those borne of cold originals can effectively use their power to complete their mission.
Dialogue: And I suppose those borne of cold originals can effectively use their power to complete their mission.
trans: 而且我想那些冷血原体可以有效地使用他们的力量来完成他们的使命。

Original: Dark Manikin (Yuna):We will not hand over our precious memories to you.
Dialogue: We will not hand over our precious memories to you.
trans: 我们不会将宝贵的回忆交给您。

Original: Seymour:Oh? She seems slightly different.
Dialogue: Oh? She seems slightly different.
trans: 哦？

Original: Dark Manikin (Yuna):We carry important memories with usboth good and bad.
Dialogue: We carry important memories with us—both good and bad.
trans: 我们带着重要的回忆——好的和坏的。

Original: Dark Manikin (Yuna):We must return them to ourselves, the ones from the World of Light.
Dialogue: We must return them to ourselves, the ones from the World of Light.
trans: 我们必须把他们还给我们自己，光之世界的那些人。

Original: Dark Manikin (Yuna):I know these memories will make them stronger.
Dialogue: I know these memories will make them stronger.
trans: 我知道这些记忆会让他们变得更坚强。

Original: Seymour:So the strength of your will is the same as your originals...
Dialogue: So the strength of your will is the same as your originals...
trans: 所以你的意志强度和你原本的一样……

Original: Seymour:And those who retain memories as brilliance are easily influenced by their originals...
Dialogue: And those who retain memories as brilliance are easily influenced by their originals...
trans: 而那些将记忆保留为光彩的人，很容易被原来的影响……

Original: Dark Manikin (Tidus):What do you want from us?
Dialogue: What do you want from us?
trans: 你想从我们这里得到什么？

Original: Seymour:Nothing. Do you intend to wait for your originals here?
Dialogue: Nothing. Do you intend to wait for your originals here?
trans: 没有什么。

Original: Seymour:Or...perhaps you would like to wait in that castle over there?
Dialogue: Or...perhaps you would like to wait in that castle over there?
trans: 或者……也许你想在那边的那个城堡里等？

Original: Dark Manikin (Auron):Are you working with the Emperor?
Dialogue: Are you working with the Emperor?
trans: 你在和皇帝一起工作吗？

Original: Seymour:I wouldn't say that.
Dialogue: I wouldn't say that.
trans: 我不会那样说。

Original: Seymour:I have no intention of becoming someone in power, but of using him.
Dialogue: I have no intention of becoming someone in power, but of using him.
trans: 我无意成为当权者，而是想利用他。

Original: Dark Manikin (Yuna):Yuna from the World of Light...
Dialogue: Yuna from the World of Light...
trans: 来自光之世界的尤娜……

Original: Yuna:Shortly after that, I got the feeling that someone was waiting for me.
Dialogue: Shortly after that, I got the feeling that someone was waiting for me.
trans: 不久之后，我感觉到有人在等我。

Original: Squall:(What's going on... She's surrounded by people.)
Dialogue: (What's going on... She's surrounded by people.)
trans: （怎么回事……她被人围住了。）

Original: Zell:Hearing you say stuff like, "Wanna get hurt?" is always so cool!
Dialogue: Hearing you say stuff like, "Wanna get hurt?" is always so cool!
trans: 听到你说“想受伤吗？”之类的话

Original: Cater:Maybe I'll give it a try next time!
Dialogue: Maybe I'll give it a try next time!
trans: 也许下次我会尝试一下！

Original: Squall:(She seems annoyed...)
Dialogue: (She seems annoyed...)
trans: （她似乎很生气……）

Original: Zell:You're so unsociable! You remind me of Squall.
Dialogue: You're so unsociable! You remind me of Squall.
trans: 你太不合群了！

Original: Squall:(We're nothing alike.)
Dialogue: (We're nothing alike.)
trans: （我们不一样。）

Original: Paine:We're nothing alike.
Dialogue: We're nothing alike.
trans: 我们不一样。

Original: Squall:(...I'm glad I kept my mouth shut.)
Dialogue: (...I'm glad I kept my mouth shut.)
trans: （......我很高兴我闭上了嘴。）

Original: Aerith:It's not easy dealing with us when we crowd around like this, is it?
Dialogue: It's not easy dealing with us when we crowd around like this, is it?
trans: 这么挤来挤去的，不好对付吧？

Original: Paine:You got that right.
Dialogue: You got that right.
trans: 你说对了。

Original: Squall:(She's got that right... It looks like she's clumsy with people, too.)
Dialogue: (She's got that right... It looks like she's clumsy with people, too.)
trans: （她说得对……看来她对人也很笨拙。）

Original: Aerith:Are there any others who remember you?
Dialogue: Are there any others who remember you?
trans: 还有其他人记得你吗？

Original: Aerith:It must be hard being the only one who remembers.
Dialogue: It must be hard being the only one who remembers.
trans: 成为唯一记得的人一定很难。

Original: Paine:Back in my world, we have a saying.
Dialogue: Back in my world, we have a saying.
trans: 回到我的世界，我们有一句谚语。

Original: Paine:"Memories are nice, but that's all they are."
Dialogue: "Memories are nice, but that's all they are."
trans: “回忆很美好，但仅此而已。”

Original: Paine:I finally understand. I think of those words a lot here.
Dialogue: I finally understand. I think of those words a lot here.
trans: 我终于明白了。

Original: Cater:You're not wrong. People can't help but reminisce.
Dialogue: You're not wrong. People can't help but reminisce.
trans: 你没有错。

Original: Aerith:But I like making new memories in this world, too.
Dialogue: But I like making new memories in this world, too.
trans: 但我也喜欢在这个世界上创造新的回忆。

Original: Paine:You're quite positive.
Dialogue: You're quite positive.
trans: 你很积极。

Original: Aerith:Isn't life better that way?
Dialogue: Isn't life better that way?
trans: 这样生活不是更好吗？

Original: Zell:But not being able to remember is annoying, too...
Dialogue: But not being able to remember is annoying, too...
trans: 但是不记得也很烦人......

Original: Squall:(That's right. Zell and the others haven't yet...)
Dialogue: (That's right. Zell and the others haven't yet...)
trans: （没错，泽尔他们还没有……）

Original: Aerith:Still, I'd want to enjoy the time it takes until I do remember.
Dialogue: Still, I'd want to enjoy the time it takes until I do remember.
trans: 尽管如此，我还是想享受这段时间，直到我记起来。

Original: Squall:(She's strong...)
Dialogue: (She's strong...)

Original: Paine:You're strong.
Dialogue: You're strong.
trans: 你很坚强。

Original: Squall:(I better keep my mouth shut when she's around...)
Dialogue: (I better keep my mouth shut when she's around...)
trans: （当她在身边时，我最好闭嘴……）

Original: Yuna:When we met them, we could tell they had no evil intent.
Dialogue: When we met them, we could tell they had no evil intent.
trans: 当我们见到他们时，我们可以看出他们没有恶意。

Original: Tidus:Are there still things I'm forgetting?
Dialogue: Are there still things I'm forgetting?
trans: 还有我忘记的事情吗？

Original: Dark Manikin (Tidus):Yeah. Very important things.
Dialogue: Yeah. Very important things.
trans: 是的。

Original: Dark Manikin (Yuna):Even though we have memories, there's nothing we can really do...
Dialogue: Even though we have memories, there's nothing we can really do...
trans: 即使我们有记忆，我们也无能为力……

Original: Dark Manikin (Yuna):We cannot laugh or cry.
Dialogue: We cannot laugh or cry.
trans: 我们不能笑也不能哭。

Original: Dark Manikin (Tidus):That's why you should take them. They'll be of more use to you than they are to us.
Dialogue: That's why you should take them. They'll be of more use to you than they are to us.
trans: 这就是为什么你应该服用它们。

Original: Yuna:It would have been better had I not known. What should I do...?
Dialogue: It would have been better had I not known. What should I do...?
trans: 如果我不知道会更好。

Original: Cecil:Fret not, Yuna. You're strong.
Dialogue: Fret not, Yuna. You're strong.
trans: 别担心，尤娜。

Original: Zack:Besides, if you continued not knowing, wouldn't you just feel bad later on?
Dialogue: Besides, if you continued not knowing, wouldn't you just feel bad later on?
trans: 再说了，你继续不知道，以后岂不是很难过？

Original: Dark Manikin (Yuna):You'll be fine as long as you stay positive.
Dialogue: You'll be fine as long as you stay positive.
trans: 只要你保持乐观，你就会没事的。

Original: Yuna:You're right. Paine said the same.
Dialogue: You're right. Paine said the same.
trans: 你说得对。

Original: Yuna:...I'll do my best!
Dialogue: ...I'll do my best!
trans: ...我将尽我所能！

Original: Tidus:Yuna... You've changed.
Dialogue: Yuna... You've changed.
trans: 尤娜……你变了。

Original: Dark Manikin (Tidus):That's what you need to remember.
Dialogue: That's what you need to remember.
trans: 这就是你需要记住的。

Original: Zack:So if we fight you, you'll hand over those memories?
Dialogue: So if we fight you, you'll hand over those memories?
trans: 所以如果我们和你打架，你会交出那些记忆吗？

Original: Dark Manikin (Yuna):That's correct. Our wills must clash. Everyone, please lend them your strength.
Dialogue: That's correct. Our wills must clash. Everyone, please lend them your strength.
trans: 这是正确的。

Original: Yuna:Would you help us?
Dialogue: Would you help us?
trans: 你愿意帮助我们吗？

Original: Zack:Of course!
Dialogue: Of course!
trans: 当然！

Original: Cecil:We'll fight together, to get back everyone's memories!
Dialogue: We'll fight together, to get back everyone's memories!
trans: 我们一起战斗，夺回大家的记忆！

Original: Auron:Is there something I'm forgetting, too?
Dialogue: Is there something I'm forgetting, too?
trans: 我也忘记了什么吗？

Original: Dark Manikin (Yuna):Yes. It's not much, but it's sure to come in handy.
Dialogue: Yes. It's not much, but it's sure to come in handy.
trans: 是的。

Original: Auron:I see... Then I look forward to remembering.
Dialogue: I see... Then I look forward to remembering.
trans: 我明白了……然后我期待着记住。

Original: Tidus:Yeah. If there are still gaps in my memories, I wanna fill them all!
Dialogue: Yeah. If there are still gaps in my memories, I wanna fill them all!
trans: 是的。

Original: Jecht:This brilliance must be Yuna's memories.
Dialogue: This brilliance must be Yuna's memories.
trans: 这光华，一定是尤娜的记忆。

Original: Y'shtola:What's the matter?
Dialogue: What's the matter?
trans: 怎么了？

Original: Yuna:I'm so embarrassed about what I remembered...
Dialogue: I'm so embarrassed about what I remembered...
trans: 我对我记得的事情感到很尴尬......

Original: Tidus:Yeah. Me, too.
Dialogue: Yeah. Me, too.
trans: 是的。

Original: Jecht:What happened to them?
Dialogue: What happened to them?
trans: 他们发生了什么？

Original: Auron:Rejoice. They have a future we didn't.
Dialogue: Rejoice. They have a future we didn't.
trans: 麾。

Original: Jecht:...Right. Heh. I don't know what kind of miracle happened, but...
Dialogue: ...Right. Heh. I don't know what kind of miracle happened, but...
trans: ...正确的。

Original: Jecht:As long as they live, there's always a way, eh, Auron?
Dialogue: As long as they live, there's always a way, eh, Auron?
trans: 只要他们活着，总会有办法的，嗯，Auron？

Original: Auron:Please, don't bring up the past...
Dialogue: Please, don't bring up the past...
trans: 请不要提起过去...

Original: Jecht:Haha! You were such a stiff back then.
Dialogue: Haha! You were such a stiff back then.
trans: 哈哈！

Original: Jecht:But Auron...
Dialogue: But Auron...
trans: 但是奥龙...

Original: Jecht:Now that other way has shown us something amazing.
Dialogue: Now that other way has shown us something amazing.
trans: 现在，另一种方式向我们展示了一些惊人的东西。

Original: Auron:...I suppose you're right. Something like this used to be impossible...
Dialogue: ...I suppose you're right. Something like this used to be impossible...
trans: ...我想你是对的。

Original: Yuna:I'm so sorry I forgot, Paine.
Dialogue: I'm so sorry I forgot, Paine.
trans: 很抱歉我忘了，潘恩。

Original: Paine:It's too late now.
Dialogue: It's too late now.
trans: 现在太迟了。

Original: Yuna:"Wanna get hurt?"
Dialogue: "Wanna get hurt?"
trans: “想受伤吗？”

Original: Paine:Don't say that again...ever.
Dialogue: Don't say that again...ever.
trans: 不要再说了……永远。

Original: Yuna:That's very kind of you to say, Paine.
Dialogue: That's very kind of you to say, Paine.
trans: 你这么说真是太好了，潘恩。

Original: Paine:You'd rather me be mean?
Dialogue: You'd rather me be mean?
trans: 你宁愿我刻薄？

Original: Yuna:I, I was just kidding!
Dialogue: I, I was just kidding!
trans: 我，我开玩笑的！

Original: Y'shtola:I'm so relieved. Even we could tell she was trying much too hard.
Dialogue: I'm so relieved. Even we could tell she was trying much too hard.
trans: 我很放心。

Original: Jecht:Yeah. And now she's all smiles.
Dialogue: Yeah. And now she's all smiles.
trans: 是的。

Original: Jecht:I guess that means life in Spira's gotten easier, huh? No more kids Yuna's age carrying such a heavy burden.
Dialogue: I guess that means life in Spira's gotten easier, huh? No more kids Yuna's age carrying such a heavy burden.
trans: 我想这意味着 Spira 的生活变得更轻松了，是吧？

Original: Tidus:You don't have to worry about that, old man. But still...it ain't easy being human.
Dialogue: You don't have to worry about that, old man. But still...it ain't easy being human.
trans: 你不必担心这个，老伙计。

Original: Jecht:Don't talk like you know.
Dialogue: Don't talk like you know.
trans: 不要像你知道的那样说话。

Original: Auron:Enough. You're not old enough to be giving sermons.
Dialogue: Enough. You're not old enough to be giving sermons.
trans: 足够的。

Original: Yuna:Well, it's been about two years since that journey. Spira has changed a lot since then.
Dialogue: Well, it's been about two years since that journey. Spira has changed a lot since then.
trans: 好吧，那次旅行已经过去了大约两年。

Original: Yuna:I really wish you two could see it...
Dialogue: I really wish you two could see it...
trans: 我真的希望你们两个能看到它...

Original: Paine:Positive thoughts!
Dialogue: Positive thoughts!
trans: 积极的想法！

Original: Yuna:You're right! At least in this world, we can still talk about it.
Dialogue: You're right! At least in this world, we can still talk about it.
trans: 你说得对！

Original: Auron:It's the only merit of this world.
Dialogue: It's the only merit of this world.
trans: 这是这个世界唯一的优点。

Original: Y'shtola:Yes... Here, you can learn things you should not know.
Dialogue: Yes... Here, you can learn things you should not know.
trans: 是的……在这里，你可以学到不该知道的东西。

Original: Y'shtola:And you can see comrades whom you've missed... I think that is indeed its only merit.
Dialogue: And you can see comrades whom you've missed... I think that is indeed its only merit.
trans: 而且你可以看到你错过的战友……我认为这确实是它唯一的优点。

Original: Tidus:I figured that, Yuna being Yuna, her life as the Grand Summoner would still be hectic, trying to help everyone.
Dialogue: I figured that, Yuna being Yuna, her life as the Grand Summoner would still be hectic, trying to help everyone.
trans: 我想，尤娜就是尤娜，她作为大召唤师的生活仍然会很忙碌，试图帮助每个人。

Original: Paine:It was, for two years. But then she tried to change.
Dialogue: It was, for two years. But then she tried to change.
trans: 两年了。

Original: Yuna:Did I change?
Dialogue: Did I change?
trans: 我改变了吗？

Original: Paine:Can't say. In the end, you couldn't turn a blind eye to anyone who needed help.
Dialogue: Can't say. In the end, you couldn't turn a blind eye to anyone who needed help.
trans: 不能说。

Original: Yuna:But it was all for my own sake...or, it should have been.
Dialogue: But it was all for my own sake...or, it should have been.
trans: 但这一切都是为了我自己……或者，应该是。

Original: Paine:But that's fine, Yuna.
Dialogue: But that's fine, Yuna.
trans: 不过没关系，尤娜。

Original: Yuna:Hearing that from you makes me feel strong, Paine!
Dialogue: Hearing that from you makes me feel strong, Paine!
trans: 听你这么说让我感觉很坚强，潘恩！

Original: Yuna:I wish I could see her. Then we can all go hunting together!
Dialogue: I wish I could see her. Then we can all go hunting together!
trans: 我希望我能见到她。

Original: Yuna:And my next journey starts now!
Dialogue: And my next journey starts now!
trans: 而我的下一段旅程现在开始！

Original: Yuna:Um... Have you remembered?
Dialogue: Um... Have you remembered?
trans: 嗯……你想起来了吗？

Original: Tidus:Yeah. I met you after you changed.
Dialogue: Yeah. I met you after you changed.
trans: 是的。

Original: Yuna:I see.
Dialogue: I see.
trans: 我懂了。

Original: Yuna:...To be honest, I'm a little nervous even now.
Dialogue: ...To be honest, I'm a little nervous even now.
trans: ……说实话，我到现在都有点紧张。

Original: Yuna:Maester Seymour still resents me for what I've done.
Dialogue: Maester Seymour still resents me for what I've done.
trans: 西摩学士仍然为我的所作所为而怨恨我。

Original: Yuna:He was not one of the people I wanted to save.
Dialogue: He was not one of the people I wanted to save.
trans: 他不是我想拯救的人之一。

Original: Tidus:I don't think anyone would fault you for it, Seymour being who he is.
Dialogue: I don't think anyone would fault you for it, Seymour being who he is.
trans: 我认为没有人会因此而责怪你，西摩就是他。

Original: Yuna:Was it all right for me to decide who should be saved and who shouldn't?
Dialogue: Was it all right for me to decide who should be saved and who shouldn't?
trans: 谁该救谁不该由我说了算？

Original: Tidus:It wasn't something you decided. The reason you brought me back had nothing to do with that.
Dialogue: It wasn't something you decided. The reason you brought me back had nothing to do with that.
trans: 这不是你决定的。

Original: Tidus:I'm sure there were a lot of others you wanted to bring back, too.
Dialogue: I'm sure there were a lot of others you wanted to bring back, too.
trans: 我敢肯定还有很多其他人也想带回来。

Original: Yuna:In my heart, I know that, but...
Dialogue: In my heart, I know that, but...
trans: 在我心里，我知道这一点，但是......

Original: Tidus:You went on a journey to find me, didn't you? Don't say that it was a mistake.
Dialogue: You went on a journey to find me, didn't you? Don't say that it was a mistake.
trans: 你踏上了寻找我的旅程，是吗？

Original: Yuna:...It wasn't.
Dialogue: ...It wasn't.
trans: ...它不是。

Original: Sabin:I suppose it's best we don't bother them now, even though we found a road into the storm.
Dialogue: I suppose it's best we don't bother them now, even though we found a road into the storm.
trans: 我想我们现在最好不要打扰他们，即使我们找到了通向暴风雨的路。

Original: Auron:Let us take our leave.
Dialogue: Let us take our leave.
trans: 让我们告别吧。

Original: Jecht:Stop right there, Auron.
Dialogue: Stop right there, Auron.
trans: 停在那里，Auron。

Original: Jecht:You need to stay!
Dialogue: You need to stay!
trans: 你需要留下来！

Original: Auron:...Why should I?
Dialogue: ...Why should I?
trans: ...我为什么要？

Original: Jecht:Because I say so!
Dialogue: Because I say so!
trans: 因为我这么说！

Original: Jecht:Seeing my son and Braska's kid like that...mumbling to each other...
Dialogue: Seeing my son and Braska's kid like that...mumbling to each other...
trans: 看到我儿子和布拉斯卡的孩子那样……互相喃喃自语……

Original: Onion Knight:Awful antsy for a father.
Dialogue: Awful antsy for a father.
trans: 一个父亲非常烦躁。

Original: Jecht:There's no old man in the world who can calm down after becoming a father!
Dialogue: There's no old man in the world who can calm down after becoming a father!
trans: 天下没有当爹了还能淡定的老人！

Original: Auron:You're not an old man yet, though, are you?
Dialogue: You're not an old man yet, though, are you?
trans: 不过，你还不是老人，对吗？

Original: Galuf:You make a good point, Jecht. The same will be true when you're a grandfather.
Dialogue: You make a good point, Jecht. The same will be true when you're a grandfather.
trans: 你说得很好，Jecht。

Original: Galuf:Grandchildren are such a joy. You'll do anything for them.
Dialogue: Grandchildren are such a joy. You'll do anything for them.
trans: 孙子们真是太高兴了。

Original: Jecht:Ugh, I don't even wanna imagine it!
Dialogue: Ugh, I don't even wanna imagine it!
trans: 呃，我什至不想去想象它！

Original: Sabin:Haha! It sounds like you've got a lot to learn, Jecht!
Dialogue: Haha! It sounds like you've got a lot to learn, Jecht!
trans: 哈哈！

Original: Jecht:If you ever have kids, you'll understand!
Dialogue: If you ever have kids, you'll understand!
trans: 如果你有孩子，你就会明白！

Original: Onion Knight:Yeah, yeah. In any case, let's get a move on.
Dialogue: Yeah, yeah. In any case, let's get a move on.
trans: 是啊是啊。

Original: Vaan:I'm happy that you got your memories back and all, but is anything different now?
Dialogue: I'm happy that you got your memories back and all, but is anything different now?
trans: 我很高兴你恢复了所有记忆，但现在有什么不同吗？

Original: Paine:If I told you the whole story, it'd take days.
Dialogue: If I told you the whole story, it'd take days.
trans: 如果我告诉你整个故事，那需要几天时间。

Original: Cloud:Maybe Seymour was saying things to try and stir up trouble.
Dialogue: Maybe Seymour was saying things to try and stir up trouble.
trans: 也许西摩说的话是想挑起事端。

Original: Yuna:Yes. But there are still a few things I should explain.
Dialogue: Yes. But there are still a few things I should explain.
trans: 是的。

Original: Yuna:Not everything Maester Seymour said was untrue.
Dialogue: Not everything Maester Seymour said was untrue.
trans: 并非西摩学士所说的一切都是不真实的。

Original: Yuna:I had heard news about Tidus.
Dialogue: I had heard news about Tidus.
trans: 我听说过有关 Tidus 的消息。

Original: Tidus:After the battle, I disappeared in front of everyone's eyes.
Dialogue: After the battle, I disappeared in front of everyone's eyes.
trans: 战斗结束后，我就消失在了所有人的眼前。

Original: Tidus:So Yuna went on a journey to find me.
Dialogue: So Yuna went on a journey to find me.
trans: 于是尤娜踏上了寻找我的旅程。

Original: Yuna:I suppose it is true that I did it for my own sake.
Dialogue: I suppose it is true that I did it for my own sake.
trans: 我想这是真的，我这样做是为了我自己。

Original: Vaan:But I don't think it's as bad as Seymour made it seem.
Dialogue: But I don't think it's as bad as Seymour made it seem.
trans: 但我不认为它像 Seymour 所说的那样糟糕。

Original: Cloud:But he used that information to drive Yuna into a corner...
Dialogue: But he used that information to drive Yuna into a corner...
trans: 但他利用这些信息把尤娜逼到了墙角……

Original: Yuna:I think he wanted to weaken me and my friends.
Dialogue: I think he wanted to weaken me and my friends.
trans: 我认为他想削弱我和我的朋友们。

Original: Cloud:He tried to crush our wills by trampling on our feelings.
Dialogue: He tried to crush our wills by trampling on our feelings.
trans: 他试图通过践踏我们的感情来粉碎我们的意志。

Original: Wakka:Calling me tubby sure trampled on mine...
Dialogue: Calling me tubby sure trampled on mine...
trans: 叫我 tubby 肯定践踏了我的...

Original: Paine:Tubby.
Dialogue: Tubby.
trans: 胖乎乎的。

Original: Wakka:Show some respect! I'm not tubby now!
Dialogue: Show some respect! I'm not tubby now!
trans: 表现出一些尊重！

Original: Yuna:Anyway, at the very end of my journey, I was able to see Tidus again.
Dialogue: Anyway, at the very end of my journey, I was able to see Tidus again.
trans: 不管怎样，在旅程的最后，我又见到了提达斯。

Original: Yuna:Though I'm afraid he may still be a dream and disappear again...
Dialogue: Though I'm afraid he may still be a dream and disappear again...
trans: 虽然我怕他还是一场梦，再次消失……

Original: Paine:Everyone feels the same, even people from different worlds.
Dialogue: Everyone feels the same, even people from different worlds.
trans: 每个人的感受都是一样的，即使是来自不同世界的人。

Original: Cloud:Yeah... People can vanish from your life at any time.
Dialogue: Yeah... People can vanish from your life at any time.
trans: 是啊……人们随时都可能从你的生活中消失。

Original: Vaan:I don't really get it, but aren't you together now?
Dialogue: I don't really get it, but aren't you together now?
trans: 我不太明白，但你们现在不是在一起了吗？

Original: Tidus:Yeah, we don't need to worry about what happens later.
Dialogue: Yeah, we don't need to worry about what happens later.
trans: 是的，我们不需要担心以后会发生什么。

Original: Yuna:I think I'll be fine facing Maester Seymour now.
Dialogue: I think I'll be fine facing Maester Seymour now.
trans: 我想我现在可以面对 Seymour 学士了。

Original: Yuna:Because there are things I will believe and won't give up on, no matter what he tells me.
Dialogue: Because there are things I will believe and won't give up on, no matter what he tells me.
trans: 因为有些事情我会相信并且不会放弃，无论他告诉我什么。

Original: Cloud:You've gotten stronger.
Dialogue: You've gotten stronger.
trans: 你变强了

Original: Paine:No. This is the real Yuna.
Dialogue: No. This is the real Yuna.
trans: 不，这才是真正的尤娜。

Original: Vaan:By the way, why was she angry at you?
Dialogue: By the way, why was she angry at you?
trans: 顺便问一下，她为什么生你的气？

Original: Tidus:...I completely forgot that I made Yuna worry.
Dialogue: ...I completely forgot that I made Yuna worry.
trans: ……我完全忘了我让尤娜担心了。

Original: Paine:And if you do it again, you're in for a world of hurt.
Dialogue: And if you do it again, you're in for a world of hurt.
trans: 如果你再做一次，你就会陷入一个痛苦的世界。

Original: Tidus:I won't do it again, I swear!
Dialogue: I won't do it again, I swear!
trans: 我不会再这样做了，我发誓！

Original: Vaan:Hmm... You look scary, but you're actually very nice, Paine.
Dialogue: Hmm... You look scary, but you're actually very nice, Paine.
trans: 嗯……你看起来很可怕，但实际上你很好，Paine。

Original: Paine:You wanna get hurt, too?
Dialogue: You wanna get hurt, too?
trans: 你也想受伤？

Original: Cloud:Quit while you're ahead. There's no helping Vaan.
Dialogue: Quit while you're ahead. There's no helping Vaan.
trans: 在你领先的时候退出。

Original: Vaan:Hey! What's that supposed to mean!?
Dialogue: Hey! What's that supposed to mean!?
trans: 嘿！

Original: Paine:What're you laughing at?
Dialogue: What're you laughing at?
trans: 你在笑什么？

Original: Yuna:The fact that you're one of us now, Paine.
Dialogue: The fact that you're one of us now, Paine.
trans: 事实上，你现在是我们中的一员，Paine。

Original: Paine:Say it clearer.
Dialogue: Say it clearer.
trans: 说清楚一点。

Original: Yuna:I'm happy we can go on another journey together!
Dialogue: I'm happy we can go on another journey together!
trans: 我很高兴我们可以一起去另一段旅程！

Original: Seymour:It seems like you've gotten your memories back.
Dialogue: It seems like you've gotten your memories back.
trans: 看来你已经恢复了记忆。

Original: Seymour:Now you understand what you threw away and what you gained, don't you?
Dialogue: Now you understand what you threw away and what you gained, don't you?
trans: 现在你明白你扔掉了什么，又得到了什么，不是吗？

Original: Yuna:I haven't thrown anything away.
Dialogue: I haven't thrown anything away.
trans: 我没有扔掉任何东西。

Original: Seymour:You mean to say you saved everyone on your second journey?
Dialogue: You mean to say you saved everyone on your second journey?
trans: 你是说你在第二次旅行中拯救了所有人？

Original: Seymour:Or perhaps you never thought of them to begin with?
Dialogue: Or perhaps you never thought of them to begin with?
trans: 或者也许您从一开始就没想过它们？

Original: Paine:Stop trying to pick a fight. We did what we could.
Dialogue: Stop trying to pick a fight. We did what we could.
trans: 不要试图挑起争端。

Original: Seymour:Is that so? But did you not put your own desires first?
Dialogue: Is that so? But did you not put your own desires first?
trans: 是这样吗？

Original: Seymour:Of course, that includes you...
Dialogue: Of course, that includes you...
trans: 当然，也包括你...

Original: Paine:You're ticking me off.
Dialogue: You're ticking me off.
trans: 你在勾引我。

Original: Seymour:Humans cannot escape their own desires...
Dialogue: Humans cannot escape their own desires...
trans: 人无法逃避自己的欲望……

Original: Seymour:And should those desires conflict, a fight is inevitable.
Dialogue: And should those desires conflict, a fight is inevitable.
trans: 如果这些愿望发生冲突，一场斗争是不可避免的。

Original: Seymour:Certainly the Grand Summoner defeated a great evil and brought about peace.
Dialogue: Certainly the Grand Summoner defeated a great evil and brought about peace.
trans: 大召唤者无疑击败了一个巨大的邪恶并带来了和平。

Original: Seymour:However, doing so uprooted Spira's values and conflict ensued.
Dialogue: However, doing so uprooted Spira's values and conflict ensued.
trans: 然而，这样做背离了 Spira 的价值观，冲突接踵而至。

Original: Seymour:Humans are foolish existences that desire strife for as long as they live.
Dialogue: Humans are foolish existences that desire strife for as long as they live.
trans: 人类是愚蠢的存在，终其一生都渴望争斗。

Original: Yuna:It's true that there was conflict...
Dialogue: It's true that there was conflict...
trans: 确实有冲突...

Original: Yuna:But we can stop it!
Dialogue: But we can stop it!
trans: 但我们可以阻止它！

Original: Yuna:And even if you say that fighting is inevitable, I refuse to give up so easily.
Dialogue: And even if you say that fighting is inevitable, I refuse to give up so easily.
trans: 就算你说战斗是不可避免的，我也不会轻易放弃。

Original: Ace:You didn't give up...on resolving the fight...
Dialogue: You didn't give up...on resolving the fight...
trans: 你没有放弃……解决战斗……

Original: Onion Knight:Aren't you the one who tried to pick a fight by saying that dying is better?
Dialogue: Aren't you the one who tried to pick a fight by saying that dying is better?
trans: 你不是那个试图挑起争端说死了更好的人吗？

Original: Yuna:It's easy to give up on resolving something and pick up a weapon.
