Original: Kefka:I went ahead and stuffed all the brilliance, magic, will, et cetera I gathered for my little bundle of joy into myself, too!
Dialogue: I went ahead and stuffed all the brilliance, magic, will, et cetera I gathered for my little bundle of joy into myself, too!
trans: 我继续前进，把我为我的小小快乐收集的所有光彩、魔法、意志等等都塞进了我自己！

Original: Noel:Watch out!
Dialogue: Watch out!
trans: 小心！

Original: Noct:Are you okay?
Dialogue: Are you okay?
trans: 你还好吗？

Original: Noel:I may have been too rash, but look...!
Dialogue: I may have been too rash, but look...!
trans: 我可能太鲁莽了，但是你看……！

Original: Kefka:You worms are always, always, always getting in my way...
Dialogue: You worms are always, always, always getting in my way...
trans: 你们这些虫子总是，总是，总是挡着我的路……

Original: Locke:Dammit! He's not messing around anymore!
Dialogue: Dammit! He's not messing around anymore!
trans: 该死！

Original: Kefka:I'll have them crush you until not even a speck of dust remains!
Dialogue: I'll have them crush you until not even a speck of dust remains!
trans: 我会让他们把你压得连一粒灰尘都不剩！

Original: Locke:Are you guys ready?
Dialogue: Are you guys ready?
trans: 你们准备好了吗？

Original: Noct:I can go anytime! I won't let him have his way.
Dialogue: I can go anytime! I won't let him have his way.
trans: 我随时都可以去！

Original: Noel:Same. I won't forgive anyone who tries to take the future away from others.
Dialogue: Same. I won't forgive anyone who tries to take the future away from others.
trans: 相同的。

Original: Locke:Perfect. I won't stand by and let this clown go free. Let's get him!
Dialogue: Perfect. I won't stand by and let this clown go free. Let's get him!
trans: 完美的。

Original: Kefka:You never learn...
Dialogue: You never learn...
trans: 你永远学不会...

Original: Kefka:Just what do you gain by clinging to life?
Dialogue: Just what do you gain by clinging to life?
trans: 执着于生命到底有什么好处呢？

Original: Noel:You'll always have a future as long as you don't give up.
Dialogue: You'll always have a future as long as you don't give up.
trans: 只要你不放弃，你就会永远有未来。

Original: Noel:I won't let this world be destroyed by you!
Dialogue: I won't let this world be destroyed by you!
trans: 我不会让这个世界被你毁灭！

Original: Locke:We waver no longer!
Dialogue: We waver no longer!
trans: 我们不再动摇！

Original: Kefka:Ow, ow, ow! It hurts! My stomach hurts!
Dialogue: Ow, ow, ow! It hurts! My stomach hurts!
trans: 呜呜呜！

Original: Kefka:Hehehe! You made me laugh so hard, my sides are splitting!
Dialogue: Hehehe! You made me laugh so hard, my sides are splitting!
trans: 嘿嘿嘿！

Original: Kefka:Did you think Willy was going to wait around while you were busy hitting me?
Dialogue: Did you think Willy was going to wait around while you were busy hitting me?
trans: 你以为威利会等你忙着打我吗？

Original: Locke:The air is shaking...!?
Dialogue: The air is shaking...!?
trans: 空气在颤抖……！？

Original: Noel:The Blackened Will is moving!
Dialogue: The Blackened Will is moving!
trans: 黑化意志在移动！

Original: Alisaie:How despicable... I can't move. Is this the end?
Dialogue: How despicable... I can't move. Is this the end?
trans: 好卑鄙……我不能动了。

Original: Kefka:And now a little bug is about to snuggle under this continent's rug!
Dialogue: And now a little bug is about to snuggle under this continent's rug!
trans: 而现在一只小虫子就要依偎在这片大陆的地毯下了！

Original: Kefka:Which means so long, and thanks for all the laughs! Kefka out!
Dialogue: Which means so long, and thanks for all the laughs! Kefka out!
trans: 这意味着这么久，感谢所有的笑声！

Original: Mog:Kupo! If we don't stop it, the Blackened Will will go on a rampage!
Dialogue: Kupo! If we don't stop it, the Blackened Will will go on a rampage!
trans: 库波！

Original: Alisaie:If what he said is true, then it has unlimited energy to run rampant!
Dialogue: If what he said is true, then it has unlimited energy to run rampant!
trans: 如果他说的是真的，那它就有无限的能量横行！

Original: Warrior of Light:Is there no way to detect it?
Dialogue: Is there no way to detect it?
trans: 没有办法检测吗？

Original: Mog:No, kupo! The entire world is jumbled! It's like being in a storm, kupo!
Dialogue: No, kupo! The entire world is jumbled! It's like being in a storm, kupo!
trans: 不，库波！

Original: Mog:There's no way I can trace its movements with just my pompom, kupo!
Dialogue: There's no way I can trace its movements with just my pompom, kupo!
trans: 光靠我的绒球是不可能追踪到它的动向的，库波！

Original: Locke:So we have no way of finding it. This world is in danger!
Dialogue: So we have no way of finding it. This world is in danger!
trans: 所以我们没有办法找到它。

Original: Mog:In any case, let's evacuate to the airship, kupo! This place might be corroded at any minute!
Dialogue: In any case, let's evacuate to the airship, kupo! This place might be corroded at any minute!
trans: 不管怎样，去飞空艇避难吧，kupo！

Original: Noel:Grab on! We're getting out of here!
Dialogue: Grab on! We're getting out of here!
trans: 抓住！

Original: Locke:We can't stay here long!
Dialogue: We can't stay here long!
trans: 我们不能在这里久留！

Original: Setzer:I'm here!
Dialogue: I'm here!
trans: 我在这！

Original: Setzer:Quickly, get on, everyone!
Dialogue: Quickly, get on, everyone!
trans: 大家快上车吧！

Original: Warrior of Light:I can't believe it... This world we tried so hard to protect is going to be consumed by that beast!
Dialogue: I can't believe it... This world we tried so hard to protect is going to be consumed by that beast!
trans: 真不敢相信……这个我们拼命守护的世界，竟然要被那只野兽吞噬！

Original: Locke:No, it won't. We're going to stop it! But we have to survive this first!
Dialogue: No, it won't. We're going to stop it! But we have to survive this first!
trans: 不，不会的。

Original: Noel:Yeah. If we lose our lives here, we won't have a chance to retaliate!
Dialogue: Yeah. If we lose our lives here, we won't have a chance to retaliate!
trans: 是的。

Original: Noel:We won't give up!
Dialogue: We won't give up!
trans: 我们不会放弃！

Original: Warrior of Light:But where...
Dialogue: But where...
trans: 但是哪里...

Original: Warrior of Light:Where did it go!?
Dialogue: Where did it go!?
trans: 它去哪儿了！？

Original: Locke:Hey! I know you know what's going on here!
Dialogue: Hey! I know you know what's going on here!
trans: 嘿！

Original: Materia:Yes... After being born anew, the Blackened Will fled...
Dialogue: Yes... After being born anew, the Blackened Will fled...
trans: 是的……重生后，黑化意志逃走了……

Original: Edgar:Finding out where it's gone is proving a difficult task.
Dialogue: Finding out where it's gone is proving a difficult task.
trans: 找出它去了哪里被证明是一项艰巨的任务。

Original: Edgar:The corrosion is starting here in your world, is it not?
Dialogue: The corrosion is starting here in your world, is it not?
trans: 腐蚀正在你的世界开始，不是吗？

Original: Materia:That is true. I have tried to find its whereabouts, but...
Dialogue: That is true. I have tried to find its whereabouts, but...
trans: 那是真实的。

Original: Materia:...It seems to be somewhere in the World of Illusions.
Dialogue: ...It seems to be somewhere in the World of Illusions.
trans: ……好像是在幻境世界的某个地方。

Original: Chelinka:Do you know anything else?
Dialogue: Do you know anything else?
trans: 你还知道什么吗？

Original: Yuri:I thought you gods had the power to write new possibilities... Can't you do anything about it?
Dialogue: I thought you gods had the power to write new possibilities... Can't you do anything about it?
trans: 我以为你们大神有能力写出新的可能性……你们就不能做点什么吗？

Original: Materia:The World of Illusions belongs to the summons. It's a place with an ambiguous connection to ours.
Dialogue: The World of Illusions belongs to the summons. It's a place with an ambiguous connection to ours.
trans: 幻象世界属于召唤物。

Original: Locke:Can't you open it by force?
Dialogue: Can't you open it by force?
trans: 不能强行打开吗？

Original: Materia:Searching their world on my own is no easy feat. It will take time.
Dialogue: Searching their world on my own is no easy feat. It will take time.
trans: 独自探索他们的世界绝非易事。

Original: Spiritus:You asked the wrong god, pathetic warriors.
Dialogue: You asked the wrong god, pathetic warriors.
trans: 你问错神了，可悲的战士们。

Original: Edgar:Spiritus... What brings you here to Materia's chambers?
Dialogue: Spiritus... What brings you here to Materia's chambers?
trans: Spiritus... 是什么把你带到了 Materia 的房间？

Original: Edgar:Seeing as you're the very one who summoned Kefka, I assumed you had no interest in this world.
Dialogue: Seeing as you're the very one who summoned Kefka, I assumed you had no interest in this world.
trans: 既然你就是召唤凯夫卡的人，我还以为你对这个世界没有兴趣呢。

Original: Spiritus:I sought only those with power to protect my world.
Dialogue: I sought only those with power to protect my world.
trans: 我只寻找那些有能力保护我的世界的人。

Original: Yuri:So you really didn't expect someone would destroy that very world...
Dialogue: So you really didn't expect someone would destroy that very world...
trans: 所以你真的没想到有人会破坏那个世界......

Original: Spiritus:I will take the blame in place of that powerless goddess.
Dialogue: I will take the blame in place of that powerless goddess.
trans: 我会代替那个无能为力的女神来承担责任。

Original: Spiritus:Now go!
Dialogue: Now go!
trans: 现在，走吧！

Original: Locke:Can we find Kefka through there?
Dialogue: Can we find Kefka through there?
trans: 我们能从那里找到凯夫卡吗？

Original: Spiritus:I detect the urge to destroy within... This will certainly put you in the right direction.
Dialogue: I detect the urge to destroy within... This will certainly put you in the right direction.
trans: 我察觉到内心想要毁灭的冲动……这肯定会让你走上正确的方向。

Original: Materia:Wait. Simply pointing my warriors toward the enemy is not enough...
Dialogue: Wait. Simply pointing my warriors toward the enemy is not enough...
trans: 等待。

Original: Materia:Let me guide you...!
Dialogue: Let me guide you...!
trans: 让我来指导你......！

Original: Materia:I've fine-tuned the portal with dimensional coordinates. Now you will definitely find Kefka.
Dialogue: I've fine-tuned the portal with dimensional coordinates. Now you will definitely find Kefka.
trans: 我已经用维度坐标微调了门户。

Original: Edgar:These gods have done nothing but fight up until this very moment... And now we have no choice but to put our faith in them.
Dialogue: These gods have done nothing but fight up until this very moment... And now we have no choice but to put our faith in them.
trans: 直到这一刻，这些神灵除了战斗之外什么也没做……现在我们别无选择，只能相信他们。

Original: Locke:Right... Well, let's get moving. Kefka's waiting!
Dialogue: Right... Well, let's get moving. Kefka's waiting!
trans: 对……好吧，我们开始吧。

Original: Kefka:Hehehe... You vermin sure sniffed me out!
Dialogue: Hehehe... You vermin sure sniffed me out!
trans: 嘿嘿嘿……你这个害虫真把我闻出来了！

Original: Onion Knight:Vermin? Look who's talking.
Dialogue: Vermin? Look who's talking.
trans: 害虫？

Original: Lenna:We were supposed to have come out in the World of Illusions... But this place is filled with evil will...
Dialogue: We were supposed to have come out in the World of Illusions... But this place is filled with evil will...
trans: 本来应该是从幻境世界出来的……可是这个地方充满了邪恶的意志……

Original: Lenna:It's like we're inside a Torsion.
Dialogue: It's like we're inside a Torsion.
trans: 就像我们在扭力中一样。

Original: Kefka:So glad you noticed! It's a custom make.
Dialogue: So glad you noticed! It's a custom make.
trans: 很高兴你注意到了！

Original: Kefka:My darling Wilbur snacked on bits and pieces of the world and made its very own nest!
Dialogue: My darling Wilbur snacked on bits and pieces of the world and made its very own nest!
trans: 我亲爱的威尔伯吃遍了世界的点点滴滴，筑起了自己的小窝！

Original: Warrior of Light:We must destroy this world before it's too late. I can feel the darkness swelling up...
Dialogue: We must destroy this world before it's too late. I can feel the darkness swelling up...
trans: 我们必须在为时已晚之前摧毁这个世界。

Original: Kefka:Bingo! It was nurtured by yours truly!
Dialogue: Bingo! It was nurtured by yours truly!
trans: 答对了！

Original: Kefka:It's chock-full of destructive energy and ready to burst any minute now!
Dialogue: It's chock-full of destructive energy and ready to burst any minute now!
trans: 它充满了破坏性的能量，随时准备爆发！

Original: Celes:We won't let you! You won't hurt anyone again!
Dialogue: We won't let you! You won't hurt anyone again!
trans: 我们不会让你！

Original: Kefka:I'd like to see you try! This place is evil will given form.
Dialogue: I'd like to see you try! This place is evil will given form.
trans: 我想看你试试！

Original: Kefka:You won't stand a chance in here! You'll be squashed like the vermin you are!
Dialogue: You won't stand a chance in here! You'll be squashed like the vermin you are!
trans: 你不会有机会在这里！

Original: Onion Knight:If he thinks he can just watch us from the sidelines, he's got another think coming.
Dialogue: If he thinks he can just watch us from the sidelines, he's got another think coming.
trans: 如果他认为他可以在场边看着我们，他就会有另一个想法。

Original: Onion Knight:But we need to destroy the Blackened Will first.
Dialogue: But we need to destroy the Blackened Will first.
trans: 但我们需要先摧毁黑化意志。

Original: Warrior of Light:No matter how perilous the road, we will traverse it!
Dialogue: No matter how perilous the road, we will traverse it!
trans: 再危险的路，我们也要走过！

Original: Celes:Yes. We'll pluck all the weeds from this world!
Dialogue: Yes. We'll pluck all the weeds from this world!
trans: 是的。

Original: Mog:I don't feel so good, kupo...
Dialogue: I don't feel so good, kupo...
trans: 我感觉不太好，库波...

Original: Lenna:Are you okay? Is something wrong?
Dialogue: Are you okay? Is something wrong?
trans: 你还好吗？

Original: Mog:I think it's because I was possessed by the Blackened Will before, kupo...
Dialogue: I think it's because I was possessed by the Blackened Will before, kupo...
trans: 我想是因为我之前被黑化意志附身了，库珀……

Original: Mog:It's a weird request, kupo, but... Please don't listen to me until the Blackened Will is destroyed.
Dialogue: It's a weird request, kupo, but... Please don't listen to me until the Blackened Will is destroyed.
trans: 这是一个奇怪的请求，库珀，但是……在黑化意志被摧毁之前请不要听我的。

Original: Onion Knight:You think it might still be controlling you?
Dialogue: You think it might still be controlling you?
trans: 你觉得它可能还在控制你？

Original: Mog:Kupo... I don't want to be a bother, kupo.
Dialogue: Kupo... I don't want to be a bother, kupo.
trans: 库波……我不想成为麻烦，库波。

Original: Celes:Everyone believes in you, Mog. We're not going to start doubting you now.
Dialogue: Everyone believes in you, Mog. We're not going to start doubting you now.
trans: 每个人都相信你，莫格。

Original: Lenna:But he really looks bad... He needs to rest.
Dialogue: But he really looks bad... He needs to rest.
trans: 不过他的脸色真的不好……他需要休息。

Original: Warrior of Light:Searching for the Blackened Will will be harder than ever without Mog...
Dialogue: Searching for the Blackened Will will be harder than ever without Mog...
trans: 没有莫格，寻找黑化意志将比以往任何时候都更难......

Original: Warrior of Light:We should make sure we're duly prepared for the road ahead.
Dialogue: We should make sure we're duly prepared for the road ahead.
trans: 我们应该确保我们为前方的道路做好了充分的准备。

Original: Kefka:Well, well! The fighting energy here sure is intense!
Dialogue: Well, well! The fighting energy here sure is intense!
trans: 好吧！

Original: Tidus:Hey! There he is!
Dialogue: Hey! There he is!
trans: 嘿！

Original: Cloud:Looks like he's out of luck.
Dialogue: Looks like he's out of luck.
trans: 看来他倒霉了。

Original: Edgar:Not even death would be enough punishment for his deeds. Perhaps we could imprison him between dimensions.
Dialogue: Not even death would be enough punishment for his deeds. Perhaps we could imprison him between dimensions.
trans: 甚至死亡都不足以惩罚他的行为。

Original: Laguna:Nice thinking! You're gonna pay for all you've put us through!
Dialogue: Nice thinking! You're gonna pay for all you've put us through!
trans: 不错的想法！

Original: Kefka:Hehehe. All I've put you through has generated the energy I wanted!
Dialogue: Hehehe. All I've put you through has generated the energy I wanted!
trans: 呵呵。

Original: Kefka:And I took, thankyouverymucho!
Dialogue: And I took, thankyouverymucho!
trans: 我接受了，thankyouverymucho！

Original: Zidane:Do you think this guy is using our battle energy to feed the Blackened Will!?
Dialogue: Do you think this guy is using our battle energy to feed the Blackened Will!?
trans: 你以为这家伙是在用我们的斗气来喂养黑化意志吗！？

Original: Kefka:I also nibble on some of it to keep my super-ultra-maximum buff-fest rolling!
Dialogue: I also nibble on some of it to keep my super-ultra-maximum buff-fest rolling!
trans: 我还啃了一些，以保持我的超超最大 buff-fest 滚动！

Original: Kefka:Which makes you soggy paper straws before my drink bar of ruin!
Dialogue: Which makes you soggy paper straws before my drink bar of ruin!
trans: 这让你在我的饮料吧台前弄湿了纸吸管！

Original: Kefka:The one who's out of luck is YOUSE!
Dialogue: The one who's out of luck is YOUSE!
trans: 倒霉的是你！

Original: Edgar:Don't expect your petty insults to suddenly get a rise out of us.
Dialogue: Don't expect your petty insults to suddenly get a rise out of us.
trans: 不要指望你的小侮辱会突然激怒我们。

Original: Edgar:We're prepared to fight.
Dialogue: We're prepared to fight.
trans: 我们准备战斗。

Original: Edgar:No matter how strong you've become, we shall defeat you!
Dialogue: No matter how strong you've become, we shall defeat you!
trans: 不管你有多强，我们都会打败你！

Original: Kefka:Ooh, what a riveting speech. I'm shaking in my boots.
Dialogue: Ooh, what a riveting speech. I'm shaking in my boots.
trans: 哦，多么引人入胜的演讲。

Original: Kefka:Well then, let's leave everything else behind and drink to ruin! Bottoms up!
Dialogue: Well then, let's leave everything else behind and drink to ruin! Bottoms up!
trans: 好吧，让我们把其他的都抛在脑后，尽情地喝吧！

Original: Terra:We've got you now!
Dialogue: We've got you now!
trans: 我们现在找到你了！

Original: Kefka:You maroons are always, always, always, always, ALWAYS getting in my way...
Dialogue: You maroons are always, always, always, always, ALWAYS getting in my way...
trans: 你们这些栗色人总是，总是，总是，总是，总是挡着我的路……

Original: Kefka:This world has no future, and yet you persist... How stupid can you get?
Dialogue: This world has no future, and yet you persist... How stupid can you get?
trans: 这个世界没有未来，你还坚持……你能傻到什么地步？

Original: Kefka:Well, let me teach you pinheads a lesson: it all ends here!
Dialogue: Well, let me teach you pinheads a lesson it all ends here!
trans: 好吧，让我给你们上一课吧，一切都到此为止了！

Original: Locke:This is the final battle! Let's finish this, Kefka!
Dialogue: This is the final battle! Let's finish this, Kefka!
trans: 这是最后的战斗！

Original: Kefka:No no no no no, cut it out! STOP IT! Please, with a cherry on top.
Dialogue: No no no no no, cut it out! STOP IT! Please, with a cherry on top.
trans: 不不不不，别打了！

Original: Terra:Mog, now!
Dialogue: Mog, now!
trans: 莫格，现在！

Original: Kefka:GYAAAH!
Dialogue: GYAAAH!
trans: 哇！

Original: Shantotto:Ohoho! How unsightly!
Dialogue: Ohoho! How unsightly!
trans: 呵呵！

Original: Shantotto:A perfect prison to hold that clown tightly.
Dialogue: A perfect prison to hold that clown tightly.
trans: 牢牢关押那个小丑的完美监狱。

Original: Noel:What is it?
Dialogue: What is it?
trans: 它是什么？

Original: Shantotto:A Torsion we styled to hold him for a while.
Dialogue: A Torsion we styled to hold him for a while.
trans: 我们设计的 Torsion 可以让他保持一段时间。

Original: Terra:If we left Kefka to his own devices, something like this might happen again...
Dialogue: If we left Kefka to his own devices, something like this might happen again...
trans: 如果我们让凯夫卡自行其是，类似的事情可能会再次发生……

Original: Noel:Is that even possible?
Dialogue: Is that even possible?
trans: 这可能吗？

Original: Mog:With this, he won't be able to do as he wants, kupo!
Dialogue: With this, he won't be able to do as he wants, kupo!
trans: 有了这个，他就不能为所欲为了，库珀！

Original: Mog:No matter what way you look at it, this was too much. If this happens again, there won't be enough worlds, kupo!
Dialogue: No matter what way you look at it, this was too much. If this happens again, there won't be enough worlds, kupo!
trans: 不管怎么看，这都太过分了。

Original: Mog:We'll give him some time to reflect, kupo.
Dialogue: We'll give him some time to reflect, kupo.
trans: 我们会给他一些时间来思考，库波。

Original: Locke:How long is "some" time? Why not forever?
Dialogue: How long is "some" time? Why not forever?
trans: “一些”时间有多长？

Original: Mog:I thought about that, too, kupo... But Spiritus stopped me.
Dialogue: I thought about that, too, kupo... But Spiritus stopped me.
trans: 我也想过这个，库波……但是 Spiritus 阻止了我。

Original: Mog:He reminded me that it was a world ruled by two gods... And that Kefka is here because he's powerful.
Dialogue: He reminded me that it was a world ruled by two gods... And that Kefka is here because he's powerful.
trans: 他提醒我这是一个由两个神统治的世界……而凯夫卡之所以在这里是因为他很强大。

Original: Locke:Does that mean he needs Kefka!?
Dialogue: Does that mean he needs Kefka!?
trans: 这是否意味着他需要凯夫卡！？

Original: Lightning:...I've got a message for them.
Dialogue: ...I've got a message for them.
trans: ...我有消息给他们。

Original: Lightning:We're not living for the gods.
Dialogue: We're not living for the gods.
trans: 我们不是为神而活。

Original: Lightning:If they're trying to tame us, they should know we won't go lying down.
Dialogue: If they're trying to tame us, they should know we won't go lying down.
trans: 如果他们想驯服我们，他们应该知道我们不会躺下。

Original: Lightning:Tell that to Spiritus and Materia.
Dialogue: Tell that to Spiritus and Materia.
trans: 告诉 Spiritus 和 Materia。

Original: Locke:And don't forget to add this: "Don't underestimate humans."
Dialogue: And don't forget to add this "Don't underestimate humans."
trans: 并且不要忘记添加“不要低估人类”。

Original: Locke:Next time, we'll tell it straight to their faces.
Dialogue: Next time, we'll tell it straight to their faces.
trans: 下一次，我们会直接告诉他们。

Original: Mog:You got it, kupo!
Dialogue: You got it, kupo!
trans: 你明白了，库波！

Original: Mog:This time I'm also steamed at them, kupo!
Dialogue: This time I'm also steamed at them, kupo!
trans: 这次我也被他们蒸了，kupo！

Original: Noel:What's going to happen to this place?
Dialogue: What's going to happen to this place?
trans: 这个地方会发生什么？

Original: Mog:With the Blackened Will gone, the corrupted worlds will try to fix themselves, kupo.
Dialogue: With the Blackened Will gone, the corrupted worlds will try to fix themselves, kupo.
trans: 随着 Blackened Will 的消失，腐化的世界将尝试自我修复，kupo。

Original: Mog:So we can relax for now, kupo.
Dialogue: So we can relax for now, kupo.
trans: 所以我们现在可以放松一下，kupo。

Original: Terra:Hmm... The world is still unstable, though.
Dialogue: Hmm... The world is still unstable, though.
trans: 嗯……不过这个世界还是不稳定的。

Original: Terra:But still, I'm relieved. Thank you, everyone.
Dialogue: But still, I'm relieved. Thank you, everyone.
trans: 不过，我还是放心了。

Original: Spiritus:They narrowly managed to seal away the planesgorger created by Kefka...
Dialogue: They narrowly managed to seal away the planesgorger created by Kefka...
trans: 他们险些封印了凯夫卡创造的位面吞噬者……

Original: Spiritus:The brilliance it stole, however, has vanished into the space-time continuum.
Dialogue: The brilliance it stole, however, has vanished into the space-time continuum.
trans: 然而，它偷走的光彩已经消失在时空连续体中。

Original: Spiritus:There are many types of warriors, even among the strong. I wonder if you can see them for what they truly are...
Dialogue: There are many types of warriors, even among the strong. I wonder if you can see them for what they truly are...
trans: 武者的种类有很多种，即便是强者之中也是如此。

Original: ???:I have more pressing matters that I must attend to.
Dialogue: I have more pressing matters that I must attend to.
trans: 我有更紧迫的事情要处理。

Original: Spiritus:That dream has ended... It is time you remembered that.
Dialogue: That dream has ended... It is time you remembered that.
trans: 那个梦已经结束了……你该记住了。

Dialogue: ...And so?

Original: ???:You revived a man with a shattered dream. Just who are you?
Dialogue: You revived a man with a shattered dream. Just who are you?
trans: 你让一个梦想破灭的人复活了。

Original: Spiritus:A god.
Dialogue: A god.
trans: 一个神。

Original: ???:I find that hard to believe... You do not exist in our visions.
Dialogue: I find that hard to believe... You do not exist in our visions.
trans: 我很难相信……你不存在于我们的视野中。

Original: Spiritus:A paradise where one can coexist with the gods... That is the order of your world.
Dialogue: A paradise where one can coexist with the gods... That is the order of your world.
trans: 能与神共存的乐园……那是你们世界的秩序。

Original: Spiritus:You possess a strong will, and in this world, will determines all.
Dialogue: You possess a strong will, and in this world, will determines all.
trans: 你拥有坚强的意志，在这个世界上，意志决定一切。

Original: Spiritus:With it, you can even reshape the very world to your liking...
Dialogue: With it, you can even reshape the very world to your liking...
trans: 有了它，您甚至可以根据自己的喜好重塑世界……

Original: ???:What is your goal?
Dialogue: What is your goal?
trans: 你的目标是什么？

Original: Spiritus:If you must know: your respite.
Dialogue: If you must know your respite.
trans: 如果你必须知道你的喘息。

Original: Kam'lanaut:My respite? Just what would an otherworldly god understand of my plight?
Dialogue: My respite? Just what would an otherworldly god understand of my plight?
trans: 我的喘息？

Original: Spiritus:Only that your hatred and indignation of being unable to achieve your dream despite your position...
Dialogue: Only that your hatred and indignation of being unable to achieve your dream despite your position...
trans: 只是你对身居高位却无法实现梦想的痛恨和愤慨……

Original: Spiritus:Will become your greatest strength in this world.
Dialogue: Will become your greatest strength in this world.
trans: 将成为你在这个世界上最大的力量。

Original: Spiritus:I need the strength of your will to preserve my world.
Dialogue: I need the strength of your will to preserve my world.
trans: 我需要你意志的力量来保护我的世界。

Original: Kam'lanaut:I see. In exchange for drawing out the power of my will...
Dialogue: I see. In exchange for drawing out the power of my will...
trans: 我懂了。

Original: Kam'lanaut:I am allowed to do whatever it is I please in this world.
Dialogue: I am allowed to do whatever it is I please in this world.
trans: 在这个世界上，我可以做任何我想做的事。

Original: Spiritus:You may see it that way if you wish.
Dialogue: You may see it that way if you wish.
trans: 如果你愿意，你可以那样看。

Original: Spiritus:You can even build your beloved Paradise here.
Dialogue: You can even build your beloved Paradise here.
trans: 你甚至可以在这里建造你心爱的乐园。

Original: Kam'lanaut:Hmph. I am the will of the crystals.
Dialogue: Hmph. I am the will of the crystals.
trans: 哼。

Original: Kam'lanaut:First I shall see this world for myself.
Dialogue: First I shall see this world for myself.
trans: 首先，我要亲眼看看这个世界。

Original: Spiritus:Show me what you're capable of.
Dialogue: Show me what you're capable of.
trans: 告诉我你的能力。

Original: ???:There's something you don't trust about him, isn't there?
Dialogue: There's something you don't trust about him, isn't there?
trans: 你对他有些不信任，不是吗？

Original: ???:That's why you summoned me.
Dialogue: That's why you summoned me.
trans: 这就是你召唤我的原因。

Original: Spiritus:You are also free to do as you wish in this world.
Dialogue: You are also free to do as you wish in this world.
trans: 你也可以自由地在这个世界上做你想做的事。

Original: ???:Well, I was imprisoned in that rift. Is this now what you call freedom?
Dialogue: Well, I was imprisoned in that rift. Is this now what you call freedom?
trans: 好吧，我被囚禁在那个裂缝中。

Original: ???:...No matter. I'll find some way to amuse myself.
Dialogue: ...No matter. I'll find some way to amuse myself.

Original: ???:I think I can do a little better than those foolish races strung on by the gods.
Dialogue: I think I can do a little better than those foolish races strung on by the gods.
trans: 我想我可以比那些被众神束缚的愚蠢种族做得更好。

Original: Terra:We succeeded insealing Kefka away, but...
Dialogue: We succeeded in sealing Kefka away, but...
trans: 我们成功地把凯夫卡封印了，但是……

Original: Papalymo:The dark manikins and the brilliance they held are gone.
Dialogue: The dark manikins and the brilliance they held are gone.
trans: 黑暗的人体模型和它们所拥有的光彩都消失了。

Original: Yda:Does that mean the memories you lost are gone forever...?
Dialogue: Does that mean the memories you lost are gone forever...?
trans: 这是否意味着你失去的记忆永远消失了......？

Original: Mog:I don't know what to say, kupo...
Dialogue: I don't know what to say, kupo...
trans: 我不知道该说什么，库波...

Original: Relm:Cheer up, guys!
Dialogue: Cheer up, guys!
trans: 振作起来，伙计们！

Original: Relm:I remember everything about you, Terra. Isn't that enough?
Dialogue: I remember everything about you, Terra. Isn't that enough?
trans: 我记得关于你的一切，Terra。

Original: Terra:Don't worry about us, Relm. The memories I want to protect haven't changed.
Dialogue: Don't worry about us, Relm. The memories I want to protect haven't changed.
trans: 别担心我们，雷尔姆。

Original: Terra:And even if I lose those...I can still make new ones.
Dialogue: And even if I lose those...I can still make new ones.
trans: 即使我失去了那些......我仍然可以制作新的。

Original: Papalymo:At this point, we can be neither optimistic nor pessimistic. But simply standing still helps no one.
Dialogue: At this point, we can be neither optimistic nor pessimistic. But simply standing still helps no one.
trans: 在这一点上，我们既不能乐观也不能悲观。

Original: Papalymo:The peculiarities of the dark manikins are even more complicated than they themselves said.
Dialogue: The peculiarities of the dark manikins are even more complicated than they themselves said.
trans: 黑暗人体模型的特殊性，比他们自己说的还要复杂。

Original: Y'shtola:Indeed. After all, they were created.
Dialogue: Indeed. After all, they were created.
trans: 的确。

Original: Y'shtola:So unlike us, they are not restricted to only one body. Everything is brilliance.
Dialogue: So unlike us, they are not restricted to only one body. Everything is brilliance.
trans: 因此，与我们不同，它们不仅限于一个身体。

Original: Y'shtola:Which means the memories you lost were not necessarily in their possession.
Dialogue: Which means the memories you lost were not necessarily in their possession.
trans: 这意味着你失去的记忆不一定在他们身上。

Original: Terra:I don't know whether or not they had our memories, but they think like us...
Dialogue: I don't know whether or not they had our memories, but they think like us...
trans: 我不知道他们是否有我们的记忆，但他们和我们一样思考...

Original: Yda:I wonder if my manikin remembers things even I don't...
Dialogue: I wonder if my manikin remembers things even I don't...
trans: 我想知道即使我不记得，我的模型是否还记得……

Original: Alphinaud:Locke's dark manikin was driven by his duty to protect.
Dialogue: Locke's dark manikin was driven by his duty to protect.
trans: Locke 的黑色人体模型被他保护的职责所驱使。

Original: Alphinaud:If his memories resided there...
Dialogue: If his memories resided there...
trans: 如果他的记忆在那里……

Original: Alphinaud:And his conduct was a result of him coming to terms with a will similar to his original's, then...
Dialogue: And his conduct was a result of him coming to terms with a will similar to his original's, then...
trans: 而他的行为是因为他接受了与他原来的遗嘱相似的遗嘱，然后……

Original: Y'shtola:You seem rather intrigued by something.
Dialogue: You seem rather intrigued by something.
trans: 你似乎对某事很感兴趣。

Original: Alphinaud:I am just trying to get some perspective. Although...I can't tell you anything at present.
Dialogue: I am just trying to get some perspective. Although...I can't tell you anything at present.
trans: 我只是想了解一些观点。

Original: Alphinaud:Even if the words of another bring back your memories Whoa!
Dialogue: Even if the words of another bring back your memories— Whoa!
trans: 就算别人的话勾起你的回忆——哇！

Original: Setzer:We've encountered turbulence!
Dialogue: We've encountered turbulence!
trans: 我们遇到了动荡！

Original: Setzer:The rudder... No, the gauge is going wild!
Dialogue: The rudder... No, the gauge is going wild!
trans: 方向舵……不，仪表太乱了！

Original: Yda:Can't you do anything!?
Dialogue: Can't you do anything!?
trans: 什么都不能做吗！？

Original: Setzer:Hold on tight! It's going to be a bumpy ride!
Dialogue: Hold on tight! It's going to be a bumpy ride!
trans: 紧紧抓住！

Original: Y'shtola:This is not the fault of the currents...
Dialogue: This is not the fault of the currents...
trans: 这不是电流的错...

Original: Lion:It looks like everyone's okay.
Dialogue: It looks like everyone's okay.
trans: 看起来大家都没事。

Original: Thancred:Although Locke's and Yuffie's eyes are rolling around from the turbulence.
Dialogue: Although Locke's and Yuffie's eyes are rolling around from the turbulence.
trans: 虽然洛克和尤菲的眼珠子都因为乱流而四处打转。

Original: Papalymo:The air is trembling...
Dialogue: The air is trembling...
trans: 空气在颤抖……

Original: Yda:Does that mean this area was summoned from our world?
Dialogue: Does that mean this area was summoned from our world?
trans: 也就是说，这片区域是从我们的世界召唤而来的吗？

Original: Mog:Kupo? I don't get that feeling, kupo...
Dialogue: Kupo? I don't get that feeling, kupo...
trans: 库波？

Original: Thancred:Do you think it's your pom-pom acting up again?
Dialogue: Do you think it's your pom-pom acting up again?
trans: 你认为这是你的绒球又在作怪吗？

Original: Mog:I can't say for sure, kupo...
Dialogue: I can't say for sure, kupo...
trans: 我不能肯定地说，库波...

Original: Lion:The atmosphere reminds me of home, too...
Dialogue: The atmosphere reminds me of home, too...
trans: 气氛也让我想起了家...

Original: Papalymo:No matter the case, it isn't the real thing.
Dialogue: No matter the case, it isn't the real thing.
trans: 不管怎样，这都不是真的。

Original: Papalymo:But we cannot relax...even if that may be the intention of the gods here.
Dialogue: But we cannot relax...even if that may be the intention of the gods here.
trans: 但我们不能放松……即使那可能是这里的神灵的意图。

Original: Y'shtola:Can you sense any planesgorgers?
Dialogue: Can you sense any planesgorgers?
trans: 你能感觉到任何位面吞噬者吗？

Original: Mog:My pom-pom's as broken as the ship's gauge, kupo...
Dialogue: My pom-pom's as broken as the ship's gauge, kupo...
trans: 我的绒球和船的仪表一样坏了，库波……

Original: Mog:But I think not sensing anything means something's up, kupo.
Dialogue: But I think not sensing anything means something's up, kupo.
trans: 但我认为没有感觉到任何东西意味着有问题，kupo。

Original: Papalymo:Someone may be interfering. We should investigate.
Dialogue: Someone may be interfering. We should investigate.
trans: 有人可能会干扰。

Original: Yda:Then what are we waiting for?
Dialogue: Then what are we waiting for?
trans: 那我们还等什么呢？

Original: Yda:We might meet someone's dark manikin and get some info!
Dialogue: We might meet someone's dark manikin and get some info!
trans: 我们可能会遇到某人的黑色人体模型并获得一些信息！

Original: Alphinaud:A dark manikin in a similar area to our home world...
Dialogue: A dark manikin in a similar area to our home world...
trans: 一个与我们的家乡世界相似区域的黑色人体模型......

Original: Alphinaud:We must proceed with caution.
Dialogue: We must proceed with caution.
trans: 我们必须谨慎行事。

Original: Caius:While you may be a puppet, you have some form of will...
Dialogue: While you may be a puppet, you have some form of will...
trans: 虽然你可能是一个木偶，但你有某种形式的意志......

Original: Caius:The brilliance you hold is in truth the lost memories of your original form.
Dialogue: The brilliance you hold is in truth the lost memories of your original form.
trans: 你所拥有的光辉，其实是你原本形态的失落记忆。

Original: Dark Manikin (Lyse):These memories are hers, as is this will...
Dialogue: These memories are hers, as is this will...
trans: 这些记忆是她的，这也是她的遗嘱……

Original: Dark Manikin (Lyse):I must get them to her. She needs to remember!
Dialogue: I must get them to her. She needs to remember!
trans: 我必须把它们交给她。

Original: Caius:Is that truly what you wish to do?
Dialogue: Is that truly what you wish to do?
trans: 那真的是你想做的吗？

Original: Dark Manikin (Lyse):What do you mean?
Dialogue: What do you mean?
trans: 你是什​​么意思？

Original: Caius:The will, the determination you have...
Dialogue: The will, the determination you have...
trans: 你的意志，你的决心……

Original: Caius:The very memories that drive you... Will she not despair upon getting them back?
Dialogue: The very memories that drive you... Will she not despair upon getting them back?
trans: 正是那些驱使你的记忆……她会不会因为把它们找回来而绝望？

Original: Dark Manikin (Lyse):What could you possibly understand? Get out of my way.
Dialogue: What could you possibly understand? Get out of my way.
trans: 你能理解什么？

Original: Caius:It is true. I hail from another world. It may be difficult for me to comprehend...
Dialogue: It is true. I hail from another world. It may be difficult for me to comprehend...
trans: 是真的。

Original: Caius:But the pain of loss is one that affects all worlds, is it not?
Dialogue: But the pain of loss is one that affects all worlds, is it not?
trans: 但是失去的痛苦是一种影响所有世界的痛苦，不是吗？

Original: Dark Manikin (Lyse):You might be right. She may be happier without these memories, but...!
Dialogue: You might be right. She may be happier without these memories, but...!
trans: 你可能是对的。

Original: Dark Manikin (Lyse):But without her determination...she would no longer be herself.
Dialogue: But without her determination...she would no longer be herself.
trans: 但如果没有她的决心……她将不再是她自己。

Original: Caius:And what about you? You are but an imitation, a puppet.
Dialogue: And what about you? You are but an imitation, a puppet.
trans: 那你呢？

Original: Dark Manikin (Lyse):What are you trying to say!?
Dialogue: What are you trying to say!?
trans: 你想说什么！？

Original: Caius:This world was created to be a place of respite...
Dialogue: This world was created to be a place of respite...
trans: 这个世界被创造为一个喘息的地方......

Original: Caius:The goddess Materia purposely deprived them of their sad memories to give them the rest they deserved.
Dialogue: The goddess Materia purposely deprived them of their sad memories to give them the rest they deserved.
trans: 女神马特里亚故意剥夺了他们悲伤的记忆，让他们得到应有的休息。

Original: Caius:Though a false happiness it may be, such is permitted in this world.
Dialogue: Though a false happiness it may be, such is permitted in this world.
trans: 尽管这可能是一种虚假的幸福，但这在这个世界上是被允许的。

Original: Caius:Would you steal that respite from her?
Dialogue: Would you steal that respite from her?
trans: 你会偷走她的喘息机会吗？

Original: Dark Manikin (Lyse):There is no such thing as respite here!
Dialogue: There is no such thing as respite here!
trans: 这里没有喘息之类的东西！

Original: Dark Manikin (Lyse):Everyone here needs to regain their memories and their will to stand and fight.
Dialogue: Everyone here needs to regain their memories and their will to stand and fight.
trans: 这里的每一个人都需要找回记忆，重新站起来战斗的意志。

Original: Caius:Though your emotions may be a farce, if your memories are real, then you can act human...
Dialogue: Though your emotions may be a farce, if your memories are real, then you can act human...
trans: 虽然你的情绪可能是一场闹剧，但如果你的记忆是真实的，那么你就可以扮演人类……

Original: Dark Manikin (Lyse):Leave me alone. I must get these memories to her!
Dialogue: Leave me alone. I must get these memories to her!
trans: 请别打扰我。

Original: Caius:The one you need to fight is not me.
Dialogue: The one you need to fight is not me.
trans: 你要打的不是我。

Original: Caius:This world is your... No. This world is connected to your original's, is it not?
Dialogue: This world is your... No. This world is connected to your original's, is it not?
trans: 这个世界是你的……不，这个世界和你原来的世界相连，不是吗？

Original: Caius:Now then... Just what kind of beast was the Shinryu there?
Dialogue: Now then... Just what kind of beast was the Shinryu there?
trans: 那么…… 那里的神龙到底是什么畜生？

Original: Caius:It is "your" duty to protect the world, isn't it? Which is more important?
Dialogue: It is "your" duty to protect the world, isn't it? Which is more important?
trans: 保护世界是“你”的职责，不是吗？

Original: Dark Manikin (Lyse):I... I must do something...
Dialogue: I... I must do something...
trans: 我……我必须做点什么……

Original: Dark Manikin (Lyse):I'll go. I must!
Dialogue: I'll go. I must!
trans: 我会去。

Original: Caius:A puppet without will...
Dialogue: A puppet without will...
trans: 没有意志的人偶……

Original: Caius:Sadness should be the burden of a hollow puppet.
Dialogue: Sadness should be the burden of a hollow puppet.
trans: 悲伤应该是一个空心木偶的负担。

Original: Caius:Because even determination borne of loss...will invite naught but tragedy.
Dialogue: Because even determination borne of loss...will invite naught but tragedy.
trans: 因为即使是失去的决心……只会带来悲剧。

Original: ???:Summoning humans from other worlds and altering their memories to suit your purposes...
Dialogue: Summoning humans from other worlds and altering their memories to suit your purposes...
trans: 从其他世界召唤人类并改变他们的记忆以适应您的目的......

Original: ???:Or feeding them excess information to fan the flames of war between them...
Dialogue: Or feeding them excess information to fan the flames of war between them...
trans: 或者向他们提供过多的信息来煽动他们之间的战火……

Original: ???:...The gods can be so selfish.
Dialogue: ...The gods can be so selfish.
trans: ……神也可以这么自私。

Original: Bartz:Huh? I thought I saw someone just now.
Dialogue: Huh? I thought I saw someone just now.
trans: 嗯？

Original: Lion:Me, too.
Dialogue: Me, too.
trans: 我也是。

Original: Krile:Wait up! What are you doing, running off like that!?
Dialogue: Wait up! What are you doing, running off like that!?
trans: 等等！

Original: Bartz:I thought I saw a kid over here.
Dialogue: I thought I saw a kid over here.
trans: 我以为我在这里看到了一个孩子。

Original: Alisaie:But it could have been an enemy, could it not? Running off alone is dangerous.
Dialogue: But it could have been an enemy, could it not? Running off alone is dangerous.
trans: 但它可能是敌人，不是吗？

Original: Thancred:If it were really a child, it couldn't have been an enemy. They might be someone's friend or family.
Dialogue: If it were really a child, it couldn't have been an enemy. They might be someone's friend or family.
trans: 如果真的是小孩子，就不可能是敌人。

Original: Alisaie:This place looks like our world. Things are not always what they appear.
Dialogue: This place looks like our world. Things are not always what they appear.
trans: 这个地方看起来像我们的世界。

Original: Thancred:You mean we need to be on our guard even with kids?
Dialogue: You mean we need to be on our guard even with kids?
trans: 你的意思是即使有孩子我们也需要保持警惕？

Original: Prishe:What did the child look like? Could you see anything?
Dialogue: What did the child look like? Could you see anything?
trans: 孩子长什么样？

Original: Lion:Not really...
Dialogue: Not really...
trans: 并不真地...

Original: Bartz:I think it was a little boy with golden hair. He was dressed nicely.
Dialogue: I think it was a little boy with golden hair. He was dressed nicely.
trans: 我想那是一个金头发的小男孩。

Original: Prishe:That's not much to go on... Have I seen someone like that... No, it couldn't be...
Dialogue: That's not much to go on... Have I seen someone like that... No, it couldn't be...
trans: 没什么好说的……我见过这样的人吗……不，不可能……

Original: Lion:...It might be them. That's why I wanted to see his face.
Dialogue: ...It might be them. That's why I wanted to see his face.
trans: ……可能是他们。

Original: Alisaie:Is he from your world?
Dialogue: Is he from your world?
trans: 他来自你的世界吗？

Original: Lion:I can't say for sure without seeing his face. I don't want to risk confusing everyone...
Dialogue: I can't say for sure without seeing his face. I don't want to risk confusing everyone...
trans: 没有看到他的脸，我不能肯定地说。

Original: Thancred:He walked off, didn't he? If we go now, we may be able to catch up.
Dialogue: He walked off, didn't he? If we go now, we may be able to catch up.
trans: 他走开了，不是吗？

Original: Krile:If he's really a kid, then we can't let him wander around alone...
Dialogue: If he's really a kid, then we can't let him wander around alone...
trans: 如果他真的是个孩子，那我们就不能让他一个人到处乱跑……

Original: Thancred:No objections here. It's easier to search when we have an objective.
Dialogue: No objections here. It's easier to search when we have an objective.
trans: 这里没有异议。

Original: Alisaie:Indeed. Whether he be enemy or ally, any information is valuable.
Dialogue: Indeed. Whether he be enemy or ally, any information is valuable.
trans: 的确。

Original: Bartz:Then let's go after him!
Dialogue: Then let's go after him!
trans: 那我们去追他吧！

Original: Lion:He went that way. But...I wonder if it's okay...
Dialogue: He went that way. But...I wonder if it's okay...
trans: 他就那样走了。

Original: Prishe:Don't worry so much. Whatever happens, everyone here's with us.
Dialogue: Don't worry so much. Whatever happens, everyone here's with us.
trans: 别那么担心。

Original: Lion:You're right. But we should be careful.
Dialogue: You're right. But we should be careful.
trans: 你说得对。

Original: Thancred:It would be nice if it would stay simple, but...
Dialogue: It would be nice if it would stay simple, but...
trans: 如果它保持简单就好了，但是......

Original: Alisaie:This isn't the first time things have gotten complicated.
Dialogue: This isn't the first time things have gotten complicated.
trans: 这不是第一次事情变得复杂。

Original: Bartz:Alright! Let's go!
Dialogue: Alright! Let's go!
trans: 好吧！

Original: Maria:Oh no! Are you okay!?
Dialogue: Oh no! Are you okay!?
trans: 不好了！

Original: Fang:Hey, are you alright? I'll go call for help!
Dialogue: Hey, are you alright? I'll go call for help!
trans: 嘿，你还好吗？

Original: Maria:Please hold on... Everything will be okay.
Dialogue: Please hold on... Everything will be okay.
trans: 请坚持……一切都会好起来的。

Original: Rem:I've given her first aid, though I don't know how well magic works on dark manikins...
Dialogue: I've given her first aid, though I don't know how well magic works on dark manikins...
trans: 我给了她急救，虽然我不知道魔法对黑暗人体模型的效果如何……

Original: Dark Manikin (Lyse):Are you the warriors from the World of Light?
Dialogue: Are you the warriors from the World of Light?
trans: 你们是光之世界的战士吗？

Original: Fang:Seems like it, at least. And who are you?
Dialogue: Seems like it, at least. And who are you?
trans: 至少看起来是这样。

Original: Dark Manikin (Lyse):I can't yet say... There is something I have to do.
Dialogue: I can't yet say... There is something I have to do.
trans: 我还不能说……有些事情我必须做。

Original: Maria:Wait! Please tell us what happened!
Dialogue: Wait! Please tell us what happened!
trans: 等待！

Original: Dark Manikin (Lyse):I must do something...
Dialogue: I must do something...
trans: 我必须做点什么...

Original: Rem:We know that you have a duty to protect the World of Darkness.
Dialogue: We know that you have a duty to protect the World of Darkness.
trans: 我们知道你有责任保护黑暗世界。

Original: Zidane:Our objective is the same. Let us help you.
Dialogue: Our objective is the same. Let us help you.
trans: 我们的目标是一样的。

Original: Dark Manikin (Lyse):I can't... This is something I must do alone.
Dialogue: I can't... This is something I must do alone.
trans: 我不能……这是我必须一个人做的事情。

Original: Zidane:H-hey! Wait!
Dialogue: H-hey! Wait!
trans: 嘿嘿！

Original: Zidane:I got the feeling I've seen that kid before.
Dialogue: I got the feeling I've seen that kid before.
trans: 我觉得我以前见过那个孩子。

Original: Fang:That so? We don't have any comrades who look like that.
Dialogue: That so? We don't have any comrades who look like that.
trans: 这么？

Original: Yda:It can't be...
Dialogue: It can't be...
trans: 这不可能...

Original: Faris:Do you know her?
Dialogue: Do you know her?
trans: 你认识她吗？

Original: Yda:She's...my little sister, Lyse.
Dialogue: She's...my little sister, Lyse.
trans: 她是……我的妹妹，莉丝。

Original: Rem:You have a little sister!? I had no idea...
Dialogue: You have a little sister!? I had no idea...
trans: 你有妹妹！？

Original: Maria:That was her dark manikin. Perhaps the real Lyse has been summoned here, too.
Dialogue: That was her dark manikin. Perhaps the real Lyse has been summoned here, too.
trans: 那是她的黑色人体模型。

Original: Zidane:Does that mean her dark manikin appeared even before the original did?
Dialogue: Does that mean her dark manikin appeared even before the original did?
trans: 这是否意味着她的黑色人体模型甚至比原来的人体模型更早出现？

Original: Zidane:In that case, it means Yda's sister is in this world somewhere.
Dialogue: In that case, it means Yda's sister is in this world somewhere.
trans: 那样的话，就意味着伊达的妹妹就在这个世界的某个地方。

Original: Zidane:Should we go look for her?
Dialogue: Should we go look for her?
trans: 我们应该去找她吗？

Original: Papalymo:......
Papalymo:What do you want to do, Yda?
Dialogue: What do you want to do, Yda?
trans: 你想做什么，Yda？

Original: Yda:...Let's go after her. I want to know for sure.
Dialogue: ...Let's go after her. I want to know for sure.
trans: ……我们去追她吧。

Original: Yda:I need to know why she appeared here.
Dialogue: I need to know why she appeared here.
trans: 我需要知道她为什么会出现在这里。

Original: Faris:Sounds complicated.
Dialogue: Sounds complicated.
trans: 听起来很复杂。

Original: Faris:But if that's your little sister, then it's best you two talk.
Dialogue: But if that's your little sister, then it's best you two talk.
trans: 但如果那是你的妹妹，那么你们两个最好谈谈。

Original: Faris:...Huh? Not all dark manikins can talk, can they?
Dialogue: ...Huh? Not all dark manikins can talk, can they?

Original: Fang:Something feels off. It feels like she was hiding something.
Dialogue: Something feels off. It feels like she was hiding something.
trans: 感觉有些不对劲。

Original: Yda:I know. But I can't say anything without my memories.
Dialogue: I know. But I can't say anything without my memories.
trans: 我知道。

Original: Yda:Even if I speak now, it might turn out not to be true.
Dialogue: Even if I speak now, it might turn out not to be true.
trans: 即使我现在说出来，也可能不是真的。

Original: Papalymo:Indeed... I am in the same situation with my memories.
Dialogue: Indeed... I am in the same situation with my memories.
trans: 果然……我的记忆也是如此。

Original: Papalymo:We lost sight of that boy we saw earlier, and now we're chasing after Lyse.
Dialogue: We lost sight of that boy we saw earlier, and now we're chasing after Lyse.
trans: 我们之前看到的那个男孩不见了，现在我们在追 Lyse。

Original: Fang:That's fine. If they're your family, it's best you talk.
Dialogue: That's fine. If they're your family, it's best you talk.
trans: 没关系。

Original: Yda:Thank you. Let's go.
Dialogue: Thank you. Let's go.
trans: 谢谢。

Original: Alisaie:The dark manikin looked like Lyse...
Dialogue: The dark manikin looked like Lyse...
trans: 黑色的人体模型看起来像 Lyse...

Original: Alphinaud:Then she holds brilliance, that which houses our memories.
Dialogue: Then she holds brilliance, that which houses our memories.
trans: 然后她拥有光彩，承载着我们的记忆。

Original: Alphinaud:If she looks like that, though, it means her memories are...
Dialogue: If she looks like that, though, it means her memories are...
trans: 不过，如果她看起来像那样，那就意味着她的记忆是……

Original: Serah:Do you two know something about Yda's sister?
Dialogue: Do you two know something about Yda's sister?
trans: 你们两个知道 Yda 姐姐的事吗？

Original: Alphinaud:Yes. She... On second thought, I don't know how much has been said already.
Dialogue: Yes. She... On second thought, I don't know how much has been said already.
trans: 是的。

Original: Kain:Quite an evasive answer.
Dialogue: Quite an evasive answer.
trans: 相当含糊的回答。

Original: Serah:There are discrepancies in memory even among people from the same world, right?
Dialogue: There are discrepancies in memory even among people from the same world, right?
trans: 即使是同一个世界的人，记忆也会有出入吧？

Original: Yuri:Is that why they called you "Master" and "Lady" when you first arrived?
Dialogue: Is that why they called you "Master" and "Lady" when you first arrived?
trans: 这就是你刚来的时候他们叫你“少爷”“小姐”的原因吗？

Original: Alisaie:That is correct. Their memories are from a time earlier than ours.
Dialogue: That is correct. Their memories are from a time earlier than ours.
trans: 那是对的。

Original: Alphinaud:Several of those who came from our world...
Dialogue: Several of those who came from our world...
trans: 一些来自我们世界的人...

Original: Alphinaud:have lost a fair bit of their memories.
Dialogue: have lost a fair bit of their memories.
trans: 失去了相当多的记忆。

Original: Serah:Is that because they're painful memories to Yda and the others?
Dialogue: Is that because they're painful memories to Yda and the others?
trans: 那是因为它们对Yda和其他人来说是痛苦的回忆吗？

Original: Alisaie:Seen objectively...yes. You would not think them happy memories.
Dialogue: Seen objectively...yes. You would not think them happy memories.
trans: 客观地看...是的。

Original: Alphinaud:It seems like Yda, Y'shtola, and the others have been here since it was possible for it to be a place of respite.
Dialogue: It seems like Yda, Y'shtola, and the others have been here since it was possible for it to be a place of respite.
trans: Yda、Y'shtola 和其他人似乎一直在这里，因为它有可能成为一个喘息的地方。

Original: Serah:Yes. It was corroded by Torsions, but they were here since the World of Light was well.
Dialogue: Yes. It was corroded by Torsions, but they were here since the World of Light was well.
trans: 是的。

Original: Alisaie:In which case, it is possible that Materia took their memories to make it a place of true respite.
Dialogue: In which case, it is possible that Materia took their memories to make it a place of true respite.
trans: 在这种情况下，Materia 可能会带走他们的记忆，使之成为真正的休憩之所。

Original: Alphinaud:However, by the time we were summoned, she needed warriors with strong wills.
Dialogue: However, by the time we were summoned, she needed warriors with strong wills.
trans: 然而，在我们被召唤的时候，她需要意志坚强的战士。

Original: Alphinaud:So she let us keep our memories of a time we had the determination to fight.
Dialogue: So she let us keep our memories of a time we had the determination to fight.
trans: 所以她让我们记住了我们下定决心去战斗的那段时光。

Original: Warrior of Light:So a time is coming when they will have to face some painful memories?
Dialogue: So a time is coming when they will have to face some painful memories?
trans: 所以他们将不得不面对一些痛苦的回忆的时候到了？

Original: Yuri:Are you worried?
Dialogue: Are you worried?
trans: 你担心吗？

Original: Warrior of Light:I know for certain that everyone possesses a stout heart, and the day of facing painful memories will come for all of us.
Dialogue: I know for certain that everyone possesses a stout heart, and the day of facing painful memories will come for all of us.
trans: 我深知每个人都有一颗坚强的心，面对痛苦回忆的那一天终将到来。

Original: Warrior of Light:I believe that retrieving brilliance and our memories...is the right thing to do.
Dialogue: I believe that retrieving brilliance and our memories...is the right thing to do.
trans: 我相信找回光彩和我们的记忆……是正确的做法。

Original: Warrior of Light:However, it seems like the more we pursue light, the deeper we plunge into darkness.
Dialogue: However, it seems like the more we pursue light, the deeper we plunge into darkness.
trans: 然而，我们似乎越是追求光明，就越是陷入黑暗。

Original: Warrior of Light:Will there really be light at our journey's end?
Dialogue: Will there really be light at our journey's end?
trans: 我们旅程的尽头真的会有光明吗？

Original: Yuri:Are you sure you're not overthinking it? Getting your memories back isn't the same as "darkness"...
Dialogue: Are you sure you're not overthinking it? Getting your memories back isn't the same as "darkness"...
trans: 你确定你没有想太多？

Original: Warrior of Light:But isn't it troubling to have to unravel your own memories?
Dialogue: But isn't it troubling to have to unravel your own memories?
trans: 但解开自己的记忆不是很麻烦吗？

Original: Alisaie:No matter how dark the path may be, standing still will get you nowhere.
Dialogue: No matter how dark the path may be, standing still will get you nowhere.
trans: 无论前路多么黑暗，原地踏步也无济于事。

Original: Alisaie:Being forced to live in a world of false respite without your memories...
Dialogue: Being forced to live in a world of false respite without your memories...
trans: 被迫生活在一个没有你记忆的虚假喘息的世界里……

Original: Alphinaud:Precisely. I cannot abide by this.
Dialogue: Precisely. I cannot abide by this.
trans: 恰恰。

Original: Alisaie:We are not the pawns of the gods. We are all citizens of the same world.
Dialogue: We are not the pawns of the gods. We are all citizens of the same world.
trans: 我们不是众神的棋子。

Original: Alphinaud:If we cannot choose our battlefield, then we should be given our memories to fight with our own wills.
Dialogue: If we cannot choose our battlefield, then we should be given our memories to fight with our own wills.
trans: 如果我们不能选择自己的战场，那么就应该赋予我们记忆，让我们以自己的意志去战斗。

Original: Alphinaud:I know that Y'shtola, Papalymo, Thancred, and even Yda would agree.
Dialogue: I know that Y'shtola, Papalymo, Thancred, and even Yda would agree.
trans: 我知道 Y'shtola、Papalymo、Thancred，甚至 Yda 都会同意。

Original: Kain:Even if the memories they have forgotten are bitter ones?
Dialogue: Even if the memories they have forgotten are bitter ones?
trans: 就算他们遗忘的记忆是苦涩的？

Original: Alisaie:Did Cecil not say the same thing before?
Dialogue: Did Cecil not say the same thing before?
trans: 之前塞西尔不是也说过同样的话吗？

Original: Kain:Yes... You are right. However painful your memories may be, one cannot pretend they did not happen.
Dialogue: Yes... You are right. However painful your memories may be, one cannot pretend they did not happen.
trans: 是的你是对的。

Original: Alisaie:Determination and feelings, the words of those who encouraged you... I cannot agree that forgetting is better.
Dialogue: Determination and feelings, the words of those who encouraged you... I cannot agree that forgetting is better.
trans: 决心和感情，鼓励你的人的话……我不能同意遗忘更好。

Original: Serah:Aren't you worried that they'll be shocked?
Dialogue: Aren't you worried that they'll be shocked?
trans: 不怕他们受惊吗？

Original: Alisaie:It's better than not knowing.
Dialogue: It's better than not knowing.
trans: 总比不知道好。

Original: Alphinaud:If Lyse has appeared, that means the time has come.
Dialogue: If Lyse has appeared, that means the time has come.
trans: 如果莉瑟出现了，那就是时候到了。

Original: Alphinaud:I realize that you are worried for your friends, but...
Dialogue: I realize that you are worried for your friends, but...
trans: 我知道你很担心你的朋友，但是...

Original: Alphinaud:We want to be their strength. That is what we can do as those who have retained their memories.
Dialogue: We want to be their strength. That is what we can do as those who have retained their memories.
trans: 我们想成为他们的力量。

Original: Kain:The ones that hold the key are puppets from the World of Darkness...
Dialogue: The ones that hold the key are puppets from the World of Darkness...
trans: 掌握钥匙的，是暗之世界的傀儡……

Original: Kain:It is best we see whether they are being controlled, their wills used against them.
Dialogue: It is best we see whether they are being controlled, their wills used against them.
trans: 我们最好看看他们是否受到控制，他们的意志是否被用来对付他们。

Original: Alisaie:...Yes. We must ensure that Lyse's frank and forthright personality is not being abused.
Dialogue: ...Yes. We must ensure that Lyse's frank and forthright personality is not being abused.

Original: Dark Manikin (Papalymo):I won't let you do as you please, looking down on us because we can't do anything...
Dialogue: I won't let you do as you please, looking down on us because we can't do anything...
trans: 我不会让你为所欲为，因为我们无能为力而看不起我们……

Original: Kam'lanaut:Humans are all inferior beings, so what can a lowly puppet do?
Dialogue: Humans are all inferior beings, so what can a lowly puppet do?
trans: 人类都是低等生物，低等的傀儡能做什么？

Original: Kam'lanaut:I am allowing you to choose your master.
Dialogue: I am allowing you to choose your master.
trans: 我允许你选择你的主人。

Original: Kam'lanaut:If you cannot feel honor even in that, then you should understand your place.
Dialogue: If you cannot feel honor even in that, then you should understand your place.
trans: 如果你连那样都感觉不到荣誉，那么你应该明白你的位置。

Original: Dark Manikin (Papalymo):Even without emotions, we can still fight. That is why I'm here.
Dialogue: Even without emotions, we can still fight. That is why I'm here.
trans: 即使没有情绪，我们仍然可以战斗。

Original: Kam'lanaut:Give up. There is nothing you can do.
Dialogue: Give up. There is nothing you can do.
trans: 放弃。

Original: Dark Manikin (Papalymo):There is. The memories in my heart tell me to fight back.
Dialogue: There is. The memories in my heart tell me to fight back.
trans: 有。

Original: Kam'lanaut:Insolent fool!
Dialogue: Insolent fool!
trans: 无礼的傻瓜！

Original: Yda:Papalymo!
Dialogue: Papalymo!
trans: 爸爸！

Original: Yda:Papalymo! Papalymo's in danger!
Dialogue: Papalymo! Papalymo's in danger!
trans: 爸爸！

Original: Papalymo:Calm down. Do not panic.
Dialogue: Calm down. Do not panic.
trans: 冷静下来。

Original: Shantotto:Oh my, what have we here? In grand clothing do you appear!
Dialogue: Oh my, what have we here? In grand clothing do you appear!
trans: 天哪，我们这里有什么？

Original: Shantotto:In fine robes have you yourself furled for an outing to another world? Ohohoho!
Dialogue: In fine robes have you yourself furled for an outing to another world? Ohohoho!
trans: 你自己穿着漂亮的长袍准备去另一个世界郊游吗？

Original: Lion:Professor Shantotto! Just how far do you intend to...
Dialogue: Professor Shantotto! Just how far do you intend to...
trans: 山托托教授！

Original: Shantotto:Worry not, my little friend, for I know what it is you wish to have said.
Dialogue: Worry not, my little friend, for I know what it is you wish to have said.
trans: 别担心，我的小朋友，因为我知道你想说什么。

Original: Shantotto:Seeing the archduke of Jeuno on the chase must mean he has much time to waste.
Dialogue: Seeing the archduke of Jeuno on the chase must mean he has much time to waste.
trans: 看到朱诺大公在追逐，一定意味着他有很多时间可以浪费。

Original: Kam'lanaut:Engaging in paltry nonsense is beneath my station.
Dialogue: Engaging in paltry nonsense is beneath my station.
trans: 从事微不足道的废话是我的立场。

Original: Kam'lanaut:I merely needed to gather the necessary...tools.
Dialogue: I merely needed to gather the necessary...tools.
trans: 我只需要收集必要的……工具。

Original: Yda:I can't watch this any longer! I'm going to help!
Dialogue: I can't watch this any longer! I'm going to help!
trans: 我不能再看这个了！

Original: Papalymo:I told you to be calm, did I not?
Dialogue: I told you to be calm, did I not?
trans: 我告诉过你要冷静，不是吗？

Original: Papalymo:That dark manikin has my form, and therefore a fragment of my power. He can overcome this.
Dialogue: That dark manikin has my form, and therefore a fragment of my power. He can overcome this.
trans: 那个黑色的人体模型有我的形态，因此是我力量的一部分。

Original: Kam'lanaut:So this puppet controls more magic power than it should because of its original...
Dialogue: So this puppet controls more magic power than it should because of its original...
trans: 所以这个傀儡控制的魔力超出了它应有的程度，因为它本来就……

Original: Yda:He's trapped!
Dialogue: He's trapped!
trans: 他被困住了！

Original: Kam'lanaut:With this, I can control the dragon that devours dimensions should it still be a larvae.
Dialogue: With this, I can control the dragon that devours dimensions should it still be a larvae.
trans: 有了这个，我就能控制吞噬次元的龙，如果它还是幼虫的话。

Original: Lion:What do you plan to do to this place!? This is different than our own world!
Dialogue: What do you plan to do to this place!? This is different than our own world!
trans: 你打算对这个地方做什么！？

Original: Kam'lanaut:I can rewrite the laws of this world.
Dialogue: I can rewrite the laws of this world.
trans: 我可以改写这个世界的法律。

Original: Dark Manikin (Papalymo):I won't let you get away with this. There is still something I can do...
Dialogue: I won't let you get away with this. There is still something I can do...
trans: 我不会让你逃脱的。

Original: Dark Manikin (Papalymo):Papalymo from the World of Light... It is up to you now.
Dialogue: Papalymo from the World of Light... It is up to you now.
trans: 来自光之世界的Papalymo……现在就看你的了。

Original: Dark Manikin (Papalymo):Take care of Yda.
Dialogue: Take care of Yda.
trans: 照顾尤达。

Original: Yda:Wh-what!? Wait!
Dialogue: Wh-what!? Wait!
trans: 什-什么！？

Original: Papalymo:...I will.
Dialogue: ...I will.

Original: Yda:Why did you say yes!? We could have saved him!
Dialogue: Why did you say yes!? We could have saved him!
trans: 你为什么说是！？

Original: Yda:That dark manikin's brilliance might have had your memories in it!
Dialogue: That dark manikin's brilliance might have had your memories in it!
trans: 那个黑色人体模型的光芒，说不定有你的记忆在里面！

Original: Papalymo:If he has memories, then his will... It means he has a plan.
Dialogue: If he has memories, then his will... It means he has a plan.
trans: 如果他有记忆，那么他的意志……就说明他有计划。

Original: Papalymo:I don't quite know his exact intentions, but as his original, I have no doubt there is one.
Dialogue: I don't quite know his exact intentions, but as his original, I have no doubt there is one.
trans: 我不太清楚他的确切意图，但作为他的原意，我毫不怀疑是有的。

Original: Yda:That may be true, but...if we don't do something...
Dialogue: That may be true, but...if we don't do something...
trans: 这可能是真的，但是……如果我们不做某事……

Original: Lion:Let's see where they went. We know what Kam'lanaut is after.
Dialogue: Let's see where they went. We know what Kam'lanaut is after.
trans: 让我们看看他们去了哪里。

Original: Shantotto:Indeed. Before he chose to disappear, he made his plan to control Shinryu's larvae very clear.
Dialogue: Indeed. Before he chose to disappear, he made his plan to control Shinryu's larvae very clear.
trans: 的确。

Original: Papalymo:Let us continue the search, if you don't mind.
Dialogue: Let us continue the search, if you don't mind.
trans: 如果您不介意，让我们继续搜索。

Original: Yda:Yes, let's...
Dialogue: Yes, let's...
trans: 是的，让我们...

Original: Yda:Huh? Didn't we come through here before?
Dialogue: Huh? Didn't we come through here before?
trans: 嗯？

Original: Galuf:Yes. It seems we've been going around in circles.
Dialogue: Yes. It seems we've been going around in circles.
trans: 是的。

Original: Lion:How strange. I thought for sure Papalymo could lead us out of here.
Dialogue: How strange. I thought for sure Papalymo could lead us out of here.
trans: 多么奇怪。

Original: Shantotto:Ohoho! Does your sense of direction need some inspection?
Dialogue: Ohoho! Does your sense of direction need some inspection?
trans: 呵呵！

Original: Papalymo:I'm doing my best, Professor Shantotto.
Dialogue: I'm doing my best, Professor Shantotto.
trans: 我正在尽力而为，Shantotto 教授。

Original: Shantotto:Allow me to make up for my rudeness with my shrewdness. It seems some false projections are at play to try and lead us astray.
Dialogue: Allow me to make up for my rudeness with my shrewdness. It seems some false projections are at play to try and lead us astray.
trans: 请允许我以我的精明来弥补我的粗鲁。

Original: Yda:Perhaps I'm too stupid to understand, but...aren't we just lost?
Dialogue: Perhaps I'm too stupid to understand, but...aren't we just lost?
trans: 也许我太笨了，无法理解，但是……我们不就是迷路了吗？

Original: Lion:It seems like there's some magic or curse preventing us from going further.
Dialogue: It seems like there's some magic or curse preventing us from going further.
trans: 似乎有一些魔法或诅咒阻止我们走得更远。

Original: Galuf:"Too stupid"...?
Dialogue: "Too stupid"...?

Original: Galuf:Yda... Have you lost your confidence? Or maybe you're just uncertain?
Dialogue: Yda... Have you lost your confidence? Or maybe you're just uncertain?
trans: Yda……你失去信心了吗？

Original: Papalymo:There are some extenuating circumstances... It's no surprise that she's shaken.
Dialogue: There are some extenuating circumstances... It's no surprise that she's shaken.
trans: 有一些情有可原……她动摇了也就不足为奇了。

Original: Krile:Can we help?
Dialogue: Can we help?
trans: 我们能帮忙吗？

Original: Papalymo:It's something we have to resolve on our own, I'm afraid. For now, please just watch over her.
Dialogue: It's something we have to resolve on our own, I'm afraid. For now, please just watch over her.
trans: 恐怕这是我们必须自己解决的事情。

Original: Papalymo:When the need for help arises, I will be sure to ask for your assistance.
Dialogue: When the need for help arises, I will be sure to ask for your assistance.
trans: 当需要帮助的时候，我一定会请求你的帮助。

Original: Papalymo:Now I have a suggestion: why not split up and search for a way out?
Dialogue: Now I have a suggestion why not split up and search for a way out?
trans: 现在我有一个建议，为什么不分头寻找出路呢？

Original: Papalymo:Even if I cannot dispel this magic, perhaps one of our otherworldly friends can.
Dialogue: Even if I cannot dispel this magic, perhaps one of our otherworldly friends can.
trans: 即使我无法驱散这种魔法，也许我们来自另一个世界的朋友可以。

Original: Lion:Good point. I'll go tell the others.
Dialogue: Good point. I'll go tell the others.
trans: 好点子。

Original: Papalymo:Let's try not to get too separated. Once we find any clues, we'll regroup immediately.
Dialogue: Let's try not to get too separated. Once we find any clues, we'll regroup immediately.
trans: 让我们尽量不要离得太远。

Original: ???:Are you lost?
Dialogue: Are you lost?
trans: 你迷路了吗？

Original: Bartz:It's you!
Dialogue: It's you!
trans: 是你！

Original: Warrior of Light:It seems you are alone. Who are you?
Dialogue: It seems you are alone. Who are you?
trans: 看来你是一个人。

Original: Eald'narche:I am Eald'narche.
Dialogue: I am Eald'narche.
trans: 我是 Eald'narche。

Original: Eald'narche:My title won't be useful in this world.
Dialogue: My title won't be useful in this world.
trans: 我的头衔在这个世界上没有用。

Original: Galuf:If you tell us from where you came, perhaps we can find your friends.
Dialogue: If you tell us from where you came, perhaps we can find your friends.
trans: 如果你告诉我们你从哪里来，也许我们可以找到你的朋友。

Original: Galuf:Warriors from all different worlds have been summoned here.
Dialogue: Warriors from all different worlds have been summoned here.
trans: 来自不同世界的战士被召唤到这里。

Original: Eald'narche:I was invited by the gods. They said the battle is spreading, no?
Dialogue: I was invited by the gods. They said the battle is spreading, no?
trans: 我被神邀请了。

Original: Papalymo:Then you know what's happening.
Dialogue: Then you know what's happening.
trans: 然后你知道发生了什么。

Original: Krile:Come with us. It must not be easy on your own.
Dialogue: Come with us. It must not be easy on your own.
trans: 跟我们来。

Original: Eald'narche:Me? With...you? I must decline.
Dialogue: Me? With...you? I must decline.
trans: 我？

Original: Eald'narche:I must proceed with haste. The exit to this forest is just ahead.
Dialogue: I must proceed with haste. The exit to this forest is just ahead.
trans: 我必须赶快行动。

Original: Papalymo:How do you know that?
Dialogue: How do you know that?
trans: 你怎么知道？

Original: Eald'narche:The one who cast this spell must have deemed this enough.
Dialogue: The one who cast this spell must have deemed this enough.
trans: 施展这个法术的人，想必是觉得这样就够了。

Original: Eald'narche:Isn't it best you hurry if you feel like you're being stalled?
Dialogue: Isn't it best you hurry if you feel like you're being stalled?
trans: 如果你觉得自己被拖延了，不是最好快点吗？

Original: Yda:He sure ran off quick... I can't tell if he's an enemy or ally.
Dialogue: He sure ran off quick... I can't tell if he's an enemy or ally.
trans: 他跑得真快……我分不清他是敌是友。

Original: Papalymo:Indeed... But what he said about the exit is true. The disturbance in the aether is weakening.
Dialogue: Indeed... But what he said about the exit is true. The disturbance in the aether is weakening.
trans: 确实……不过他说的出口是真的。

Original: Warrior of Light:In that case, we had best make our way out of here. Many curious figures have appeared here.
Dialogue: In that case, we had best make our way out of here. Many curious figures have appeared here.
trans: 在那种情况下，我们最好离开这里。

Original: Galuf:It was just like that boy said. We made it out of the forest.
Dialogue: It was just like that boy said. We made it out of the forest.
trans: 就像那个男孩说的那样。

Original: Onion Knight:Whoever wanted to stall us in those woods got what they wanted... Huh!?
Dialogue: Whoever wanted to stall us in those woods got what they wanted... Huh!?
trans: 谁想在那些树林里拖我们的后腿，他们得到了他们想要的……哈！？

Original: Dark Manikin (Lyse):Sorry! Coming through!
Dialogue: Sorry! Coming through!
trans: 对不起！

Original: Zidane:Wasn't that Yda's sister!?
Dialogue: Wasn't that Yda's sister!?
trans: 那不是尤达的妹妹吗！？

Original: Kam'lanaut:Why are you here? Have you forgotten who I am?
Dialogue: Why are you here? Have you forgotten who I am?
trans: 你为什么在这？

Original: Kam'lanaut:That I said puppets are nothing more than toys to be manipulated by humans...
Dialogue: That I said puppets are nothing more than toys to be manipulated by humans...
trans: 我说人偶不过是供人类操纵的玩具……

Original: Dark Manikin (Lyse):I won't let you get away with this!
Dialogue: I won't let you get away with this!
trans: 我不会让你得逞的！

Original: Kam'lanaut:Around me is a barrier only the chosen may enter. Puppets cannot enter.
Dialogue: Around me is a barrier only the chosen may enter. Puppets cannot enter.
trans: 我周围是只有被选中者才能进入的屏障。

Original: Kam'lanaut:What are you looking at? Get back to work.
Dialogue: What are you looking at? Get back to work.
trans: 你在看什么？

Original: Kam'lanaut:I will summon true paradise here.
Dialogue: I will summon true paradise here.
trans: 我会在这里召唤真正的天堂。

Original: Dark Manikin (Lyse):Stop this!
Dialogue: Stop this!
trans: 停止这个！

Original: Dark Manikin (Papalymo):We don't have the leisure of choices! We simply obey those with strong wills! But...
Dialogue: We don't have the leisure of choices! We simply obey those with strong wills! But...
trans: 我们没有选择的闲暇！

Original: Yda:Oh no!
Dialogue: Oh no!
trans: 不好了！

Original: Papalymo:We must hurry!
Dialogue: We must hurry!
trans: 我们必须抓紧时间！

Original: Dark Manikin (Papalymo):But I can entrust it to them.
Dialogue: But I can entrust it to them.
trans: 但我可以委托给他们。

Original: Dark Manikin (Papalymo):I believe in those from the World of Light...
Dialogue: I believe in those from the World of Light...
trans: 我相信光之世界的人……

Original: Papalymo:...I see. These are the memories I lost.
Dialogue: ...I see. These are the memories I lost.
trans: ...我懂了。

Original: Papalymo:I will take good care of them.
Dialogue: I will take good care of them.
trans: 我会好好照顾他们的。

Original: Kam'lanaut:Hmph... What a farce.
Dialogue: Hmph... What a farce.
trans: 哼……真是闹剧。

Original: Kam'lanaut:I have been filled with Shinryu's power. I shall journey to a new world beyond space-time.
Dialogue: I have been filled with Shinryu's power. I shall journey to a new world beyond space-time.
trans: 我已经充满了神龙的力量。

Original: Kam'lanaut:But before that...I must exterminate those unworthy!
Dialogue: But before that...I must exterminate those unworthy!
trans: 但在那之前……我必须消灭那些不值得的人！

Original: Dark Manikin (Lyse):I won't let you! I can't...!
Dialogue: I won't let you! I can't...!
trans: 我不会让你！

Original: Yda:That's my role.
Dialogue: That's my role.
trans: 那是我的角色。

Original: Yda:I'll take care of it from here.
Dialogue: I'll take care of it from here.
trans: 我会从这里处理它。

Original: Kam'lanaut:I wish you would not interfere...
Dialogue: I wish you would not interfere...
trans: 希望你不要干涉...

Original: Papalymo:I will not back down...now that I have my will.
Dialogue: I will not back down...now that I have my will.
trans: 我不会退缩……既然我有我的意志。

Original: Kam'lanaut:Hmph... Then I will strike you down here, and have you submit your will to me!
Dialogue: Hmph... Then I will strike you down here, and have you submit your will to me!
trans: 哼……那我就把你打在这里，让你臣服于我！

Original: Lion:Now give up! We'll stop you no matter how many times it takes!
Dialogue: Now give up! We'll stop you no matter how many times it takes!
trans: 现在放弃！

Original: Kam'lanaut:You have not stopped me yet. Look closer.
Dialogue: You have not stopped me yet. Look closer.
trans: 你还没有阻止我。

Original: Kam'lanaut:This unshapely world has borne but an unshapely door...
Dialogue: This unshapely world has borne but an unshapely door...
trans: 这个不规则的世界只承载了一扇不规则的门……

Original: Kam'lanaut:But the clumsy work of those bungling gods will become the cornerstone of a new world!
Dialogue: But the clumsy work of those bungling gods will become the cornerstone of a new world!
trans: 但是那些笨拙的神的笨拙工作将成为新世界的基石！

Original: Papalymo:You mean you made a world no longer under the rule of Spiritus and Materia?
Dialogue: You mean you made a world no longer under the rule of Spiritus and Materia?
trans: 你是说你创造了一个不再受 Spiritus 和 Materia 统治的世界？

Original: Papalymo:I cannot believe it. You did not seem to hold such power...
Dialogue: I cannot believe it. You did not seem to hold such power...
trans: 我不相信。

Original: Kam'lanaut:I needed only take what I lacked.
Dialogue: I needed only take what I lacked.
trans: 我只需要拿走我缺少的东西。

Original: Kam'lanaut:Those puppets who carried the powerful wills of their originals... They were more than they appeared.
Dialogue: Those puppets who carried the powerful wills of their originals... They were more than they appeared.
trans: 那些携带着本尊强大意志的傀儡……他们比表面上的要多。

Original: Kam'lanaut:The gods are utterly moronic...
Dialogue: The gods are utterly moronic...
trans: 大神们都太脑残了。。。

Original: Kam'lanaut:By giving the memories they stole to those puppets, they created slaves.
Dialogue: By giving the memories they stole to those puppets, they created slaves.
trans: 通过将窃取的记忆交给那些人偶，他们创造了奴隶。

Original: Yda:Y'shtola! Thancred!
Dialogue: Y'shtola! Thancred!
trans: Y'shtola！

Original: Lion:After wasting away our world, you now want to try and turn this one into your "Paradise"?
Dialogue: After wasting away our world, you now want to try and turn this one into your "Paradise"?
trans: 荒废了我们的世界，你现在想尝试把这里变成你的“天堂”？

Original: Lion:Your selfishness knows no bounds!
Dialogue: Your selfishness knows no bounds!
trans: 你的自私是无止境的！

Original: Kam'lanaut:Selfish? Just who loses in my plan?
Dialogue: Selfish? Just who loses in my plan?
trans: 自私？

Original: Kam'lanaut:My world is a peaceful one... Eternal. Perfect. Paradise.
Dialogue: My world is a peaceful one... Eternal. Perfect. Paradise.
trans: 我的世界是和平的……永恒的。

Original: Kam'lanaut:That is exactly why I plant o build the world of respite that Materia and Spiritus failed to create.
Dialogue: That is exactly why I plant o build the world of respite that Materia and Spiritus failed to create.
trans: 这就是为什么我要建立一个 Materia 和 Spiritus 未能创造的喘息世界的原因。

Original: Lion:Don't be fooled. His ideal is far from peaceful.
Dialogue: Don't be fooled. His ideal is far from peaceful.
trans: 不要被愚弄了。

Original: Firion:I'm not surprised. He forcefully stole the will of another. There's no way a world made from that could be paradise.
Dialogue: I'm not surprised. He forcefully stole the will of another. There's no way a world made from that could be paradise.
trans: 我不惊讶。

Original: Kam'lanaut:Of course, there is no way rabble like yourselves could enter my new world...
Dialogue: Of course, there is no way rabble like yourselves could enter my new world...
trans: 当然，你们这种乌合之众是不可能进入我的新世界的……

Original: Yda:But you're going to take those two manikins with you!?
Dialogue: But you're going to take those two manikins with you!?
trans: 但是你要带着那两个人体模型！？

Original: Yda:They might have brilliance, memories in them!
Dialogue: They might have brilliance, memories in them!
trans: 他们或许有光彩，有记忆！

Original: Papalymo:If you take them somewhere else, their originals may lose those memories forever.
Dialogue: If you take them somewhere else, their originals may lose those memories forever.
trans: 如果你把它们带到别处，它们的原件可能会永远失去那些记忆。

Original: Papalymo:Such a thing
Dialogue: Such a thing—
trans: 这样的事情-

Original: Dark Manikin (Lyse):Such a thing, I cannot forgive!
Dialogue: Such a thing, I cannot forgive!
trans: 这种事，我不能原谅！

Original: Lion:Be reasonable!
Dialogue: Be reasonable!
trans: 讲道理！

Original: Kam'lanaut:I tire of this...
Dialogue: I tire of this...
trans: 我厌倦了这个...

Original: Yda:We have to go after them!
Dialogue: We have to go after them!
trans: 我们得去追他们！

Original: Lion:Your sister's manikin was moved by a powerful will.
Dialogue: Your sister's manikin was moved by a powerful will.
trans: 你姐姐的人体模型被强大的意志所感动。

Original: Firion:Even though she didn't stand a chance... It was like she was out of control.
Dialogue: Even though she didn't stand a chance... It was like she was out of control.
trans: 尽管她没有机会…… 就像她失去了控制一样。

Original: Papalymo:The dark manikins have given their memories to us and have drawn out our will with it.
Dialogue: The dark manikins have given their memories to us and have drawn out our will with it.
trans: 黑暗的人体模型已经把他们的记忆给了我们，并用它引出了我们的意志。

Original: Papalymo:...Like my dark manikin did.
Dialogue: ...Like my dark manikin did.
trans: ...就像我的黑色人体模型一样。

Original: Yda:Papalymo... Just what did you...?
Dialogue: Papalymo... Just what did you...?
trans: Papalymo……你到底做了什么……？

Original: Papalymo:That is something you must reclaim for yourself.
Dialogue: That is something you must reclaim for yourself.
trans: 那是你必须为自己收回的东西。

Original: Yda:I understand. Let's get to the other side of that door!
Dialogue: I understand. Let's get to the other side of that door!
trans: 我明白。

Original: Aerith:Is this the world that Kam'lanaut made?
Dialogue: Is this the world that Kam'lanaut made?
trans: 这是 Kam'lanaut 创造的世界吗？

Original: Zack:It doesn't seem that much different. Are you sure this is it?
Dialogue: It doesn't seem that much different. Are you sure this is it?
trans: 看起来并没有太大的不同。

Original: Alphinaud:The atmosphere is unstable.
Dialogue: The atmosphere is unstable.
trans: 气氛不稳定。

Original: Alisaie:It seems just as uncertain as those places summoned from other worlds, but...
Dialogue: It seems just as uncertain as those places summoned from other worlds, but...
trans: 好像和从异世界召唤来的地方一样不确定，但是……

Original: Alisaie:Is this really his wish for a new world?
Dialogue: Is this really his wish for a new world?
trans: 这真的是他想要的新世界吗？
