Original: Vayne:But you are quite keen in your observation. Befitting of an adviser...
Dialogue: But you are quite keen in your observation. Befitting of an adviser...
trans: 但你的观察力相当敏锐。

Original: Vayne:One such as yourself is certainly indispensable to that prince.
Dialogue: One such as yourself is certainly indispensable to that prince.
trans: 像你这样的人，对于那位王子来说，当然是不可或缺的。

Original: Ignis:He refers to himself as a prince?
Dialogue: He refers to himself as a prince?
trans: 他自称太子？

Original: Vayne:He is loathe to be called as such, wishing to be treated the same as his allies.
Dialogue: He is loathe to be called as such, wishing to be treated the same as his allies.
trans: 他厌恶这样的称呼，希望得到与他的盟友一样的待遇。

Original: Ignis:...I see.
Dialogue: ...I see.
trans: ...我懂了。

Original: Vayne:Can I assume then that he is not a prince to you?
Dialogue: Can I assume then that he is not a prince to you?
trans: 那么我可以假设他不是你的王子吗？

Original: Vayne:Perhaps because of something that happens in his future...something he has forgotten?
Dialogue: Perhaps because of something that happens in his future...something he has forgotten?
trans: 也许是因为他未来发生的事情……他忘记的事情？

Original: Ignis:What do you know?
Dialogue: What do you know?
trans: 你知道什么？

Original: Vayne:Something that the one who summoned you failed to say.
Dialogue: Something that the one who summoned you failed to say.
trans: 召唤你的人没有说的话。

Original: Vayne:The greatest power in this world is willpower.
Dialogue: The greatest power in this world is willpower.
trans: 这个世界上最强大的力量就是意志力。

Original: Vayne:In order to strengthen that will, I was summoned by a god who granted me certain memories and knowledge.
Dialogue: In order to strengthen that will, I was summoned by a god who granted me certain memories and knowledge.
trans: 为了强化那个意志，我被赋予了一定的记忆和知识的神召唤。

Original: Vayne:Though it seems Materia has also come to learn the importance of memories and histories in peoples' wills to fight.
Dialogue: Though it seems Materia has also come to learn the importance of memories and histories in peoples' wills to fight.
trans: 尽管 Materia 似乎也开始了解记忆和历史在人们的战斗意志中的重要性。

Original: Vayne:So there is a chance you know more than that prince does.
Dialogue: So there is a chance you know more than that prince does.
trans: 所以你有可能知道的比那位王子还多。

Original: Vayne:A warrior possessing a strong will can manipulate this world to his liking.
Dialogue: A warrior possessing a strong will can manipulate this world to his liking.
trans: 拥有坚强意志的战士可以随心所欲地操纵这个世界。

Original: Vayne:You can do things that prince cannot do... Take that device, for example.
Dialogue: You can do things that prince cannot do... Take that device, for example.
trans: 你可以做王子做不到的事情……以那个装置为例。

Original: Vayne:You can make it work in this world.
Dialogue: You can make it work in this world.
trans: 你可以让它在这个世界上发挥作用。

Original: Vayne:One with a strong will can overwrite the laws of this world.
Dialogue: One with a strong will can overwrite the laws of this world.
trans: 意志坚强的人可以改写这个世界的法则。

Original: Ignis:So I can bend things to my will?
Dialogue: So I can bend things to my will?
trans: 所以我可以屈服于我的意志？

Original: Vayne:It seems you're finally starting to understand.
Dialogue: It seems you're finally starting to understand.
trans: 看来你终于开始明白了。

Original: Vayne:But remember one thing.
Dialogue: But remember one thing.
trans: 但请记住一件事。

Original: Vayne:Your liege is enjoying his life as a "prince" in this world.
Dialogue: Your liege is enjoying his life as a "prince" in this world.
trans: 您的君主在这个世界上享受着“王子”的生活。

Original: Vayne:As such, you cannot count on the strength of his will. Do you not feel the need to change that as his adviser?
Dialogue: As such, you cannot count on the strength of his will. Do you not feel the need to change that as his adviser?
trans: 因此，你不能指望他意志的力量。

Original: Ignis:I shall determine that after we meet.
Dialogue: I shall determine that after we meet.
trans: 我会在见面后决定的。

Original: Prompto:Noct! You're ringing, dude!
Dialogue: Noct! You're ringing, dude!
trans: 夜！

Original: Noct:What? Me?
Dialogue: What? Me?
trans: 什么？

Original: Lyse:Isn't that sound coming from your pocket?
Dialogue: Isn't that sound coming from your pocket?
trans: 声音不是从你口袋里传出来的吗？

Original: Fang:It might be broken. But it's sure making a ruckus, so why not take a look?
Dialogue: It might be broken. But it's sure making a ruckus, so why not take a look?
trans: 它可能坏了。

Original: Noct:Maybe it's my alarm... Huh?
Dialogue: Maybe it's my alarm... Huh?
trans: 也许是我的闹钟……嗯？

Original: Noct:It's Ignis!
Dialogue: It's Ignis!
trans: 是伊格尼斯！

Original: Prompto:Really!? Answer it!
Dialogue: Really!? Answer it!
trans: 真的吗！？

Original: Prompto:Are you the real deal!?
Dialogue: Are you the real deal!?
trans: 你是真的吗！？

Original: Ignis:Of course.
Dialogue: Of course.
trans: 当然。

Original: Ignis:My apologies on the wait.
Dialogue: My apologies on the wait.
trans: 我很抱歉等待。

Original: Lyse:So who's our new friend?
Dialogue: So who's our new friend?
trans: 那么谁是我们的新朋友呢？

Original: Noct:Oh, right. This is Ignis. He's my...
Dialogue: Oh, right. This is Ignis. He's my...
trans: 啊对。

Original: Prompto:Tactician? Isn't that a bit stiff, even for you?
Dialogue: Tactician? Isn't that a bit stiff, even for you?
trans: 战术家？

Original: Ignis:I thought it the best way to speak to those from other worlds.
Dialogue: I thought it the best way to speak to those from other worlds.
trans: 我认为这是与来自其他世界的人交谈的最佳方式。

Original: Ace:I appreciate it.
Dialogue: I appreciate it.
trans: 我很感激。

Original: Garnet:Since we're all from different worlds, the simpler you can explain it, the better.
Dialogue: Since we're all from different worlds, the simpler you can explain it, the better.
trans: 因为我们都来自不同的世界，所以你解释得越简单越好。

Original: Garnet:You must be very reliable to be Noctis's tactician. Welcome to the team!
Dialogue: You must be very reliable to be Noctis's tactician. Welcome to the team!
trans: 作为诺克提斯的战术家，你必须非常可靠。

Original: Ignis:Glad to be of service.
Dialogue: Glad to be of service.
trans: 很高兴为您服务。

Original: Prompto:You sure are fast friends!
Dialogue: You sure are fast friends!
trans: 你们真是快的朋友！

Original: Lyse:Hehe. Isn't that a good thing? After all, you looked so happy to see him earlier.
Dialogue: Hehe. Isn't that a good thing? After all, you looked so happy to see him earlier.
trans: 呵呵。

Original: Noct:Me? Happy?
Dialogue: Me? Happy?
trans: 我？

Original: Lyse:Oh, didn't you notice?
Dialogue: Oh, didn't you notice?
trans: 哦，你没注意到吗？

Original: Lyse:When you got the call from him, you seemed so relieved, and your voice sounded so happy.
Dialogue: When you got the call from him, you seemed so relieved, and your voice sounded so happy.
trans: 当你接到他的电话时，你似乎松了一口气，你的声音听起来很高兴。

Original: Noct:I wouldn't say happy... It's normal to feel relieved when one of your friends turns out to be fine, right?
Dialogue: I wouldn't say happy... It's normal to feel relieved when one of your friends turns out to be fine, right?
trans: 我不会说高兴……当你的一个朋友被证明没事时感到欣慰是很正常的，对吧？

Original: Ignis:"Relieved," I see. You haven't changed at all, Noct.
Dialogue: "Relieved," I see. You haven't changed at all, Noct.
trans: “松了一口气，”我明白了。

Original: Ace:What's the matter? Something on your mind?
Dialogue: What's the matter? Something on your mind?
trans: 怎么了？

Original: Ignis:I suppose I'm also relieved nothing has changed.
Dialogue: I suppose I'm also relieved nothing has changed.
trans: 我想我也松了一口气，一切都没有改变。

Original: Lyse:There's no need to worry. Noct is doing fine.
Dialogue: There's no need to worry. Noct is doing fine.
trans: 不用担心。

Original: Mog:Kupo, kupo! I sense brilliance!
Dialogue: Kupo, kupo! I sense brilliance!
trans: 外套，外套！

Original: Mog:And this time, there's no trace of Shinryu! We might be able to gather it up easily for once, kupo!
Dialogue: And this time, there's no trace of Shinryu! We might be able to gather it up easily for once, kupo!
trans: 而这一次，没有真龙的踪迹！

Original: Ace:Could it be a trap set by the enemy? Is there a chance something is interfering with your pompom?
Dialogue: Could it be a trap set by the enemy? Is there a chance something is interfering with your pompom?
trans: 难不成是敌人设下的圈套？

Original: Prompto:You're thinking too hard, Ace. I'm sure everything'll be fine!
Dialogue: You're thinking too hard, Ace. I'm sure everything'll be fine!
trans: 你想太多了，艾斯。

Original: Noct:Then let's go get that brilliance.
Dialogue: Then let's go get that brilliance.
trans: 那么让我们去获得那光彩吧。

Original: Lyse:It's definitely best we get our hands on it first, before the enemy can use it.
Dialogue: It's definitely best we get our hands on it first, before the enemy can use it.
trans: 我们最好先拿到它，然后敌人才能使用它。

Original: Ignis:So we are to gather this "brilliance"?
Dialogue: So we are to gather this "brilliance"?
trans: 所以我们要聚集这个“光彩”？

Original: Noct:I'll explain it along the way.
Dialogue: I'll explain it along the way.
trans: 我会一路解释。

Original: Garnet:We'll introduce you to the others, too.
Dialogue: We'll introduce you to the others, too.
trans: 我们也会向您介绍其他人。

Original: Steiner:So Sir Ignis is responsible not only for the group's battle strategies...
Dialogue: So Sir Ignis is responsible not only for the group's battle strategies...
trans: 所以伊格尼斯爵士不仅要负责小组的战斗策略......

Original: Steiner:But their nutrition as well!
Dialogue: But their nutrition as well!
trans: 但他们的营养也是如此！

Original: Ignis:It certainly isn't easy, especially with such picky eaters about.
Dialogue: It certainly isn't easy, especially with such picky eaters about.
trans: 这当然不容易，尤其是有这么挑食的人。

Original: Edgar:Though you and Noct are close in age, you hold different viewpoints and offer him advice...
Dialogue: Though you and Noct are close in age, you hold different viewpoints and offer him advice...
trans: 虽然你和诺克特年龄相仿，但你的观点不同，并给他出谋划策……

Original: Edgar:And not just that, you look after his health and cook, too. How fortunate he is to have a tactician such as you!
Dialogue: And not just that, you look after his health and cook, too. How fortunate he is to have a tactician such as you!
trans: 不仅如此，您还要照顾他的健康并做饭。

Original: Lenna:Indeed. You may not be siblings, but you're just as reliable as one.
Dialogue: Indeed. You may not be siblings, but you're just as reliable as one.
trans: 的确。

Original: Ignis:Has everyone been eating and sleeping properly? I want to learn what I can about the life here.
Dialogue: Has everyone been eating and sleeping properly? I want to learn what I can about the life here.
trans: 大家吃好睡好了吗？

Original: Rosa:We have everything we need on the airship.
Dialogue: We have everything we need on the airship.
trans: 我们在飞艇上拥有我们需要的一切。

Original: Rosa:Even if more people join our team, we have plenty of room.
Dialogue: Even if more people join our team, we have plenty of room.
trans: 即使有更多的人加入我们的团队，我们也有足够的空间。

Original: Penelo:Yeah. There might be dangerous monsters outside, but we want for nothing with the airship.
Dialogue: Yeah. There might be dangerous monsters outside, but we want for nothing with the airship.
trans: 是的。

Original: Edgar:But perhaps we had best let Ignis know about Noct's behavior this morning.
Dialogue: But perhaps we had best let Ignis know about Noct's behavior this morning.
trans: 但也许我们最好让 Ignis 知道今天早上 Noct 的行为。

Original: Steiner:Indeed! This morning, Sir Noct very discreetly left his vegetables on his plate.
Dialogue: Indeed! This morning, Sir Noct very discreetly left his vegetables on his plate.
trans: 的确！

Original: Ignis:It is as I feared.
Dialogue: It is as I feared.
trans: 正如我所担心的那样。

Original: Ignis:No matter where he goes, he fails to understand the importance of a balanced diet.
Dialogue: No matter where he goes, he fails to understand the importance of a balanced diet.
trans: 无论走到哪里，他都无法理解均衡饮食的重要性。

Original: Rosa:You are a much friendlier man than your title and appearance make you seem.
Dialogue: You are a much friendlier man than your title and appearance make you seem.
trans: 你是一个比你的头衔和外表看起来要友善得多的人。

Original: Penelo:I agree. Though royals and their retainers seem to be conscious about all kinds of things.
Dialogue: I agree. Though royals and their retainers seem to be conscious about all kinds of things.
trans: 我同意。

Original: Penelo:I feel like you're doing your best to be approachable to us, Ignis.
Dialogue: I feel like you're doing your best to be approachable to us, Ignis.
trans: Ignis，我觉得你正在尽最大努力让我们平易近人。

Original: Edgar:Well, this won't do. I try my hardest to be approachable...
Dialogue: Well, this won't do. I try my hardest to be approachable...
trans: 好吧，这不行。

Original: Edgar:But perhaps you'd prefer a more frank approach, Penelo?
Dialogue: But perhaps you'd prefer a more frank approach, Penelo?
trans: 但也许你更喜欢更坦率的方法，Penelo？

Original: Penelo:No. Not...really...
Dialogue: No. Not...really...
trans: 不，不是……真的……

Original: Edgar:Haha, I jest! I wouldn't want Vaan to get jealous.
Dialogue: Haha, I jest! I wouldn't want Vaan to get jealous.
trans: 哈哈，我开玩笑！

Original: Ignis:I don't quite understand the full situation. However...
Dialogue: I don't quite understand the full situation. However...
trans: 我不太了解全部情况。

Original: Ignis:Perhaps that very aspect is what makes you difficult to approach, Edgar.
Dialogue: Perhaps that very aspect is what makes you difficult to approach, Edgar.
trans: 也许正是这个方面让你难以接近，埃德加。

Original: Prompto:Ignis sure doesn't hold back.
Dialogue: Ignis sure doesn't hold back.
trans: Ignis 肯定不会退缩。

Original: Noct:He's settling in a little too well...
Dialogue: He's settling in a little too well...
trans: 他安顿得有点太好了……

Original: Noel:It's been a while since you've seen each other. Isn't there anything you want to say?
Dialogue: It's been a while since you've seen each other. Isn't there anything you want to say?
trans: 你们已经有一段时间没见面了。

Original: Prompto:Well... Yes, but...
Dialogue: Well... Yes, but...
trans: 嗯……是的，但是……

Original: Noel:Why so polite?
Dialogue: Why so polite?
trans: 为什么这么客气？

Original: Prompto:Um, well... Sorry about that. I guess I shouldn't be...
Dialogue: Um, well... Sorry about that. I guess I shouldn't be...
trans: 嗯，好吧……抱歉。

Original: Prishe:You and Noct are pretty shy, huh.
Dialogue: You and Noct are pretty shy, huh.
trans: 你和诺克特都很害羞，嗯。

Original: Prompto:D-did you read my mind?
Dialogue: D-did you read my mind?
trans: D-你读懂我的想法了吗？

Original: Noel:It's pretty easy to tell regardless.
Dialogue: It's pretty easy to tell regardless.
trans: 无论如何，这很容易分辨。

Original: Noel:Why don't you go talk to him? He must have things he wants to say, too.
Dialogue: Why don't you go talk to him? He must have things he wants to say, too.
trans: 你为什么不去和他谈谈？

Original: Noct:Yeah, maybe, but...
Dialogue: Yeah, maybe, but...
trans: 是的，也许，但是...

Original: Prishe:Oh, I get it. You're afraid of getting scolded, aren't you?
Dialogue: Oh, I get it. You're afraid of getting scolded, aren't you?
trans: 哦，我明白了。

Original: Noct:But we need to talk to him about what we remember.
Dialogue: But we need to talk to him about what we remember.
trans: 但我们需要和他谈谈我们记得的事情。

Original: Noel:Then I'll call him over.
Dialogue: Then I'll call him over.
trans: 那我叫他过来。

Original: Noct:So you met Materia?
Dialogue: So you met Materia?
trans: 所以你遇到了Materia？

Original: Ignis:Yes. She gave me the gist of this world and said you had already arrived.
Dialogue: Yes. She gave me the gist of this world and said you had already arrived.
trans: 是的。

Original: Ignis:Why do you ask?
Dialogue: Why do you ask?
trans: 你为什么要问？

Original: Prompto:Neither of us met her...
Dialogue: Neither of us met her...
trans: 我们俩都没见过她...

Original: Noct:And we have some allies from other worlds who've lost their memories...
Dialogue: And we have some allies from other worlds who've lost their memories...
trans: 我们有一些来自其他世界的盟友失去了记忆......

Original: Noct:And some of their friends who arrived afterward had all theirs intact.
Dialogue: And some of their friends who arrived afterward had all theirs intact.
trans: 他们的一些后来到达的朋友都完好无损。

Original: Ignis:You're worried your memories may not be complete?
Dialogue: You're worried your memories may not be complete?
trans: 你担心你的记忆可能不完整？

Original: Prompto:I don't want to forget anything important...
Dialogue: I don't want to forget anything important...
trans: 我不想忘记任何重要的事情...

Original: Ignis:I may not have all of my memories.
Dialogue: I may not have all of my memories.
trans: 我可能没有我所有的记忆。

Original: Ignis:And I don't want to risk worsening the situation by saying something vague or incomplete.
Dialogue: And I don't want to risk worsening the situation by saying something vague or incomplete.
trans: 我不想冒着说些含糊或不完整的话而使情况恶化的风险。

Original: Prompto:We were looking for him and asking around if anyone'd seen a big dude with tattoos, but...
Dialogue: We were looking for him and asking around if anyone'd seen a big dude with tattoos, but...
trans: 我们正在寻找他并四处打听是否有人见过一个有纹身的大个子，但是......

Original: Prompto:No luck.
Dialogue: No luck.
trans: 没有运气。

Original: Noct:If Gladio is here, he must be looking for us, too.
Dialogue: If Gladio is here, he must be looking for us, too.
trans: 如果 Gladio 在这里，他一定也在找我们。

Original: Ignis:In which case, we're bound to run into him eventually.
Dialogue: In which case, we're bound to run into him eventually.
trans: 在这种情况下，我们最终一定会遇到他。

Original: Ignis:How have you two been faring here? And what of your camera, Prompto?
Dialogue: How have you two been faring here? And what of your camera, Prompto?
trans: 你们两个在这里过得怎么样？

Original: Prompto:It didn't make the trip. I must have dropped it somewhere.
Dialogue: It didn't make the trip. I must have dropped it somewhere.
trans: 它没有成行。

Original: Ignis:Then we need to keep an eye out for that, too. We should keep a record of our journey in this world.
Dialogue: Then we need to keep an eye out for that, too. We should keep a record of our journey in this world.
trans: 那么我们也需要留意这一点。

Original: Prompto:Yeah! It'd be great to look back on all the amazing things we did and all the great people we met!
Dialogue: Yeah! It'd be great to look back on all the amazing things we did and all the great people we met!
trans: 是的！

Original: Prompto:We'll get to look back on those pictures and reminisce about our adventures.
Dialogue: We'll get to look back on those pictures and reminisce about our adventures.
trans: 我们将回顾那些照片并回忆我们的冒险经历。

Original: Ignis:Is there anything else you're lacking?
Dialogue: Is there anything else you're lacking?
trans: 你还有什么不足的吗？

Original: Noct:Not really. Mog takes care of the rest.
Dialogue: Not really. Mog takes care of the rest.
trans: 并不真地。

Original: Noct:I've even got the hang of fighting with our new friends.
Dialogue: I've even got the hang of fighting with our new friends.
trans: 我什至学会了和我们的新朋友打架。

Original: Prompto:You can't imagine how surprised I was to hear we were in a different world, but I guess we're all in the same boat here.
Dialogue: You can't imagine how surprised I was to hear we were in a different world, but I guess we're all in the same boat here.
trans: 你无法想象听到我们在不同的世界时我有多惊讶，但我想我们都在同一条船上。

Original: Ignis:How has the journey been?
Dialogue: How has the journey been?
trans: 旅途如何？

Original: Noct:Well, it's not all bad.
Dialogue: Well, it's not all bad.
trans: 好吧，还不全是坏事。

Original: Prompto:Definitely different from home, but it's been fun so far.
Dialogue: Definitely different from home, but it's been fun so far.
trans: 绝对不同于家里，但到目前为止很有趣。

Original: Ignis:...I see.
Dialogue: ...I see.
trans: ...我懂了。

Original: Prompto:You seem...underwhelmed. Something wrong?
Dialogue: You seem...underwhelmed. Something wrong?
trans: 你似乎……不知所措。

Original: Ignis:I'm no different than usual.
Dialogue: I'm no different than usual.
trans: 我和平时没什么两样。

Original: Noct:(You're as far from "usual" as I've ever seen...)
Dialogue: (You're as far from "usual" as I've ever seen...)
trans: （你与我所见过的“平常”相去甚远......）

Original: ???:With this world as the ark, I can fly anywhere.
Dialogue: With this world as the ark, I can fly anywhere.
trans: 以这个世界为方舟，我可以飞到任何地方。

Original: ???:Who controls this world?
Dialogue: «Who controls this world?»
trans: “谁控制了这个世界？”

Original: ???:The gods.
Dialogue: The gods.
trans: 神仙。

Original: ???:The seat of the gods will become my new promised land.
Dialogue: «The seat of the gods will become my new promised land.»
trans: “众神之座将成为我新的乐土。”

Original: ???:But there are those who stand in the way.
Dialogue: But there are those who stand in the way.
trans: 但也有人挡路。

Original: ???:A powerless god cannot stop me.
Dialogue: «A powerless god cannot stop me.»
trans: «一个无能为力的神不能阻止我。»

Original: ???:Ah, yes... It's best to end them.
Dialogue: Ah, yes... It's best to end them.
trans: 啊，是的……最好结束他们。

Original: ???:Ha ha ha...
Dialogue: Ha ha ha...
trans: 哈哈哈……

Original: ???:I will take their throne and...
Dialogue: I will take their throne and...
trans: 我会夺取他们的王位，然后...

Original: Vayne:...Try to become a god?
Dialogue: ...Try to become a god?
trans: ……努力成神？

Original: Vayne:...But perhaps worth considering. If he strikes down Materia...
Dialogue: ...But perhaps worth considering. If he strikes down Materia...
trans: ......但也许值得考虑。

Original: Vayne:It might be a chance to release all those held captive by this world.
Dialogue: It might be a chance to release all those held captive by this world.
trans: 这或许是释放所有被这个世界俘虏的人的机会。

Original: Vayne:If one has the strength of will to oppose the gods, he can escape their rule. That is the type of world we are in.
Dialogue: If one has the strength of will to oppose the gods, he can escape their rule. That is the type of world we are in.
trans: 如果一个人有反抗诸神的意志力，他就可以逃脱他们的统治。

Original: Vayne:They probably make their way for Materia's chambers...
Dialogue: They probably make their way for Materia's chambers...
trans: 他们可能会前往 Materia 的房间……

Original: Vayne:She is perhaps easier prey than Spiritus.
Dialogue: She is perhaps easier prey than Spiritus.
trans: 她也许比 Spiritus 更容易成为猎物。

Original: Vayne:...I shall make my own preparations.
Dialogue: ...I shall make my own preparations.
trans: ……我会自己准备的。

Original: Vayne:Have you grown accustomed to this world?
Dialogue: Have you grown accustomed to this world?
trans: 你已经习惯这个世界了吗？

Original: Vayne:It seems you've grown suspicious of me... Perhaps you've heard some bad rumors?
Dialogue: It seems you've grown suspicious of me... Perhaps you've heard some bad rumors?
trans: 看来你对我产生了怀疑……是不是听到了什么不好的传闻？

Original: Ignis:Vaan and his friends said you were their enemy.
Dialogue: Vaan and his friends said you were their enemy.
trans: Vaan 和他的朋友说你是他们的敌人。

Original: Vayne:But we have an agreement to fight together in this world, and I have no intention of starting a fight now.
Dialogue: But we have an agreement to fight together in this world, and I have no intention of starting a fight now.
trans: 但我们有约定，要在这个世界上并肩作战，我现在还没有动手的打算。

Original: Ignis:What business have you with me?
Dialogue: What business have you with me?
trans: 你找我有什么事？

Original: Vayne:I have a question for you as a newcomer to this world: what do you think of it?
Dialogue: I have a question for you as a newcomer to this world what do you think of it?
trans: 作为这个世界的新人，我有一个问题要问你，你怎么看？

Original: Vayne:For example... How did you find your liege?
Dialogue: For example... How did you find your liege?
trans: 比如……你是怎么找到你的领主的？

Original: Ignis:He seemed fine and at ease here.
Dialogue: He seemed fine and at ease here.
trans: 他在这里看起来很好，很自在。

Original: Vayne:A safe answer.
Dialogue: A safe answer.
trans: 一个安全的答案。

Original: Ignis:What are you getting at?
Dialogue: What are you getting at?
trans: 你在说什么？

Original: Vayne:Do not think your allies are the only ones who came from your world.
Dialogue: Do not think your allies are the only ones who came from your world.
trans: 不要认为你的盟友是唯一来自你的世界的人。

Original: Vayne:It seems your crystal chooses its king regardless of one's sovereignty.
Dialogue: It seems your crystal chooses its king regardless of one's sovereignty.
trans: 看起来你的水晶选择了它的国王而不考虑一个人的主权。

Original: Vayne:It selects a ruler without democracy...
Dialogue: It selects a ruler without democracy...
trans: 它选择了一个没有民主的统治者......

Original: Vayne:And the chosen one has no choice but to obey its supernatural selector.
Dialogue: And the chosen one has no choice but to obey its supernatural selector.
trans: 而被选中的人别无选择，只能服从其超自然的选择者。

Original: Ignis:That is our world.
Dialogue: That is our world.
trans: 那就是我们的世界。

Original: Vayne:They were merely my own thoughts on the matter. Do you feel no resentment at being bound by gods and legends?
Dialogue: They were merely my own thoughts on the matter. Do you feel no resentment at being bound by gods and legends?
trans: 它们只是我自己对此事的想法。

Original: Ignis:...I do not need to answer you.
Dialogue: ...I do not need to answer you.
trans: ......我不需要回答你。

Original: Vayne:...Regardless, the gods in this world differ from the ones in yours.
Dialogue: ...Regardless, the gods in this world differ from the ones in yours.
trans: ……总之，这个世界的神和你们的不同。

Original: Vayne:You've witnessed Materia's weakness with your own eyes, haven't you?
Dialogue: You've witnessed Materia's weakness with your own eyes, haven't you?
trans: 你亲眼目睹了魔石的弱点，不是吗？

Original: Ignis:She said she was losing the faith of her warriors.
Dialogue: She said she was losing the faith of her warriors.
trans: 她说她正在失去战士们的信任。

Original: Vayne:Yes. And now someone who knows of her weakness is seeking to seize her authority.
Dialogue: Yes. And now someone who knows of her weakness is seeking to seize her authority.
trans: 是的。

Original: Vayne:Be on your guard. The current state of affairs may be detestable, but...
Dialogue: Be on your guard. The current state of affairs may be detestable, but...
trans: 保持警惕。

Original: Vayne:Being ruled by someone who seeks to be a hero by slaying the gods is perhaps an even worse fate.
Dialogue: Being ruled by someone who seeks to be a hero by slaying the gods is perhaps an even worse fate.
trans: 被一个想通过屠神成为英雄的人统治，也许是一种更糟糕的命运。

Original: Vayne:I would keep a watchful eye on anything...peculiar that may appear before you.
Dialogue: I would keep a watchful eye on anything...peculiar that may appear before you.
trans: 我会密切注意任何可能出现在你面前的……特别的东西。

Original: Ignis:What a strange man.
Dialogue: What a strange man.
trans: 真是个奇怪的人。

Original: Ignis:I had best regroup with the others.
Dialogue: I had best regroup with the others.
trans: 我最好和其他人重新集结。

Original: Materia:You would turn your blade on a god... Why?
Dialogue: You would turn your blade on a god... Why?
trans: 你会把你的刀刃对准神……为什么？

Original: Zack:It is the natural reward for a god without a will...
Dialogue: It is the natural reward for a god without a will...
trans: 这是对没有意志的神灵的天然奖赏……

Original: Materia:Accepting the will of the warriors...is my responsibility as a god.
Dialogue: Accepting the will of the warriors...is my responsibility as a god.
trans: 接受战士们的意志……是我作为神的职责。

Original: Zack:Ha ha ha...
Dialogue: Ha ha ha...
trans: 哈哈哈……

Original: Sephiroth:Now, the goddess's throne...
Dialogue: Now, the goddess's throne...
trans: 现在，女神的宝座……

Original: Sephiroth:The worlds are connected here... However...
Dialogue: The worlds are connected here... However...
trans: 世界在这里相连……然而……

Original: Sephiroth:I must first rid it of its parasites.
Dialogue: I must first rid it of its parasites.
trans: 我必须先去除它的寄生虫。

Original: Sephiroth:They have been divided. Some of them won't respond...
Dialogue: They have been divided. Some of them won't respond...
trans: 他们已经分裂了。

Original: Sephiroth:The power of my will...is being hindered by the law of the gods.
Dialogue: The power of my will...is being hindered by the law of the gods.
trans: 我的意志之力……被诸神的法则所阻碍。

Original: Sephiroth:So how well can empty puppets fare?
Dialogue: So how well can empty puppets fare?
trans: 那么空木偶的表现如何呢？

Original: Dark Manikin (Zack):Where is this...?
Dialogue: Where is this...?
trans: 这是哪里……？

Original: Dark Manikin (Zack):Why are there so many of me...?
Dialogue: Why are there so many of me...?
trans: 为什么有这么多我...？

Original: Dark Manikin (Zack):So...we weren't unique.
Dialogue: So...we weren't unique.
trans: 所以……我们不是独一无二的。

Original: Dark Manikin (Zack):Why are you standing in Materia's place...?
Dialogue: Why are you standing in Materia's place...?
trans: 你为什么要站在玛泰利亚的位置上……？

Original: Sephiroth:This place belongs to me now.
Dialogue: This place belongs to me now.
trans: 这个地方现在属于我了。

Original: Sephiroth:And you...are my warriors.
Dialogue: And you...are my warriors.
trans: 而你……是我的战士。

Original: Dark Manikin (Zack):Yeah right! To defeat people like you, we
Dialogue: Yeah right! To defeat people like you, we—
trans: 对对对！

Original: Sephiroth:You...are puppets.
Dialogue: You...are puppets.
trans: 你们……是傀儡。

Original: Sephiroth:As copies, all you need to do is fulfill your role.
Dialogue: As copies, all you need to do is fulfill your role.
trans: 作为副本，你需要做的就是完成你的角色。

Original: Sephiroth:Copy their memories, delude them, and crush their will.
Dialogue: Copy their memories, delude them, and crush their will.
trans: 复制他们的记忆，迷惑他们，粉碎他们的意志。

Original: Dark Manikin (Zack):My body...won't...listen to me...
Dialogue: My body...won't...listen to me...
trans: 我的身体……不会……听我的……

Original: Ignis:I just finished inspecting the airship's equipment.
Dialogue: I just finished inspecting the airship's equipment.
trans: 我刚刚检查完飞艇的设备。

Original: Noel:It has everything you need, right?
Dialogue: It has everything you need, right?
trans: 它有你需要的一切，对吧？

Original: Ignis:I found it absolutely fascinating.
Dialogue: I found it absolutely fascinating.
trans: 我发现它非常迷人。

Original: Ignis:For example, I saw a vegetable with a star-shaped cross-section.
Dialogue: For example, I saw a vegetable with a star-shaped cross-section.
trans: 例如，我看到一种蔬菜，其截面呈星形。

Original: Yuri:It's like the star carrots from our world.
Dialogue: It's like the star carrots from our world.
trans: 它就像来自我们世界的明星胡萝卜。

Original: Ignis:A carrot... So it's a root vegetable.
Dialogue: A carrot... So it's a root vegetable.
trans: 一根胡萝卜……所以它是一种块根类蔬菜。

Original: Chelinka:Yeah! You can put it in a stew or saut it.
Dialogue: Yeah! You can put it in a stew or sauté it.
trans: 是的！

Original: Ignis:I see.
Dialogue: I see.
trans: 我懂了。

Original: Noel:Noct doesn't eat those red vegetables.
Dialogue: Noct doesn't eat those red vegetables.
trans: Noct不吃那些红色蔬菜。

Original: Sabin:Gahaha! Whether you simmer or fry it, he won't even take a bite.
Dialogue: Gahaha! Whether you simmer or fry it, he won't even take a bite.
trans: 哈哈哈！

Original: Ignis:I'll give it a taste later.
Dialogue: I'll give it a taste later.
trans: 我待会儿尝尝。

Original: Prishe:This world doesn't have many unique foods like those pickles Steiner carries around...
Dialogue: This world doesn't have many unique foods like those pickles Steiner carries around...
trans: 这个世界上没有很多像斯坦纳随身携带的泡菜这样独特的食物……

Original: Prishe:There are "similar" foods, though.
Dialogue: There are "similar" foods, though.
trans: 不过，也有“相似”的食物。

Original: Yuri:But if you keep thinking they're fakes, food starts tasting pretty bland.
Dialogue: But if you keep thinking they're fakes, food starts tasting pretty bland.
trans: 但是，如果您一直认为它们是假货，食物就会开始尝起来很乏味。

Original: Chelinka:Even if we don't eat for a long time, though, we're completely fine here. Maybe we don't need to eat at all in this world.
Dialogue: Even if we don't eat for a long time, though, we're completely fine here. Maybe we don't need to eat at all in this world.
trans: 不过，即使我们很长时间不吃东西，我们在这里也完全没有问题。

Original: Prishe:I know how you feel! But that's exactly why I eat!
Dialogue: I know how you feel! But that's exactly why I eat!
trans: 我知道你的感受！

Original: Prishe:I eat and have a blast here!
Dialogue: I eat and have a blast here!
trans: 我在这里吃得很开心！

Original: Sabin:Yeah! Even if a cure or potion will heal our wounds, nothing quite rejuvenates the heart like a good meal.
Dialogue: Yeah! Even if a cure or potion will heal our wounds, nothing quite rejuvenates the heart like a good meal.
trans: 是的！

Original: Sabin:And nothing beats drinking a fragrant tea.
Dialogue: And nothing beats drinking a fragrant tea.
trans: 没有什么比喝一杯香茶更好的了。

Original: Ignis:Then I'll see if I can't find any good tea leaves around here.
Dialogue: Then I'll see if I can't find any good tea leaves around here.
trans: 那我就看看这附近能不能找到什么好茶叶。

Original: Sabin:You get it. Thanks!
Dialogue: You get it. Thanks!
trans: 你懂了。

Original: Noel:It seems like time's stopped here.
Dialogue: It seems like time's stopped here.
trans: 时间仿佛在这里停止了。

Original: Noel:I don't get the feeling of really living, like eating or sleeping.
Dialogue: I don't get the feeling of really living, like eating or sleeping.
trans: 我没有真正生活的感觉，比如吃饭或睡觉。

Original: Ignis:Is that so?
Dialogue: Is that so?
trans: 是这样吗？

Original: Prishe:But Noct is getting by with this feeling somehow.
Dialogue: But Noct is getting by with this feeling somehow.
trans: 但不知何故，Noct 正在忍受这种感觉。

Original: Yuri:Well, in that case...
Dialogue: Well, in that case...
trans: 那么，在那种情况下......

Original: Yuri:Could we eat some food you prepared for Noct?
Dialogue: Could we eat some food you prepared for Noct?
trans: 我们可以吃一些你为 Noct 准备的食物吗？

Original: Chelinka:Yuri! Remember your manners!
Dialogue: Yuri! Remember your manners!
trans: 尤里！

Original: Yuri:You say that, but aren't you interested, too?
Dialogue: You say that, but aren't you interested, too?
trans: 你这么说，但你不感兴趣吗？

Original: Noel:I'm interested.
Dialogue: I'm interested.
trans: 我很感兴趣。

Original: Sabin:I would have anything you make!
Dialogue: I would have anything you make!
trans: 我想要你做的任何东西！

Original: Ignis:Very well then.
Dialogue: Very well then.
trans: 那好吧。

Original: Prishe:You're so generous, Ignis!
Dialogue: You're so generous, Ignis!
trans: 你真慷慨，伊格尼斯！

Original: Chelinka:Won't it be difficult with vegetables you're not used to?
Dialogue: Won't it be difficult with vegetables you're not used to?
trans: 吃不惯的蔬菜不会很难吗？

Original: Ignis:It won't be a problem.
Dialogue: It won't be a problem.
trans: 这不会有问题。

Original: Yuri:Yay! I'm looking forward to it!
Dialogue: Yay! I'm looking forward to it!
trans: 耶！

Original: Ignis:You won't be disappointed.
Dialogue: You won't be disappointed.
trans: 你不会失望的。

Original: Tidus:That's why I'm the star player now. You're yesterday's news, old man.
Dialogue: «That's why I'm the star player now. You're yesterday's news, old man.»
trans: «这就是为什么我现在是明星球员。

Original: Jecht:That so? Didn't anyone tell you that I'm makin' a comeback?
Dialogue: «That so? Didn't anyone tell you that I'm makin' a comeback?»
trans: “这么？

Original: Tidus:Some people might be saying that, but what they really want is my autograph.
Dialogue: «Some people might be saying that, but what they really want is my autograph.»
trans: “有些人可能会这么说，但他们真正想要的是我的签名。”

Original: Jecht:Haha. Well, of course.
Dialogue: «Haha. Well, of course.»
trans: “哈哈。

Original: Jecht:But no matter how badly people want my autograph, it's still a fake if you write it.
Dialogue: «But no matter how badly people want my autograph, it's still a fake if you write it.»
trans: “但无论人们多么想要我的签名，如果你写了它仍然是假的。”

Original: Jecht:Keep tryin', kid. I'll keep watchin' you for as long as it takes.
Dialogue: «Keep tryin', kid. I'll keep watchin' you for as long as it takes.»
trans: «继续努力，孩子。

Original: Relm:I need to get back home or else he'll get lonely and senile.
Dialogue: «I need to get back home or else he'll get lonely and senile.»
trans: “我需要回家，否则他会变得孤独和衰老。”

Original: Shadow:...Why are you talking to me?
Dialogue: «...Why are you talking to me?»
trans: “...你为什么跟我说话？”

Original: Relm:Just because. Besides, you're always nearby, Shadow.
Dialogue: «Just because. Besides, you're always nearby, Shadow.»
trans: «只是因为。

Original: Galuf:Krile, were you injured in the last battle?
Dialogue: «Krile, were you injured in the last battle?»
trans: “Krile，你在上次战斗中受伤了吗？”

Original: Krile:You worry too much, Grandpa.
Dialogue: «You worry too much, Grandpa.»
trans: “你太担心了，爷爷。”

Original: Krile:I'm fine! Are you okay?
Dialogue: «I'm fine! Are you okay?»
trans: “我很好！

Original: Galuf:Ho ho ho. I am fine. I want to be with my adorable granddaughter and dear friends for as long as possible.
Dialogue: «Ho ho ho. I am fine. I want to be with my adorable granddaughter and dear friends for as long as possible.»
trans: “哈哈哈。

Original: Zack:Is this...everyone's ideal?
Dialogue: «Is this...everyone's ideal?»
trans: “这是……每个人的理想吗？”

Original: Zack:The place of respite that everyone wished for?
Dialogue: «The place of respite that everyone wished for?»
trans: «每个人都希望的喘息之地？»

Original: Zack:Is this to weaken our wills?
Dialogue: «Is this to weaken our wills?»
trans: “这是要削弱我们的意志吗？”

Original: Zack:I need to...entrust it to someone...
Dialogue: «I need to...entrust it to someone...»
trans: “我需要……委托给某人……”

Original: Zack:My very cells are being controlled by him... My body won't last...
Dialogue: «My very cells are being controlled by him... My body won't last...»
trans: «我的细胞都被他控制了……我的身体活不下去了……»

Original: Yuna:There you are!
Dialogue: There you are!
trans: 你在这！

Original: Tidus:Sorry, Yuna. We were just talking.
Dialogue: «Sorry, Yuna. We were just talking.»
trans: «对不起，尤娜。

Original: Jecht:Yeah. We'll be right there.
Dialogue: «Yeah. We'll be right there.»
trans: “是的。

Original: Warrior of Light:I found them.
Dialogue: I found them.
trans: 我找到了他们。

Original: Jecht:Who the hell are they!?
Dialogue: Who the hell are they!?
trans: 他们到底是谁！？

Original: Yuna:What's going on...!?
Dialogue: What's going on...!?
trans: 这是怎么回事...！？

Original: Tidus:Well, I...
Dialogue: «Well, I...»

Original: Jecht:You don't...remember?
Dialogue: «You don't...remember?»
trans: “你不……记得吗？”

Original: Zack:I've been waiting for you!
Dialogue: «I've been waiting for you!»
trans: “我一直在等你！”

Original: Tidus:Dad!?
Dialogue: «Dad!?»

Original: Warrior of Light:What's going on!?
Dialogue: What's going on!?
trans: 这是怎么回事！？

Original: Zack:What's all the fuss?
Dialogue: What's all the fuss?
trans: 有什么大惊小怪的？

Original: Zack:Is that...me!?
Dialogue: Is that...me!?
trans: 那是……我！？

Original: Zack:No, I'm not. Neither are they.
Dialogue: «No, I'm not. Neither are they.»
trans: “不，我不是。

Original: Tidus:Why did you do that to my dad...?
Dialogue: «Why did you do that to my dad...?»
trans: “你为什么要这样对我爸爸……？”

Original: Jecht:Maybe he got the wrong one? I'm...
Dialogue: «Maybe he got the wrong one? I'm...»
trans: «也许他听错了？

Original: Cloud:They have the same face... Is this some kind of trick?
Dialogue: They have the same face... Is this some kind of trick?
trans: 同一张脸……这是什么诡计？

Original: Zack:You know, don't you, Cloud? The injured ones are copies.
Dialogue: «You know, don't you, Cloud? The injured ones are copies.»
trans: «你知道吗，克劳德？

Original: Yuna:I didn't know. How could I have made such a mistake...?
Dialogue: I didn't know. How could I have made such a mistake...?
trans: 我不知道。

Original: Cloud:They're copies who can read our memories. The stronger your emotional attachment, the harder it is to see through them.
Dialogue: They're copies who can read our memories. The stronger your emotional attachment, the harder it is to see through them.
trans: 他们是可以读取我们记忆的副本。

Original: Zack:How is that possible!? And why aren't you one of them?
Dialogue: How is that possible!? And why aren't you one of them?
trans: 这怎么可能！？

Original: Zack:I'll tell you after we take care of these guys.
Dialogue: «I'll tell you after we take care of these guys.»
trans: “等我们处理掉这些人后我再告诉你。”

Original: Jecht:Having to fight someone with my own face...
Dialogue: Having to fight someone with my own face...
trans: 不得不用自己的脸去打人……

Original: Jecht:If it's a joke, I'm not laughin'.
Dialogue: «If it's a joke, I'm not laughin'.»
trans: “如果这是个玩笑，我不会笑的。”

Original: Yuna:Their voice and personality are identical. I can't bring myself to harm him without knowing why...
Dialogue: Their voice and personality are identical. I can't bring myself to harm him without knowing why...
trans: 他们的声音和个性是相同的。

Original: Zack:It's no good if you guys don't do it. If you don't strike them down, it'll infect others.
Dialogue: «It's no good if you guys don't do it. If you don't strike them down, it'll infect others.»
trans: «如果你们不这样做，那就不好了。

Original: Zack:Hey. What we want is different, right? This isn't respite, is it?
Dialogue: «Hey. What we want is different, right? This isn't respite, is it?»

Original: Zack:Hold on a second. What are you talking about?
Dialogue: Hold on a second. What are you talking about?
trans: 稍等一下。

Original: Cloud:You don't need to understand, Zack. You know who you need to defeat.
Dialogue: You don't need to understand, Zack. You know who you need to defeat.
trans: 你不需要明白，扎克。

Original: Zack:Reliable as ever, Cloud.
Dialogue: «Reliable as ever, Cloud.»
trans: “一如既往的可靠，克劳德。”

Original: Cloud:I'll put an end to these clones. Those who can't take it, stand back.
Dialogue: I'll put an end to these clones. Those who can't take it, stand back.
trans: 我会终结这些克隆人。

Original: Tidus:Do we really have to fight? Do we have to disappear!?
Dialogue: «Do we really have to fight? Do we have to disappear!?»
trans: «我们真的要打架吗？

Original: Tidus:Why do they...
Dialogue: Why do they...
trans: 他们为什么...

Original: Zack:I'm counting on you guys.
Dialogue: «I'm counting on you guys.»
trans: “我指望你们了。”

Original: Zack:Don't force your memories onto us.
Dialogue: «Don't force your memories onto us.»
trans: “不要把你的记忆强加给我们。”

Original: Tidus:I didn't like seeing those clones of me and my old man.
Dialogue: I didn't like seeing those clones of me and my old man.
trans: 我不喜欢看到我和我老人家的那些克隆体。

Original: Ignis:Have you ever fought puppets like that before?
Dialogue: Have you ever fought puppets like that before?
trans: 你以前和傀儡打过这样的仗吗？

Original: Vivi:Not really... Most dark manikins we've met couldn't speak very well.
Dialogue: Not really... Most dark manikins we've met couldn't speak very well.
trans: 不是真的……我们遇到的大多数深色人体模型都不太会说话。

Original: Vivi:Their feelings were different from ours. They were very unique.
Dialogue: Their feelings were different from ours. They were very unique.
trans: 他们的感受与我们不同。

Original: Ignis:So they had their own wills and emotions based on that.
Dialogue: So they had their own wills and emotions based on that.
trans: 因此，他们有自己的意志和情感。

Original: Tidus:But these were different. It was like someone went through the trouble of making an exact replica.
Dialogue: But these were different. It was like someone went through the trouble of making an exact replica.
trans: 但这些是不同的。

Original: Noct:Maybe it's a different type of dark manikin.
Dialogue: Maybe it's a different type of dark manikin.
trans: 也许这是一种不同类型的深色人体模型。

Original: Zack:Which reminds me... My clone went somewhere during the battle.
Dialogue: Which reminds me... My clone went somewhere during the battle.
trans: 这让我想起了……我的分身在战斗中去了某个地方。

Original: Zack:He was saying that Cloud understood, if I remember correctly.
Dialogue: He was saying that Cloud understood, if I remember correctly.
trans: 如果我没记错的话，他是说克劳德明白了。

Original: Zack:Calamity...?
Dialogue: Calamity...?

Original: Ignis:Tell us more.
Dialogue: Tell us more.
trans: 请告诉我们更多。

Original: Cloud:The calamity and those with its power could read the memories of others and had the ability to copy them.
Dialogue: The calamity and those with its power could read the memories of others and had the ability to copy them.
trans: 天劫和拥有天劫之力的人，可以读取他人的记忆，并且拥有复制他人的能力。

Original: Cloud:They could mimic the face of a deceased father or brother when fighting you.
Dialogue: They could mimic the face of a deceased father or brother when fighting you.
trans: 在与你战斗时，他们可以模仿已故父亲或兄弟的脸。

Original: Cloud:But I don't think there are many who have that power in this world.
Dialogue: But I don't think there are many who have that power in this world.
trans: 但我认为这个世界上拥有这种力量的人并不多。

Original: Cloud:Which means those were copies of copies, or a variation of the dark manikins.
Dialogue: Which means those were copies of copies, or a variation of the dark manikins.
trans: 这意味着那些是副本的副本，或者是深色人体模型的变体。

Original: Tidus:They read mine and Yuna's memories, which is why we couldn't tell they were fakes right away.
Dialogue: They read mine and Yuna's memories, which is why we couldn't tell they were fakes right away.
trans: 他们读取了我和尤娜的记忆，这就是为什么我们不能马上分辨出它们是假的。

Original: Vivi:It's different fromthe timemy dark manikin was used as a substitute...
Dialogue: It's different from the time my dark manikin was used as a substitute...
trans: 这与我的深色人体模型被用作替代品的时间不同......

Original: Vivi:They're the ones reflecting everyone's memories.
Dialogue: They're the ones reflecting everyone's memories.
trans: 他们是反映每个人记忆的人。

Original: Ignis:So they possess no will of their own, merely acting upon the memories of others...
Dialogue: So they possess no will of their own, merely acting upon the memories of others...
trans: 所以他们没有自己的意志，只是根据别人的记忆行事……

Original: Tidus:Is there a way to tell them apart?
Dialogue: Is there a way to tell them apart?
trans: 有办法区分它们吗？

Original: Cloud:It's...difficult. In my world, that calamity wiped out an entire race.
Dialogue: It's...difficult. In my world, that calamity wiped out an entire race.
trans: 它很难。

Original: Noct:So we just have to stick together?
Dialogue: So we just have to stick together?
trans: 所以我们只需要坚持在一起？

Original: Tidus:I'd love to, but it's not always that easy.
Dialogue: I'd love to, but it's not always that easy.
trans: 我很乐意，但这并不总是那么容易。

Original: Ignis:If they can only take the form of those they meet, there may be a way to tell them apart.
Dialogue: If they can only take the form of those they meet, there may be a way to tell them apart.
trans: 如果他们只能采取他们遇到的人的形式，也许有办法区分他们。

Original: Ignis:Use information that only you know that the person in question couldn't.
Dialogue: Use information that only you know that the person in question couldn't.
trans: 使用只有您知道而对方不知道的信息。

Original: Zack:Like something they did and forgot, but you saw... I see.
Dialogue: Like something they did and forgot, but you saw... I see.
trans: 就像他们做过但忘了的事情，但你看到了……我明白了。

Original: Zack:You never disappoint, Mr. Tactician!
Dialogue: You never disappoint, Mr. Tactician!
trans: 你永远不会让人失望，战术家先生！

Original: Noct:Easier said than done.
Dialogue: Easier said than done.
trans: 说起来容易做起来难。

Original: Vivi:I'll try my best to remember. Even those fake ones seemed to be struggling...
Dialogue: I'll try my best to remember. Even those fake ones seemed to be struggling...
trans: 我会努力记住的。

Original: Cloud:I don't think they're doing it because they want to. There must be someone pulling the strings.
Dialogue: I don't think they're doing it because they want to. There must be someone pulling the strings.
trans: 我不认为他们这样做是因为他们想这样做。

Original: Zack:I'm also interested in what my clone was starting to say...
Dialogue: I'm also interested in what my clone was starting to say...
trans: 我也对我的克隆人开始说的话感兴趣……

Original: Ignis:We must proceed with caution, and be careful after splitting up and regrouping.
Dialogue: We must proceed with caution, and be careful after splitting up and regrouping.
trans: 谨慎行事，分分合合慎重。

Original: Noct:...You've really become the group's advisor, haven't you?
Dialogue: ...You've really become the group's advisor, haven't you?
trans: ……你真的当上了集团的顾问对吧？

Original: Prompto:This world sure is strange...
Dialogue: «This world sure is strange...»
trans: «这个世界真的很奇怪……»

Original: Prompto:The power of will?
Dialogue: «The power of will?»
trans: “意志的力量？”

Original: Prompto:If you have that, you can do anything.
Dialogue: «If you have that, you can do anything.»
trans: “如果你有那个，你可以做任何事。”

Original: Noctis:I don't think "anything" is possible.
Dialogue: «I don't think "anything" is possible.»
trans: «我不认为“任何事情”都是可能的。»

Original: Prompto:Yeah, but...
Dialogue: «Yeah, but...»

Original: Prompto:We might be able to do things we couldn't before.
Dialogue: «We might be able to do things we couldn't before.»
trans: «我们也许可以做以前做不到的事情。 »

Original: Prompto:Like...giving a sad story a happy ending.
Dialogue: «Like...giving a sad story a happy ending.»
trans: “就像……给一个悲伤的故事一个圆满的结局。”

Original: Ignis:What's the matter?
Dialogue: What's the matter?
trans: 怎么了？

Original: Noctis:Oh, right. Can I ask you something, Ignis?
Dialogue: «Oh, right. Can I ask you something, Ignis?»
trans: “啊对。

Original: Noctis:Do you think there's a way...
Dialogue: «Do you think there's a way...»
trans: “你认为有什么办法……”

Original: Noctis:To bring back the things we lost on our journey?
Dialogue: «To bring back the things we lost on our journey?»
trans: “为了找回我们在旅途中丢失的东西？”

Original: Ignis:...I see. You're reading my memories.
Dialogue: ...I see. You're reading my memories.
trans: ...我懂了。

Original: Ignis:...Or perhaps my desires.
Dialogue: ...Or perhaps my desires.
trans: ...或者也许是我的愿望。

Original: Prompto:We're being serious.
Dialogue: «We're being serious.»
trans: “我们是认真的。”

Original: Ignis:"If only fate had not been so cruel." "I wish things had gone differently that time."
Dialogue: "If only fate had not been so cruel." "I wish things had gone differently that time."
trans: “要是命运没有那么残酷就好了。”

Original: Ignis:I've thought it many times. But...those events won't change.
Dialogue: I've thought it many times. But...those events won't change.
trans: 我想过很多次。

Original: Ignis:Even if you keep hoping to be saved by the "what ifs," what you lost cannot be brought back. And...
Dialogue: Even if you keep hoping to be saved by the "what ifs," what you lost cannot be brought back. And...
trans: 即使你一直希望被“如果”拯救，你失去的东西也无法挽回。

Original: Ignis:You two are not that perceptive.
Dialogue: You two are not that perceptive.
trans: 你们两个没有那么敏锐。

Original: Ignis:Especially concerning memories of that time.
Dialogue: Especially concerning memories of that time.
trans: 尤其是关于那个时代的回忆。

Original: Ignis:I accepted my fate and was still prepared to fight.
Dialogue: I accepted my fate and was still prepared to fight.
trans: 我接受了我的命运，仍然准备战斗。

Original: Noctis:Wh-what are you saying, Ignis?
Dialogue: «Wh-what are you saying, Ignis?»
trans: “你——你在说什么，伊格尼斯？”

Original: Ignis:It's time to regroup.
Dialogue: It's time to regroup.
trans: 是时候重整旗鼓了。

Original: Prompto:Am I dreaming!?
Dialogue: Am I dreaming!?
trans: 我在做梦吗！？

Original: Noct:You can't be serious... They look just like us.
Dialogue: You can't be serious... They look just like us.
trans: 你不是认真的……他们看起来就像我们一样。

Original: Ignis:You said they transformed after reading my memories?
Dialogue: You said they transformed after reading my memories?
trans: 你说他们是看了我的记忆才变身的？

Original: Prompto:Are we about to get a beatdown!?
Dialogue: «Are we about to get a beatdown!?»
trans: «我们要被打败了吗！？»

Original: Zack:You don't want to fight?
Dialogue: You don't want to fight?
trans: 你不想打架？

Original: Noct:Then why did you transform?
Dialogue: Then why did you transform?
trans: 那你为什么转型？

Original: Cloud:Don't be fooled. They'll use a friendly face to bring your guard down.
Dialogue: Don't be fooled. They'll use a friendly face to bring your guard down.
trans: 不要被愚弄了。

Original: Cloud:They're trying to weaken our will. It reeks of...him.
Dialogue: They're trying to weaken our will. It reeks of...him.
trans: 他们试图削弱我们的意志。

Original: Zack:Are you sure they're fakes?
Dialogue: Are you sure they're fakes?
trans: 你确定他们是假的？

Original: Ignis:They knew things only I did.
Dialogue: They knew things only I did.
trans: 他们知道只有我知道的事情。

Original: Prompto:We promise we won't do anything. Can't we all just get along?
Dialogue: «We promise we won't do anything. Can't we all just get along?»
trans: «我们保证我们不会做任何事情。

Original: Prompto:Aw man, I would totally say that...
Dialogue: Aw man, I would totally say that...
trans: 哦，伙计，我完全会说......

Original: Cloud:If we leave them alone, they'll turn into monsters. As long as they're being controlled by him, we can't just let them be.
Dialogue: If we leave them alone, they'll turn into monsters. As long as they're being controlled by him, we can't just let them be.
trans: 如果我们不管他们，他们就会变成怪物。

Original: Zack:Then we have no choice but to fight.
Dialogue: Then we have no choice but to fight.
trans: 那我们别无选择，只能战斗。

Original: Noctis:Fine then. If it's Ignis, then...
Dialogue: «Fine then. If it's Ignis, then...»
trans: «那好吧。

Original: Noct:Cut that out!
Dialogue: Cut that out!
trans: 别说了！

Original: Cloud:Don't confuse our comrades any more.
Dialogue: Don't confuse our comrades any more.
trans: 不要再迷惑我们的战友了。

Original: Cloud:Stop pretending you have a heart!
Dialogue: Stop pretending you have a heart!
trans: 别假装你有一颗心！

Original: Zack:My dark manikin...? And two of them!?
Dialogue: My dark manikin...? And two of them!?
trans: 我的黑暗模型……？

Original: Dark Manikin (Zack):Now which of us is pretending to have a heart?
Dialogue: Now which of us is pretending to have a heart?
trans: 现在我们谁在假装有一颗心？

Original: Cloud:They aren't Zack. They're being controlled.
Dialogue: They aren't Zack. They're being controlled.
trans: 他们不是扎克。

Original: Zack:They're not themselves, right? We should defeat them...right?
Dialogue: They're not themselves, right? We should defeat them...right?
trans: 他们不是他们自己，对吧？

Original: Ignis:Yes. That much is clear.
Dialogue: Yes. That much is clear.
trans: 是的。

Original: Noct:Then let's do it!
Dialogue: Then let's do it!
trans: 那我们开始吧！

Original: Noctis:What's up with these guys?
Dialogue: What's up with these guys?
trans: 这些家伙怎么了？

Original: Ignis:They're our enemy.
Dialogue: They're our enemy.
trans: 他们是我们的敌人。

Original: Noctis:I know that!
Dialogue: I know that!
trans: 我知道！

Original: Ignis:Then you know we must bring them down.
Dialogue: Then you know we must bring them down.
trans: 那么你知道我们必须打倒他们。

Original: Zack:I kinda knew there had to be more than one or two fakes, but still...
Dialogue: I kinda knew there had to be more than one or two fakes, but still...
trans: 我有点知道一定有不止一两个假货，但仍然......

Original: Firion:It seems like they were made to confuse us and weaken our will to fight...
Dialogue: It seems like they were made to confuse us and weaken our will to fight...
trans: 看起来他们是为了迷惑我们并削弱我们的战斗意志而制造的……

Original: Ignis:They're simply imitating us as a child would.
Dialogue: They're simply imitating us as a child would.
trans: 他们只是像孩子一样模仿我们。

Original: Zack:They might all be puppets of me inside. I can't help but wonder why.
Dialogue: They might all be puppets of me inside. I can't help but wonder why.
trans: 他们可能都是我内心的傀儡。

Original: Onion Knight:I remember Vivi's dark manikin being manipulated.
Dialogue: I remember Vivi's dark manikin being manipulated.
trans: 我记得薇薇的黑色人体模型被人操纵过。

Original: Onion Knight:But why would someone use a puppet of Zack to imitate other people?
Dialogue: But why would someone use a puppet of Zack to imitate other people?
trans: 但是为什么会有人用扎克斯的人偶来模仿别人呢？

Original: Cloud:I don't understand the whole story. My memories might still be incomplete.
Dialogue: I don't understand the whole story. My memories might still be incomplete.
trans: 我不明白整个故事。

Original: Cloud:I think this is the work of Sephiroth and the experiments in our home world.
Dialogue: I think this is the work of Sephiroth and the experiments in our home world.
trans: 我认为这是 Sephiroth 的工作和我们家乡世界的实验。

Original: Zack:Experiments? What experiments? ...What is this feeling?
Dialogue: Experiments? What experiments? ...What is this feeling?
trans: 实验？

Original: Cloud:I only have this information as "knowledge." My own experiences are...fuzzy.
Dialogue: I only have this information as "knowledge." My own experiences are...fuzzy.
trans: 我只有这些信息作为“知识”。

Original: Onion Knight:If both your memories are unclear, then there's not much we from other worlds can do.
Dialogue: If both your memories are unclear, then there's not much we from other worlds can do.
trans: 如果你们俩的记忆都不清楚，那我们异界的人也无能为力。

Original: Cloud:The one thing I do know for sure is that the real Zack wouldn't become like that.
Dialogue: The one thing I do know for sure is that the real Zack wouldn't become like that.
trans: 我确实知道的一件事是真正的 Zack 不会变成那样。

Original: Cloud:But that puppet is different.
Dialogue: But that puppet is different.
trans: 但是那个傀儡就不一样了。

Original: Cloud:Dark manikins are easily influenced by a stronger will.
Dialogue: Dark manikins are easily influenced by a stronger will.
trans: 深色人体模型很容易受到更强烈意志的影响。

Original: Zack:So they were working for Sephiroth. Were they chosen by him because they're my manikins?
Dialogue: So they were working for Sephiroth. Were they chosen by him because they're my manikins?
trans: 所以他们在为 Sephiroth 工作。

Original: Zack:I don't get it! I just can't remember!
Dialogue: I don't get it! I just can't remember!
trans: 我不明白！

Original: Firion:I thought each person only had one dark manikin...
Dialogue: I thought each person only had one dark manikin...
trans: 我以为每个人只有一个黑色人体模型...

Original: Firion:But it seems like there can be lots of a body.
Dialogue: But it seems like there can be lots of a body.
trans: 但似乎可以有很多身体。

Original: Onion Knight:Do you know anything about that, Mog?
Dialogue: Do you know anything about that, Mog?
trans: 你知道吗，莫格？

Original: Mog:The only thing I really know about is brilliance, kupo...
Dialogue: The only thing I really know about is brilliance, kupo...
trans: 我真正知道的唯一一件事就是光彩，库波……

Original: Mog:And the only Zack with brilliance was the first one we met, kupo.
Dialogue: And the only Zack with brilliance was the first one we met, kupo.
trans: 唯一才华横溢的 Zack 是我们遇到的第一个，kupo。

Original: Ignis:So we have no deeper insight into the biology of these dark manikins?
Dialogue: So we have no deeper insight into the biology of these dark manikins?
trans: 所以我们对这些黑暗人体模型的生物学没有更深入的了解？

Original: Mog:Dark manikins are created by the crystal core of darkness, kupo.
Dialogue: Dark manikins are created by the crystal core of darkness, kupo.
trans: 黑暗人体模型是由黑暗水晶核心 kupo 创造的。

Original: Mog:Which means they belong to neither Materia nor Spiritus, kupo.
Dialogue: Which means they belong to neither Materia nor Spiritus, kupo.
trans: 这意味着它们既不属于 Materia，也不属于 Spiritus，kupo。

Original: Ignis:So they aren't bound by the laws of the gods?
Dialogue: So they aren't bound by the laws of the gods?
trans: 所以他们不受众神法则的约束？

Original: Mog:That's the first time I've seen so many of them, kupo...
Dialogue: That's the first time I've seen so many of them, kupo...
trans: 第一次见这么多，库波。。。

Original: Mog:The crystal core is supposed to protect this world, kupo, but it seems to be doing the opposite now.
Dialogue: The crystal core is supposed to protect this world, kupo, but it seems to be doing the opposite now.
trans: 晶核本来是要保护这个世界的，库珀，现在却好像反其道而行之。

Original: Firion:Right. If our enemy can create and control that many warriors...
Dialogue: Right. If our enemy can create and control that many warriors...
trans: 正确的。

Original: Onion Knight:This world is theirs for the destroying. They're just creating an army.
Dialogue: This world is theirs for the destroying. They're just creating an army.
trans: 这个世界是他们的毁灭者。

Original: Ignis:In any case, what they have are merely pawns.
Dialogue: In any case, what they have are merely pawns.
trans: 无论如何，他们拥有的只是棋子。

Original: Firion:I wonder if we'll be able to face them without fear again in battle...
Dialogue: I wonder if we'll be able to face them without fear again in battle...
trans: 我不知道我们是否能够在战斗中再次无所畏惧地面对他们......

Original: Ignis:Shall we take a detour then?
Dialogue: Shall we take a detour then?
trans: 那我们绕路好吗？

Original: Ignis:We must first defeat the man behind the curtain.
Dialogue: We must first defeat the man behind the curtain.
trans: 我们必须先打败幕后黑手。

Original: Zack:No. I can't just let this go.
Dialogue: No. I can't just let this go.
trans: 不，我不能就这样放手。

Original: Zack:Even if they're no more than clones, I can't forgive them for trampling on other people's memories like that.
Dialogue: Even if they're no more than clones, I can't forgive them for trampling on other people's memories like that.
trans: 就算是分身，我也无法原谅他们如此践踏他人的记忆。

Original: Firion:Alright. But don't push yourself too hard. Remember that we're all here to help.
Dialogue: Alright. But don't push yourself too hard. Remember that we're all here to help.
trans: 好吧。

Original: Galuf:Guoh...!
Dialogue: «Guoh...!»
trans: «Guoh...!»

Original: Zack:Are they degrading...!?
Dialogue: Are they degrading...!?
trans: 他们有辱人格......！？

Original: Cloud:Have you remembered?
Dialogue: Have you remembered?
trans: 你想起来了吗？

Original: Zack:No, but what is this feeling? Even though I can't recall, it's like I still remember...
Dialogue: No, but what is this feeling? Even though I can't recall, it's like I still remember...
trans: 不，但这是什么感觉？

Original: Noct:Who is he?
Dialogue: Who is he?
trans: 他是谁？

Original: Dark Manikin (Zack):You finally made it.
Dialogue: You finally made it.
trans: 你终于成功了。

Original: Aerith:You're Zack from the World of Darkness, aren't you?
Dialogue: You're Zack from the World of Darkness, aren't you?
trans: 你是来自暗之世界的扎克斯对吧？

Original: Dark Manikin (Zack):Aerith and Cloud are here... So that's the goddess's idea of respite. Hmm...
Dialogue: Aerith and Cloud are here... So that's the goddess's idea of respite. Hmm...
trans: 爱丽丝和克劳德在这里……这就是女神的喘息之计。

Original: Zack:What's going on here?
Dialogue: What's going on here?
trans: 这里发生了什么？

Original: Dark Manikin (Zack):It's pointless to explain it. You and I are the same, after all.
Dialogue: It's pointless to explain it. You and I are the same, after all.
trans: 解释它是没有意义的。

Original: Zack:I know that! So you remember everything!?
Dialogue: I know that! So you remember everything!?
trans: 我知道！

Original: Dark Manikin (Zack):If you defeat me, you'll get your memories back. But...
Dialogue: If you defeat me, you'll get your memories back. But...
trans: 如果你打败了我，你就会找回你的记忆。

Original: Dark Manikin (Zack):They're painful.
Dialogue: They're painful.
trans: 他们很痛苦。

Original: Zack:Better than forgetting.
Dialogue: Better than forgetting.
trans: 总比遗忘好。

Original: Dark Manikin (Zack):I had a feeling you'd say that. We really are one and the same.
Dialogue: I had a feeling you'd say that. We really are one and the same.
trans: 我有预感你会这么说。

Original: Aerith:Everyone is feeling...uneasy. Could you explain it to us?
Dialogue: Everyone is feeling...uneasy. Could you explain it to us?
trans: 每个人都感到……不安。

Original: Laguna:Hey, hey. They're turning into monsters as we speak. Should we beat 'em?
Dialogue: Hey, hey. They're turning into monsters as we speak. Should we beat 'em?
trans: 嘿嘿

Original: Noct:Guess so.
Dialogue: Guess so.
trans: 我猜也是。

Original: Dark Manikin (Zack):I get it. I need to tell you.
Dialogue: I get it. I need to tell you.
trans: 我得到它。

Original: Cloud:The one behind all this is Sephiroth, isn't it?
Dialogue: The one behind all this is Sephiroth, isn't it?
trans: 这一切的幕后黑手是 Sephiroth，不是吗？

Original: Cloud:There's no way you could do this, not with Zack's memories.
Dialogue: There's no way you could do this, not with Zack's memories.
trans: 没有扎克的记忆，你不可能做到这一点。

Original: Dark Manikin (Zack):It's nice to know you have faith in me.
Dialogue: It's nice to know you have faith in me.
trans: 很高兴知道你对我有信心。

Original: Dark Manikin (Zack):I've got to return this happiness to you.
Dialogue: I've got to return this happiness to you.
trans: 我要把这份幸福还给你。

Original: Zack:Sadness, regret... I'll take it all.
Dialogue: Sadness, regret... I'll take it all.
trans: 悲伤，遗憾……我来承担。

Original: Dark Manikin (Zack):There's no other way to save us other than defeating us, so...
Dialogue: There's no other way to save us other than defeating us, so...
trans: 除了打败我们，没有别的办法可以拯救我们，所以……

Original: Dark Manikin (Zack):Don't hold back!
Dialogue: Don't hold back!
trans: 不要退缩！

Original: Cloud:Are you sure you're alright with this?
Dialogue: Are you sure you're alright with this?
trans: 你确定你没问题吗？

Original: Zack:It's not easy, but I'll be fine.
Dialogue: It's not easy, but I'll be fine.
trans: 这并不容易，但我会没事的。

Original: Zack:I'd hate to keep forcing our memories on them.
Dialogue: I'd hate to keep forcing our memories on them.
trans: 我不想一直把我们的记忆强加给他们。

Original: Dark Manikin (Zack):Appreciate it.
Dialogue: Appreciate it.
trans: 欣赏它。

Original: Dark Manikin (Zack):I leave this dream to you.
Dialogue: I leave this dream to you.
trans: 我把这个梦想留给你。

Original: Dark Manikin (Zack):They're painful memories, but...they're all yours now.
Dialogue: They're painful memories, but...they're all yours now.
trans: 它们是痛苦的回忆，但是……它们现在都是你的了。

Original: Zack:I see... So that's what happened.
Dialogue: I see... So that's what happened.
trans: 我明白了……原来是这样。

Original: Zack:Looks like I forgot a lot of things.
Dialogue: Looks like I forgot a lot of things.
trans: 好像忘记了很多东西。

Original: Cloud:So you remember your past now...
Dialogue: So you remember your past now...
trans: 所以你现在记得你的过去......

Original: Zack:And things you don't know, too.
Dialogue: And things you don't know, too.
trans: 还有你不知道的事情。

Original: Zack:Hehe... But you're doing fine, Cloud.
Dialogue: Hehe... But you're doing fine, Cloud.
trans: 呵呵……不过你很好，克劳德。

Original: Zack:You lived on.
Dialogue: You lived on.
trans: 你活了下来。

Original: Zack:You took good care of my honor, my dreams.
Dialogue: You took good care of my honor, my dreams.
trans: 你照顾好我的荣誉，我的梦想。

Original: Zack:Thank you.
Dialogue: Thank you.
trans: 谢谢。

Original: Cloud:You don't need to thank me.
Dialogue: You don't need to thank me.
trans: 你不用谢我。

Original: Zack:Being able to see Aerith and Tifa... This must be what Materia called "respite."
Dialogue: Being able to see Aerith and Tifa... This must be what Materia called "respite."
trans: 能够见到爱丽丝和蒂法……这一定就是玛泰利亚所说的“喘息之机”。

Original: Zack:I thought I could become a hero if I saved this world...
Dialogue: I thought I could become a hero if I saved this world...
trans: 我以为如果我拯救了这个世界，我就能成为英雄……

Original: Zack:It's nothing. Don't worry about it, Cloud. Just stay like that until it's your turn.
Dialogue: It's nothing. Don't worry about it, Cloud. Just stay like that until it's your turn.
trans: 没什么。

Original: Zack:There's still a lot of thinking to do, but there are other things I need to do first.
Dialogue: There's still a lot of thinking to do, but there are other things I need to do first.
trans: 还有很多事情要做，但我还有其他事情需要先做。

Original: Zack:I want to tell the others what I know, Cloud. Could you call them for a strategy meeting?
Dialogue: I want to tell the others what I know, Cloud. Could you call them for a strategy meeting?
trans: 我想把我知道的告诉其他人，克劳德。

Original: Edgar:...He's trying to become a god!?
Dialogue: ...He's trying to become a god!?
trans: ……他想成为神！？

Original: Zack:I could see what my manikin saw. Sephiroth is standing where Materia stood.
Dialogue: I could see what my manikin saw. Sephiroth is standing where Materia stood.
trans: 我可以看到我的人体模型看到的东西。

Original: Ignis:So what he said was true...
Dialogue: So what he said was true...
trans: 所以他说的是真的...

Original: Vaan:You knew!?
Dialogue: You knew!?
trans: 你知道！？

Original: Ignis:Yes. I'd been told so before.
Dialogue: Yes. I'd been told so before.
trans: 是的。

Original: Ignis:By the man you called an enemy.
Dialogue: By the man you called an enemy.
trans: 被你称为敌人的那个人。

Original: Vaan:You met Vayne and didn't tell us!?
Dialogue: You met Vayne and didn't tell us!?
trans: 你见过薇恩却没告诉我们！？

Original: Noct:Why didn't you say anything to me?
Dialogue: Why didn't you say anything to me?
trans: 你为什么不对我说什么？

Original: Ignis:There was no way to prove he wasn't a fake. I only wished to say so after I had gathered sufficient evidence.
Dialogue: There was no way to prove he wasn't a fake. I only wished to say so after I had gathered sufficient evidence.
trans: 没有办法证明他不是假的。

Original: Ignis:I thought there would be those uncomfortable knowing of our contact.
Dialogue: I thought there would be those uncomfortable knowing of our contact.
trans: 我以为知道我们的联系会让那些人感到不舒服。

Original: Vaan:Just how childish do you think I am!?
Dialogue: Just how childish do you think I am!?
trans: 你以为我有多幼稚！？

Original: Edgar:It's not too difficult to discern Vayne's motives as an informant.
Dialogue: It's not too difficult to discern Vayne's motives as an informant.
trans: 辨别薇恩作为线人的动机并不难。

Original: Edgar:He may be the violent sort, but would even sacrifice the world and its gods in order to protect his own realm.
Dialogue: He may be the violent sort, but would even sacrifice the world and its gods in order to protect his own realm.
trans: 他可能是个暴虐的人，但为了保护自己的王国，甚至会牺牲世界和神灵。

Original: Edgar:In this case, he wasn't sure what would happen to this world after the goddess had been killed...
Dialogue: In this case, he wasn't sure what would happen to this world after the goddess had been killed...
trans: 在这种情况下，他不知道女神被杀后，这个世界会发生什么……

Original: Edgar:But wanted us to stop Sephiroth from controlling this world, which would make things...difficult for him, I suppose.
Dialogue: But wanted us to stop Sephiroth from controlling this world, which would make things...difficult for him, I suppose.
trans: 但是希望我们阻止 Sephiroth 控制这个世界，这会让事情……对他来说很困难，我想。

Original: Noct:Not like the world's changed at all, though.
Dialogue: Not like the world's changed at all, though.
trans: 不过，世界并没有完全改变。

Original: Vaan:It's just one annoying thing after the other, like making clones...
Dialogue: It's just one annoying thing after the other, like making clones...
trans: 这只是一件接一件烦人的事情，比如制造克隆……

Original: Edgar:What's most troubling is the very fact that the world hasn't changed. Why?
Dialogue: What's most troubling is the very fact that the world hasn't changed. Why?
trans: 最令人不安的是世界没有改变这一事实。

Original: Edgar:Is Materia really dead? Is there perhaps a chance she managed to escape and is in hiding?
Dialogue: Is Materia really dead? Is there perhaps a chance she managed to escape and is in hiding?
trans: Materia真的死了吗？

Original: Zack:My manikin's memories start from Sephiroth being in Materia's chamber.
Dialogue: My manikin's memories start from Sephiroth being in Materia's chamber.
trans: 我的人体模型的记忆是从 Sephiroth 在 Materia 的房间里开始的。

Original: Zack:That's all I know. I leave the thinking to you guys.
Dialogue: That's all I know. I leave the thinking to you guys.
trans: 这是我所知道的一切。

Original: Cloud:Sephiroth in Materia's chambers... It doesn't feel real.
Dialogue: Sephiroth in Materia's chambers... It doesn't feel real.
trans: Sephiroth 在 Materia 的房间里……感觉不真实。

Original: Zack:If that's how you feel, you might be right.
Dialogue: If that's how you feel, you might be right.
trans: 如果这就是你的感受，那么你可能是对的。

Original: Cloud:What makes you say that?
Dialogue: What makes you say that?
trans: 是什么让你这么说？

Original: Zack:I wish I could tell you, but I don't know the details. I think it's something you have to remember yourself.
Dialogue: I wish I could tell you, but I don't know the details. I think it's something you have to remember yourself.
trans: 我希望我能告诉你，但我不知道细节。

Original: Vaan:So where should we be headed?
Dialogue: So where should we be headed?
trans: 那么我们应该去哪里呢？

Original: Zack:What do you think, Cloud?
Dialogue: What do you think, Cloud?
trans: 云，你怎么看？

Original: Cloud:I think...we need to go forward.
Dialogue: I think...we need to go forward.
trans: 我想……我们需要前进。

Original: Edgar:We have no basis for judgment now...so we'll have to rely on Zack's words.
Dialogue: We have no basis for judgment now...so we'll have to rely on Zack's words.
trans: 我们现在没有判断依据……所以我们只能依靠扎克斯的话。

Original: Ignis:We can ascertain Materia's safety afterward. For now, let us hurry on.
Dialogue: We can ascertain Materia's safety afterward. For now, let us hurry on.
trans: 我们之后可以确定 Materia 的安全性。

Original: Noct:Why are you hiding things?
Dialogue: Why are you hiding things?
trans: 你为什么要藏东西？

Original: Zack:I don't want to say that I was satisfied...
Dialogue: I don't want to say that I was satisfied...
trans: 我不想说我很满意...

Original: Zack:Maybe I could have done more... There were things I wanted to do with the others...
Dialogue: Maybe I could have done more... There were things I wanted to do with the others...
trans: 也许我可以做得更多……有些事情我想和其他人一起做……

Original: Zack:No. There's no wise way to accept this. But, at the very least...
Dialogue: No. There's no wise way to accept this. But, at the very least...
trans: 不，没有明智的方法来接受这一点。

Original: Zack:At the very least, I need to pretend...
Dialogue: At the very least, I need to pretend...
trans: 至少，我得假装……

Original: Zack:For their sake.
Dialogue: For their sake.
trans: 为了他们。

Original: Zack:What's up?
Dialogue: What's up?
trans: 这是怎么回事？

Original: Cloud:It seems like you've remembered.
Dialogue: It seems like you've remembered.
trans: 看来你已经想起来了。

Original: Zack:I'll be fine. Just worry about yourself.
Dialogue: I'll be fine. Just worry about yourself.
trans: 我会没事儿的。

Original: Cloud:Even so... My own memories are fuzzy and uncertain...
Dialogue: Even so... My own memories are fuzzy and uncertain...
trans: 即便如此……我自己的记忆也模糊不清……

Original: Cloud:And just by being here together now, I might be putting you through something terrible.
Dialogue: And just by being here together now, I might be putting you through something terrible.
trans: 现在就在一起，我可能会让你经历一些可怕的事情。

Original: Cloud:Usually this is the part where I say, "I don't care," but...
Dialogue: Usually this is the part where I say, "I don't care," but...
trans: 通常这是我说“我不在乎”的部分，但是......

Original: Cloud:I want to help.
Dialogue: I want to help.
trans: 我想帮忙。

Original: Cloud:I can't just let you carry this burden alone.
Dialogue: I can't just let you carry this burden alone.
trans: 我不能让你一个人背负这个重担。

Original: Cloud:...We're friends, right?
Dialogue: ...We're friends, right?
trans: ……我们是朋友吧？

Original: Cloud:Are the fake memories causing these feelings, too?
Dialogue: Are the fake memories causing these feelings, too?
trans: 虚假的记忆也会引起这些感觉吗？

Original: Zack:No, that's not it.
Dialogue: No, that's not it.
trans: 不，不是这样。

Original: Cloud:Don't laugh.
Dialogue: Don't laugh.
trans: 别笑。

Original: Zack:I'm laughing because I'm happy. You're doing good.
Dialogue: I'm laughing because I'm happy. You're doing good.
trans: 我笑是因为我很开心。

Original: Zack:I see... So that's what it felt like.
Dialogue: I see... So that's what it felt like.
trans: 原来如此……原来是这样的感觉。

Original: Cloud:Who are you talking about?
Dialogue: Who are you talking about?
trans: 你在说谁？

Original: Zack:Right. Feelings of happiness. Regret, sadness...dreams.
Dialogue: Right. Feelings of happiness. Regret, sadness...dreams.
trans: 正确的。

Original: Zack:They're all still here. As a part of me.
Dialogue: They're all still here. As a part of me.
trans: 他们都还在这里。

Original: Zack:I made up my mind. I won't look back!
Dialogue: I made up my mind. I won't look back!
trans: 我下了决心。

Original: Zack:I'll live, here and now. With you, and Aerith...
Dialogue: I'll live, here and now. With you, and Aerith...
trans: 我会活着，此时此地。

Original: Zack:...Shoot. I'm showing off again.
Dialogue: ...Shoot. I'm showing off again.

Original: Cloud:...It's good to see you cheering up.
Dialogue: ...It's good to see you cheering up.
trans: ……很高兴看到你高兴起来。

Original: Zack:It's good to feel this way!
Dialogue: It's good to feel this way!
trans: 这种感觉真好！

Original: Zack:...Thank you, Cloud.
Dialogue: ...Thank you, Cloud.
trans: ……谢谢你，克劳德。

Original: Vayne:You made it.
Dialogue: You made it.
trans: 你做到了。

Original: Ashe:Vayne! Have you been waiting here for us!?
Dialogue: Vayne! Have you been waiting here for us!?
trans: 薇恩！

Original: Ignis:We have some information on the one who sought to eliminate Materia.
Dialogue: We have some information on the one who sought to eliminate Materia.
trans: 我们有一些关于试图消灭 Materia 的人的信息。

Original: Vayne:I have learned some on my own as well.
Dialogue: I have learned some on my own as well.
trans: 我自己也学到了一些。

Original: Vayne:Incapacitating one of the gods will cause this world to become unstable.
Dialogue: Incapacitating one of the gods will cause this world to become unstable.
trans: 使其中一位神失去能力将导致这个世界变得不稳定。

Original: Ashe:Are you colluding with him!?
Dialogue: Are you colluding with him!?
trans: 你这是在勾结他！？

Original: Cloud:Calm down. You need to keep a clear mind.
Dialogue: Calm down. You need to keep a clear mind.
trans: 冷静下来。

Original: Vayne:The goddess Materia has died.
Dialogue: The goddess Materia has died.
trans: 女神玛特里亚死了。

Original: Vayne:To put it more precisely... She was expelled from her seat of power by Sephiroth.
Dialogue: To put it more precisely... She was expelled from her seat of power by Sephiroth.
trans: 更准确地说……她是被萨菲罗斯从权力之座上驱逐的。

Original: Vayne:The reason this world still persists is because of Spiritus's power and...
Dialogue: The reason this world still persists is because of Spiritus's power and...
trans: 这个世界之所以还存在，是因为Spiritus的力量和...

Original: Vayne:The powerful will of you, Materia's warriors.
Dialogue: The powerful will of you, Materia's warriors.
trans: 你强大的意志，Materia 的战士。

Original: Zack:So that's why Sephiroth is controlling the puppets...
Dialogue: So that's why Sephiroth is controlling the puppets...
trans: 所以这就是Sephiroth控制傀儡的原因……

Original: Zack:And tried to confuse our friend.
Dialogue: And tried to confuse our friend.
trans: 并试图迷惑我们的朋友。

Original: Cloud:So we defeat Sephiroth and find Materia. I don't want to live in a world ruled by Sephiroth.
Dialogue: So we defeat Sephiroth and find Materia. I don't want to live in a world ruled by Sephiroth.
trans: 所以我们打败了 Sephiroth 并找到了 Materia。

Original: Vayne:That is a proper solution. Materia is incompetent, but moderate.
Dialogue: That is a proper solution. Materia is incompetent, but moderate.
trans: 这是妥善的解决办法。

Original: Vayne:Sephiroth is trying to use this world for his own purposes.
Dialogue: Sephiroth is trying to use this world for his own purposes.
trans: Sephiroth 正试图利用这个世界达到他自己的目的。

Original: Zack:He's not someone I'd want in charge.
Dialogue: He's not someone I'd want in charge.
trans: 他不是我想要负责的人。

Original: Vayne:The only question is whether you have the power to defeat him.
Dialogue: The only question is whether you have the power to defeat him.
trans: 唯一的问题是你是否有能力打败他。

Original: Vayne:Especially you, Noctis Lucis Caelum.
Dialogue: Especially you, Noctis Lucis Caelum.
trans: 特别是你，夜光天。

Original: Vayne:You lack the resolution to be a king. Do you have the will to protect?
Dialogue: You lack the resolution to be a king. Do you have the will to protect?
trans: 你缺乏成为国王的决心。

Original: Vayne:Trying to protect him, I see. It seems you just can't let go as a caregiver.
Dialogue: Trying to protect him, I see. It seems you just can't let go as a caregiver.
trans: 试图保护他，我明白了。

Original: Ignis:Noct's memories should be of no concern to you.
Dialogue: Noct's memories should be of no concern to you.
trans: Noct的记忆应该与你无关。

Original: Ignis:And we can prove it to you.
Dialogue: And we can prove it to you.
trans: 我们可以向您证明这一点。

Original: Ashe:That he has the strength of will even without his memories?
Dialogue: That he has the strength of will even without his memories?
trans: 即使没有记忆，他也有意志力？

Original: Cloud:If that's the case, this should be quick.
Dialogue: If that's the case, this should be quick.
trans: 如果是这样的话，这应该很快。

Original: Noct:I don't get it, but I'm pissed off.
Dialogue: I don't get it, but I'm pissed off.
trans: 我不明白，但我很生气。

Original: Zack:That's the spirit! Let's do this!
Dialogue: That's the spirit! Let's do this!
trans: 就是那种精神！

Original: Vayne:Now then... Show me what you're capable of.
Dialogue: Now then... Show me what you're capable of.
trans: 那么现在... 告诉我你的能力。

Original: Vayne:In this tepid world, can you show a will befitting a king?
Dialogue: In this tepid world, can you show a will befitting a king?
trans: 在这个不温不火的世界里，你能展现出王者般的意志吗？

Original: Noct:Does it matter?
Dialogue: Does it matter?
trans: 有关系吗？

Original: Ignis:Noct will be fine.
Dialogue: Noct will be fine.
trans: 晚上会没事的。

Original: Vayne:How can you be so sure?
Dialogue: How can you be so sure?
trans: 你怎么能这么肯定？

Original: Ignis:We will prove it to you.
Dialogue: We will prove it to you.
trans: 我们会证明给你看。

Original: Vayne:This is my loss.
Dialogue: This is my loss.
trans: 这是我的损失。

Original: Noct:Come on. I could do this all day.
Dialogue: Come on. I could do this all day.
trans: 快点。

Original: Vayne:...No. This is enough.
Dialogue: ...No. This is enough.

Original: Vayne:I wish I were as fortunate as you when it came to comrades.
Dialogue: I wish I were as fortunate as you when it came to comrades.
trans: 在同志方面，我希望我像你一样幸运。

Original: Ignis:So you understand how strong he is.
Dialogue: So you understand how strong he is.
trans: 所以你知道他有多强。
