Original: Warrior of Light:Even without his memories, his will is full of light.
Dialogue: Even without his memories, his will is full of light.
trans: 即使没有记忆，他的意志也充满了光明。

Original: Balthier:And? Are you satisfied now?
Dialogue: And? Are you satisfied now?
trans: 和？

Original: Vayne:Next, you must dethrone Sephiroth.
Dialogue: Next, you must dethrone Sephiroth.
trans: 接下来，你必须推翻 Sephiroth。

Original: Ignis:You speak as though you're one of us.
Dialogue: You speak as though you're one of us.
trans: 你说话好像你是我们中的一员。

Original: Vayne:I thought I had explained our...agreement before.
Dialogue: I thought I had explained our...agreement before.
trans: 我以为我之前已经解释过我们的……协议。

Original: Vayne:Furthermore, I doubt he will be as easily defeated as I was.
Dialogue: Furthermore, I doubt he will be as easily defeated as I was.
trans: 而且，我怀疑他会像我一样容易被打败。

Original: Noct:You really know how to tick me off. I understand how Vaan feels now.
Dialogue: You really know how to tick me off. I understand how Vaan feels now.
trans: 你真的知道怎么惹我生气。

Original: Vayne:It was a compliment. Be proud of what you've accomplished.
Dialogue: It was a compliment. Be proud of what you've accomplished.
trans: 这是一种恭维。

Original: Cloud:Sephiroth is ahead. You knew and tried to get in our way, didn't you?
Dialogue: Sephiroth is ahead. You knew and tried to get in our way, didn't you?
trans: 萨菲罗斯领先。

Original: Vayne:But now our objectives are one in the same.
Dialogue: But now our objectives are one in the same.
trans: 但现在我们的目标是一致的。

Original: Vayne:Should you need my aid in the battle, you know how to summon me.
Dialogue: Should you need my aid in the battle, you know how to summon me.
trans: 如果你在战斗中需要我的帮助，你知道如何召唤我。

Original: Balthier:He's gone... Now what?
Dialogue: He's gone... Now what?
trans: 他走了……现在怎么办？

Original: Warrior of Light:We proceed and have faith in the words of our comrades. Isn't that right, Zack?
Dialogue: We proceed and have faith in the words of our comrades. Isn't that right, Zack?
trans: 我们继续并相信我们同志的话。

Original: Zack:Yeah! If Cloud says it, I'm sure it's right!
Dialogue: Yeah! If Cloud says it, I'm sure it's right!
trans: 是的！

Original: Cloud:...That way.
Dialogue: ...That way.

Original: Noct:Ignis.
Dialogue: Ignis.
trans: 伊格尼斯。

Original: Ignis:I know you have something you wish to say to me.
Dialogue: I know you have something you wish to say to me.
trans: 我知道你有话要对我说。

Original: Ignis:I made the decision to withhold information and did not speak to you, putting other comrades first. From where should I apologize?
Dialogue: I made the decision to withhold information and did not speak to you, putting other comrades first. From where should I apologize?
trans: 我决定隐瞒，不跟你说话，把其他同志放在第一位。

Original: Noct:It's not about that!
Dialogue: It's not about that!
trans: 不是那个！

Original: Prompto:Easy there, Noct... We're not here to fight.
Dialogue: Easy there, Noct... We're not here to fight.
trans: 放轻松，诺克特……我们不是来打架的。

Original: Noct:I know, but... Ugh!
Dialogue: I know, but... Ugh!
trans: 我知道，但是……呃！

Original: Ignis:I apologize for the confusion.
Dialogue: I apologize for the confusion.
trans: 对于造成的混乱，我深表歉意。

Original: Noct:Don't apologize!
Dialogue: Don't apologize!
trans: 不要道歉！

Original: Prompto:Hey, Ignis. I'm sure you know things about our future that we don't.
Dialogue: Hey, Ignis. I'm sure you know things about our future that we don't.
trans: 嘿，伊格尼斯。

Original: Prompto:Is it because they're too painful for the present "us" to understand that you haven't told us?
Dialogue: Is it because they're too painful for the present "us" to understand that you haven't told us?
trans: 是因为他们太痛苦了，让现在的“我们”无法理解你没有告诉我们吗？

Original: Noct:Are we really that...weak?
Dialogue: Are we really that...weak?
trans: 我们真的有那么……弱吗？

Original: Ignis:No. You've got it all wrong.
Dialogue: No. You've got it all wrong.
trans: 不，你完全错了。

Original: Ignis:I know that you'll be fine. It's just...
Dialogue: I know that you'll be fine. It's just...
trans: 我知道你会没事的。

Original: Ignis:You two...
Dialogue: You two...
trans: 你们俩...

Original: Ignis:Noct, you...
Dialogue: Noct, you...

Original: Ignis:You're enjoying your journey here.
Dialogue: You're enjoying your journey here.
trans: 你在这里享受你的旅程。

Original: Ignis:And to me that...
Dialogue: And to me that...
trans: 对我来说...

Original: Ignis:Makes me happy.
Dialogue: Makes me happy.
trans: 让我开心。

Original: Noct:Are you serious?
Dialogue: Are you serious?
trans: 你是认真的？

Original: Prompto:Really, Ignis?
Dialogue: Really, Ignis?
trans: 真的吗，伊格尼斯？

Original: Ignis:I'm currently not prepared to tell you the truth.
Dialogue: I'm currently not prepared to tell you the truth.
trans: 我目前不准备告诉你真相。

Original: Ignis:Please give me time.
Dialogue: Please give me time.
trans: 请给我时间。

Original: Noct:...Guess we don't have much of a choice.
Dialogue: ...Guess we don't have much of a choice.
trans: ...我猜我们别无选择。

Original: Prompto:You're definitely different from the Ignis we know.
Dialogue: You're definitely different from the Ignis we know.
trans: 你绝对不同于我们认识的 Ignis。

Original: Noct:We'll just have to wait, I guess.
Dialogue: We'll just have to wait, I guess.
trans: 我想我们只需要等待。

Original: Noct:No. I think I'll take back my memories before then.
Dialogue: No. I think I'll take back my memories before then.
trans: 不，我想在那之前我会收回我的记忆。

Original: Prompto:Same here. It's not the time to be enjoying some grand adventure in another world!
Dialogue: Same here. It's not the time to be enjoying some grand adventure in another world!
trans: 同样在这里。

Original: Ignis:I never said not to enjoy this world.
Dialogue: I never said not to enjoy this world.
trans: 我从未说过不要享受这个世界。

Original: Noct:I know. We're just preparing for when that time comes.
Dialogue: I know. We're just preparing for when that time comes.
trans: 我知道。

Original: Prompto:I'm a bit anxious about it, but...at least we have Ignis, and he knows the future.
Dialogue: I'm a bit anxious about it, but...at least we have Ignis, and he knows the future.
trans: 我有点担心，但是……至少我们有 Ignis，而且他知道未来。

Original: Noct:It's definitely good to have you around.
Dialogue: It's definitely good to have you around.
trans: 有你在身边绝对是件好事。

Original: Ignis:Yes... And I don't plan on going anywhere anytime soon.
Dialogue: Yes... And I don't plan on going anywhere anytime soon.
trans: 是的...而且我不打算很快去任何地方。

Original: Cloud:That's...!
Dialogue: That's...!

Original: Zack:I'm going in. Are you sure you're okay with this?
Dialogue: I'm going in. Are you sure you're okay with this?
trans: 我进去了。你确定你没问题吗？

Original: Noct:I don't care, even if it is a trap.
Dialogue: I don't care, even if it is a trap.
trans: 我不在乎，即使这是一个陷阱。

Original: Cloud:You really did expel Materia...
Dialogue: You really did expel Materia...
trans: 你真的驱逐了魔石……

Original: Sephiroth:I am God.
Dialogue: I am God.
trans: 我是上帝。

Original: Sephiroth:I wasn't chosen by someone. No, I chose this world.
Dialogue: I wasn't chosen by someone. No, I chose this world.
trans: 我不是被某人选中的。

Original: Zack:What are you talking about? I knew it... You're nothing more than a monster.
Dialogue: What are you talking about? I knew it... You're nothing more than a monster.
trans: 你在说什么？

Original: Sephiroth:Heh... The monster is you.
Dialogue: Heh... The monster is you.
trans: 呵……怪物就是你。

Original: Zack:...Even so, I won't lose my way. I've still got my dreams and honor!
Dialogue: ...Even so, I won't lose my way. I've still got my dreams and honor!
trans: ……即便如此，我也不会迷路的。

Original: Zack:Don't try to push your logic on me!
Dialogue: Don't try to push your logic on me!
trans: 不要试图把你的逻辑强加于我！

Original: Sephiroth:How do you feel, knowing your fate?
Dialogue: How do you feel, knowing your fate?
trans: 你感觉如何，知道你的命运？

Original: Zack:Enough talk. I won't let you take anything else away from us!
Dialogue: Enough talk. I won't let you take anything else away from us!
trans: 说够了。

Original: Zack:My dreams, future, and friends... I'll protect them all!
Dialogue: My dreams, future, and friends... I'll protect them all!
trans: 我的梦想、未来和朋友们……我会保护他们的！

Original: Sephiroth:What a pitiful man you are. You've already lost everything.
Dialogue: What a pitiful man you are. You've already lost everything.
trans: 你是一个多么可怜的人。

Original: Ignis:A memory?
Dialogue: A memory?
trans: 记忆？

Original: Sephiroth:A grounds for yearning. A guide back to a bygone past.
Dialogue: A grounds for yearning. A guide back to a bygone past.
trans: 渴望的理由。

Original: Sephiroth:Where time is stopped and dreams will never come true.
Dialogue: Where time is stopped and dreams will never come true.
trans: 时间停止的地方，梦想永远不会成真。

Original: Sephiroth:Do you feel resentment? Did you think you could settle your unfinished business in this land of respite?
Dialogue: Do you feel resentment? Did you think you could settle your unfinished business in this land of respite?
trans: 你有怨恨吗？

Original: Zack:Cloud! Let's bring this guy down, together!
Dialogue: Cloud! Let's bring this guy down, together!
trans: 云！

Original: Zack:Listen up, Sephiroth!
Dialogue: Listen up, Sephiroth!
trans: 听好了，萨菲罗斯！

Original: Zack:I'm nobody's replacement. I have my own dreams.
Dialogue: I'm nobody's replacement. I have my own dreams.
trans: 我不是任何人的替代者。

Original: Zack:My dreaming heart is right here.
Dialogue: My dreaming heart is right here.
trans: 我梦想的心就在这里。

Original: Zack:That's my only reason for fighting.
Dialogue: That's my only reason for fighting.
trans: 这是我战斗的唯一理由。

Original: Sephiroth:A bold front.
Dialogue: A bold front.
trans: 一个大胆的前面。

Original: Zack:Just try me, and you'll see!
Dialogue: Just try me, and you'll see!
trans: 试试我，你就会知道！

Original: Noct:We'll help.
Dialogue: We'll help.
trans: 我们会帮忙的。

Original: Noct:Right, Ignis?
Dialogue: Right, Ignis?
trans: 对吧，伊格尼斯？

Original: Ignis:But of course.
Dialogue: But of course.
trans: 但是当然。

Original: Zack:Let's go!
Dialogue: Let's go!
trans: 我们走吧！

Original: Cloud:Do you know what it means to kill a god!?
Dialogue: Do you know what it means to kill a god!?
trans: 你知道杀神是什么意思吗！？

Original: Sephiroth:You're still nothing but a puppet. You have no will without someone to pull your strings.
Dialogue: You're still nothing but a puppet. You have no will without someone to pull your strings.
trans: 你还是个傀儡。

Original: Zack:Enough talk!
Dialogue: Enough talk!
trans: 说够了！

Original: Zack:You're nothing but a monster with the face of my friend!
Dialogue: You're nothing but a monster with the face of my friend!
trans: 你不过是个长着我朋友脸的怪物！

Original: Sephiroth:I'm not so sure about that.
Dialogue: I'm not so sure about that.
trans: 我不太确定。

Original: Sephiroth:Ha ha ha...
Dialogue: Ha ha ha...
trans: 哈哈哈……

Original: Zack:What's so funny!?
Dialogue: What's so funny!?
trans: 有什么好笑的！？

Original: Sephiroth:Without a god here, this world will crumble.
Dialogue: Without a god here, this world will crumble.
trans: 这里没有神，这个世界就会崩溃。

Original: Sephiroth:Do you see what's coming from over there?
Dialogue: Do you see what's coming from over there?
trans: 你看到那边传来什么了吗？

Original: Noct:Now!?
Dialogue: Now!?
trans: 现在！？

Original: Sephiroth:Even now, this world is being eroded. Without its gods, it cannot persist.
Dialogue: Even now, this world is being eroded. Without its gods, it cannot persist.
trans: 即使是现在，这个世界也在被侵蚀。

Original: Mog:Wait, kupo! Fighting here is dangerous!
Dialogue: Wait, kupo! Fighting here is dangerous!
trans: 等等，库波！

Original: Ignis:If we lose, this world will be consumed, and if we win, his place on the throne will only be the firmer.
Dialogue: If we lose, this world will be consumed, and if we win, his place on the throne will only be the firmer.
trans: 输了，这个世界就会被毁灭，而赢了，他的王座之位只会更加稳固。

Original: Cloud:Sephiroth wins either way.
Dialogue: Sephiroth wins either way.
trans: 无论哪种方式，Sephiroth 都会获胜。

Original: Ignis:One way or another, a change of scenery is in order.
Dialogue: One way or another, a change of scenery is in order.
trans: 不管怎样，风景的变化是有序的。

Original: Zack:Isn't there anything you can do!?
Dialogue: Isn't there anything you can do!?
trans: 就没有什么可以做的吗！？

Original: Zack:Guide us to a place connected to our wills!
Dialogue: Guide us to a place connected to our wills!
trans: 引导我们到一个与我们的意志相关的地方！

Original: Zack:Let's settle this!
Dialogue: Let's settle this!
trans: 让我们解决这个问题！

Original: Sephiroth:You are nothing but cowardly blight on this world.
Dialogue: You are nothing but cowardly blight on this world.
trans: 你只不过是这个世界上懦弱的祸害。

Original: Sephiroth:I have no need for you aboard Mother's vessel to a new planet...!
Dialogue: I have no need for you aboard Mother's vessel to a new planet...!
trans: 我不需要你登上母亲的飞船前往新星球……！

Original: Zack:Your mother's vessel...
Dialogue: Your mother's vessel...
trans: 你妈妈的船...

Original: Zack:You don't hold anything dear. You're no hero!
Dialogue: You don't hold anything dear. You're no hero!
trans: 你不珍惜任何东西。

Original: Cloud:We won't let you get away with this!
Dialogue: We won't let you get away with this!
trans: 我们不会让你得逞的！

Original: Sephiroth:You bore me.
Dialogue: You bore me.
trans: 你让我厌烦。

Original: Sephiroth:You will all die here.
Dialogue: You will all die here.
trans: 你们都会死在这里。

Original: Sephiroth:Who dares interrupt me?
Dialogue: Who dares interrupt me?
trans: 谁敢打扰我？

Original: Ignis:So this is the other god.
Dialogue: So this is the other god.
trans: 所以这是另一个神。

Original: Noct:Aren't we enemies?
Dialogue: Aren't we enemies?
trans: 我们不是敌人吗？

Original: Zack:Why did you come here?
Dialogue: Why did you come here?
trans: 你为什么来这里？

Original: Spiritus:To settle this. I cannot overlook your recklessness now.
Dialogue: To settle this. I cannot overlook your recklessness now.
trans: 解决这个问题。

Original: Spiritus:The fallen hero will be thrown into the rift between space and time.
Dialogue: The fallen hero will be thrown into the rift between space and time.
trans: 堕落的英雄将被扔进时空的裂缝中。

Original: Sephiroth:Hahaha...
Dialogue: Hahaha...
trans: 哈哈哈...

Original: Cloud:What are you laughing at now?
Dialogue: What are you laughing at now?
trans: 你现在在笑什么？

Original: Sephiroth:Don't you understand? The one on the gods' throne can seal away warriors.
Dialogue: Don't you understand? The one on the gods' throne can seal away warriors.
trans: 你不明白吗？

Original: Sephiroth:But this world no longer belongs to the gods. The empty throne has no power over me.
Dialogue: But this world no longer belongs to the gods. The empty throne has no power over me.
trans: 但这个世界已经不属于众神了。

Original: Zack:Running away!?
Dialogue: Running away!?
trans: 逃跑！？

Original: Noct:Calm down.
Dialogue: Calm down.
trans: 冷静下来。

Original: Ignis:You'll be caught in the seal.
Dialogue: You'll be caught in the seal.
trans: 你会被困在海豹中。

Original: Spiritus:He got away. This place is fine...
Dialogue: He got away. This place is fine...
trans: 他逃走了。

Original: Noct:Far from it.
Dialogue: Far from it.
trans: 离得很远。

Original: Spiritus:The throne cannot be left empty.
Dialogue: The throne cannot be left empty.
trans: 宝座不能空着。

Original: Spiritus:Yes, but barely...
Dialogue: Yes, but barely...
trans: 是的，但勉强...

Original: Zack:Was Sephiroth able to defeat her because we didn't believe in her?
Dialogue: Was Sephiroth able to defeat her because we didn't believe in her?
trans: Sephiroth 之所以能够打败她，是因为我们不相信她吗？

Original: Spiritus:The authority of the gods should not be shaken so easily. Something is happening to this world.
Dialogue: The authority of the gods should not be shaken so easily. Something is happening to this world.
trans: 诸神的权威，应该不会这么轻易动摇。

Original: Spiritus:While I search for the origin, you must restore Materia to her throne.
Dialogue: While I search for the origin, you must restore Materia to her throne.
trans: 在我寻找起源的同时，你必须将 Materia 恢复到她的王座上。

Original: Zack:Is she breathing?
Dialogue: Is she breathing?
trans: 她在呼吸吗？

Original: Materia:You are all...safe...
Dialogue: You are all...safe...
trans: 你们都……安全……

Original: Lightning:I wanted to get back at her for what she's done, but...not like this.
Dialogue: I wanted to get back at her for what she's done, but...not like this.
trans: 我想报复她的所作所为，但是……不是这样的。

Original: Lightning:How did this happen?
Dialogue: How did this happen?
trans: 这怎么发生的？

Original: Materia:I'm so sorry...
Dialogue: I'm so sorry...
trans: 我很抱歉...

Original: Zack:Apologies won't help us now. We need to know what happened.
Dialogue: Apologies won't help us now. We need to know what happened.
trans: 现在道歉对我们没有帮助。

Original: Warrior of Light:Your position wasn't meant to be so easily shaken by us.
Dialogue: Your position wasn't meant to be so easily shaken by us.
trans: 你的立场不是为了让我们那么容易动摇的。

Original: Materia:Indeed. But reality is different.
Dialogue: Indeed. But reality is different.
trans: 的确。

Original: Materia:When you lost faith in me, I felt my power weakening.
Dialogue: When you lost faith in me, I felt my power weakening.
trans: 当你对我失去信心时，我感到自己的力量在减弱。

Original: Materia:The wish that desired this world rendered me impotent.
Dialogue: The wish that desired this world rendered me impotent.
trans: 渴望这个世界的愿望使我无能为力。

Original: Noct:But you made this world.
Dialogue: But you made this world.
trans: 但你创造了这个世界。

Original: Materia:The ones who made the world and its laws was us.
Dialogue: The ones who made the world and its laws was us.
trans: 创造世界及其法则的是我们。

Original: Materia:But the one who wished for its creation was neither Spiritus nor myself.
Dialogue: But the one who wished for its creation was neither Spiritus nor myself.
trans: 但希望创造它的人既不是 Spiritus 也不是我自己。

Original: Materia:It was the crystal's desire, and the ones we summoned.
Dialogue: It was the crystal's desire, and the ones we summoned.
trans: 这是水晶的愿望，也是我们召唤的。

Original: Materia:But I was unable to fulfill that wish and my duty...
Dialogue: But I was unable to fulfill that wish and my duty...
trans: 但我无法实现那个愿望和我的职责......

Original: Lightning:Do you understand that the "respite" you tried to force on us was a mistake?
Dialogue: Do you understand that the "respite" you tried to force on us was a mistake?
trans: 你明白你试图强加给我们的“喘息”是个错误吗？

Original: Materia:...I didn't understand. even now, I still don't.
Dialogue: ...I didn't understand. even now, I still don't.
trans: ……我不明白。

Original: Materia:I merely govern the physical laws.
Dialogue: I merely govern the physical laws.
trans: 我只是支配物理定律。

Original: Materia:Even if I know that a human body needs rest, I don't understand how to rest one's spirit.
Dialogue: Even if I know that a human body needs rest, I don't understand how to rest one's spirit.
trans: 纵然知道人的身体需要休息，却不知道如何让精神休息。

Original: Materia:But even though I don't understand, I cannot leave my throne.
Dialogue: But even though I don't understand, I cannot leave my throne.
trans: 但即使我不明白，我也不能离开我的宝座。

Original: Ignis:Like a king's throne. It is a predetermined position.
Dialogue: Like a king's throne. It is a predetermined position.
trans: 就像国王的宝座。

Original: Materia:Perhaps that is true in your world.
Dialogue: Perhaps that is true in your world.
trans: 也许在你的世界里也是如此。

Original: Warrior of Light:You should have left it to us. We could have talked it out.
Dialogue: You should have left it to us. We could have talked it out.
trans: 你应该把它留给我们。

Original: Noct:I suppose you just didn't get around to that.
Dialogue: I suppose you just didn't get around to that.
trans: 我想你只是没有解决这个问题。

Original: Lightning:Why didn't you resist your fate?
Dialogue: Why didn't you resist your fate?
trans: 你为什么不反抗你的命运？

Original: Ignis:There must have been some reason behind it.
Dialogue: There must have been some reason behind it.
trans: 这背后一定有某种原因。

Original: Materia:No, it's as you said. I probably should have resisted.
Dialogue: No, it's as you said. I probably should have resisted.
trans: 不，就像你说的那样。

Original: Materia:Perhaps I should have said something.
Dialogue: Perhaps I should have said something.
trans: 也许我应该说些什么。

Original: Materia:Even if your respite was hollow and fake...
Dialogue: Even if your respite was hollow and fake...
trans: 即使你的喘息是空洞的和虚假的......

Original: Materia:I felt...happy.
Dialogue: I felt...happy.
trans: 我感到……快乐。

Original: Materia:Seeing you laugh and deepen your friendships made me...happy.
Dialogue: Seeing you laugh and deepen your friendships made me...happy.
trans: 看到你笑，加深你们的友谊让我……很开心。

Original: Materia:That is all I can say.
Dialogue: That is all I can say.
trans: 我只能说这些。

Original: Noct:Now what?
Dialogue: Now what?
trans: 怎么办？

Original: Warrior of Light:We cannot leave the throne empty. Can you stay here and be our strength?
Dialogue: We cannot leave the throne empty. Can you stay here and be our strength?
trans: 我们不能让宝座空着。

Original: Materia:Is that acceptable to you?
Dialogue: Is that acceptable to you?
trans: 你能接受吗？

Original: Zack:We can't just abandon you now. Let's talk again after you've rested up.
Dialogue: We can't just abandon you now. Let's talk again after you've rested up.
trans: 我们不能现在就抛弃你。

Original: Ignis:This world's danger affects us all. We must face it together.
Dialogue: This world's danger affects us all. We must face it together.
trans: 这个世界的危险影响到我们所有人。

Original: Materia:Thank you, my warriors. Let us meet again.
Dialogue: Thank you, my warriors. Let us meet again.
trans: 谢谢你们，我的勇士们。

Original: Noct:Why is that guy only trying to get close to Ignis?
Dialogue: Why is that guy only trying to get close to Ignis?
trans: 为什么那家伙只想接近伊格尼斯？

Original: Squall:You mean Vayne?
Dialogue: You mean Vayne?
trans: 你是说薇恩？

Original: Ignis:He was the first person I met upon arriving here.
Dialogue: He was the first person I met upon arriving here.
trans: 他是我到这里遇到的第一个人。

Original: Prompto:Even before us, huh.
Dialogue: Even before us, huh.
trans: 甚至在我们之前，嗯。

Original: Rinoa:Until now, our friends who had their memories intact have shown up near us.
Dialogue: Until now, our friends who had their memories intact have shown up near us.
trans: 直到现在，我们的记忆完好无损的朋友们已经出现在我们附近。

Original: Ignis:I think that was Materia's intention when she sent me on my way.
Dialogue: I think that was Materia's intention when she sent me on my way.
trans: 我认为那是 Materia 送我上路时的意图。

Original: Balthier:But she was weak, wasn't she? Perhaps she misjudged the distance.
Dialogue: But she was weak, wasn't she? Perhaps she misjudged the distance.
trans: 但她很虚弱，不是吗？

Original: Noct:And that alone created the pretext for another fight...
Dialogue: And that alone created the pretext for another fight...
trans: 仅此一项就为另一场战斗创造了借口......

Original: Squall:Did he do something you didn't like?
Dialogue: Did he do something you didn't like?
trans: 他做了你不喜欢的事吗？

Original: Balthier:He said so himself that he wished to have been as fortunate in his comrades.
Dialogue: He said so himself that he wished to have been as fortunate in his comrades.
trans: 他自己也这么说，他希望自己的同志们也有同样的幸运。

Original: Balthier:If Vayne returns to our world, he will be a candidate for the next emperor. He was in a dispute with his siblings over the right to succession.
Dialogue: If Vayne returns to our world, he will be a candidate for the next emperor. He was in a dispute with his siblings over the right to succession.
trans: 如果薇恩回到我们的世界，他将成为下一任皇帝的候选人。

Original: Ignis:Yes, he did mention something like that.
Dialogue: Yes, he did mention something like that.
trans: 是的，他确实提到了类似的事情。

Original: Balthier:His path up until then is stained with blood. That empire has always been that way.
Dialogue: His path up until then is stained with blood. That empire has always been that way.
trans: 直到那时，他的道路都沾满了鲜血。

Original: Prompto:Totally different from Noct!
Dialogue: Totally different from Noct!
trans: 和诺克完全不同！

Original: Noct:Not now, man.
Dialogue: Not now, man.
trans: 现在不行，伙计。

Original: Squall:I suppose he might be jealous of your friends.
Dialogue: I suppose he might be jealous of your friends.
trans: 我想他可能嫉妒你的朋友。

Original: Balthier:That might be the truth, however hard it is to believe. At the very least, it seems you and he have no common ground.
Dialogue: That might be the truth, however hard it is to believe. At the very least, it seems you and he have no common ground.
trans: 这可能是事实，无论多么难以置信。

Original: Prompto:No way! I wouldn't want to be close to someone surrounded by conspiracies like that.
Dialogue: No way! I wouldn't want to be close to someone surrounded by conspiracies like that.
trans: 决不！

Original: Ignis:Quarrels are merely something that follow royalty around.
Dialogue: Quarrels are merely something that follow royalty around.
trans: 争吵只是皇室的事情。

Original: Ignis:Though most should be easily avoidable.
Dialogue: Though most should be easily avoidable.
trans: 虽然大多数应该很容易避免。

Original: Rinoa:Hmm... To that guy...
Dialogue: Hmm... To that guy...
trans: 嗯……对那个人……

Original: Rinoa:Noct must seem so happy.
Dialogue: Noct must seem so happy.
trans: Noct 一定很高兴吧。

Original: Rinoa:I guess that's what might make him jealous, like Squall said.
Dialogue: I guess that's what might make him jealous, like Squall said.
trans: 我想这可能会让他嫉妒，就像 Squall 说的那样。

Original: Rinoa:Noct is surrounded by reliable friends who laugh and smile with him.
Dialogue: Noct is surrounded by reliable friends who laugh and smile with him.
trans: Noct 周围都是可靠的朋友，他们会和他一起欢笑。

Original: Noct:I don't get it, but isn't it normal to be happy to have good friends?
Dialogue: I don't get it, but isn't it normal to be happy to have good friends?
trans: 我不明白，但是有好朋友开心不是很正常吗？

Original: Prompto:It must be tough being him...
Dialogue: It must be tough being him...
trans: 做他一定很难...

Original: Ignis:An arbitrary and false accusation.
Dialogue: An arbitrary and false accusation.
trans: 任意和错误的指控。

Original: Balthier:Indeed. Our worlds are governed by different principles. It's not a problem worth meddling in.
Dialogue: Indeed. Our worlds are governed by different principles. It's not a problem worth meddling in.
trans: 的确。

Original: Locke:I thought the gods were making fools of us, but seeing them like that is...sad.
Dialogue: I thought the gods were making fools of us, but seeing them like that is...sad.
trans: 我以为众神在愚弄我们，但看到他们那样……令人难过。

Original: Ignis:Even the gods cannot choose their fate.
Dialogue: Even the gods cannot choose their fate.
trans: 即使是神也无法选择自己的命运。

Original: Warrior of Light:Being chosen by the crystal, or being born royalty...
Dialogue: Being chosen by the crystal, or being born royalty...
trans: 被水晶选中，还是天生皇族……

Original: Warrior of Light:It must be frustrating having to accept that fate. It was a mistake turning our anger on Materia.
Dialogue: It must be frustrating having to accept that fate. It was a mistake turning our anger on Materia.
trans: 不得不接受这种命运一定令人沮丧。

Original: Zack:Maybe the story's gotten too confusing. We should tell Materia...
Dialogue: Maybe the story's gotten too confusing. We should tell Materia...
trans: 也许这个故事变得太混乱了。

Original: Zack:Tell her what we're thinking and how she can help.
Dialogue: Tell her what we're thinking and how she can help.
trans: 告诉她我们的想法以及她可以如何提供帮助。

Original: Lightning:I might not like it, but she's our ally now. We just have to accept that.
Dialogue: I might not like it, but she's our ally now. We just have to accept that.
trans: 我可能不喜欢，但她现在是我们的盟友了。

Original: Warrior of Light:We need to work together to rid this world of danger.
Dialogue: We need to work together to rid this world of danger.
trans: 我们需要共同努力，让这个世界摆脱危险。

Original: Spiritus:What's this...?
Dialogue: What's this...?
trans: 这是什么...？

Original: Spiritus:The crystal core of darkness's power is growing...
Dialogue: The crystal core of darkness's power is growing...
trans: 黑暗之力的晶核正在成长……

Original: Spiritus:The balance of light and dark is crumbling. Someone is giving it limitless power...
Dialogue: The balance of light and dark is crumbling. Someone is giving it limitless power...
trans: 光明与黑暗的平衡正在崩溃。

Original: Spiritus:Is it losing control?
Dialogue: Is it losing control?
trans: 它正在失去控制吗？

Original: ???:So the gods don't understand after all. I am fighting my fate.
Dialogue: So the gods don't understand after all. I am fighting my fate.
trans: 所以诸神终究是不明白。

Original: ???:Making light of the will of humans... You will regret making this world.
Dialogue: Making light of the will of humans... You will regret making this world.
trans: 轻视人类的意志……你会后悔创造这个世界的。

Original: ???:I will draw in the darkness and destroy the kings, gods, and world.
Dialogue: I will draw in the darkness and destroy the kings, gods, and world.
trans: 我将吸引黑暗并摧毁国王、众神和世界。

Original: Dark Manikin (Bartz):I see... With this...
Dialogue: I see... With this...
trans: 我明白了……有了这个……

Original: Faris:Bartz! Hey, hang in there!
Dialogue: Bartz! Hey, hang in there!
trans: 巴茨！

Original: Galuf:How terrible...
Dialogue: How terrible...
trans: 多么可怕...

Original: Krile:Wake up!
Dialogue: Wake up!
trans: 醒来！

Original: Lenna:Please, get up, Bartz!
Dialogue: Please, get up, Bartz!
trans: 请起床，巴茨！

Original: Galuf:This reckless fool...!
Dialogue: This reckless fool...!
trans: 这个鲁莽的笨蛋……！

Original: Spiritus:Rectify the distortions in this world as one of my soldiers.
Dialogue: Rectify the distortions in this world as one of my soldiers.
trans: 作为我的士兵之一，纠正这个世界的扭曲。

Original: Leo:I am grateful for your trust and the arrangement. However...
Dialogue: I am grateful for your trust and the arrangement. However...
trans: 感谢您的信任和安排。

Original: Leo:Allow me to think about the command you have given.
Dialogue: Allow me to think about the command you have given.
trans: 请允许我考虑一下您发出的命令。

Original: Leo:There appears to be an order to this world, as there is within me.
Dialogue: There appears to be an order to this world, as there is within me.
trans: 这个世界似乎有秩序，就像我内心一样。

Original: Leo:Though I have lost my life once... No, because I have...
Dialogue: Though I have lost my life once... No, because I have...
trans: 虽然我曾经失去过生命……不，因为我有……

Original: Leo:I must ensure I use this one wisely.
Dialogue: I must ensure I use this one wisely.
trans: 我必须确保我明智地使用这个。

Original: Spiritus:Very well... You may have the freedom to do so for a while.
Dialogue: Very well... You may have the freedom to do so for a while.
trans: 很好......你可以自由地这样做一段时间。

Original: Spiritus:Descend to the land of respite and discern for yourself what you must do.
Dialogue: Descend to the land of respite and discern for yourself what you must do.
trans: 下降到喘息之地，亲自辨别你必须做什么。

Original: Leo:Why did he choose me...?
Dialogue: Why did he choose me...?
trans: 他为什么选择我……？

Original: Gilgamesh:Ho? A new face?
Dialogue: Ho? A new face?
trans: 何？

Original: Leo:You there! Are you some sort of monster!?
Dialogue: You there! Are you some sort of monster!?
trans: 你在那里！

Original: Gilgamesh:Well that's not very nice! Though I can see where you're coming from...
Dialogue: Well that's not very nice! Though I can see where you're coming from...
trans: 那不是很好！

Original: Gilgamesh:I am Gilgamesh! A warrior of humanity and justice! I merely wish to talk to you.
Dialogue: I am Gilgamesh! A warrior of humanity and justice! I merely wish to talk to you.
trans: 我是吉尔伽美什！

Original: Leo:A warrior?
Dialogue: A warrior?
trans: 战士？

Original: Leo:Are monsters capable of masquerading as warriors in this world...?
Dialogue: Are monsters capable of masquerading as warriors in this world...?
trans: 在这个世界上，怪物可以伪装成战士吗……？

Original: Gilgamesh:Never you mind that! The ways of this world take some getting used to.
Dialogue: Never you mind that! The ways of this world take some getting used to.
trans: 别介意！

Original: Gilgamesh:Were you summoned by Spiritus or Materia? Depending on which, I may be able to lend a hand!
Dialogue: Were you summoned by Spiritus or Materia? Depending on which, I may be able to lend a hand!
trans: 你是被 Spiritus 还是 Materia 召唤的？

Original: Leo:So I take it you were also summoned by a god, sir?
Dialogue: So I take it you were also summoned by a god, sir?
trans: 所以我想你也是被神召唤的，先生？

Original: Gilgamesh:There's no need for pleasantries. Just call me Gilgamesh.
Dialogue: There's no need for pleasantries. Just call me Gilgamesh.
trans: 无需客套话。

Original: Gilgamesh:So what happened?
Dialogue: So what happened?
trans: 所以发生了什么事？

Original: Leo:...I find that difficult to determine.
Dialogue: ...I find that difficult to determine.
trans: ……我觉得很难确定。

Original: Leo:It might be hard for you to understand, Sir Gilgamesh, as we've just met, but...
Dialogue: It might be hard for you to understand, Sir Gilgamesh, as we've just met, but...
trans: 你可能很难理解，吉尔伽美什爵士，因为我们刚刚认识，但是......

Original: Leo:I was once slain in battle.
Dialogue: I was once slain in battle.
trans: 我曾经战死沙场。

Original: Gilgamesh:Ha ha! So you're one of those.
Dialogue: Ha ha! So you're one of those.
trans: 哈哈！

Original: Leo:What do you mean?
Dialogue: What do you mean?
trans: 你是什​​么意思？

Original: Gilgamesh:There're plenty more what have stories like that in this world!
Dialogue: There're plenty more what have stories like that in this world!
trans: 世界上还有很多这样的故事！

Original: Gilgamesh:What selfish gods.
Dialogue: What selfish gods.
trans: 多么自私的神。

Original: Leo:I heard what happened in my world.
Dialogue: I heard what happened in my world.
trans: 我听说我的世界发生了什么。

Original: Leo:...And those I knew stopped his evil ambitions.
Dialogue: ...And those I knew stopped his evil ambitions.
trans: ......而我认识的人阻止了他邪恶的野心。

Original: Gilgamesh:It doesn't seem real if you weren't there, does it? I know how you feel!
Dialogue: It doesn't seem real if you weren't there, does it? I know how you feel!
trans: 如果你不在场，它看起来就不真实，是吗？

Original: Leo:Have you been in this world long, Sir Gilgamesh?
Dialogue: Have you been in this world long, Sir Gilgamesh?
trans: 吉尔伽美什爵士，你在这个世界上呆了很久吗？

Original: Gilgamesh:I think I arrived quite early on, wandering between the dimensions.
Dialogue: I think I arrived quite early on, wandering between the dimensions.
trans: 我想我很早就到了，在维度之间徘徊。

Original: Gilgamesh:Say! If you don't know where you're going, why don't you come with me?
Dialogue: Say! If you don't know where you're going, why don't you come with me?
trans: 说！

Original: Gilgamesh:There are monsters roaming everywhere, so there's safety in numbers.
Dialogue: There are monsters roaming everywhere, so there's safety in numbers.
trans: 到处都有怪物游荡，所以人多安全。

Original: Leo:You have my gratitude.
Dialogue: You have my gratitude.
trans: 你有我的感激之情。

Original: Gilgamesh:Sweat it not! A journey needs a companion as the world needs compassion! It ain't in me to look the other way if someone's in a bind.
Dialogue: Sweat it not! A journey needs a companion as the world needs compassion! It ain't in me to look the other way if someone's in a bind.
trans: 不要流汗！

Original: Gilgamesh:Uh-oh...
Dialogue: Uh-oh...
trans: 呃哦...

Original: Gilgamesh:Where did Little Leo go...?
Dialogue: Where did Little Leo go...?
trans: 小里奥去哪儿了……？

Original: Mog:Kupo! The coordinates are right here...kupo!?
Dialogue: Kupo! The coordinates are right here...kupo!?
trans: 库波！

Original: Bartz:Seriously? It's just Gilgamesh.
Dialogue: Seriously? It's just Gilgamesh.
trans: 严重地？

Original: Gilgamesh:What do you mean, just me!? I set off these coordinates on purpose!
Dialogue: What do you mean, just me!? I set off these coordinates on purpose!
trans: 什么意思，只有我！？

Original: Gilgamesh:You sure took your time getting here! I was starting to get worried!
Dialogue: You sure took your time getting here! I was starting to get worried!
trans: 你真的花时间来到这里！

Original: Lulu:I suppose you aren't the only one who's disappointed. We thought we would find a new comrade...
Dialogue: I suppose you aren't the only one who's disappointed. We thought we would find a new comrade...
trans: 我想你不是唯一感到失望的人。

Original: Mog:Yeah, kupo!
Dialogue: Yeah, kupo!
trans: 是啊，笨蛋！

Original: Terra:Mog was sure someone was here, which is why we came down.
Dialogue: Mog was sure someone was here, which is why we came down.
trans: 莫格确信有人在这里，这就是我们下来的原因。

Original: Celes:Did you send out a strong signal to lure us in?
Dialogue: Did you send out a strong signal to lure us in?
trans: 是不是发出了强烈的信号，引诱我们进去？

Original: Gilgamesh:How rude! I wasn't trying to lure you in! I called you on purpose!
Dialogue: How rude! I wasn't trying to lure you in! I called you on purpose!
trans: 太粗鲁了！

Original: Gilgamesh:I made a new friend named Little Leo, but we got separated.
Dialogue: I made a new friend named Little Leo, but we got separated.
trans: 我交了一个新朋友 Little Leo，但我们分开了。

Original: Gilgamesh:He isn't used to this world and seemed to have a lot on his mind...
Dialogue: He isn't used to this world and seemed to have a lot on his mind...
trans: 他不习惯这个世界，似乎有很多心事……

Original: Gilgamesh:But I can't find him on my own here because...of reasons! Please help me!
Dialogue: But I can't find him on my own here because...of reasons! Please help me!
trans: 但我不能独自在这里找到他，因为……原因！

Original: Gilgamesh:Yes! He said he was from the same world as you ladies!
Dialogue: Yes! He said he was from the same world as you ladies!
trans: 是的！

Original: Celes:You mean General Leo!?
Dialogue: You mean General Leo!?
trans: 你是说雷欧将军！？

Original: Gilgamesh:Oho! A colleague, I see!
Dialogue: Oho! A colleague, I see!
trans: 哦！

Original: Lulu:A friend of yours?
Dialogue: A friend of yours?
trans: 你的一个朋友？

Original: Terra:No, but...he wasn't a bad person.
Dialogue: No, but...he wasn't a bad person.
trans: 不，但是……他不是坏人。

Original: Celes:Before he could achieve his goal, Kefka...
Dialogue: Before he could achieve his goal, Kefka...
trans: 在他实现目标之前，凯夫卡...

Original: Gilgamesh:He knew about that, too! Spiritus told him all about it.
Dialogue: He knew about that, too! Spiritus told him all about it.
trans: 这件事他也知道！

Original: Gilgamesh:But unlike Spiritus's other warriors, he doesn't seem out to avenge himself.
Dialogue: But unlike Spiritus's other warriors, he doesn't seem out to avenge himself.
trans: 但与 Spiritus 的其他战士不同，他似乎并不打算为自己报仇。

Original: Gilgamesh:He wanted to know more about this world and those he's fighting.
Dialogue: He wanted to know more about this world and those he's fighting.
trans: 他想更多地了解这个世界和他正在战斗的人。

Original: Celes:That sounds like him alright.
Dialogue: That sounds like him alright.
trans: 听起来他还不错。

Original: Terra:General Leo... I wish I could have learned more from him.
Dialogue: General Leo... I wish I could have learned more from him.
trans: 里奥将军……我希望我能从他那里学到更多。

Original: Bartz:I'd love to meet the guy. He should be around here somewhere, right?
Dialogue: I'd love to meet the guy. He should be around here somewhere, right?
trans: 我很想见见那个人。

Original: Lulu:Are we really going to look for him? Won't that be going out of our way?
Dialogue: Are we really going to look for him? Won't that be going out of our way?
trans: 我们真的要去找他吗？

Original: Mog:That's true, kupo...
Dialogue: That's true, kupo...
trans: 原来如此，库波...

Original: Mog:But if this is where one of Spiritus's warriors landed, then there's got to be a reason.
Dialogue: But if this is where one of Spiritus's warriors landed, then there's got to be a reason.
trans: 但如果这是 Spiritus 的一名战士降落的地方，那一定是有原因的。

Original: Celes:General Leo's got a good head on his shoulders, but he's still an imperial general at the end of the day.
Dialogue: General Leo's got a good head on his shoulders, but he's still an imperial general at the end of the day.
trans: 雷欧将军的脑袋倒是不错，但终究还是个帝国将军。

Original: Celes:His honest personality may or may not be being used by someone.
Dialogue: His honest personality may or may not be being used by someone.
trans: 他诚实的个性可能会或可能不会被某人使用。

Original: Bartz:Then let's go find Gilgamesh's friend.
Dialogue: Then let's go find Gilgamesh's friend.
trans: 那么我们去找吉尔伽美什的朋友吧。

Original: Gilgamesh:I am in your debt!
Dialogue: I am in your debt!
trans: 我欠你的债！

Original: Leo:Hmmm... Where did Sir Gilgamesh go?
Dialogue: Hmmm... Where did Sir Gilgamesh go?
trans: 嗯……吉尔伽美什爵士去哪儿了？

Original: Leo:Well, I suppose this too is destiny.
Dialogue: Well, I suppose this too is destiny.
trans: 好吧，我想这也是命运。

Original: Leo:They were all such fine soldiers.
Dialogue: They were all such fine soldiers.
trans: 他们都是那么优秀的士兵。

Original: Leo:But I was summoned back to the empire at that time...
Dialogue: But I was summoned back to the empire at that time...
trans: 但是那个时候我被召回了帝国……

Original: Leo:Kefka acted selfishly and disobeyed the emperor.
Dialogue: Kefka acted selfishly and disobeyed the emperor.
trans: 凯夫卡自私自利，不服从皇帝。

Original: Leo:Without an empire or a people to protect...what do I do?
Dialogue: Without an empire or a people to protect...what do I do?
trans: 没有帝国或人民需要保护……我该怎么办？

Original: Leo:For what purpose am I living this life...?
Dialogue: For what purpose am I living this life...?
trans: 我这一生到底是为了什么……？

Original: Cyan:So even General Leo has come to this world...
Dialogue: So even General Leo has come to this world...
trans: 原来连雷欧将军也来到了这个世界……

Original: Cyan:But he does not know what befell our world. His devotion to the empire should still be intact.
Dialogue: But he does not know what befell our world. His devotion to the empire should still be intact.
trans: 但他不知道我们的世界发生了什么。

Original: Ashe:Your homeland... Have you two fought before?
Dialogue: Your homeland... Have you two fought before?
trans: 你的祖国……你们两个以前打过仗吗？

Original: Sabin:Yeah. Cyan's hometown was in a desert like this one.
Dialogue: Yeah. Cyan's hometown was in a desert like this one.
trans: 是的。

Original: Ashe:It sounds like you lost to the empire...
Dialogue: It sounds like you lost to the empire...
trans: 听起来你输给了帝国......

Original: Sabin:I think General Leo is someone who can discern right from wrong.
Dialogue: I think General Leo is someone who can discern right from wrong.
trans: 我觉得里奥将军是明辨是非的人。

Original: Sabin:But the result was tragic... Not even townspeople or children escaped.
Dialogue: But the result was tragic... Not even townspeople or children escaped.
trans: 但结果却是悲惨的……连市民和孩子都没有逃过一劫。

Original: Sabin:What do you think?
Dialogue: What do you think?
trans: 你怎么认为？

Original: Shadow:Cyan's home fell while Leo was back in his own country.
Dialogue: Cyan's home fell while Leo was back in his own country.
trans: 当利奥回到自己的国家时，青色的家倒塌了。

Original: Shadow:What do you intend to do, Cyan?
Dialogue: What do you intend to do, Cyan?
trans: 你打算做什么，青色？

Original: Lenna:If we leave him alone, I fear he will be manipulated by some ill-willed warrior.
Dialogue: If we leave him alone, I fear he will be manipulated by some ill-willed warrior.
trans: 如果我们不管他，我担心他会被一些意志薄弱的战士所操纵。

Original: Ashe:That said, though, whether or not we journey together depends on Cyan...
Dialogue: That said, though, whether or not we journey together depends on Cyan...
trans: 尽管如此，我们是否一起旅行取决于 Cyan...

Original: Onion Knight:According to Gilgamesh, he's one of Spiritus's soldiers, right?
Dialogue: According to Gilgamesh, he's one of Spiritus's soldiers, right?
trans: 根据吉尔伽美什的说法，他是斯皮里图斯的士兵之一，对吧？

Original: Onion Knight:If we can reason with him, maybe we should keep him on our side.
Dialogue: If we can reason with him, maybe we should keep him on our side.
trans: 如果我们能跟他讲道理，也许我们应该让他站在我们这边。

Original: Lenna:Of course... But my heart does hurt at the thought...
Dialogue: Of course... But my heart does hurt at the thought...
trans: 当然。。。但是一想到我的心就痛。。。

Original: Onion Knight:Seifer wasn't told anything, Jecht isn't aware of the details, and Kain was called at an early time.
Dialogue: Seifer wasn't told anything, Jecht isn't aware of the details, and Kain was called at an early time.
trans: Seifer 没有被告知任何事情，Jecht 也不知道细节，而 Kain 很早就接到了电话。

Original: Onion Knight:This General Leo knows what Spiritus is thinking now, which makes him very rare.
Dialogue: This General Leo knows what Spiritus is thinking now, which makes him very rare.
trans: 这位里奥将军知道斯皮里图斯现在在想什么，这让他很是难得。

Original: Cyan:We needn't stop out of consideration for me.
Dialogue: We needn't stop out of consideration for me.
trans: 我们不必为了我而停下来。

Original: Cyan:Facing an old enemy again is some sort of fate, I am certain.
Dialogue: Facing an old enemy again is some sort of fate, I am certain.
trans: 再次面对宿敌，我敢肯定，这是一种宿命。

Original: Sabin:We can think about it more after we meet him. But we gotta find him first!
Dialogue: We can think about it more after we meet him. But we gotta find him first!
trans: 我们可以在遇到他之后再多考虑一下。

Original: Cyan:Indeed. The time I spent with that general was short.
Dialogue: Indeed. The time I spent with that general was short.
trans: 的确。

Original: Cyan:Perhaps in this world we share a righteous heart.
Dialogue: Perhaps in this world we share a righteous heart.
trans: 也许在这个世界上我们都有一颗正直的心。

Original: Sazh:So how did you meet General Leo, Gilgamesh?
Dialogue: So how did you meet General Leo, Gilgamesh?
trans: 那么你是怎么认识里奥将军的，吉尔伽美什？

Original: Gilgamesh:Oho! The million-gil question!
Dialogue: Oho! The million-gil question!
trans: 哦！

Original: Edgar:Was our lone wolf yearning for some company after wandering the dimensions for so long?
Dialogue: Was our lone wolf yearning for some company after wandering the dimensions for so long?
trans: 在异界游荡了这么久之后，我们这只独狼是否渴望有人陪伴？

Original: Gilgamesh:You got it all wrong! My elite warrior senses picked up a troubled will!
Dialogue: You got it all wrong! My elite warrior senses picked up a troubled will!
trans: 你完全错了！

Original: Gilgamesh:Listen to this. When we were in the space between dimensions...
Dialogue: Listen to this. When we were in the space between dimensions...
trans: 听听这个。

Original: Leo:I see... So even you have served as a general.
Dialogue: I see... So even you have served as a general.
trans: 原来如此……原来你也当过将军啊。

Original: Gilgamesh:And not just any general!
Dialogue: And not just any general!
trans: 而且不只是任何将军！

Original: Gilgamesh:I served a warlock who would've sacrificed anything for power!
Dialogue: I served a warlock who would've sacrificed anything for power!
trans: 我服务于一个愿意为权力牺牲任何东西的术士！

Original: Gilgamesh:Anyway... A lot of things happened and I asked to be dismissed from duty.
Dialogue: Anyway... A lot of things happened and I asked to be dismissed from duty.
trans: 反正……发生了很多事，我要求免职。

Original: Leo:So you could no longer support your liege?
Dialogue: So you could no longer support your liege?
trans: 所以你不能再支持你的君主了？

Original: Leo:I suppose that makes us both traitors, then.
Dialogue: I suppose that makes us both traitors, then.
trans: 我想这让我们都变成了叛徒，那么。

Original: Gilgamesh:You didn't betray anyone! That was just Kefka's usual nonsense!
Dialogue: You didn't betray anyone! That was just Kefka's usual nonsense!
trans: 你没有背叛任何人！

Original: Leo:But the emperor didn't know the truth...and I remain a powerless traitor.
Dialogue: But the emperor didn't know the truth...and I remain a powerless traitor.
trans: 但皇帝并不知道真相……而我仍然是一个无能为力的叛徒。

Original: Leo:I never thought of severing my ties like you did, Sir Gilgamesh.
Dialogue: I never thought of severing my ties like you did, Sir Gilgamesh.
trans: 吉尔伽美什大人，我从未想过像您那样断绝关系。

Original: Leo:I couldn't make the right call, and now I'm left with nothing but regrets.
Dialogue: I couldn't make the right call, and now I'm left with nothing but regrets.
trans: 我没能做出正确的决定，现在我只剩下遗憾。

Original: Gilgamesh:Hey, hey! You can't let your thoughts stray into darkness! In this world, those feelings can turn into a terrifying power.
Dialogue: Hey, hey! You can't let your thoughts stray into darkness! In this world, those feelings can turn into a terrifying power.
trans: 嘿嘿！

Original: Gilgamesh:You'll get swept away by your emotions and fall under someone's control, and that'll be it.
Dialogue: You'll get swept away by your emotions and fall under someone's control, and that'll be it.
trans: 你会被情绪冲昏头脑，落入某人的控制之下，仅此而已。

Original: Leo:Why do you continue your journey here, Sir Gilgamesh?
Dialogue: Why do you continue your journey here, Sir Gilgamesh?
trans: 吉尔伽美什爵士，你为什么要在这里继续你的旅程？

Original: Gilgamesh:I've always been a wanderer of dimensions.
Dialogue: I've always been a wanderer of dimensions.
trans: 我一直是维度的流浪者。

Original: Gilgamesh:Staying in one place cramps my style, and I lend Bartz and his friends a hand once in a while.
Dialogue: Staying in one place cramps my style, and I lend Bartz and his friends a hand once in a while.
trans: 呆在一个地方限制了我的风格，我偶尔会向 Bartz 和他的朋友们伸出援手。

Original: Leo:I have no country or people to serve, and I know that I must determine my path on my own.
Dialogue: I have no country or people to serve, and I know that I must determine my path on my own.
trans: 我没有国家和人民可以服务，我知道我必须自己决定我的道路。

Original: Leo:But for some reason, I just can't bring myself to serve the god of another world.
Dialogue: But for some reason, I just can't bring myself to serve the god of another world.
trans: 但不知为何，我就是无法让自己侍奉异世界的神明。

Original: Gilgamesh:Did Spiritus tell you to obey him?
Dialogue: Did Spiritus tell you to obey him?
trans: Spiritus 有没有告诉你要服从他？

Original: Gilgamesh:That's weird... Spiritus has never told his warriors what to do.
Dialogue: That's weird... Spiritus has never told his warriors what to do.
trans: 这很奇怪……Spiritus 从未告诉他的战士们该做什么。

Original: Leo:I don't quite understand the situation, but it seemed urgent.
Dialogue: I don't quite understand the situation, but it seemed urgent.
trans: 我不太了解情况，但似乎很紧急。

Original: Leo:I know I must obey orders, but...
Dialogue: I know I must obey orders, but...
trans: 我知道我必须服从命令，但是...

Original: Gilgamesh:You don't need to worry about a thing, Little Leo, because you'll have me around! Ha ha!
Dialogue: You don't need to worry about a thing, Little Leo, because you'll have me around! Ha ha!
trans: 小里奥，你什么都不用担心，因为有我在你身边！

Original: Leo:Thank you, Sir Gilgamesh. ...But please don't call me "Little Leo" anymore.
Dialogue: Thank you, Sir Gilgamesh. ...But please don't call me "Little Leo" anymore.
trans: 谢谢你，吉尔伽美什爵士。

Original: Gilgamesh:Request denied! Ha ha ha!
Dialogue: Request denied! Ha ha ha!
trans: 请求被拒绝！

Original: Edgar:So General Leo was given an order from Spiritus...
Dialogue: So General Leo was given an order from Spiritus...
trans: 所以利奥将军接到了斯皮里图斯的命令……

Original: Edgar:Interfering directly with the world... I suppose even that god has found himself between a rock and a hard place.
Dialogue: Interfering directly with the world... I suppose even that god has found himself between a rock and a hard place.
trans: 直接干涉世界……我想连那个神也进退两难了。

Original: Sazh:He's more likely to listen to orders than someone like Kefka, that's for sure.
Dialogue: He's more likely to listen to orders than someone like Kefka, that's for sure.
trans: 比起凯夫卡这样的人，他更愿意听从命令，这是肯定的。

Original: Bartz:And that's how you two became friends?
Dialogue: And that's how you two became friends?
trans: 你们两个就是这样成为朋友的？

Original: Gilgamesh:That's right!
Dialogue: That's right!
trans: 这是正确的！

Original: Gilgamesh:What happened in his home world doesn't affect me. That's the great part of being a wanderer!
Dialogue: What happened in his home world doesn't affect me. That's the great part of being a wanderer!
trans: 他家乡发生的事对我没有影响。

Original: Edgar:Gilgamesh's friendships aside, I'm curious what that general and Spiritus are up to.
Dialogue: Gilgamesh's friendships aside, I'm curious what that general and Spiritus are up to.
trans: 撇开吉尔伽美什的友情不谈，我很好奇那位将军和斯皮里图斯在做什么。

Original: Gilgamesh:Don't you dare put my new friend aside!
Dialogue: Don't you dare put my new friend aside!
trans: 你敢把我的新朋友搁置一旁！

Original: Bartz:Easy there, Gilgamesh. We're going to go find him now.
Dialogue: Easy there, Gilgamesh. We're going to go find him now.
trans: 放轻松，吉尔伽美什。

Original: Gilgamesh:I knew you wouldn't let me down, Bartz!
Dialogue: I knew you wouldn't let me down, Bartz!
trans: 我知道你不会让我失望的，巴茨！

Original: Terra:General Leo!
Dialogue: General Leo!
trans: 里奥将军！

Original: Leo:That voice... Could it be?
Dialogue: That voice... Could it be?
trans: 那个声音……难道是？

Original: Gilgamesh:You're alright! Hoorah!
Dialogue: You're alright! Hoorah!
trans: 你没事吧！

Original: Edgar:You can call me a "Returner" if that's easier for you.
Dialogue: You can call me a "Returner" if that's easier for you.
trans: 如果这对你来说更容易的话，你可以叫我“回归者”。

Original: Celes:Edgar! Not now
Dialogue: Edgar! Not now—
trans: 埃德加！

Original: Leo:Ah, my apologies. For me...
Dialogue: Ah, my apologies. For me...
trans: 啊，对不起。

Original: Leo:You are still the King of Figaro. As Celes is still a general.
Dialogue: You are still the King of Figaro. As Celes is still a general.
trans: 你仍然是费加罗之王。

Original: Terra:I remember. You were betrayed by Kefka.
Dialogue: I remember. You were betrayed by Kefka.
trans: 我记得。

Original: Terra:You didn't do anything wrong. We can join forces now.
Dialogue: You didn't do anything wrong. We can join forces now.
trans: 你没有做错任何事。

Original: Leo:Terra... You've changed. Did this happen in the future unknown to me?
Dialogue: Terra... You've changed. Did this happen in the future unknown to me?
trans: 泰拉……你变了。

Original: Papalymo:"The future..." Spiritus can be cruel.
Dialogue: "The future..." Spiritus can be cruel.
trans: “未来……” Spiritus 可以是残酷的。

Original: Edgar:General. I have no doubt of your loyalty, so I don't want to coerce you.
Dialogue: General. I have no doubt of your loyalty, so I don't want to coerce you.
trans: 一般的。

Original: Edgar:But we would hate for someone with a will as strong and forthright as yours to be taken advantage of.
Dialogue: But we would hate for someone with a will as strong and forthright as yours to be taken advantage of.
trans: 但我们不希望像您这样意志坚强、直率的人被人利用。

Original: Edgar:So I want to ask you: Did Spiritus ask you to stop us?
Dialogue: So I want to ask you Did Spiritus ask you to stop us?
trans: 所以我想问问你 Spiritus 让你阻止我们了吗？

Original: Leo:No... But I was thinking it was quite heavy a task to bear alone.
Dialogue: No... But I was thinking it was quite heavy a task to bear alone.
trans: 不……但我觉得一个人承担的任务很重。

Original: Leo:To fight to protect this world would require some like-minded comrades.
Dialogue: To fight to protect this world would require some like-minded comrades.
trans: 为保护这个世界而战，需要一些志同道合的同志。

Original: Terra:That's perfect!
Dialogue: That's perfect!
trans: 那很完美！

Original: Papalymo:It's not that simple. He has no place to return to.
Dialogue: It's not that simple. He has no place to return to.
trans: 没那么简单。

Original: Papalymo:Time has stopped in this land of respite. There's no reason for those without a future to try and save it.
Dialogue: Time has stopped in this land of respite. There's no reason for those without a future to try and save it.
trans: 时间在这片喘息之地停止了。

Original: Papalymo:You saw what happened to the others who despised the world they came from, didn't you?
Dialogue: You saw what happened to the others who despised the world they came from, didn't you?
trans: 你看到了那些蔑视他们来自的世界的其他人的下场，不是吗？

Original: Leo:It is as he says.
Dialogue: It is as he says.
trans: 正如他所说。

Original: Leo:I have no intention of clinging to my life for the greater good. I do not want to cause anything out of anger or hatred.
Dialogue: I have no intention of clinging to my life for the greater good. I do not want to cause anything out of anger or hatred.
trans: 我无意为了更大的利益而坚持我的生命。

Original: Leo:But without the empire or its people...I have no reason to fight.
Dialogue: But without the empire or its people...I have no reason to fight.
trans: 但没有帝国和它的人民……我没有理由战斗。

Original: Leo:I am simply lost...for the first time in my life.
Dialogue: I am simply lost...for the first time in my life.
trans: 我只是迷路了……这是我生命中的第一次。

Original: Celes:I'm sorry I couldn't do anything for you.
Dialogue: I'm sorry I couldn't do anything for you.
trans: 对不起，我不能为你做任何事。

Original: Leo:You've changed, General Celes.
Dialogue: You've changed, General Celes.
trans: 你变了，塞莱斯将军。

Original: Leo:There is something I want to ask you.
Dialogue: There is something I want to ask you.
trans: 有件事想问你。

Original: Leo:Is it worth protecting both this world and the one you come from?
Dialogue: Is it worth protecting both this world and the one you come from?
trans: 保护这个世界和你来自的世界是否值得？

Original: Gilgamesh:Good grief, Little Leo! What are you doing!?
Dialogue: Good grief, Little Leo! What are you doing!?
trans: 天啊，小里奥！

Original: Leo:You taught me that the stronger someone's will, the greater their power, Sir Gilgamesh.
Dialogue: You taught me that the stronger someone's will, the greater their power, Sir Gilgamesh.
trans: 吉尔伽美什大人，是您告诉我，意志越强的人，力量就越大。

Original: Leo:The Terra I knew was an emotionless young woman who had lost her will.
Dialogue: The Terra I knew was an emotionless young woman who had lost her will.
trans: 我认识的泰拉是一个没有感情的失去意志的年轻女子。

Original: Leo:I would like to join hands with her and her friends.
Dialogue: I would like to join hands with her and her friends.
trans: 我愿与她和她的朋友们携手共进。

Original: Leo:If that power is true, I will believe that she regained her humanity.
Dialogue: If that power is true, I will believe that she regained her humanity.
trans: 如果那股力量是真的，我相信她已经恢复了人性。

Original: Terra:Then I'll show you what my will is capable of.
Dialogue: Then I'll show you what my will is capable of.
trans: 那我就让你看看我的意志能做什么。

Original: Edgar:As expected of the great General Leo. Then we won't hold back.
Dialogue: As expected of the great General Leo. Then we won't hold back.
trans: 不愧是伟大的雷欧将军。

Original: Leo:You have my gratitude...King of Figaro.
Dialogue: You have my gratitude...King of Figaro.
trans: 我感谢你……费加罗之王。

Original: Leo:Why do you fight?
Dialogue: Why do you fight?
trans: 你为什么打架？

Original: Celes:There are people I love, and I want to protect their world!
Dialogue: There are people I love, and I want to protect their world!
trans: 有我爱的人，我要保护他们的世界！

Original: Terra:I want to save those precious to me from my home!
Dialogue: I want to save those precious to me from my home!
trans: 我想把那些对我来说很珍贵的东西从我的家里救出来！

Original: Leo:That love... I see. It is as I thought...
Dialogue: That love... I see. It is as I thought...
trans: 那种爱……我明白了。

Original: Leo:You knew, didn't you, Terra...? In that case, show me that power!
Dialogue: You knew, didn't you, Terra...? In that case, show me that power!
trans: 你知道，不是吗，Terra……？

Original: Leo:...You've grown strong, Terra.
Dialogue: ...You've grown strong, Terra.
trans: ……你变强了，泰拉。

Original: Leo:I can't say the same for myself, however. A wandering will makes for a weak warrior in this world.
Dialogue: I can't say the same for myself, however. A wandering will makes for a weak warrior in this world.
trans: 但是，我不能对自己说同样的话。

Original: Barret:Of course it does! Tch. What a pathetic reason for fighting...
Dialogue: Of course it does! Tch. What a pathetic reason for fighting...
trans: 当然可以！

Original: Locke:I remember you beat Kefka once. But it doesn't seem you're as strong as you were then.
Dialogue: I remember you beat Kefka once. But it doesn't seem you're as strong as you were then.
trans: 我记得你打败过凯夫卡一次。

Original: Leo:I wielded my sword for my country. In a world without the empire, it's useless.
Dialogue: I wielded my sword for my country. In a world without the empire, it's useless.
trans: 我为我的国家挥舞着我的剑。

Original: Sabin:I understand where your loyalty comes from. You really believed in Gestahl...
Dialogue: I understand where your loyalty comes from. You really believed in Gestahl...
trans: 我明白你的忠诚从何而来。

Original: Sabin:But you were also worried about your troops. You treated them as individual people, didn't you?
Dialogue: But you were also worried about your troops. You treated them as individual people, didn't you?
trans: 但你也担心你的部队。

Original: Leo:I fought for the sake of peace...
Dialogue: I fought for the sake of peace...
trans: 我为和平而战……

Original: Leo:I believed that if the empire ruled everything, peace would come.
Dialogue: I believed that if the empire ruled everything, peace would come.
trans: 我相信，如果帝国统治一切，和平就会到来。

Original: Leo:But I was wrong, wasn't I? The empire...
Dialogue: But I was wrong, wasn't I? The empire...
trans: 但我错了，不是吗？

Original: Sabin:Nobody's blaming you!
Dialogue: Nobody's blaming you!
trans: 没人怪你！

Original: Leo:I can't yet bring myself to think that way.
Dialogue: I can't yet bring myself to think that way.
trans: 我还不能让自己那样想。

Original: Leo:Please... Give me more time.
Dialogue: Please... Give me more time.
trans: 请...给我更多时间。

Original: Gilgamesh:H-hey, Little Leo! Wait for me!
Dialogue: H-hey, Little Leo! Wait for me!
trans: 嘿，小里奥！

Original: Barret:Is he gonna be okay? He's pretty indecisive for a soldier.
Dialogue: Is he gonna be okay? He's pretty indecisive for a soldier.
trans: 他会没事吗？

Original: Bartz:I never thought I'd say this, but...Gilgamesh is with him, so he'll be fine.
Dialogue: I never thought I'd say this, but...Gilgamesh is with him, so he'll be fine.
trans: 我从没想过我会这么说，但是……吉尔伽美什和他在一起，所以他会没事的。

Original: Bartz:What worries me is...
Dialogue: What worries me is...
trans: 让我担心的是...

Original: Locke:Why they're in this area.
Dialogue: Why they're in this area.
trans: 为什么他们在这个地区。

Original: Locke:We don't yet know the mission Spiritus gave him, but...
Dialogue: We don't yet know the mission Spiritus gave him, but...
trans: 我们还不知道 Spiritus 交给他的任务，但是……

Original: Locke:That god's not stupid enough to just release a warrior like this without reason.
Dialogue: That god's not stupid enough to just release a warrior like this without reason.
trans: 那个神明不会傻到就这样无缘无故的放了一个武者。

Original: Barret:I'm sure there's a reason he's here.
Dialogue: I'm sure there's a reason he's here.
trans: 我敢肯定他来这里是有原因的。

Original: Sabin:Barret's right. I don't think there's any harm in looking a little while longer.
Dialogue: Barret's right. I don't think there's any harm in looking a little while longer.
trans: 巴雷特是对的。

Original: Bartz:I feel something... It's like the wind is calling...
Dialogue: I feel something... It's like the wind is calling...
trans: 我感觉到了什么……就像风在呼唤……

Original: Barret:Did you say somethin', Bartz?
Dialogue: Did you say somethin', Bartz?
trans: 你说什么了吗，巴茨？

Original: Bartz:It's nothing. C'mon, let's go after them.
Dialogue: It's nothing. C'mon, let's go after them.
trans: 没什么。

Original: Gau:Thou...okay?
Dialogue: Thou...okay?
trans: 你……好吗？

Original: Cyan:My apologies, Sir Gau, I did not mean to make thou worry...
Dialogue: My apologies, Sir Gau, I did not mean to make thou worry...
trans: 抱歉，高爵士，我不是故意让你担心的……

Original: Gau:Thou, Thou! Cheer up!
Dialogue: Thou, Thou! Cheer up!
trans: 你，你！

Original: Ashe:But he's an enemy from your homeland, is he not? Allying with someone like that is...
Dialogue: But he's an enemy from your homeland, is he not? Allying with someone like that is...
trans: 但他是你祖国的敌人，不是吗？

Original: Lyse:When you fought, you gripped your weapon with strength. I know how you feel, Cyan.
Dialogue: When you fought, you gripped your weapon with strength. I know how you feel, Cyan.
trans: 当你战斗时，你用力握住你的武器。

Original: Cyan:I suppose it is pointless trying to hide it... General Leo's siege was not short.
Dialogue: I suppose it is pointless trying to hide it... General Leo's siege was not short.
trans: 我想试图隐藏它是没有意义的……利奥将军的围攻并不短。

Original: Agrias:I heard he was a great commander. His swordsmanship was quite magnificent to behold.
Dialogue: I heard he was a great commander. His swordsmanship was quite magnificent to behold.
trans: 我听说他是一位伟大的指挥官。

Original: Agrias:But you must have seen him as an enemy who stole the lives of countless countrymen.
Dialogue: But you must have seen him as an enemy who stole the lives of countless countrymen.
trans: 但你一定把他看成是夺走了无数同胞生命的敌人。

Original: Sabin:Do you remember, Cyan?
Dialogue: Do you remember, Cyan?
trans: 你还记得吗，青色？

Original: Sabin:After the world fell to ruin, you sympathized with the lover of an imperial soldier...
Dialogue: After the world fell to ruin, you sympathized with the lover of an imperial soldier...
trans: 世界覆灭后，你同情帝国军人的情人……

Original: Cyan:"We humans tend to allow the past to destroy our lives."
Dialogue: "We humans tend to allow the past to destroy our lives."
trans: “我们人类倾向于让过去摧毁我们的生活。”

Original: Cyan:...Yes. I wrote a letter.
Dialogue: ...Yes. I wrote a letter.

Original: Gau:Thou! You kind! You good person!
Dialogue: Thou! You kind! You good person!
trans: 你！

Original: Cyan:Everyone has someone precious to them... Even those from the empire.
Dialogue: Everyone has someone precious to them... Even those from the empire.
trans: 每个人都有自己心爱的人……哪怕是帝国的人。

Original: Cyan:It is enough that war divides people into friends and foes.
Dialogue: It is enough that war divides people into friends and foes.
trans: 战争足以将人分为朋友和敌人。

Original: Agrias:We are not at war here...for now.
Dialogue: We are not at war here...for now.
trans: 我们这里没有打仗……暂时。

Original: Ashe:We allow the past...to destroy our lives...
Dialogue: We allow the past...to destroy our lives...
trans: 我们允许过去……摧毁我们的生活……

Original: Cyan:We cannot let history repeat itself, much less in this world.
Dialogue: We cannot let history repeat itself, much less in this world.
trans: 我们不能让历史重演，更不能让这个世界重演。

Original: Gau:Thou right! But Gau worry. Thou face in pain...
Dialogue: Thou right! But Gau worry. Thou face in pain...
trans: 你说得对！

Original: Cyan:I am a soldier of Doma, Sir Gau.
Dialogue: I am a soldier of Doma, Sir Gau.
trans: 我是 Doma 的士兵，Gau 爵士。

Original: Cyan:If I swing my blade with hatred, it will not strike true.
Dialogue: If I swing my blade with hatred, it will not strike true.
trans: 如果我带着仇恨挥动我的刀刃，它就不会命中。

Original: Cyan:We must go forward.
Dialogue: We must go forward.
trans: 我们必须前进。

Original: Lyse:...You're so strong, Cyan. All soldiers of Doma are amazing.
Dialogue: ...You're so strong, Cyan. All soldiers of Doma are amazing.
trans: ……你真强，Cyan。

Original: Lyse:But please don't push yourself, Cyan. You don't need to bear all this alone.
Dialogue: But please don't push yourself, Cyan. You don't need to bear all this alone.
trans: 但请不要勉强自己，Cyan。

Original: Lyse:Everyone helped mewhen I was trying to take back my memories, and I want to repay that debt.
Dialogue: Everyone helped me when I was trying to take back my memories, and I want to repay that debt.
trans: 当我试图取回记忆时，每个人都帮助了我，我想偿还这笔债。

Original: Sabin:She's right. Don't overdo it, Cyan.
Dialogue: She's right. Don't overdo it, Cyan.
trans: 她是对的。

Original: Galuf:You can stick to your beliefs, regardless of your reservations.
Dialogue: You can stick to your beliefs, regardless of your reservations.
trans: 无论您有何保留，您都可以坚持自己的信念。

Original: Cyan:Thank you...everyone.
Dialogue: Thank you...everyone.
trans: 谢谢大家。

Original: Leo:I understand why His Majesty did what he did.
Dialogue: I understand why His Majesty did what he did.
trans: 我明白陛下为什么要这么做。

Original: Leo:His experiments on Kefka and General Celes, his controlling of Terra, and everyone's thirst for power...
Dialogue: His experiments on Kefka and General Celes, his controlling of Terra, and everyone's thirst for power...
trans: 他对凯夫卡和赛列斯将军的实验，他对泰拉的掌控，以及所有人对权力的渴求……

Original: Leo:I should have admonished him. And yet...
Dialogue: I should have admonished him. And yet...
trans: 我应该告诫他。

Original: Gilgamesh:Loyalty is too hard to just throw away.
Dialogue: Loyalty is too hard to just throw away.
trans: 忠诚度太难丢掉了。

Original: Leo:Yes. Emotions can be such a burden. I could never be like you, Sir Gilgamesh.
Dialogue: Yes. Emotions can be such a burden. I could never be like you, Sir Gilgamesh.
trans: 是的。

Original: Gilgamesh:You can't just force yourself to become friends with your enemies. You have to decide how you want to live on your own.
Dialogue: You can't just force yourself to become friends with your enemies. You have to decide how you want to live on your own.
trans: 你不能仅仅强迫自己与敌人成为朋友。

Original: Gilgamesh:I know a few people who sat in pretty high places back in their home worlds. I can introduce you, if you want.
Dialogue: I know a few people who sat in pretty high places back in their home worlds. I can introduce you, if you want.
trans: 我认识一些人，他们在自己的家乡世界里坐在相当高的地方。

Original: Leo:I appreciate the consideration.
Dialogue: I appreciate the consideration.
trans: 我很感激你的考虑。

Original: Leo:But I can't just swear my allegiance to any country.
Dialogue: But I can't just swear my allegiance to any country.
trans: 但我不能宣誓效忠于任何国家。

Original: Leo:If it's not the Empire of Gestahl, then it's meaningless. It's my home. My life.
Dialogue: If it's not the Empire of Gestahl, then it's meaningless. It's my home. My life.
trans: 如果不是盖斯塔尔帝国，那就没有意义了。

Original: Gilgamesh:It might be I'm missing the mark again, but...
Dialogue: It might be I'm missing the mark again, but...
trans: 可能是我又错过了标记，但是......

Original: Gilgamesh:The country you're trying to protect is your home, right?
Dialogue: The country you're trying to protect is your home, right?
trans: 你要保护的国家就是你的家，对吧？

Original: Gilgamesh:The place you were raised, the rivers that flowed, the sound of the wind, the heat of the hearth...and the people there.
Dialogue: The place you were raised, the rivers that flowed, the sound of the wind, the heat of the hearth...and the people there.
trans: 你长大的地方，流过的河流，风的声音，壁炉的热度……还有那里的人。

Original: Gilgamesh:You became strong in order to protect those things, right?
Dialogue: You became strong in order to protect those things, right?
trans: 你是为了守护那些东西而变强的吧？

Original: Leo:My home... Yes. The people, places, and nature there...
Dialogue: My home... Yes. The people, places, and nature there...
trans: 我的家……是的。

Original: Leo:I became a general to protect those things.
Dialogue: I became a general to protect those things.
trans: 我成为保护那些东西的将军。

Original: Gilgamesh:You can still protect it from afar. I know someone who did that.
Dialogue: You can still protect it from afar. I know someone who did that.
trans: 你仍然可以从远处保护它。

Original: Gilgamesh:But he didn't do it alone. Just like you now, Little Leo.
Dialogue: But he didn't do it alone. Just like you now, Little Leo.
trans: 但他并不是一个人做的。

Original: Gilgamesh:So that's why...
Dialogue: So that's why...
trans: 所以这就是为什么...

Original: Gilgamesh:You shouldn't feel like you have to do this on your own!
Dialogue: You shouldn't feel like you have to do this on your own!
trans: 你不应该觉得你必须自己做这件事！

Original: Leo:Sir Gilgamesh... I see.
Dialogue: Sir Gilgamesh... I see.
trans: 吉尔伽美什爵士……我明白了。

Original: Leo:There are still those living in the place I called "home"...
Dialogue: There are still those living in the place I called "home"...
trans: 在我称之为“家”的地方，还有人居住……

Original: Leo:I want to do what I can here to protect those people and that place.
Dialogue: I want to do what I can here to protect those people and that place.
trans: 我想在这里尽我所能保护那些人和那个地方。

Original: Gilgamesh:What are you going to do? Meet Spiritus's other warriors?
Dialogue: What are you going to do? Meet Spiritus's other warriors?
trans: 你会怎样做？

Original: Gilgamesh:There are some real weirdos on that team, but they're not all bad eggs.
Dialogue: There are some real weirdos on that team, but they're not all bad eggs.
trans: 该团队中有一些真正的怪人，但他们并不都是坏蛋。

Original: Leo:No. I want to face Terra and the others once more.
Dialogue: No. I want to face Terra and the others once more.
trans: 不，我想再次面对泰拉她们。

Original: Leo:Cyan, a warrior of Doma, is with them...
Dialogue: Cyan, a warrior of Doma, is with them...
trans: Doma 的战士 Cyan 和他们在一起......

Original: Leo:To atone for what I did...I know where I must be.
Dialogue: To atone for what I did...I know where I must be.
trans: 为我的所作所为赎罪……我知道我必须去哪里。

Original: Gilgamesh:Huzzah! Then let's get a move on!
Dialogue: Huzzah! Then let's get a move on!
trans: 万岁！

Original: Exdeath:Gilgamesh... That bungling fool.
Dialogue: Gilgamesh... That bungling fool.
trans: 吉尔伽美什……那个笨蛋。

Original: Exdeath:Befriending Materia's warriors!?
Dialogue: Befriending Materia's warriors!?
trans: 与魔石的战士成为朋友！？

Original: Exdeath:No matter. I have a powerful will in my hands.
Dialogue: No matter. I have a powerful will in my hands.
trans: 不管。

Original: Exdeath:The one who forced this sadness onto you is rejoicing in his freedom out there.
Dialogue: The one who forced this sadness onto you is rejoicing in his freedom out there.
trans: 将这种悲伤强加给你的人正在为他在那里的自由而高兴。

Original: Exdeath:Bring down your original and retrieve your lost memories.
Dialogue: Bring down your original and retrieve your lost memories.
trans: 放下你的原件，找回你丢失的记忆。

Original: Dark Manikin (Bartz):Alone... Lonely...
Dialogue: Alone... Lonely...
trans: 孤独寂寞...

Original: Cyan:Have you made up your mind, General Leo?
Dialogue: Have you made up your mind, General Leo?
trans: 利奥将军，你决定了吗？

Original: Leo:There is nothing I can do alone. I need allies.
Dialogue: There is nothing I can do alone. I need allies.
trans: 我一个人无能为力。

Original: Terra:Does that mean...?
Dialogue: Does that mean...?
trans: 这是否意味着...？

Original: Leo:There are others in this world possessing strong wills.
Dialogue: There are others in this world possessing strong wills.
trans: 这个世界上还有其他人拥有坚强的意志。

Original: Leo:One ruling of a country, another living for his home, and even one who governs natural providence... Becoming allies with them is also an option.
Dialogue: One ruling of a country, another living for his home, and even one who governs natural providence... Becoming allies with them is also an option.
trans: 一个治国，一个为家而活，甚至主宰天道……与他们结盟也是一种选择。

Original: Faris:If you find our power lacking, you're free to cozy up to those sea dogs.
Dialogue: If you find our power lacking, you're free to cozy up to those sea dogs.
trans: 如果你发现我们的力量不足，你可以随意讨好那些海狗。

Original: Leo:Terra and warriors from other worlds... Once again, I ask you to show me your power.
Dialogue: Terra and warriors from other worlds... Once again, I ask you to show me your power.
trans: 泰拉和来自异世界的战士们……再一次请求你们展示你们的力量。

Original: Leo:To reaffirm my own will!
Dialogue: To reaffirm my own will!
trans: 重申自己的意志！

Original: Bartz:We'll take you on anytime!
Dialogue: We'll take you on anytime!
trans: 我们随时接你！

Original: Gilgamesh:That's the spirit! I'll be on Little Leo's side this time.
Dialogue: That's the spirit! I'll be on Little Leo's side this time.
trans: 就是那种精神！

Original: Gilgamesh:It wouldn't be a fair fight otherwise!
Dialogue: It wouldn't be a fair fight otherwise!
trans: 否则这不是一场公平的战斗！

Original: Bartz:Your math is a bit off, but have it your way.
Dialogue: Your math is a bit off, but have it your way.
trans: 你的数学有点不对劲，但随心所欲。

Original: Bartz:We won't hold back!
Dialogue: We won't hold back!
trans: 我们不会退缩！

Original: Cyan:Allow me to test thy will for myself, General.
Dialogue: Allow me to test thy will for myself, General.
trans: 请允许我亲自测试您的意志，将军。

Original: Leo:You have my gratitude, Sir Cyan.
Dialogue: You have my gratitude, Sir Cyan.
trans: 我很感激你，赛恩爵士。

Original: Leo:Let's finish this, here and now. You can have your revenge!
Dialogue: Let's finish this, here and now. You can have your revenge!
trans: 让我们在这里和现在完成这个。

Original: Cyan:Nay! Our enemy is within us.
Dialogue: Nay! Our enemy is within us.
trans: 不！

Original: Cyan:Nothing is born out of our ill feelings, yet we cannot abandon our convictions.
Dialogue: Nothing is born out of our ill feelings, yet we cannot abandon our convictions.
trans: 我们的恶感不会生出任何东西，但我们不能放弃我们的信念。

Original: Cyan:I will overcome without throwing away those memories!
Dialogue: I will overcome without throwing away those memories!
trans: 我会在不丢掉那些记忆的情况下克服的！

Original: Leo:A spectacular resolve... I expected no less of you. Now come!
Dialogue: A spectacular resolve... I expected no less of you. Now come!
trans: 惊人的决心……我对你的期望不亚于你。

Original: Leo:The last time we fought, my power wasn't at its fullest.
Dialogue: The last time we fought, my power wasn't at its fullest.
trans: 上次交手时，我的力量还没有发挥到极致。

Original: Leo:By strengthening my will, I can fight you as equals.
Dialogue: By strengthening my will, I can fight you as equals.
trans: 通过增强我的意志，我可以与你平起平坐。

Original: Gilgamesh:Little Leo's made up his mind and I'm going to help him see it through!
Dialogue: Little Leo's made up his mind and I'm going to help him see it through!
trans: 小里奥下定决心了，我要帮他渡过难关！

Original: Leo:I stand before you not as a general, but as a warrior... Now, come!
Dialogue: I stand before you not as a general, but as a warrior... Now, come!
trans: 我不是以将军的身份，而是以战士的身份站在你面前……现在，来吧！

Original: Terra:Did that help?
Dialogue: Did that help?
trans: 那有帮助吗？

Original: Leo:I'm not sure. But I have gained the resolve to fight.
Dialogue: I'm not sure. But I have gained the resolve to fight.
trans: 我不知道。

Original: Leo:I would like to travel with you and fulfill my mission.
Dialogue: I would like to travel with you and fulfill my mission.
trans: 我想和你一起去旅行，完成我的使命。

Original: Edgar:Then let me ask you again: What exactly is the mission Spiritus gave to you?
Dialogue: Then let me ask you again What exactly is the mission Spiritus gave to you?
trans: 那我再问你一次，Spiritus给你的使命到底是什么？

Original: Gilgamesh:Wait, before that!
Dialogue: Wait, before that!
trans: 等等，在那之前！

Original: Gilgamesh:Hear me out! There's a reason I have to cut in now!
Dialogue: Hear me out! There's a reason I have to cut in now!
trans: 听我说！

Original: Krile:Because you can't wait your turn?
Dialogue: Because you can't wait your turn?
trans: 因为等不及轮到你了？

Original: Gilgamesh:No, no, no! This is important! I need your power!
Dialogue: No, no, no! This is important! I need your power!
trans: 不不不！

Original: Bartz:Alright. We'll listen to what you have to say. You never show up without a reason anyway.
Dialogue: Alright. We'll listen to what you have to say. You never show up without a reason anyway.
trans: 好吧。

Original: Gilgamesh:Don't you feel something around here, Kupo Kupo?
Dialogue: Don't you feel something around here, Kupo Kupo?
trans: Kupo Kupo，你不觉得这里有什么吗？

Original: Mog:Kupo? Hmm... Let me see, kupo...
Dialogue: Kupo? Hmm... Let me see, kupo...
trans: 外套？

Original: Mog:Kupo!? He's right! I sense brilliance, kupo!
Dialogue: Kupo!? He's right! I sense brilliance, kupo!
trans: 库波！？

Original: Mog:But I can't pinpoint it, kupo... I think someone's interfering.
Dialogue: But I can't pinpoint it, kupo... I think someone's interfering.
trans: 但我无法确定它，kupo...我认为有人在干扰。

Original: Terra:Is it different from other places?
Dialogue: Is it different from other places?
trans: 和其他地方有什么不同吗？

Original: Gilgamesh:Yes. Exdeath is planning something up ahead.
Dialogue: Yes. Exdeath is planning something up ahead.
trans: 是的。

Original: Gilgamesh:And your manikins are fighting to stop him.
Dialogue: And your manikins are fighting to stop him.
trans: 你的人体模型正在努力阻止他。

Original: Krile:You mean our dark manikins?
Dialogue: You mean our dark manikins?
trans: 你是说我们的黑色人体模型？

Original: Gilgamesh:Yes. But it's strange... Bartz's manikin was missing.
Dialogue: Yes. But it's strange... Bartz's manikin was missing.
trans: 是的。

Original: Exdeath:Mwa-hahaha... Is that all the puppets of the Crystal Core of Darkness can do?
Dialogue: Mwa-hahaha... Is that all the puppets of the Crystal Core of Darkness can do?
trans: 哇哈哈哈……黑暗晶核的傀儡就只能这样了吗？

Original: Dark Manikin (Galuf):You won't get away with this, Exdeath!
Dialogue: You won't get away with this, Exdeath!
trans: 你逃不掉的，Exdeath！

Original: Exdeath:With those distorted memories, your wills are too weak to stop me.
Dialogue: With those distorted memories, your wills are too weak to stop me.
trans: 那些扭曲的记忆，你的意志已经薄弱到无法阻止我。

Original: Exdeath:It is a struggle just to maintain your form.
Dialogue: It is a struggle just to maintain your form.
trans: 只是为了保持你的状态是一场斗争。

Original: Dark Manikin (Lenna):Urgh... Sister...
Dialogue: Urgh... Sister...
trans: 呃……姐姐……

Original: Dark Manikin (Faris):Hang in there! Dammit... If only he were here...
Dialogue: Hang in there! Dammit... If only he were here...
trans: 坚持住！

Original: Dark Manikin (Krile):Grandpa... I'm scared...
Dialogue: Grandpa... I'm scared...
trans: 爷爷……我好害怕……

Original: Dark Manikin (Galuf):We must hold fast until the warriors from the World of Light arrive...!
Dialogue: We must hold fast until the warriors from the World of Light arrive...!
trans: 必须坚持到光之世界的战士们到来为止……！

Original: Exdeath:Impossible... Your inquisitive little friend is my pawn.
Dialogue: Impossible... Your inquisitive little friend is my pawn.
trans: 不可能……你这个好奇的小朋友是我的棋子。

Original: Exdeath:By controlling him, I will be able to shatter the seal on these ruins.
Dialogue: By controlling him, I will be able to shatter the seal on these ruins.
trans: 控制住他，就能破开遗迹上的封印。

Original: Dark Manikin (Faris):Hold it!
Dialogue: Hold it!
trans: 拿住！

Original: Gilgamesh:Isn't that the spry old fellow and his friends!? This is bad!
Dialogue: Isn't that the spry old fellow and his friends!? This is bad!
trans: 那不是那个活泼的老家伙和他的朋友们吗！？

Original: Gilgamesh:...And that's what I was going to tell you when I ran into Little Leo here.
