Dialogue: ...And that's what I was going to tell you when I ran into Little Leo here.
trans: ......这就是我在这里遇到小里奥时要告诉你的。

Original: Leo:Spiritus asked me to stop his warriors from running rampant.
Dialogue: Spiritus asked me to stop his warriors from running rampant.
trans: 斯皮里图斯要我阻止他的战士们肆虐。

Original: Edgar:Where are the dark manikins?
Dialogue: Where are the dark manikins?
trans: 黑色人体模型在哪里？

Original: Gilgamesh:After I saw them, I was roaming around the dimensions for a while, so... Where was that...
Dialogue: After I saw them, I was roaming around the dimensions for a while, so... Where was that...
trans: 看到他们之后，我在空间里游荡了一会儿，所以……那是哪里……

Original: Krile:That's the most important part! How could you forget?
Dialogue: That's the most important part! How could you forget?
trans: 这是最重要的部分！

Original: Bartz:I'm sure...they're around here somewhere.
Dialogue: I'm sure...they're around here somewhere.
trans: 我敢肯定……他们就在这附近的某个地方。

Original: Edgar:We must trust our instincts.
Dialogue: We must trust our instincts.
trans: 我们必须相信我们的直觉。

Original: Gilgamesh:You said it! Let's go!
Dialogue: You said it! Let's go!
trans: 你说的！

Original: Leo:So you're Bartz. I heard about you from Gilgamesh.
Dialogue: So you're Bartz. I heard about you from Gilgamesh.
trans: 所以你是巴茨。

Original: Bartz:Good grief... What did he say about me?
Dialogue: Good grief... What did he say about me?
trans: 天哪……他对我说了什么？

Original: Leo:Only good things. He mentioned you were a curious traveler with a good heart and a warrior of light who saved his world.
Dialogue: Only good things. He mentioned you were a curious traveler with a good heart and a warrior of light who saved his world.
trans: 只有好东西。

Original: Leo:He said you were a formidable warrior who makes quick work of monsters.
Dialogue: He said you were a formidable warrior who makes quick work of monsters.
trans: 他说你是一个能快速解决怪物问题的强大战士。

Original: Bartz:...He sure can spin a story.
Dialogue: ...He sure can spin a story.
trans: ......他确实可以编故事。

Original: Leo:It means he has faith in you.
Dialogue: It means he has faith in you.
trans: 这说明他对你有信心。

Original: Leo:When telling tales of other warriors, Sir Gilgamesh looks as happy as if they were his own heroic deeds.
Dialogue: When telling tales of other warriors, Sir Gilgamesh looks as happy as if they were his own heroic deeds.
trans: 当讲述其他战士的故事时，吉尔伽美什爵士看起来像讲述自己的英雄事迹一样开心。

Original: Leo:He is without a doubt someone who is willing to give his life for you.
Dialogue: He is without a doubt someone who is willing to give his life for you.
trans: 毫无疑问，他是一个愿意为你献出生命的人。

Original: Bartz:Give his life...? Gilgamesh? For me?
Dialogue: Give his life...? Gilgamesh? For me?
trans: 献出生命……？

Original: Leo:It seems you are missing some of your memories.
Dialogue: It seems you are missing some of your memories.
trans: 看来你失去了一些你的记忆。

Original: Leo:I'm sure Sir Gilgamesh is happy that you are able to continue forward nevertheless.
Dialogue: I'm sure Sir Gilgamesh is happy that you are able to continue forward nevertheless.
trans: 我相信吉尔伽美什爵士很高兴你能够继续前进。

Original: Leo:How spectacular... I could never live my life that way.
Dialogue: How spectacular... I could never live my life that way.
trans: 多么壮观……我永远不能那样生活。

Original: Leo:Traveling for the sake of one's world, even leaving the one your home is in...
Dialogue: Traveling for the sake of one's world, even leaving the one your home is in...
trans: 为了一个人的世界而旅行，甚至离开你的家所在的那个人......

Original: Bartz:Leaving...my home...
Dialogue: Leaving...my home...
trans: 离开……我的家……

Original: Bartz:I only started traveling...because it was my father's last wish.
Dialogue: I only started traveling...because it was my father's last wish.
trans: 我只是开始旅行……因为这是我父亲的遗愿。

Original: Leo:...My apologies. I didn't mean to pry.
Dialogue: ...My apologies. I didn't mean to pry.
trans: ...我很抱歉。

Original: Leo:There is much I wish to learn from the other warriors.
Dialogue: There is much I wish to learn from the other warriors.
trans: 我想向其他战士学习很多东西。

Original: Bartz:...Am I really that great?
Dialogue: ...Am I really that great?
trans: ……我真的有那么好吗？

Original: Bartz:I was just drifting with the wind...
Dialogue: I was just drifting with the wind...
trans: 我只是随风飘荡……

Original: Bartz:No... There's something I'm forgetting. Something important...
Dialogue: No... There's something I'm forgetting. Something important...
trans: 不...我忘记了一些事情。

Original: Bartz:I remember my father was sick three years ago.
Dialogue: I remember my father was sick three years ago.
trans: 我记得我父亲三年前病了。

Original: Bartz:But... What? ...That's right.
Dialogue: But... What? ...That's right.
trans: 但是……什么？

Original: Bartz:The people I met in this world...
Dialogue: The people I met in this world...
trans: 我在这个世界上遇到的人...

Original: Bartz:It wasn't because I could see them again. No...
Dialogue: It wasn't because I could see them again. No...
trans: 不是因为我能再次见到他们。

Original: Dark Manikin (Bartz):...You were happy.
Dialogue: ...You were happy.

Original: Bartz:Who's there!?
Dialogue: Who's there!?
trans: 谁在那儿！？

Original: Dark Manikin (Bartz):The memories you left beyond the wind.
Dialogue: The memories you left beyond the wind.
trans: 你在风中留下的记忆。

Original: Bartz:Do you have my memories!?
Dialogue: Do you have my memories!?
trans: 你有我的记忆吗！？

Original: Dark Manikin (Bartz):The goddess wanted the adventurous heart that resides in me.
Dialogue: The goddess wanted the adventurous heart that resides in me.
trans: 女神要的是我心中的冒险之心。

Original: Dark Manikin (Bartz):So memories of the journey's partings were just extra baggage.
Dialogue: So memories of the journey's partings were just extra baggage.
trans: 因此，对旅途离别的回忆只是额外的包袱。

Original: Dark Manikin (Bartz):That's why I'm holding onto all of it. So you can smile.
Dialogue: That's why I'm holding onto all of it. So you can smile.
trans: 这就是为什么我坚持所有这一切。

Original: Bartz:Give them to me.
Dialogue: Give them to me.
trans: 把它们给我。

Original: Dark Manikin (Bartz):I'm an emotionless puppet, an accumulation of all your sadness.
Dialogue: I'm an emotionless puppet, an accumulation of all your sadness.
trans: 我是一个没有感情的傀儡，是你所有悲伤的累积。

Original: Dark Manikin (Bartz):I'm just a shadow, so it doesn't bother me. I'll take it all.
Dialogue: I'm just a shadow, so it doesn't bother me. I'll take it all.
trans: 我只是一个影子，所以它不会打扰我。

Original: Dark Manikin (Bartz):It doesn't bother me...at all...
Dialogue: It doesn't bother me...at all...

Original: Bartz:If that's the case, then why...
Dialogue: If that's the case, then why...
trans: 如果是这样的话，那为什么...

Original: Bartz:Why are you crying?
Dialogue: Why are you crying?
trans: 你哭什么？

Original: Lenna:Bartz... Bartz!
Dialogue: Bartz... Bartz!
trans: 巴茨……巴茨！

Original: Galuf:This reckless fool...!
Dialogue: This reckless fool...!
trans: 这个鲁莽的笨蛋……！

Original: Zidane:Hey! What's going on!?
Dialogue: Hey! What's going on!?
trans: 嘿！

Original: Faris:His body seems fine, but no matter how much we shake 'im, he won't wake up...
Dialogue: His body seems fine, but no matter how much we shake 'im, he won't wake up...
trans: 他的身体看起来很好，但无论我们怎么摇晃他，他都醒不来……

Original: Squall:What happened?
Dialogue: What happened?
trans: 发生了什么？

Original: Krile:We saw it from way over there, but...Bartz was talking to his dark manikin.
Dialogue: We saw it from way over there, but...Bartz was talking to his dark manikin.
trans: 我们从那边看到了，但是……巴茨正在和他的黑色人体模型说话。

Original: Bartz:...So it was you calling me.
Dialogue: ...So it was you calling me.
trans: ……原来是你叫我。

Original: Dark Manikin (Bartz):Did I...?
Dialogue: Did I...?
trans: 我有……吗？

Original: Bartz:You were all alone, carrying my painful memories.
Dialogue: You were all alone, carrying my painful memories.
trans: 你一个人，背负着我痛苦的回忆。

Original: Dark Manikin (Bartz):Yeah... I was calling you...
Dialogue: Yeah... I was calling you...
trans: 是的...我在叫你...

Original: Dark Manikin (Bartz):Back home, far, far away...the flowers are blooming just like these...
Dialogue: Back home, far, far away...the flowers are blooming just like these...
trans: 回到家，很远很远的地方……花开的就是这样……

Original: Dark Manikin (Bartz):But there was no one to see it with you. Neither Dad nor Mom...
Dialogue: But there was no one to see it with you. Neither Dad nor Mom...
trans: 但是没有人和你一起看。

Original: Dark Manikin (Bartz):You were called by the wind, and while on your quest...
Dialogue: You were called by the wind, and while on your quest...
trans: 你被风呼唤，在你的追求中......

Original: Dark Manikin (Bartz):The memories you left behind brought me pain...
Dialogue: The memories you left behind brought me pain...
trans: 你留下的回忆让我痛苦...

Original: Bartz:I made you bear that burden for a long time.
Dialogue: I made you bear that burden for a long time.
trans: 我让你背负了很长一段时间的负担。

Original: Bartz:While on my journey, you were always...
Dialogue: While on my journey, you were always...
trans: 在我的旅途中，你总是...

Original: Dark Manikin (Bartz):I want to go home...
Dialogue: I want to go home...
trans: 我想回家...

Original: Bartz:...Don't make that face.
Dialogue: ...Don't make that face.
trans: ……别做出那种表情。

Original: Dark Manikin (Bartz):Parting, sadness, loneliness... It can drive you crazy.
Dialogue: Parting, sadness, loneliness... It can drive you crazy.
trans: 离别、悲伤、孤独……它会让你发疯。

Original: Bartz:Then you can have it all.
Dialogue: Then you can have it all.
trans: 然后你就可以拥有一切。

Original: Bartz:Everything I remember. Courage, hope, compassion...
Dialogue: Everything I remember. Courage, hope, compassion...
trans: 我记得的一切。

Original: Bartz:I'll give it all to you.
Dialogue: I'll give it all to you.
trans: 我会全部给你。

Original: Dark Manikin (Bartz):I see... With this...
Dialogue: I see... With this...
trans: 我明白了……有了这个……

Original: Dark Manikin (Bartz):...I have to go!
Dialogue: ...I have to go!
trans: ...我得走了！

Original: Lenna:We could not hear what they were saying, but...it looks like Bartz gave him something.
Dialogue: We could not hear what they were saying, but...it looks like Bartz gave him something.
trans: 我们听不见他们在说什么，但是……巴茨好像给了他什么东西。

Original: Galuf:Not only his memories, but his feelings... I feel they were taken by his dark manikin.
Dialogue: Not only his memories, but his feelings... I feel they were taken by his dark manikin.
trans: 不仅是他的记忆，还有他的感受……我觉得它们都被他的黑色人体模型带走了。

Original: Zidane:So...he's empty?
Dialogue: So...he's empty?
trans: 所以……他是空的？

Original: Faris:Don't be ridiculous. Hey, get up!
Dialogue: Don't be ridiculous. Hey, get up!
trans: 别开玩笑了。

Original: Squall:(Seriously...?)
Dialogue: (Seriously...?)

Original: Squall:Why did you...?
Dialogue: Why did you...?
trans: 为什么你...？

Original: Zidane:What happened to his dark manikin?
Dialogue: What happened to his dark manikin?
trans: 他的黑色人体模型怎么了？

Original: Krile:He went off in a hurry, almost like he was running away...
Dialogue: He went off in a hurry, almost like he was running away...
trans: 他匆忙离开，几乎就像逃跑一样……

Original: Zidane:Then let's go after him!
Dialogue: Then let's go after him!
trans: 那我们去追他吧！

Original: Lenna:But we can't just leave Bartz like this!
Dialogue: But we can't just leave Bartz like this!
trans: 但我们不能就这样离开巴茨！

Original: Squall:So he can move...
Dialogue: So he can move...
trans: 这样他就可以动了……

Original: Galuf:We don't have any clues right now. We must do as Zidane says and follow that manikin.
Dialogue: We don't have any clues right now. We must do as Zidane says and follow that manikin.
trans: 我们现在没有任何线索。

Original: Faris:...Can we get him back to the way he was?
Dialogue: ...Can we get him back to the way he was?
trans: ……我们能让他回到原来的样子吗？

Original: Squall:Why ask me...? Still...I'm sure we can.
Dialogue: Why ask me...? Still...I'm sure we can.
trans: 为什么要问我...？

Original: Zidane:We'll save him for sure.
Dialogue: We'll save him for sure.
trans: 我们一定会救他的。

Original: Krile:Then let's go. We've gotta help Bartz!
Dialogue: Then let's go. We've gotta help Bartz!
trans: 那我们走吧。

Original: Dark Manikin (Galuf):Warriors from the World of Light! You're here!
Dialogue: Warriors from the World of Light! You're here!
trans: 来自光之世界的勇士！

Original: Galuf:Bartz isn't with you?
Dialogue: Bartz isn't with you?
trans: 巴茨不在你身边？

Original: Dark Manikin (Lenna):He was captured by Exdeath...
Dialogue: He was captured by Exdeath...
trans: 他被埃克斯迪斯俘虏了……

Original: Dark Manikin (Faris):He intends to use his feelings for his own ends.
Dialogue: He intends to use his feelings for his own ends.
trans: 他打算利用自己的感情来达到自己的目的。

Original: Lenna:Feelings? But dark manikins...
Dialogue: Feelings? But dark manikins...
trans: 情怀？

Original: Lenna:...I am so sorry.
Dialogue: ...I am so sorry.
trans: ...我很抱歉。

Original: Dark Manikin (Lenna):Do not worry. What you say is true.
Dialogue: Do not worry. What you say is true.
trans: 不用担心。

Original: Dark Manikin (Faris):Right. There are things we can shoulder simply because our emotions are so shallow.
Dialogue: Right. There are things we can shoulder simply because our emotions are so shallow.
trans: 正确的。

Original: Dark Manikin (Faris):But Bartz is a different story...
Dialogue: But Bartz is a different story...
trans: 但巴茨是另一回事……

Original: Faris:So do you guys have our memories?
Dialogue: So do you guys have our memories?
trans: 那么你们有我们的回忆吗？

Original: Dark Manikin (Galuf):...Of course. That is why we were able to fight.
Dialogue: ...Of course. That is why we were able to fight.

Original: Dark Manikin (Galuf):The memories you lost came to us. They were full of such emotion.
Dialogue: The memories you lost came to us. They were full of such emotion.
trans: 你失去的记忆来到我们身边。

Original: Dark Manikin (Lenna):They gave us hollow manikins strength...as a momentary power of will.
Dialogue: They gave us hollow manikins strength...as a momentary power of will.
trans: 他们给了我们空心人体模型力量……作为一种瞬间的意志力。

Original: Lenna:Memories full of emotion...
Dialogue: Memories full of emotion...
trans: 充满感动的回忆……

Original: Lenna:Are those the ones Materia thought we were better off without?
Dialogue: Are those the ones Materia thought we were better off without?
trans: 那些是 Materia 认为没有我们会更好的东西吗？

Original: Faris:I had a feeling I was missing something, like there was a hole in my memories somewhere.
Dialogue: I had a feeling I was missing something, like there was a hole in my memories somewhere.
trans: 我有一种感觉，我错过了什么，就像我的记忆中某处出现了一个洞。

Original: Galuf:...I knew. But I did not want to say anything.
Dialogue: ...I knew. But I did not want to say anything.
trans: ...我知道。

Original: Galuf:However, if there are those pained by those memories...we must take it from you.
Dialogue: However, if there are those pained by those memories...we must take it from you.
trans: 然而，如果那些人因那些回忆而痛苦……我们必须把它从你手中拿走。

Original: Dark Manikin (Faris):Who cares if they're painful? We got this far because of your memories.
Dialogue: Who cares if they're painful? We got this far because of your memories.
trans: 谁在乎他们是否痛苦？

Original: Dark Manikin (Faris):You overcame your pain with the help of your family and friends. Those memories gave us strength.
Dialogue: You overcame your pain with the help of your family and friends. Those memories gave us strength.
trans: 在家人和朋友的帮助下，您克服了痛苦。

Original: Dark Manikin (Lenna):But Bartz...
Dialogue: But Bartz...
trans: 但是巴茨...

Original: Dark Manikin (Galuf):Something was wrong with him even before Exdeath appeared.
Dialogue: Something was wrong with him even before Exdeath appeared.
trans: 甚至在 Exdeath 出现之前，他就有些不对劲。

Original: Dark Manikin (Galuf):Freedom and loneliness together are too much for dark manikins to bear...
Dialogue: Freedom and loneliness together are too much for dark manikins to bear...
trans: 自由和孤独加在一起，让黑暗的人体模型无法承受……

Original: Dark Manikin (Lenna):Exdeath intends to control our Bartz.
Dialogue: Exdeath intends to control our Bartz.
trans: Exdeath 打算控制我们的 Bartz。

Original: Dark Manikin (Lenna):We were fine. We had our friends with us. But I am not so sure about Bartz...
Dialogue: We were fine. We had our friends with us. But I am not so sure about Bartz...
trans: 我们很好。

Original: Faris:You guys are holding onto our painful memories... No.
Dialogue: You guys are holding onto our painful memories... No.
trans: 你们抓住了我们痛苦的回忆……不。

Original: Faris:Our painful memories are the only ones you have, right?
Dialogue: Our painful memories are the only ones you have, right?
trans: 我们痛苦的回忆是你仅有的，对吧？

Original: Dark Manikin (Faris):...Yes. Memories of...partings.
Dialogue: ...Yes. Memories of...partings.

Original: Dark Manikin (Krile):We got this far because of your memories, but...
Dialogue: We got this far because of your memories, but...
trans: 我们走到这一步都是因为你的记忆，但是......

Original: Galuf:You must return them to where they belong, yes?
Dialogue: You must return them to where they belong, yes?
trans: 你必须把它们放回原处，是吗？

Original: Dark Manikin (Krile):It must be so painful. After all...we can't always be
Dialogue: It must be so painful. After all...we can't always be—
trans: 一定很痛吧。

Original: Galuf:Even the Krile from the World of Darkness has a stout heart.
Dialogue: Even the Krile from the World of Darkness has a stout heart.
trans: 即便是来自黑暗世界的克里尔人，也有着一颗坚强的心。

Original: Galuf:But...it's time.
Dialogue: But...it's time.
trans: 但是……是时候了。

Original: Krile:I know... But it's a little scary.
Dialogue: I know... But it's a little scary.
trans: 我知道……但是有点害怕。

Original: Lenna:I can't look the other way... So please!
Dialogue: I can't look the other way... So please!
trans: 我不能看别的方向......所以拜托！

Original: Dark Manikin (Faris):"Mercy" ain't in my dictionary.
Dialogue: "Mercy" ain't in my dictionary.
trans: “怜悯”不在我的字典里。

Original: Faris:You've got a lot of brass! I like it!
Dialogue: You've got a lot of brass! I like it!
trans: 你有很多黄铜！

Original: Krile:...I'm sure it's painful. But it's fine now.
Dialogue: ...I'm sure it's painful. But it's fine now.
trans: ......我敢肯定这很痛苦。

Original: Krile:Because everyone is here, together.
Dialogue: Because everyone is here, together.
trans: 因为每个人都在这里，在一起。

Original: Faris:Yes. We're not alone.
Dialogue: Yes. We're not alone.
trans: 是的。

Original: Lenna:And we can overcome anything together.
Dialogue: And we can overcome anything together.
trans: 我们可以一起克服任何事情。

Original: Dark Manikin (Galuf):How promising... Now then, here I go!
Dialogue: How promising... Now then, here I go!
trans: 多么有前途……现在，我走了！

Original: Dark Manikin (Galuf):Warriors of the World of Light... We leave the rest to you.
Dialogue: Warriors of the World of Light... We leave the rest to you.
trans: 光之世界的勇士们……剩下的就交给你们了。

Original: Lenna:Our lost memories...
Dialogue: Our lost memories...
trans: 我们失去的记忆...

Original: Krile:...Grandpa.
Dialogue: ...Grandpa.

Original: Galuf:What's the matter, Krile? I'm alive and well here!
Dialogue: What's the matter, Krile? I'm alive and well here!
trans: 怎么了，克里尔？

Original: Galuf:We haven't the time to worry about me. We must rescue Bartz!
Dialogue: We haven't the time to worry about me. We must rescue Bartz!
trans: 我们没有时间为我担心。

Original: Lenna:Y-yes, you are right. We must safeguard the world our manikins were protecting...
Dialogue: Y-yes, you are right. We must safeguard the world our manikins were protecting...
trans: 是的，你是对的。

Original: Krile:You're right... I want to help Bartz.
Dialogue: You're right... I want to help Bartz.
trans: 你说得对……我想帮助巴茨。

Original: Bartz:The wind...
Dialogue: The wind...

Original: Lenna:B-Bartz just...spoke!
Dialogue: B-Bartz just...spoke!
trans: B-Bartz 刚刚……说话了！

Original: Bartz:...is coming.
Dialogue: ...is coming.

Original: Galuf:Ruins are rising up...! Those are the ones from our world!
Dialogue: Ruins are rising up...! Those are the ones from our world!
trans: 废墟正在升起……！

Original: Cid:What's going on!? You folks still on the ground!?
Dialogue: What's going on!? You folks still on the ground!?
trans: 这是怎么回事！？

Original: Setzer:We have confirmed a mechanical structure in the sky. Are these ruins from your world?
Dialogue: We have confirmed a mechanical structure in the sky. Are these ruins from your world?
trans: 我们已经确认了天空中的机械结构。

Original: Lenna:Yes... But they might be too high to reach in the airship.
Dialogue: Yes... But they might be too high to reach in the airship.
trans: 是的……但它们可能太高了，飞艇够不着。

Original: Cid:Just what do you think mechanics are for!?
Dialogue: Just what do you think mechanics are for!?
trans: 你以为机械师是干什么用的！？

Original: Setzer:Gilgamesh told us this might happen.
Dialogue: Gilgamesh told us this might happen.
trans: 吉尔伽美什告诉我们这可能会发生。

Original: Setzer:So we made a few minor adjustments while you were fighting.
Dialogue: So we made a few minor adjustments while you were fighting.
trans: 所以我们在你战斗的时候做了一些小的调整。

Original: Cid:There was nothin' "minor" about it, you jerk!
Dialogue: There was nothin' "minor" about it, you jerk!
trans: 没有什么“小事”，你这个混蛋！

Original: Cid:We gave this thing a complete overhaul from stem to stern!
Dialogue: We gave this thing a complete overhaul from stem to stern!
trans: 我们对这东西进行了从船首到船尾的彻底检修！

Original: Faris:Well done, lads!
Dialogue: Well done, lads!
trans: 干得好，小伙子们！

Original: Setzer:What happened to all that boundless enthusiasm he usually has...?
Dialogue: What happened to all that boundless enthusiasm he usually has...?
trans: 他平时无限的热情怎么了……？

Original: Setzer:Let's see what we can do to help.
Dialogue: Let's see what we can do to help.
trans: 让我们看看我们能做些什么来提供帮助。

Original: Sazh:Hey! We're ready to go when you are! All aboard!
Dialogue: Hey! We're ready to go when you are! All aboard!
trans: 嘿！

Original: Lenna:No matter the circumstance or the world we come from, our allies are always here to help us.
Dialogue: No matter the circumstance or the world we come from, our allies are always here to help us.
trans: 无论我们来自何种环境或世界，我们的盟友总是在这里帮助我们。

Original: Krile:They're the best! C'mon, Bartz, let's go!
Dialogue: They're the best! C'mon, Bartz, let's go!
trans: 他们是最棒的！

Original: Cecil:Bartz... What's on your mind?
Dialogue: Bartz... What's on your mind?
trans: 巴茨……你在想什么？

Original: Firion:I wonder. If he lost everything, including his memories...
Dialogue: I wonder. If he lost everything, including his memories...
trans: 我想知道。

Original: Squall:Did you remember a way to get him back to his old self?
Dialogue: Did you remember a way to get him back to his old self?
trans: 你有没有想过让他变回原来的自己的方法？

Original: Galuf:It is not so easy. What we remembered were things from our home world.
Dialogue: It is not so easy. What we remembered were things from our home world.
trans: 这不是那么容易。

Original: Krile:Bartz was always so positive, I thought he would be fine even on his own.
Dialogue: Bartz was always so positive, I thought he would be fine even on his own.
trans: 巴茨总是那么积极，我以为他一个人也会没事的。

Original: Squall:(I see... You're fine both on your own or with others.)
Dialogue: (I see... You're fine both on your own or with others.)
trans: （我明白了……你一个人或者和别人在一起都很好。）

Original: Galuf:But it's like Lenna and the others said. The harm to his home took a toll on him. He was just a young lad.
Dialogue: But it's like Lenna and the others said. The harm to his home took a toll on him. He was just a young lad.
trans: 但这就像莱娜和其他人所说的那样。

Original: Zidane:He kept up a brave front. He didn't let us see any of that.
Dialogue: He kept up a brave front. He didn't let us see any of that.
trans: 他保持着勇敢的姿态。

Original: Firion:I acted like I knew, but I never did. I'm sorry...
Dialogue: I acted like I knew, but I never did. I'm sorry...
trans: 我表现得就像我知道的那样，但我从来没有这样做过。

Original: Galuf:Perhaps even he forgot. One hardly pays any mind to growing nostalgia.
Dialogue: Perhaps even he forgot. One hardly pays any mind to growing nostalgia.
trans: 或许连他自己都忘记了。

Original: Cecil:What?
Dialogue: What?
trans: 什么？

Original: Krile:Bartz's dark manikin said he was lonely.
Dialogue: Bartz's dark manikin said he was lonely.
trans: 巴茨的黑色人体模型说他很孤独。

Original: Krile:Maybe...you didn't hear it.
Dialogue: Maybe...you didn't hear it.
trans: 也许……你没听过。

Original: Firion:With all those memories of partings and loss...I wouldn't be surprised if his emotions took a turn for the worse.
Dialogue: With all those memories of partings and loss...I wouldn't be surprised if his emotions took a turn for the worse.
trans: 带着所有那些离别和失落的回忆……如果他的情绪变得更糟，我不会感到惊讶。

Original: Cecil:Perhaps he felt sympathy when told that by his dark manikin.
Dialogue: Perhaps he felt sympathy when told that by his dark manikin.
trans: 当他的黑色人体模型告诉他这些时，他可能会感到同情。

Original: Squall:(I wonder.)
Dialogue: (I wonder.)
trans: （我想知道。）

Original: Squall:(Are you okay with people just imagining what's going on inside of you?)
Dialogue: (Are you okay with people just imagining what's going on inside of you?)
trans: （你能接受人们只是想象你内心发生的事情吗？）

Original: Squall:(We won't know unless you tell us...)
Dialogue: (We won't know unless you tell us...)
trans: （除非你告诉我们，否则我们不会知道……）

Original: Zidane:You're talking like that because you know he won't reply...right?
Dialogue: You're talking like that because you know he won't reply...right?
trans: 你这样说话是因为你知道他不会回复……对吧？

Original: Squall:What did you say?
Dialogue: What did you say?
trans: 你说什么？

Original: Zidane:I know what you're thinking without saying it.
Dialogue: I know what you're thinking without saying it.
trans: 不用说我也知道你在想什么。

Original: Zidane:We were so reliant on his cheerfulness.
Dialogue: We were so reliant on his cheerfulness.
trans: 我们非常依赖他的开朗。

Original: Cecil:He always encouraged us whenever we were lost or uncertain of our path.
Dialogue: He always encouraged us whenever we were lost or uncertain of our path.
trans: 每当我们迷路或不确定我们的道路时，他总是鼓励我们。

Original: Cecil:Bartz... Perhaps you can't hear us, but...
Dialogue: Bartz... Perhaps you can't hear us, but...
trans: 巴茨……也许你听不到我们的声音，但是……

Original: Cecil:We are here to help you. Would you let us be your strength this time?
Dialogue: We are here to help you. Would you let us be your strength this time?
trans: 我们是来帮你的。

Original: Zidane:That's right. We're going to be the ones helping you out now!
Dialogue: That's right. We're going to be the ones helping you out now!
trans: 这是正确的。

Original: Squall:...You can do so without saying it, too.
Dialogue: ...You can do so without saying it, too.
trans: ......你也可以不说就这样做。

Original: Warrior of Light:Giant mechanical ruins floating in the sky... Is this Exdeath's doing?
Dialogue: Giant mechanical ruins floating in the sky... Is this Exdeath's doing?
trans: 空中漂浮着巨大的机械废墟……这是艾克斯迪斯干的？

Original: Galuf:Yes. Our dark manikins saw him with their own eyes.
Dialogue: Yes. Our dark manikins saw him with their own eyes.
trans: 是的。

Original: Galuf:I suppose Exdeath intends to summon something like the crystal and use the giant Torsion that opens up to gather power.
Dialogue: I suppose Exdeath intends to summon something like the crystal and use the giant Torsion that opens up to gather power.
trans: 我猜艾克斯迪斯打算召唤水晶之类的东西，并使用打开的巨大扭曲来收集力量。

Original: Leo:Why is he so obsessed with power?
Dialogue: Why is he so obsessed with power?
trans: 他为何如此执着于权力？

Original: Galuf:He is the physical form of evil residing in a giant tree, the very incarnation of wickedness.
Dialogue: He is the physical form of evil residing in a giant tree, the very incarnation of wickedness.
trans: 他是居住在一棵巨树中的邪恶实体，是邪恶的化身。

Original: Warrior of Light:So he is a tree that wishes to absorb the nourishment of the earth to his heart's content...
Dialogue: So he is a tree that wishes to absorb the nourishment of the earth to his heart's content...
trans: 所以他是一棵希望尽情吸收大地养分的树……

Original: Tidus:Meaning there's no logic to what he does.
Dialogue: Meaning there's no logic to what he does.
trans: 这意味着他所做的事情没有逻辑。

Original: Faris:Most likely not. I think that's why he captured Bartz's dark manikin.
Dialogue: Most likely not. I think that's why he captured Bartz's dark manikin.
trans: 很可能不会。

Original: Faris:Complicated emotions can create a powerful will... You know that, don't you?
Dialogue: Complicated emotions can create a powerful will... You know that, don't you?
trans: 复杂的情绪可以造就强大的意志……你知道的，不是吗？

Original: Tidus:Is he different?
Dialogue: Is he different?
trans: 他不一样吗？

Original: Galuf:In this world where complex memories can become our power...
Dialogue: In this world where complex memories can become our power...
trans: 在这个复杂的记忆可以成为我们力量的世界里……

Original: Galuf:An existence filled with negative emotions may be even stronger than pure evil.
Dialogue: An existence filled with negative emotions may be even stronger than pure evil.
trans: 充满负面情绪的存在，或许比纯粹的邪恶还要强大。

Original: Leo:So that's why he took Bartz's dark manikin.
Dialogue: So that's why he took Bartz's dark manikin.
trans: 所以这就是为什么他选择了 Bartz 的黑色人体模型。

Original: Tidus:But something's different.
Dialogue: But something's different.
trans: 但有一点不一样。

Original: Tidus:Galuf and the others' dark manikins were holding only painful memories.
Dialogue: Galuf and the others' dark manikins were holding only painful memories.
trans: 格鲁夫等人的黑色人体模型中，只剩下痛苦的回忆。

Original: Warrior of Light:Bartz's manikin should be the same. His will should have been strong enough...
Dialogue: Bartz's manikin should be the same. His will should have been strong enough...
trans: 巴茨的人体模型应该是一样的。

Original: Warrior of Light:If they met once before, why didn't they fight?
Dialogue: If they met once before, why didn't they fight?
trans: 如果他们以前见过一次，他们为什么不打架？

Original: Faris:...Maybe he gave him his memories.
Dialogue: ...Maybe he gave him his memories.
trans: ……也许是他给了他记忆。

Original: Galuf:Hmm... Why would he do something so absurd...?
Dialogue: Hmm... Why would he do something so absurd...?
trans: 嗯……他为什么要做出这么荒唐的事情……？

Original: Tidus:He's always so cheerful. Seeing him like this is throwing me off my game...
Dialogue: He's always so cheerful. Seeing him like this is throwing me off my game...
trans: 他总是那么开朗。

Original: Warrior of Light:His light...is with his shadow. We must get to those ruins.
Dialogue: His light...is with his shadow. We must get to those ruins.
trans: 他的光……和他的影子在一起。

Original: Steiner:I see... So that is why Sir Leo cannot use magic.
Dialogue: I see... So that is why Sir Leo cannot use magic.
trans: 原来如此……所以雷欧大人不能使用魔法。

Original: Leo:But I wished to protect my home with my own hands.
Dialogue: But I wished to protect my home with my own hands.
trans: 但我想用自己的双手保护我的家园。

Original: Ignis:It sounds like we will get along swimmingly.
Dialogue: It sounds like we will get along swimmingly.
trans: 听起来我们会相处得很好。

Original: Cecil:And you? Is there something that speaks to your loyalty as an advisor?
Dialogue: And you? Is there something that speaks to your loyalty as an advisor?
trans: 你呢？

Original: Ignis:...I cannot well express if that is what it's called.
Dialogue: ...I cannot well express if that is what it's called.
trans: ......我不能很好地表达它是否是所谓的。

Original: Steiner:But losing your country and thus your resolve to fight must have been terrible!
Dialogue: But losing your country and thus your resolve to fight must have been terrible!
trans: 但是失去你的国家和你的战斗决心一定是可怕的！

Original: Leo:At first, I thought the same. But I later realized that my loyalty was really my love for the people of my home.
Dialogue: At first, I thought the same. But I later realized that my loyalty was really my love for the people of my home.
trans: 起初，我也是这么想的。

Original: Leo:I would sacrifice anything for the people of my home.
Dialogue: I would sacrifice anything for the people of my home.
trans: 我愿意为我家的人牺牲任何东西。

Original: Cecil:A loyal man... I was estranged from my people, so I admit I'm a little envious.
Dialogue: A loyal man... I was estranged from my people, so I admit I'm a little envious.
trans: 一个忠诚的人……我和我的人民疏远了，所以我承认我有点嫉妒。

Original: Cecil:There was a time that my countrymen hated me because of a misunderstanding.
Dialogue: There was a time that my countrymen hated me because of a misunderstanding.
trans: 曾经有一段时间，我的同胞因为误会而恨我。

Original: Ignis:I think you are very loyal, Cecil.
Dialogue: I think you are very loyal, Cecil.
trans: 我认为你非常忠诚，塞西尔。

Original: Ignis:As for myself... I have memories of both the city I was raised in and the world I traveled...
Dialogue: As for myself... I have memories of both the city I was raised in and the world I traveled...
trans: 至于我自己……我对我长大的城市和我旅行的世界都有记忆……

Original: Ignis:But if Noct were not the king, I am uncertain I would have done the same things.
Dialogue: But if Noct were not the king, I am uncertain I would have done the same things.
trans: 但如果 Noct 不是国王，我不确定我是否会做同样的事情。

Original: Cecil:Everyone has their own circumstances... There is a lot to be learned here.
Dialogue: Everyone has their own circumstances... There is a lot to be learned here.
trans: 每个人都有自己的情况……这里有很多东西要学。

Original: Ramza:I wonder if I ever felt that toward someone...
Dialogue: I wonder if I ever felt that toward someone...
trans: 我想知道我是否曾经对某人有过这种感觉……

Original: Agrias:Even if your memories were sound, thinking that way is pointless.
Dialogue: Even if your memories were sound, thinking that way is pointless.
trans: 即使你的记忆是健全的，那样想也是毫无意义的。

Original: Agrias:A strategist's emotional attachment...
Dialogue: A strategist's emotional attachment...
trans: 战略家的情感依恋...

Original: Agrias:And a general's compassion for people...
Dialogue: And a general's compassion for people...
trans: 还有将军的慈悲心……

Original: Agrias:Both are ideas you might have.
Dialogue: Both are ideas you might have.
trans: 两者都是您可能有的想法。

Original: Ramza:...Thank you for your kind words, Agrias.
Dialogue: ...Thank you for your kind words, Agrias.
trans: ...谢谢你的客气话，Agrias。

Original: Ramza:Because of you, I can still believe in myself.
Dialogue: Because of you, I can still believe in myself.
trans: 因为有你，我还能相信自己。

Original: Agrias:Even my memories are untrustworthy. For now, we need only accomplish our mission in this world.
Dialogue: Even my memories are untrustworthy. For now, we need only accomplish our mission in this world.
trans: 连我的记忆都不可信。

Original: Krile:Sniffle... Grandpa...
Dialogue: Sniffle... Grandpa...
trans: 吸鼻子……爷爷……

Original: Ignis:Is it painful, reclaiming your future?
Dialogue: Is it painful, reclaiming your future?
trans: 夺回你的未来是痛苦的吗？

Original: Krile:Yeah... Once we finish our journey here, I won't be able to be with Grandpa anymore...
Dialogue: Yeah... Once we finish our journey here, I won't be able to be with Grandpa anymore...
trans: 是啊……一旦我们结束了这里的旅程，我就不能再和爷爷在一起了……

Original: Krile:I thought we would always be together... I don't want to be apart...!
Dialogue: I thought we would always be together... I don't want to be apart...!
trans: 我以为我们会永远在一起……我不想分开……！

Original: Krile:I want the world to be peaceful, but...then I'll be all alone...
Dialogue: I want the world to be peaceful, but...then I'll be all alone...
trans: 想要世界太平，可是……那样的话，我就孤身一人了……

Original: Krile:...I'm sorry, Ignis. I didn't mean to...
Dialogue: ...I'm sorry, Ignis. I didn't mean to...
trans: ……对不起，伊格尼斯。

Original: Ignis:Never you mind that. I understand well the pain of loss and solitude...
Dialogue: Never you mind that. I understand well the pain of loss and solitude...
trans: 没关系，你介意。

Original: Krile:I'm so happy I could see Grandpa again, but...I'm scared of saying goodbye.
Dialogue: I'm so happy I could see Grandpa again, but...I'm scared of saying goodbye.
trans: 我很高兴能再次见到爷爷，但是……我害怕说再见。

Original: Krile:But if I get sad and cry...Grandpa will laugh at me.
Dialogue: But if I get sad and cry...Grandpa will laugh at me.
trans: 但是如果我难过哭了……爷爷会笑话我的。

Original: Krile:When I think about the bad guys from other worlds...I kind of understand how they feel.
Dialogue: When I think about the bad guys from other worlds...I kind of understand how they feel.
trans: 当我想到来自其他世界的坏人时……我有点理解他们的感受。

Original: Krile:I start to wonder if I could change what happened then...
Dialogue: I start to wonder if I could change what happened then...
trans: 我开始怀疑我是否可以改变当时发生的一切......

Original: Ignis:...I see.
Dialogue: ...I see.
trans: ...我懂了。

Original: Ignis:If you could change it, that future would not have you in it, Krile.
Dialogue: If you could change it, that future would not have you in it, Krile.
trans: 如果你能改变它，那个未来就不会有你，Krile。

Original: Ignis:There would be people who missed you... Including your grandfather.
Dialogue: There would be people who missed you... Including your grandfather.
trans: 会有人想念你的……包括你的祖父。

Original: Krile:Even Grandpa...?
Dialogue: Even Grandpa...?
trans: 连爷爷都……？

Original: Ignis:You are together now. You ought to be searching with Galuf for the course you should follow.
Dialogue: You are together now. You ought to be searching with Galuf for the course you should follow.
trans: 你们现在在一起了。

Original: Krile:...You're right. We are together now.
Dialogue: ...You're right. We are together now.
trans: ...你说得对。

Original: Zack:Hey, Krile! Do you have any memories that might get a reaction out of Bartz?
Dialogue: Hey, Krile! Do you have any memories that might get a reaction out of Bartz?
trans: 嘿，克里尔！

Original: Zack:Everyone's trying to talk to him now.
Dialogue: Everyone's trying to talk to him now.
trans: 现在每个人都想和他说话。

Original: Krile:Huh!? But there are so many...
Dialogue: Huh!? But there are so many...

Original: Ignis:Everyone is worried about Bartz.
Dialogue: Everyone is worried about Bartz.
trans: 每个人都在担心巴茨。

Original: Krile:...Right. I need to help him.
Dialogue: ...Right. I need to help him.
trans: ...正确的。

Original: Krile:After all, he was a good friend to me when I was all alone!
Dialogue: After all, he was a good friend to me when I was all alone!
trans: 毕竟，当我一个人的时候，他是我的好朋友！

Original: Zack:I've got a bad feeling about this...
Dialogue: I've got a bad feeling about this...
trans: 对此我有种不好的预感...

Original: Zack:Hey, it's me, Zack! Cloud's here, too. Remember us?
Dialogue: Hey, it's me, Zack! Cloud's here, too. Remember us?
trans: 嘿，是我，扎克！

Original: Cloud:Enough. He can't hear you.
Dialogue: Enough. He can't hear you.
trans: 足够的。

Original: Zack:We don't know for sure until we try!
Dialogue: We don't know for sure until we try!
trans: 在我们尝试之前我们不确定！

Original: Zack:Even if he lost his memories of his home world, there's a chance he still remembers us.
Dialogue: Even if he lost his memories of his home world, there's a chance he still remembers us.
trans: 即使他失去了对家乡世界的记忆，他也有可能还记得我们。

Original: Noel:You might be right.
Dialogue: You might be right.
trans: 你可能是对的。

Original: Noel:His heart might just be out on a stroll, looking for a reason to come back.
Dialogue: His heart might just be out on a stroll, looking for a reason to come back.
trans: 他的心可能只是出去逛逛，寻找一个回来的理由。

Original: Ignis:Noct. What is Bartz's favorite dish?
Dialogue: Noct. What is Bartz's favorite dish?
trans: 晚上。

Original: Noct:How should I know?
Dialogue: How should I know?
trans: 我怎么知道？

Original: Noct:Well... We went fishing together and ate that before.
Dialogue: Well... We went fishing together and ate that before.
trans: 嗯……我们一起去钓鱼，之前吃过那个。

Original: Ignis:Fish... I'll give it a try.
Dialogue: Fish... I'll give it a try.
trans: 鱼……我试试看。

Original: Cloud:...Are you really going to do that, even if it won't work?
Dialogue: ...Are you really going to do that, even if it won't work?
trans: ......你真的打算这样做，即使它不会起作用吗？

Original: Ignis:It's worth a try, especially since he's from a different world. There must be something we can do.
Dialogue: It's worth a try, especially since he's from a different world. There must be something we can do.
trans: 值得一试，尤其是因为他来自不同的世界。

Original: Zack:And it's not like I can just look the other way.
Dialogue: And it's not like I can just look the other way.
trans: 而且我不能只看另一个方向。

Original: Noel:Agreed. I don't want to give up on the living.
Dialogue: Agreed. I don't want to give up on the living.
trans: 同意。

Original: Noct:He always acted so...free.
Dialogue: He always acted so...free.
trans: 他总是表现得那么……自由。

Original: Noct:It doesn't feel right just leaving him like this.
Dialogue: It doesn't feel right just leaving him like this.
trans: 就这样离开他感觉不对。

Original: Ignis:It sounds like he embarked on a journey on his own. Nevertheless, he's a gentle person who won't turn down a friend.
Dialogue: It sounds like he embarked on a journey on his own. Nevertheless, he's a gentle person who won't turn down a friend.
trans: 听起来像是他独自踏上了旅程。

Original: Noel:I can see how he became a leader. I wish I could go on a journey like him.
Dialogue: I can see how he became a leader. I wish I could go on a journey like him.
trans: 我可以看到他是如何成为领导者的。

Original: Cloud:But now he's just a husk of who he used to be...
Dialogue: But now he's just a husk of who he used to be...
trans: 但现在他只是他曾经是谁的外壳......

Original: Zack:See! Even you know this isn't right, Cloud! What should we do...?
Dialogue: See! Even you know this isn't right, Cloud! What should we do...?
trans: 看！

Original: Cloud:...Everything we possibly can...for a friend.
Dialogue: ...Everything we possibly can...for a friend.
trans: ...我们可能做的一切...为了朋友。

Original: Squall:No response, as usual.
Dialogue: No response, as usual.
trans: 没有回应，一如往常。

Original: Lenna:But we've tried so many things...
Dialogue: But we've tried so many things...
trans: 但是我们已经尝试了很多东西......

Original: Squall:(It brings back some bad memories...)
Dialogue: (It brings back some bad memories...)
trans: （勾起了一些不好的回忆……）

Original: Squall:You weren't always like this...
Dialogue: You weren't always like this...
trans: 你不是一直这样的...

Original: Zidane:He's usually such a positive guy...which makes it that much harder to look at.
Dialogue: He's usually such a positive guy...which makes it that much harder to look at.
trans: 他通常是一个非常积极的人……这让人很难看。

Original: Leo:Bartz... I'm sorry for what I said that time. I was careless.
Dialogue: Bartz... I'm sorry for what I said that time. I was careless.
trans: 巴茨……我为我当时说的话感到抱歉。

Original: Leo:I didn't think it weighed so heavily on you that you would surrender your own heart...
Dialogue: I didn't think it weighed so heavily on you that you would surrender your own heart...
trans: 没想到你的心这么重，竟然会交出自己的心……

Original: Zidane:You talked to him before it happened? Did anything seem...different?
Dialogue: You talked to him before it happened? Did anything seem...different?
trans: 事发前你跟他谈过？

Original: Leo:We were talking about leaving our hometowns.
Dialogue: We were talking about leaving our hometowns.
trans: 我们正在谈论离开家乡。

Original: Lenna:Usually Bartz doesn't talk about such things.
Dialogue: Usually Bartz doesn't talk about such things.
trans: 通常巴茨不会谈论这样的事情。

Original: Faris:He knew he couldn't returnhome, yet hewent to save a friend.
Dialogue: He knew he couldn't return home, yet he went to save a friend.
trans: 他知道他回不了家了，但他还是去救了一个朋友。

Original: Lenna:No matter how far he traveled, Bartz never forgot where he came from.
Dialogue: No matter how far he traveled, Bartz never forgot where he came from.
trans: 无论走多远，巴茨都没有忘记自己来自哪里。

Original: Squall:(It's like talking to a wall.)
Dialogue: (It's like talking to a wall.)
trans: （这就像对着一堵墙说话。）

Original: Leo:...No doubt Galuf brought to mind the memories of his passed father.
Dialogue: ...No doubt Galuf brought to mind the memories of his passed father.
trans: ……毫无疑问，格鲁夫让他想起了已故父亲的回忆。

Original: Leo:His dark manikin is carrying all that sadness on his own. He may be stronger than even Bartz himself.
Dialogue: His dark manikin is carrying all that sadness on his own. He may be stronger than even Bartz himself.
trans: 他深色的人体模型独自承受着所有的悲伤。

Original: Squall:There's no way he'd lose...
Dialogue: There's no way he'd lose...
trans: 他怎么可能输...

Original: Lenna:What do you mean?
Dialogue: What do you mean?
trans: 你是什​​么意思？

Original: Squall:Even without his memories, Bartz is still Bartz.
Dialogue: Even without his memories, Bartz is still Bartz.
trans: 即使没有了记忆，巴茨还是巴茨。

Original: Squall:He must have had a reason, and temporarily entrusted his manikin with his memories.
Dialogue: He must have had a reason, and temporarily entrusted his manikin with his memories.
trans: 他一定是有什么理由，将自己的记忆暂时托付给了人偶。

Original: Zidane:I think so, too. His memories weren't taken by force. He gave them to his manikin.
Dialogue: I think so, too. His memories weren't taken by force. He gave them to his manikin.
trans: 我也这么认为。

Original: Zidane:...Maybe he wanted to share the strength of overcoming that sadness with him.
Dialogue: ...Maybe he wanted to share the strength of overcoming that sadness with him.
trans: ……或许是想和他分享战胜那份悲伤的力量吧。

Original: Squall:(And still no response.)
Dialogue: (And still no response.)
trans: （仍然没有回应。）

Original: Squall:And here I thought you would be the only one who wouldn't get so down like this...
Dialogue: And here I thought you would be the only one who wouldn't get so down like this...
trans: 在这里，我认为你会是唯一一个不会像这样沮丧的人......

Original: Faris:Hear that? Folks from other worlds have faith in you.
Dialogue: Hear that? Folks from other worlds have faith in you.
trans: 听说？

Original: Zidane:You guys all know how reliable he is, right?
Dialogue: You guys all know how reliable he is, right?
trans: 你们都知道他有多靠谱吧？

Original: Lenna:Of course. Everyone depends on him.
Dialogue: Of course. Everyone depends on him.
trans: 当然。

Original: Lenna:But that's exactly why...I want to help him now. I want to be with him again.
Dialogue: But that's exactly why...I want to help him now. I want to be with him again.
trans: 但这就是为什么……我现在想帮助他。

Original: Zidane:So we're all in the same boat then! Leave it to us, Bartz!
Dialogue: So we're all in the same boat then! Leave it to us, Bartz!
trans: 所以我们都在同一条船上！

Original: Dark Manikin (Bartz):...You're too late. The crystal's power is near.
Dialogue: ...You're too late. The crystal's power is near.
trans: ...你太迟了。

Original: Krile:Are you a servant of Exdeath now!?
Dialogue: Are you a servant of Exdeath now!?
trans: 你现在是艾克斯迪斯的仆人吗！？

Original: Dark Manikin (Bartz):He who saved the world but couldn't save himself is here... You all remember what happened, don't you?
Dialogue: He who saved the world but couldn't save himself is here... You all remember what happened, don't you?
trans: 拯救了世界却无法拯救自己的人就在这里……你们都记得发生了什么，不是吗？

Original: Lenna:...We do. We remember everything until the end of our journey.
Dialogue: ...We do. We remember everything until the end of our journey.
trans: ...我们的确是。

Original: Faris:So why are you doing this!?
Dialogue: So why are you doing this!?
trans: 那你为什么要这样做！？

Original: Dark Manikin (Bartz):No matter what you say, it's pointless now.
Dialogue: No matter what you say, it's pointless now.
trans: 不管你说什么，现在都没有意义了。

Original: Dark Manikin (Bartz):A great power is about to be reborn from this Torsion...!
Dialogue: A great power is about to be reborn from this Torsion...!
trans: 一股强大的力量即将从这种扭力中重生……！

Original: Dark Manikin (Bartz):...Just kidding.
Dialogue: ...Just kidding.
trans: ...只是在开玩笑。

Original: Dark Manikin (Bartz):As if I would do something like this!
Dialogue: As if I would do something like this!
trans: 好像我会做这样的事似的！

Original: Faris:Huh!? Bartz, have you come to your senses!?
Dialogue: Huh!? Bartz, have you come to your senses!?

Original: Lenna:You mean you weren't being controlled by Exdeath?
Dialogue: You mean you weren't being controlled by Exdeath?
trans: 你是说你没有被 Exdeath 控制？

Original: Dark Manikin (Bartz):I was. He used the wounds in my heart to control me, but...
Dialogue: I was. He used the wounds in my heart to control me, but...
trans: 我曾是。

Original: Dark Manikin (Bartz):The real me...helped me remember how to overcome it.
Dialogue: The real me...helped me remember how to overcome it.
trans: 真正的我……帮助我记住了如何克服它。

Original: Galuf:I see. He wanted to save you from sinking into despair...
Dialogue: I see. He wanted to save you from sinking into despair...
trans: 我懂了。

Original: Faris:So that's why he gave you everything he had...
Dialogue: So that's why he gave you everything he had...
trans: 这就是为什么他给了你他所有的一切......

Original: Dark Manikin (Bartz):Well...it didn't go quite as planned. It looks like his heart went on a journey of its own...
Dialogue: Well...it didn't go quite as planned. It looks like his heart went on a journey of its own...
trans: 好吧……它并没有按计划进行。

Original: Dark Manikin (Bartz):I was borrowing it for a little while to stop Exdeath, but...
Dialogue: I was borrowing it for a little while to stop Exdeath, but...
trans: 我借了它一段时间来阻止 Exdeath，但是......

Original: Dark Manikin (Bartz):Now that you're here, I can return his memories to where they belong.
Dialogue: Now that you're here, I can return his memories to where they belong.
trans: 既然你来了，我就可以把他的记忆带回原处。

Original: Dark Manikin (Bartz):That's right. Fight me and remember who you are!
Dialogue: That's right. Fight me and remember who you are!
trans: 这是正确的。

Original: Bartz:......
Dark Manikin (Bartz):You poor thing. Your friends are beside you, but you can't talk to them...
Dialogue: You poor thing. Your friends are beside you, but you can't talk to them...
trans: 你这个可怜的东西。

Original: Dark Manikin (Bartz):I'm not alone. I'm not sad anymore.
Dialogue: I'm not alone. I'm not sad anymore.
trans: 我不孤独。

Original: Dark Manikin (Bartz):So I'll give it all back to you. Thank you...me.
Dialogue: So I'll give it all back to you. Thank you...me.
trans: 所以我会把它全部还给你。

Original: Dark Manikin (Bartz):My heart was so full... Thank you.
Dialogue: My heart was so full... Thank you.
trans: 我的心满满的……谢谢你。

Original: Bartz:Yaaawn... Why do I feel like I woke up from a long dream...?
Dialogue: Yaaawn... Why do I feel like I woke up from a long dream...?
trans: Yaaawn...为什么我觉得我从一个漫长的梦中醒来...？

Original: Lenna:Bartz! You can speak again!
Dialogue: Bartz! You can speak again!
trans: 巴茨！

Original: Bartz:Huh? What's everyone doing here? And are we...in some ruins?
Dialogue: Huh? What's everyone doing here? And are we...in some ruins?
trans: 嗯？

Original: Krile:Come on! Get it together!
Dialogue: Come on! Get it together!
trans: 快点！

Original: Faris:We were worried about you, matey!
Dialogue: We were worried about you, matey!
trans: 我们很担心你，伙计！

Original: Galuf:The same old Bartz... No, this Bartz has come back to us with all of his memories intact.
Dialogue: The same old Bartz... No, this Bartz has come back to us with all of his memories intact.
trans: 还是那个老巴茨……不，这个巴茨带着他所有的记忆完好无损地回到了我们身边。

Original: Bartz:...Yes, I'm back. Sorry for all the trouble.
Dialogue: ...Yes, I'm back. Sorry for all the trouble.
trans: ……是的，我回来了。

Original: Galuf:Just what were you thinking doing something so reckless?
Dialogue: Just what were you thinking doing something so reckless?
trans: 你到底在想什么，做出如此鲁莽的事情？

Original: Galuf:What would have happened should your dark manikin use your memories for foul purposes?
Dialogue: What would have happened should your dark manikin use your memories for foul purposes?
trans: 如果你的黑色人体模型将你的记忆用于卑鄙的目的，会发生什么？

Original: Bartz:I knew he wouldn't. He's me, after all.
Dialogue: I knew he wouldn't. He's me, after all.
trans: 我知道他不会。

Original: Bartz:And even if I was wrong, I knew you would all be there to stop him. It all worked out in the end, didn't it?
Dialogue: And even if I was wrong, I knew you would all be there to stop him. It all worked out in the end, didn't it?
trans: 即使我错了，我也知道你们都会在那里阻止他。

Original: Galuf:Is that really true?
Dialogue: Is that really true?
trans: 真的是这样吗？

Original: Bartz:Of course it is!
Dialogue: Of course it is!
trans: 当然如此！

Original: Bartz:Thank you, everyone, for giving me strength.
Dialogue: Thank you, everyone, for giving me strength.
trans: 谢谢大家给我力量。

Original: Bartz:There are so many things I want to talk about, but first...we need to deal with these ruins.
Dialogue: There are so many things I want to talk about, but first...we need to deal with these ruins.
trans: 有很多话想说，但首先……我们得先处理好这些遗迹。

Original: Lenna:There's a big Torsion where the crystal should be.
Dialogue: There's a big Torsion where the crystal should be.
trans: 水晶应该在的地方有一个大的扭曲。

Original: Faris:Is this Exdeath's target?
Dialogue: Is this Exdeath's target?
trans: 这是埃克斯迪斯的目标吗？

Original: Exdeath:...Even without that puppet, my plan will not fail.
Dialogue: ...Even without that puppet, my plan will not fail.
trans: ……就算没有那个傀儡，我的计划也不会失败。

Original: Exdeath:I will gain the power of the world released from this Torsion!
Dialogue: I will gain the power of the world released from this Torsion!
trans: 我将获得从这个扭力中释放出来的世界之力！

Original: Exdeath:Shinryu! Come to me!
Dialogue: Shinryu! Come to me!
trans: 新龙！来找我！

Original: Galuf:Just how far are you willing to go for power?
Dialogue: Just how far are you willing to go for power?
trans: 你愿意为权力走多远？

Original: Exdeath:All power shall be mine, and I shall become the ultimate existence!
Dialogue: All power shall be mine, and I shall become the ultimate existence!
trans: 所有的力量都属于我，我将成为终极的存在！

Original: Gilgamesh:Not on my watch!
Dialogue: Not on my watch!
trans: 不在我的手表上！

Original: Exdeath:Gilgamesh... So this was your doing after all.
Dialogue: Gilgamesh... So this was your doing after all.
trans: 吉尔伽美什……原来这是你干的。

Original: Leo:Defying the god who summoned you and chasing after power... I cannot let this go unpunished!
Dialogue: Defying the god who summoned you and chasing after power... I cannot let this go unpunished!
trans: 违抗召唤你的神明，追逐力量……我不能逍遥法外！

Original: Exdeath:God? Mwa-haha... So they still have some strength, I see.
Dialogue: God? Mwa-haha... So they still have some strength, I see.
trans: 上帝？

Original: Bartz:What's so funny!?
Dialogue: What's so funny!?
trans: 有什么好笑的！？

Original: Exdeath:The world abandoned the gods a long time ago.
Dialogue: The world abandoned the gods a long time ago.
trans: 很久以前，世界就抛弃了众神。

Original: Exdeath:The crystal core of darkness is under the control of a much stronger will.
Dialogue: The crystal core of darkness is under the control of a much stronger will.
trans: 黑暗晶核在更强大意志的控制之下。

Original: Exdeath:What I seek is that power!
Dialogue: What I seek is that power!
trans: 我要的就是那种力量！

Original: Terra:The crystal cores no longer belong to the gods...!?
Dialogue: The crystal cores no longer belong to the gods...!?
trans: 晶核已经不属于神了……！？

Original: Exdeath:You servants of the old gods are no longer necessary in this world...
Dialogue: You servants of the old gods are no longer necessary in this world...
trans: 在这个世界上不再需要你们旧神的仆人……

Original: Exdeath:Return to the Void!
Dialogue: Return to the Void!
trans: 回归虚空！

Original: Bartz:We won't give up!
Dialogue: We won't give up!
trans: 我们不会放弃！

Original: Gilgamesh:That's right! Don't believe a word he says!
Dialogue: That's right! Don't believe a word he says!
trans: 这是正确的！

Original: Gilgamesh:I believe in the will of people like Bartz and Little Leo!
Dialogue: I believe in the will of people like Bartz and Little Leo!
trans: 我相信巴茨和小里奥这样的人的意志！

Original: Bartz:Let's do this, everyone! For the future!
Dialogue: Let's do this, everyone! For the future!
trans: 大家一起来吧！

Original: Exdeath:Anger, sadness, loneliness... You accepted all of it.
Dialogue: Anger, sadness, loneliness... You accepted all of it.
trans: 愤怒、悲伤、孤独……你全都接受了。

Original: Bartz:Yes. I remembered what I lost.
Dialogue: Yes. I remembered what I lost.
trans: 是的。

Original: Exdeath:Then why do you still refuse me?
Dialogue: Then why do you still refuse me?
trans: 那你为什么还拒绝我？

Original: Exdeath:Kneel before the Void, where there is no sadness or hatred! Bow before its power!
Dialogue: Kneel before the Void, where there is no sadness or hatred! Bow before its power!
trans: 跪在没有悲伤和仇恨的虚空之前！

Original: Bartz:There's no way you could understand. I won't let you turn my memories to nothing!
Dialogue: There's no way you could understand. I won't let you turn my memories to nothing!
trans: 没有办法让你明白。

Original: Lenna:The ruins are crumbling...!
Dialogue: The ruins are crumbling...!
trans: 废墟正在崩塌……！

Original: Faris:Exdeath ran away like the yellow-bellied coward he is! We need to get out of here now!
Dialogue: Exdeath ran away like the yellow-bellied coward he is! We need to get out of here now!
trans: Exdeath 像个胆小鬼一样逃跑了！

Original: Krile:Grandpa! Bartz! Come on!
Dialogue: Grandpa! Bartz! Come on!
trans: 爷爷！

Original: Galuf:Yes? This is no time to be gloomy.
Dialogue: Yes? This is no time to be gloomy.
trans: 是的？

Original: Bartz:I know.
Dialogue: I know.
trans: 我知道。

Original: Bartz:I'm happy I could see you again here, alive.
Dialogue: I'm happy I could see you again here, alive.
trans: 我很高兴能在这里再次见到你，还活着。

Original: Galuf:Ho ho! You needn't make a mountain of a molehill!
Dialogue: Ho ho! You needn't make a mountain of a molehill!
trans: 呵呵！

Original: Galuf:But...I am happy to hear it.
Dialogue: But...I am happy to hear it.
trans: 但是……我很高兴听到这个消息。

Original: Warrior of Light:Exdeath said this world is out of the gods' hands...
Dialogue: Exdeath said this world is out of the gods' hands...
trans: 艾克斯迪斯说这个世界不在神的手中……

Original: Leo:The mission Spiritus gave me was about that.
Dialogue: The mission Spiritus gave me was about that.
trans: Spiritus 给我的任务就是关于这个。

Original: Leo:He said the crystal core of darkness was starting to lose control.
Dialogue: He said the crystal core of darkness was starting to lose control.
trans: 他说黑暗的水晶核心开始失去控制。

Original: Leo:He said it was on the verge of becoming something that bestows unlimited power on those with strong wills, regardless of good and evil.
Dialogue: He said it was on the verge of becoming something that bestows unlimited power on those with strong wills, regardless of good and evil.
trans: 他说，它即将成为一种东西，无论善恶，意志坚强的人都能获得无限的力量。

Original: Edgar:So Spiritus realized the gravity of the situation and appointed a general as one of his warriors to resolve the problem...
Dialogue: So Spiritus realized the gravity of the situation and appointed a general as one of his warriors to resolve the problem...
trans: 因此，Spiritus 意识到情况的严重性，并任命一名将军作为他的战士之一来解决问题......

Original: Onion Knight:The power of wills is law here.
Dialogue: The power of wills is law here.
trans: 意志的力量在这里就是法律。

Original: Onion Knight:If there is someone with a will stronger than the gods, then...the world obeys them.
Dialogue: If there is someone with a will stronger than the gods, then...the world obeys them.
trans: 如果有意志比神更强大的人，那么……世界就会服从他们。

Original: Bartz:Exdeath said the same thing...
Dialogue: Exdeath said the same thing...
trans: Exdeath 说了同样的话...

Original: Warrior of Light:So this is even beyond Spiritus's control now...
Dialogue: So this is even beyond Spiritus's control now...
trans: 所以这甚至已经超出了 Spiritus 的控制范围……

Original: Onion Knight:Calling on someone like General Leo may have been his way of saying he indirectly wanted to work with us.
Dialogue: Calling on someone like General Leo may have been his way of saying he indirectly wanted to work with us.
trans: 拜访像里奥将军这样的人可能是他间接表示希望与我们合作的方式。

Original: Onion Knight:It sure would be great if he would only summon people like General Leo...
Dialogue: It sure would be great if he would only summon people like General Leo...
trans: 要是只召唤雷欧将军这样的人就好了……

Original: Edgar:There have been cases like that in the past. But the gods are not to be counted on.
Dialogue: There have been cases like that in the past. But the gods are not to be counted on.
trans: 过去有过这样的案例。

Original: Galuf:Just where is the crystal core of darkness now?
Dialogue: Just where is the crystal core of darkness now?
trans: 黑暗晶核现在究竟在哪里？

Original: Warrior of Light:With so many warriors shaping the world to their will, we can't be sure of its location.
Dialogue: With so many warriors shaping the world to their will, we can't be sure of its location.
trans: 有这么多战士按照他们的意愿塑造世界，我们无法确定它的位置。

Original: Leo:Indeed. Spiritus told me he is searching for places of unusual activity.
Dialogue: Indeed. Spiritus told me he is searching for places of unusual activity.
trans: 的确。

Original: Bartz:Well, in that case, I guess we'll just let the wind decide where we go next!
Dialogue: Well, in that case, I guess we'll just let the wind decide where we go next!
trans: 好吧，既然如此，我想我们就让风来决定我们下一步要去哪里吧！

Original: Onion Knight:How carefree... Still...
Dialogue: How carefree... Still...
trans: 多么无忧无虑……还是……

Original: Warrior of Light:We are happy to have you back here safe. It seems like an even brighter light shines within you.
Dialogue: We are happy to have you back here safe. It seems like an even brighter light shines within you.
trans: 我们很高兴你能安全回到这里。

Original: Bartz:Mm. I'm alright now. Thank you.
Dialogue: Mm. I'm alright now. Thank you.
trans: 毫米。

Original: Bartz:Even though my heart wasn't here...I could hear your voices.
Dialogue: Even though my heart wasn't here...I could hear your voices.
trans: 即使我的心不在这里......我能听到你的声音。

Original: Bartz:Not just my old friends, but everyone here.
Dialogue: Not just my old friends, but everyone here.
trans: 不只是我的老朋友，还有这里的每一个人。

Original: Warrior of Light:Now let us all go forth together...as warriors of light.
Dialogue: Now let us all go forth together...as warriors of light.
trans: 现在让我们一起前进……作为光之战士。

Original: Galuf:The crystal gave out four powers...
Dialogue: The crystal gave out four powers...
trans: 水晶发出四种力量……

Original: Galuf:My "hope" was Krile.
Dialogue: My "hope" was Krile.
trans: 我的“希望”是 Krile。

Original: Bartz:Now there are five of us. I hope that's alright.
Dialogue: Now there are five of us. I hope that's alright.
trans: 现在我们有五个人。

Original: Bartz:We've just got double the hope now!
Dialogue: We've just got double the hope now!
trans: 我们现在有了双倍的希望！

Original: Galuf:Ho ho. With your memories back, you're even cheerier than ever!
Dialogue: Ho ho. With your memories back, you're even cheerier than ever!
trans: 呵呵。

Original: Bartz:I told you, I'm happy.
Dialogue: I told you, I'm happy.
trans: 我告诉过你，我很高兴。

Original: Bartz:After talking to my dark manikin who was all alone...I remembered a lot of things.
Dialogue: After talking to my dark manikin who was all alone...I remembered a lot of things.
trans: 在和我一个人的黑色人体模型交谈后……我想起了很多事情。

Original: Bartz:I didn't think I was lonely. It was my father's dying wish...
Dialogue: I didn't think I was lonely. It was my father's dying wish...
trans: 我不认为我是孤独的。

Original: Bartz:But something happened and I wanted to lay my dad to rest next to my mom as soon as possible.
Dialogue: But something happened and I wanted to lay my dad to rest next to my mom as soon as possible.
trans: 但是发生了一些事情，我想尽快让我爸爸躺在我妈妈身边休息。

Original: Galuf:You mean you may have gone home had you not met me?
Dialogue: You mean you may have gone home had you not met me?
trans: 你是说如果你没有遇见我，你可能已经回家了？

Original: Bartz:I'm sure of it. After all, I only went after you and Lenna because of Boko...
Dialogue: I'm sure of it. After all, I only went after you and Lenna because of Boko...
trans: 我敢肯定。

Original: Galuf:It's nothing to fret about. You were traveling around that world we met in.
Dialogue: It's nothing to fret about. You were traveling around that world we met in.
trans: 没什么可担心的。

Original: Galuf:So even if we had parted, I'm sure our paths would have crossed again.
Dialogue: So even if we had parted, I'm sure our paths would have crossed again.
trans: 所以即使我们分开了，我相信我们的道路还会再次相遇。

Original: Bartz:I'm glad we journeyed together from the start.
Dialogue: I'm glad we journeyed together from the start.
trans: 我很高兴我们从一开始就一起旅行。

Original: Galuf:I told you, no more gloomy words!
Dialogue: I told you, no more gloomy words!
trans: 我告诉你，不要再阴沉的话了！

Original: Bartz:When I told you not to die, I didn't mean to meet me in a place like this...
Dialogue: When I told you not to die, I didn't mean to meet me in a place like this...
trans: 当我告诉你不要死的时候，我不是故意要在这种地方遇见我的……

Original: Bartz:Or at least that's what I thought. But being together again is great. When you came back, I was so relieved.
Dialogue: Or at least that's what I thought. But being together again is great. When you came back, I was so relieved.
trans: 或者至少那是我的想法。

Original: Galuf:...Is that so.
Dialogue: ...Is that so.
trans: ...是这样吗。

Original: Galuf:The hope the crystal entrusted to us...is something we must achieve on our own.
Dialogue: The hope the crystal entrusted to us...is something we must achieve on our own.
trans: 水晶托付给我们的希望……是我们必须靠自己去实现的。

Original: Galuf:Krile with her hope, me with my hope...
Dialogue: Krile with her hope, me with my hope...
trans: Krile 带着她的希望，我带着我的希望……

Original: Galuf:We will search this world together.
Dialogue: We will search this world together.
trans: 我们将一起探索这个世界。

Original: Bartz:I'll go with you, no matter how far.
Dialogue: I'll go with you, no matter how far.
trans: 我会和你一起去，无论多远。

Original: Galuf:If you really feel that way, stop being so reckless from now on.
Dialogue: If you really feel that way, stop being so reckless from now on.
trans: 如果你真的有这种感觉，从现在开始就不要那么鲁莽了。

Original: Galuf:It's not just us who worry about you now, but people from other worlds.
Dialogue: It's not just us who worry about you now, but people from other worlds.
trans: 现在担心你的不仅仅是我们，还有其他世界的人。

Original: Bartz:I wasn't being reckless. I believed in everyone...
Dialogue: I wasn't being reckless. I believed in everyone...
trans: 我没有鲁莽。

Original: Galuf:You're a fool, Bartz. If you make your companions worry, that trust is meaningless!
Dialogue: You're a fool, Bartz. If you make your companions worry, that trust is meaningless!
trans: 你是个傻瓜，巴茨。

Original: Bartz:...I know. I'll be more careful.
Dialogue: ...I know. I'll be more careful.
trans: ...我知道。

Original: Galuf:What are you doing grinning there without a word? Lost your memories again?
Dialogue: What are you doing grinning there without a word? Lost your memories again?
trans: 你在那里笑而不语做什么？

Original: Bartz:It's just...when I think of being able to journey with you again, Galuf...
Dialogue: It's just...when I think of being able to journey with you again, Galuf...
trans: 只是……一想到能和你一起去旅行，嘎鲁夫……

Original: Bartz:I feel so happy. And when I think about what lies ahead...
Dialogue: I feel so happy. And when I think about what lies ahead...
trans: 我很高兴。

Original: Bartz:I know that we can overcome anything.
Dialogue: I know that we can overcome anything.
trans: 我知道我们可以克服任何事情。

Original: Galuf:...You really are a fool, Bartz.
Dialogue: ...You really are a fool, Bartz.
trans: ……你真是个傻瓜，巴兹。

Original: Galuf:It is not just me, but everyone who will help us overcome what lies ahead.
Dialogue: It is not just me, but everyone who will help us overcome what lies ahead.
trans: 不仅仅是我，而是所有将帮助我们克服未来困难的人。

Original: Galuf:When we battled Exdeath here, you said you were fighting for everyone's future.
Dialogue: When we battled Exdeath here, you said you were fighting for everyone's future.
trans: 当我们在这里与 Exdeath 战斗时，你说你是在为每个人的未来而战。

Original: Galuf:You were as reliable as ever. Even without your memories, you were still you.
Dialogue: You were as reliable as ever. Even without your memories, you were still you.
trans: 你一如既往地可靠。

Original: Galuf:And being there as one of your friends is something I am proud of. Next to my Krile, of course. Ho ho!
Dialogue: And being there as one of your friends is something I am proud of. Next to my Krile, of course. Ho ho!
trans: 作为你的朋友之一在那里是我引以为豪的事情。

Original: Galuf:Let us overcome the battles ahead and protect the future with all of our comrades.
Dialogue: Let us overcome the battles ahead and protect the future with all of our comrades.
trans: 让我们与所有战友一起战胜前方的战斗，守护未来。

Original: Bartz:You're right. Thanks, Galuf.
Dialogue: You're right. Thanks, Galuf.
trans: 你说得对。

Original: Galuf:(Dorgann... Your son has become a man more reliable than most.)
Dialogue: (Dorgann... Your son has become a man more reliable than most.)
trans: （多尔根……你的儿子已经成为比大多数人都可靠的男人了。）

Original: Bartz:What's the matter, Galuf?
Dialogue: What's the matter, Galuf?
trans: 怎么了，加鲁夫？

Original: Galuf:Never you mind this old man. We have a journey ahead of us!
Dialogue: Never you mind this old man. We have a journey ahead of us!
trans: 别介意这个老人。

Original: Ace:Where am I...?
Dialogue: Where am I...?
trans: 我在哪里...？

Original: Ace:You're that monster trying to destroy the world...aren't you?
Dialogue: You're that monster trying to destroy the world...aren't you?
trans: 你就是那个想要毁灭世界的怪物……是吗？

Original: Cloud of Darkness:When the balance of light and dark is disrupted, we return the world to nothingness.
Dialogue: When the balance of light and dark is disrupted, we return the world to nothingness.
trans: 当光明与黑暗的平衡被打破时，我们将世界归于虚无。

Original: Ace:Is that...my dark manikin!?
Dialogue: Is that...my dark manikin!?
trans: 那是……我的黑暗人体模型！？

Original: Cloud of Darkness:Your will is incomplete. So we will give you what this puppet keeps.
Dialogue: Your will is incomplete. So we will give you what this puppet keeps.
trans: 你的遗嘱不完整。

Original: Cloud of Darkness:The light and darkness of this world still hang in a dangerous balance...
Dialogue: The light and darkness of this world still hang in a dangerous balance...
trans: 这个世界的光明与黑暗仍然处于危险的平衡之中……

Original: Cloud of Darkness:But the world has already fallen into chaos and heads toward destruction.
Dialogue: But the world has already fallen into chaos and heads toward destruction.
trans: 但世界已经陷入混乱，走向毁灭。

Original: Cloud of Darkness:The flood of darkness is near... So we bestow you with the power of will.
Dialogue: The flood of darkness is near... So we bestow you with the power of will.
trans: 黑暗的洪流临近了……所以我们赋予你意志的力量。

Original: Ace:Why me...?
Dialogue: Why me...?
trans: 为什么是我...？

Original: Ace:Mother? Is she in this world, too?
Dialogue: Mother? Is she in this world, too?
trans: 母亲？

Original: Cloud of Darkness:That Mother has great power... As such, we cannot locate her.
Dialogue: That Mother has great power... As such, we cannot locate her.
trans: 那个母亲拥有强大的力量……因此，我们无法找到她。

Original: Ace:So are you returning my memories because Mother told you about me?
Dialogue: So are you returning my memories because Mother told you about me?
trans: 所以你是在恢复我的记忆，因为妈妈告诉你关于我的事吗？

Original: Cloud of Darkness:We grant her wish with this powerful will.
Dialogue: We grant her wish with this powerful will.
trans: 我们以这种强大的意志实现她的愿望。

Original: Cloud of Darkness:The crystal core of darkness will bestow you with as much power as you wish.
Dialogue: The crystal core of darkness will bestow you with as much power as you wish.
trans: 黑暗水晶核心会赋予你想要的力量。

Original: Cloud of Darkness:Now take it!
Dialogue: Now take it!
trans: 现在拿去！

Original: Ace:These are...my memories...
Dialogue: These are...my memories...
trans: 这些是……我的回忆……

Original: Ace:Is that it...? Was that...the end?
Dialogue: Is that it...? Was that...the end?
trans: 难道是……？

Original: Ace:...I see.
Dialogue: ...I see.
trans: ...我懂了。

Original: Ace:So that's why you're trying to make me use the power of my will...
Dialogue: So that's why you're trying to make me use the power of my will...
trans: 所以这就是为什么你试图让我使用我意志的力量......

Original: Cloud of Darkness:Will is law here. With it, one can create anything they desire.
Dialogue: Will is law here. With it, one can create anything they desire.
trans: 意志就是这里的法律。

Original: Ace:And if my wish comes true, then so does yoursunleashing a flood of darkness.
Dialogue: And if my wish comes true, then so does yours—unleashing a flood of darkness.
trans: 如果我的愿望成真，那么你的愿望也会实现——释放黑暗的洪流。

Original: Cloud of Darkness:All is according to the will of humans. The choice is in your hands.
Dialogue: All is according to the will of humans. The choice is in your hands.
trans: 一切都是按照人的意志来的。

Original: Cloud of Darkness:If you will not use that power, we need only choose another.
Dialogue: If you will not use that power, we need only choose another.
trans: 如果你不使用那个力量，我们只需要选择另一个。

Original: Ace:...That won't be necessary.
Dialogue: ...That won't be necessary.
trans: ……那是没有必要的。

Original: Ace:We have nowhere to return, no one to remember us.
Dialogue: We have nowhere to return, no one to remember us.
trans: 我们无处可归，没有人记得我们。

Original: Ace:That's why we'll live here... I'll create a home for us in this world!
Dialogue: That's why we'll live here... I'll create a home for us in this world!
trans: 这就是为什么我们要住在这里……我会在这个世界上为我们创造一个家！

Original: Cloud of Darkness:Then go forth. The land of respite awaits you.
Dialogue: Then go forth. The land of respite awaits you.
trans: 然后出去。

Original: Ace:...I will decide my own fate.
Dialogue: ...I will decide my own fate.
trans: ……我来决定自己的命运。

Original: Ace:I know the fear of death.
Dialogue: I know the fear of death.
trans: 我知道对死亡的恐惧。

Original: Ace:And now I choose...
Dialogue: And now I choose...
trans: 而现在我选择...

Original: Ace:To live in a world where I have a future.
Dialogue: To live in a world where I have a future.
trans: 生活在一个我有未来的世界里。

Original: Ace:That's right. This is my place of respite...
Dialogue: That's right. This is my place of respite...
trans: 这是正确的。

Original: Dark Manikin (Machina):Back again? You really like chocobos, don't you?
Dialogue: Back again? You really like chocobos, don't you?
trans: 再次回来？

Original: Ace:Is that weird?
Dialogue: Is that weird?
trans: 这很奇怪吗？

Original: Dark Manikin (Machina):But you could be doing better things with your time than wasting it here.
Dialogue: But you could be doing better things with your time than wasting it here.
trans: 但是你可以用你的时间做更好的事情而不是在这里浪费它。

Original: Dark Manikin (Machina):Couldn't you think of something else to do?
Dialogue: Couldn't you think of something else to do?
trans: 你就不能想点别的事做吗？

Original: Ace:This is fine. I don't want to make things worse.
Dialogue: This is fine. I don't want to make things worse.
trans: 这可以。

Original: Dark Manikin (Machina):Still... Don't you want to see the others?
Dialogue: Still... Don't you want to see the others?
trans: 还是……不想见其他人？

Original: Ace:Not right now. I want to be somewhere quiet.
Dialogue: Not right now. I want to be somewhere quiet.
trans: 不是现在。

Original: Chocobo:Kweh, kweh!
Dialogue: Kweh, kweh!
trans: 哇，哇！

Original: Dark Manikin (Machina):Does this sound quiet to you?
Dialogue: Does this sound quiet to you?
trans: 这听起来安静吗？

Original: Ace:They're just hungry.
Dialogue: They're just hungry.
trans: 他们只是饿了。

Original: Dark Manikin (Machina):I know. Wait your turn.
Dialogue: I know. Wait your turn.
trans: 我知道。

Original: Dark Manikin (Machina):Well, if you're going to stay, at least help out.
Dialogue: Well, if you're going to stay, at least help out.
trans: 好吧，如果你要留下来，至少帮帮忙。

Original: Ace:Right. Who's this?
Dialogue: Right. Who's this?
trans: 正确的。

Original: Dark Manikin (Machina):Ah, this one's name is...
Dialogue: Ah, this one's name is...
trans: 啊，这位的名字是……

Original: Onion Knight:He also said the crystal core of darkness is running wild and being manipulated by someone.
Dialogue: He also said the crystal core of darkness is running wild and being manipulated by someone.
trans: 还说黑暗晶核在肆虐，被人操纵。

Original: Leo:Spiritus tasked me with locating the crystal core and putting a stop to whoever is abusing it.
Dialogue: Spiritus tasked me with locating the crystal core and putting a stop to whoever is abusing it.
trans: Spiritus 指派我找到水晶核心并制止任何滥用它的人。

Original: Kain:Heh... So I'm finally one of them now.
Dialogue: Heh... So I'm finally one of them now.
trans: 呵呵……所以我现在终于是他们中的一员了。

Original: Warrior of Light:We've been fighting together for a long time now. As we have with others summoned by Spiritus.
Dialogue: We've been fighting together for a long time now. As we have with others summoned by Spiritus.
trans: 我们已经一起战斗了很长时间了。

Original: Onion Knight:Aside from the rotten apples we can't reason with...
Dialogue: Aside from the rotten apples we can't reason with...
trans: 除了烂苹果，我们无法推理...

Original: Onion Knight:Right now, I want to work with the other warriors who haven't joined us yet.
Dialogue: Right now, I want to work with the other warriors who haven't joined us yet.
trans: 现在，我想和其他还没有加入我们的战士一起工作。

Original: Machina:You're so calm. It's like you aren't worried at all.
Dialogue: You're so calm. It's like you aren't worried at all.
trans: 你真冷静

Original: Onion Knight:Me? I guess it's because the Cloud of Darkness from my world is like calamity given form.
Dialogue: Me? I guess it's because the Cloud of Darkness from my world is like calamity given form.
trans: 我？

Original: Onion Knight:And there's no way you can reason with a storm or natural disaster.
Dialogue: And there's no way you can reason with a storm or natural disaster.
trans: 你无法用暴风雨或自然灾害来推理。

Original: Machina:I see... I guess everyone's got their own circumstances.
Dialogue: I see... I guess everyone's got their own circumstances.
trans: 我明白了……我想每个人都有自己的情况。

Original: Kain:Exactly. Yourself included, Machina.
Dialogue: Exactly. Yourself included, Machina.
trans: 确切地。

Original: Kain:There is no need to compare yourself to others. You must decide your own route for yourself.
Dialogue: There is no need to compare yourself to others. You must decide your own route for yourself.
trans: 没有必要将自己与他人进行比较。

Original: Machina:...I wish I could.
Dialogue: ...I wish I could.
trans: ...我希望我能。

Original: Mog:Kupo! I found a new area, kupo!
Dialogue: Kupo! I found a new area, kupo!
trans: 外套！

Original: Mog:I can sense brilliance, and Shinryu! Prepare to land, kupo!
Dialogue: I can sense brilliance, and Shinryu! Prepare to land, kupo!
trans: 我能感觉到光彩，还有Shinryu！

Original: Rem:Now that you mention it, it does.
Dialogue: Now that you mention it, it does.
trans: 既然你提到它，它确实如此。

Original: Fran:This wasteland is your home?
Dialogue: This wasteland is your home?
trans: 这片荒地是你的家？

Original: Deuce:Well...a part of it.
Dialogue: Well...a part of it.
trans: 嗯……一部分。

Original: Rem:There are, unfortunately, a lot of places that look like this because of the war.
Dialogue: There are, unfortunately, a lot of places that look like this because of the war.
trans: 不幸的是，由于战争，有很多地方看起来像这样。

Original: Laguna:So it's a battlefield. Life sure is tough for soldiers...
Dialogue: So it's a battlefield. Life sure is tough for soldiers...
trans: 所以这是一个战场。

Original: Deuce:Weren't you a soldier, too, Laguna?
Dialogue: Weren't you a soldier, too, Laguna?
trans: 拉古纳，你不是也当过兵吗？

Original: Laguna:Yeah, but I quit the army. You kids are still fighting.
Dialogue: Yeah, but I quit the army. You kids are still fighting.
trans: 是的，但我退出了军队。

Original: Rem:But we had a lot of combat missions, so we got used to it pretty quick.
Dialogue: But we had a lot of combat missions, so we got used to it pretty quick.
trans: 但是我们有很多战斗任务，所以我们很快就习惯了。

Original: Machina:Huh? Oh...sorry. What were you talking about?
Dialogue: Huh? Oh...sorry. What were you talking about?
trans: 嗯？

Original: Laguna:How you kids are so young, but doing an amazing job!
Dialogue: How you kids are so young, but doing an amazing job!
trans: 你们的孩子怎么这么年轻，却做得很棒！

Original: Deuce:Is something the matter?
Dialogue: Is something the matter?
trans: 有什么事吗？

Original: Machina:Well, I just realized that I haven't seen Ace in a while now...
Dialogue: Well, I just realized that I haven't seen Ace in a while now...
trans: 好吧，我才意识到我已经有一段时间没见到 Ace 了……

Original: Fran:He may still be aboard the ship. Proper preparation is vital.
Dialogue: He may still be aboard the ship. Proper preparation is vital.
trans: 他可能还在船上。

Original: Machina:...I hope you're right.
Dialogue: ...I hope you're right.
trans: ...我希望你是对的。

Original: Deuce:In a place that looks so much like home...
Dialogue: In a place that looks so much like home...
trans: 在一个看起来很像家的地方……

Original: Deuce:We might be able to find someone else from Orience here.
Dialogue: We might be able to find someone else from Orience here.
trans: 我们或许可以在这里找到来自 Orience 的其他人。

Original: Mog:And my pom-pom is in tip-top condition! So let's go go go, kupo!
Dialogue: And my pom-pom is in tip-top condition! So let's go go go, kupo!
trans: 我的绒球处于最佳状态！

Original: Basch:Could you tell us more about Orience?
Dialogue: Could you tell us more about Orience?
trans: 您能告诉我们更多关于 Orience 的信息吗？

Original: Basch:It might help us learn what to look for here.
Dialogue: It might help us learn what to look for here.
trans: 它可能会帮助我们了解要在这里寻找什么。

Original: Seven:Orience is comprised of four nations, each with their own culture and crystal.
Dialogue: Orience is comprised of four nations, each with their own culture and crystal.
trans: 东方由四个国家组成，每个国家都有自己的文化和水晶。

Original: Irvine:You guys were trained at school in how to fight, right? Like us?
Dialogue: You guys were trained at school in how to fight, right? Like us?
trans: 你们在学校受过如何打架的训练，对吧？

Original: King:Strictly speaking, our training wasn't just for warfare.
Dialogue: Strictly speaking, our training wasn't just for warfare.
trans: 严格来说，我们的训练不只是为了打仗。

Original: King:We cadets are the ones trained to become Agito.
Dialogue: We cadets are the ones trained to become Agito.
trans: 我们学员是受过训练成为 Agito 的人。
